templates.name: Business Point Identification With Report An Error Data
templates.sql: SELECT bpi.ID , bpi.BusinessPointID , bpi.Name , bpi.BrandName , bpi.TaxCode , bpi.Profession , Heading = bpi.Heading, Phone1 = REPLACE(REPLACE(bpi.Phone1,' ',''),'+30',''), Phone2 = REPLACE(REPLACE(bpi.Phone2,' ',''),'+30',''), Phone3 = REPLACE(REPLACE(bpi.Phone3,' ',''),'+30',''), MobilePhone = REPLACE(REPLACE(bpi.MobilePhone,' ',''),'+30',''), Fax = REPLACE(REPLACE(bpi.Fax,' ',''),'+30',''), bpi.Email1 , bpi.Email2 , bpi.Address , bpi.City , bpi.PostalCode , bpi.LegalForm , bpi.TaxOffice , bpi.DMKey , bpi.DMTable , bpi.DMCharKey , bpi.BillingEmailAddress , bpi.BillingTelephone , bpi.ExtraInformation , bpi.CustomerURL , NewBusinessPointCodes = bpi.NewBusinessPointCodes, NameOld = r.BusinessNameOld, HeadingOld =r.HeadingOld, Phone1Old = REPLACE(REPLACE(r.PhoneOld,' ',''),'+30',''), MobilePhoneOld = REPLACE(REPLACE(r.MobileOld,' ',''),'+30',''), FaxOld = REPLACE(REPLACE(r.FaxOld,' ',''),'+30',''), AddressOld = r.AddressOld, GeographicalPositionUrl = bpi.GeographicalPositionUrl, ReportErrorFormID = r.ID, ReportErrorFormCreatedOn = r.CreatedOn FROM dbo.BusinessPointIdentification bpi JOIN ITAPPS.[rae].[ReportErrorForm] r ON bpi.id = r.BusinessPointIdentificationId

templates.name: Campaign Analsysis Previous Campaign View
aggregations: SUM(CASE WHEN cp.AlteredAmount IS NULL THEN cp.Price - cp.Discount - cp.RulesDiscount ELSE cp.AlteredAmount END)
templates.sql: select cs1bp.BusinessPointCode ,cs1bp.CustomerSolvencyID ,cs1bp.CustomerSolvency ,camp.ID CampaignID ,camp.Name CampaignName ,cs1bp.Name ,cs1bp.LocationPrefectureID ,cs1bp.LocationPrefecture ,cs1bp.LocationMunicipalityID ,cs1bp.LocationMunicipality ,cs1bp.LocationGeoModelStreet1ID ,cs1bp.LocationGeoModelStreet1Text ,cs1bp.LocationGeoModelZipCode ,cs1bp.BrandName ,cs1bp.Profession ,cs1bp.MainActivityID ,cs1bp.MainActivity ,cs1bp.Seniority ,PreviousMediumID = mv.MediumID ,PreviousMediumName = me.Name ,PreviousChannelTypID = cc.ChannelTypeID ,PreviousSubChannelTypeID = cc.SubChannelID ,PreviousChannelTypeName = ct.[Description] ,PreviousSubchannelName = sch.[Description] ,PreviousSubrTotalAmountAfterDiscount = CASE WHEN cp.IsSubscriptionBased = 0 THEN cp.Price- cp.Discount - cp.RulesDiscount ELSE null END ,PreviousNoSubrTotalAmountAfterDiscount = CASE WHEN cp.IsSubscriptionBased = 1 THEN cp.Price- cp.Discount - cp.RulesDiscount ELSE null END ,PreviousFinalPrice = CASE WHEN cp.AlteredAmount IS NULL THEN cp.Price - cp.Discount - cp.RulesDiscount ELSE cp.AlteredAmount END ,CurrentChannelTypeID = currContract.ChannelTypeID ,CurrentSubchannelId = currContract.SubChannelID ,CurrentChannelTypeName = currChannelType.[Description] ,CurrentSubchannelName = currSubchannel.[Description] ,CurrentFinalPrice = currContract.Price from CampaignBusinessPoint cbp join Campaign camp on cbp.CampaignID = camp.ID join CanvasStage1BusinessPoint cs1bp on cbp.BusinessPointID = cs1bp.BusinessPointID left join CampaignContractProduct ccp on ccp.BusinessPointID = cbp.BusinessPointID and ccp.CampaignID = cbp.CampaignID left join ContractProduct cp on ccp.ContractProductID = cp.ID left join VersionSection vs on cp.VersionSectionID = vs.ID left join MediumVersion mv on vs.MediumVersionID = mv.ID left join Medium me on mv.MediumID = me.ID left join [Contract] cc on cc.ID = ccp.ContractID left join ( select con.CampaignID CampaignID, con.ActualBPOwnerID BusinessPointID, con.ID ContractID, con.ChannelTypeID, con.SubChannelID, SUM(CASE WHEN cp.AlteredAmount IS NULL THEN cp.Price - cp.Discount - cp.RulesDiscount ELSE cp.AlteredAmount END) Price from [Contract] con join ContractProduct cp on con.ID = cp.RelatedContractID group by con.CampaignID,con.ActualBPOwnerID, con.ID, con.ChannelTypeID, con.SubChannelID ) currContract on currContract.BusinessPointID = ccp.BusinessPointID and currContract.CampaignID = camp.ID left join ChannelType ct on cc.ChannelTypeID = ct.ID left join SubChannel sch on cc.SubChannelID = sch.ID left join ChannelType currChannelType on currContract.ChannelTypeID = currChannelType.ID left join SubChannel currSubchannel on currContract.SubChannelID = currSubchannel.ID

templates.name: Campaign Analysis Per Product View
templates.sql: SELECT distinct CCP.CampaignID as CurrentCampaignID, CurrentCampaign.Code + ' ' + CurrentCampaign.Name as CurrentCampaignName, CCP.ContractProductID as ContractProductID, CCP.AdvertisementID as AdvertisementID, conCampaign.ID AS PreviousCampaignID, conCampaign.Code + ' ' + conCampaign.Name AS Campaign, CS1BP.BusinessPointCode AS BranchCode, CS1BP.Name as Customer, CS1BP.BrandName as BrandName, case when CS1BP.IsActive = 0 then 'InActive' else 'Active' end as BusinessPointStatus, CLN.Name as customerCategory, CS1BP.LocationLine3 as Prefecture, CS1BP.LocationPrefecture as ActualPrefecture, CS1BP.SalesLine3 as SalesPointPrefecture, CS1BP.SalesPrefecture as SalesPointActualPrefecture, CASE WHEN CS1CD.ContractState = 0 THEN 'Pending' WHEN CS1CD.ContractState = 1 THEN 'Approved' WHEN CS1CD.ContractState = 2 THEN 'Rejected' WHEN CS1CD.ContractState = 3 THEN 'Cancelled' WHEN CS1CD.ContractState = 6 THEN 'Modified' ELSE 'UKNOWN '+ CONVERT(NVARCHAR(10),CS1CD.ContractState) END AS ContractStatus, CASE WHEN CS1CD.CPState = 0 THEN 'Pending' WHEN CS1CD.CPState = 1 THEN 'Accepted' WHEN CS1CD.CPState = 2 THEN 'Rejected' WHEN CS1CD.CPState = 3 THEN 'Cancelled' WHEN CS1CD.CPState = 4 THEN 'Interrupted' WHEN CS1CD.CPState = 5 THEN 'Completed' WHEN CS1CD.CPState = 6 THEN 'Modified' WHEN CS1CD.CPState = 7 THEN 'ModifiedForEBS' ELSE 'UKNOWN '+ CONVERT(NVARCHAR(10),CS1CD.CPState) END AS ContractProductStatus, ISNULL(CS1CD.MigratedCode,CS1CD.ContractID) AS ContractCode, CS1CD.CreatedBy AS ContractInsertionUser, CS1CD.SignedDate AS SignDate, ISNULL(CS1CD.NoSubrSalesmanID, CS1CD.SubrSalesmanID) as SalesRepID, ISNULL(CS1CD.NoSubrSalesmanCode,CS1CD.SubrSalesmanCode) AS SaleRepCode, ISNULL(CS1CD.NoSubrSalesman,CS1CD.SubrSalesman) AS SaleRepName, ISNULL(CS1CD.NoSubrSupervisorID,os.OriginalSupervisorID) AS SupervisorID, ISNULL(CS1CD.NoSubrSupervisorCode,os.OriginalSupervisorCode) AS SupervisorCode, ISNULL(CS1CD.NoSubrSupervisor,os.OriginalSupervisorName) AS Supervisor, isnull(CS1CD.ContractAmount,0) AS ContractAmount, CASE WHEN CS1CD.IsCPRenewable = 1 THEN 'True' else 'False' END AS Syndromitiko_Flag, CASE WHEN CS1CD.IsCPSubscriptionBased = 1 THEN 'True' else 'False' END AS Syndromhtiko_Old, CS1CD.CreatedOn AS Contract_Creation_Date, CS1CD.AdvBeginDate AS Start_Date, CASE WHEN CS1CD.CreatedBy = 'SubScriptionRenewalAll' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS Auto_Renewal, CASE WHEN CS1CD.IsBundle = 1 THEN 'True' else 'False' END AS IsBundle, CS1CD.CPCode AS ProductCode, CS1CD.CPName AS ProductName, CS1CD.AdvProductCode AS AdvertisementProductCode, CS1CD.AdvProductName AS AdvertisementProductName, CS1CD.AdvHeadingCode + ' - ' + CS1CD.AdvHeadingName AS SHeading, me.Name AS Medium, mv.Code AS MediumVersion, vs.Name AS VersionSection, CS1CD.CPInterruptionDate AS AdvertisementInterruptionDate, CS1CD.AdvEndDate AS AdvertisementEndDate, CS1CD.AdvPrice AS Price, ISNULL(CS1CD.AdvDiscount,0) + ISNULL(CS1CD.AdvRulesDiscount,0) AS Discount, ISNULL(CS1CD.AdvPrice,0) - ISNULL(CS1CD.AdvDiscount,0) - ISNULL(CS1CD.AdvRulesDiscount,0) AS PriceAfterDiscount, CASE WHEN CS1CD.CPState in (3,4) THEN CS1CD.AdvAlteredAmount ELSE NULL END AS AlteredAmount, CASE WHEN CS1CD.CPState in (3,4) THEN CS1CD.AdvAlteredAmount ELSE (ISNULL(CS1CD.AdvPrice,0) - ISNULL(CS1CD.AdvDiscount,0) - ISNULL(CS1CD.AdvRulesDiscount,0)) END AS FinalPriceAfterDiscount, CS1CD.ContractPaymentMethodName AS PaymentMethod, CASE WHEN CS1CDRenewals.OriginalContractID = CS1CD.ContractID AND CS1CDRenewals.ContractState IN (3, 5, 10) THEN 'Cancelled' WHEN CS1CDRenewals.OriginalContractID = CS1CD.ContractID AND CS1CDRenewals.CPState IN (3, 4) THEN 'Cancelled' WHEN CS1CDRenewals.OriginalContractID = CS1CD.ContractID AND CS1CDRenewals.CPState NOT IN (3, 4) AND CS1CDRenewals.ContractState NOT IN (3, 5, 10) THEN 'Valid' ELSE '' END as AutoRenewalContractStatus, CASE WHEN CS1CDRenewals.OriginalContractID = CS1CD.ContractID AND CS1CDRenewals.IsCPRenewable = 1 THEN 'True' WHEN CS1CDRenewals.OriginalContractID = CS1CD.ContractID AND CS1CDRenewals.IsCPRenewable = 0 THEN 'False' WHEN CS1CDRenewals.OriginalContractID = CS1CD.ContractID THEN '' END AS AutoRenewalContractRenewStatus, CASE WHEN CS1CDRenewals.OriginalContractID = CS1CD.ContractID THEN CS1CDRenewals.ContractID END AS AutoRenewalContractId, CASE WHEN CS1CDRenewals.OriginalContractID = CS1CD.ContractID THEN CS1CD.ContractID END AS OldCtr, CASE WHEN CS1CDRenewals.OriginalContractID = CS1CD.ContractID THEN CS1CDRenewals.SourceContractProductID END AS SourceContractProductID, CS1CD.ContractReleaseDate AS ReleasedDate FROM CanvasStage1ContractDetail AS CS1CD JOIN CampaignContractProduct as CCP ON CS1CD.ContractProductID = CCP.ContractProductID and CS1CD.Advertisementid = CCP.AdvertisementID left JOIN CanvasStage1ContractDetail as CS1CDRenewals on CS1CDRenewals.OriginalContractID = CS1CD.ContractID and CS1CDRenewals.SourceContractProductID = CS1CD.ContractProductID JOIN CanvasStage1BusinessPoint as CS1BP ON CCP.BusinessPointID = CS1BP.BusinessPointID JOIN Campaign as PreviousCampaign ON CCP.PreviousCampaignID = PreviousCampaign.ID JOIN Campaign as CurrentCampaign ON CCP.CampaignID = CurrentCampaign.ID join Advertisement adv on adv.ID = CS1CD.Advertisementid join Product pr on pr.id = adv.Productid and pr.IsComposite = 0 left join VersionSection vs on adv.VersionSectionID = vs.ID left join MediumVersion mv on vs.MediumVersionID = mv.ID left join Medium me on mv.MediumID = me.ID left join Campaign conCampaign on CS1CD.ContractCampaignID = conCampaign.ID LEFT JOIN Classification CLF on CLF.BusinessPointID = CS1BP.BusinessPointID AND CLF.ClassifierID = 7 LEFT JOIN ClassifierNode CLN on CLF.ClassifierNodeID = CLN.ID outer apply fn_GetOriginalSupervisor(CS1CD.ContractID) os WHERE CurrentCampaign.State = 1

templates.name: Campaign Bucket File Upload History Status View
templates.sql: select h.CampaignID AS CampaignID ,h.ID AS FileID ,h.FileName AS FileName ,h.CreatedOn AS CreatedOn ,h.CreatedByUserID AS CreatedByUserID ,u.FirstName AS CreatedByUserFirstName ,u.LastName AS CreatedByUserLastName ,CASE WHEN EXISTS(SELECT NULL FROM CampaignBucketFileUploadHistoryDetail AS hd WHERE h.ID = hd.FileID) THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT) END AS HasFileHistoryDetail ,CASE WHEN (EXISTS(SELECT NULL FROM CampaignBucket AS cb JOIN CampaignSegmentStatus as css on cb.CampaignID = css.CampaignID AND cb.SegmentID = css.SegmentID WHERE cb.CampaignID = h.CampaignID AND cb.FileID = h.ID AND css.SegmentStatusID = 0 AND cb.ItemStatus = 0 ) OR EXISTS( SELECT NULL FROM CampaignBucket AS cb --FYI: Must permit the ability to delete from current 'RUNNING' Segment. JOIN CampaignSegmentStatus as css on cb.CampaignID = css.CampaignID AND cb.SegmentID = css.SegmentID WHERE cb.CampaignID = h.CampaignID AND cb.FileID = h.ID AND css.SegmentStatusID = 1 AND cb.ItemStatus = 0 AND cb.SegmentID = MONTH(GETDATE()) )) THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT) END AS CanDeleteFromBucket FROM CampaignBucketFileUploadHistory as h JOIN [User] as u on h.CreatedByUserID = u.id

templates.name: Campaign New Loss Premise Customer View
templates.sql: with a as ( SELECT r.CampaignID as CampaignID, r.ID as RuleID, r.Name as RuleName, cp.Code as CampaignCode, cp.[Description] as CampaignDescription, cp.[State] as CampaignState, cp.StartedOn as CampaignStartedOn, cp.ClosedOn as CampaignClosedOn, s.SalesmanID as SalesmanID, r.CreatorUserID as CreatorUserID, cu.FirstName as CreatorFistName, cu.LastName as CreatorLastName, bp.ID as BusinessPointID, bp.Code as BuisnessPointCode, bp.Brandname as BusinessPointBrandName, bp.Name as BusinessPointName, cn.Name as MainActivityName, --baup.AreaName as City, bp.HasCRMTicket as HasCRMTicket, cuso.[Description] as ReliabilityStatus, ISNULL(cuso.ID,0) as ReliabilityID, bp.LocationAddressID, CASE WHEN EXISTS( SELECT NULL FROM [case] cs JOIN task t on t.CaseID = cs.id JOIN TargetGroupItemValue tgiv with (nolock) on cs.ContextEntityID = tgiv.id and cs.ContextEntityType = 'TGIV' JOIN TargetGroupItem tgi with (nolock) on tgi.id = tgiv.TargetGroupItemID WHERE c.BusinessPointID = tgi.BusinessPointID AND tgi.CampaignID = r.CampaignID ) THEN 1 else 0 END as HasSalesMarketCase FROM CampaignNewLossCustomerRule as r JOIN Campaign as cp with (nolock) on r.CampaignID = cp.ID JOIN CampaignNewLossCustomer as c with (nolock) ON r.ID = c.RuleID JOIN CampaignNewLossCustomerRuleSalesman as s with (nolock) ON r.ID = s.RuleID JOIN [User] as cu with (nolock) on r.CreatorUserID = cu.ID JOIN [User] as sd with (nolock) on s.SalesmanID = sd.ID JOIN BusinessPoint as bp with (nolock) on c.BusinessPointID = bp.ID join ClassifierNode cn on bp.ActivityClassifierNodeID = cn.ID --left join BroaderArea ba on ba.AddressID = bp.LocationAddressID and LEFT(ba.BroaderAreaID,1) = 'B' and ba.BroaderAreaID <> 'B1' --left join BroaderAreaLookUp baup on ba.BroaderAreaID = baup.BroaderAreaID left join CustomerSolvency cuso with (nolock) on bp.CustomerSolvencyID = cuso.ID WHERE r.IsActive = 1 AND r.ChannelTypeID = 0 --Premis Channel Type = 0 AND cp.[State] = 2 AND NOT EXISTS(SELECT NULL FROM CampaignNewLossSalesmenCustomer as sc where r.ID = sc.RuleID and c.BusinessPointID = sc.BusinessPointID) ) select a.*, min(adr.GeoModelLocText) as City from a --left join BroaderArea ba on ba.AddressID = a.LocationAddressID and LEFT(ba.BroaderAreaID,1) = 'B' and ba.BroaderAreaID <> 'B1' --left join BroaderAreaLookUp baup on ba.BroaderAreaID = baup.BroaderAreaID left join address adr on a.LocationAddressID = adr.ID group by a.CampaignID, a.RuleID, a.RuleName, a.CampaignCode, a.CampaignDescription, a.CampaignState, a.CampaignStartedOn, a.CampaignClosedOn, a.SalesmanID, a.CreatorUserID, a.CreatorFistName, a.CreatorLastName, a.BusinessPointID, a.BuisnessPointCode, a.BusinessPointBrandName, a.BusinessPointName, a.MainActivityName, a.HasCRMTicket, a.ReliabilityStatus, a.ReliabilityID, a.LocationAddressID, a.HasSalesMarketCase

templates.name: Campaign Pivot Report View Item

joins.right: CS.ID /* JOIN CampaignChannelType AS CCT on REP.CampaignChannelTypeID = CCT.ID LEFT JOIN ChannelType AS CT ON REP.CampaignChannelTypeID = CT.ID LEFT JOIN CampaignGroup AS CG ON REP.CampaignGroupID = CG.ID LEFT JOIN User AS SALESMAN ON REP.CampaignSalesmanID = SALESMAN.ID LEFT JOIN User AS SUPERVISOR ON REP.CampaignSuperVisorID = SUPERVISOR.ID */

templates.sql: /****** Script for SelectTopNRows command from SSMS ******/ SELECT REP.ID ,REP.CampaignID ,CAMP.Code as CampaignCode ,CAMP.Name as CampaignName ,REP.CampaignSegmentID ,CS.Name AS CampaignSegmentName ,REP.CampaignChannelTypeID ,CT.Description AS CampaignChannelTypeName ,REP.CampaignGroupID ,CG.Name As CampaignGroupName ,REP.CampaignSupervisorID ,SUPERVISOR.FirstName AS SupervisorFirstName ,SUPERVISOR.LastName AS SupervisorLastName ,REP.CampaignSalesmanID ,SALESMAN.FirstName AS SalesmanFirstName ,SALESMAN.LastName AS SalesmanLastName ,REP.NumberOfCases ,REP.LossQuantity ,REP.NewQuantity ,REP.COQuantity ,REP.LossQuantityPercentage ,REP.NewQuantityPercentage ,REP.COQuantityPercentage ,REP.ContractAmount ,REP.SubscriptionAmount ,REP.RenewalAmount ,REP.NonSubscriptionAmount ,REP.SubscriptionAmountPercentage ,REP.RenewalAmountPercentage ,REP.NonSubscriptionAmountPercentage ,REP.PivotType FROM CampaignPivotReport AS REP JOIN Campaign AS CAMP ON REP.CampaignID = CAMP.ID JOIN CampaignSegment AS CS ON REP.CampaignSegmentID = CS.ID -- JOIN CampaignChannelType AS CCT on REP.CampaignChannelTypeID = CCT.ID LEFT JOIN ChannelType AS CT ON REP.CampaignChannelTypeID = CT.ID LEFT JOIN CampaignGroup AS CG ON REP.CampaignGroupID = CG.ID LEFT JOIN [User] AS SALESMAN ON REP.CampaignSalesmanID = SALESMAN.ID LEFT JOIN [User] AS SUPERVISOR ON REP.CampaignSuperVisorID = SUPERVISOR.ID

templates.name: Campaign Sales Market View Item
templates.sql: SELECT T.ID AS TaskID ,T.Description AS TaskDescrition ,T.TaskTypeID AS TaskTypeID ,T.Status AS TaskStatus ,T.EditorState AS TaskEditorState ,C.ID as CaseID ,C.CaseTypeID as CaseTypeID ,C.State as CaseState ,C.SubState as CaseSubState ,CSMI.CampaignID ,CSMI.TargetGroupItemValueID ,CSMI.SegmentID ,CSMI.ChannelTypeID ,CSMI.GroupID ,CSMI.BusinessPointCode ,CSMI.NewLossCOID ,CSMI.NewLossCO ,CSMI.PreviousCampaignName ,CSMI.PrefectureID ,CSMI.Prefecture ,CSMI.MunicipalityID ,CSMI.Municipality ,CSMI.LocationGeoModelStreet1ID ,CSMI.LocationGeoModelStreet1Text ,CSMI.LocationGeoModelStreet1Num ,CSMI.LocationGeoModelZipCode ,CSMI.BusinessPointName ,CSMI.BusinessPointBrandName ,CSMI.Profession ,CSMI.MainActivityID ,CSMI.MainActivity ,CSMI.CustomerSolvencyID ,CSMI.CustomerSolvency ,CSMI.PaymentRefusal ,CSMI.Disappeared ,CSMI.PrecariousnessLegal ,CSMI.ContinuousPaymentRefusal ,CSMI.SealedCheck ,CSMI.SignedDate ,CSMI.AdvBeginDateSubr ,CSMI.AdvEndDate ,CSMI.AdvDeactivationReason ,CSMI.IsCPSubscriptionBased ,CSMI.IsCPRenewable ,CSMI.SubrTotalAmountDiscount ,CSMI.NoSubrTotalAmountDiscounts ,CSMI.RenewalTotalAmount ,CSMI.PrePrintedTotalAmount ,CSMI.NoSubrSalesmanID ,CSMI.NoSubrSalesmanCode ,CSMI.NoSubrSalesman ,CSMI.NoSubrSupervisorCode ,CSMI.NoSubrSupervisor ,CSMI.NoSubrChannelTypeID ,CSMI.NoSubrChannelType ,CSMI.SubrSalesmanID ,CSMI.SubrSalesmanCode ,CSMI.SubrSalesman ,CSMI.SubrSupervisorCode ,CSMI.SubrSupervisor ,CSMI.SubrChannelType ,CSMI.SubrChannelTypeID ,CSMI.CreatedOn ,CSMI.IsBundle ,CSMI.LastSignedDate ,CSMI.LegalForm ,CSMI.LastModifiedOn ,CSMI.CustomerUpdateID ,CSMI.CustomerUpdate ,CSMI.ChanneType ,CSMI.GroupName ,CSMI.SegmentName ,CSMI.SegmentStartDate ,CSMI.SegmentEndDate ,CSMI.HandlerSalesManID ,CSMI.HandlerSalesManCode ,CSMI.HandlerSalesManLastName ,CSMI.HandlerSalesManFirstName ,CSMI.HandlerSupervisorCode ,CSMI.HandlerSupervisorLastName ,CSMI.HandlerSupervisorFirstName ,CSMI.TargetSalesManID ,CSMI.TargetSalesManCode ,CSMI.TargetSalesManLastName ,CSMI.TargetSalesManFirstName ,CSMI.TargetSupervisorCode ,CSMI.TargetSupervisorLastName ,CSMI.TargetSupervisorFirstName ,CSMI.ReleasedStartDate ,CSMI.ReleasedEndDateDate ,CSMI.IsReleased ,CSMI.MediumCode ,CSMI.MediumName ,CSMI.UDFString01 ,CSMI.UDFString02 ,CSMI.UDFString03 ,CSMI.UDFString04 ,CSMI.UDFString05 ,CSMI.FinalPrice ,CSMI.Seniority ,CSMI.SplitGroupNumber ,CSMI.BusinessPointID FROM CampaignSalesMarketItem AS CSMI JOIN TargetGroupItemValue AS TGIV ON CSMI.TargetGroupItemValueID = TGIV.ID JOIN [Case] AS C ON TGIV.ID = C.ContextEntityID AND C.ContextEntityType = 'TGIV' JOIN Task AS T ON c.ID = T.CaseID

templates.name: Campaign Score Report View
templates.sql: select csr.ID, csr.CampaignID AS CampaignID, csr.SegmentID AS SegmentID, csr.SalesmanID AS SalesmanID, sdu.FirstName AS SalesmanFirstName, sdu.LastName AS SalesmanLastName, csr.SupervisorID AS SupervisorID, su.FirstName AS SupervisorFirstName, su.LastName AS SupervisorLastName, csr.MangerID AS ManagerID, csr.NumberOfCustomers AS NumberOfCustomers, csr.TotalCoAmount AS TotalCoAmount, csr.TotalRoCoAmount AS TotalRoCoAmount, csr.TotalNew AS TotalNew from CampaignScoreReport AS csr join [user] AS sdu on csr.SalesmanID = sdu.ID join [User] AS su on csr.SupervisorID = su.ID

templates.sql: --SELECT CustomerCode, CreatedOn, CompanyCode, ActionID, CreatedBY, ActionDescr -- FROM [cardinal12].[CTCollect_XO].[dbo].[COMPToYPSContacts] SELECT [CustomerCode] = cast(999999999999 as numeric(18,0)), [CreatedOn] = cast('' as datetime) , [CompanyCode] = cast(1 as smallint), [ActionID] = cast(1 as numeric(18,0)), [CreatedBY] = cast('' as char(20)), [ActionDescr] = cast('' as varchar(100))

templates.name: COMPTo YPSCustomer Identification
templates.sql: SELECT [ActionId] ,[CustomerCode] collate Greek_CI_AS as [CustomerCode] ,[Name] collate Greek_CI_AS as [Name] ,[BrandName] collate Greek_CI_AS as [BrandName] ,[TaxCode] ,[Profession] collate Greek_CI_AS as [Profession] ,[Phone1] ,[Phone2] ,[Phone3] ,[MobilePhone] ,[Fax] ,[Email1] ,[Email2] ,[Address] collate Greek_CI_AS as [Address] ,[City] collate Greek_CI_AS as [City] ,[PostalCode] ,[LegalForm] collate Greek_CI_AS as [LegalForm] ,[TaxOffice] collate Greek_CI_AS as [TaxOffice] ,[BillingEmailAddress] collate Greek_CI_AS as [BillingEmailAddress] ,[BillingTelephone] ,[ExtraInformation] collate Greek_CI_AS as [ExtraInformation] ,[CreatedOn] ,[IdentityConfirmed] ,[CreatedBY] collate Greek_CI_AS as [CreatedBY] FROM [cardinal12].[OC_XO_UPGRADE].[dbo].[COMPToYPSCustomerIdentification] --Devops 11433 - 2025-01-20

templates.name: COMPTo YPSLast Action
templates.sql: select cast(a.CustomerCode as nvarchar(50)) as BusinessPointCode ,ISNULL(a.CreatedOn, 0) AS ActionCreatedOn ,cast(a.ActionCode as numeric(18,0)) AS ActionID ,cast(RTRIM(LTRIM(a.Agent)) as varchar(20)) AS ActionCreatedBy ,cast(ISNULL(a.ActionDescription,'') as varchar(100)) AS ActionDescription from [ITApps].dbo.[CollectionActions] a where a.rn = 1 and CompanyCode = 1

templates.name: Customer Relationships View
templates.sql: SELECT MainCustomerID ,MainCustomerCode ,CustomerID ,CustomerCode ,CustomerType ,MainCustomerIsActive ,CustomerIsActive FROM dbo.CustomerRelationshipsViewBasic --where CustomerID not in ( select CustomerID from dbo.CustomerRelationshipsViewDoubles) /* old code SELECT BP.ID As MainCustomerID, BP.Code as MainCustomerCode, BP.ID AS CustomerID, BP.Code AS CustomerCode, 1 AS CustomerType, -- ''ΕΔΡΑ'' BP.IsActive as MainCustomerIsActive FROM BusinessPoint AS BP WHERE BP.IsPOI = 0 AND BP.IsActive = 1 AND NOT (EXISTS( SELECT NULL AS EMPTY FROM PointRelationship AS PR WHERE PR.Type = 2 AND PR.TargetBussinessPointID = BP.ID )) UNION ALL SELECT BP2.ID AS MainCustomerID, BP2.Code AS MainCustomerCode, BP1.ID AS CustomerID, BP1.Code AS CustomerCode, 2 as CustomerType, -- ''ΥΠΟΚΑΤΑΣΤΗΜΑ'' BP2.IsActive as MainCustomerIsActive FROM PointRelationship AS PR INNER JOIN BusinessPoint AS BP1 ON BP1.ID = PR.TargetBussinessPointID INNER JOIN BusinessPoint AS BP2 ON BP2.ID = PR.BusinessPointID WHERE PR.Type = 2 AND BP1.IsPOI = 0 AND BP2.IsPOI = 0 AND BP1.IsActive = 1 AND BP2.IsActive = 1 */

templates.name: Customer Relationships View Basic
templates.sql: /*==============================================================*/ /* View: CustomerRelationshipsViewBasic */ /*==============================================================*/ create view CustomerRelationshipsViewBasic as with crv as ( -- EDRA = not exists PointRelationship that shows another point as BillingPoint -- and exists PointRelationship that shows the same point as BillingPoint select MainCustomerID = [targetBP].ID ,MainCustomerCode = [targetBP].Code ,CustomerID = [targetBP].ID ,CustomerCode = [targetBP].Code ,CustomerType = 1 ,MainCustomerIsActive = [targetBP].IsActive ,CustomerIsActive = [targetBP].IsActive ,lvl=0 from dbo.BusinessPoint [targetBP] WHERE [targetBP].IsPOI = 0 and targetBP.ID not in ( select BusinessPointID from dbo.PointRelationship pr where pr.[Type] = 10 and pr.BusinessPointID <> pr.TargetBussinessPointID ) and targetBP.ID in ( select BusinessPointID from dbo.PointRelationship pr where pr.[Type] = 10 and pr.BusinessPointID = pr.TargetBussinessPointID ) union all -- ΥΠΟΚΑΤΑΣΤΗΜΑ = BusinessPoint that has BillingPoint one of the EDRAs SELECT MainCustomerID = bp.ID ,MainCustomerCode = bp.Code ,CustomerID = sourceBP.ID ,CustomerCode = sourceBP.Code ,CustomerType = 2 -- ΥΠΟΚΑΤΑΣΤΗΜΑ ,MainCustomerIsActive = bp.IsActive ,CustomerIsActive = sourceBP.IsActive ,lvl= targetBP.lvl+1 FROM crv [targetBP] join dbo.BusinessPoint bp on targetBP.CustomerID = bp.ID JOIN dbo.PointRelationship PR ON bp.ID = PR.TargetBussinessPointID and PR.[Type] = 10 and pr.BusinessPointID <> pr.TargetBussinessPointID JOIN dbo.BusinessPoint [sourceBP] ON [sourceBP].ID = PR.BusinessPointID AND [sourceBP].IsPOI = 0 ) select MainCustomerID ,MainCustomerCode ,CustomerID ,CustomerCode ,CustomerType ,MainCustomerIsActive ,CustomerIsActive ,lvl from crv

templates.name: Dialer View Reasons Per Task
templates.sql: select dt.BusinessPointID as BusinessPointID,dt.CurrentTaskID as CurrentTaskID, CallResultID =(Case when tgiv.PostponeReasonID is not null and tgiv.NegationReasonID is null and tgiv.NoCommReasonID is null then 3 --ΕΠΑΝΑΚΛΗΣΗ when tgiv.NegationReasonID is not null and tgiv.NegationReasonID in (select id from NegationReason where NegationType = 1 ) then 5 --ΑΡΝΗΣΗ ΕΠΙΚΟΙΝΩΝΙΑΣ when tgiv.NegationReasonID is not null and tgiv.NegationReasonID in (select id from NegationReason where NegationType = 2 )then 1 --ΑΡΝΗΣΗ ΣΥΝΕΡΓΑΣΙΑΣ when tgiv.NoCommReasonID is not null then 2 --ΑΔΥΝΑΜΙΑ ΕΥΡΕΣΗΣ ΠΕΛΑΤΗ end), ReasonID = (Case when tgiv.PostponeReasonID is not null and tgiv.NegationReasonID is null and tgiv.NoCommReasonID is null then tgiv.PostponeReasonID when tgiv.NegationReasonID is not null then tgiv.NegationReasonID when tgiv.NoCommReasonID is not null then tgiv.NoCommReasonID end), ReasonDescription = (Case when tgiv.PostponeReasonID is not null and tgiv.NegationReasonID is null and tgiv.NoCommReasonID is null then (select description from PostponeReason where ID=tgiv.PostponeReasonID) when tgiv.NegationReasonID is not null then (select description from NegationReason where ID=tgiv.NegationReasonID) when tgiv.NoCommReasonID is not null then (select description from NoCommReason where ID=tgiv.NoCommReasonID) end),dt.ExportDate from DialerTask dt join TargetGroupItemValue tgiv on tgiv.id=dt.TargetGroupItemValueID join Task t on t.ID = dt.CurrentTaskID where (tgiv.PostponeReasonID is not null or tgiv.NegationReasonID is not null or tgiv.NoCommReasonID is not null ) and ((year(dt.ExportDate) = YEAR(getdate()))or((year(dt.ExportDate) = year(DATEADD(YEAR, -1, GETDATE()))) and month(dt.ExportDate) =12)) -- 8691 DevOps

templates.name: Dir Product Attribute Value Relationship
templates.sql: -- Για τον έλεγχο 2b από το email -- Έλεγχος με βάση το classifierNode & το attributevalue SELECT DirProductId = p.ProductID, DirProductName = p.NameGr, ClassifierNodeId = act.ClassifierNodeID, AttributeValueId = p.AttributeValueId FROM [ItApps].[dir].[ProductToSyncWithHeadings] p JOIN ItApps.heading.ActivityHeading ah ON ah.HeadingID = p.[HeadingId] JOIN ItApps.heading.Activity act ON act.ID = ah.ActivityID WHERE PageStatus != 0 --exclude pending AND IsCustomAttribute = 1

templates.name: Full Active Medium Version
templates.sql: select MediumType= mt.Description , mv.* from dbo.MediumVersion mv join dbo.Medium m on m.ID = mv.MediumID join dbo.MediumType mt on m.MediumTypeID =mt.ID and m.IsActive = 1 and mv.IsActive =1 and mv.PublishDate is not null and m.ID not in (11,45)

templates.name: Full Address View
templates.sql: /*==============================================================*/ /* View: FullAddressView */ /*==============================================================*/ create view FullAddressView as select adr.*, Prefecture= bal.AreaName,Municipality = bal2.AreaName from dbo.[Address] adr left join dbo.BroaderArea da join dbo.BroaderAreaLookUp bal on da.BroaderAreaID = bal.BroaderAreaID and LEFT(da.BroaderAreaID ,2 ) = 'CB' on adr.ID = da.AddressID left join dbo.BroaderArea da2 join dbo.BroaderAreaLookUp bal2 on da2.BroaderAreaID = bal2.BroaderAreaID and LEFT(da2.BroaderAreaID ,2 ) = 'HB' on adr.ID = da2.AddressID

templates.name: Full Contract Cav View
templates.sql: /*==============================================================*/ /* View: FullContractCavView */ /*==============================================================*/ create view FullContractCavView as select C_ID ,A_BPID ,A_BPCode ,A_BPName ,A_BPIsActive ,C_Signdate ,C_State ,C_MigratedCode ,C_OriginalContractID ,C_BPID ,C_BPCode ,C_BPName ,C_BPIsActive ,C_DMKey ,CP_ID ,CP_State ,CP_IsSubscriptionBased ,CP_IsRenewable ,CP_IsRenewed ,CP_Price ,CP_Discount ,CP_RulesDiscount ,CP_VersionSectionID ,CP_VersionSectionCode ,CP_BPID ,CP_BPCode ,CP_BPName ,CP_BPIsActive ,CP_ProductID ,CP_ProductCode ,CP_ProductName ,CP_ProductIsComposite ,CP_DMCharKey ,CP_DMTable ,Adv_ID ,Adv_BeginDate ,Adv_EndDate ,Adv_HeadingID ,Adv_GeoAreaID ,Adv_IsSubscriptionBased ,Adv_QA ,Adv_Price ,Adv_Discount ,Adv_RulesDiscount ,Adv_VersionSectionID ,Adv_VersionSectionCode ,Adv_ProductID ,Adv_ProductCode ,Adv_ProductName ,Adv_ProductIsComposite ,Adv_ProductKitID ,Adv_DMKey ,Adv_DMTable ,Adv_DMCharKey ,PP_ID ,PP_FillOrder ,PPD_ID ,PPD_Name ,Cad_ID ,Cad_FillOrder ,Cad_Name ,Cav_ID ,Cav_SeqNo ,Cav_Value from dbo.ViewContentAttributeValue

templates.name: Full Contract View
templates.sql: /*==============================================================*/ /* View: FullContractView */ /*==============================================================*/ create view FullContractView as select C_ID ,A_BPID ,A_BPCode ,A_BPName ,A_BPIsActive ,C_Signdate ,C_State ,C_MigratedCode ,C_OriginalContractID ,C_BPID ,C_BPCode ,C_BPName ,C_BPIsActive ,C_DMKey ,CP_ID ,CP_State ,CP_IsSubscriptionBased ,CP_IsRenewable ,CP_IsRenewed ,CP_Price ,CP_Discount ,CP_RulesDiscount ,CP_VersionSectionID ,CP_VersionSectionCode ,CP_BPID ,CP_BPCode ,CP_BPName ,CP_BPIsActive ,CP_ProductID ,CP_ProductCode ,CP_ProductName ,CP_ProductIsComposite ,CP_DMCharKey ,CP_DMTable ,Adv_ID ,Adv_BeginDate ,Adv_EndDate ,Adv_HeadingID ,Adv_GeoAreaID ,Adv_IsSubscriptionBased ,Adv_QA ,Adv_Price ,Adv_Discount ,Adv_RulesDiscount ,Adv_VersionSectionID ,Adv_VersionSectionCode ,Adv_ProductID ,Adv_ProductCode ,Adv_ProductName ,Adv_ProductIsComposite ,Adv_ProductKitID ,Adv_DMKey ,Adv_DMTable ,Adv_DMCharKey from dbo.ViewAdvertisement

templates.name: Full Master Geo Area View
templates.sql: with MGAs as ( select MGAID = MGA.ID ,MGADESCR = MGA.Description ,MGACode = MGA.Code ,ParentMGAID = convert(int,null) ,ParentMGADescr = CONVERT(nvarchar(100), null) ,PMGACode = MGA.Code ,RootMGAID = MGA.ID ,RootMGADESCR = MGA.Description ,Lvl = 0 from dbo.MasterGeoAreaGroup MGA where MGA.ParentGeoAreaGroupID is null union all select MGAID = MGA.ID ,MGADESCR = MGA.Description ,MGACode = MGA.Code ,ParentMGAID = MGAs.MGAID ,ParentMGADescr = MGAs.MGADESCR ,PMGACode = MGAs.MGACode ,RootMGAID = MGAs.RootMGAID ,RootMGADESCR = MGAs.RootMGADESCR ,Lvl = MGAs.Lvl+1 from dbo.MasterGeoAreaGroup MGA join MGAs on MGA.ParentGeoAreaGroupID = MGAs.MGAID and MGA.ParentGeoAreaGroupID is not null ) select MGAs.* from MGAs

templates.name: Full Master Heading View
templates.sql: CREATE VIEW FullMasterHeadingView as with MHs as ( select MHID = MH.ID ,MHDESCR = MH.Description ,MHCode = mh.Code ,ParentMHID = convert(int,null) ,ParentMHDescr = CONVERT(nvarchar(100), null) ,PMHCode = mh.Code ,RootMHID = MH.ID ,RootMHDESCR = MH.Description ,Lvl = 0 from dbo.MasterHeading MH where MH.ParentHeadingID is null union all select MHID = MH.ID ,MHDESCR = MH.Description ,MHCode = mh.Code ,ParentMHID = MHs.MHID ,ParentMHDescr = MHs.MHDESCR ,PMHCode = mhs.MHCode ,RootMHID = MHs.RootMHID ,RootMHDESCR = MHs.RootMHDESCR ,Lvl = MHs.Lvl+1 from dbo.MasterHeading MH join MHs on MH.ParentHeadingID = MHs.MHID and MH.ParentHeadingID is not null ) select MHID ,MHDESCR ,MHCode ,ParentMHID ,ParentMHDescr ,PMHCode ,RootMHID ,RootMHDESCR ,Lvl ,ParentIsRoot = case when ParentMHID=RootMHID then 1 else 0 end ,IsRoot = case when ParentMHID is null then 1 else 0 end , HasLower = Case when MHDESCR collate Greek_CS_AS = upper(MHDESCR collate Greek_CS_AS) then 0 else 1 end from MHs

templates.name: Full VGIView
templates.sql: /*==============================================================*/ /* View: FullVGIView */ /*==============================================================*/ create view FullVGIView as with vgis as ( select VGIID = vgi.ID ,VGIDESCR = vgi.Description ,vgi.MediumVersionID ,ParentVGIID = convert(int,null) ,ParentVGIDescr = CONVERT(nvarchar(130), null) ,RootVGIID = vgi.ID ,RootVGIDESCR = vgi.Description ,Lvl = 0 ,VGIType=vgi.[Type] ,ParentVGIType=CONVERT(int,null) ,RootVGIType=vgi.[Type] ,Branch = CONVERT(nvarchar(200),vgi.ID) from dbo.VersionGroupItem vgi where vgi.ParentID is null union all select VGIID = vgi.ID ,VGIDESCR = vgi.Description ,vgi.MediumVersionID ,ParentVGIID = vgis.VGIID ,ParentVGIDescr = vgis.VGIDESCR ,RootVGIID = vgis.RootVGIID ,RootVGIDESCR = vgis.RootVGIDESCR ,Lvl = vgis.Lvl+1 ,VGIType=vgi.[Type] ,ParentVGIType=vgis.VGIType ,RootVGIType=RootVGIType ,Branch = CONVERT(nvarchar(200), vgis.Branch + '-' + CONVERT(nvarchar(200),vgi.ID)) from dbo.VersionGroupItem vgi join vgis on vgi.ParentID = vgis.VGIID ) select VGIID ,VGIDESCR ,v.MediumVersionID ,ParentVGIID ,ParentVGIDescr ,RootVGIID ,RootVGIDESCR ,Lvl ,VGIType ,ParentVGIType ,RootVGIType ,ParentIsRoot = case when ParentVGIID=RootVGIID then 1 else 0 end , vgi.SourceHeadingID , vgi.SourceGeoID , vgi.DMKey , vgi.DMTable , HeadingCode =mh.Code , mgag.BroaderAreaID , HasLower = Case when v.VGIDESCR collate Greek_CS_AS = upper(v.VGIDESCR collate Greek_CS_AS) then 0 else 1 end ,Branch from vgis v join dbo.VersionGroupItem vgi on v.VGIID = vgi.ID left join dbo.MasterHeading mh on mh.ID = vgi.SourceHeadingID left join dbo.MasterGeoAreaGroup mgag on mgag.ID = vgi.SourceGeoID

templates.name: Full VSView
templates.sql: /*==============================================================*/ /* View: FullVSView */ /*==============================================================*/ create view FullVSView as with vgis as ( select VSID = vs.ID ,VSDESCR = vs.Name ,ParentVSID = convert(int,null) ,ParentVSDescr = CONVERT(nvarchar(130), null) ,RootVSID = VS.ID ,RootVSDESCR = VS.Name ,Lvl = 0 ,VS.CatalogType ,ParentVSType=CONVERT(int,null) ,RootVSType= VS.CatalogType ,Branch = CONVERT(nvarchar(200),VS.ID) from dbo.VersionSection vs where --vgi.MediumVersionID = 321 --and vgi.Type =1 --and VS.ParentID is null union all select VSID = VS.ID ,VSDESCR = VS.Name ,ParentVSID = vgis.VSID ,ParentVSDescr = vgis.VSDESCR ,RootVSID = vgis.RootVSID ,RootVSDESCR = vgis.RootVSDESCR ,Lvl = vgis.Lvl+1 ,VS.CatalogType ,ParentVSType=vgis.CatalogType ,RootVSType=RootVSType ,Branch = CONVERT(nvarchar(200), vgis.Branch + '-' + CONVERT(nvarchar(200),VS.ID)) from dbo.VersionSection vs join vgis on VS.ParentID = vgis.VSID ) select VSID ,VSDESCR ,VS.MediumVersionID ,ParentVSID ,ParentVSDescr ,RootVSID ,RootVSDESCR ,Lvl ,v.CatalogType ,ParentVSType ,RootVSType ,ParentIsRoot = case when ParentVSID=RootVSID then 1 else 0 end ,Branch ,vs.MasterSectionID ,vs.VersionGroupItemID from vgis v join dbo.VersionSection vs on v.VSID = vs.ID

templates.name: Get Adids
templates.sql: SELECT TOP (100) PERCENT ID, ContractProductID, ProductID, VersionSectionID, GeoAreaID, HeadingID, AdvBeginDate, AdvEndDate, QA, CaseAttachmentID, DMKey, DMTable, DMCharKey, Price, Discount, RulesDiscount, ProductKitID FROM dbo.Advertisement AS adv WHERE (AdvEndDate > GETDATE()) AND (AdvBeginDate < GETDATE()) AND (ProductID IN (SELECT DISTINCT ProductID FROM dbo.Internet_Products)) ORDER BY ID

templates.name: Internet Products
templates.sql: SELECT TOP (100) PERCENT p.ID AS ProductID, pp.ID AS ProductPartID, ppd.ID AS ProductPartDefinitionID, p.Name AS ProductName, ppd.Code AS ProductPartDefinitionCode, ppd.Name AS ProductPartDefinitionName, ppd.Description AS ProductPartDefinitionDescription, ppd.UdacPartDefinitionID, ppd.MediumVersionID AS Expr9, ppd.SingleAppearance, ppd.DMKey AS Expr10, ppd.DMTable AS Expr11, ppd.DMCharKey AS Expr12, iu.ID AS Expr13, iu.Code AS Expr14 FROM dbo.Product AS p INNER JOIN dbo.ProductPart AS pp ON p.ID = pp.ProductID INNER JOIN dbo.ProductPartDefinition AS ppd ON pp.ProductPartDefinitionID = ppd.ID INNER JOIN dbo.Internet_Udacs AS iu ON iu.DMKey = ppd.DMKey ORDER BY ProductID

templates.name: Internet Udacs
templates.sql: SELECT ID, Code, Name, Description, IsComposite, CreatedOn, CreatedBy, ModifiedOn, ModifiedBy, ProductTypeID, DiscountPolicyID, MinMembers, MaxMembers, TargetValueType, TargetValueID, HasOptionalMembers, IsDependent, IsDeleted, UdacType, NewUdacID, CanvasPlanningGroupID, OldUdacCode, Characterization, DMKey, DMTable, DMCharKey FROM dbo.Udac WHERE (ProductTypeID = 4)

templates.name: View FO Full Product Map
templates.sql: /*==============================================================*/ /* View: View_FO_FullProductMap */ /*==============================================================*/ create view View_FO_FullProductMap as select pm.SameUdac , IsValid = Case when --(cad.DefaultValue is not null and cad.DefaultValue <> ''''UCAD._Type.DLOV'''') or ncad.ID is not null then 1 else 0 end , pm.NewProductID , pm.NewProductCode , pm.OldProductID , pm.OldProductCode , ProductPartID =Pp.ID , NewPPDID = ppd.ID , ppd.Name , CadID = cad.ID , CadName = cad.Name , cad.DefaultValue , OldPPDID =nppd.ID , OldPPDName = nppd.Name , SourceProductPartID = npp.ID , SourceCadID = ncad.ID , SourceCadName = ncad.Name , TargetCadVisibilityMask = cad.VisibilityMask from dbo.View_FO_ProductMap pm join dbo.ProductPart pp on pm.NewProductID = pp.ProductID join dbo.ProductPartDefinition ppd on pp.ProductPartDefinitionID = ppd.ID join dbo.ContentAttributeDefinition cad on ppd.ID = cad.ProductPartDefinitionID left join dbo.ProductPart npp join dbo.ProductPartDefinition nppd on nppd.ID = npp.ProductPartDefinitionID join dbo.ContentAttributeDefinition ncad on nppd.ID = ncad.ProductPartDefinitionID on npp.ProductID = pm.OldProductID and nppd.UdacPartDefinitionID = ppd.UdacPartDefinitionID and ncad.Name = cad.Name and ncad.[Type] = cad.[Type]

templates.name: View FO MVMap
templates.sql: /*==============================================================*/ /* View: View_FO_MVMap */ /*==============================================================*/ create view View_FO_MVMap as with basicMV as ( select mv.ID , Code = Case when ISNUMERIC(mv.code) = 1 then mv.Code else mv.ID end , mv.Name , mv.MediumID , mv.IsActive , m.MediumTypeID from dbo.MediumVersion mv join dbo.Medium m on mv.MediumID = m.ID ) select MVID = pre.ID , MVCode = pre.Code , MVName = pre.Name , NextMVID = case when pre.MediumTypeID = 2 and pos.ID is null then pre.ID else pos.ID end , NextMVCode= case when pre.MediumTypeID = 2 and pos.ID is null then pre.Code else pos.Code end from basicMV pre left join basicMV pos on pre.MediumID = pos.MediumID and CONVERT(int, pre.Code) = CONVERT(int,pos.Code) -1

templates.name: View FO Product Map
templates.sql: /*==============================================================*/ /* View: View_FO_ProductMap */ /*==============================================================*/ create view View_FO_ProductMap as with productMap as ( select OldMVID = m.MVID ,OldProductID = p.ID ,OldProductCode = p.Code ,NewMVID = m.NextMVID ,NewProductID = np.ID ,NewProductCode= np.Code ,SameUdac=1 from [dbo].[View_FO_MVMap] m join dbo.Product p on m.MVID = p.MediumVersionID join dbo.Udac u on p.UdacID = u.ID and u.NewUdacID is null --and u.IsDeleted = 0 join dbo.Product np on p.UdacID = np.UdacID and m.NextMVID = np.MediumVersionID union select OldMVID = m.MVID ,OldProductID = p.ID ,OldProductCode = p.Code ,NewMVID = m.NextMVID ,NewProductID = np.ID ,NewProductCode= np.Code ,SameUdac=0 from [dbo].[View_FO_MVMap] m join dbo.Product p on m.MVID = p.MediumVersionID join dbo.Udac u on p.UdacID = u.ID and u.NewUdacID is not null --and u.IsDeleted = 1 join dbo.Product np on u.NewUdacID = np.UdacID and m.NextMVID = np.MediumVersionID ) select OldMVID ,OldProductID ,OldProductCode ,NewMVID ,NewProductID ,NewProductCode ,SameUdac from productMap

templates.name: View FO VSMap
templates.sql: /*==============================================================*/ /* View: View_FO_VSMap */ /*==============================================================*/ create view View_FO_VSMap as select mv.MediumID , v.MediumVersionID , map.NextMVID , v.Name , VersionSectionID = v.ID , v.Code , TargetVersionSectionID = nv.ID from dbo.VersionSection v join dbo.MediumVersion mv on v.MediumVersionID = mv.ID left join [dbo].[View_FO_MVMap] map on map.MVID = v.MediumVersionID left join dbo.VersionSection nv on map.NextMVID = nv.MediumVersionID and nv.Code = v.Code

templates.name: View SR Full Product Map
templates.sql: select pm.RenewalDefinition , IsValid = Case when ncad.ID is not null then 1 else 0 end , SourceProductID = pm.OldProductID , TargetProductID = pm.NewProductID , SourceProductCode = pm.OldProductCode , TargetProductCode = pm.NewProductCode , SourceProductPartID = npp.ID , TargetProductPartID = pp.ID , TargetProductPartMinOccurence = pp.MinOccurence , SourceProductPartDefinitionID =nppd.ID , TargetProductPartDefinitionID = ppd.ID , SourceProductPartDefinitionName = nppd.Name , TargetProductPartDefinitionName = ppd.Name , SourceCadID = ncad.ID , TargetCadID = cad.ID , SourceCadName = ncad.Name , TargetCadName = cad.Name , TargetCadDefaultValue = cad.DefaultValue , TargetCadVisibilityMask = cad.VisibilityMask from dbo.View_SR_ProductMap pm join dbo.ProductPart pp on pm.NewProductID = pp.ProductID join dbo.ProductPartDefinition ppd on pp.ProductPartDefinitionID = ppd.ID join dbo.ContentAttributeDefinition cad on ppd.ID = cad.ProductPartDefinitionID left join dbo.ProductPart npp join dbo.ProductPartDefinition nppd on nppd.ID = npp.ProductPartDefinitionID join dbo.ContentAttributeDefinition ncad on nppd.ID = ncad.ProductPartDefinitionID on npp.ProductID = pm.OldProductID and nppd.UdacPartDefinitionID = ppd.UdacPartDefinitionID and ncad.Name = cad.Name and ncad.[Type] = cad.[Type]

templates.name: View SR MVMap
templates.sql: /*==============================================================*/ /* View: View_SR_MVMap */ /*==============================================================*/ create view View_SR_MVMap as with basicMV as ( select mv.ID , Code = Case when ISNUMERIC(mv.code) = 1 then mv.Code else mv.ID end , mv.Name , mv.MediumID , mv.IsActive , m.MediumTypeID from dbo.MediumVersion mv join dbo.Medium m on mv.MediumID = m.ID ) select MVID = pre.ID , MVCode = pre.Code , MVName = pre.Name , NextMVID = case when pre.MediumTypeID = 2 and pos.ID is null then pre.ID else pos.ID end , NextMVCode= case when pre.MediumTypeID = 2 and pos.ID is null then pre.Code else pos.Code end from basicMV pre left join basicMV pos on pre.MediumID = pos.MediumID and CONVERT(int, pre.Code) = CONVERT(int,pos.Code) -1

templates.name: View SR Product Map
templates.sql: /*==============================================================*/ /* View: View_SR_ProductMap */ /*==============================================================*/ create view View_SR_ProductMap as with udacMap as ( select SourceUdacID =a.ID , TargetUdacID = ISNULL( ISNULL( a.NewSrID , a.NewUdacID),a.ID) , RenewalDefinition = CONVERT( nvarchar(20), Case when a.NewSrID IS not null then 'RenewalConnection' when a.NewSrID IS null and a.NewUdacID IS not null then 'NewUdacDefined' when a.NewSrID IS null and a.NewUdacID IS null then 'SameUdac' end ) from ( select U.ID, u.NewUdacID , NewSrID = MAX(ur.TargetUdacID) from dbo.Udac u left join dbo.UdacRelationship ur on u.ID = ur.SourceUdacID and ur.RelationshipType = 1 and ur.IsActive = 1 GROUP by U.ID, u.NewUdacID ) a ) ,productMap as ( select OldMVID = m.MVID ,OldProductID = p.ID ,OldProductCode = p.Code ,NewMVID = m.NextMVID ,NewProductID = np.ID ,NewProductCode= np.Code ,u.RenewalDefinition from [dbo].[View_SR_MVMap] m join dbo.Product p on m.MVID = p.MediumVersionID join udacMap u on p.UdacID = u.SourceUdacID join dbo.Product np on u.TargetUdacID = np.UdacID and m.NextMVID = np.MediumVersionID ) select OldMVID ,OldProductID ,OldProductCode ,NewMVID ,NewProductID ,NewProductCode ,RenewalDefinition from productMap

templates.name: View SR VSMap
templates.sql: /*==============================================================*/ /* View: View_SR_VSMap */ /*==============================================================*/ create view View_SR_VSMap as select mv.MediumID , v.MediumVersionID , map.NextMVID , v.Name , VersionSectionID = v.ID , v.Code , TargetVersionSectionID = nv.ID from dbo.VersionSection v join dbo.MediumVersion mv on v.MediumVersionID = mv.ID left join [dbo].[View_SR_MVMap] map on map.MVID = v.MediumVersionID left join dbo.VersionSection nv on map.NextMVID = nv.MediumVersionID and nv.Code = v.Code

templates.name: View Advertisement
templates.sql: /*==============================================================*/ /* View: ViewAdvertisement */ /*==============================================================*/ select cp.* ,Adv_ID = Adv.ID ,Adv_BeginDate = adv.AdvBeginDate ,Adv_EndDate = adv.AdvEndDate ,Adv_HeadingID = Adv.HeadingID ,Adv_GeoAreaID = Adv.GeoAreaID ,Adv_IsSubscriptionBased = Adv.IsSubscriptionBased ,Adv_QA = adv.QA ,Adv_Price = adv.Price ,Adv_Discount = adv.Discount ,Adv_RulesDiscount = adv.RulesDiscount ,Adv_VersionSectionID = adv.VersionSectionID ,Adv_VersionSectionCode = advVS.Code ,Adv_VersionSectionMVID = advVS.MediumVersionID ,Adv_ProductID = advPr.ID ,Adv_ProductCode = advPr.Code ,Adv_ProductName = advPr.Name ,Adv_ProductIsComposite = advPr.IsComposite ,Adv_ProductMVID =advPr.MediumVersionID ,Adv_ProductKitID = adv.ProductKitID ,Adv_DMKey = adv.DMKey ,Adv_DMTable = adv.DMTable ,Adv_DMCharKey = adv.DMCharKey from [dbo].ViewContractProduct cp join dbo.Advertisement adv on adv.ContractProductID = cp.CP_ID join dbo.VersionSection advVS on adv.VersionSectionID = advVS.ID join dbo.Product advPr on adv.ProductID = advPr.ID

templates.name: View Attribute Metadata
templates.sql: select a.ClassifierNodeID as ActivityID, att.id as AttributeID, att.code as AttributeCode, /*att.NameGR*/ag.NameGR as AttributeName, att.IsMandatory, isnull(aa.Priority,att.Priority) as priority, att.MaxAllowedFL, att.MaxAllowedProfile as MaxAllowedProfile, att.MaxAllowedYparxo, ag.isMultiSelect as AttributeType from Itapps.heading.Activity a join Itapps.heading.ActivityAttribute aa on aa.ActivityID = a.id join Itapps.heading.Attribute att on att.id = aa.AttributeID join Itapps.heading.AttributeGroup ag on ag.id = att.AttributeGroupID where a.IsActive = 1 and att.IsActive = 1 and ag.IsActive = 1

templates.name: View Attribute Value
templates.sql: select a.id as AttributeID, av.id as AttributeValueID, av.Code as AttributeValueCode, av.NameGR as AttributeValueName from ItApps.heading.Attribute a join ItApps.heading.AttrValueAttribute ava on ava.AttributeID = a.id join ItApps.heading.AttributeValue av on av.id = ava.AttributeValueID where a.IsActive = 1 and av.IsActive = 1

templates.name: View Batch Action Analysis
templates.sql: /*==============================================================*/ /* View: ViewBatchActionAnalysis */ /*==============================================================*/ create view ViewBatchActionAnalysis as select ID , BatchID , EntityID , EntityType , ErrorType = [Type] , ContractID = f.c.value('@C_ID', 'int') , ContractProductID = f.c.value('@CP_ID', 'int') , CP_VersionSectionID = f.c.value('@CP_VersionSectionID', 'int') , CP_State = f.c.value('@CP_State', 'int') , Target_CP_VSID = f.c.value('@Target_CP_VSID', 'int') , CP_ProductID = f.c.value('@CP_ProductID', 'int') , CP_ProductCode = f.c.value('@CP_ProductCode', 'nvarchar(20)') , CP_ProductUdacType = f.c.value('@CP_ProductUdacType', 'int') , Target_CP_ProductID = f.c.value('@Target_CP_ProductID', 'int') , Target_CP_ProductCode = f.c.value('@Target_CP_ProductCode', 'nvarchar(20)') , Target_CP_ProductUdacType = f.c.value('@Target_CP_ProductUdacType', 'int') , templates.name: View Campaign Bucket With Previous SD
templates.sql: Select cb.*, u.ID PreviousUserID, u.FirstName PreviousUserFirstName, u.LastName PreviousUserLastName from CampaignBucket cb join Campaign camp on cb.CampaignID = camp.ID left join [User] u on u.ID = dbo.fn_PreviousCampaignSalesmanID(cb.BusinessPointID,YEAR(camp.StartedOn))

templates.name: View Classifier Node Master Heading
templates.sql: select cn.ID as ClassifierNodeID, dbo.fn_ConcatenationMasterHeading(cn.ID) as MasterHeadings from ClassifierNode cn join ClassifierNodeMasterHeadings cnmh on cn.ID = cnmh.ClassifierNodeID where cnmh.Type = 2

templates.name: View Communication Actions From XO
templates.sql: SELECT CustomerCode, ContactType, Category, SentDate, Receiver, Filename, CommResult , FilePath = isnull(FilePath, ''), BusinessPointID = bp.ID FROM [ITApps].[csm].[CSMToYPSCollectionEmails] e join BusinessPoint bp on e.CustomerCode = bp.Code UNION ALL SELECT CustomerCode COLLATE Greek_CI_AI, ContactType COLLATE Greek_CI_AI, SMSCategory COLLATE Greek_CI_AI, SentDate , MobilePhone COLLATE Greek_CI_AI, SMSText COLLATE Greek_CI_AI, CommResult COLLATE Greek_CI_AI, FILEPath COLLATE Greek_CI_AI, BsuienssPointId = bp.ID FROM [cardinal12].XOEntersoft.dbo.EBSToYPSCollectionSMS e join BusinessPoint bp on e.CustomerCode COLLATE Greek_CI_AI = bp.Code UNION ALL SELECT BPCode, 'VIBER/SMS', SMSType, SentDate, Mobile, SMSText, '', '', bp.ID FROM [ItApps].[ccm].[ViberMessages] vm join BusinessPoint bp on vm.BPCode = bp.Code where vm.SentDate is not null and vm.IsFromEBS = 0

templates.name: View Content Attribute Value
templates.sql: /*==============================================================*/ /* View: ViewContentAttributeValue */ /*==============================================================*/ SELECT va.* ,PP_ID = pp.ID ,PP_FillOrder = pp.FillOrder ,PP_IsAddon = pp.IsAddon ,PP_MinOccurence = pp.MinOccurence ,PP_MaxOccurence = pp.MaxOccurence ,PP_PriceMode = pp.PriceMode ,PPD_ID = ppd.ID ,PPD_Name = ppd.Name ,PPD_Code = ppd.Code ,PPD_SingleAppearance = ppd.SingleAppearance ,Cad_ID = cad.ID ,Cad_FillOrder = cad.FillOrder ,Cad_Name = cad.Name ,Cad_Type = cad.[Type] ,Cad_VisibilityMask = cad.VisibilityMask ,Cad_IsRequired = cad.IsRequired ,Cad_IsReadonly = cad.IsReadonly ,Cav_ID = cav.ID ,Cav_SeqNo = Cav.SeqNo ,Cav_Value = cav.Value ,Cav_DMKey = cav.DMKey ,Cav_DMTable = cav.DMTable ,Cav_DMCharKey = cav.DMCharKey from [dbo].[ViewAdvertisement] va join dbo.ProductPart pp on va.Adv_ProductID = pp.ProductID join dbo.ProductPartDefinition ppd on pp.ProductPartDefinitionID = ppd.ID join dbo.ContentAttributeDefinition cad on ppd.ID = cad.ProductPartDefinitionID join dbo.ContentAttributeValue cav on va.CP_ID = cav.ContractProductID and va.Adv_ID = cav.AdvertisementID and pp.ID = cav.ProductPartID and cad.ID = cav.ContentAttributeDefinitionID

templates.name: View Contract
templates.sql: /*==============================================================*/ /* View: ViewContract */ /*==============================================================*/ create view ViewContract as select C_ID = c.ID ,A_BPID = aBP.ID ,A_BPCode = aBP.Code ,A_BPName = aBP.Name ,A_BPBrandName = aBP.BrandName ,A_BPLocationAddressID = aBP.LocationAddressID ,A_BPBillingAddressID = aBP.BillingAddressID ,A_BPIsActive = aBP.IsActive ,C_CreatedBy = c.CreatedBy ,C_CreatedOn = c.CreatedOn ,C_Signdate = c.SignedDate ,C_State = c.[State] ,C_MigratedCode = c.MigratedCode ,C_OriginalContractID = c.OrigionalContractID ,C_BPID = cBP.ID ,C_BPCode = cBP.Code ,C_BPName = cBP.Name ,C_BPIsActive = cBP.IsActive ,C_DMKey = c.DMKey ,C_DMTable = c.DMTable ,C_DMCharKey = c.DMCharKey ,C_CampaignID = c.CampaignID ,C_SalesManID = c.SalesManID ,C_SubChannelID = c.SubChannelID ,C_OriginalContractType = c.OriginalContractType ,C_Type = c.[Type] ,C_RenewalNumber = c.RenewalNumber from dbo.[Contract] c join dbo.BusinessPoint cBP on c.BillingPointID = cbp.ID join dbo.BusinessPoint aBP ON c.ActualBPOwnerID = aBP.ID

templates.name: View Contract Product

joins.right: pmt.ID /* where not exists ( select 1 from dbo.InvoicePaymentMethod ipm where ipm.ID = bd.C_ID ) union select bd.* , PM_ID = pm.ID , PM_Type = pmt.Description , PM_IsExchangeSale = pm.IsExchangeSale from bd join dbo.InvoicePaymentMethod pm on pm.ID = bd.C_ID join dbo.PaymentMethodType pmt on pm.PaymentMethodTypeID = pmt.ID where bd.CP_PaymentMethodID is null union select bd.* , PM_ID = CONVERT(int,null) , PM_Type = null , PM_IsExchangeSale = null from bd where bd.CP_PaymentMethodID is null and not exists ( select 1 from dbo.InvoicePaymentMethod ipm where ipm.ID = bd.C_ID ) */

templates.sql: /*==============================================================*/ /* View: ViewContractProduct */ /*==============================================================*/ create view ViewContractProduct as with bd as (select c.* ,CP_ID = cp.ID ,CP_State = cp.[State] ,CP_IsSubscriptionBased = cp.IsSubscriptionBased ,CP_IsRenewable = cp.IsRenewable ,CP_IsRenewed = cp.IsRenewed ,CP_Price = cp.Price ,CP_Discount = cp.Discount ,CP_RulesDiscount = cp.RulesDiscount ,CP_VersionSectionID = cp.VersionSectionID ,CP_VersionSectionCode = cpVS.Code ,CP_VersionSectionMVID = cpVS.MediumVersionID ,CP_BPID = cpBP.ID ,CP_BPCode = cpbp.Code ,CP_BPName = cpbp.Name ,CP_BPIsActive = cpbp.IsActive ,CP_ProductID = cpPr.ID ,CP_ProductCode = cpPr.Code ,CP_ProductName = cpPr.Name ,CP_ProductIsComposite = cpPr.IsComposite ,CP_ProductMVID = cpPr.MediumVersionID ,CP_DMCharKey = cp.DMCharKey ,CP_DMTable = cp.DMTable ,CP_SourceContractProductID = cp.SourceContractProductID ,CP_PaymentMethodID = cp.PaymentMethodID from [dbo].ViewContract c join dbo.ContractProduct cp on c.C_ID = cp.RelatedContractID join dbo.VersionSection cpVS on cp.VersionSectionID = cpVS.ID join dbo.BusinessPoint cpBP on cp.BusinessPointID = cpBP.ID join dbo.Product cpPr on cp.ProductID = cpPr.ID ) select bd.* , PM_ID = pm.ID , PM_Type = pmt.[Description] , PM_IsExchangeSale = pm.IsExchangeSale from bd join dbo.PaymentMethod pm on pm.ID = bd.CP_PaymentMethodID join dbo.PaymentMethodType pmt on pm.PaymentMethodTypeID = pmt.ID --where not exists ( select 1 from dbo.InvoicePaymentMethod ipm where ipm.ID = bd.C_ID ) union select bd.* , PM_ID = pm.ID , PM_Type = pmt.[Description] , PM_IsExchangeSale = pm.IsExchangeSale from bd join dbo.InvoicePaymentMethod pm on pm.ID = bd.C_ID join dbo.PaymentMethodType pmt on pm.PaymentMethodTypeID = pmt.ID where bd.CP_PaymentMethodID is null union select bd.* , PM_ID = CONVERT(int,null) , PM_Type = null , PM_IsExchangeSale = null from bd where bd.CP_PaymentMethodID is null and not exists ( select 1 from dbo.InvoicePaymentMethod ipm where ipm.ID = bd.C_ID )

templates.name: View Dialer Agent
templates.sql: /*==============================================================*/ /* View: ViewDialerAgent */ /*==============================================================*/ create view ViewDialerAgent as SELECT ID, UserName, LastName, FirstName from [dbo].[User] where IsActive = 1

templates.name: View Double Phones
templates.sql: /*==============================================================*/ /* View: ViewDoublePhones */ /*==============================================================*/ create view ViewDoublePhones as SELECT PhoneNumber = c.Number ,BusinessPointCode = bp.code ,BusinessPointName = bp.Name ,PhoneUsage = case c.Usage when 1 then 'Business' when 4 then 'Mobile' when 5 then 'Home' when 7 then 'Fax' when 9 then 'Billing' when 10 then 'Other' end ,PhoneUsageGR = case c.Usage when 1 then 'Εταιρικό' when 4 then 'Κινητό' when 5 then 'Οικίας' when 7 then 'Fax' when 9 then 'Χρέωσης' when 10 then 'Άλλο' end ,BusinessPointType = clnode.Name FROM PointPhone c JOIN PointPhone x ON (x.Number = c.Number and x.BusinessPointID != c.BusinessPointID) JOIN BusinessPoint bp on bp.ID = c.BusinessPointID join Classification cl on cl.BusinessPointID = bp.ID join ClassifierNode clnode on clnode.ID = cl.ClassifierNodeID where cl.ClassifierNodeID = 3 or cl.ClassifierNodeID = 4 GROUP BY c.Number ,bp.code ,bp.Name ,c.Usage ,clnode.Name

templates.name: View Get Version Sections For Internet Root
templates.sql: select distinct vs.ID, 580 as rootID from VersionSection vs join fn_GetVersionSectionsForRoot(580) fn on vs.ID = fn.VersionSectionID

templates.name: View Last Business Point Identification
templates.sql: select bpi.*, ISNULL(tgiv.ContractID, tgiv.AltOfferID) as ContractID from BusinessPointIdentification bpi join (select tgiv1.ID tgivID, max(bpih.BusinessPointIdentificationID) BusinessPointIdentificationID from BusinessPointConfirmationHistory bpih join Task as t on bpih.TaskID = t.id join [case] as c on t.caseid = c.id join TargetGroupItemValue as tgiv1 on c.ContextEntityID = tgiv1.ID and c.ContextEntityType = 'TGIV' group by tgiv1.ID) bph on bph.BusinessPointIdentificationID = bpi.ID join TargetGroupItemValue tgiv on tgiv.ID = bph.tgivID

templates.name: View List Of Contract Salesman
templates.sql: /*==============================================================*/ /* DBMS name: Microsoft SQL Server 2008 */ /* Created on: 28/4/2014 1:39:46 μμ */ /*==============================================================*/ /*==============================================================*/ /* View: ViewListOfContractSalesman */ /*==============================================================*/ create view ViewListOfContractSalesman as select ContractSalesman = '['+u.SalesCode +'] ' + u.LastName + ' '+ u.FirstName, Channel = ct.Description, CaseID = c.ID from [case] c (nolock) join [case] cc (nolock) on c.MasterCaseID = cc.ID and cc.ContextEntityType = 'TGIV' left outer join TargetGroupItemValue tgiv (nolock) on cc.ContextEntityID = tgiv.ID left outer join [Contract] con (nolock) on COALESCE(tgiv.ContractID,tgiv.AltOfferID) = con.ID left outer join ChannelType ct (nolock) on con.ChannelTypeID = ct.ID left outer join [User] u (nolock) on con.SalesManID = u.ID union select ContractSalesman = '['+u.SalesCode +'] ' + u.LastName + ' '+ u.FirstName, Channel = ct.Description, CaseID = c.ID from [case] c (nolock) join [case] cc (nolock) on c.MasterCaseID = cc.ID and cc.ContextEntityType = 'TICKET' left outer join Ticket tic (nolock) on cc.ContextEntityID = tic.ID left outer join [Contract] con (nolock) on tic.RelatedContractID = con.ID left outer join ChannelType ct (nolock) on con.ChannelTypeID = ct.ID left outer join [User] u (nolock) on con.SalesManID = u.ID union select ContractSalesman = null, Channel = null, CaseID = c.ID from [case] c (nolock) join [case] cc (nolock) on c.MasterCaseID = cc.ID and cc.ContextEntityType <> 'TICKET' and cc.ContextEntityType <> 'TGIV'

templates.name: View Market Item
templates.sql: /*==============================================================*/ /* View: ViewMarketItem */ /*==============================================================*/ create view ViewMarketItem as select CampaignID = vtgii.CampaignID ,TaskStatus = task.[Status] ,CaseState = ca.[State] ,ActivityType = tt.ActivityType ,UnitID =actualOwner.UnitID ,TargetGroupValueID = vtgii.TargetGroupItemValueID ,SelectedAllocationPlanID = vtgii.CampaignAllocationPlanID ,TargetGroupItemID = vtgii.ID ,CaseID = task.CaseID ,TaskID = task.ID ,TaskName = task.[Description] ,TaskTypeID = task.TaskTypeID ,TaskCreatedOn = task.CreatedOn ,ActualOwnerID = task.ActualOwnerID ,ActualOwner = actualOwner.LastName + ' ' + actualOwner.FirstName ,SupervisorID = vtgii.Supervisor ,Supervisor = vtgii.SupervisorName ,AppointmentDateTime = vtgii.AppointmentDateTime ,BusinessPointID = vtgii.BusinessPointID ,BPIdentityConfirmed = vtgii.BPIdentityConfirmed ,CustomerName = vtgii.CustomerName ,CustomerCode = vtgii.Code ,CustomerCodeNumeric = convert(int,isnull(vtgii.Code,0)) ,BrandName = vtgii.Brandname ,EndDate = vtgii.EndDate ,StartDate = vtgii.StartDate ,IsReleased = vtgii.IsReleased ,OfferAmount = vtgii.TargetValue ,AddressLine1 = vtgii.StreetName+' '+vtgii.StreetNumber ,AddressLine3 = vtgii.City ,ContactInfo = convert(nvarchar(250),'') --//Check ,ContactName = convert(nvarchar(50),'') --//Check ,CRM = bp.HasCRMTicket ,MasterClassification = vtgii.MainHeadingName ,MasterHeading = vtgii.MainHeadingName --//Check ,IsRed = case when exists ( select 1 from dbo.CustomerSolvency cs where cs.ID = bp.CustomerSolvencyID and cs.Code= '004') then 1 else 0 end --//Check ,ReliabilityStatus = vtgii.ReliabilityStatus ,Phones = convert(nvarchar(250),'') --//Check ,LossPrintedNew = vtgii.LossPrintedNew ,LastSignedDate = vtgii.LastSignedDate ,SubChannel = vtgii.Description ,Prefecture = ISNULL( vtgii.Prefecture,'') ,Municipality = ISNULL(vtgii.Municipality,'') ,City = ISNULL(vtgii.City ,'') ,Street = ISNULL( vtgii.StreetName,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(vtgii.StreetNumber,'') ,ZipCode = ISNULL(vtgii.ZipCode,'') ,LastPrintSalesMan = ISNULL( vtgii.LastPrintSalesMan01 , vtgii.LastPrintSalesMan02) ,LastInternetSalesMan = ISNULL( vtgii.LastInternetSalesMan01, vtgii.LastInternetSalesMan02) ,ExpirationDateInternet = vtgii.ExpirationDateInternet from ViewTargetGroupItemInfo vtgii with (nolock) inner join BusinessPoint bp on vtgii.BusinessPointID = bp.ID inner join [Case] ca with (nolock) on vtgii.TargetGroupItemValueID = ca.ContextEntityID and ca.ContextEntityType = 'TGIV' inner join Task task on ca.ID = task.CaseID AND task.Status = 0 inner join TaskType tt with (nolock) on task.TaskTypeID = tt.ID inner join [User] actualOwner with (nolock) on task.ActualOwnerID = actualOwner.ID

templates.name: View Ote DVPP
templates.sql: /*==============================================================*/ /* View: ViewOteDVPP */ /*==============================================================*/ create view ViewOteDVPP as Select odvpp.OteDirectoryVersionID, odvpp.OteProgressPointID, odvpp.ID, IsRelated = odvpp.RelatedActualFlag, EstimatedDate = case when odvpp.RelatedActualFlag=0 then odvpp.EstimatedDate else dateadd(dd, isnull(odvpp.RelatedDays,0), isnull( odvpp1.EstimatedDate , convert(datetime,'1-1-1900') )) end , odvpp.ActualDate , odvpp.Comments from OteDirectoryVersionProgressPoint odvpp left outer join OteDirectoryVersionProgressPoint odvpp1 on odvpp1.ID = odvpp.RelatedID

templates.name: View Ote Version Progress
templates.sql: /*==============================================================*/ /* View: ViewOteVersionProgress */ /*==============================================================*/ select odv.ID ,od.Name ,odv.VersionYear ,Circulation = (select sum(Amount) from OteDirectoryVersionShipping odvs where odvs.OteDirectoryVersionID = odv.ID) ,IsActualPages = cast((case when isnull(odv.ActualPages,0)>0 then 1 else 0 end) as bit) ,Pages = case when isnull(odv.ActualPages,0)>0 then odv.ActualPages else odv.EstimatedPages end ,odv.PaperWeight ,ca1.ID as ID1, ca1.EstimatedDate as ED1, ca1.ActualDate as AD1, CO1 = ca1.Comments, ca2.ID as ID2, ca2.EstimatedDate as ED2, ca2.ActualDate as AD2, CO2 = ca2.Comments, ca3.ID as ID3, ca3.EstimatedDate as ED3, ca3.ActualDate as AD3, CO3 = ca3.Comments, ca4.ID as ID4, ca4.EstimatedDate as ED4, ca4.ActualDate as AD4, CO4 = ca4.Comments, ca5.ID as ID5, ca5.EstimatedDate as ED5, ca5.ActualDate as AD5, CO5 = ca5.Comments, ca6.ID as ID6, ca6.EstimatedDate as ED6, ca6.ActualDate as AD6, CO6 = ca6.Comments, ca7.ID as ID7, ca7.EstimatedDate as ED7, ca7.ActualDate as AD7, CO7 = ca7.Comments, ca8.ID as ID8, ca8.EstimatedDate as ED8, ca8.ActualDate as AD8, CO8 = ca8.Comments ,IR1 = ca1.IsRelated ,IR2 = ca2.IsRelated ,IR3 = ca3.IsRelated ,IR4 = ca4.IsRelated ,IR5 = ca5.IsRelated ,IR6 = ca6.IsRelated ,IR7 = ca7.IsRelated ,IR8 = ca8.IsRelated ,IS1 = case when ca1.ActualDate is null then 0 when ca1.EstimatedDate >= ca1.ActualDate then 1 else 2 end ,IS2 = case when ca2.ActualDate is null then 0 when ca2.EstimatedDate >= ca2.ActualDate then 1 else 2 end ,IS3 = case when ca3.ActualDate is null then 0 when ca3.EstimatedDate >= ca3.ActualDate then 1 else 2 end ,IS4 = case when ca4.ActualDate is null then 0 when ca4.EstimatedDate >= ca4.ActualDate then 1 else 2 end ,IS5 = case when ca5.ActualDate is null then 0 when ca5.EstimatedDate >= ca5.ActualDate then 1 else 2 end ,IS6 = case when ca6.ActualDate is null then 0 when ca6.EstimatedDate >= ca6.ActualDate then 1 else 2 end ,IS7 = case when ca7.ActualDate is null then 0 when ca7.EstimatedDate >= ca7.ActualDate then 1 else 2 end ,IS8 = case when ca8.ActualDate is null then 0 when ca8.EstimatedDate >= ca8.ActualDate then 1 else 2 end from OteDirectoryVersion odv inner join OteDirectory od on odv.OteDirectoryID = od.ID left outer join ViewOteDVPP ca1 on ca1.OteDirectoryVersionID = odv.ID and ca1.OteProgressPointID = 1 left outer join ViewOteDVPP ca2 on ca2.OteDirectoryVersionID = odv.ID and ca2.OteProgressPointID = 2 left outer join ViewOteDVPP ca3 on ca3.OteDirectoryVersionID = odv.ID and ca3.OteProgressPointID = 3 left outer join ViewOteDVPP ca4 on ca4.OteDirectoryVersionID = odv.ID and ca4.OteProgressPointID = 4 left outer join ViewOteDVPP ca5 on ca5.OteDirectoryVersionID = odv.ID and ca5.OteProgressPointID = 5 left outer join ViewOteDVPP ca6 on ca6.OteDirectoryVersionID = odv.ID and ca6.OteProgressPointID = 6 left outer join ViewOteDVPP ca7 on ca7.OteDirectoryVersionID = odv.ID and ca7.OteProgressPointID = 7 left outer join ViewOteDVPP ca8 on ca8.OteDirectoryVersionID = odv.ID and ca8.OteProgressPointID = 8

templates.name: View Phones Flatting
templates.sql: /*==============================================================*/ /* DBMS name: Microsoft SQL Server 2008 */ /* Created on: 29/1/2014 2:47:57 μμ */ /*==============================================================*/ --alter table DialerTask -- add CampaignID int null --go /*==============================================================*/ /* View: ViewPhonesFlatting */ /*==============================================================*/ create view ViewPhonesFlatting as with bd as ( select pp.BusinessPointID , pp.Number , RankID = RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY pp.BusinessPointId ORDER BY pp.Number DESC) from PointPhone pp where pp.Usage not in (7,9) ) select BusinessPointID = p1.BusinessPointID, Phone1 = p1.Number, Phone2 = p2.Number, Phone3 = p3.Number, Phone4 = p4.Number, Phone5 = p5.Number from bd p1 left join bd p2 on p1.BusinessPointID = p2.BusinessPointID and p2.RankID = 2 left join bd p3 on p1.BusinessPointID = p3.BusinessPointID and p3.RankID = 3 left join bd p4 on p1.BusinessPointID = p4.BusinessPointID and p4.RankID = 4 left join bd p5 on p1.BusinessPointID = p5.BusinessPointID and p5.RankID = 5 where p1.RankID = 1
