templates.name: View Prefecture BPDtls
templates.sql: /*==============================================================*/ /* View: ViewPrefectureBPDtls */ /*==============================================================*/ create view ViewPrefectureBPDtls as SELECT ActiveFlag = a.IsActive, BusinessPointID = a.ID, BusinessPointCode = a.Code, BusinessPointName = a.Name, IsPOI = a.IsPOI, CustomerSourceID = a.CustomerSourceID, CustomerSourceDesc = b.Description, ActivityClassifierNodeID = a.ActivityClassifierNodeID, ActivityName = c.Name, AreaName = x.AreaName FROM BusinessPoint a LEFT OUTER JOIN CustomerSource b ON (b.ID = a.CustomerSourceID) LEFT OUTER JOIN ClassifierNode c ON (c.ID = a.ActivityClassifierNodeID) LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT d.AddressID,e.AreaName FROM BroaderArea d, BroaderAreaLookUp e WHERE d.BroaderAreaID = e.BroaderAreaID AND d.BroaderAreaID LIKE 'E%' AND isnull(e.MasterGeoAreaGroupID,0) > 0 GROUP BY d.AddressID,e.AreaName) x ON (x.AddressID = a.LocationAddressID)

templates.name: View Prefecture BPs
templates.sql: /*==============================================================*/ /* View: ViewPrefectureBPs */ /*==============================================================*/ create view ViewPrefectureBPs as with basicData as ( SELECT ActiveFlag = bp.IsActive ,AreaID = Case when ba.BroaderAreaID IS null then '' else ba.BroaderAreaID end ,AreaName = case when ba.BroaderAreaID IS null then 'Unknown Prefecture' else bal.AreaName end FROM BusinessPoint bp join dbo.Classification cl on bp.ID = cl.BusinessPointID and cl.ClassifierID = 5 and cl.ClassifierNodeID IN (3,4) left join BroaderArea ba join BroaderAreaLookUp bal on bal.BroaderAreaID = ba.BroaderAreaID and ba.BroaderAreaID LIKE 'E%' AND isnull(bal.MasterGeoAreaGroupID,0) > 0 on bp.LocationAddressID =ba.AddressID ) SELECT ActiveFlag ,AreaID ,AreaName ,BPcount = count(*) FROM basicData GROUP BY ActiveFlag ,AreaID ,AreaName

templates.name: View Production Task Info New

joins.right: pmt.ID /* left join TicketPriority tp on tic.PriorityID = tp.id left join (select cp.RelatedContractID, min(adv.DesiredBeginDate) as DesiredBeginDate from contractproduct cp join advertisement adv on cp.id = adv.contractproductid group by cp.RelatedContractID ) cc on cc.RelatedContractID = con.ID and vti.TaskTypeID in (189,190) left join ChannelType cht on con.ChannelTypeID = cht.ID --left join TicketType tt on tt.ID = tic.TicketTypeID left join User u on con.SalesManID = u.ID left join (select tah.TicketID TicketID, max(tah.AdvertisementID) AdvertisementID from TicketAdvertisementHistory tah join Ticket tic1 on tah.TicketID = tic1.ID where tah.IsWorkDoneInProduction = 0 and tic1.Status = 0 group by tah.TicketID) mtah on mtah.TicketID = tic.ID */

templates.sql: select vti.ID TaskID, c.MasterCaseID MasterCaseID, con.ID ContractID, inv.PaymentMethodTypeID, pmt.Description PaymentMethidType, pmt.PaymentWay PaymentMethodWay, null PriorityID, cast(null as nvarchar(100)) TicketPriority, cc.DesiredBeginDate DesiredBeginDate, cht.Description ChannelDescription, null TicketID, cast(null as nvarchar(100)) TicketType, '[' + u.SalesCode + '] ' + u.LastName + ' ' + u.FirstName SalesManFullName, mtah.AdvertisementID TicketAdvertisementID, con.FinalPrice ContractFinalPrice from task vti join [case] c on c.ID = vti.CaseID join [case] cm on c.MasterCaseID = cm.ID left join TargetGroupItemValue tgiv on cm.ContextEntityID = tgiv.ID and cm.ContextEntityType = 'TGIV' left join Ticket tic on tgiv.ContractID = tic.RelatedContractID left join Contract con on tgiv.ContractID = con.ID left join InvoicePaymentMethod inv on con.id = inv.Id left join PaymentMethodType pmt on inv.PaymentMethodTypeID = pmt.ID --left join TicketPriority tp on tic.PriorityID = tp.id left join (select cp.RelatedContractID, min(adv.DesiredBeginDate) as DesiredBeginDate from contractproduct cp join advertisement adv on cp.id = adv.contractproductid group by cp.RelatedContractID ) cc on cc.RelatedContractID = con.ID and vti.TaskTypeID in (189,190) left join ChannelType cht on con.ChannelTypeID = cht.ID --left join TicketType tt on tt.ID = tic.TicketTypeID left join [User] u on con.SalesManID = u.ID left join (select tah.TicketID TicketID, max(tah.AdvertisementID) AdvertisementID from TicketAdvertisementHistory tah join Ticket tic1 on tah.TicketID = tic1.ID where tah.IsWorkDoneInProduction = 0 and tic1.Status = 0 group by tah.TicketID) mtah on mtah.TicketID = tic.ID

templates.name: View Production Task Info New ADV
templates.sql: select vti.ID TaskID, c.MasterCaseID MasterCaseID, con.ID ContractID, inv.PaymentMethodTypeID, pmt.Description PaymentMethidType, pmt.PaymentWay PaymentMethodWay, tic.PriorityID, tp.Description TicketPriority, adv.DesiredBeginDate DesiredBeginDate, cht.Description ChannelDescription, tic.ID TicketID, tt.Description TicketType, '[' + u.SalesCode + '] ' + u.LastName + ' ' + u.FirstName SalesManFullName, mtah.AdvertisementID TicketAdvertisementID, con.FinalPrice ContractFinalPrice from task vti join [case] c on c.ID = vti.CaseID join [case] cm on c.MasterCaseID = cm.ID left join Ticket tic on cm.ContextEntityID = tic.ID and cm.ContextEntityType = 'TICKET' left join TargetGroupItemValue tgiv on cm.ContextEntityID = tgiv.ID and cm.ContextEntityType = 'TGIV' left join Contract con on COALESCE(tic.RelatedContractID, tgiv.ContractID) = con.ID left join InvoicePaymentMethod inv on con.id = inv.Id left join PaymentMethodType pmt on inv.PaymentMethodTypeID = pmt.ID left join TicketPriority tp on tic.PriorityID = tp.id left join Advertisement adv on c.ContextEntityID = adv.ID and c.ContextEntityType = 'ADV' left join ChannelType cht on con.ChannelTypeID = cht.ID left join TicketType tt on tt.ID = tic.TicketTypeID left join [User] u on con.SalesManID = u.ID left join Ticket tic1 on tgiv.ContractID = tic1.RelatedContractID and tic1.status = 0 and exists (select 1 from TicketAdvertisementHistory ttah where ttah.TicketID = tic1.ID and adv.ID = ttah.AdvertisementID and ttah.IsWorkDoneInProduction = 0) left join TicketAdvertisementHistory mtah on tic1.ID = mtah.TicketID and adv.ID = mtah.AdvertisementID and mtah.IsWorkDoneInProduction = 0

templates.name: View Release Task Info

joins.right: CaseType.ID /* inner join TaskAssignment ta on ta.TaskID = task.ID and ta.AssignmentType = 0 --and task.ActualOwnerID is not null and ta.RoleID is not null and ta.UserID is null inner join User theOwner on task.ActualOwnerID = theOwner.ID left outer join User as sender on task.SenderID = sender.ID where theCase.State = 0 and taskType.ActivityType = 'H' and task.ActualOwnerID is not null -- FYI: BI#85 */

templates.sql: /*==============================================================*/ /* View: ViewReleaseTaskInfo */ /*==============================================================*/ create view ViewReleaseTaskInfo as select distinct TaskID = task.ID ,TaskStatus = task.[Status] ,TaskCaseID = task.CaseID ,TaskSenderID = task.SenderID ,TaskDynamicCode = task.DynamicCode ,TaskDynamicDescription = task.DynamicDescription ,TaskDescription = task.[Description] ,TaskCreatedOn = task.CreatedOn ,TaskActualOwnerID = task.ActualOwnerID ,TaskTypeID = taskType.ID ,TaskTypeCode = taskType.Code ,TaskTypeActivityType = taskType.ActivityType ,TaskCaseState = theCase.[State] ,CaseContextEntityID = theCase.ContextEntityID ,CaseContextEntityType = theCase.ContextEntityType ,CaseTypeID = caseType.ID ,TaskCaseTypeCode = caseType.Code ,TaskCaseTypeDescription = caseType.[Description] ,CaseTypeContextEntityType = caseType.ContextEntityType ,sender.LastName + ' ' + sender.FirstName as TaskSenderFullName ,TaskSenderFirstName = sender.FirstName ,TaskSenderLastName = sender.LastName ,theOwner.LastName + ' ' + theOwner.FirstName as TaskActualOwnerFullName ,TaskActualOwnerFirstName = theOwner.FirstName ,TaskActualOwnerLastName = theOwner.LastName ,PotentialUserID = null ,StakeHolderUserID =null from Task as task inner join TaskType taskType on task.TaskTypeID = taskType.ID and 1 <> task.[Status] inner join [Case] theCase on task.CaseID = theCase.ID inner join CaseType caseType on theCase.CaseTypeID = CaseType.ID --inner join TaskAssignment ta on ta.TaskID = task.ID and ta.AssignmentType = 0 --and task.ActualOwnerID is not null and ta.RoleID is not null and ta.UserID is null inner join [User] theOwner on task.ActualOwnerID = theOwner.ID left outer join [User] as sender on task.SenderID = sender.ID where theCase.[State] = 0 and taskType.ActivityType = 'H' and task.ActualOwnerID is not null -- FYI: BI#85

templates.name: View Renewal Failure
templates.sql: /*==============================================================*/ /* View: ViewRenewalFailure */ /*==============================================================*/ create view ViewRenewalFailure as select csfh.BatchID , ContractID = vc.C_ID , ActualBpOwnerCode = vc.A_BPCode , ErrorType =csfh.[Type] , ContractProductID , CP_VersionSectionID , CP_State , CP_Medium = ( select '('+ m.Code+')'+ m.Name from dbo.Medium m join dbo.MediumVersion mv on m.ID = mv.MediumID join dbo.VersionSection vs on mv.ID = vs.MediumVersionID where vs.ID = CP_VersionSectionID) , CP_MediumVersionCode = ( select mv.Code from dbo.MediumVersion mv join dbo.VersionSection vs on mv.ID = vs.MediumVersionID where vs.ID = CP_VersionSectionID) , CP_VersionSection =( select vs.Name from dbo.VersionSection vs where vs.ID = CP_VersionSectionID) , Target_CP_VSID , Target_CP_Medium = ( select '('+ m.Code+')'+ m.Name from dbo.Medium m join dbo.MediumVersion mv on m.ID = mv.MediumID join dbo.VersionSection vs on mv.ID = vs.MediumVersionID where vs.ID = Target_CP_VSID) , Target_CP_MediumVersionCode = ( select mv.Code from dbo.MediumVersion mv join dbo.VersionSection vs on mv.ID = vs.MediumVersionID where vs.ID = Target_CP_VSID) , Target_CP_VersionSection =( select vs.Name from dbo.VersionSection vs where vs.ID = Target_CP_VSID) , CP_ProductID , CP_ProductCode , CP_ProductUdacType , Target_CP_ProductID , Target_CP_ProductCode , Target_CP_ProductUdacType , AdvertisementID , Adv_VersionSectionID , Adv_Medium = ( select '('+ m.Code+')'+ m.Name from dbo.Medium m join dbo.MediumVersion mv on m.ID = mv.MediumID join dbo.VersionSection vs on mv.ID = vs.MediumVersionID where vs.ID = Adv_VersionSectionID) , Adv_MediumVersionCode = ( select mv.Code from dbo.MediumVersion mv join dbo.VersionSection vs on mv.ID = vs.MediumVersionID where vs.ID = Adv_VersionSectionID) , Adv_VersionSection =( select vs.Name from dbo.VersionSection vs where vs.ID = Adv_VersionSectionID) , Target_ADV_VSID , Target_Adv_Medium = ( select '('+ m.Code+')'+ m.Name from dbo.Medium m join dbo.MediumVersion mv on m.ID = mv.MediumID join dbo.VersionSection vs on mv.ID = vs.MediumVersionID where vs.ID = Target_ADV_VSID) , Target_Adv_MediumVersionCode = ( select mv.Code from dbo.MediumVersion mv join dbo.VersionSection vs on mv.ID = vs.MediumVersionID where vs.ID = Target_ADV_VSID) , Target_Adv_VersionSection =( select vs.Name from dbo.VersionSection vs where vs.ID = Target_ADV_VSID) , Adv_ProductID , Adv_ProductCode , Target_Adv_ProductKitID , Target_ADV_ProductID , Target_ADV_ProductCode , Adv_HeadingID , ADV_Heading = ( select vgi.[Description] from dbo.VersionGroupItem vgi where vgi.ID = ADV_HeadingID) , Target_ADV_HeadingID , Target_ADV_Heading = ( select vgi.[Description] from dbo.VersionGroupItem vgi where vgi.ID = Target_ADV_HeadingID) , Adv_GeoAreaID , Adv_GeoArea = ( select vgi.[Description] from dbo.VersionGroupItem vgi where vgi.ID = ADV_GeoAreaID) , Target_ADV_GeoAreaID , Target_ADV_GeoArea = ( select vgi.[Description] from dbo.VersionGroupItem vgi where vgi.ID =Target_ADV_GeoAreaID) , Adv_ProductIsComposite , IsCustomerRed , SubChannelUserExists , SalesManID , SalesMan = ( select u.UserName from dbo.[User] u where u.ID = SalesManID) , Adv_EndDate , Errors = case when IsCustomerRed = 1 then 'Πελάτης Red' else '' end + '-' + case when SubChannelUserExists = 1 then 'Default Πωλητής' else '' end + '-' + case when Invalid_Target_CP_VSID = 1 then 'Section Προβολής' else '' end + '-' + case when Invalid_Target_CP_ProductID = 1 then 'Προϊόν Προβολής' else '' end +'-' + case when Invalid_Target_ADV_VSID = 1 then 'Section Γραμμής Προβολής' else '' end +'-' + case when Invalid_Target_ADV_ProductID = 1 and Target_ADV_ProductID IS null then 'Προϊόν Γραμμής Προβολής' else '' end + '-' + case when Invalid_Target_ADV_ProductID = 1 and Target_Adv_ProductKitID IS null then 'Bundle Member' else '' end + '-' + case when Invalid_Target_ADV_HeadingID = 1 then 'Κατηγορία Γραμμής Προβολής' else '' end + '-' + case when Invalid_Target_ADV_GeoAreaID = 1 then 'GeoArea Γραμμής Προβολής' else '' end + '-' + case when Invalid_Adv_EndDate = 1 then 'Ελειπής Ημ/νια Λήξης' else '' end +'-' + case when Invalid_Bundle_Heading = 1 then 'Κατηγορία Προϊόντος Ενιαίας Προβολής' else '' end +'-' + case when Invalid_Target_Prid = 1 then 'Απορρ. Συμβ. λόγω έλλειψης τιμής προϊόντος' else '' end +'-' + case when Invalid_BPIsActive = 1 then 'Απορρ. Συμβ. λόγω Μη Ενεργού Επιχειρηματικού Σημείου' else '' end +'-' + case when Invalid_HeadingIDIsActive = 1 then 'Απορρ. Συμβ. λόγω Μη Ενεργής Κατηγορίας' else '' end + Case when Invalid_NotPassedQA = 1 then 'Απορρ. Συμβ. λόγω έλειψης QA' else '' end + Case when Invalid_MixedPm = 1 then 'Απορρ. Συμβ. λόγω συνύπαρξης παλιού και νέου τρόπου πληρωμής' else '' end + Case when Invalid_CP_State = 1 then 'Απορρ. Συμβ. λόγω μη έγκυρου state προβολής' else '' end , Invalid_Target_CP_VSID , Invalid_Target_CP_ProductID , Invalid_Target_ADV_VSID , Invalid_Target_ADV_ProductID , Invalid_Target_ADV_HeadingID , Invalid_Target_ADV_GeoAreaID , Invalid_Adv_EndDate , Invalid_Bundle_Heading , Invalid_Target_Prid , pd.A_BPIsActive , pd.C_BPIsActive , pd.CP_BPIsActive , pd.Invalid_BPIsActive , pd.Invalid_HeadingIDIsActive , pd.Invalid_NotPassedQA , Invalid_MixedPm , Invalid_CP_State , IsInvalid from dbo.[BatchActionHistoryAnalysis] csfh join (select distinct BatchActionID = b.BatchID ,b.BatchActionType from dbo.BatchActionHistory b) as bah on csfh.BatchID = bah.BatchActionID and bah.BatchActionType =1 join dbo.ViewContract vc on csfh.EntityID = vc.C_ID left join [dbo].[ViewBatchActionAnalysis] pd on csfh.BatchID = pd.BatchID and csfh.EntityID = pd.EntityID where csfh.EntityType =1

templates.name: View Sales Market Active Campaign
templates.sql: select CampaignID = c.ID ,CampaignDescription = '['+c.Code+'] ' + c.Name ,ActualOwnerID = t.ActualOwnerID ,CampaignStartedOn = c.StartedOn ,CampaignClosedOn = c.ClosedOn ,TaskTypeId = t.TaskTypeId ,TaskEditorState = t.EditorState ,TgivStartDate = tgiv.StartDate ,TgivEndDate = tgiv.EndDate ,IsReleased = tgiv.IsReleased ,Supervisor = tgiv.Supervisor ,[Version] = c.[Version] ,CampaignState = c.state from Campaign c (nolock) join TargetGroupItem tgi (nolock) on c.ID = tgi.CampaignID join TargetGroupItemValue tgiv (nolock) on tgi.ID = tgiv.TargetGroupItemID join [Case] cs (nolock) on tgiv.ID = cs.ContextEntityID and cs.ContextEntityType = 'TGIV' join Task t (nolock) on cs.ID = t.CaseID where t.Status = 0 and cs.State = 0 and c.state in (2,3)

templates.name: View Sales Market Analysis Anamoni Maketas
templates.sql: with pt as ( select c.MasterCaseID, CampaignID = tgi.CampaignID, ActualOwnerID = t.ActualOwnerID , UnitID = u.UnitID,tgiv.StartDate,tgiv.EndDate from TargetGroupItem as tgi join TargetGroupItemValue as tgiv on tgi.ID = tgiv.TargetGroupItemID join [Case] c on tgiv.ID = c.ContextEntityID join Task t on c.ID = t.CaseID join [User] u on t.ActualOwnerID = u.ID where c.ContextEntityType = 'TGIV' and t.ActualOwnerID is not null and (t.Outcome = 'Αποδοχή με παρουσίαση μακέτας' OR t.Outcome = 'ΑΠΟΔΠ') and tgiv.NeedPresentation = 1 and t.Status = 1 and c.State = 1 and t.TaskTypeID in (173,154,312,313) ) select CampaignID, ActualOwnerID,UnitID,StartDate,EndDate from pt as v where not exists ( select t1.ID from [Case] as c1 join Task as t1 on c1.ID = t1.CaseID where c1.MasterCaseID = v.MasterCaseID and t1.TaskTypeID = 169 and t1.Status = 0 ) and not exists ( select t1.ID from [Case] as c1 join Task as t1 on c1.ID = t1.CaseID where c1.MasterCaseID = v.MasterCaseID and t1.TaskTypeID = 169 and t1.Status = 1 and t1.Outcome <> 'ΑΛΛΑΓ' group by t1.ID having MAX(t1.ID) = t1.ID )

templates.name: View Sales Market Analysis Anamoni Promaketas
templates.sql: with pt as ( select c.MasterCaseID, CampaignID = tgi.CampaignID, ActualOwnerID =t.ActualOwnerID , UnitID = u.UnitID,tgiv.StartDate,tgiv.EndDate from TargetGroupItem as tgi join TargetGroupItemValue as tgiv on tgi.ID = tgiv.TargetGroupItemID join [Case] c on tgiv.ID = c.ContextEntityID join Task t on c.ID = t.CaseID join [User] u on t.ActualOwnerID = u.ID where c.ContextEntityType = 'TGIV' and tgiv.NeedPresentation = 1 and tgiv.OfferPresentationType = 0 and t.Outcome = 'ΠΡΟΣΦ' and t.Status = 1 and c.State = 1 and t.TaskTypeID in (154,313) ) select CampaignID,ActualOwnerID,UnitID,StartDate,EndDate from pt as v where not exists ( select Null as Empty from [Case] as c1 join Task as t1 on c1.ID = t1.CaseID where c1.MasterCaseID= v.MasterCaseID and t1.TaskTypeID = 173 and t1.Status = 0 ) and not exists ( select t1.ID from [Case] as c1 join Task as t1 on c1.ID = t1.CaseID where c1.MasterCaseID= v.MasterCaseID and t1.TaskTypeID in (173, 312) and t1.Status = 1 and t1.Outcome = 'ΑΡΝ' group by t1.ID having MAX(t1.ID) = t1.ID ) and not exists ( select t1.ID from [Case] as c1 join Task as t1 on c1.ID = t1.CaseID where c1.MasterCaseID = v.MasterCaseID and t1.TaskTypeID = 173 and t1.Status = 1 group by t1.ID having MAX(t1.ID) = t1.ID )

templates.name: View Sales Market Analysis Completed
templates.sql: select distinct tgiv.ID ,CampaignID = tgi.CampaignID ,ActualOwnerID =tgiv.HandlerUserID , UnitID = u.UnitID ,tgiv.StartDate,tgiv.EndDate, (select sum(cp.Price-cp.Discount-cp.RulesDiscount) from ContractProduct cp where cp.RelatedContractID = ct.ID) as TargetValue, 1 as TargetCount, CustomerRating = tgiv.LossPrintedNew from TargetGroupItem as tgi join TargetGroupItemValue as tgiv on tgi.ID = tgiv.TargetGroupItemID join [Contract] as ct on tgiv.ContractID = ct.ID join [Case] c on tgiv.ID = c.ContextEntityID join Task t on c.ID = t.CaseID join [User] u on tgiv.HandlerUserID = u.ID where c.ContextEntityType = 'TGIV' and t.Status = 1 and c.State = 1 AND ct.State <> 3 AND tgiv.ContractID IS NOT NULL and ((t.TaskTypeID = 189 AND t.Outcome in ('Δεν αφορά σύνθετη καταχώρηση', 'Δεν υπάρχουν ελλείψεις')) or (t.TaskTypeID = 195 AND t.Outcome = 'Σελιδοποίηση'))

templates.name: View Sales Market Analysis Losings
templates.sql: with pt as ( select c.MasterCaseID,CampaignID = tgi.CampaignID,ActualOwnerID =t.ActualOwnerID , UnitID = u.UnitID,tgiv.StartDate,tgiv.EndDate from TargetGroupItem as tgi join TargetGroupItemValue as tgiv on tgi.ID = tgiv.TargetGroupItemID join [Case] c on tgiv.ID = c.ContextEntityID join Task t on c.ID = t.CaseID join [User] u on t.ActualOwnerID = u.ID where c.ContextEntityType = 'TGIV' and t.ActualOwnerID is not null and t.Outcome in ('ΑΡΝ','ΑΡΝΕ') and t.Status=1 and c.State=1 and t.TaskTypeID in (146,151,154,173,258,299,307,312,313) ) select CampaignID, ActualOwnerID,UnitID,StartDate,EndDate from pt as v where not exists ( select NULL as Empty from [Case] as c1 join Task as t1 on c1.ID = t1.CaseID left join TaskAssignment as ta1 on ta1.TaskID = t1.ID where c1.State = 0 and t1.TaskTypeID not in (263,273,155,199) -- FYI: Exclude notifications and t1.Status = 0 and c1.MasterCaseID = v.MasterCaseID and (t1.ActualOwnerID = v.ActualOwnerID or ta1.UserID = v.ActualOwnerID) )

templates.name: View Sales Market Analysis Pending
templates.sql: with pt as ( select c.MasterCaseID, CampaignID = tgi.CampaignID, ActualOwnerID =t.ActualOwnerID, UnitID = u.UnitID,tgiv.StartDate,tgiv.EndDate from TargetGroupItem as tgi join TargetGroupItemValue as tgiv on tgi.ID = tgiv.TargetGroupItemID join [Case] c on tgiv.ID = c.ContextEntityID join Task t on c.ID = t.CaseID join [User] u on t.ActualOwnerID = u.ID where c.ContextEntityType = 'TGIV' and tgiv.NeedPresentation = 0 and (t.Outcome = 'Αποδοχή χωρίς παρουσίαση μακέτας' OR t.Outcome = 'ΑΠΟΔΠ') and t.Outcome <> 'ΠΡΟΣΦ' and t.Status = 1 and c.State = 1 and t.TaskTypeID in (154,313) ) select CampaignID, ActualOwnerID,UnitID,StartDate,EndDate from pt as v where not exists (select null as empty from [Case] as c1 join Task as t1 on c1.ID = t1.CaseID where c1.MasterCaseID = v.MasterCaseID and t1.TaskTypeID not in (154,313,263,273,155,199) -- FYI: Exclude the above tasks and notifications and t1.Status = 0 and v.ActualOwnerID = t1.ActualOwnerID)

templates.name: View Sales Market Analysis Target Amount
templates.sql: select CampaignID = tgi.CampaignID, ActualOwnerID = tgiv.HandlerUserID, UnitID = u.UnitID, tgiv.StartDate as FromDate, tgiv.EndDate as ToDate, SUM(tgiv.TargetValue) as TargetValue, COUNT(tgiv.ID)as TargetCount from TargetGroupItem as tgi join TargetGroupItemValue as tgiv on tgi.ID = tgiv.TargetGroupItemID join [User] as u on tgiv.HandlerUserID = u.ID where tgiv.TargetValue > 0 group by tgi.CampaignID, tgiv.HandlerUserID, tgiv.StartDate,tgiv.EndDate, UnitID

templates.name: View Sales Market Item
templates.sql: /*==============================================================*/ /* View: ViewSalesMarketItem */ /*==============================================================*/ create view ViewSalesMarketItem as select CampaignID = tgi.CampaignID ,ActivityType = tst.ActivityType ,UnitID =actualOwner.UnitID ,TargetGroupValueID = tgiv.ID ,SelectedAllocationPlanID = tgiv.CampaignAllocationPlanID ,TargetGroupItemID = tgi.ID ,CaseID = ts.CaseID ,ts.ID as TaskID ,TaskName = ts.[Description] ,TaskTypeID = ts.TaskTypeID ,TaskCreatedOn = ts.CreatedOn ,ActualOwnerID = ts.ActualOwnerID ,ActualOwner = actualOwner.LastName + ' ' + actualOwner.FirstName ,SupervisorID = tgiv.Supervisor ,Supervisor = supervisor.LastName + ' ' + supervisor.FirstName ,AppointmentDateTime = tgiv.AppointmentDateTime ,BusinessPointID = tgi.BusinessPointID ,BPIdentityConfirmed = tgiv.BPIdentityConfirmed ,CustomerName = tgi.CustomerName ,CustomerCode = tgi.Code ,BrandName = tgi.Brandname ,EndDate = tgiv.EndDate ,IsReleased = tgiv.IsReleased ,OfferAmount = tgiv.TargetValue ,CRM = bp.HasCRMTicket ,MasterClassification = tgi.MainHeadingName ,MasterHeading = tgi.MainHeadingName --//Check ,ReliabilityStatus = cuso.[Description] ,ReliabilityID = ISNULL(cuso.ID,0) ,LossPrintedNew = tgiv.LossPrintedNew ,Prefecture = ISNULL( tgi.Prefecture,'') ,Municipality = ISNULL(tgi.Municipality,'') ,City = ISNULL(tgi.City ,'') ,Street = ISNULL( tgi.StreetName,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(tgi.StreetNumber,'') ,ZipCode = ISNULL(tgi.ZipCode,'') ,IsSubscription = (Case when exists (SELECT 1 FROM TargetGroupItemPeriod tgip join ContractProduct cp on tgip.ContractProductID = cp.ID where tgip.TargetGroupItemValueID = tgiv.ID and cp.IsRenewable = 1) then 1 else 0 end) ,NoCommReasonID = tgiv.NoCommReasonID ,UDFString01 = ISNULL(tgii.UDFString01,'') ,UDFString03 = ISNULL(tgii.UDFString03,'') ,UDFString05 = ISNULL(tgii.UDFString05,'') ,UDFValue01 = ISNULL(tgii.UDFValue01,0) ,UDFValue02 = ISNULL(tgii.UDFValue02,0) ,StartDate = tgiv.StartDate ,RecallTime =tgiv.RecallTime ,LastSignedDate = tgiv.LastSignedDate from TargetGroupItemValue tgiv join [Case] cs with (nolock) on tgiv.ID = cs.ContextEntityID join [Task] ts with (nolock) on cs.ID = ts.CaseID join [TaskType] tst with (nolock) on ts.TaskTypeID = tst.ID join TargetGroupItem tgi with (nolock) on tgiv.TargetGroupItemID = tgi.ID join BusinessPoint bp with (nolock) on tgi.BusinessPointID = bp.ID left join [User] actualOwner with (nolock) on ts.ActualOwnerID = actualOwner.ID left join [User] supervisor with (nolock) on tgiv.Supervisor = supervisor.ID left join CustomerSolvency cuso with (nolock) on bp.CustomerSolvencyID = cuso.ID left join TargetGroupItemInfo tgii with (nolock) on tgiv.ID = tgii.TargetGroupItemValueID where cs.ContextEntityType = 'TGIV' and ts.[Status] = 0

templates.name: View Sales Market Item Potential Owner Basic
templates.sql: select vTask.* ,PotentialOwnerID = vTask.ActualOwnerID from ViewSalesMarketTaskBasic vTask union select vTask.* ,PotentialOwnerID = urpTa.UserID from ViewSalesMarketTaskBasic vTask inner join TaskAssignment ta (nolock) on ta.TaskID = vTask.ID and ta.AssignmentType = 0 and vTask.ActualOwnerID is null inner join UserRole urpTa (nolock) on urpTa.RoleID = ta.RoleID union select vTask.* ,PotentialOwnerID = ta.UserID from ViewSalesMarketTaskBasic vTask inner join TaskAssignment ta (nolock) on ta.TaskID = vTask.ID and ta.AssignmentType = 0 and vTask.ActualOwnerID is null and ta.UserID is not null

templates.name: View Sales Market Item Potential Owner For Counter
templates.sql: select CampaignID = tgi.CampaignID ,ts.ID as TaskID ,TaskName = ts.[Description] ,TaskTypeID = ts.TaskTypeID ,PotentialOwnerID = ts.PotentialOwnerID ,UnitID = usr.UnitID ,NoCommReasonID = tgiv.NoCommReasonID ,StartDate = tgiv.StartDate ,EndDate = tgiv.EndDate ,AltOfferID = Case when tgiv.AltOfferID is null then 0 else 1 end ,IsReleased = tgiv.IsReleased ,CampaignState = camp.State ,TaskEditorState = ts.EditorState from TargetGroupItemValue tgiv (nolock) join ViewSalesMarketItemPotentialOwnerBasic as ts on tgiv.ID = ts.CaseContextEntityID join TargetGroupItem tgi with (nolock) on tgiv.TargetGroupItemID = tgi.ID join Campaign camp with (nolock) on tgi.CampaignID = camp.ID join [User] usr with (nolock) on ts.PotentialOwnerID = usr.ID left join TargetGroupItemInfo tgii with (nolock) on tgiv.ID = tgii.TargetGroupItemValueID where ts.CaseContextEntityType = 'TGIV' and ts.[Status] = 0 and (camp.state = 2 or (camp.State = 3 and (ts.EditorState > 0 and ts.TaskTypeID in (151,146) OR ts.TaskTypeID not in (151,146)))) --and ((camp.StartedOn <= GETDATE() and camp.ClosedOn >= GETDATE()) OR -- (camp.ClosedOn < GETDATE() and ts.EditorState > 0 and ts.TaskTypeID in (151,146)) OR -- (camp.ClosedOn < GETDATE() and ts.TaskTypeID not in (151,146)))

templates.name: View Sales Market Item Stake Holder Basic
templates.sql: select ta.TaskID TaskID, ursTa.UserID StakeHolderUserID from TaskAssignment ta inner join UserRole ursTa on ursTa.RoleID = ta.RoleID where ta.AssignmentType = 1 union select TaskID TaskID, UserID StakeHolderUserID from TaskAssignment where AssignmentType = 1 and UserID is not null

templates.name: View Sales Market Task And Owner
templates.sql: select vTask.* ,usr.LastName + ' ' + usr.FirstName as ActualOwnerFullName ,ActualOwnerUnitID = usr.UnitID ,PotentialOwnerUnitID = usr.UnitID ,PotentialOwnerID = vTask.ActualOwnerID ,StakeHolderUserID =null from ViewSalesMarketTaskBasic vTask inner join [User] as usr on vTask.ActualOwnerID = usr.ID union select vTask.* ,ActualOwnerFullName = null ,ActualOwnerUnitID = null ,PotentialOwnerUnitID = usr.UnitID ,PotentialOwnerID = urpTa.UserID ,StakeHolderUserID =null from ViewSalesMarketTaskBasic vTask inner join TaskAssignment ta on ta.TaskID = vTask.ID and ta.AssignmentType = 0 and vTask.ActualOwnerID is null inner join UserRole urpTa on urpTa.RoleID = ta.RoleID inner join [User] usr on urpTa.UserID = usr.ID union select vTask.* ,TaskActualOwnerFullName = null ,ActualOwnerUnitID = null ,PotentialOwnerUnitID = usr.UnitID ,PotentialOwnerID = ta.UserID ,StakeHolderUserID =null from ViewSalesMarketTaskBasic vTask inner join TaskAssignment ta on ta.TaskID = vTask.ID and ta.AssignmentType = 0 and vTask.ActualOwnerID is null and ta.UserID is not null inner join [User] usr on ta.UserID = usr.ID union select vTask.* ,usr.LastName + ' ' + usr.FirstName as ActualOwnerFullName ,ActualOwnerUnitID = usr.UnitID ,PotentialOwnerUnitID = null ,PotentialOwnerID = null ,StakeHolderUserID = ursTa.UserID from ViewSalesMarketTaskBasic vTask inner join [User] as usr on vTask.ActualOwnerID = usr.ID inner join TaskAssignment ta on ta.TaskID = vTask.ID and ta.AssignmentType = 1 inner join UserRole ursTa on ursTa.RoleID = ta.RoleID union select vTask.* ,TaskActualOwnerFullName = null ,ActualOwnerUnitID = null ,PotentialOwnerUnitID = null ,PotentialUserID = null ,StakeHolderUserID = ursTa.UserID from ViewSalesMarketTaskBasic vTask inner join TaskAssignment ta on ta.TaskID = vTask.ID and ta.AssignmentType = 1 and vTask.ActualOwnerID is null inner join UserRole ursTa on ursTa.RoleID = ta.RoleID union select vTask.* ,usr.LastName + ' ' + usr.FirstName as ActualOwnerFullName ,ActualOwnerUnitID = usr.UnitID ,PotentialOwnerUnitID = null ,PotentialOwnerID = null ,StakeHolderUserID = ta.UserID from ViewSalesMarketTaskBasic vTask left outer join [User] as usr on vTask.ActualOwnerID = usr.ID inner join TaskAssignment ta on ta.TaskID = vTask.ID and ta.AssignmentType = 1 and ta.UserID is not null

templates.name: View Sales Market Task Basic
templates.sql: select task.ID ,task.Description ,task.CreatedOn ,task.Status ,task.CaseID ,task.TaskTypeID ,task.Outcome ,task.CompletedOn ,task.ActualOwnerID ,task.DynamicCode ,task.DynamicDescription ,task.SenderID ,task.DMKey ,task.DMTable ,task.DMCharKey ,task.SubStatus ,task.EditorState ,TaskTypeActivityType = taskType.ActivityType ,CaseContextEntityID = theCase.ContextEntityID ,CaseContextEntityType = theCase.ContextEntityType from Task as task (nolock) inner join TaskType taskType (nolock) on task.TaskTypeID = taskType.ID and 1 <> task.[Status] inner join [Case] theCase (nolock) on task.CaseID = theCase.ID where ( 0 = theCase.[State] OR ( 1 = theCase.[State] AND 'N' = taskType.ActivityType ) ) AND taskType.ActivityType IN (N'N',N'H')

templates.name: View Source BPs
templates.sql: /*==============================================================*/ /* View: [ViewSourceBPs] */ /*==============================================================*/ create view ViewSourceBPs as with basicData as ( SELECT ActiveFlag = bp.IsActive ,SourceID = Case when cs.ID IS null then 0 else cs.ID end ,SourceName = case when cs.ID IS null then 'Unknown Source' else cs.[Description] end FROM BusinessPoint bp join dbo.Classification cl on bp.ID = cl.BusinessPointID and cl.ClassifierID = 5 and cl.ClassifierNodeID IN (3,4) left join CustomerSource cs on cs.ID = bp.CustomerSourceID ) SELECT ActiveFlag ,SourceID ,SourceName ,BPcount = count(*) FROM basicData GROUP BY ActiveFlag ,SourceID ,SourceName

,tgiv.AppointmentDateTime ,tgiv.BPIdentityConfirmed ,tgi.Code ,tgiv.LossPrintedNew ,tgiv.LastSignedDate ,LastPrintSalesMan01 = lastPrintSalesMan01.FullName ,LastPrintSalesMan02 = ,TaskCaseState -- ,CaseContextEntityID -- ,CaseContextEntityType -- ,CaseTypeID -- ,TaskCaseTypeCode -- ,TaskCaseTypeDescription -- ,CaseTypeContextEntityType -- ,TaskSenderLastName + ' ' + TaskSenderFirstName as TaskSenderFullName -- ,TaskSenderFirstName -- ,TaskSenderLastName -- ,TaskActualOwnerFullName = null -- ,TaskActualOwnerFirstName = null -- ,TaskActualOwnerLastName = null -- ,TaskDescription ,TaskCreatedOn ,TaskActualOwnerID ,TaskTypeID ,TaskTypeCode ,TaskTypeActivityType ,TaskCaseState ,CaseContextEntityID ,CaseContextEntityType ,CaseTypeID ,TaskCaseTypeCode ,TaskCaseTypeDescription ,CaseTypeContextEntityType ,TaskSenderLastName + ' ' + TaskSenderFirstName as TaskSenderFullName ,TaskSenderFirstName ,TaskSenderLastName ,usr.LastName + ' ' + usr.FirstName templates.name: View Task Info And Contract Salesman
templates.sql: select vt.*,ContractSalesman = '['+u.SalesCode +'] ' + u.LastName + ' '+ u.FirstName, Channel = ct.Description, CaseID = vt.TaskCaseID from ViewTaskInfo vt left outer join TargetGroupItemValue tgiv (nolock) on vt.[CaseContextEntityID] = tgiv.ID and vt.[CaseContextEntityType] = 'TGIV' left outer join Ticket tic (nolock) on vt.[CaseContextEntityID] = tic.ID and vt.[CaseContextEntityType] = 'TICKET' left outer join [Contract] con (nolock) on COALESCE(tgiv.ContractID,tgiv.AltOfferID,tic.RelatedContractID) = con.ID left outer join ChannelType ct (nolock) on con.ChannelTypeID = ct.ID left outer join [User] u on con.SalesManID = u.ID

templates.name: View Task Info Basic
templates.sql: SELECT TaskID = task.ID ,TaskStatus = task.[Status] ,TaskCaseID = task.CaseID ,TaskSenderID = task.SenderID ,TaskDynamicCode = task.DynamicCode ,TaskDynamicDescription = task.DynamicDescription ,TaskDescription = task.[Description] ,TaskCreatedOn = task.CreatedOn ,TaskActualOwnerID = task.ActualOwnerID ,TaskTypeID = taskType.ID ,TaskTypeCode = taskType.Code ,TaskTypeActivityType = taskType.ActivityType ,TaskCaseState = theCase.[State] ,CaseContextEntityID = theCase.ContextEntityID ,CaseContextEntityType = theCase.ContextEntityType ,CaseTypeID = caseType.ID ,TaskCaseTypeCode = caseType.Code ,TaskCaseTypeDescription = caseType.[Description] ,CaseTypeContextEntityType = caseType.ContextEntityType ,TaskSenderFirstName = sender.FirstName ,TaskSenderLastName = sender.LastName FROM Task AS task INNER JOIN TaskType taskType ON task.TaskTypeID = taskType.ID AND 1 <> task.[Status] INNER JOIN [Case] theCase ON task.CaseID = theCase.ID INNER JOIN CaseType caseType ON theCase.CaseTypeID = CaseType.ID AND caseType.[Version] != 3 LEFT OUTER JOIN [User] AS sender ON task.SenderID = sender.ID WHERE ( 0 = theCase.[State] OR ( 1 = theCase.[State] AND 'N' = taskType.ActivityType ) ) AND taskType.ActivityType IN (N'N',N'H')

templates.name: View Task Info Role Assigned
templates.sql: SELECT TaskID = task.ID ,TaskStatus = task.[Status] ,TaskCaseID = task.CaseID ,TaskSenderID = task.SenderID ,TaskDynamicCode = task.DynamicCode ,TaskDynamicDescription = task.DynamicDescription ,TaskDescription = task.[Description] ,TaskCreatedOn = task.CreatedOn ,TaskActualOwnerID = task.ActualOwnerID ,TaskTypeID = taskType.ID ,TaskTypeCode = taskType.Code ,TaskTypeActivityType = taskType.ActivityType ,TaskCaseState = theCase.[State] ,CaseContextEntityID = theCase.ContextEntityID ,CaseContextEntityType = theCase.ContextEntityType ,CaseTypeID = caseType.ID ,TaskCaseTypeCode = caseType.Code ,TaskCaseTypeDescription = caseType.[Description] ,CaseTypeContextEntityType = caseType.ContextEntityType ,TaskSenderFirstName = sender.FirstName ,TaskSenderLastName = sender.LastName ,TaskSenderFullName = sender.LastName + ' ' + sender.FirstName ,TaskActualOwnerFullName = usr.LastName + ' ' + usr.FirstName ,RoleID = ta.RoleID FROM Task AS task INNER JOIN TaskType taskType ON task.TaskTypeID = taskType.ID INNER JOIN [Case] theCase ON task.CaseID = theCase.ID INNER JOIN CaseType caseType ON theCase.CaseTypeID = CaseType.ID AND caseType.[Version] != 3 LEFT OUTER JOIN [User] AS sender ON task.SenderID = sender.ID LEFT OUTER JOIN [User] AS usr ON task.ActualOwnerID = usr.ID JOIN TaskAssignment ta ON task.ID = ta.TaskID AND ta.AssignmentType = 0 AND ta.RoleID IS NOT NULL WHERE 0 = theCase.[State] AND 'H' = taskType.ActivityType AND task.[status] = 0 AND task.ActualOwnerID IS NOT NULL

templates.name: View Task List For Dialer

joins.right: tgi.ID /* and tgi.CampaignID = 40 join Campaign camp on tgi.CampaignID = camp.ID and camp.State = 2 join Case c on tgiv.ID = c.ContextEntityID and c.ContextEntityType = 'TGIV' join Task t on c.ID = t.CaseID --and t.ActualOwnerID = 891 and t.TaskTypeID = 151 and t.Status = 0 where --camp.StartedOn <= @currDate and camp.ClosedOn >= @currDate c.State = 0 */

templates.sql: /*==============================================================*/ /* View: ViewTaskListForDialer */ /*==============================================================*/ create view ViewTaskListForDialer as select BusinessPointID = tgi.BusinessPointID ,CustomerCode = tgi.Code ,CustomerName = tgi.CustomerName ,LossPrintedNew = tgiv.LossPrintedNew ,StartDate = tgiv.StartDate ,EndDate = tgiv.EndDate ,MasterHeading = tgi.MainHeadingName ,TaskID = t.ID ,TargetGroupItemValueID = tgiv.ID ,TaskCreatedOn = t.CreatedOn ,SourceTaskID = t.ID ,TaskDescription = t.[Description] ,TaskTypeId = t.TaskTypeID ,CampaignID = camp.ID ,CampStartedOn = camp.StartedOn ,CampClosedOn = camp.ClosedOn ,ActualOwnerID = t.ActualOwnerID ,Brandname = tgi.Brandname ,Prefecture = tgi.Prefecture ,Municipality = tgi.Municipality ,City = tgi.City ,StreetName = tgi.StreetName ,StreetNumber = tgi.StreetNumber ,NumberExtension = tgi.NumberExtension ,ZipCode = tgi.ZipCode ,Phone = tgi.Phone ,CustomerProfession = tgi.CustomerProfession ,LastSignedDate = tgiv.LastSignedDate ,ReliabilityStatus = tgi.ReliabilityStatus ,SubchannelID = tgiv.SubChannelID from TargetGroupItemValue tgiv join TargetGroupItem tgi on tgiv.TargetGroupItemID = tgi.ID --and tgi.CampaignID = 40 join Campaign camp on tgi.CampaignID = camp.ID and camp.State = 2 join [Case] c on tgiv.ID = c.ContextEntityID and c.ContextEntityType = 'TGIV' join Task t on c.ID = t.CaseID --and t.ActualOwnerID = 891 and t.TaskTypeID = 151 and t.Status = 0 where --camp.StartedOn <= @currDate and camp.ClosedOn >= @currDate c.State = 0

templates.name: View XOGRAdvertisement Capture Info
templates.sql: SELECT h.Id, BusinessPointId = bp.id, CustomerCode = CAST(CustomerCode AS NVARCHAR(100)), CaptureDate = CAST(ISNULL([SnapshotCreatedOn],h.[CreatedOn]) AS DATETIME), [Version] = CAST( h.[Version] AS INT), [ListingType] = CAST( ListingType AS NVARCHAR(50)), [Type] = CAST( VersionType AS NVARCHAR(50)), [FriendlyUrl] = CAST( 'https://www.xo.gr/profile/'+FriendlyUrl+'/el/' AS NVARCHAR(255) ), Details = CAST([Changes] AS NVARCHAR(MAX)), SnapshotFile = CAST(SnapshotPath AS NVARCHAR(3500)) FROM ITAPPS.xoupdate.XoListingHistory h join BusinessPoint bp on h.CustomerCode = bp.Code --WHERE IsCaptured = 1

templates.name: vw LOCACities
templates.sql: --ΕΔΡΑ και συσχετιζόμενα select distinct mlc1.LocId as Id , mlc2.LocId as value , mlc2.city collate greek_ci_ai +' '+ isnull(mlc2.specifier,'')+' [' + cast(mlc2.LocId as nvarchar(10)) + ']' as 'text' from itapps.loca.cities mlc1 join itapps.loca.Cities mlc2 on mlc1.pref = mlc2.pref and mlc1.flag = 'I' where mlc1.LocId <> mlc2.LocId--a.GeoModelGC_Type = 'L' and bp.code = 10001 union ----------LOCA Type2 -- Mainland plus Εύβοια, Κρήτη (Πόλεις με απόσταση <= 60Km) select distinct mlc1.LocId as Id , mlc2.LocId as value , mlc2.city collate greek_ci_ai +' '+ isnull(mlc2.specifier,'') +' [' + cast(mlc2.LocId as nvarchar(10)) + ']' as 'text' from itapps.loca.cities mlc1 cross apply itapps.loca.Cities mlc2 where mlc1.Geom.STDistance(mlc2.Geom)/1000 <= 60 and mlc1.Geom.STDistance(mlc2.Geom)>0 and mlc1.flag='M' union ----------LOCA Type 3 -- Αττική (Πόλεις με απόσταση <= 6Km) select distinct mlc1.LocId as Id , mlc2.LocId as value , mlc2.city collate greek_ci_ai +' '+ isnull(mlc2.specifier,'') +' [' + cast(mlc2.LocId as nvarchar(10)) + ']' as 'text' from itapps.loca.cities mlc1 cross apply itapps.loca.Cities mlc2 where mlc1.Geom.STDistance(mlc2.Geom)/1000 <= 6 and mlc1.Geom.STDistance(mlc2.Geom)>0 and mlc1.flag = 'A' ----------LOCA Type 4 -- Θεσσαλονίκη union select distinct mlc1.LocId as Id , mlc2.LocId as value , mlc2.city collate greek_ci_ai +' '+ isnull(mlc2.specifier,'')+' [' + cast(mlc2.LocId as nvarchar(10)) + ']' as 'text' from itapps.loca.cities mlc1 cross apply itapps.loca.Cities mlc2 where mlc1.Geom.STDistance(mlc2.Geom)/1000 <= 10 and mlc1.Geom.STDistance(mlc2.Geom)>0 and mlc1.flag = 'T'

templates.name: vw Related Bp Branches
templates.sql: --ΕΔΡΑ και συσχετιζόμενα SELECT bp.code AS id, tbp.Code +','+ CAST(2 AS NVARCHAR(5)) AS value, tbp.code COLLATE Greek_CI_AS+' - '+tbp.name COLLATE Greek_CI_AS+ ' ['+CASE WHEN pr.Type = 2 THEN 'Σχέση Υποκαταστήματος]' ELSE 'Franchise]' COLLATE Greek_CI_AS END AS 'text' FROM dbo.BusinessPoint bp JOIN dbo.PointRelationship pr ON pr.BusinessPointID = bp.id --and pr.Type in (2,4) JOIN dbo.BusinessPoint tbp ON pr.TargetBussinessPointID = tbp.id AND pr.Type IN (2,4) WHERE bp.isactive = 1 AND tbp.isactive =1 --and bp.code = 123456 UNION --Επιστρέφει όλα τα related bps της έδρας ενός υποκαταστήματος εκτός της έδρας SELECT bp.code,--sbp.code,--related_bp.code,--, related_bp.code +','+ CAST(all_pr.Type AS NVARCHAR(5)) AS value, related_bp.code COLLATE Greek_CI_AS+' - '+related_bp.name COLLATE Greek_CI_AS+ ' ['+CASE WHEN all_pr.Type = 2 THEN 'Σχέση Υποκαταστήματος]' ELSE 'Franchise]' COLLATE Greek_CI_AS END AS 'text' FROM dbo.businesspoint bp JOIN dbo.PointRelationship pr ON bp.id= pr.TargetBussinessPointID AND pr.type IN (2,4) JOIN dbo.BusinessPoint sbp ON pr.BusinessPointID = sbp.id JOIN dbo.PointRelationship all_pr ON sbp.id = all_pr.BusinessPointID AND all_pr.type IN (2,4) JOIN dbo.BusinessPoint related_bp ON related_bp.id = all_pr.TargetBussinessPointID AND all_pr.TargetBussinessPointID <> bp.id WHERE bp.IsActive = 1 AND sbp.IsActive = 1 AND related_bp.IsActive = 1 --and bp.code = 123456 --Επιστρέφει την έδρα ενός υποκαταστήματος UNION SELECT bp.code,--related_bp.code,--sbp.code, sbp.code +','+ CAST(pr.Type AS NVARCHAR(5)) AS value, sbp.code COLLATE Greek_CI_AS+' - '+sbp.name COLLATE Greek_CI_AS+ ' ['+CASE WHEN pr.Type = 2 THEN 'Σχέση Υποκαταστήματος]' ELSE 'Franchise]' COLLATE Greek_CI_AS END AS 'text' FROM dbo.businesspoint bp JOIN dbo.PointRelationship pr ON bp.id= pr.TargetBussinessPointID AND pr.type IN (2,4) JOIN dbo.BusinessPoint sbp ON pr.BusinessPointID = sbp.id WHERE bp.IsActive = 1 AND sbp.IsActive = 1 --and bp.code = 123456

templates.name: vw Top Priority Cities
templates.sql: SELECT DISTINCT mlc1.LocId as Id , mlc1.LocId as value , mlc1.city collate greek_ci_ai +' '+ isnull(mlc1.specifier,'')+' [' + cast(mlc1.LocId as nvarchar(10)) + ']' as 'text' FROM itapps.loca.cities mlc1 WHERE LocId not in ('L1','L2')--pref <> 'E1' AND pref <> 'E3'

templates.sql: SELECT DISTINCT mlc1.LocId as Id , mlc1.LocId as value , mlc1.city collate greek_ci_ai +' '+ isnull(mlc1.specifier,'')+' [' + cast(mlc1.LocId as nvarchar(10)) + ']' as 'text' FROM itapps.loca.cities mlc1 where LocId = 'L2'--mlc1.pref = 'E3'

templates.name: vw Agora
templates.sql: SELECT TOP (100) PERCENT CASE WHEN ([Filter1].[LossPrintedNew] = 0) THEN CAST('Ν' AS VARCHAR) WHEN ([Filter1].[LossPrintedNew] = 1) THEN CAST('Π' AS VARCHAR) WHEN ([Filter1].[LossPrintedNew] = 2) THEN CAST('Α' AS VARCHAR) END AS LossPrintedNew, Filter1.TaskName, Filter1.CustomerCode, Filter1.CustomerName, Filter1.StartDate, Filter1.EndDate, Filter1.OfferAmount, Filter1.LastSignedDate, Filter1.MasterClassification, Filter1.AppointmentDateTime, Filter1.ActualOwnerLastName, Filter1.SupervisorLastName, Filter1.ContractID FROM (SELECT Extent1.ContractID, Extent1.CampaignID, Extent1.UnitID, Extent1.TargetGroupValueID, Extent1.SelectedAllocationPlanID, Extent1.TargetGroupItemID, Extent1.CaseID, Extent1.TaskID, Extent1.TaskName, Extent1.TaskTypeID, Extent1.TaskCreatedOn, Extent1.ActualOwnerID, Extent1.ActualOwner, Extent1.ActualOwnerFirstName, Extent1.ActualOwnerLastName, Extent1.SupervisorID, Extent1.Supervisor, Extent1.SupervisorFirstName, Extent1.SupervisorLastName, Extent1.AppointmentDateTime, Extent1.BusinessPointID, Extent1.BPIdentityConfirmed, Extent1.CustomerName, Extent1.CustomerCode, Extent1.Brandname, Extent1.EndDate, Extent1.StartDate, Extent1.IsReleased, Extent1.OfferAmount, Extent1.AddressLine1, Extent1.AddressLine3, Extent1.ContactInfo, Extent1.ContactName, Extent1.CRM, Extent1.MasterClassification, Extent1.MasterHeading, Extent1.IsRed, Extent1.Phones, Extent1.LossPrintedNew, Extent1.LastSignedDate, Extent2.LeftIndex, Extent2.RightIndex FROM (SELECT ContractID, CampaignID, TaskStatus, CaseState, ActivityType, UnitID, TargetGroupValueID, SelectedAllocationPlanID, TargetGroupItemID, CaseID, TaskID, TaskName, TaskTypeID, TaskCreatedOn, ActualOwnerID, ActualOwner, ActualOwnerFirstName, ActualOwnerLastName, SupervisorID, Supervisor, SupervisorFirstName, SupervisorLastName, AppointmentDateTime, BusinessPointID, BPIdentityConfirmed, CustomerName, CustomerCode, Brandname, EndDate, StartDate, IsReleased, OfferAmount, AddressLine1, AddressLine3, ContactInfo, ContactName, CRM, MasterClassification, MasterHeading, IsRed, Phones, LossPrintedNew, LastSignedDate FROM dbo.vwMarketValueContract AS ViewMarketItem) AS Extent1 INNER JOIN dbo.Unit AS Extent2 ON Extent1.UnitID = Extent2.ID WHERE (Extent1.StartDate IS NOT NULL) AND (Extent1.IsReleased = 1) AND (Extent1.StartDate IS NOT NULL) AND (Extent1.EndDate IS NOT NULL)) AS Filter1 INNER JOIN dbo.Unit AS Extent3 ON Filter1.LeftIndex >= Extent3.LeftIndex AND Filter1.RightIndex <= Extent3.RightIndex WHERE (Extent3.ID = 56) AND (Filter1.CampaignID = 13) AND (Filter1.StartDate >= '2011-07-01 00:00:00.000') ORDER BY Filter1.AppointmentDateTime

templates.name: vw Agora Attiki24
templates.sql: SELECT vae.LossPrintedNew AS E, vae.TaskName AS Περιγραφή, vae.CustomerCode AS Κωδικός, vae.CustomerName AS Όνομα, vae.StartDate AS Έναρξη, vae.EndDate AS Λήξη, vae.OfferAmount AS Προτυπωμένη, vae.LastSignedDate AS [Προηγ. Υπογραφή Συμβολαίου], vae.MasterClassification AS Κατηγορία, vae.AppointmentDateTime AS Ραντεβού, vae.ActualOwnerLastName AS Χρήστης, vae.SupervisorLastName AS Επιθεωρητής, vae.SubChannel AS ΥποΚανάλι, vae.Prefecture AS Νομός, vae.Municipality AS Δήμος, vae.City AS Πόλη, vae.Street AS Οδός, vae.ZipCode AS [Τ.Κ.], vae.MasterHeading AS [Κύρια Δραστηριότητα], vae.LastPrintSalesMan AS [Τελευταίος Πωλητής ( Print )], vae.LastInternetSalesMan AS [Τελευταίος Πωλητής ( Online )], vae.ExpirationDateInternet AS [Ημ/νια Λήξης Online], CASE WHEN ISNULL(tgiv.ContractID, '') = '' THEN tgiv.AltOfferID ELSE tgiv.ContractID END AS [Κωδ. Συμβολαίου] FROM dbo.vwAgoraExtended AS vae INNER JOIN dbo.TargetGroupItemValue AS tgiv ON vae.TargetGroupValueID = tgiv.ID

templates.name: vw Agora Extended
templates.sql: SELECT CASE WHEN ([Project1].[LossPrintedNew] = 0) THEN CAST('Ν' AS VARCHAR) WHEN ([Project1].[LossPrintedNew] = 1) THEN CAST('Π' AS VARCHAR) WHEN ([Project1].[LossPrintedNew] = 2) THEN CAST('Α' AS VARCHAR) END AS LossPrintedNew, [Project1].TaskName, [Project1].CustomerCode, [Project1].CustomerName, [Project1].StartDate, [Project1].EndDate, [Project1].OfferAmount, [Project1].LastSignedDate, [Project1].MasterClassification, [Project1].AppointmentDateTime, [Project1].ActualOwnerLastName, [Project1].SupervisorLastName, [Project1].[SubChannel] AS [SubChannel], [Project1].[Prefecture] AS [Prefecture], [Project1].[Municipality] AS [Municipality], [Project1].[City] AS [City], [Project1].[Street] AS [Street], [Project1].[ZipCode] AS [ZipCode], [Project1].[MasterHeading] AS [MasterHeading], [Project1].[LastPrintSalesMan] AS [LastPrintSalesMan], [Project1].[LastInternetSalesMan] AS [LastInternetSalesMan], [Project1].[ExpirationDateInternet] AS [ExpirationDateInternet], [Project1].[TargetGroupValueID] FROM (SELECT [Project1].[CampaignID] AS [CampaignID], [Project1].[UnitID] AS [UnitID], [Project1].[TargetGroupValueID] AS [TargetGroupValueID], [Project1].[SelectedAllocationPlanID] AS [SelectedAllocationPlanID], [Project1].[TargetGroupItemID] AS [TargetGroupItemID], [Project1].[CaseID] AS [CaseID], [Project1].[TaskID] AS [TaskID], [Project1].[TaskName] AS [TaskName], [Project1].[TaskTypeID] AS [TaskTypeID], [Project1].[TaskCreatedOn] AS [TaskCreatedOn], [Project1].[ActualOwnerID] AS [ActualOwnerID], [Project1].[ActualOwner] AS [ActualOwner], [Project1].[ActualOwnerFirstName] AS [ActualOwnerFirstName], [Project1].[ActualOwnerLastName] AS [ActualOwnerLastName], [Project1].[SupervisorID] AS [SupervisorID], [Project1].[Supervisor] AS [Supervisor], [Project1].[SupervisorFirstName] AS [SupervisorFirstName], [Project1].[SupervisorLastName] AS [SupervisorLastName], [Project1].[AppointmentDateTime] AS [AppointmentDateTime], [Project1].[BusinessPointID] AS [BusinessPointID], [Project1].[BPIdentityConfirmed] AS [BPIdentityConfirmed], [Project1].[CustomerName] AS [CustomerName], [Project1].[CustomerCode] AS [CustomerCode], [Project1].[BrandName] AS [BrandName], [Project1].[EndDate] AS [EndDate], [Project1].[StartDate] AS [StartDate], [Project1].[IsReleased] AS [IsReleased], [Project1].[OfferAmount] AS [OfferAmount], [Project1].[AddressLine1] AS [AddressLine1], [Project1].[AddressLine3] AS [AddressLine3], [Project1].[ContactInfo] AS [ContactInfo], [Project1].[ContactName] AS [ContactName], [Project1].[CRM] AS [CRM], [Project1].[MasterClassification] AS [MasterClassification], [Project1].[MasterHeading] AS [MasterHeading], [Project1].[Phones] AS [Phones], [Project1].[LossPrintedNew] AS [LossPrintedNew], [Project1].[LastSignedDate] AS [LastSignedDate], [Project1].[SubChannel] AS [SubChannel], [Project1].[Prefecture] AS [Prefecture], [Project1].[Municipality] AS [Municipality], [Project1].[City] AS [City], [Project1].[Street] AS [Street], [Project1].[ZipCode] AS [ZipCode], [Project1].[LastPrintSalesMan] AS [LastPrintSalesMan], [Project1].[LastInternetSalesMan] AS [LastInternetSalesMan], [Project1].[ExpirationDateInternet] AS [ExpirationDateInternet], [Project1].[C1] AS [C1], row_number() OVER (ORDER BY [Project1].[TaskCreatedOn] DESC) AS [row_number] FROM (SELECT [Extent1].[CampaignID] AS [CampaignID], [Extent1].[UnitID] AS [UnitID], [Extent1].[TargetGroupValueID] AS [TargetGroupValueID], [Extent1].[SelectedAllocationPlanID] AS [SelectedAllocationPlanID], [Extent1].[TargetGroupItemID] AS [TargetGroupItemID], [Extent1].[CaseID] AS [CaseID], [Extent1].[TaskID] AS [TaskID], [Extent1].[TaskName] AS [TaskName], [Extent1].[TaskTypeID] AS [TaskTypeID], [Extent1].[TaskCreatedOn] AS [TaskCreatedOn], [Extent1].[ActualOwnerID] AS [ActualOwnerID], [Extent1].[ActualOwner] AS [ActualOwner], [Extent1].[ActualOwnerFirstName] AS [ActualOwnerFirstName], [Extent1].[ActualOwnerLastName] AS [ActualOwnerLastName], [Extent1].[SupervisorID] AS [SupervisorID], [Extent1].[Supervisor] AS [Supervisor], [Extent1].[SupervisorFirstName] AS [SupervisorFirstName], [Extent1].[SupervisorLastName] AS [SupervisorLastName], [Extent1].[AppointmentDateTime] AS [AppointmentDateTime], [Extent1].[BusinessPointID] AS [BusinessPointID], [Extent1].[BPIdentityConfirmed] AS [BPIdentityConfirmed], [Extent1].[CustomerName] AS [CustomerName], [Extent1].[CustomerCode] AS [CustomerCode], [Extent1].[BrandName] AS [BrandName], [Extent1].[EndDate] AS [EndDate], [Extent1].[StartDate] AS [StartDate], [Extent1].[IsReleased] AS [IsReleased], [Extent1].[OfferAmount] AS [OfferAmount], [Extent1].[AddressLine1] AS [AddressLine1], [Extent1].[AddressLine3] AS [AddressLine3], [Extent1].[ContactInfo] AS [ContactInfo], [Extent1].[ContactName] AS [ContactName], [Extent1].[CRM] AS [CRM], [Extent1].[MasterClassification] AS [MasterClassification], [Extent1].[MasterHeading] AS [MasterHeading], [Extent1].[Phones] AS [Phones], [Extent1].[LossPrintedNew] AS [LossPrintedNew], [Extent1].[LastSignedDate] AS [LastSignedDate], [Extent1].[SubChannel] AS [SubChannel], [Extent1].[Prefecture] AS [Prefecture], [Extent1].[Municipality] AS [Municipality], [Extent1].[City] AS [City], [Extent1].[Street] AS [Street], [Extent1].[ZipCode] AS [ZipCode], [Extent1].[LastPrintSalesMan] AS [LastPrintSalesMan], [Extent1].[LastInternetSalesMan] AS [LastInternetSalesMan], [Extent1].[ExpirationDateInternet] AS [ExpirationDateInternet], CASE WHEN (1 = [Extent1].[IsRed]) THEN cast(1 AS bit) WHEN (1 <> [Extent1].[IsRed]) THEN cast(0 AS bit) END AS [C1] FROM (SELECT [ViewMarketItem].[CampaignID] AS [CampaignID], [ViewMarketItem].[TaskStatus] AS [TaskStatus], [ViewMarketItem].[CaseState] AS [CaseState], [ViewMarketItem].[ActivityType] AS [ActivityType], [ViewMarketItem].[UnitID] AS [UnitID], [ViewMarketItem].[TargetGroupValueID] AS [TargetGroupValueID], [ViewMarketItem].[SelectedAllocationPlanID] AS [SelectedAllocationPlanID], [ViewMarketItem].[TargetGroupItemID] AS [TargetGroupItemID], [ViewMarketItem].[CaseID] AS [CaseID], [ViewMarketItem].[TaskID] AS [TaskID], [ViewMarketItem].[TaskName] AS [TaskName], [ViewMarketItem].[TaskTypeID] AS [TaskTypeID], [ViewMarketItem].[TaskCreatedOn] AS [TaskCreatedOn], [ViewMarketItem].[ActualOwnerID] AS [ActualOwnerID], [ViewMarketItem].[ActualOwner] AS [ActualOwner], [ViewMarketItem].[ActualOwnerFirstName] AS [ActualOwnerFirstName], [ViewMarketItem].[ActualOwnerLastName] AS [ActualOwnerLastName], [ViewMarketItem].[SupervisorID] AS [SupervisorID], [ViewMarketItem].[Supervisor] AS [Supervisor], [ViewMarketItem].[SupervisorFirstName] AS [SupervisorFirstName], [ViewMarketItem].[SupervisorLastName] AS [SupervisorLastName], [ViewMarketItem].[AppointmentDateTime] AS [AppointmentDateTime], [ViewMarketItem].[BusinessPointID] AS [BusinessPointID], [ViewMarketItem].[BPIdentityConfirmed] AS [BPIdentityConfirmed], [ViewMarketItem].[CustomerName] AS [CustomerName], [ViewMarketItem].[CustomerCode] AS [CustomerCode], [ViewMarketItem].[BrandName] AS [BrandName], [ViewMarketItem].[EndDate] AS [EndDate], [ViewMarketItem].[StartDate] AS [StartDate], [ViewMarketItem].[IsReleased] AS [IsReleased], [ViewMarketItem].[OfferAmount] AS [OfferAmount], [ViewMarketItem].[AddressLine1] AS [AddressLine1], [ViewMarketItem].[AddressLine3] AS [AddressLine3], [ViewMarketItem].[ContactInfo] AS [ContactInfo], [ViewMarketItem].[ContactName] AS [ContactName], [ViewMarketItem].[CRM] AS [CRM], [ViewMarketItem].[MasterClassification] AS [MasterClassification], [ViewMarketItem].[MasterHeading] AS [MasterHeading], [ViewMarketItem].[IsRed] AS [IsRed], [ViewMarketItem].[Phones] AS [Phones], [ViewMarketItem].[LossPrintedNew] AS [LossPrintedNew], [ViewMarketItem].[LastSignedDate] AS [LastSignedDate], [ViewMarketItem].[SubChannel] AS [SubChannel], [ViewMarketItem].[Prefecture] AS [Prefecture], [ViewMarketItem].[Municipality] AS [Municipality], [ViewMarketItem].[City] AS [City], [ViewMarketItem].[Street] AS [Street], [ViewMarketItem].[ZipCode] AS [ZipCode], [ViewMarketItem].[LastPrintSalesMan] AS [LastPrintSalesMan], [ViewMarketItem].[LastInternetSalesMan] AS [LastInternetSalesMan], [ViewMarketItem].[ExpirationDateInternet] AS [ExpirationDateInternet] FROM [dbo].[ViewMarketItem] AS [ViewMarketItem]) AS [Extent1] INNER JOIN [dbo].[Unit] AS [Extent2] ON [Extent1].[UnitID] = [Extent2].[ID] CROSS JOIN [dbo].[Unit] AS [Extent3] WHERE ([Extent1].[StartDate] IS NOT NULL) AND ([Extent1].[EndDate] IS NOT NULL) AND ([Extent1].[CampaignID] = 13) AND ([Extent2].[LeftIndex] >= [Extent3].[LeftIndex]) AND ([Extent2].[RightIndex] <= [Extent3].[RightIndex]) AND ([Extent3].[ID] = 56) /*AND ( [Extent1].[EndDate] >= '2013-03-10 00:00:00' )*/ AND ([Extent1].[IsReleased] = 1) AND ([Extent1].[StartDate] IS NOT NULL) /*AND ( [Extent1].[StartDate] <= '2012-03-13 00:00:00' )*/ AND ([Extent1].[EndDate] IS NOT NULL)/*AND ( [Extent1].[EndDate] >= '2013-03-10 00:00:00' )*/ ) AS [Project1]) AS [Project1] WHERE [Project1].[row_number] > 0

templates.name: vw Market Value Contract
templates.sql: SELECT camp.ID AS CampaignID, task.Status AS TaskStatus, ca.State AS CaseState, tt.ActivityType, actualOwner.UnitID, tgiv.ID AS TargetGroupValueID, camp.SelectedAllocationPlanID, tgi.ID AS TargetGroupItemID, task.CaseID, task.ID AS TaskID, task.Description AS TaskName, task.TaskTypeID, task.CreatedOn AS TaskCreatedOn, task.ActualOwnerID, ISNULL(actualOwner.LastName, '') + ' ' + ISNULL(actualOwner.FirstName, '') AS ActualOwner, actualOwner.FirstName AS ActualOwnerFirstName, actualOwner.LastName AS ActualOwnerLastName, supervisor.ID AS SupervisorID, ISNULL(supervisor.LastName, '') + ' ' + ISNULL(supervisor.FirstName, '') AS Supervisor, supervisor.FirstName AS SupervisorFirstName, supervisor.LastName AS SupervisorLastName, tgiv.AppointmentDateTime, tgi.BusinessPointID, tgiv.BPIdentityConfirmed, tgi.CustomerName, tgi.Code AS CustomerCode, tgi.Brandname, tgiv.EndDate, tgiv.StartDate, tgiv.IsReleased, tgiv.TargetValue AS OfferAmount, tgi.StreetName + ' ' + tgi.StreetNumber AS AddressLine1, tgi.City AS AddressLine3, CONVERT(nvarchar(250), '') AS ContactInfo, CONVERT(nvarchar(50), '') AS ContactName, bp.HasCRMTicket AS CRM, cn.Name AS MasterClassification, tgi.MainHeadingName AS MasterHeading, 0 AS IsRed, CONVERT(nvarchar(250), '') AS Phones, tgiv.LossPrintedNew, tgiv.LastSignedDate, tgiv.ContractID FROM dbo.Campaign AS camp INNER JOIN dbo.TargetGroupItem AS tgi ON camp.ID = tgi.CampaignID INNER JOIN dbo.BusinessPoint AS bp ON tgi.BusinessPointID = bp.ID INNER JOIN dbo.ClassifierNode AS cn ON bp.ActivityClassifierNodeID = cn.ID INNER JOIN dbo.TargetGroupItemValue AS tgiv ON tgi.ID = tgiv.TargetGroupItemID INNER JOIN dbo.[Case] AS ca ON tgiv.ID = ca.ContextEntityID INNER JOIN dbo.CaseType AS ct ON ca.CaseTypeID = ct.ID AND ct.ContextEntityType = 'TGIV' INNER JOIN dbo.Task AS task ON ca.ID = task.CaseID AND task.Status = 0 INNER JOIN dbo.TaskType AS tt ON task.TaskTypeID = tt.ID INNER JOIN dbo.[User] AS actualOwner ON task.ActualOwnerID = actualOwner.ID INNER JOIN dbo.[User] AS supervisor ON tgiv.Supervisor = supervisor.ID

templates.name: vw Super Grid
templates.sql: SELECT vtg.UDFString02 AS [Κωδ. Πελάτη], vtg.Y01ADTotalPreprintedValue AS [Προτυπωμένη Αξία], vtg.Description AS Υποκανάλι, vtg.HandlerName AS [Σ.Δ. - Ανάθεση], vtg.SupervisorName AS Επιθεωρητής, Y01PSalesrep.ID AS [Πωλητής - Y01 - Print], Y01OSalesrep.ID AS [OnlineSalesRepIDΠωλητής - Y01 - Online], vtg.ExpirationDateInternet AS [Ελάχιστη ημερομηνία λήξης], vtg.SubscriptionSignDate AS [Ημερομηνία υπογραφής συνδρομητικού], vtg.Y01PrintSignDate AS [Ημερομηνία υπογραφής τελευταίου print] FROM dbo.ViewTargetGroupItemInfo AS vtg INNER JOIN dbo.CampaignAllocationPlan AS cap ON vtg.CampaignAllocationPlanID = cap.ID AND cap.PlanType = 1 LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.[User] AS Y01PSalesrep ON vtg.Y01PSalesrep = Y01PSalesrep.ID LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.[User] AS Y02PSalesrep ON vtg.Y02PSalesrep = Y02PSalesrep.ID LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.[User] AS Y01OSalesrep ON vtg.Y01OSalesrep = Y01OSalesrep.ID LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.[User] AS Y02OSalesrep ON vtg.Y02OSalesrep = Y02OSalesrep.ID WHERE (vtg.CampaignID = 14)

templates.name: vw Super Grid Pre Printed
templates.sql: SELECT vtg.UDFString02 AS [Κωδ. Πελάτη], vtg.CustomerName AS [Επωνυμία Πελάτη], Usr.SalesCode AS [Κωδ. Σ.Δ.], vtg.HandlerName AS [Σ.Δ. - Ανάθεση], UsrInspector.SalesCode AS [Κωδ. Επιθεωρητή], vtg.SupervisorName AS Επιθεωρητής FROM dbo.ViewTargetGroupItemInfo AS vtg INNER JOIN dbo.CampaignAllocationPlan AS cap ON vtg.CampaignAllocationPlanID = cap.ID AND cap.PlanType = 1 LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.[User] AS Y01PSalesrep ON vtg.Y01PSalesrep = Y01PSalesrep.ID LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.[User] AS Y02PSalesrep ON vtg.Y02PSalesrep = Y02PSalesrep.ID LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.[User] AS Y01OSalesrep ON vtg.Y01OSalesrep = Y01OSalesrep.ID LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.[User] AS Y02OSalesrep ON vtg.Y02OSalesrep = Y02OSalesrep.ID LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.[User] AS Usr ON vtg.HandlerUserID = Usr.ID LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.[User] AS UsrInspector ON vtg.Supervisor = UsrInspector.ID LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.TargetGroupItemValue AS tgiv ON vtg.TargetGroupItemValueID = tgiv.ID WHERE (vtg.CampaignID = 6) AND (tgiv.LossPrintedNew = 1)

templates.name: Workflow Contract View
templates.sql: /*==============================================================*/ /* View: WorkflowContractView */ /*==============================================================*/ with CaseTaskInfo as ( select CaseID = c.ID ,CaseState = c.[State] ,C.MasterCaseID ,C.CaseTypeID ,C.ContextEntityID ,C.ContextEntityType ,TaskID = t.ID ,TaskStatus = t.[Status] ,TaskCreatedOn = t.CreatedOn ,TaskDescription = t.[Description] ,TaskOutcome = T.Outcome ,TaskTypeID = TT.ID ,TT.ActivityType ,ActualOwnerID = AO.ID ,ActualOwnerUserName = AO.UserName --FYI: Actual Owner ,PotentialOwnerUserID = POU.ID ,PotentialOwenerUserName = POU.UserName -- FYI: Potential Onwer as User ,PotentialOwnerRoleID = R.ID ,PotentialOwnerRole = R.[Description] -- FYI: Potential Owner as Role from [Case] C with (nolock) JOIN CaseType CT with (nolock) ON C.CaseTypeID = CT.ID JOIN Task T with (nolock) ON T.CaseID = C.ID JOIN TaskType TT with (nolock) ON T.TaskTypeID = TT.ID LEFT JOIN [User] AO with (nolock) ON T.ActualOwnerID = AO.ID LEFT JOIN TaskAssignment TA with (nolock) ON T.ID = TA.TaskID and ta.AssignmentType = 0 LEFT JOIN [User] POU with (nolock) ON TA.UserID = POU.ID LEFT JOIN [Role] R with (nolock) ON TA.RoleID = R.ID ) , finalReport as ( --FYI: The following select returns a list of contracts that have not been completed SELECT ContractID = fcv.C_ID ,BusinessPointCode = fcv.A_BPCode ,BrandName = fcv.A_BPName ,ContractState = fcv.C_State ,ContractDate = fcv.C_Signdate ,ProductName = NULL ,Medium = NULL ,AdvState = convert(nvarchar(100),NULL ) ,TaskID ,TaskDescription ,TaskCreatedOn ,ActualOwnerID ,ActualOwnerUserName ,PotentialOwnerUserID ,PotentialOwenerUserName ,PotentialOwnerRoleID ,PotentialOwnerRole ,Flag=1 FROM dbo.ViewContract fcv with (nolock) JOIN TargetGroupItemValue TGIV with (nolock) ON ISNULL(TGIV.ContractID,TGIV.AltOfferID ) = fcv.C_ID JOIN CaseTaskInfo cti with (nolock) ON cti.ContextEntityID = TGIV.ID AND cti.ContextEntityType = 'TGIV' AND cti.[CaseState] = 0 AND cti.[TaskStatus] = 0 AND cti.ActivityType = 'H' UNION ALL --FYI: The following select returns a list of Advertisement that have not been completed SELECT ContractID = fcv.C_ID ,BusinessPointCode = fcv.A_BPCode ,BrandName = fcv.A_BPName ,ContractState = fcv.C_State ,ContractDate = fcv.C_Signdate ,ProductName = fcv.Adv_ProductName ,Medium = MV.Name ,AdvState = CASE fcv.Adv_QA WHEN 0 THEN 'Σε εκκρεμότητα' WHEN 1 THEN 'Ολοκληρωμένη' END ,TaskID ,TaskDescription ,TaskCreatedOn ,ActualOwnerID ,ActualOwnerUserName ,PotentialOwnerUserID ,PotentialOwenerUserName ,PotentialOwnerRoleID ,PotentialOwnerRole ,Flag=2 FROM dbo.ViewAdvertisement fcv with (nolock) JOIN MediumVersion MV with (nolock) ON fcv.Adv_ProductMVID = MV.ID JOIN CaseTaskInfo cti with (nolock) ON cti.ContextEntityID = fcv.Adv_ID AND cti.ContextEntityType = 'ADV' AND cti.[CaseState] = 0 AND cti.[TaskStatus] = 0 AND cti.ActivityType = 'H' UNION ALL --FYI: The following select statement is to retrieve contracts that --have been completed and passed QA -- during T01 (Έλεγχος πληρότητας) of P101 SELECT ContractID = fcv.C_ID ,BusinessPointCode = fcv.A_BPCode ,BrandName = fcv.A_BPName ,ContractState = fcv.C_State ,ContractDate = fcv.C_Signdate ,ProductName = fcv.Adv_ProductName ,Medium = MV.Name ,AdvState = case when exists ( select 1 from dbo.UdacProdRole as upr with (nolock) where p.UdacID = upr.UdacID ) and not exists ( Select 1 from dbo.[Case] advCase with (nolock) where fcv.Adv_ID = advCase.ContextEntityID and advCase.CaseTypeID in (81,102,103,104) and cti.MasterCaseID = advCase.MasterCaseID ) then 'Χωρίς παραμετροποίηση' when exists (Select 1 from dbo.[Case] advCase with (nolock) join dbo.Task advTask with (nolock) on advCase.ID = advTask.CaseID where fcv.Adv_ID = advCase.ContextEntityID and advCase.CaseTypeID in (81,102,103,104) and cti.MasterCaseID = advCase.MasterCaseID --and advTask.TaskTypeID = 193 and --and advTask.[Status] = 1 --and advTask.ActualOwnerID is not null ) and adv.DenyExtraction = 0 then 'Ολοκληρωμένη' when exists (Select 1 from dbo.[Case] advCase with (nolock) join dbo.Task advTask with (nolock) on advCase.ID = advTask.CaseID where fcv.Adv_ID = advCase.ContextEntityID and advCase.CaseTypeID in (81,102,103,104) and cti.MasterCaseID = advCase.MasterCaseID --and advTask.TaskTypeID = 193 and --and advTask.[Status] = 1 --and advTask.ActualOwnerID is not null ) and adv.DenyExtraction = 1 then 'Ολοκλήρωση χωρίς Κατασκευή' else 'Αυτόματη Ολοκλήρωση' end ,TaskID ,TaskDescription ,TaskCreatedOn ,ActualOwnerID ,ActualOwnerUserName ,PotentialOwnerUserID ,PotentialOwenerUserName ,PotentialOwnerRoleID ,PotentialOwnerRole ,Flag=3 from CaseTaskInfo cti with (nolock) join dbo.TargetGroupItemValue tgiv with (nolock) on cti.ContextEntityID = tgiv.ID and cti.ContextEntityType = 'TGIV' and cti.TaskTypeID = 189 and cti.TaskStatus = 1 and cti.TaskOutcome in ( 'Δεν αφορά σύνθετη καταχώρηση','Δεν υπάρχουν ελλείψεις') join dbo.ViewAdvertisement fcv with (nolock) on ISNULL(TGIV.ContractID,TGIV.AltOfferID ) = fcv.C_ID and fcv.Adv_ProductIsComposite = 0 AND fcv.Adv_QA = 1 join Advertisement adv with (nolock) on fcv.Adv_ID = adv.ID join dbo.Product p with (nolock) on fcv.Adv_ProductID = p.ID JOIN MediumVersion MV with (nolock) ON fcv.Adv_ProductMVID = MV.ID where not exists (select 1 from [Case] ca with (nolock) where ca.ContextEntityType = 'ADV' and ca.ContextEntityID = adv.ID) --not exists (Select 1 from -- dbo.[Case] ca -- join dbo.Task ta on ca.ID = ta.CaseID -- where tgiv.ID = ca.ContextEntityID -- and ta.TaskTypeID in (195,500) -- and ta.[Status] = 1 -- ) UNION ALL --FYI: The following select statement is to retrieve contracts that -- have been completed and passed QA -- during T06 (Οριστικοποίηση κατασκευής) of P101 SELECT ContractID = fcv.C_ID ,BusinessPointCode = fcv.A_BPCode ,BrandName = fcv.A_BPName ,ContractState = fcv.C_State ,ContractDate = fcv.C_Signdate ,ProductName = fcv.Adv_ProductName ,Medium = MV.Name ,AdvState = 'Ακύρωση' ,TaskID ,TaskDescription ,TaskCreatedOn ,ActualOwnerID ,ActualOwnerUserName ,PotentialOwnerUserID ,PotentialOwenerUserName ,PotentialOwnerRoleID ,PotentialOwnerRole ,Flag=5 FROM dbo.ViewAdvertisement fcv with (nolock) join Advertisement adv with (nolock) on fcv.Adv_ID = adv.ID join dbo.Product p with (nolock) on fcv.Adv_ProductID = p.ID JOIN MediumVersion MV with (nolock) ON fcv.Adv_ProductMVID = MV.ID JOIN TargetGroupItemValue TGIV with (nolock) ON ISNULL(TGIV.ContractID,TGIV.AltOfferID ) = fcv.C_ID JOIN CaseTaskInfo cti with (nolock) ON cti.ContextEntityID = adv.ID AND cti.ContextEntityType = 'ADV' WHERE --cti.[CaseState] = 1 AND -- removed due to bi465 cti.[TaskStatus] = 1 and cti.TaskOutcome = 'Ακύρωση' AND fcv.Adv_QA = 0 and fcv.CP_State = 3 -- cancelled --AND cti.TaskOutcome = 'Σελιδοποίηση' --BI-708 --and exists( select 1 -- from Task T1 -- where cti.CaseID = T1.CaseID -- and T1.TaskTypeID = 189) UNION ALL --FYI: The following select statement is to retrieve contracts that -- have been completed and passed QA -- during T06 (Οριστικοποίηση κατασκευής) of P101 SELECT ContractID = fcv.C_ID ,BusinessPointCode = fcv.A_BPCode ,BrandName = fcv.A_BPName ,ContractState = fcv.C_State ,ContractDate = fcv.C_Signdate ,ProductName = fcv.Adv_ProductName ,Medium = MV.Name ,AdvState = case when adv.DenyExtraction = 1 then 'Ολοκλήρωση χωρίς Κατασκευή' else 'Ολοκληρωμένη' end ,TaskID ,TaskDescription ,TaskCreatedOn ,ActualOwnerID ,ActualOwnerUserName ,PotentialOwnerUserID ,PotentialOwenerUserName ,PotentialOwnerRoleID ,PotentialOwnerRole ,Flag=4 FROM dbo.ViewAdvertisement fcv with (nolock) join Advertisement adv with (nolock) on fcv.Adv_ID = adv.ID join dbo.Product p with (nolock) on fcv.Adv_ProductID = p.ID JOIN MediumVersion MV with (nolock) ON fcv.Adv_ProductMVID = MV.ID JOIN TargetGroupItemValue TGIV with (nolock) ON ISNULL(TGIV.ContractID,TGIV.AltOfferID ) = fcv.C_ID JOIN [Case] c with (nolock) on TGIV.ID = c.ContextEntityID and c.ContextEntityType = 'TGIV' JOIN CaseTaskInfo cti with (nolock) ON c.ID = cti.MasterCaseID and cti.ContextEntityType = 'ADV' and cti.ContextEntityID = adv.ID WHERE cti.[TaskStatus] = 1 and ( (cti.TaskTypeID = 193 and cti.TaskOutcome = 'Σύνθετη καταχώρηση δεν παρουσιάζει λάθη') or (cti.TaskTypeID = 508 and cti.TaskOutcome = 'Ολοκλήρωση Χωρίς Κατασκεύη') or (cti.TaskTypeID = 521 and cti.TaskOutcome = 'Ολοκλήρωση χωρίς Κατασκευή') or (cti.TaskTypeID = 526 and cti.TaskOutcome = 'Ολοκλήρωση χωρίς Κατασκευή') or (cti.TaskTypeID = 515 and cti.TaskOutcome = 'Ολοκλήρωση χωρίς Κατασκευή') or (cti.TaskTypeID = 518) or (cti.TaskTypeID = 522 and cti.TaskOutcome = 'Δεν Απαιτούνται Διορθώσεις') or (cti.TaskTypeID = 527 and cti.TaskOutcome = 'Δεν Απαιτούνται Διορθώσεις') ) --AND cti.TaskOutcome = 'Σελιδοποίηση' --BI-708 AND fcv.Adv_QA = 1 --and exists( select 1 -- from Task T1 -- where cti.CaseID = T1.CaseID -- and T1.TaskTypeID = 189) ) select ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY ContractID) as ID, TaskID ,BusinessPointCode ,BrandName ,ContractID ,ContractState ,ContractDate ,TaskDescription ,ProductName ,Medium ,AdvState ,TaskCreatedOn ,ActualOwnerID ,ActualOwnerUserName ,PotentialOwnerUserID ,PotentialOwenerUserName ,PotentialOwnerRoleID ,PotentialOwnerRole ,Flag from finalReport fr

templates.name: XO active banners vw
templates.sql: WITH bd AS ( SELECT IL07_CT05_Id = fccv.Adv_ID ,DR02_Code = mv.Code ,DR10_Code = fccv.Adv_VersionSectionCode ,CM15_Id =CAST(fccv.C_BPCode AS INTEGER) ,CM22_Name = bp.BrandName ,CM22_BrandName = fccv.CP_BpName ,campaign = '-H' + CAST(ISNULL(mh.Code,'') AS VARCHAR) + '-C' + CAST(bp.Code AS VARCHAR) + '-' + CAST (fccv.C_ID AS VARCHAR) + '-' + CAST (Fccv.Adv_ID AS VARCHAR) ,UD02_Code = fccv.Adv_ProductCode ,HD06_FCode = REPLACE ( fvv.Branch,'-','.EL.') + CASE WHEN fvv.Branch IS NOT NULL THEN '.EL.' ELSE NULL END ,HD05_PrintedName = vgi.Description ,CT04_SignDate = fccv.C_Signdate ,CT23_StartDate = fccv.Adv_BeginDate ,CT05_ExpirationDate = fccv.Adv_EndDate ,ContractCode = fccv.C_ID ,CT04_Code = fccv.C_MigratedCode ,Adv_ProductID ,CP_ID ,C_State FROM dbo.FullContractView fccv JOIN dbo.BusinessPoint bp ON fccv.C_BPID = bp.ID JOIN dbo.VersionSection vs ON vs.ID = fccv.Adv_VersionSectionID JOIN dbo.MediumVersion mv ON vs.MediumVersionID = mv.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.VersionGroupItem vgi JOIN dbo.MasterHeading mh ON vgi.SourceHeadingID = mh.ID JOIN dbo.[FullVGIView] fvv ON vgi.ID= fvv.VGIID ON fccv.Adv_HeadingID = vgi.ID JOIN dbo.ProductPart pp ON fccv.Adv_ProductID = pp.ProductID JOIN dbo.ProductPartDefinition ppd ON pp.ProductPartDefinitionID = ppd.ID WHERE fccv.Adv_ProductCode IN ('ABN', 'ABT', 'CB1', 'CB1E', 'CB2', 'CB2E', 'CB3', 'CB3E' , 'CT1', 'CT1E', 'CT2', 'CT2E', 'CT3', 'CT3E', 'HB', 'HT' , 'RB1', 'RB2', 'RB3', 'SB', 'ST', 'TU' , 'LTAS1','LTAS2', 'LTAS3', 'LTAS1B', 'LTAS2B', 'LTAS3B' , '6M_CB1', '6M_CB2', '6M_CB3', '6M_CT1', '6M_CT2', '6M_CT3' , '6M_LTAS1', '6M_LTAS1B', '6M_LTAS2', '6M_LTAS2B', '6M_LTAS3', '6M_LTAS3B' ,'DPPMB','HTMLLTAS2','HTMLLTAS2B' ,'LTAS1_PROMO2015','LTAS2_PROMO2015','LTAS3_PROMO2015','LTAS1B_PROMO2015','LTAS2B_PROMO2015','LTAS3B_PROMO2015','CB1_PROMO2015','CB2_PROMO2015','CB3_PROMO2015' ) AND fccv.Adv_EndDate >= CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE) AND fccv.Adv_QA='true' --AND c_id != 1906941 /******AND fccv.C_BPCode NOT IN ('1289984','1440597','1541556')******/ ) , Cavs AS ( SELECT a.advID, a.cadName, cav.Value cavValue FROM ( SELECT bd.IL07_CT05_Id advID, cadAnim.NAME cadName, CavID= MAX(cavAnim.ID) FROM bd JOIN dbo.ProductPart pp ON bd.Adv_ProductID = pp.ProductID JOIN dbo.ProductPartDefinition ppd ON pp.ProductPartDefinitionID = ppd.ID JOIN dbo.ContentAttributeDefinition cadAnim ON ppd.ID = cadAnim.ProductPartDefinitionID AND cadAnim.NAME IN ('Αρχείο Animation','URL','oxScript','oxPrepend','oxAppend','oxService' ) JOIN dbo.ContentAttributeValue cavAnim ON cavAnim.ContractProductID = bd.CP_ID AND cavAnim.AdvertisementID = bd.IL07_CT05_Id AND cavAnim.ProductPartID = pp.ID AND cavAnim.ContentAttributeDefinitionID = cadAnim.ID AND cavAnim.Value IS NOT NULL GROUP BY bd.IL07_CT05_Id, cadAnim.NAME ) a JOIN dbo.ContentAttributeValue cav ON a.CavID = cav.id ) , CavsP AS ( SELECT * FROM Cavs PIVOT (MAX (Cavs.cavValue) FOR cadName IN ([Αρχείο Animation],[URL],[oxScript],[oxPrepend],[oxAppend],[oxService])) AS AvgIncomePerDay ) SELECT DISTINCT bd.IL07_CT05_Id ,DR02_Code ,DR10_Code ,CM15_Id ,CM22_Name ,CM22_BrandName ,campaign ,UD02_Code ,HD06_FCode ,HD05_PrintedName ,CT04_SignDate ,CT23_StartDate ,DATEADD(DAY, -1, CT05_ExpirationDate ) CT05_ExpirationDate ,IL09_GL12_Id = CASE WHEN PATINDEX('%.dpsf.%', g.[Αρχείο Animation] ) > 0 THEN LEFT( g.[Αρχείο Animation], PATINDEX('%.dpsf.%', g.[Αρχείο Animation] )+4) ELSE ('\\junco12\YPSDATA\CaseAttachments\'+g.[Αρχείο Animation]) END ,CT11_TextToPrint = g.URL ,ContractCode ,CT04_Code ,[oxScript] ,[oxPrepend] ,[oxAppend] ,[oxService] , CASE WHEN UD02_Code = 'HTMLLTAS2B' OR UD02_Code = 'HTMLLTAS2' THEN N'bannerTypeHtml:oxHtml:genericHtml' ELSE N'' END [oxBannerType] FROM bd JOIN dbo.Advertisement adv ON adv.ID = bd.IL07_CT05_Id JOIN dbo.ContractProduct cp ON adv.ContractProductID = cp.ID AND cp.State <> 3 AND ISNULL(InterruptionDate, GETDATE()+1) >= GETDATE() JOIN dbo.Contract ct ON cp.RelatedContractID = ct.ID AND ct.Type NOT IN (1,10) AND Ct.State NOT IN (3,5,10) JOIN CavsP g ON bd.IL07_CT05_Id = g.advID WHERE g.[Αρχείο Animation] IS NOT NULL OR oxScript IS NOT NULL

templates.name: XO active banners vw Buffer
templates.sql: with bd as ( select IL07_CT05_Id = fccv.Adv_ID ,DR02_Code = mv.Code ,DR10_Code = fccv.Adv_VersionSectionCode ,CM15_Id =CAST(fccv.C_BPCode AS integer) ,CM22_Name = bp.BrandName ,CM22_BrandName = fccv.CP_BpName ,campaign = '-H' + Cast(isnull(mh.Code,'') AS varchar) + '-C' + CAST(bp.Code AS varchar) + '-' + CAST (fccv.C_ID AS varchar) + '-' + Cast (Fccv.Adv_ID as varchar) ,UD02_Code = fccv.Adv_ProductCode ,HD06_FCode = REPLACE ( fvv.Branch,'-','.EL.') + case when fvv.Branch IS not null then '.EL.' else null end ,HD05_PrintedName = vgi.Description ,CT04_SignDate = fccv.C_Signdate ,CT23_StartDate = fccv.Adv_BeginDate ,CT05_ExpirationDate = fccv.Adv_EndDate ,ContractCode = fccv.C_ID ,CT04_Code = fccv.C_MigratedCode ,Adv_ProductID ,CP_ID ,C_State from dbo.FullContractView fccv join dbo.BusinessPoint bp on fccv.C_BPID = bp.ID join dbo.VersionSection vs on vs.ID = fccv.Adv_VersionSectionID join dbo.MediumVersion mv on vs.MediumVersionID = mv.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.VersionGroupItem vgi JOIN dbo.MasterHeading mh ON vgi.SourceHeadingID = mh.ID join dbo.[FullVGIView] fvv on vgi.ID= fvv.VGIID ON fccv.Adv_HeadingID = vgi.ID JOIN dbo.ProductPart pp ON fccv.Adv_ProductID = pp.ProductID JOIN dbo.ProductPartDefinition ppd ON pp.ProductPartDefinitionID = ppd.ID where fccv.Adv_ProductCode IN ('ABN', 'ABT', 'CB1', 'CB1E', 'CB2', 'CB2E', 'CB3', 'CB3E' , 'CT1', 'CT1E', 'CT2', 'CT2E', 'CT3', 'CT3E', 'HB', 'HT' , 'RB1', 'RB2', 'RB3', 'SB', 'ST', 'TU' , 'LTAS1','LTAS2', 'LTAS3', 'LTAS1B', 'LTAS2B', 'LTAS3B' , '6M_CB1', '6M_CB2', '6M_CB3', '6M_CT1', '6M_CT2', '6M_CT3' , '6M_LTAS1', '6M_LTAS1B', '6M_LTAS2', '6M_LTAS2B', '6M_LTAS3', '6M_LTAS3B' ,'DPPMB','HTMLLTAS2','HTMLLTAS2B' ) AND fccv.Adv_EndDate >= cast(GETDATE() as date) AND fccv.Adv_QA='true' --AND c_id != 1906941 /******AND fccv.C_BPCode NOT IN ('1289984','1440597','1541556')******/ ) , Cavs as ( SELECT a.advID, a.cadName, cav.Value cavValue FROM ( select bd.IL07_CT05_Id advID, cadAnim.NAME cadName, CavID= MAX(cavAnim.ID) from bd JOIN dbo.ProductPart pp ON bd.Adv_ProductID = pp.ProductID JOIN dbo.ProductPartDefinition ppd ON pp.ProductPartDefinitionID = ppd.ID JOIN dbo.ContentAttributeDefinition cadAnim ON ppd.ID = cadAnim.ProductPartDefinitionID AND cadAnim.NAME in ('Αρχείο Animation','URL','oxScript','oxPrepend','oxAppend','oxService' ) JOIN dbo.ContentAttributeValue cavAnim ON cavAnim.ContractProductID = bd.CP_ID AND cavAnim.AdvertisementID = bd.IL07_CT05_Id AND cavAnim.ProductPartID = pp.ID AND cavAnim.ContentAttributeDefinitionID = cadAnim.ID and cavAnim.Value is not null group by bd.IL07_CT05_Id, cadAnim.NAME ) a JOIN dbo.ContentAttributeValue cav ON a.CavID = cav.id ) , CavsP as ( select * from Cavs pivot (max (Cavs.cavValue) for cadName in ([Αρχείο Animation],[URL],[oxScript],[oxPrepend],[oxAppend],[oxService])) as AvgIncomePerDay ) select distinct bd.IL07_CT05_Id ,DR02_Code ,DR10_Code ,CM15_Id ,CM22_Name ,CM22_BrandName ,campaign ,UD02_Code ,HD06_FCode ,HD05_PrintedName ,CT04_SignDate ,CT23_StartDate ,dateadd(day, -1, CT05_ExpirationDate ) CT05_ExpirationDate ,IL09_GL12_Id = Case when PATINDEX('%.dpsf.%', g.[Αρχείο Animation] ) > 0 then LEFT( g.[Αρχείο Animation], PATINDEX('%.dpsf.%', g.[Αρχείο Animation] )+4) else ('\\junco12\YPSDATA\CaseAttachments\'+g.[Αρχείο Animation]) end ,CT11_TextToPrint = g.URL ,ContractCode ,CT04_Code ,[oxScript] ,[oxPrepend] ,[oxAppend] ,[oxService] , CASE WHEN UD02_Code = 'HTMLLTAS2B' OR UD02_Code = 'HTMLLTAS2' THEN N'bannerTypeHtml:oxHtml:genericHtml' ELSE N'' END [oxBannerType] from bd JOIN dbo.Advertisement adv ON adv.ID = bd.IL07_CT05_Id JOIN dbo.ContractProduct cp ON adv.ContractProductID = cp.ID AND cp.State <> 3 AND ISNULL(InterruptionDate, GETDATE()+1) >= GETDATE() JOIN dbo.Contract ct ON cp.RelatedContractID = ct.ID AND ct.Type NOT IN (1,10) AND Ct.State NOT IN (3,5,10) join CavsP g on bd.IL07_CT05_Id = g.advID where g.[Αρχείο Animation] is not null OR oxScript is NOT null

templates.name: XOSMSYPSTo EBSActive Business Points
templates.sql: SELECT distinct [Κωδικός] = bp.Code , [Διακριτικός] = bp.Name, [Επωνυμία] = bp.BrandName, [Είδος πελάτη] = cn.name, [Κύρια Δραστηριότητα] = (SELECT a.name FROM yps.dbo.ClassifierNode a JOIN yps.dbo.Classification b ON a.id = b.ClassifierNodeID AND b.ClassifierID = 3 AND b.BusinessPointID = bp.id), [Νομός] = adr.Prefecture, [Τελευταίo Συμβόλαιο] = (select top 1 id from yps.dbo.Contract ct where ct.ActualBPOwnerID = bp.id and ct.State not in (3,5,10) AND (ct.type in (0,2,3,4)) order by SignedDate desc), [Τελευταία Ημερ. Υπογραφής] = (select top 1 SignedDate from yps.dbo.Contract ct where ct.ActualBPOwnerID = bp.id and ct.State not in (3,5,10) AND (ct.type in (0,2,3,4)) order by SignedDate desc), [Τελευταία Ημερ. Λήξης Προβολής] =(select MAX(adv.AdvEndDate) from yps.dbo.Contract ct join yps.dbo.ContractProduct cp on cp.RelatedContractID = ct.id join yps.dbo.Advertisement adv on adv.ContractProductID = cp.id where ct.ActualBPOwnerID = bp.id and ct.State not in (3,5,10) AND (ct.type in (0,2,3,4)) ), [Ημερ. Διακοπής Προβολής] =(select top 1 cp.InterruptionDate from yps.dbo.Contract ct join yps.dbo.ContractProduct cp on cp.RelatedContractID = ct.id join yps.dbo.Advertisement adv on adv.ContractProductID = cp.id where ct.ActualBPOwnerID = bp.id and ct.State not in (3,5,10) AND (ct.type in (0,2,3,4)) order by adv.AdvEndDate desc ), --[Τηλέφωνο1]=(select top 1 number from PointPhone pp where pp.BusinessPointID = bp.id and pp.IsActive=1 and Usage =1), --[Τηλέφωνο2]=(select top 1 number from PointPhone pp where pp.BusinessPointID = bp.id and pp.IsActive=1 and Usage = 2), --[Φαξ]=(select top 1 number from PointPhone pp where pp.BusinessPointID = bp.id and pp.IsActive=1 and Usage = 7), [Κινητό] = (select top 1 pp.Number from yps.dbo.PointPhone pp WHERE pp.IsActive = 1 AND pp.Usage = 4 AND pp.BusinessPointID = bp.id AND pp.Number IS NOT NULL ORDER BY 1), [Ημ/νία Σύγκρισης] = case when ct.OrigionalContractID is null then ct.SignedDate ELSE ct.createdon end FROM yps.dbo.BusinessPoint bp LEFT JOIN yps.dbo.CONTRACT ct ON bp.id = ct.ActualBPOwnerID AND ct.State not in (3,5,10) AND ct.type in (0,2,3,4) join yps.dbo.FullAddressViewV2 adr on adr.ID = bp.LocationAddressID --731837 join yps.dbo.Classification cl on cl.BusinessPointID = bp.id and cl.ClassifierID = 5 join yps.dbo.ClassifierNode cn on cl.ClassifierNodeID = cn.id WHERE bp.IsActive = 1
