templates.sql: WITH billingemails AS ( SELECT bp.id AS Customerid, BillingEmail = ce.Email, RankEmailID = RANK() over(partition by Cr.BusinessPointID order by cr.id, CE.ID) FROM YPS.dbo.BusinessPoint AS bp JOIN YPS.dbo.ContactRelationship cr ON bp.ID = cr.BusinessPointID AND cr.ContactRelationshipTypeID = 20 AND cr.IsActive = 1 JOIN YPS.dbo.Contact ct ON cr.ContactID = ct.ID JOIN YPS.dbo.ContactEmail ce ON ct.ID = ce.ContactID ) , billingphones AS ( SELECT bp.id AS Customerid, BillingPhone = pp.Number, RankPhoneID = RANK() over(partition by pp.BusinessPointID order by pp.ID /*20150804 Bugzilla 1111 */desc) FROM YPS.dbo.BusinessPoint AS bp JOIN YPS.dbo.PointPhone pp ON bp.ID = pp.BusinessPointID AND pp.Usage = 9 AND pp.IsActive = 1 where not exists (select 1 from cardinal12.xoentersoft.dbo.EBSToCollectionCustomerAddress_20251030 e where bp.code = e.CustomerCode collate Greek_CI_AS --DEV-20387 sv 2025-11-24 and (e.Telephone1 = pp.Number collate Greek_CI_AI or pp.Number collate Greek_CI_AI = e.Telephone2 )) ) , emails AS ( SELECT bp.id AS Customerid, Email = pe.Email, RankEmailID = RANK() over(partition by pe.BusinessPointID order by pe.ID) FROM YPS.dbo.BusinessPoint AS bp JOIN YPS.dbo.PointEmail pe ON bp.ID = pe.BusinessPointID ) , workphones AS ( SELECT pp.BusinessPointID,pp.Number , SortRank = 2 FROM YPS.dbo.PointPhone pp WHERE Usage = 1 AND IsActive = 1 ) , restphones AS ( SELECT pp.BusinessPointID,pp.Number , SortRank = 3 FROM YPS.dbo.PointPhone pp WHERE Usage NOT IN (4,7) AND IsActive = 1 AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM workphones wp WHERE wp.Number = pp.Number)) , allphones AS ( SELECT * FROM workphones UNION SELECT * FROM restphones ) ,selectedPhones AS (select * from allphones ap join BusinessPoint bp on bp.id = ap.BusinessPointID where not exists (select 1 from cardinal12.xoentersoft.dbo.EBSToCollectionCustomerAddress_20251030 e where bp.code = e.CustomerCode collate Greek_CI_AS --DEV-20387 sv 2025-11-24 and (e.Telephone1 = ap.Number collate Greek_CI_AI or ap.Number collate Greek_CI_AI = Telephone2 )) and not exists (select 1 from billingphones b where b.BillingPhone = ap.Number and b.Customerid = ap.BusinessPointID ) --DEV-20387 ), RankedPhones AS ( select BusinessPointID,Number,SortRank,PhoneRank = RANK() over(partition by BusinessPointID order by sortrank, number desc) from selectedPhones ) --select * from BusinessPoint bp where bp.id = 61 --SELECT /*top 200*/ CustomerCode = bp.Code ,--DEV-9163 -- case when em.RankEmailID = 1 then em.BillingEmail else NULL end as BillingEmail, -- case when ph.RankPhoneID = 1 then ph.BillingPhone else NULL end as BillingPhone, -- case when m.RankEmailID = 1 then m.email else NULL end as Email2, -- Phone2 = case when ph2.PhoneRank = 1 then number else null end, -- Phone3 = case when ph2.PhoneRank = 2 then number else null end --FROM YPS.dbo.BusinessPoint bp --LEFT JOIN billingemails em ON em.customerid = bp.id --LEFT JOIN billingphones ph ON ph.customerid = bp.ID --LEFT JOIN emails m ON m.customerid = bp.ID --LEFT JOIN RankedPhones ph2 ON ph2.businesspointid = bp.id --WHERE (em.BillingEmail IS NOT NULL OR -- ph.BillingPhone IS NOT NULL OR -- m.email IS NOT NULL OR -- ph2.number is NOT NULL) /* selectedphones AS ( SELECT ap.businesspointid, ap.number, PhoneRank = RANK() over(partition by ap.BusinessPointID order by ap.SortRank, ap.ID /*20150804 Bugzilla 1111 */desc) FROM ( select *, rank = RANK() over(partition by BusinessPointID, number order by sortrank, id desc) from allphones --DEV-20387 2025-10-16 ) as ap join BusinessPoint bp on bp.id = ap.BusinessPointID where not exists (select 1 from cardinal12.xoentersoft.dbo.EBSToCollectionCustomerAddress e where bp.code = e.MainCustomerCode collate Greek_CI_AS and (e.Telephone1 = ap.Number collate Greek_CI_AI or ap.Number collate Greek_CI_AI = Telephone2 )) and not exists (select 1 from billingphones b where b.BillingPhone = ap.Number and b.Customerid = ap.BusinessPointID ) --DEV-20387 and ap.rank = 1 --DEV-20387 2025-10-16 ) */ SELECT CustomerCode = bp.Code ,--DEV-9163 em.BillingEmail, ph.BillingPhone, Email2 = m.email, Phone2 = ph2.Number, Phone3 = ph3.Number FROM YPS.dbo.BusinessPoint bp LEFT JOIN (SELECT customerid, billingemail FROM billingemails WHERE RankEmailID = 1) em ON em.customerid = bp.id LEFT JOIN (SELECT customerid, billingphone FROM billingphones WHERE RankPhoneID = 1) ph ON ph.customerid = bp.ID LEFT JOIN (SELECT customerid, email FROM emails WHERE RankEmailID = 1 ) m ON m.customerid = bp.ID--DEV-9163 changed 2 to 1 // 20161209 LEFT JOIN (SELECT businesspointid, number FROM RankedPhones sp WHERE PhoneRank =1) ph2 ON ph2.businesspointid = bp.id--DEV-9163 changed 2 to 1 // 20161209 LEFT JOIN (SELECT businesspointid, number FROM RankedPhones sp WHERE PhoneRank = 2) ph3 ON ph3.businesspointid = bp.id--DEV-9163 changed 3 to 2 // 20161209 WHERE (em.BillingEmail IS NOT NULL OR ph.BillingPhone IS NOT NULL OR m.email IS NOT NULL OR ph2.number is NOT NULL OR ph3.number is NOT null)

templates.sql: /****** Script for SelectTopNRows command from SSMS ******/ ( SELECT --cd.id,reverse(left(reverse(Filename), charindex('\', reverse(Filename)) -1)) cd.ID as ID, /*2024-03-29*/ cd.ContractID, co.MainCustomerCode as MainCustomerCode, CASE WHEN SUBSTRING(cd.Filename,1,30)<>'\\headquarters.gr\archivedyps\' THEN '\\junco12\YPSDATA\Contract\'+Filename ELSE cd.Filename END AS ContractDocument, CASE WHEN ins.rnk=1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS IsDefault , --cd.CreatedOn, --Extension = REVERSE(LEFT(REVERSE(reverse(left(reverse(Filename), charindex('\', reverse(Filename)) -1))), CHARINDEX('.', REVERSE(reverse(left(reverse(Filename), charindex('\', reverse(Filename)) -1)))))), --[File] = REVERSE(SUBSTRING(REVERSE(reverse(left(reverse(Filename), charindex('\', reverse(Filename)) -1))), CHARINDEX('_', REVERSE(reverse(left(reverse(Filename), charindex('\', reverse(Filename)) -1)))) + 1, LEN(REVERSE(reverse(left(reverse(Filename), charindex('\', reverse(Filename)) -1)))) - CHARINDEX('_', REVERSE(reverse(left(reverse(Filename), charindex('\', reverse(Filename)) -1)))))), DocumentName = CASE WHEN charindex('\', reverse(Filename)) > 1 THEN Case WHEN CHARINDEX('_', REVERSE(reverse(left(reverse(Filename), charindex('\', reverse(Filename)) -1)))) > 0 THEN REVERSE(SUBSTRING(REVERSE(REVERSE(LEFT(REVERSE(Filename), CHARINDEX('\', REVERSE(Filename)) -1))), CHARINDEX('_', REVERSE(REVERSE(LEFT(REVERSE(Filename), CHARINDEX('\', REVERSE(Filename)) -1)))) + 1, LEN(REVERSE(REVERSE(LEFT(REVERSE(Filename), CHARINDEX('\', REVERSE(Filename)) -1)))) - CHARINDEX('_', REVERSE(REVERSE(LEFT(REVERSE(Filename), CHARINDEX('\', REVERSE(Filename)) -1)))))) + REVERSE(LEFT(REVERSE(REVERSE(LEFT(REVERSE(Filename), CHARINDEX('\', REVERSE(Filename)) -1))), CHARINDEX('.', REVERSE(REVERSE(LEFT(REVERSE(Filename), CHARINDEX('\', REVERSE(Filename)) -1)))))) ELSE reverse(left(reverse(Filename), charindex('\', reverse(Filename)) -1)) END ELSE Filename END, DocumentType = CASE cd.ContractDocumentType WHEN 1 THEN 'Contract' WHEN 2 THEN 'Maketa' WHEN 3 THEN 'Outbound' WHEN 4 THEN 'OtherDocuments' WHEN 5 THEN 'MaketaProject' WHEN 6 THEN 'Logo' WHEN 7 THEN 'LogoProject' WHEN 8 THEN 'Informational' WHEN 9 THEN 'Inbound' WHEN 10 THEN 'InformationalProject' WHEN 11 THEN 'Cancelation' WHEN 12 THEN 'WebImageReport' WHEN 13 THEN 'VideoProject' WHEN 14 THEN 'AnimationProject' WHEN 15 THEN 'GoldenNumberProject' ELSE '' END, --ταξινόμηση ανά σύμβαση με την πιο πρόσφατη πάνω πάνω και ύστερα ανά ημερομηνία δημιουργίας του εγγράφου με το πιο πρόσφατο πάνω πάνω OrderNum = ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY co.MainCustomerCode ORDER BY cd.ContractID DESC, cd.CreatedOn desc) /*DEV-20327 2025*-06-04*/ FROM YPS.dbo.ContractDocument cd join cardinal12.[XOEntersoft].[dbo].EBSToCollectionContracts co on co.ContractCode = cast(cd.ContractID as nvarchar(50)) --join YPSSTAGE.dbo.Contract ct on ct.id = cd.ContractID --join YPSSTAGE.dbo.BusinessPoint bp on bp.id = ct.ActualBPOwnerID LEFT JOIN (SELECT id,ContractID,CreatedOn,ContractDocumentType,RANK () OVER (PARTITION BY ContractID ORDER BY createdon DESC,id DESC) AS rnk FROM YPS.dbo.ContractDocument WHERE ContractDocumentType=1 )ins ON ins.ID=cd.id )

templates.name: YPSTo EBSPost Checks
templates.sql: /*==============================================================*/ /* View: YPSToEBSPostChecks */ /*==============================================================*/ WITH Table7 AS ( SELECT cl.ContractID, cl.AdvertisementID, cl.ParentAdvertisementID, cl.AlteredAmount AS BufferValue, --adv.Price - adv.Discount - adv.RulesDiscount AS SourceValue, --Case when cp.State IN (3,4) then adv.AlteredAmount else adv.Price - adv.Discount - adv.RulesDiscount end AS SourceValue adv.AlteredAmount AS SourceValue FROM dbo.YPSToEBSContractLines cl JOIN dbo.Advertisement adv ON cl.AdvertisementID = adv.ID JOIN dbo.ContractProduct cp on cp.ID=adv.ContractProductID WHERE cp.State IN (3,4) and cl.AlteredAmount <> adv.AlteredAmount --cl.NetAmount <> Case when cp.State IN (3,4) then adv.AlteredAmount else adv.Price - adv.Discount - adv.RulesDiscount end --WHERE cl.NetAmount <> adv.Price - adv.Discount - adv.RulesDiscount UNION SELECT cl.ContractID, cl.AdvertisementID, cl.ParentAdvertisementID, cl.NetAmount AS BufferValue, --adv.Price - adv.Discount - adv.RulesDiscount AS SourceValue, -- Case when cp.State IN (3,4) then adv.AlteredAmount else adv.Price - adv.Discount - adv.RulesDiscount end AS SourceValue adv.Price - adv.Discount - adv.RulesDiscount AS SourceValue FROM dbo.YPSToEBSContractLines cl JOIN dbo.Advertisement adv ON cl.AdvertisementID = adv.ID JOIN dbo.ContractProduct cp on cp.ID=adv.ContractProductID WHERE cl.NetAmount <> adv.Price - adv.Discount - adv.RulesDiscount --cl.NetAmount <> Case when cp.State IN (3,4) then adv.AlteredAmount else adv.Price - adv.Discount - adv.RulesDiscount end ) --, Table8 as --( SELECT DISTINCT -- AdvertisementID , -- ParentAdvertisementID -- FROM dbo.YPSToEBSContracts ct -- JOIN dbo.YPSToEBSContractLines cl ON ct.ContractID = cl.ContractID -- WHERE cl.StartDate >= DATEADD(MILLISECOND, -3, DATEADD(YEAR, DATEDIFF(YEAR, 0, DATEADD(YEAR, 1, GETDATE())) + 1, 0)) -- AND ct.[Status] = 'ΕΝΕΡΓΗ' --) ,Table9 as (SELECT DISTINCT AdvertisementID , ParentAdvertisementID FROM dbo.YPSToEBSContracts ct JOIN dbo.YPSToEBSContractLines cl ON ct.ContractID = cl.ContractID WHERE cl.FirstInvoiceDate > = DATEADD(MILLISECOND, -3, DATEADD(YEAR, DATEDIFF(YEAR, 0, DATEADD(YEAR, 1, GETDATE())) + 1, 0)) AND ct.Status = 'ΕΝΕΡΓΗ' ) ,Table10 as (SELECT DISTINCT AdvertisementID , ParentAdvertisementID FROM dbo.YPSToEBSContracts ct JOIN dbo.YPSToEBSContractLines cl ON ct.ContractID = cl.ContractID WHERE cl.InstallmentSequence = 0 AND ct.[Status] = 'ΕΝΕΡΓΗ' ) ,Table11 as (select AdvertisementID, ParentAdvertisementID FROM dbo.YPSToEBSContracts ct JOIN dbo.YPSToEBSContractLines cl ON ct.ContractID = cl.ContractID where InvoiceQuantity = 0 AND ct.[Status] = 'ΕΝΕΡΓΗ' ) ,Table12 as (select AdvertisementID, ParentAdvertisementID FROM dbo.YPSToEBSContracts ct JOIN dbo.YPSToEBSContractLines cl ON ct.ContractID = cl.ContractID where InstallmentsPerInvoice = 0 AND ct.[Status] = 'ΕΝΕΡΓΗ' ) ,Table13 as (select AdvertisementID, ParentAdvertisementID FROM dbo.YPSToEBSContracts ct JOIN dbo.YPSToEBSContractLines cl ON ct.ContractID = cl.ContractID where InstallmentSequence <>1 AND PaymentChannel = 'ΜΕΤΡΗΤΑ' AND ct.[Status] = 'ΕΝΕΡΓΗ' ) ,Table14 as (select AdvertisementID, ParentAdvertisementID FROM dbo.YPSToEBSContracts ct JOIN dbo.YPSToEBSContractLines cl ON ct.ContractID = cl.ContractID where InstallmentSequence > 2 AND ct.[Status] = 'ΕΝΕΡΓΗ' ) ,Table15 as (select AdvertisementID, ParentAdvertisementID FROM dbo.YPSToEBSContracts ct JOIN dbo.YPSToEBSContractLines cl ON ct.ContractID = cl.ContractID where InstallmentSequence <> 2 AND PaymentChannel = 'ΟΤΕ' AND ct.[Status] = 'ΕΝΕΡΓΗ' ) ,Table16 as (SELECT DISTINCT c.id as contractid FROM dbo.Contract c JOIN dbo.ContractProduct cp ON cp.RelatedContractID=c.id JOIN dbo.PaymentMethod pm ON cp.PaymentMethodID = pm.ID JOIN dbo.PaymentMethodType pmt ON pm.PaymentMethodTypeID = pmt.ID WHERE c.MigratedCode IS NULL AND pmt.Description = 'TOTAL_BILLED' union SELECT DISTINCT c.id as contractid FROM dbo.Contract c JOIN dbo.InvoicePaymentMethod pm on pm.ID=c.id JOIN dbo.PaymentMethodType pmt ON pm.PaymentMethodTypeID = pmt.ID WHERE c.MigratedCode IS NULL AND pmt.Description = 'TOTAL_BILLED' ) ,Table17 AS (SELECT ict.id as contractid FROM dbo.Contract ict JOIN dbo.ContractProduct icp ON ict.ID = icp.RelatedContractID JOIN dbo.Advertisement ia ON icp.ID = ia.ContractProductID WHERE icp.[state] IN (1,2) AND ia.qa = 1 ) select ErrorType = 1 ,ErrorDescr = 'Πελάτες – Λάθος Φορολογικά Στοιχεία' ,EntityType = 'YPSToEBSCustomerData' ,EntityData = convert(xml, ( SELECT * FROM dbo.YPSToEBSCustomerData cust WHERE not (KEPYOStatus IS not NULL and VATStatus IS not NULL and GLSeqCode IS not NULL and ( not (TaxRegistrationNumber IS NULL AND GLSeqCode <> 2 and VATStatus<>2 ) ) ) FOR XML RAW ) ) union all select ErrorType = 2 ,ErrorDescr = 'Πελάτες – Χωρίς Γραμμή Διεύθυνσης' ,EntityType = 'YPSToEBSCustomerData' ,EntityData = convert(xml, ( SELECT * FROM dbo.YPSToEBSCustomerData cd WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM dbo.YPSToEBSCustomerAddress ca WHERE cd.Code = ca.CustomerCode ) FOR Λάθος Συχνότητα - ΟΤΕ' ,EntityType = 'YPSToEBSContracts' ,EntityData = convert(xml, ( select * from ( SELECT cl.* FROM dbo.YPSToEBSContractLines cl JOIN Table15 dc ON cl.AdvertisementID = dc.AdvertisementID union SELECT cl.* FROM dbo.YPSToEBSContractLines cl JOIN Table15 dc ON cl.AdvertisementID = dc.ParentAdvertisementID ) a FOR XML RAW ) ) union all select ErrorType = 16 ,ErrorDescr = 'Συμβόλαια – Έλλειψη Γραμμών' ,EntityType = 'YPSToEBSContracts' ,EntityData = convert(xml, ( SELECT ContractID FROM dbo.YPSToEBSContracts ct WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM dbo.YPSToEBSContractLines cl WHERE ct.ContractID = cl.ContractID ) FOR XML RAW ) ) union all select ErrorType = 17 ,ErrorDescr = 'Εισπράξεις – Έλλειψη Πελάτη' ,EntityType = 'YPSToEBSSalesCollection' ,EntityData = convert(xml, ( SELECT sl.* FROM dbo.YPSToEBSSalesCollection sl WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM dbo.YPSToEBSCustomerData cd WHERE sl.MainCustomerCode = cd.Code ) FOR XML RAW ) ) union all select ErrorType = 18 ,ErrorDescr = 'Εισπράξεις – Έλλειψη Διεύθυνσης Πελάτη' ,EntityType = 'YPSToEBSSalesCollection' ,EntityData = convert(xml, ( SELECT sl.* FROM dbo.YPSToEBSSalesCollection sl WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM dbo.YPSToEBSCustomerAddress ca WHERE sl.CustomerCode = ca.CustomerCode ) FOR XML RAW ) ) union all select ErrorType = 19 ,ErrorDescr = 'Εισπράξεις – Αντιστροφή Κωδ. templates.name: YPSTo EBSSales Collection
templates.sql: SELECT [SystemReceiptID] ,[MainCustomerCode] ,[CustomerCode] ,[BlockSeries] ,[BlockReceiptNumber] ,[CreatedOn] ,[SalesManCode] ,[CollectorCode] ,[ContractID] ,[PaymentChannel] ,CreaditCardTransactionID = [TransactionID] ,[CreditCardTypeID] ,[CreditCardNumber] ,[CreditCardEndDate] ,[CreditCardOwner] ,[CreditCardInstallments] ,[CheckNumber] ,[BankID] ,[CheckPublishDate] ,[CheckExpirationDate] ,[CheckPublisher] ,[CheckTaxCode] ,[Amount] ,[IsPayoff] ,[IsSamePublisher] ,[Status] ,[ModifiedOn] ,BankDepositNumber ,BankDepositDate ,CompanyId ,CollectionDate FROM [dbo].[ERPSalesCollectionBridgeBuffer]

templates.name: YPSTo EBSSales Person
templates.sql: /*==============================================================*/ /* View: YPSToEBSSalesPerson */ /*==============================================================*/ create view YPSToEBSSalesPerson as select Code, FullName, LastModifiedDate, IsActive from ErpSalesmanBridgeBuffer

templates.name: YPSTo EBSServices
templates.sql: /*==============================================================*/ /* View: YPSToEBSServices */ /*==============================================================*/ SELECT ID, Code, Name, case IsDeleted when 1 then 0 else 1 end as IsActive, IsComposite as IsBundle, case Characterization when 1 then 'ΥΠΗΡΕΣΙΑ PRINT' when 2 then 'ΥΠΗΡΕΣΙΑ ONLINE' when 3 then 'BUNDLE MORE PRINT' when 4 then 'BUNDLE MORE ONLINE' when 5 then 'BUNDLE CORE' else null end as Category, ModifiedOn as LastModificationDate FROM Udac u WHERE id = (SELECT MAX(id) FROM dbo.Udac u1 WHERE u.Code = u1.Code)

templates.name: YPSTo EBSTax Office
templates.sql: /*==============================================================*/ /* View: YPSToEBSTaxOffice */ /*==============================================================*/ create view YPSToEBSTaxOffice as SELECT ID, Code, Description, IsActive From TaxOffice

templates.name: YPSTo EBSVATStatus
templates.sql: /*==============================================================*/ /* View: YPSToEBSVATStatus */ /*==============================================================*/ create view YPSToEBSVATStatus as select ID, Code, Description,IsActive from VatCategory

templates.name: HEADQUARTERS\spitsaris
templates.sql: /*==============================================================*/ /* View: ViewPrefectureBPDtls */ /*==============================================================*/ create view ViewPrefectureBPDtls as SELECT ActiveFlag = a.IsActive, BusinessPointID = a.ID, BusinessPointCode = a.Code, BusinessPointName = a.Name, IsPOI = a.IsPOI, CustomerSourceID = a.CustomerSourceID, CustomerSourceDesc = b.Description, ActivityClassifierNodeID = a.ActivityClassifierNodeID, ActivityName = c.Name, AreaName = x.AreaName FROM BusinessPoint a LEFT OUTER JOIN CustomerSource b ON (b.ID = a.CustomerSourceID) LEFT OUTER JOIN ClassifierNode c ON (c.ID = a.ActivityClassifierNodeID) LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT d.AddressID,e.AreaName FROM BroaderArea d, BroaderAreaLookUp e WHERE d.BroaderAreaID = e.BroaderAreaID AND d.BroaderAreaID LIKE 'E%' AND isnull(e.MasterGeoAreaGroupID,0) > 0 GROUP BY d.AddressID,e.AreaName) x ON (x.AddressID = a.LocationAddressID)

templates.name: HEADQUARTERS\spitsaris
templates.sql: /*==============================================================*/ /* View: ViewPrefectureBPs */ /*==============================================================*/ create view ViewPrefectureBPs as SELECT ActiveFlag = a.IsActive, AreaID = b.BroaderAreaID, AreaName = c.AreaName, BPcount = count(*) FROM BusinessPoint a, BroaderArea b, BroaderAreaLookUp c WHERE a.LocationAddressID = b.AddressID AND b.BroaderAreaID = c.BroaderAreaID AND b.BroaderAreaID LIKE 'E%' AND isnull(c.MasterGeoAreaGroupID,0) > 0 GROUP BY a.IsActive,b.BroaderAreaID, c.AreaName

templates.name: Absentees ( Monthly Report ) - Absentees Dataset
templates.sql: --declare @dateto datetime, -- @datefrom datetime --set @dateto = '2021-03-31'; --set @datefrom = '2021-03-01'; IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#xo_jc_lavi_temp') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #xo_jc_lavi_temp; SELECT ABSENCES.PERSON_CD, PERSONS.LAST_NAME, PERSONS.FIRST_NAME, ABSENCES.DATE_INI, ABSENCES.DATE_FIN, ABSENCES.PERIOD into #xo_jc_lavi_temp FROM cardinal12.HrMaster.dbo.T0X_PRSDAT AS PERSONDATA INNER JOIN cardinal12.HrMaster.dbo.T0X_PERSON AS PERSONS ON PERSONDATA.PERSON_CD = PERSONS.CODE INNER JOIN cardinal12.HrMaster.dbo.T9X_PRSABS AS ABSENCES ON PERSONS.CODE = ABSENCES.PERSON_CD WHERE PERSONDATA.NOTICE_DATE > DATEADD(year, 10, @dateto) AND (DATE_INI >= @datefrom or DATE_FIN >= @datefrom ) AND (DATE_INI <= @dateto or DATE_FIN <= @dateto ) IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#xo_jc_badd_temp') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #xo_jc_badd_temp; select distinct Code, LAST_NAME, FIRST_NAME into #xo_jc_badd_temp from cardinal12.HrMaster.dbo.T0X_PERSON AS PERSONS select [Personnel Number], xo_jc_badd.LAST_NAME, xo_jc_badd.FIRST_NAME, DayAbsent from ( select [Personnel Number], LAST_NAME, FIRST_NAME, DayAbsent from ( select distinct [Personnel Number], LAST_NAME, FIRST_NAME, cast(Day as datetime) as DayAbsent, max(case when cast(xo_jc_nonpres.Day as datetime) >= cast(xo_jc_lavi.DATE_INI as datetime) AND cast(xo_jc_nonpres.Day as datetime) <= cast(xo_jc_lavi.DATE_FIN as datetime) then 1 else 0 end ) as maxflag from ( select sentoni.[Personnel Number], sentoni.Day, max(sentoni.presence) as mpr from ( select distinct [Personnel Number], Day, presence from ( select distinct workers.[Personnel Number], working_days.Day, 0 as presence from ( select distinct ca.tIdentification AS [Personnel Number], ev.dtEventReal from dbo.tblEvents as ev INNER JOIN dbo.tblEmployees as ca ON ev.IdEmpNum = ca.iEmployeeNum where ev.dtEventReal >= @datefrom and ev.dtEventReal <= DateAdd(day, 1, @dateto ) and ca.tIdentification <> '' ) as workers, ( select distinct '20' + SUBSTRING(REPLACE(CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), ev.dtEventReal, 4), '.', '/'), 7, 2) + '-' + SUBSTRING(REPLACE(CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), ev.dtEventReal, 4), '.', '/'), 4, 2) + '-' + SUBSTRING(REPLACE(CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), ev.dtEventReal, 4), '.', '/'), 1, 2) AS Day from dbo.tblEvents as ev INNER JOIN dbo.tblEmployees as ca ON ev.IdEmpNum = ca.iEmployeeNum where ev.dtEventReal >= @datefrom and ev.dtEventReal <= DateAdd(day, 1, @dateto ) and datepart(weekday, SUBSTRING(REPLACE(CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), ev.dtEventReal, 4), '.', '/'), 4, 2) + '/' + SUBSTRING(REPLACE(CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), ev.dtEventReal, 4), '.', '/'), 1, 2) + '/' + '20' + SUBSTRING(REPLACE(CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), ev.dtEventReal, 4), '.', '/'), 7, 2) ) not in (1,7) ) as working_days ) as a union all ( select distinct ca.tIdentification AS [Personnel Number], '20' + SUBSTRING(REPLACE(CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), ev.dtEventReal, 4), '.', '/'), 7, 2) + '-' + SUBSTRING(REPLACE(CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), ev.dtEventReal, 4), '.', '/'), 4, 2) + '-' + SUBSTRING(REPLACE(CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), ev.dtEventReal, 4), '.', '/'), 1, 2) AS Day, 1 as presence from dbo.tblEvents as ev INNER JOIN dbo.tblEmployees as ca ON ev.IdEmpNum = ca.iEmployeeNum where ev.dtEventReal >= @datefrom and ev.dtEventReal <= DateAdd(day, 1, @dateto ) and ca.tIdentification <> '' and datepart(weekday, SUBSTRING(REPLACE(CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), ev.dtEventReal, 4), '.', '/'), 4, 2) + '/' + SUBSTRING(REPLACE(CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), ev.dtEventReal, 4), '.', '/'), 1, 2) + '/' + '20' + SUBSTRING(REPLACE(CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), ev.dtEventReal, 4), '.', '/'), 7, 2) ) not in (1,7) ) ) as sentoni group by sentoni.[Personnel Number], sentoni.Day having max(sentoni.presence) = 0 ) as xo_jc_nonpres LEFT OUTER JOIN #xo_jc_lavi_temp xo_jc_lavi on xo_jc_nonpres.[Personnel Number] = xo_jc_lavi.PERSON_CD --where xo_jc_nonpres.[Personnel Number] not in (select * from dbo.XO_Excepted_AMYs) group by [Personnel Number], LAST_NAME, FIRST_NAME, Day ) as outter_rim where maxflag = 0 ) as even_outter,#xo_jc_badd_temp as xo_jc_badd where even_outter.[Personnel Number] = xo_jc_badd.Code --and [Personnel Number] not in (select * from dbo.XO_Excepted_AMYs) order by DayAbsent drop table #xo_jc_lavi_temp drop table #xo_jc_badd_temp

templates.name: Approved Συμβόλαια (weekly report) - Weekly Report For Georgatos Data Set
aggregations: SUM(CASE WHEN cp1.state IN (3, 4) AND NOT cp1.AlteredAmount IS NULL THEN cp1.AlteredAmount ELSE cp1.Price - cp1.Discount - cp1.RulesDiscount END)
templates.sql: SELECT [t9].[Code] AS [BPCode], [t9].[TaxCode] AS [VAT], [t9].[BrandName], [t9].ID AS [ContractID], [t9].[SignedDate] AS [SignedOn], [t9].[value] AS [Amount], [t9].[value2] AS [Campaign], [t9].CreatedOn, [t9].OrigionalContractID FROM ( SELECT [t4].[Code] AS [Code], [t4].[TaxCode] AS [TaxCode], [t4].[BrandName] AS [BrandName], [t4].ID AS ID, [t4].[SignedDate] AS [SignedDate], [t4].[value] AS [value], ( CASE WHEN EXISTS( SELECT NULL AS [EMPTY] FROM [TargetGroupItemValue] AS [t5] WHERE ( [t5].[ContractID] = ( [t4].[ID] ) ) AND ( [t5].[ContractID] = [t4].[ID] ) ) THEN CONVERT( NVARCHAR(MAX), ( SELECT [t8].[Name] FROM [TargetGroupItemValue] AS [t6] INNER JOIN [TargetGroupItem] AS [t7] ON [t7].[ID] = [t6].[TargetGroupItemID] INNER JOIN [Campaign] AS [t8] ON [t8].[ID] = [t7].[CampaignID] WHERE ( [t6].[ContractID] = ( [t4].[ID] ) ) AND ( [t6].[ContractID] = [t4].[ID] ) ) ) ELSE NULL END ) AS [value2], [t4].[State] AS [State], [t4].CreatedOn AS CreatedOn, [t4].OrigionalContractID AS OrigionalContractID FROM ( SELECT [t1].[Code] AS [Code], [t2].[TaxCode] AS [TaxCode], [t1].[BrandName] AS [BrandName], [t0].[SignedDate] AS [SignedDate], ( ( CAST(( SELECT SUM( CASE WHEN cp1.state IN (3, 4) AND NOT cp1.AlteredAmount IS NULL THEN cp1.AlteredAmount ELSE cp1.Price - cp1.Discount - cp1.RulesDiscount END ) FROM dbo.ContractProduct AS cp1 WHERE RelatedContractID = [t0].id ) AS MONEY) ) ) AS [value], [t0].[ID] AS [ID], [t0].[State] AS [State], [t0].CreatedOn AS CreatedOn, [t0].OrigionalContractID AS OrigionalContractID FROM [Contract] AS [t0] INNER JOIN [BusinessPoint] AS [t1] ON [t1].[ID] = [t0].[BillingPointID] AND ( [t0].type IN (0, 2, 4) ) LEFT OUTER JOIN [TaxCode] AS [t2] ON [t2].[ID] = [t1].[ID] ) AS [t4] ) AS [t9] WHERE ( NOT [t9].[SignedDate] IS NULL ) AND ( ( ( [t9].[SignedDate] >= @p0 ) AND ( [t9].[SignedDate] <= @p1 ) AND [t9].OrigionalContractID IS NULL ) OR ( ( [t9].CreatedOn >= @p0 ) AND ( [t9].CreatedOn <= @p1 ) AND NOT [t9].OrigionalContractID IS NULL ) ) AND ( [t9].[State] = 1 ) ORDER BY [t9].[SignedDate]

templates.name: Customer Constraints-Συνοπτικά Επιχ Σημεία Ανά Καμπάνια - Data Set1
templates.sql: --συγκεντρωτικό select count(distinct bp.id) as cnt--'Πελάτες με Customer Constraints' ,a.CampaignId ,'['+cm.code+'] '+cm.name as 'Καμπάνια' , case when cast(cm.ClosedOn as date) > cast(getdate() as date) then 'Ενεργή' else 'Ανενεργή' end as CStatus from BusinessPoint bp --on tgi.BusinessPointID = bp.id join dbo.Classification cl on cl.BusinessPointID = bp.ID JOIN dbo.ClassifierNode cln ON cl.ClassifierNodeID = cln.ID JOIN dbo.Classifier clr ON cl.ClassifierID = clr.ID join (select max(tgi.CampaignID) as campaignId,bp.id as bpId from BusinessPoint bp join TargetGroupItem tgi on bp.id = tgi.BusinessPointID where bp.IsActive = 1 group by bp.id )a on a.bpId = bp.id join Campaign cm on cm.id = a.campaignId where clr.id = 6 --and cast(cm.ClosedOn as date) > cast(getdate() as date) and cm.id in (@CampaignID) group by a.campaignId, '['+cm.code+'] '+cm.name, case when cast(cm.ClosedOn as date) > cast(getdate() as date) then 'Ενεργή' else 'Ανενεργή' end order by 4 desc

templates.name: Customer Constraints-Συνοπτικά Επιχ Σημεία Ανά Καμπάνια - DSCampaign Param
templates.sql: --συγκεντρωτικό select distinct a.CampaignId ,'['+cm.code+'] '+cm.name as 'Καμπάνια' from BusinessPoint bp --on tgi.BusinessPointID = bp.id join dbo.Classification cl on cl.BusinessPointID = bp.ID JOIN dbo.ClassifierNode cln ON cl.ClassifierNodeID = cln.ID JOIN dbo.Classifier clr ON cl.ClassifierID = clr.ID join (select max(tgi.CampaignID) as campaignId,bp.id as bpId from BusinessPoint bp join TargetGroupItem tgi on bp.id = tgi.BusinessPointID where bp.IsActive = 1 group by bp.id )a on a.bpId = bp.id join Campaign cm on cm.id = a.campaignId where clr.id = 6 order by 1 desc

templates.name: Email-Κινητά Πελατολογίου - Data Set1
templates.sql: --declare @PrefectureParam nvarchar(50),@date date ,@cusIndicator nvarchar(50), @option nvarchar(50); --set @PrefectureParam = 'Αιτωλοακαρνανίας'; --set @date = '2013/02/26'; --set @cusIndicator = 'Regular'; --set @option = 'ΝΑΙ'; --select distinct -- Prefecture = (case WHEN da.BroaderAreaID ='E2' THEN 'Αττικής' -- WHEN da.BroaderAreaID = 'E5' THEN 'Αττικής' -- WHEN da.BroaderAreaID = 'E20' THEN 'Αττικής' -- WHEN da.BroaderAreaID = 'E4' THEN 'Αττικής' -- ELSE da.AreaName -- END) --from BroaderAreaLookUp da where BroaderAreaID like 'E%' --select BusinessPointID from pointemail if object_id('tempdb..#basicPoint') is not null drop table #basicPoint SELECT distinct bp.id, [Κωδικός] = cast(bp.Code as bigint) , [Διακριτικός] = bp.Name, [Επωνυμία] = bp.BrandName, [CusIndicator] = cn.name, [Κύρια Δραστηριότητα] = (SELECT a.name FROM dbo.ClassifierNode a JOIN dbo.Classification b ON a.id = b.ClassifierNodeID AND b.ClassifierID = 3 AND b.BusinessPointID = bp.id), Νομός = adr.Prefecture, [Συμβόλαιο]=case when (select count(distinct ct.id) from Contract ct where ct.ActualBPOwnerID = bp.id and ct.State not in (3,5,10) AND (ct.type in (0,2,3,4)) and ((ct.SignedDate >= @date and ct.OrigionalContractID IS null) OR (ct.createdon >= @date and ct.OrigionalContractID IS not null)) ) = 0 then 'ΟΧΙ' ELSE 'ΝΑΙ' END, [Τελευταίo Συμβόλαιο] = (select top 1 id from Contract ct where ct.ActualBPOwnerID = bp.id and ct.State not in (3,5,10) AND (ct.type in (0,2,3,4)) order by SignedDate desc), [Τελευταία Ημερ. Υπογραφής] = (select top 1 SignedDate from Contract ct where ct.ActualBPOwnerID = bp.id and ct.State not in (3,5,10) AND (ct.type in (0,2,3,4)) order by SignedDate desc), [Τελευταία Ημερ. Λήξης Προβολής] =(select top 1 adv.AdvEndDate from Contract ct join ContractProduct cp on cp.RelatedContractID = ct.id join Advertisement adv on adv.ContractProductID = cp.id where ct.ActualBPOwnerID = bp.id and ct.State not in (3,5,10) AND (ct.type in (0,2,3,4)) order by adv.AdvEndDate desc), [Ημερ. Διακοπής Προβολής] =(select top 1 cp.InterruptionDate from Contract ct join ContractProduct cp on cp.RelatedContractID = ct.id join Advertisement adv on adv.ContractProductID = cp.id where ct.ActualBPOwnerID = bp.id and ct.State not in (3,5,10) AND (ct.type in (0,2,3,4)) order by adv.AdvEndDate desc), [Τηλέφωνο1]=(select top 1 number from PointPhone pp where pp.BusinessPointID = bp.id and pp.IsActive=1 and Usage =1), [Τηλέφωνο2]=(select top 1 number from PointPhone pp where pp.BusinessPointID = bp.id and pp.IsActive=1 and Usage = 2), [Φαξ]=(select top 1 number from PointPhone pp where pp.BusinessPointID = bp.id and pp.IsActive=1 and Usage = 7) INTO #basicPoint FROM dbo.BusinessPoint bp join FullAddressViewV2 adr on adr.ID = bp.LocationAddressID --731837 join Classification cl on cl.BusinessPointID = bp.id and cl.ClassifierID = 5 join ClassifierNode cn on cl.ClassifierNodeID = cn.id WHERE bp.IsActive = 1 AND adr.Prefecture IN ( @PrefectureParam ) and cn.name in( @cusIndicator) AND ( (EXISTS (select 1 from dbo.PointPhone pp where pp.BusinessPointID = bp.id and pp.IsActive=1 and Usage = 4) AND @option2 = 'ΚΙΝΗΤΟ' ) OR (EXISTS (select 1 from dbo.PointEmail pe where pe.BusinessPointID = bp.id ) AND @option2 = 'EMAIL') ) if object_id('tempdb..#emails') is not null drop table #emails SELECT * , RankID = RANK() over ( PARTITION By aa.BusinessPointID order by aa.Email ) into #emails from ( select distinct pe.BusinessPointID ,pe.Email from #basicPoint bp join dbo.PointEmail pe on bp.ID = pe.BusinessPointID )aa if object_id('tempdb..#mobiles') is not null drop table #mobiles SELECT * , RankID = RANK() over ( PARTITION By aa.BusinessPointID order by aa.Number ) into #mobiles from ( select distinct pp.BusinessPointID ,pp.Number from #basicPoint bp join dbo.PointPhone pp on bp.ID = pp.BusinessPointID WHERE pp.IsActive = 1 AND pp.Usage = 4 )aa select distinct bp.[Κωδικός] ,bp.[Διακριτικός] ,bp.[Επωνυμία] ,bp.[CusIndicator] ,bp.[Κύρια Δραστηριότητα] ,bp.[Νομός] ,bp.[Συμβόλαιο] ,bp.[Τελευταίo Συμβόλαιο] ,convert (NVARCHAR(15), bp.[Τελευταία Ημερ. Υπογραφής], 103) as [Τελευταία Ημερ. Υπογραφής] ,convert (NVARCHAR(15), bp.[Τελευταία Ημερ. Λήξης Προβολής], 103) as [Τελευταία Ημερ. Λήξης Προβολής] ,convert (NVARCHAR(15), bp.[Ημερ. Διακοπής Προβολής], 103) as [Ημερ. Διακοπής Προβολής] ,bp.[Τηλέφωνο1] ,bp.[Τηλέφωνο2] ,Κινητό = m1.Number --,Κινητό2 = m2.Number --,Κινητό3 = m3.Number ,bp.[Φαξ] ,email1 = e1.email ,email2 = e2.email ,email3 = e3.email ,email4 = e4.email ,email5 = e5.email --into #result from #basicPoint bp left join #emails e1 on bp.ID = e1.BusinessPointID and e1.RankID =1 left join #emails e2 on bp.ID = e2.BusinessPointID and e2.RankID =2 left join #emails e3 on bp.ID = e3.BusinessPointID and e3.RankID =3 left join #emails e4 on bp.ID = e4.BusinessPointID and e4.RankID =4 left join #emails e5 on bp.ID = e5.BusinessPointID and e5.RankID =5 left join #mobiles m1 on bp.ID = m1.BusinessPointID and m1.RankID =1 left join #mobiles m2 on bp.ID = m2.BusinessPointID and m2.RankID =2 left join #mobiles m3 on bp.ID = m3.BusinessPointID and m3.RankID =3 where ( (e1.Email is not null AND @option2 = 'EMAIL') OR (m1.number is not null AND @option2 = 'ΚΙΝΗΤΟ') ) and bp.[Συμβόλαιο] in (@option ) order by bp.[Κωδικός]

templates.sql: --DECLARE @startdate AS DATETIME, @enddate AS DATETIME, @Campaignid AS INT --SET @startdate = '20121001' --SET @enddate = '20121024' --SET @Campaignid = 13 ; WITH YPSData AS ( SELECT DISTINCT CampaignDesc = '[' + cm.Code + '] ' + cm.Name , SupervisorId = su.id , SalesManID = u.id , SupervisorName = '[' + su.SalesCode + '] ' + su.LastName + ' ' + su.FirstName , SalesmanName = '[' + u.SalesCode + '] ' + u.LastName + ' ' + u.FirstName , CustomerIndicator = CASE tgiv.LossPrintedNew WHEN 2 THEN 0 ELSE tgiv.LossPrintedNew END , cn.Name MainActivity , cn.ID MAId , OfferId = ct.id , TaskOutcome = t.Outcome FROM dbo.Campaign cm JOIN dbo.TargetGroupItem tgi ON tgi.CampaignID = cm.ID JOIN dbo.TargetGroupItemValue tgiv ON tgi.ID = tgiv.TargetGroupItemID AND tgiv.CampaignAllocationPlanID = cm.SelectedAllocationPlanID JOIN dbo.[User] su ON tgiv.Supervisor = su.ID JOIN dbo.[Case] cs ON cs.ContextEntityID = tgiv.ID AND cs.ContextEntityType = 'tgiv' JOIN dbo.Task t ON cs.ID = t.CaseID --JOIN dbo.[User] u ON t.ActualOwnerID = u.ID JOIN dbo.TaskType tt ON t.TaskTypeID = tt.ID AND TT.ActivityType = 'H' AND tt.ID IN (154,312,313) --146--Προγραμματισμός πώλησης --154 ---TaskType = Επίσκεψη σε πελάτη JOIN dbo.Contract ct ON tgiv.AltOfferID = ct.ID and ct.type in (0,2,3,4) /**/JOIN dbo.[User] u ON ct.SalesManID = u.ID JOIN dbo.BusinessPoint BP ON tgi.BusinessPointID = BP.ID JOIN dbo.Classification cl ON BP.ID = cl.BusinessPointID JOIN dbo.ClassifierNode cn ON cl.ClassifierNodeID = cn.ID AND cl.ClassifierID = 3 WHERE cm.ID = @CampaignId AND ct.State not in (3,5,10) AND ct.CreatedOn BETWEEN @startdate AND DATEADD(DAY,1,@EndDate) ) , GroupOfferData AS ( SELECT CampaignDesc , SupervisorId , SalesManID , SupervisorName , SalesmanName , CustomerIndicator , MainActivity , MAId , CountOfOffers = COUNT(DISTINCT OfferId) FROM YPSData GROUP BY CampaignDesc , SupervisorId , SalesManID , SupervisorName , SalesmanName , CustomerIndicator , MainActivity , MAId ), GroupContractData AS ( SELECT SalesManId , SupervisorId , CustomerIndicator , MainActivity , MAId , CountOfContracts = COUNT(DISTINCT OfferId) FROM YPSData cd WHERE (TaskOutcome in ('ΑΠΟΔΠ','Αποδοχή με παρουσίαση μακέτας','Αποδοχή χωρίς παρουσίαση μακέτας') OR TaskOutcome IS NULL) --in ('ΑΠΟΔΠ','Αποδοχή με παρουσίαση μακέτας','Αποδοχή χωρίς παρουσίαση μακέτας') GROUP BY SalesManId , SupervisorId , SalesmanId , CustomerIndicator , MainActivity , MAId ) SELECT cod.SupervisorId , cod.SupervisorName , cod.SalesManID , cod.SalesmanName , cod.MainActivity , CustomerIndicator = CASE cod.CustomerIndicator WHEN 0 THEN 'ΝΕΟΙ' ELSE 'ΠΡΟΤΥΠΩΜΕΝΟΙ' END , SumOffers = ISNULL(CountOfOffers, 0) , SumContracts = ISNULL(CountOfContracts, 0) FROM GroupOfferData cod LEFT JOIN GroupContractData gcd ON cod.SalesManID = gcd.SalesManId AND cod.CustomerIndicator = gcd.CustomerIndicator AND cod.supervisorid = gcd.supervisorid AND cod.MAId = gcd.maid

templates.name: Premise - Επισκεψιμότητα Ανά Καμπάνια - Visits
templates.sql: ----SELECT * FROM dbo.Campaign --DECLARE @startdate AS DATETIME, @enddate AS DATETIME, @Campaignid AS INT --SET @startdate = '20130628' --SET @enddate = '20130628' --SET @Campaignid = 24 --SELECT * FROM dbo.TaskType WHERE Description LIKE 'επίσκε%' ;WITH CustomerVisits AS ( SELECT TgivId = tgiv.id, TaskID = t.id, CampaignID = cm.ID , CampaignDesc = '[' + cm.Code + '] ' + cm.NAME, SupervisorId = su.ID, SupervisorName = '[' + ISNULL(su.SalesCode,'') + '] ' + ISNULL(su.LastName, '') + ' ' + ISNULL(su.FirstName,''), SalesManId = U.ID, SalesManName = '[' + ISNULL(u.SalesCode,'') + '] ' + ISNULL(u.LastName, '') + ' ' + ISNULL(u.FirstName,''), VisitDate = DATEADD(day, DATEDIFF(day, 0, t.CompletedOn), 0), CustomerIndicator = CASE tgiv.LossPrintedNew WHEN 2 then 0 ELSE tgiv.LossPrintedNew END, TaskOutcome = t.Outcome FROM dbo.Campaign cm JOIN dbo.TargetGroupItem tgi ON tgi.CampaignID = cm.ID JOIN dbo.TargetGroupItemValue tgiv ON tgi.ID = tgiv.TargetGroupItemID AND tgiv.CampaignAllocationPlanID = cm.SelectedAllocationPlanID JOIN dbo.[User] su ON tgiv.Supervisor = su.ID JOIN dbo.[Case] cs ON cs.ContextEntityID = tgiv.ID AND cs.ContextEntityType = 'tgiv' JOIN dbo.Task t ON cs.ID = t.CaseID JOIN dbo.TaskType tt ON t.TaskTypeID = tt.ID AND TT.ActivityType = 'H' AND tt.ID in (154,312,313) --154 ---TaskType = Επίσκεψη σε πελάτη select * from tasktype where id in(154,312,313) JOIN dbo.[User] u ON t.ActualOwnerID = u.id LEFT JOIN dbo.Contract ct ON tgiv.AltOfferID = ct.ID WHERE cm.ID = @CampaignId AND t.CompletedOn BETWEEN @startdate AND DATEADD(DAY,1,@EndDate) AND ISNULL(ct.State,0) not in (3,5,10) and ISNULL(ct.type,0) in (0,2,3,4) UNION --Neo Rantebou SELECT TgivId = tgiv.id, TaskID = t.id, CampaignID = cm.ID , CampaignDesc = '[' + cm.Code + '] ' + cm.NAME, SupervisorId = su.ID, SupervisorName = '[' + ISNULL(su.SalesCode,'') + '] ' + ISNULL(su.LastName, '') + ' ' + ISNULL(su.FirstName,''), SalesManId = U.ID, SalesManName = '[' + ISNULL(u.SalesCode,'') + '] ' + ISNULL(u.LastName, '') + ' ' + ISNULL(u.FirstName,''), VisitDate = DATEADD(day, DATEDIFF(day, 0, tl.Timestamp), 0), CustomerIndicator = CASE tgiv.LossPrintedNew WHEN 2 then 0 ELSE tgiv.LossPrintedNew END, TaskOutcome = tl.Outcome FROM dbo.Campaign cm JOIN dbo.TargetGroupItem tgi ON tgi.CampaignID = cm.ID JOIN dbo.TargetGroupItemValue tgiv ON tgi.ID = tgiv.TargetGroupItemID AND tgiv.CampaignAllocationPlanID = cm.SelectedAllocationPlanID JOIN dbo.[User] su ON tgiv.Supervisor = su.ID JOIN dbo.[Case] cs ON cs.ContextEntityID = tgiv.ID AND cs.ContextEntityType = 'tgiv' JOIN dbo.Task t ON cs.ID = t.CaseID JOIN dbo.TaskType tt ON t.TaskTypeID = tt.ID AND TT.ActivityType = 'H' AND tt.ID in (154,312,313) --154 ---TaskType = Επίσκεψη σε πελάτη JOIN dbo.[User] u ON t.ActualOwnerID = u.id JOIN dbo.TaskLog tl ON t.ID = tl.TaskID AND tl.Outcome = 'ΝΕΟΡ' WHERE cm.ID = @CampaignId AND tl.Timestamp BETWEEN @startdate AND DATEADD(DAY,1,@EndDate) ) , WorkingDays AS ( SELECT CampaignId = ISNULL( yd.CampaignID, cm.ID), CampaignDesc = ISNULL(yd.CampaignDesc , '[' + cm.Code + '] ' + cm.NAME), SupervisorId = ISNULL(yd.SupervisorId, su.ID) , SupervisorName=ISNULL(yd.SupervisorName, '[' + ISNULL(su.SalesCode,'') + '] ' + ISNULL(su.LastName, '') + ' ' + ISNULL(su.FirstName,'')), SalesManId = ISNULL(yd.SalesManId, u.ID), SalesmanName = ISNULL(yd.SalesManName, '[' + u.SalesCode + '] ' + u.LastName + ' ' + u.FirstName), WorkingDays = COUNT(DISTINCT DATEADD(day, DATEDIFF(day, 0, wdct.WorkingDate), 0)) FROM ITApps.wdc.WorkingDaysPerCampaign wdct JOIN dbo.Campaign cm ON cm.ID = wdct.CampaignId JOIN dbo.[User] u ON wdct.UserId = u.ID JOIN dbo.[User] su ON wdct.SupervisorId = su.ID FULL OUTER JOIN CustomerVisits yd ON wdct.CampaignId = yd.CampaignID AND wdct.UserId = yd.SalesManId AND wdct.SupervisorId = yd.SupervisorId AND wdct.WorkingDate = yd.VisitDate WHERE (cm.ID = @CampaignId OR cm.ID IS NULL) AND (wdct.WorkingDate BETWEEN @startdate AND DATEADD(DAY,1,@EndDate) OR wdct.WorkingDate IS NULL) GROUP BY ISNULL( yd.CampaignID, cm.ID), ISNULL(yd.CampaignDesc , '[' + cm.Code + '] ' + cm.NAME), ISNULL(yd.SupervisorId, su.ID), ISNULL(yd.SupervisorName, '[' + ISNULL(su.SalesCode,'') + '] ' + ISNULL(su.LastName, '') + ' ' + ISNULL(su.FirstName,'')), ISNULL(yd.SalesManId, u.ID), ISNULL(yd.SalesManName, '[' + u.SalesCode + '] ' + u.LastName + ' ' + u.FirstName) ) , GroupVisitData AS ( SELECT SupervisorId, SalesManID, CustomerIndicator, CountOfVisits = COUNT(*) FROM CustomerVisits GROUP BY SupervisorId, SalesManID, CustomerIndicator ) , GroupContractData AS --Apodoxh Protashs kai Ekptvwsh pou den anhkei se Apodoxh Protashs ( SELECT SalesManId , SupervisorId , CustomerIndicator , CountOfSales = COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT * from CustomerVisits cd WHERE TaskOutcome IN ('Αποδοχή με παρουσίαση μακέτας','Αποδοχή χωρίς παρουσίαση μακέτας','ΑΠΟΔΠ' , 'ΕΚΠΤ') --'Αποδοχή με παρουσίαση μακέτας','Αποδοχή χωρίς παρουσίαση μακέτας',ΠΡΟΣΦ,ΝΕΟΡ,ΑΡΝ,ΕΚΠΤ AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM CustomerVisits cv WHERE cv.TgivId = cd.tgivid AND cv.TaskOutcome = 'ΕΚΠΤ' AND cd.TaskOutcome in ('ΑΠΟΔΠ','Αποδοχή με παρουσίαση μακέτας','Αποδοχή χωρίς παρουσίαση μακέτας')) ) a GROUP BY SalesManId , SupervisorId , SalesmanId , CustomerIndicator ) --select * from tasktype where id in(154,312,313) select * from yps1902.dbo.tasktype where id in(154,312,313) , GroupPostponeData AS ( SELECT SupervisorId, SalesManID, CustomerIndicator, CountOfPostp = COUNT(*) FROM CustomerVisits WHERE TaskOutcome = 'ΝΕΟΡ' GROUP BY SupervisorId, SalesManID, CustomerIndicator ) , GroupLossesData AS ( SELECT SupervisorId, SalesManID, CustomerIndicator, CountOfLosses = COUNT(*) FROM CustomerVisits WHERE TaskOutcome = 'ΑΡΝ' GROUP BY SupervisorId, SalesManID, CustomerIndicator ) SELECT distinct A.SupervisorId, A.SupervisorName, A.SalesManID, A.SalesmanName, CustomerIndicator = CASE A.CustInd WHEN 0 THEN 'ΝΕΟΙ' ELSE 'ΠΡΟΤΥΠΩΜΕΝΟΙ' END, A.WorkingDays, SumOfVisits = ISNULL(CountOfVisits,0), SumOfSales = ISNULL(CountOfSales,0), SumOfPostp = ISNULL(CountOfPostp,0), SumOfLosses = ISNULL(CountOfLosses,0) into #tmp FROM (SELECT swd.supervisorid , swd.SalesManID , swd.SupervisorName , swd.SalesmanName , swd.WorkingDays , B.CustInd FROM WorkingDays swd CROSS JOIN (SELECT 0 CustInd UNION SELECT 1 CustInd) B ) A LEFT JOIN GroupVisitData gv ON A.SalesManID = gv.SalesManID AND gv.supervisorid = A.supervisorid AND A.CustInd = gv.CustomerIndicator LEFT JOIN GroupContractData gc ON A.SalesManID = gc.SalesManId AND A.CustInd = gc.CustomerIndicator AND A.supervisorid = gc.supervisorid LEFT JOIN GroupPostponeData gp ON A.SalesManID = gp.SalesManId AND A.CustInd = gp.CustomerIndicator AND A.supervisorid = gp.supervisorid LEFT JOIN GroupLossesData gl ON A.SalesManID = gl.SalesManId AND A.CustInd = gl.CustomerIndicator AND A.supervisorid = gl.supervisorid select * from #tmp WHERE SupervisorId IN (@UserIds) if object_id('tempdb..#tmp') is not null drop table #tmp

templates.name: Premise - Επισκεψιμότητα Ανά Καμπάνια - Users
templates.sql: IF SUBSTRING(@UserName, CHARINDEX('\', @UserName) + 1, 50) IN ( SELECT UserName FROM ITApps.dbo.PPR_SpecialUsers ) SELECT UserId = u.id, u.SalesCode, u.LastName, u.FirstName, u.UserName, u.IsUnitManager, u.IsActive, UnitDescription = un.Description, [1rstUnit] = [1ParentUnit].Description, [2ndUnit] = [2ParentUnit].Description, [3rdUnit] = [3ParentUnit].Description, [4rthUnit] = [4ParentUnit].Description, [5fthUnit] = [5ParentUnit].Description FROM dbo.[User] u JOIN dbo.Unit un ON u.UnitID = un.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.Unit [1parentunit] ON un.ParentID = [1ParentUnit].ID LEFT JOIN dbo.Unit [2parentunit] ON [1parentunit].ParentId = [2parentunit].id LEFT JOIN dbo.Unit [3parentunit] ON [2parentunit].ParentId = [3parentunit].id LEFT JOIN dbo.Unit [4parentunit] ON [3parentunit].ParentId = [4parentunit].id LEFT JOIN dbo.Unit [5parentunit] ON [4parentunit].ParentId = [5parentunit].id WHERE [5parentunit].ID = 56 OR [4parentunit].ID = 56 OR [3parentunit].ID = 56 OR [2parentunit].ID = 56 OR [1parentunit].ID = 56 OR [un].ID = 56 ELSE SELECT UserId = u.id, u.SalesCode, u.LastName, u.FirstName, u.UserName, u.IsUnitManager, u.IsActive, UnitDescription = un.Description, [1rstUnit] = [1ParentUnit].Description, [2ndUnit] = [2ParentUnit].Description, [3rdUnit] = [3ParentUnit].Description, [4rthUnit] = [4ParentUnit].Description, [5fthUnit] = [5ParentUnit].Description FROM dbo.[User] u JOIN dbo.Unit un ON u.UnitID = un.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.Unit [1parentunit] ON un.ParentID = [1ParentUnit].ID LEFT JOIN dbo.Unit [2parentunit] ON [1parentunit].ParentId = [2parentunit].id LEFT JOIN dbo.Unit [3parentunit] ON [2parentunit].ParentId = [3parentunit].id LEFT JOIN dbo.Unit [4parentunit] ON [3parentunit].ParentId = [4parentunit].id LEFT JOIN dbo.Unit [5parentunit] ON [4parentunit].ParentId = [5parentunit].id WHERE [5parentunit].ID IN (SELECT UnitID FROM [User] u WHERE u.UserName = SUBSTRING(@UserName, CHARINDEX('\', @UserName) + 1, 50)) OR [4parentunit].ID IN (SELECT UnitID FROM [User] u WHERE u.UserName = SUBSTRING(@UserName, CHARINDEX('\', @UserName) + 1, 50)) OR [3parentunit].ID IN (SELECT UnitID FROM [User] u WHERE u.UserName = SUBSTRING(@UserName, CHARINDEX('\', @UserName) + 1, 50)) OR [2parentunit].ID IN (SELECT UnitID FROM [User] u WHERE u.UserName = SUBSTRING(@UserName, CHARINDEX('\', @UserName) + 1, 50)) OR [1parentunit].ID IN (SELECT UnitID FROM [User] u WHERE u.UserName = SUBSTRING(@UserName, CHARINDEX('\', @UserName) + 1, 50)) OR [un].ID IN (SELECT UnitID FROM [User] u WHERE u.UserName = SUBSTRING(@UserName, CHARINDEX('\', @UserName) + 1, 50))

templates.name: Premise - Ημερήσια Δραστηριότητα Ανά Καμπάνια - Daily Activity DS
templates.sql: ;WITH ContractData AS ( SELECT CampaignID = cm.id, CampaignCode = cm.Code, CampaignDescription = cm.Name, SalesManId = ct.SalesManID, SupervisorId = tgiv.Supervisor, Supervisor = '[' + su.SalesCode + '] ' + su.LastName + ' ' + su.FirstName, Salesman = '[' + u.SalesCode + '] ' + u.LastName + ' ' + u.FirstName, CustomerIndicator = CASE LossPrintedNew WHEN 2 then 0 ELSE LossPrintedNew END, ContractId = ct.id, bp.ID BPId, ContractPrice = (SELECT CAST(SUM( CASE WHEN cp.[STATE] in (3,4) AND cp.AlteredAmount IS NOT NULL THEN cp.AlteredAmount ELSE (cp.Price - cp.Discount - cp.RulesDiscount) END ) AS money) FROM dbo.ContractProduct cp JOIN dbo.Contract ct1 ON cp.RelatedContractID = ct1.id WHERE cp.RelatedContractID = ct.id AND cp.State <> 3) FROM dbo.Campaign cm JOIN dbo.TargetGroupItem tgi ON cm.ID = tgi.CampaignID JOIN dbo.TargetGroupItemValue tgiv ON tgi.ID = tgiv.TargetGroupItemID JOIN dbo.[Case] c ON c.ContextEntityID = tgiv.ID AND c.ContextEntityType = 'TGIV' JOIN dbo.Task t ON c.ID = t.CaseID JOIN dbo.TaskType tt ON t.TaskTypeID = tt.ID AND TT.ActivityType = 'H' AND tt.ID IN (154,312,313,300,309,311) ---TaskType = Επίσκεψη σε πελάτη, νέο ραντεβού --,Απάντηση Αιτήματος Έκπτωσης added on 20130724 --JOIN dbo.[User] u ON t.ActualOwnerID = u.ID JOIN dbo.Contract ct ON tgiv.AltOfferID = ct.ID and ct.State not in (3,5,10) and ct.type in (0,3,2,4) ---Not cancelled JOIN dbo.[User] u ON ct.SalesManID = u.ID JOIN dbo.BusinessPoint bp ON tgi.BusinessPointID = bp.ID JOIN dbo.[User] su ON tgiv.Supervisor = su.ID WHERE ISNULL(t.Outcome, 'ΑΠΟΔΠ') IN ( 'ΑΠΟΔΠ','Αποδοχή με παρουσίαση μακέτας','Αποδοχή χωρίς παρουσίαση μακέτας','ΑΕΚΠΤ')--ΑΕΚΠΤ added on 20130724 AND cm.ID = @CampaignID --AND ct.CreatedOn BETWEEN @StartDate AND DATEADD(DAY,1, @EndDate) AND ct.SignedDate BETWEEN @StartDate AND DATEADD(DAY,1, @EndDate) --DEV3848 GROUP BY cm.id , cm.Code , cm.Name , su.SalesCode , su.LastName , su.FirstName , u.SalesCode , u.LastName , u.FirstName , (CASE LossPrintedNew WHEN 2 THEN 0 ELSE LossPrintedNew END) , ct.id , bp.id , ct.SalesManID , tgiv.Supervisor ) , PreprintedFilteredData AS ( SELECT SupervisorId = tgiv.Supervisor, tgiv.HandlerUserID, tgiv.LossPrintedNew, SumPreprintedValue = SUM(tgiv.TargetValue) FROM dbo.TargetGroupItemValue tgiv JOIN dbo.TargetGroupItem tgi ON tgiv.TargetGroupItemID = tgi.ID ---only selected allocation plan JOIN dbo.Campaign cm ON cm.ID = tgi.CampaignID AND tgiv.CampaignAllocationPlanID = cm.SelectedAllocationPlanID WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM ContractData fcd WHERE tgi.businesspointid = fcd.bpid AND tgi.CampaignID = fcd.campaignid AND CASE tgiv.LossPrintedNew WHEN 2 then 0 ELSE tgiv.LossPrintedNew END = fcd.CustomerIndicator ) AND tgiv.LossPrintedNew = 1 ---mono protupwmenoi GROUP BY tgiv.Supervisor, tgiv.HandlerUserID, tgiv.LossPrintedNew ) , ReportData AS ( SELECT CampaignDesc = '[' + CampaignCode + '] ' + CampaignDescription, Supervisor, SupervisorId, Salesman, SalesManId, CustomerIndicator = CASE CustomerIndicator WHEN 0 THEN 'ΝΕΟΙ' ELSE 'ΠΡΟΤΥΠΩΜΕΝΟΙ' END , CountOfContracts = COUNT(DISTINCT ContractId), SumOfContractPrice = SUM(ContractPrice), SumPreprintedValue = ----edw einai olh thn protupwmenh tou pelath pou exei anatethei ston pwlhth kai oxi tou sugkekrimenou case ISNULL(( SELECT SumPreprintedValue FROM PreprintedFilteredData pfd WHERE pfd.HandlerUserID = cd.SalesmanId AND pfd.SupervisorId = cd.SupervisorId AND pfd.LossPrintedNew = cd.CustomerIndicator ), 0) FROM ContractData cd GROUP BY CampaignId, CampaignCode, CampaignDescription, Supervisor, SupervisorId, Salesman, CustomerIndicator, SalesManId, cd.SupervisorId ) SELECT rd.CampaignDesc, rd.Supervisor, rd.SupervisorId, rd.Salesman, CustomerIndicator, CountOfContracts, SumOfContractPrice, SumPreprintedValue, Raised = CASE WHEN SumOfContractPrice - SumPreprintedValue > 0 THEN SumOfContractPrice - SumPreprintedValue ELSE 0 END, Reduced = CASE WHEN SumOfContractPrice - SumPreprintedValue < 0 THEN ABS(SumOfContractPrice - SumPreprintedValue) ELSE 0 END INTO #tmp FROM ReportData RD SELECT CampaignDesc, Supervisor, Salesman, CustomerIndicator, CountOfContracts, SumOfContractPrice, SumPreprintedValue, Raised , Reduced FROM #tmp WHERE SupervisorId IN (@UserIds) IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#tmp') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #tmp

templates.sql: ;with products as (SELECT DISTINCT code ProductCode, pt.id TypeID, pt.Description TypeDescription , CASE WHEN pt.ID IN (35,36,73,74) THEN 'PROFILE' WHEN pt.ID IN (38,39,70,71) THEN 'BANNER' WHEN pt.ID IN (40,75,76,85,86,87,88) THEN 'SPONSOR' ELSE 'GENERIC' END as [Type] FROM yps.dbo.Product pr JOIN yps.dbo.ProductType pt ON pt.ID = pr.ProductTypeID WHERE pr.MediumVersionID = 36 ), sourcedata as ( SELECT [AdId] = UniqID , [BranchCode] = CustomerCode , [Contracts] = ContractIDs, [Category] = CAST(CategoryID as NVARCHAR(255)) + ' - ' + CategoryGr, [Name] = NameGr , [Address]= ISNULL(AddressGr + ', ', '') + ISNULL(Address2Gr + ', ', '') + ISNULL('T.K. ' + ZipCode, '') , [Municipality]= MunicipalityGr , [Prefecture]= PrefectureGr , [Rank]=isnull([rank],0), [StartDate] = PaidListingStartDate , [Udacs]= ContractUdacs , [BillingScore] = ContractBilling, [Type]= ltrim(rtrim(case when len(isnull(ContractUdacs,'')) = 0 then 'FREE' else '' end + isnull(' ' + p.[Type] , ''))) from xoupdate.XoListing l cross apply dbo.SplitString(',',ContractUdacs) a left join products p on p.ProductCode = ltrim(rtrim(a.s)) where ( (CategoryID = @categoryid AND CustomerCode = @customercode ) OR (@categoryid is null AND CustomerCode = @customercode ) OR (CategoryID = @categoryid AND @customercode is null) ) AND AdType <> 0 ) SELECT distinct [AdId], [BranchCode], [Contracts], [Category], [Name], [Address], [Municipality], [Prefecture], [Rank], [StartDate], [Udacs], [BillingScore], [Type] = LTRIM( REPLACE( (SELECT DISTINCT ' ' + din.Type FROM sourcedata din WHERE din.AdId = d.adid FOR XML PATH('')) ,'GENERIC', '') ) from sourcedata d group by [AdId], [BranchCode], [Contracts], [Category], [Name], [Address], [Municipality], [Prefecture], [Rank], [StartDate], [Udacs], [BillingScore] order by [AdId]

templates.name: Report Παρασκευής - Contracts Campaigns - Online Contracts Specific Campaigns Data Set
templates.sql: --DECLARE @CampaignID INT, @DateFrom DATETIME, @DateTo DATETIME, @DateType BIT, @User1 NVARCHAR(30); --SET @DateType =1; --SET @CampaignID =60; --SET @DateFrom ='2013-07-01'; --SET @DateTo ='2015-07-16'; --SET @User1 =''; ----SELECT * FROM dbo.Campaign --if object_id('tempdb..#tmp') is not null --drop table #tmp SELECT vw.[Καμπάνια] ,vw.[Κωδ. Πελάτη] ,vw.[Επωνυμία] ,vw.[Κωδ. Συμβολαίου] ,vw.[Αξία] ,vw.[Εκπτωση Τρόπου πληρωμής] , CASE WHEN vw.[ΜεταβεβλημένηΑξία] <> vw.[Αξία] THEN vw.[ΜεταβεβλημένηΑξία] ELSE NULL END [ΜεταβεβλημένηΑξία] ,vw.[Περιέχει Συνδρομητική Προβολή] ,vw.[Περιέχει Προβολή Προς Ανανέωση] ,vw.[Πωλητής] ,vw.[Ημ. Υπογραφής] ,vw.[Ημ. Δημιουργίας] ,vw.[State ( Συμβολαίου )] ,tgiv.id tgivID , tgiv.LossPrintedNew INTO #tmp FROM ITApps.[dbo].[vwContractsPerCampaign] vw JOIN yps.dbo.TargetGroupItemValue tgiv ON ISNULL(tgiv.ContractID,tgiv.AltOfferID) = vw.[Κωδ. Συμβολαίου] LEFT JOIN yps.dbo.[User] u ON tgiv.Supervisor = u.id WHERE vw.CampaignID in ( @CampaignID) AND u.id in (@User1) AND ( (@DateType=0 and [Ημ. Υπογραφής] BETWEEN isnull(@DateFrom,'2005-01-01') AND isnull(@DateTo,'2099-01-01')) or (@DateType=1 and cast([Ημ. Δημιουργίας] as DATE) BETWEEN isnull(@DateFrom,'2005-01-01') AND isnull(@DateTo,'2099-01-01')) ) --AND ('HEADQUARTERS\'+ +u.UserName in( @User) if object_id('tempdb..#contractTasks') is not null drop table #contractTasks SELECT tmp.[Κωδ. Συμβολαίου],t.id taskID,isnull('['+CAST(t.id AS nvarchar(15))+'] '+t.Description,'-') tDescription INTO #contractTasks FROM #tmp tmp JOIN YPS.dbo.[Case] mc ON mc.ContextEntityID = tmp.tgivID AND mc.ContextEntityType = 'TGIV' JOIN YPS.dbo.[case] c ON mc.ID = c.MasterCaseID JOIN YPS.dbo.Task t ON c.ID = t.CaseID JOIN YPS.dbo.TaskType tt ON t.TaskTypeID = tt.ID AND tt.ActivityType = 'H' WHERE t.Status = 0 AND c.state = 0 ORDER BY t.id desc if object_id('tempdb..#contractproducts') is not null drop table #contractproducts if object_id('tempdb..#tmpPr') is not null drop table #tmpPr SELECT cp.RelatedContractID ctid,pr.code prcode into #tmpPr FROM #tmp tmp JOIN YPS.dbo.ContractProduct cp on tmp.[Κωδ. Συμβολαίου]=cp.RelatedContractID join yps.dbo.Advertisement adv on adv.ContractProductID=cp.ID join yps.dbo.Product pr on pr.ID=adv.ProductID where pr.IsComposite=0 SELECT p1.ctid, ( SELECT p2.prcode + ',' FROM #tmpPr p2 WHERE p2.ctid = p1.ctid ORDER BY p2.prcode FOR XML PATH('') ) AS Products into #contractproducts FROM #tmpPr p1 GROUP BY ctid if object_id('tempdb..#tmpm') is not null drop table #tmpm select distinct '[' + mv.Code + ']-'+m.name as medium ,t.[Κωδ. Συμβολαίου] into #tmpm from #tmp t join yps.dbo.Contract ct on t.[Κωδ. Συμβολαίου] = ct.ID join yps.dbo.ContractProduct cp on cp.RelatedContractID = ct.ID join yps.dbo.Advertisement adv on cp.ID = adv.ContractProductID join yps.dbo.Product pr on adv.ProductID = pr.id join yps.dbo.VersionSection vs on adv.VersionSectionID = vs.ID join yps.dbo.MediumVersion mv on mv.ID = vs.MediumVersionID join yps.dbo.Medium m on m.ID = mv.MediumID where pr.IsComposite = 0 if object_id('tempdb..#medium') is not null drop table #medium select t1.[Κωδ. Συμβολαίου] , ( SELECT t2.medium + ',' FROM #tmpm t2 WHERE t2.[Κωδ. Συμβολαίου] = t1.[Κωδ. Συμβολαίου] ORDER BY t2.medium FOR XML PATH('') ) AS Mediums into #medium from #tmpm t1 group by [Κωδ. Συμβολαίου] SELECT Καμπάνια , case LossPrintedNew when 0 then 'Νέος' when 1 then 'Προτυπωμένος' when 2 then 'Απώλεια' end [Κατηγορία Πελάτη], [Κωδ. Πελάτη] , Επωνυμία , [Κωδ. Συμβολαίου] , Αξία , [Εκπτωση Τρόπου πληρωμής] , ΜεταβεβλημένηΑξία , [Περιέχει Συνδρομητική Προβολή] , [Περιέχει Προβολή Προς Ανανέωση] , Πωλητής , [Ημ. Υπογραφής] , [Ημ. Δημιουργίας] , [State ( Συμβολαίου )] , isnull((SELECT TOP 1 tDescription FROM #contractTasks c WHERE c.[Κωδ. Συμβολαίου] = t.[Κωδ. Συμβολαίου] ORDER BY taskID desc),'-') tDescription, [Προϊόντα Συμβολαίου]=(select SUBSTRING(pr.Products,1,LEN(pr.products)-1) from #contractproducts pr where pr.ctid=t.[Κωδ. Συμβολαίου]), [Μέσο]=(select SUBSTRING(m.Mediums,1,LEN(m.Mediums)-1) from #medium m where m.[Κωδ. Συμβολαίου]=t.[Κωδ. Συμβολαίου]) , [Τρόπος Πληρωμής]=tt.Description, [Activity] = cln.Name, [Πόλη] = a.GeoModelLocText FROM #tmp t join yps.dbo.BusinessPoint bp on t.[Κωδ. Πελάτη] = bp.code JOIN yps.dbo.Classification cl ON bp.ID = cl.BusinessPointID JOIN yps.dbo.ClassifierNode cln ON cl.ClassifierNodeID = cln.ID join yps.dbo.Address a on bp.LocationAddressID = a.id left join yps.dbo.InvoicePaymentMethod pm on pm.id=t.[Κωδ. Συμβολαίου] left join yps.dbo.PaymentMethodType tt on tt.id=pm.PaymentMethodTypeID where cl.ClassifierID = 3

templates.sql: SELECT [t99].BusinessPointCode AS [Κωδ. Επιχ. Σημείου], [t99].[ID] AS [Συμβόλαιο] , CONVERT(VARCHAR,[t99].[value],103) AS [Ημ. Υπογ. Συμβολαίου] , CONVERT(VARCHAR, [t99].[value2], 103) AS [Ημ. Δημ. Σμβολαίου] , [t99].[value3] AS [Ποσό Συμβολαίου] , [t99].[value4] AS [Τελικό Ποσό Συμβολαίου] , [t99].[value5] AS [Ποσό Internet] , [t99].[value6] AS [Ποσό Print] , [t99].[value7] AS [Bundle] , CONVERT(VARCHAR,[t99].[value8],103) AS [Ημ. Έναρξης Προβολής] , [t99].[value9] AS [Έκδοση] , [t99].[value10] AS [Μέσο] , [t99].[value11] AS [Καμπάνια] FROM ( SELECT [t4].[ID] , [t4].BusinessPointCode, ( SELECT [t10].[SignedDate] FROM ( SELECT TOP ( 1 ) [t5].[RelatedContractID] FROM [ContractProduct] AS [t5] LEFT OUTER JOIN [Contract] AS [t6] ON [t6].[ID] = [t5].[RelatedContractID] and [t6].type in (0,2,3,4) INNER JOIN [Product] AS [t7] ON [t7].[ID] = [t5].[ProductID] CROSS JOIN [Advertisement] AS [t8] WHERE ( [t4].[ID] = [t6].[ID] ) AND ( [t4].[ProductID] = [t5].[ProductID] ) AND ( [t6].[SignedDate] IS NOT NULL ) AND ( [t6].[SignedDate] BETWEEN @p0 AND @p1) --AND ( [t6].[SignedDate] < ) AND ( [t7].[IsComposite] = 1 ) AND ( [t6].[State] = @p2 ) AND ( [t8].[ContractProductID] = [t5].[ID] ) ) AS [t9] LEFT OUTER JOIN [Contract] AS [t10] ON [t10].[ID] = [t9].[RelatedContractID] and [t10].type in (0,2,3,4) ) AS [value] , ( SELECT [t16].[CreatedOn] FROM ( SELECT TOP ( 1 ) [t11].[RelatedContractID] FROM [ContractProduct] AS [t11] LEFT OUTER JOIN [Contract] AS [t12] ON [t12].[ID] = [t11].[RelatedContractID] and [t12].type in (0,2,3,4) INNER JOIN [Product] AS [t13] ON [t13].[ID] = [t11].[ProductID] CROSS JOIN [Advertisement] AS [t14] WHERE ( [t4].[ID] = [t12].[ID] ) AND ( [t4].[ProductID] = [t11].[ProductID] ) AND ( [t12].[SignedDate] IS NOT NULL ) AND ( [t12].[SignedDate] BETWEEN @p0 AND @p1) -- AND ( [t12].[SignedDate] < ) AND ( [t13].[IsComposite] = 1 ) AND ( [t12].[State] = @p2 ) AND ( [t14].[ContractProductID] = [t11].[ID] ) ) AS [t15] LEFT OUTER JOIN [Contract] AS [t16] ON [t16].[ID] = [t15].[RelatedContractID] and [t16].type in (0,2,3,4) ) AS [value2] , ( SELECT SUM([t23].[Price]) FROM ( SELECT TOP ( 1 ) [t17].[RelatedContractID] FROM [ContractProduct] AS [t17] LEFT OUTER JOIN [Contract] AS [t18] ON [t18].[ID] = [t17].[RelatedContractID] and [t18].type in (0,2,3,4) INNER JOIN [Product] AS [t19] ON [t19].[ID] = [t17].[ProductID] CROSS JOIN [Advertisement] AS [t20] WHERE ( [t4].[ID] = [t18].[ID] ) AND ( [t4].[ProductID] = [t17].[ProductID] ) AND ( [t18].[SignedDate] IS NOT NULL ) AND ( [t18].[SignedDate] BETWEEN @p0 AND @p1) --AND ( [t18].[SignedDate] < @p1 ) AND ( [t19].[IsComposite] = 1 ) AND ( [t18].[State] = @p2 ) AND ( [t20].[ContractProductID] = [t17].[ID] ) ) AS [t21] LEFT OUTER JOIN [Contract] AS [t22] ON [t22].[ID] = [t21].[RelatedContractID] and [t22].type in (0,2,3,4) CROSS JOIN [ContractProduct] AS [t23] WHERE [t23].[RelatedContractID] = [t22].[ID] ) AS [value3] , ( SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN [t30].state IN (3,4) AND [t30].AlteredAmount IS NOT NULL THEN [t30].AlteredAmount else [t30].Price - [t30].Discount - [t30].RulesDiscount end) FROM ( SELECT TOP ( 1 ) [t24].[RelatedContractID] FROM [ContractProduct] AS [t24] LEFT OUTER JOIN [Contract] AS [t25] ON [t25].[ID] = [t24].[RelatedContractID] INNER JOIN [Product] AS [t26] ON [t26].[ID] = [t24].[ProductID] CROSS JOIN [Advertisement] AS [t27] WHERE ( [t4].[ID] = [t25].[ID] ) AND ( [t4].[ProductID] = [t24].[ProductID] ) AND ( [t25].[SignedDate] IS NOT NULL ) AND ( [t25].[SignedDate] BETWEEN @p0 AND @p1) -- AND ( [t25].[SignedDate] < ) AND ( [t26].[IsComposite] = 1 ) AND ( [t35].[MediumVersionID] INNER JOIN [Medium] AS [t37] ON [t37].[ID] = [t36].[MediumID] WHERE ( [t37].[MediumTypeID] = @p3 ) AND ( [t4].[ID] = [t32].[ID] ) AND ( [t4].[ProductID] = [t31].[ProductID] ) [t41].RulesDiscount end) FROM [ContractProduct] AS [t38] LEFT OUTER JOIN [Contract] AS [t39] ON [t39].[ID] = [t38].[RelatedContractID] and [t39].type in (0,2,3,4) INNER JOIN [Product] AS [t40] ON [t40].[ID] = [t38].[ProductID] CROSS JOIN [Advertisement] AS [t41] INNER JOIN [VersionSection] AS [t42] ON [t42].[ID] = [t41].[VersionSectionID] INNER JOIN [MediumVersion] AS [t43] ON [t43].[ID] = [t42].[MediumVersionID] INNER JOIN [Medium] AS [t44] ON [t44].[ID] = [t43].[MediumID] WHERE ( [t44].[MediumTypeID] = @p4 ) AND ( [t4].[ID] = [t39].[ID] ) AND ( [t4].[ProductID] = [t38].[ProductID] ) SELECT TOP ( 1 ) [t51].[ProductID] FROM [ContractProduct] AS [t51] LEFT OUTER JOIN [Contract] AS [t52] ON [t52].[ID] = [t51].[RelatedContractID] and [t52].type in (0,2,3,4) INNER JOIN [Product] AS [t53] ON [t53].[ID] = [t51].[ProductID] CROSS JOIN [Advertisement] AS [t54] WHERE ( [t4].[ID] = [t52].[ID] ) AND ( [t4].[ProductID] = [t51].[ProductID] ) AND ( [t52].[SignedDate] IS NOT NULL ) AND ( [t52].[SignedDate] BETWEEN @p0 AND @p1) -- AND ( [t52].[SignedDate] < ) AND ( [t53].[IsComposite] = 1 ) AND ( [t52].[State] = @p2 ) AND ( [t54].[ContractProductID] = [t51].[ID] ) ) AS [t55] INNER JOIN [Product] AS [t56] ON [t56].[ID] = [t55].[ProductID] ) ) AS [value7] , ( SELECT [t61].[AdvBeginDate] FROM ( SELECT TOP ( 1 ) [t60].[AdvBeginDate] FROM [ContractProduct] AS [t57] LEFT OUTER JOIN [Contract] AS [t58] ON [t58].[ID] = [t57].[RelatedContractID] and [t58].type in (0,2,3,4) INNER JOIN [Product] AS [t59] ON [t59].[ID] = [t57].[ProductID] CROSS JOIN [Advertisement] AS [t60] WHERE ( [t60].[ProductID] = [t4].[ProductID] ) AND ( [t60].[ProductKitID] IS NULL ) AND ( [t4].[ID] = [t58].[ID] ) AND ( [t4].[ProductID] = [t57].[ProductID] ) AND ( [t58].[SignedDate] IS NOT NULL ) AND ( [value8] , ( ( /*@p6 +*/ ( ( SELECT [t68].[Code] FROM ( SELECT TOP ( 1 ) [t62].[VersionSectionID] FROM [ContractProduct] AS [t62] LEFT OUTER JOIN [Contract] AS [t63] ON [t63].[ID] = [t62].[RelatedContractID] and [t63].type in (0,2,3,4) INNER JOIN [Product] AS [t64] ON [t64].[ID] = [t62].[ProductID] CROSS JOIN [Advertisement] AS [t65] WHERE ( [t4].[ID] = [t63].[ID] ) AND ( [t4].[ProductID] = [t62].[ProductID] ) AND ( [t63].[SignedDate] IS NOT NULL ) AND ( [t63].[SignedDate] BETWEEN @p0 and @p1) -- AND ( [t63].[SignedDate] < ) AND ( [t64].[IsComposite] = 1 ) AND ( [t63].[State] = @p2 ) AND ( [t65].[ContractProductID] = [t62].[ID] ) ) AS [t66] INNER JOIN [VersionSection] AS [t67] ON [t67].[ID] = [t66].[VersionSectionID] INNER JOIN [MediumVersion] AS [t68] ON [t68].[ID] = [t67].[MediumVersionID] ) ) ) /*+ @p7*/ ) -- + ( ( -- SELECT [t75].[Name] -- FROM ( SELECT TOP ( 1 ) -- [t69].[VersionSectionID] -- FROM [ContractProduct] AS [t69] -- LEFT OUTER JOIN [Contract] AS [t70] ON [t70].[ID] = [t69].[RelatedContractID] -- INNER JOIN [Product] AS [t71] ON [t71].[ID] = [t69].[ProductID] -- CROSS JOIN [Advertisement] AS [t72] -- WHERE ( [t4].[ID] = [t70].[ID] ) -- AND ( [t4].[ProductID] = [t69].[ProductID] ) -- AND ( [t70].[SignedDate] IS NOT NULL ) -- AND ( [t70].[SignedDate] > @p0 ) -- AND ( [t70].[SignedDate] < @p1 ) -- AND ( [t71].[IsComposite] = 1 ) -- AND ( [t70].[State] = @p2 ) -- AND ( [t72].[ContractProductID] = [t69].[ID] ) -- ) AS [t73] -- INNER JOIN [VersionSection] AS [t74] ON [t74].[ID] = FROM [ContractProduct] AS [t76] LEFT OUTER JOIN [Contract] AS [t77] ON [t77].[ID] = [t76].[RelatedContractID] and [t77].type in (0,2,3,4) INNER JOIN [Product] AS [t78] ON [t78].[ID] = AS [t81] ON [t81].[ID] = [t80].[VersionSectionID] INNER JOIN [MediumVersion] AS [t82] ON [t82].[ID] = [t81].[MediumVersionID] INNER JOIN [Medium] AS [t83] ON [t83].[ID] = [t82].[MediumID] ) AS [value10] , ( SELECT '[' + [t98].code + '] ' + [t98].[Name] FROM ( SELECT TOP ( 1 ) [t90].[TargetGroupItemID] FROM ( SELECT TOP ( 1 ) [t84].[RelatedContractID] FROM [ContractProduct] AS [t84] LEFT OUTER JOIN [Contract] AS [t85] ON [t85].[ID] = [t84].[RelatedContractID] and [t85].type in (0,2,3,4) INNER JOIN [Product] AS [t86] ON [t86].[ID] = [t84].[ProductID] CROSS JOIN [Advertisement] AS [t87] WHERE ( [t4].[ID] = [t85].[ID] ) AND ( [t4].[ProductID] = [t84].[ProductID] ) AND ( [t85].[SignedDate] IS NOT NULL ) AND ( [t85].[SignedDate] BETWEEN @p0 AND @p1) --AND ( [t85].[SignedDate] < ) AND ( [t86].[IsComposite] = 1 ) AND ( [t85].[State] = @p2 ) AND ( [t87].[ContractProductID] = [t84].[ID] ) ) AS [t88] LEFT OUTER JOIN [Contract] AS [t89] ON [t89].[ID] = [t88].[RelatedContractID] and [ContractProduct] AS [t91] LEFT OUTER JOIN [Contract] AS [t92] ON [t92].[ID] = [t91].[RelatedContractID] and [t92].type in (0,2,3,4) INNER JOIN [Product] AS [t93] ON [t93].[ID] = [t91].[ProductID] CROSS JOIN [Advertisement] AS [t94] WHERE ( [t4].[ID] = [t92].[ID] ) AND ( [t4].[ProductID] = [t91].[ProductID] ) AND ( [t92].[SignedDate] IS NOT NULL ) AND ( [t92].[SignedDate] BETWEEN @p0 AND @p1) -- AND ( [t92].[SignedDate] < ) AND ( [t93].[IsComposite] = 1 ) AND ( [t92].[State] = @p2 ) AND ( [t94].[ContractProductID] = [t91].[ID] ) ) AS [t95] ) ) ) AND ( [t90].[ContractID] = [t89].[ID] ) ) AS templates.name: Report Συμβολαίων - Online Contracts Sign Date - Online Contracts Sign Date Data Set
templates.sql: SELECT [Κωδ. Πελάτη], [Επωνυμία], [Κωδ. Συμβολαίου], [Αξία], [Συνδρομητικό], [Πωλητής], [Ημ. Υπογραφής], [Ημ. Δημιουργίας], [State ( Συμβολαίου )] FROM dbo.vwYpsOnlineContracts WHERE [Ημ. Υπογραφής] > '2012-01-01 00:00:00.000'

templates.name: Website Contracts With Addons - Main Data Set

joins.right: u.ID /* join UdacPart up on up.UdacID = u.ID and up.IsAddon = 1 --join UdacPartDefinition upd on up.UdacPartDefinitionID = upd.ID join ContractProduct cp on a.ContractProductID = cp.ID join dbo.ContentAttributeValue cav on cp.ID = cav.ContractProductID and a.ID = cav.AdvertisementID join ProductPart pp on pp.ID = cav.ProductPartID and pp.IsAddon = 1 join ProductPartDefinition ppd on ppd.ID = pp.ProductPartDefinitionID join UdacPartDefinition upd on upd.id = ppd.UdacPartDefinitionID join Contract cn on cp.RelatedContractID = cn.ID join Campaign cm on cn.CampaignID = cm.ID join user usr on cn.SalesManID = usr.ID join BusinessPoint bp on cp.BusinessPointID = bp.ID where u.code in (@Udacs) and a.AdvBeginDate <= GETDATE() and a.AdvEndDate >= GETDATE() */

templates.sql: SELECT DISTINCT bp.Code AS BpCode, cn.ID AS ContractId, cm.Description AS Campaign, usr.LastName + ' ' + usr.FirstName AS Salesman, u.Code AS Udac, upd.Code AS UdacPart, cp.Quantity, a.ID AS AdId, CAST(a.AdvBeginDate AS DATE) AS AdvBeginDate, CAST(a.AdvEndDate AS DATE) AS AdvEndDate FROM Advertisement AS a JOIN Product AS p ON a.ProductID = p.id JOIN Udac AS u ON p.UdacID = u.ID /* join UdacPart up on up.UdacID = u.ID and up.IsAddon = 1 --join UdacPartDefinition upd on up.UdacPartDefinitionID = upd.ID join ContractProduct cp on a.ContractProductID = cp.ID join dbo.ContentAttributeValue cav on cp.ID = cav.ContractProductID and a.ID = cav.AdvertisementID join ProductPart pp on pp.ID = cav.ProductPartID and pp.IsAddon = 1 join ProductPartDefinition ppd on ppd.ID = pp.ProductPartDefinitionID join UdacPartDefinition upd on upd.id = ppd.UdacPartDefinitionID join Contract cn on cp.RelatedContractID = cn.ID join Campaign cm on cn.CampaignID = cm.ID join [user] usr on cn.SalesManID = usr.ID join BusinessPoint bp on cp.BusinessPointID = bp.ID where u.code in (@Udacs) and a.AdvBeginDate <= GETDATE() and a.AdvEndDate >= GETDATE() */

templates.name: Website Contracts With Addons - Udacs
templates.sql: SELECT DISTINCT Code FROM Udac WHERE Code IN ( 'WST_EMAIL_PACKAGES', 'WST_BASIC_ADD_ON', 'WST_MONO_PROD_ADD_ON', 'WST_BASIC_ADV_ADD_ON', 'WST_PR_CAT_ADD_ON', 'WST_ESHOP_ADD_ON', 'WST_S_ESHOP_ADD_ON' )

templates.name: YPSOnline - Κρατήσεις Προϊόντων - Main Dataset
templates.sql: IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#user') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #user; SELECT u.[UserName], u.[UnitID], un.[ParentID] as 'ParentUnitID', (u.[LastName] + ' ' + u.[FirstName]) as 'FullName' INTO #user FROM [CARDINAL11].[YPS].[dbo].[User] u JOIN [CARDINAL11].[YPS].[dbo].[Unit] un ON un.ID = u.UnitID where u.[isActive] = 1 IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#manager') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #manager; SELECT u.[UserName], u.[UnitID], (u.[LastName] + ' ' + u.[FirstName]) as 'FullName' INTO #manager FROM [CARDINAL11].[YPS].[dbo].[User] u JOIN [CARDINAL11].[YPS].[dbo].[UserRole] ur ON u.ID = ur.UserID WHERE u.[isUnitManager] = 1 and ur.[RoleID] IN (41,42) and u.UnitID <> 56 IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#managerleveluser') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #managerleveluser; SELECT m.UserName as 'manager', u.UserName as 'salesman', u.UnitID as 'UnitID', m.FullName as 'ManagerFullName', u.FullName as 'SalesmanFullName' INTO #managerleveluser FROM #manager m JOIN #user u on m.UnitID = u.UnitID AND m.UserName <> u.UserName ;with UnderManagerUser as( SELECT UserName as 'manager', UserName as 'salesman', UnitID as 'UnitID', FullName as 'ManagerFullName', FullName as 'SalesmanFullName' FROM #manager UNION ALL SELECT umu.manager, u.UserName, u.UnitID, umu.ManagerFullName, u.FullName as 'SalesmanFullName' FROM #user u JOIN UnderManagerUser umu ON u.ParentUnitID = umu.UnitID ) , UserManager as( SELECT * FROM UnderManagerUser UNION ALL SELECT * FROM #managerleveluser ) SELECT [Product] = case SlotCategoryId when 11 then 'Banner' else 'Sponsor' end ,[AreaManager] = um.ManagerFullName ,[Salesman] = um.SalesmanFullName ,[TotalBookings] = Count(*) FROM [XODB].ypsonline.AdvSlotStatus s join [XODB].ypsonline.AdvSlot ss on s.SlotId = ss.Id join [XODB].ypsonline.Enumerations en on en.id = ss.ProductCategoryId left join UserManager um on um.salesman = case LEFT(s.[Salesman], CHARINDEX('@', s.[Salesman]) - 1) when 'amatzorou' then 'amantzorou' else LEFT(s.[Salesman], CHARINDEX('@', s.[Salesman]) - 1) END where statusid = 13 and case SlotCategoryId when 11 then 'Banner' else 'Sponsor' end IN (@pProductType) and EndDate > case @pActive when 'true' then GETDATE() else '1753-01-01' END group by case SlotCategoryId when 11 then 'Banner' else 'Sponsor' end, um.ManagerFullName, um.SalesmanFullName

templates.name: YPSOnline - Κρατήσεις Προϊόντων - Product Type
templates.sql: SELECT Id, Name FROM XODB.ypsonline.Enumerations WHERE [Type] = 'SlotCategory'

templates.name: YPSOnline - Ραντεβού - Main Dataset
templates.sql: --declare @psalesman nvarchar(50), --@pDatefrom datetime, --@pDateto datetime; --set @psalesman = '2306' --set @pDatefrom = '20211117' --set @pDateto = '20211118' IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#final') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #final; select isnull(man.LastName + ' ' + man.FirstName,'') as Manager ,isnull(sup.LastName + ' ' + sup.FirstName,'') as Supervisor ,isnull(sd.LastName + ' ' + sd.FirstName,'') as Salesman ,app.BusinessPointCodePhone ,app.BusinessPointName ,isnull(app.MainActivity,'') as MainActivity ,cast(app.AppointmentDate as date) as AppointmentDate ,typ.AliasName as [Type] ,src.AliasName as [Source] ,isnull(STUFF((SELECT ', ' + CAST(prop.AliasName AS VARCHAR(20)) [text()] FROM [avocet\avocet].XODB.ypsonline.AppointmentProposalType apt join [avocet\avocet].XODB.ypsonline.Enumerations prop on prop.id = apt.ProposalTypeId WHERE apt.AppointmentId = app.ID FOR XML PATH(''), TYPE) .value('.','NVARCHAR(MAX)'),1,2,''),'') as Proposal ,stat.AliasName as [Status] ,app.[Contract] ,(select --sum(ct.finalPrice) as finalPrice SUM(CASE WHEN cp.STATE IN (3,4) THEN cp.AlteredAmount ELSE cp.Price - cp.Discount -cp.RulesDiscount END) as finalPrice from [avocet\avocet].XODB.ypsonline.Appointment appp cross apply fn_SplitString(appp.Contract,';') fn join Yps.dbo.[Contract] ct on ct.ID = fn.FieldValue join Yps.dbo.ContractProduct cp on cp.RelatedContractID = ct.ID where appp.Contract = app.Contract and app.AppointmentDate = appp.AppointmentDate) as [FinalPrice] ,app.Comments into #final from [avocet\avocet].XODB.ypsonline.Appointment app left join [avocet\avocet].XODB.ypsonline.Enumerations typ on typ.id = app.TypeId left join [avocet\avocet].XODB.ypsonline.Enumerations src on src.id = app.SourceId left join [avocet\avocet].XODB.ypsonline.Enumerations stat on stat.id = app.StatusId join Yps.dbo.[User] sd on sd.Email = (CASE WHEN app.CreatedBy not like '%@%' THEN CONCAT(app.CreatedBy, '@xo.gr') ELSE app.CreatedBy END) left join Yps.dbo.[Contract] c on app.[Contract] = c.ID left join Yps.dbo.SalesTreeHistory sth on sth.SalesmanID = sd.ID and sth.Year = year(app.AppointmentDate) and sth.SegmentID = month(app.AppointmentDate) and sth.isDeleted = 0 left join Yps.dbo.[User] man on sth.ManagerID = man.ID left join Yps.dbo.[User] sup on sth.SupervisorID = sup.ID where sd.ID in (@pSalesman) and app.AppointmentDate between @pDatefrom and @pDateto and isnull(typ.AliasName,'') in (@pType) --OR typ.AliasName is null) and isnull(src.AliasName,'') in (@pSource) --OR src.AliasName is null) and isnull(stat.AliasName,'') in (@pStatus) --OR stat.AliasName is null) and isnull(MainActivity,'') in (@pActivity) --OR MainActivity is null) --(@ypsusersids) or sd.ID = @ypscurrentuserid select distinct f.* from #final f cross apply ItApps.dbo.SplitString(',', REPLACE(f.Proposal,', ',',') ) as ss where ss.s in (@pProposal) or f.Proposal = '' --and Manager like '%' + @pManager + '%' --and Supervisor like '%' + @pSupervisor + '%' --and Salesman like '%' + @pSalesman + '%' --and MainActivity like '%' + @pActivity + '%'

templates.name: YPSOnline - Ραντεβού - Appointment Type
templates.sql: SELECT ISNULL(AliasName, '') AS AliasName FROM [XODB].[ypsonline].[Enumerations] WHERE [Type] = 'AppointmentType' UNION SELECT ''
