templates.name: YPSOnline - Ραντεβού - Area Manager
templates.sql: --declare @username nvarchar(50) --set @username = 'spitsaris'; --declare @ypscurrentuserid int = 2503; IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#tt') IS NOT NULL drop table #tt; IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#area') IS NOT NULL drop table #area; IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#supervisor') IS NOT NULL drop table #supervisor; IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#admin') IS NOT NULL drop table #admin; SELECT u.* into #area FROM [ITApps].[dbo].[YPSUsersAll] u join YPS.dbo.UserRole ur on u.YPSUserId = ur.UserID where ur.RoleID in (41,42) and u.YPSUserId <> 1189 /*araptis*/ select u.* into #supervisor FROM [ITApps].[dbo].[YPSUsersAll] u join YPS.dbo.UserRole ur on u.YPSUserId = ur.UserID where ur.RoleID in (43,44) and u.YPSUserId not in (select YPSUserId from #area ) and u.YPSUserId <> 1189 /*araptis*/ select id=0, u.USERNAME, UserFullName = 'Admin', YpsUserId=0, SalesmanIds = (select SalesmanYPSIds from ItApps.scd.Salesman where Username = 'araptis'), ShortName = '', AppCode = a.APPLICATION_CODE, UserID = usr.Id into #admin from [ITApps].[dbo].IT_APPLICATION_RIGHTS r join [ITApps].[dbo].IT_APPLICATION_USERS u on u.ADID = r.USER_ADID join [ITApps].[dbo].IT_APPLICATIONS a on a.ID = r.APPLICATION_ID --join [ITApps].[dbo].[YPSUsersAll] usr on usr.Username = u.USERNAME join YPS.dbo.[user] usr on usr.USERNAME = u.USERNAME where a.APPLICATION_CODE = 'rep' select Salesman = u.YPSUserId, SalesmanName = u.UserFullName, AreaManager = area.YPSUserId, AreaManagerName = '['+area.UserSalesCode+'] ' + area.UserFullName,u.Username,area.UserFullName into #tt from [ITApps].[dbo].[YPSUsersAll] u left join #area area on u.FullUnitId like area.FullUnitId + '%' where area.Level = (select max(ain.level) from #area ain where u.FullUnitId like ain.FullUnitId + '%' ) order by 3 --select * from YPS.dbo.[user] u where username = 'araptis' if (@ypscurrentuserid in (select UserID from #admin ) or @ypscurrentuserid = 1189 /*araptis*/) and @ypscurrentuserid not in (select YPSUserID from #area)-- Admin begin select distinct t.AreaManager,t.AreaManagerName,t.UserFullName from #tt t order by t.UserFullName end else if @ypscurrentuserid in (select YPSUserID from #area) and @ypscurrentuserid <> 1189 -- Area Manager begin select YPSUserId as AreaManager ,'['+UserSalesCode+'] '+UserFullName as AreaManagerName,UserFullName from #area a where a.YPSUserID = @ypscurrentuserid order by UserFullName end else if @ypscurrentuserid in (select YPSUserID from #supervisor) -- Supervisor begin select distinct YPSUserId as AreaManager, '['+UserSalesCode+'] '+UserFullName as AreaManagerName, UserFullName from YPS.dbo.SalesTreeHistory sth join #area a on sth.ManagerID = a.YPSUserId where sth.SupervisorID = @ypscurrentuserid and sth.year = year(getdate()) and sth.SegmentID = month(getdate()) end else-- if @username in (select t.salesman from #tt t) and @username <> 'araptis' and @username not in (select Username from #area) begin select t.AreaManager,t.AreaManagerName,t.UserFullName from #tt t where t.AreaManager = @ypscurrentuserid order by t.UserFullName end --else -- Sup or SR --select * from #tt where salesman = 1185 -- select * from [user] u where u.id in (718)(1303) (1185, --1189, --1306, --1330, --1378, --1385, --2024) -- --

templates.name: YPSOnline - Ραντεβού - Supervisor
templates.sql: IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#area') IS NOT NULL drop table #area; IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#supervisor') IS NOT NULL drop table #supervisor; SELECT u.* into #area FROM [ITApps].[dbo].[YPSUsersAll] u join [YPS].[dbo].UserRole ur on u.YPSUserId = ur.UserID where ur.RoleID in (41,42) and u.YPSUserId <> 1189 /*araptis*/ select u.* into #supervisor FROM [ITApps].[dbo].[YPSUsersAll] u join [YPS].[dbo].UserRole ur on u.YPSUserId = ur.UserID where ur.RoleID in (43,44) and u.YPSUserId not in (select YPSUserId from #area ) and u.YPSUserId <> 1189 /*araptis*/ if @ypscurrentuserid in (select YPSUserID from #supervisor) begin select distinct YPSUserId as SupervisorID, '['+UserSalesCode+'] '+UserFullName as Supervisor, UserFullName from [YPS].[dbo].SalesTreeHistory sth join #supervisor s on sth.SupervisorID = s.YPSUserId where sth.SupervisorID = @ypscurrentuserid and sth.year = year(getdate()) and sth.SegmentID = month(getdate()) end else begin select distinct sth.SupervisorID,'['+UserSalesCode+'] '+UserFullName as Supervisor,UserFullName from [YPS].[dbo].SalesTreeHistory sth join [ITApps].[dbo].[YPSUsersAll] sup on sup.YPSUserId = sth.SupervisorID where sth.ManagerID in (@pManager) and sth.year = year(getdate()) and sth.SegmentID = month(getdate()) order by UserFullName end

templates.name: YPSOnline - Ραντεβού - Sales Rep
templates.sql: SELECT DISTINCT sth.SalesmanID, '[' + UserSalesCode + '] ' + UserFullName AS SalesRep, UserFullName FROM [YPS].dbo.SalesTreeHistory AS sth JOIN [ITApps].[dbo].[YPSUsersAll] AS sup ON sup.YPSUserId = sth.SalesmanID WHERE sth.SupervisorID IN (@pSupervisor) AND sth.year = YEAR(GETDATE()) AND sth.SegmentID = MONTH(GETDATE()) ORDER BY UserFullName

templates.name: YPSOnline - Ραντεβού - Activity
templates.sql: SELECT ISNULL(ActivityName, '') AS ActivityName FROM ( SELECT ActivityName FROM [YPS].[dbo].[ViewActivityHeader] UNION SELECT DISTINCT MainActivity AS ActivityName FROM [avocet\avocet].XODB.ypsonline.appointment ) AS a ORDER BY ActivityName

templates.name: YPSOnline - Ραντεβού - User ID
templates.sql: SELECT usr.id FROM [YPS].[dbo].[user] AS usr WHERE CASE WHEN @username = 'amatzorou' THEN 'amantzorou' ELSE @username END = usr.UserName

templates.name: Αιτήματα CRM (offline) - Main
templates.sql: --report Query --DECLARE @FromDate DATE, @ToDate DATE, @option bit; --SET @FromDate = '2014-01-01'; --SET @ToDate = '2014-04-25'; --SET @option = 1; /*--ΠΙΣΤΩΤΙΚΑ ΠΑΡΑΓΓΕΛΙΩΝ----*/ IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#ebsPistwtika1') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #ebsPistwtika1 SELECT GID,code , netvalue , ADRegistrationDate INTO #ebsPistwtika1 FROM ITApps.dbo.CRM_Ticket_Data_EBS_Pist_Offline WHERE ( ( [ADRegistrationDate] BETWEEN @FromDate AND DATEADD(day, 1, @ToDate) ) OR @option = 0 ) ; IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#ebsPistwtika') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #ebsPistwtika SELECT code , SUM(aa.netvalue) netvalue , REPLACE(SUBSTRING(( SELECT DISTINCT '**' + CONVERT(NVARCHAR(15), dt1.ADRegistrationDate, 103) AS [text()] FROM #ebsPistwtika1 dt1 WHERE dt1.code = aa.code ORDER BY '**' + CONVERT(NVARCHAR(15), dt1.ADRegistrationDate, 103)--dt1.[date] FOR XML PATH('') ), 3, 1000),'**',CHAR(13)+CHAR(10)) [Dates] INTO #ebsPistwtika FROM #ebsPistwtika1 aa GROUP BY aa.code /*--ΑΚΥΡΩΣΕΙΣ ΠΑΡΑΓΓΕΛΙΩΝ----*/ IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#ebsAkurwtika1') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #ebsAkurwtika1 SELECT GID,code , netvalue , ADRegistrationDate INTO #ebsAkurwtika1 FROM ITApps.dbo.CRM_Ticket_Data_EBS_Akyr_Offline WHERE ( ( [ADRegistrationDate] BETWEEN @FromDate AND DATEADD(day, 1, @ToDate) ) OR @option = 0 ) ; IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#ebsAkurwtika') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #ebsAkurwtika SELECT code , SUM(aa.netvalue) netvalue , REPLACE(SUBSTRING(( SELECT DISTINCT '**' + CONVERT(NVARCHAR(15), dt1.ADRegistrationDate, 103) AS [text()] FROM #ebsAkurwtika1 dt1 WHERE dt1.code = aa.code ORDER BY '**' + CONVERT(NVARCHAR(15), dt1.ADRegistrationDate, 103)--dt1.[date] FOR XML PATH('') ), 3, 1000),'**',CHAR(13)+CHAR(10)) [Dates] INTO #ebsAkurwtika FROM #ebsAkurwtika1 aa GROUP BY aa.code ; SELECT m.* , pis.netvalue AS pistwtika , pis.dates pistwtika_dates, ak.netvalue AS akurwtika , ak.dates akurwtika_dates FROM ITApps.dbo.CRM_Ticket_Data_Offline m LEFT JOIN #ebsPistwtika pis ON pis.code = CAST(m.[Κωδ. Αιτήματος] AS NVARCHAR(20)) ------******** LEFT JOIN #ebsAkurwtika ak ON ak.code = CAST(m.[Κωδ. Αιτήματος] AS NVARCHAR(20)) ------******** WHERE ( ( ( m.dateParam BETWEEN @FromDate AND DATEADD(day, 1, @ToDate) ) OR @option = 1 ) --AND DATEDIFF(month, @FromDate, @ToDate) <= 2 ) AND ( pis.code IS NOT NULL OR ak.code IS NOT NULL OR @option = 0 ) AND m.TicketSourceTypeId IN ( @ticketSourceTypeId ) AND m.TicketTypeId IN ( @ticketTypeId ) AND ISNULL(m.TicketRequestReasonId, -1) IN ( @ticketRequestReasonId ) AND ISNULL(m.TicketCancellationReasonId, -1) IN ( @ticketCancellationReasonId ) AND ISNULL(m.TicketChargeOfResponsibilityID, -1) IN ( @TicketChargeOfResponsibilityID ) AND ISNULL(m.uSalesPersonID, -1) IN ( @uSalesPersonID ) AND ISNULL(m.CampaignId, -1) IN ( @CampaignId ) AND ISNULL(m.[Νομός], 'Κενό') IN ( @prefecture ) AND m.[Κατάσταση Αιτήματος] IN (@state) DROP TABLE #ebsAkurwtika DROP TABLE #ebsPistwtika

templates.name: Αιτήματα CRM (offline) - Ticket Source Type
templates.sql: SELECT id, description FROM TicketSourceType

templates.name: Αιτήματα CRM (offline) - Ticket Type
templates.sql: SELECT id, description FROM TicketType ORDER BY 2

templates.name: Αιτήματα CRM (offline) - Ticket Request Reason
templates.sql: SELECT -1 AS id, 'Κενό' AS description, 1 AS tp UNION SELECT id, description, 2 AS tp FROM TicketRequestReason ORDER BY 3, 2

templates.name: Αιτήματα CRM (offline) - Ticket Cancellation Reason
templates.sql: SELECT -1 AS id, 'Κενό' AS description, 1 AS p UNION SELECT id, description, 2 AS tp FROM TicketCancellationReason ORDER BY 3, 2

templates.name: Αιτήματα CRM (offline) - Ticket Charge Of Responsibility
templates.sql: SELECT -1 AS id, 'Κενό' AS description, 1 AS tp UNION SELECT id, description, 2 AS tp FROM TicketChargeOfResponsibility ORDER BY 3, 2

templates.name: Αιτήματα CRM (offline) - Sales Man
templates.sql: SELECT -1 AS id, 'Κενό' AS lastname, 1 AS tp UNION SELECT DISTINCT usr.ID, usr.LastName, 2 AS tp FROM [User] AS usr JOIN Ticket AS t ON t.RelatedSalesmanID = usr.ID ORDER BY 3, 2

templates.name: Αιτήματα CRM (offline) - Campaign
templates.sql: SELECT -1 AS id, 'Κενό' AS description, 1 AS tp UNION SELECT id, Description + ' ' + Code AS description, 2 AS tp FROM campaign ORDER BY 3, 2

templates.name: Αιτήματα CRM (offline) - Prefecture
templates.sql: SELECT 'Κενό' AS areaname, 1 AS tp UNION SELECT areaname, 2 AS tp FROM BroaderAreaLookUp WHERE BroaderAreaID LIKE 'e%' ORDER BY 2, 1

templates.name: Αιτήματα CRM (online) - Main
templates.sql: --report Query IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#Last_ticket_task') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #Last_ticket_task SELECT t.ID , MAX(tr.id) AS tr_id INTO #Last_ticket_task FROM ticket t JOIN dbo.TicketResult tr ON t.ID = tr.TicketID GROUP BY t.ID; IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#LastCrmCustomerResult') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #LastCrmCustomerResult SELECT T.id , tr.ResultCustomer INTO #LastCrmCustomerResult FROM ticket t JOIN dbo.TicketResult tr ON t.ID = tr.TicketID JOIN [user] u ON tr.PerformedByID = u.ID JOIN dbo.UserRole ur ON u.ID = ur.UserID JOIN [role] r ON ur.RoleID = r.ID AND r.id IN ( 101, 103 ) -- 101 Agent 103 Handler WHERE tr.id = ( SELECT MAX(itr.id) FROM ticket it JOIN dbo.TicketResult itr ON it.ID = itr.TicketID JOIN [user] iu ON itr.PerformedByID = iu.ID JOIN dbo.UserRole iur ON iu.ID = iur.UserID JOIN [role] ir ON iur.RoleID = ir.ID AND ir.id IN ( 101, 103 ) WHERE it.id = t.id ); /*-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/ IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#users') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #users SELECT * INTO #users FROM ( SELECT usr.SalesCode , usr.UserName AS [Username Πωλητή] , ( usr.LastName + ' ' + usr.FirstName ) AS [Πωλητής] , un1.Description AS [Ομάδα] , srv.UserName AS [Username Supervisor] , ( srv.LastName + ' ' + srv.FirstName ) AS [Supervisor] , ISNULL(arm1.username, arm2.UserName) AS [Username Area Manager] , ( ISNULL(arm1.LastName, arm2.LastName) + ' ' + ISNULL(arm1.FirstName, arm2.FirstName) ) AS [Area Manager] FROM [User] usr JOIN [Unit] un1 ON usr.unitID = un1.ID LEFT JOIN [user] srv ON srv.UnitID = un1.ID AND srv.IsUnitManager = 1 LEFT JOIN [unit] un2 ON un1.ParentID = un2.id LEFT JOIN [unit] un3 ON un2.ParentID = un3.id LEFT JOIN [user] arM1 ON arM1.UnitID = un2.ID AND arM1.IsUnitManager = 1 LEFT JOIN [user] arM2 ON arM2.UnitID = un3.ID AND arM2.IsUnitManager = 1 WHERE un1.ParentID IN ( 55, 69, 75, 79, 81, 84, 87, 99, 102 ) UNION SELECT usr.SalesCode , usr.UserName AS [Username Πωλητή] , ( usr.LastName + ' ' + usr.FirstName ) AS [Πωλητής] , un1.Description AS [Ομάδα] , srv.UserName AS [Username Supervisor] , ( srv.LastName + ' ' + srv.FirstName ) AS [Supervisor] , srv.UserName AS [Username Area Manager] , ( srv.LastName + ' ' + srv.FirstName ) AS [Area Manager] FROM [User] usr JOIN [Unit] un1 ON usr.unitID = un1.ID LEFT JOIN [user] srv ON srv.UnitID = un1.ID AND srv.IsUnitManager = 1 WHERE un1.id IN ( 55, 69, 77, 87 ) AND usr.IsUnitManager = 1 UNION SELECT usr.SalesCode , usr.UserName AS [Username Πωλητή] , ( usr.LastName + ' ' + usr.FirstName ) AS [Πωλητής] , 'ΑΝΕΝΕΡΓΟΙ' AS [Ομάδα] , 'ΑΝΕΝΕΡΓΟΙ' AS [Username Supervisor] , 'ΑΝΕΝΕΡΓΟΙ' AS [Supervisor] , 'ΑΝΕΝΕΡΓΟΙ' AS [Username Area Manager] , 'ΑΝΕΝΕΡΓΟΙ' AS [Area Manager] FROM [user] usr WHERE unitid = 96 UNION SELECT usr.SalesCode , usr.UserName AS [Username Πωλητή] , ( usr.LastName + ' ' + usr.FirstName ) AS [Πωλητής] , 'ΣΥΝΔΡΟΜΗΤΙΚΟΣ' AS [Ομάδα] , 'ΣΥΝΔΡΟΜΗΤΙΚΟΣ' AS [Username Supervisor] , 'ΣΥΝΔΡΟΜΗΤΙΚΟΣ' AS [Supervisor] , 'ΣΥΝΔΡΟΜΗΤΙΚΟΣ' AS [Username Area Manager] , 'ΣΥΝΔΡΟΜΗΤΙΚΟΣ' AS [Area Manager] FROM [user] usr WHERE unitid = 97 ) a /*set @option = 0;*/ BEGIN IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#ebsPistwtika') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #ebsPistwtika SELECT ( CAST('' AS NVARCHAR(100)) ) AS code , ( CAST(0 AS FLOAT) ) AS netvalue ,( CAST('' AS NVARCHAR(1000)) ) AS dates INTO #ebsPistwtika TRUNCATE TABLE #ebsPistwtika IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#ebsAkurwtika') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #ebsAkurwtika SELECT ( CAST('' AS NVARCHAR(100)) ) AS code , ( CAST(0 AS FLOAT) ) AS netvalue ,( CAST('' AS NVARCHAR(1000)) ) AS dates INTO #ebsAkurwtika TRUNCATE TABLE #ebsAkurwtika END IF ( @option = 1 ) BEGIN /*--ΠΙΣΤΩΤΙΚΑ ΠΑΡΑΓΓΕΛΙΩΝ----*/ IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#ebsPistwtika1') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #ebsPistwtika1 SELECT DISTINCT dt.GID , dt.adstringfield3 AS code , CONVERT(FLOAT, dt.netvalue) AS netvalue, dt.ADRegistrationDate AS [date] INTO #ebsPistwtika1 FROM [cardinal12].[XOEntersoft].[dbo].esfidocumenttrade dt JOIN [cardinal12].[XOEntersoft].[dbo].esfidocumenttype dtype ON dtype.gid = dt.faddocumenttypegid AND dtype.fcompanycode = '001' LEFT JOIN [cardinal12].[XOEntersoft].[dbo].ESFITradeAccountContract ec ON ec.Code = dt.faddimension1code AND ec.fcompanycode = '001' JOIN [cardinal12].[XOEntersoft].[dbo].esfitradeaccount es ON es.gid = dt.ftradeaccountgid AND es.fcompanycode = '001' WHERE dtype.code = 'ΠΤΥ' AND dt.fcompanycode = '001' AND dt.adstringfield3 IS NOT NULL AND dt.adstringfield3 <> 'ΑΝΕΥ' AND ( ( dt.[ADRegistrationDate] BETWEEN @FromDate AND DATEADD(day, 1, @ToDate) ) OR @option = 0 ); INSERT INTO #ebsPistwtika SELECT code , SUM(aa.netvalue) netvalue , REPLACE(SUBSTRING(( SELECT DISTINCT '**' + CONVERT(NVARCHAR(15), dt1.[date], 103) AS [text()] FROM #ebsPistwtika1 dt1 WHERE dt1.code = aa.code ORDER BY '**' + CONVERT(NVARCHAR(15), dt1.[date], 103)--dt1.[date] FOR XML PATH('') ), 3, 1000),'**',CHAR(13)+CHAR(10)) [Dates] FROM #ebsPistwtika1 aa GROUP BY aa.code /*--ΑΚΥΡΩΣΕΙΣ ΠΑΡΑΓΓΕΛΙΩΝ----*/ IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#ebsAkurwtika1') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #ebsAkurwtika1 SELECT DISTINCT dt.GID , dt.adstringfield3 AS code , CONVERT(FLOAT, dt.netvalue) AS netvalue, dt.ADRegistrationDate AS [date] INTO #ebsAkurwtika1 FROM [cardinal12].[XOEntersoft].[dbo].esfidocumenttrade dt JOIN [cardinal12].[XOEntersoft].[dbo].esfidocumenttype dtype ON dtype.gid = dt.faddocumenttypegid AND dtype.fcompanycode = '001' LEFT JOIN [cardinal12].[XOEntersoft].[dbo].ESFITradeAccountContract ec ON ec.Code = dt.faddimension1code AND ec.fcompanycode = '001' JOIN [cardinal12].[XOEntersoft].[dbo].esfitradeaccount es ON es.gid = dt.ftradeaccountgid AND es.fcompanycode = '001' WHERE dtype.code = 'ΠΑΑ' AND dt.fcompanycode = '001' AND dt.adstringfield3 IS NOT NULL AND dt.adstringfield3 <> 'ΑΝΕΥ' AND ( ( dt.[ADRegistrationDate] BETWEEN @FromDate AND DATEADD(day, 1, @ToDate) ) OR @option = 0 ); INSERT INTO #ebsAkurwtika SELECT code , SUM(aa.netvalue) netvalue , REPLACE(SUBSTRING(( SELECT DISTINCT '**' + CONVERT(NVARCHAR(15), dt1.[date], 103) AS [text()] FROM #ebsAkurwtika1 dt1 WHERE dt1.code = aa.code ORDER BY '**' + CONVERT(NVARCHAR(15), dt1.[date], 103)--dt1.[date] FOR XML PATH('') ), 3, 1000),'**',CHAR(13)+CHAR(10)) [Dates] FROM #ebsAkurwtika1 aa GROUP BY aa.code END; -- -- DEV11005 addition----------------------------------------------------------------------------- IF OBJECT_ID('itapps.dbo.product', 'U') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE itapps.dbo.product; select distinct ct.id as ContractID, '[' + pr.code +'] '+pr.Name as Product, pt.Description as ProductCategory, ctp.Description as Channel, '('+ m.Code + ') '+m.name as Medium into itapps.dbo.product from yps.dbo.Ticket t join yps.dbo.Contract ct on t.RelatedContractID = ct.id join yps.dbo.ContractProduct cp on cp.RelatedContractID = ct.id and cp.state in (0,1,5,6,7) join yps.dbo.Advertisement a on a.ContractProductID = cp.ID join yps.dbo.VersionSection vs on a.VersionSectionID = vs.ID join yps.dbo.MediumVersion mv on mv.ID = vs.MediumVersionID join yps.dbo.Medium m on m.ID = mv.MediumID join yps.dbo.Product pr on a.ProductID = pr.ID join yps.dbo.ProductType pt on pt.ID = pr.ProductTypeID join yps.dbo.ChannelType ctp on ctp.ID = ct.ChannelTypeID use ITApps; /****** Object: Index [NonClusteredIndex-20180327-131804] Script Date: 27/03/2018 13:18:29 ******/ CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX [NonClusteredIndex-20180327-131804] ON itapps.[dbo].[product] ( [ContractID] ASC, [Product] ASC, [ProductCategory] ASC )WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF, DROP_EXISTING = OFF, ONLINE = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON) use YPS; IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#productDelimited') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #productDelimited select distinct st2.ContractID , st2.Channel, STUFF((Select ', '+ST1.Product AS [text()] From itapps.dbo.product ST1 Where ST1.ContractID = ST2.ContractID group by ST1.Product,ST1.ContractID ORDER BY ST1.ContractID For XML PATH ('')), 1, 1, '') products , STUFF((Select ', '+ST1.ProductCategory AS [text()] From itapps.dbo.product ST1 Where ST1.ContractID = ST2.ContractID group by ST1.ProductCategory,ST1.ContractID ORDER BY ST1.ContractID For XML PATH ('')), 1, 1, '') productCategories ,STUFF((Select ', '+ ST1.Medium AS [text()] From itapps.dbo.product ST1 Where ST1.ContractID = ST2.ContractID group by ST1.Medium,ST1.ContractID ORDER BY ST1.ContractID For XML PATH ('')), 1, 1, '') Medium into #productDelimited from itapps.dbo.product st2 ------------- DEV11005 addition--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#main') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #main SELECT DISTINCT t.id AS 'Κωδ. Αιτήματος' , t.code AS 'Παλιός Κωδικός' , bp.code AS 'Kωδ. Επιχ. Σημείου' , bp.Name AS 'Επιχ.Σημείο' , t.[status] , CASE WHEN t.Status = 1 THEN 'Κλειστό' ELSE 'Ανοιχτό' END AS 'Κατάσταση Αιτήματος' , cmpn.Description + ' ' + cmpn.Code AS 'Καμπάνια' , adrv2.Prefecture AS 'Νομός' , tp.Description AS 'Προτεραιότητα' , tt.Description AS 'Τύπος Αιτήματος' , uSalesPerson.LastName + ' ' + uSalesPerson.FirstName AS 'Πωλητής' , uSalesPerson.SalesCode AS 'Κωδ. Πωλητή' , t.RelatedContractID AS 'Σχετικό συμβόλαιο' , c.SignedDate AS 'Ημ. Υπογραφής Συμβολαίου' , tst.Description AS 'Προέλευση' , t.CreatedOn AS 'Ημ. Εισαγωγής' , t.ReceivedOn AS 'Ημ. Παραλαβής' , t.CompletedOn AS 'Ημ. Επίλυσης' , ucreated.LastName + ' ' + ucreated.FirstName AS 'Χρήστης Εισαγωγής' , uhandler.LastName + ' ' + uhandler.FirstName AS 'Τελευταίος CRM Χρήστης' , ucompleted.LastName + ' ' + ucompleted.FirstName AS 'Χρήστης' , ulastAssign.LastName + ' ' + ulastAssign.FirstName AS 'Τελ. Ρόλος/Χρήστης1' , rlastAssign.Description AS 'Τελ. Ρόλος/Χρήστης2' , trm.Description AS 'Επίλυση' , CASE WHEN tr.Result = 1 THEN 'ΕΠΙΛΥΣΗ' ELSE NULL END AS 'Αποτέλεσμα' , CASE WHEN tr.ResultCustomer = 1 THEN 'ΘΕΤΙΚΟ' WHEN tr.ResultCustomer = 0 THEN 'ΑΡΝΗΤΙΚΟ' ELSE NULL END AS 'Αποτέλεσμα για πελάτη' , tcor.Description AS 'Καταλογισμός Ευθύνης' , t.ContactName AS 'Άτομο Επικοινωνίας' , trr.Description AS 'Αιτία Αιτήματος' , tcr.Description AS 'Λόγος Ακύρωσης'/*rct.Description*/ , CASE WHEN tr.ResultComm = 1 THEN 'ΝΑΙ' WHEN tr.ResultComm = 0 THEN 'ΟΧΙ' ELSE NULL END AS 'Επικοινωνία με πελάτη' , tr.ResultCommDate AS 'Ημ. Επικοινωνίας' , tst.ID AS TicketSourceTypeId , tt.ID AS TicketTypeID , trr.ID AS TicketRequestReasonId , tcr.ID AS TicketCancellationReasonId , tcor.ID AS TicketChargeOfResponsibilityID , uSalesPerson.ID AS uSalesPersonID , CASE WHEN lccr.resultcustomer = 1 THEN 'ΘΕΤΙΚΟ' WHEN lccr.resultcustomer = 0 THEN 'ΑΡΝΗΤΙΚΟ' ELSE NULL END AS 'Αποτέλεσμα για πελάτη CRM' , cmpn.ID AS CampaignId, pd.Channel,-- DEV11005 addition pd.Medium,-- DEV11005 addition pd.products,-- DEV11005 addition Pd.productCategories-- DEV11005 addition INTO #main FROM ticket t LEFT JOIN dbo.TicketRequestReason trr ON t.RequestReasonID = trr.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.TicketPriority tp ON t.PriorityID = tp.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.TicketSourceType tst ON t.SourceTypeID = tst.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.TicketResolutionMethod trm ON t.ResolutionMethodID = trm.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.[Contract] c ON t.RelatedContractID = c.ID AND c.type IN ( 0, 2, 3, 4 ) LEFT JOIN dbo.Campaign cmpn ON c.CampaignID = cmpn.ID LEFT JOIN [user] uSalesPerson ON t.RelatedSalesmanID = uSalesPerson.ID LEFT JOIN [user] ulastAssign ON t.LastAssignUserID = ulastAssign.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.Role rlastAssign ON t.LastAssignRoleID = rlastAssign.id LEFT JOIN [user] uhandler ON t.HandlerID = uhandler.ID LEFT JOIN [user] ucreated ON t.CreatedByID = ucreated.ID LEFT JOIN [user] ucompleted ON t.CompletedByID = ucompleted.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.BusinessPoint bp ON t.BusinessPointID = bp.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.FullAddressViewV2 adrv2 ON adrv2.ID = bp.LocationAddressID LEFT JOIN #Last_ticket_task ltt ON ltt.id = t.id LEFT JOIN dbo.TicketResult tr ON ltt.tr_id = tr.id /*AND tr.ResolutionMethodID IS NOT NULL*/ LEFT JOIN dbo.TicketResultCommType trct ON tr.ResultCommTypeID = trct.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.[User] utr ON tr.PerformedByID = utr.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.TicketChargeOfResponsibility tcor ON t.ChargeOfResponsibilityID = tcor.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.TicketCancellationReason tcr ON t.CancellationResonID = tcr.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.TicketType tt ON t.TicketTypeID = tt.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.TicketCommunication tc ON t.ID = tc.TicketID/*WHERE t.CreatedOn BETWEEN '2012-09-01' AND '2012-09-30'*/ LEFT JOIN #LastCrmCustomerResult lccr ON lccr.id = t.id left join #ProductDelimited pd on Pd.ContractID = c.id-- DEV11005 addition WHERE EXISTS (SELECT TOP 1 1 FROM dbo.[Case] c WHERE c.ContextEntityID = t.id AND c.ContextEntityType = 'TICKET') AND DATEDIFF(day, @FromDate, @ToDate) <= 8 --IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#flow') IS NOT NULL -- DROP TABLE #flow --SELECT t.ID AS Tid , -- c.id AS Cid , -- tsk.id AS tsk_id , -- r.[Description] AS OM --INTO #flow --FROM dbo.Ticket AS t -- INNER JOIN dbo.[Case] AS c ON t.ID = c.ContextEntityID -- INNER JOIN dbo.BusinessPoint AS bp ON t.BusinessPointID = bp.ID -- LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.[Case] AS c2 ON t.ID = c2.ContextEntityID -- AND c2.ContextEntityType = 'TICKET' -- AND c2.CaseTypeID IN ( 88, 91, 86 ) -- LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.Task AS tsk ON ( c2.ID = tsk.CaseID ) -- AND ( tsk.TaskTypeID IN ( 227, 243, 242 ) ) -- LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.TaskAssignment AS ta ON ( tsk.ID = ta.TaskID ) -- AND ( 0 = ta.AssignmentType ) -- AND ( ta.UserID IS NULL ) -- AND ( ta.RoleID IS NOT NULL ) -- LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.[Role] AS r ON ta.RoleID = r.ID --WHERE /*r.[Description] = 'Προϊστάμενος Οργανωτικής Μονάδας FINANCE' AND*/ -- c.[State] = 0 -- AND t.[Status] = 0 -- AND r.[Description] IS NOT NULL -- AND EXISTS ( SELECT MAX(itsk.id) , -- it.id , -- ic.id -- FROM dbo.Ticket it -- JOIN dbo.[Case] ic ON it.ID = ic.ContextEntityID -- AND ic.ContextEntityType = 'TICKET' -- AND ic.CaseTypeID IN ( 88, 91, 86 ) -- LEFT JOIN dbo.Task itsk ON ic.ID = itsk.CaseID -- AND itsk.TaskTypeID IN ( 227, 243, 242 ) -- WHERE it.id = t.id -- AND ic.id = c.id -- GROUP BY it.id , -- ic.id -- HAVING MAX(itsk.id) = tsk.id ) IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#tmp') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #tmp SELECT DISTINCT ti.id ticketID , ti.Status ticketStatus , mc.id caseId , mt.id taskID , u.LastName potentialUser , r.Description potentialRole , ISNULL(u.LastName, r.Description) potentialUserRole INTO #tmp --select * FROM dbo.Ticket ti JOIN dbo.[Case] c ON c.ContextEntityID = ti.id AND c.ContextEntityType = 'TICKET' JOIN dbo.[Case] mc ON c.MasterCaseID = mc.MasterCaseID JOIN dbo.Task mt ON mc.ID = mt.CaseID LEFT JOIN dbo.TaskAssignment taa ON mt.id = taa.TaskID LEFT JOIN dbo.Role r ON taa.RoleID = r.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.[User] u ON ISNULL(mt.ActualOwnerID, taa.UserID) = u.id --AND UnitID <> 40 WHERE mt.Status = 0 AND ti.status = 0 AND EXISTS (SELECT TOP 1 1 FROM #main m WHERE m.[Κωδ. Αιτήματος] = ti.id) AND DATEDIFF(day, @FromDate, @ToDate) <= 8 IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#flow2') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #flow2 SELECT DISTINCT ticketID Tid , STUFF((SELECT CHAR(13) + CHAR(10) + [potentialUserRole] FROM #tmp WHERE ( ticketID = Results.ticketID ) ORDER BY #tmp.[potentialUserRole] FOR XML PATH('') , TYPE).value('(./text())[1]', 'VARCHAR(MAX)'), 1, 2, '') AS OM INTO #flow2 FROM #tmp Results GROUP BY Results.ticketID ------------------- --case Comments ------------------- /* IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#tmp6') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #tmp6 SELECT DISTINCT ti.id ticketID , cc.CaseID , cc.CommentText , cc.CreatedOn , cc.CreatedBy INTO #tmp6 FROM dbo.Ticket ti JOIN dbo.[Case] c ON c.ContextEntityID = ti.id AND c.ContextEntityType = 'TICKET' JOIN dbo.CaseComment cc ON c.ID = cc.CaseID WHERE EXISTS (SELECT TOP 1 1 FROM #main m WHERE m.[Κωδ. Αιτήματος] = ti.id) AND DATEDIFF(day, @FromDate, @ToDate) <= 8 IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#comm') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #comm SELECT DISTINCT ticketID Tid , STUFF((SELECT CHAR(13) + CHAR(10) + '[' + [CreatedBy] + '] - ' + CONVERT(NVARCHAR(25), CreatedOn, 120) + ' - ' + CommentText FROM #tmp6 WHERE ( ticketID = Results.ticketID ) ORDER BY #tmp6.CreatedOn FOR XML PATH('') , TYPE).value('(./text())[1]', 'VARCHAR(MAX)'), 1, 2, '') AS Comments INTO #comm FROM #tmp6 Results GROUP BY Results.ticketID */ IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#SV_task_dates') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #SV_task_dates SELECT COALESCE(tgiv.ContractID,tgiv.AltOfferID,tgiv.FixOfferID) ct_id, MAX(t.CompletedOn) t_CompletedOn INTO #SV_task_dates FROM dbo.TargetGroupItemValue tgiv JOIN #main ct ON ct.[Σχετικό συμβόλαιο] = COALESCE(tgiv.ContractID,tgiv.AltOfferID,tgiv.FixOfferID) JOIN dbo.[Case] c ON c.ContextEntityID = tgiv.id AND c.ContextEntitytype = 'TGIV' JOIN dbo.Task t ON c.ID = t.CaseID WHERE TaskTypeID IN ( 164, 259, 261 ) and Outcome = 'Δεν απαιτούνται διορθώσεις' --AND COALESCE(tgiv.ContractID,tgiv.AltOfferID,tgiv.FixOfferID) = 1679657 GROUP BY COALESCE(tgiv.ContractID,tgiv.AltOfferID,tgiv.FixOfferID) IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#result') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #result SELECT DISTINCT m.[Κωδ. Αιτήματος] , m.[Παλιός Κωδικός] , m.[Kωδ. Επιχ. Σημείου] , m.[Επιχ.Σημείο] , m.[Κατάσταση Αιτήματος] , m.[Καμπάνια] , m.[Νομός] , m.[Προτεραιότητα] , m.[Τύπος Αιτήματος] , m.[Πωλητής] , m.[Κωδ. Πωλητή] , us.Supervisor , us.[Area Manager] , m.[Σχετικό συμβόλαιο] , CONVERT(NVARCHAR, m.[Ημ. Υπογραφής Συμβολαίου], 103) AS [Ημ. Υπογραφής Συμβολαίου] , CONVERT(NVARCHAR, d.t_CompletedOn, 103) AS [Ημ. Ελέγχου Επιθ] , m.[Προέλευση] , CONVERT(NVARCHAR, m.[Ημ. Εισαγωγής], 103) AS [Ημ. Εισαγωγής] , CONVERT(NVARCHAR, m.[Ημ. Παραλαβής], 103) AS [Ημ. Παραλαβής] , CONVERT(NVARCHAR, m.[Ημ. Επίλυσης], 103) AS [Ημ. Επίλυσης] , m.[Χρήστης Εισαγωγής] , m.[Τελευταίος CRM Χρήστης] , m.[Χρήστης] , ISNULL(m.[Τελ. Ρόλος/Χρήστης1],m.[Τελ. Ρόλος/Χρήστης2]) [Τελ. Ρόλος/Χρήστης], m.[Επίλυση] , m.[Αποτέλεσμα] , m.[Αποτέλεσμα για πελάτη] , m.[Αποτέλεσμα για πελάτη CRM] , m.[Καταλογισμός Ευθύνης] , m.[Άτομο Επικοινωνίας] , m.[Αιτία Αιτήματος] , m.[Λόγος Ακύρωσης] , m.[Επικοινωνία με πελάτη] , CONVERT(NVARCHAR, m.[Ημ. Επικοινωνίας], 103) AS [Ημ. Επικοινωνίας] , f.OM AS 'OM Ανοιχτών Αιτημάτων' , m.TicketSourceTypeId , m.TicketTypeID , m.TicketRequestReasonId , m.TicketCancellationReasonId , m.TicketChargeOfResponsibilityID , m.uSalesPersonID , m.CampaignId , m.Channel, m.Medium, m.products, m.productCategories, pis.netvalue AS pistwtika , pis.dates pistwtika_dates, ak.netvalue AS akurwtika , ak.dates akurwtika_dates, contractValue = ( SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN cp1.state IN (3,4) AND cp1.alteredamount IS NOT NULL THEN alteredamount ELSE Price - Discount - RulesDiscount END) FROM dbo.ContractProduct cp1 WHERE cp1.RelatedContractID = m.[Σχετικό συμβόλαιο] ) --,c.Comments --INTO #result FROM #main m LEFT JOIN #flow2 f ON m.[Κωδ. Αιτήματος] = f.Tid AND m.[status] = 0 --LEFT JOIN #comm c ON m.[Κωδ. Αιτήματος] = c.Tid LEFT JOIN #ebsPistwtika pis ON pis.code = CAST(m.[Κωδ. Αιτήματος] AS NVARCHAR(20)) LEFT JOIN #ebsAkurwtika ak ON ak.code = CAST(m.[Κωδ. Αιτήματος] AS NVARCHAR(20)) LEFT JOIN #users us ON us.SalesCode = m.[Κωδ. Πωλητή] AND us.SalesCode IS NOT NULL LEFT JOIN #SV_task_dates d ON d.ct_id = m.[Σχετικό συμβόλαιο] WHERE DATEDIFF(day, @FromDate, @ToDate) <= 8 AND ( m.[Ημ. Εισαγωγής] BETWEEN @FromDate AND DATEADD(day, 1, @ToDate) OR @option = 1 ) AND ( pis.code IS NOT NULL OR ak.code IS NOT NULL OR @option = 0 ) AND m.TicketSourceTypeId IN ( @ticketSourceTypeId ) AND m.TicketTypeId IN ( @ticketTypeId ) AND ISNULL(m.TicketRequestReasonId, -1) IN ( @ticketRequestReasonId ) AND ISNULL(m.TicketCancellationReasonId, -1) IN ( @ticketCancellationReasonId ) AND ISNULL(m.TicketChargeOfResponsibilityID, -1) IN ( @TicketChargeOfResponsibilityID ) AND ISNULL(m.uSalesPersonID, -1) IN ( @uSalesPersonID ) AND ISNULL(m.CampaignId, -1) IN ( @CampaignId ) AND ISNULL(m.[Νομός], 'Κενό') IN ( @prefecture ) AND m.[Κατάσταση Αιτήματος] IN ( @state ) --SELECT * --FROM #result --WHERE [Κωδ. Αιτήματος] = 573968

templates.name: Αιτήματα CRM (online) - Ticket Source Type
templates.sql: SELECT id, description FROM TicketSourceType

templates.name: Αιτήματα CRM (online) - Ticket Type
templates.sql: SELECT id, description FROM TicketType ORDER BY 2

templates.name: Αιτήματα CRM (online) - Ticket Request Reason
templates.sql: SELECT -1 AS id, 'Κενό' AS description, 1 AS tp UNION SELECT id, description, 2 AS tp FROM TicketRequestReason ORDER BY 3, 2

templates.name: Αιτήματα CRM (online) - Ticket Cancellation Reason
templates.sql: SELECT -1 AS id, 'Κενό' AS description, 1 AS p UNION SELECT id, description, 2 AS tp FROM TicketCancellationReason ORDER BY 3, 2

templates.name: Αιτήματα CRM (online) - Ticket Charge Of Responsibility
templates.sql: SELECT -1 AS id, 'Κενό' AS description, 1 AS tp UNION SELECT id, description, 2 AS tp FROM TicketChargeOfResponsibility ORDER BY 3, 2

templates.name: Αιτήματα CRM (online) - Sales Man
templates.sql: SELECT -1 AS id, 'Κενό' AS lastname, 1 AS tp UNION SELECT DISTINCT usr.ID, usr.LastName, 2 AS tp FROM [User] AS usr JOIN Ticket AS t ON t.RelatedSalesmanID = usr.ID ORDER BY 3, 2

templates.name: Αιτήματα CRM (online) - Campaign
templates.sql: SELECT -1 AS id, 'Κενό' AS description, 1 AS tp UNION SELECT id, Description + ' ' + Code AS description, 2 AS tp FROM campaign ORDER BY 3, 2

templates.name: Αιτήματα CRM (online) - Prefecture
templates.sql: SELECT 'Κενό' AS areaname, 1 AS tp UNION SELECT areaname, 2 AS tp FROM BroaderAreaLookUp WHERE BroaderAreaID LIKE 'e%' ORDER BY 2, 1

templates.name: Αναζητήσεις ανα περιοχή - v2018 - Main Dataset
Αναζητήσεις ανα περιοχή - v2018 - Year
templates.sql: WITH yearlist AS ( SELECT 2018 AS year UNION ALL SELECT yl.year + 1 AS year FROM yearlist AS yl WHERE yl.year + 1 <= YEAR(GETDATE()) ) SELECT year FROM yearlist ORDER BY year DESC

templates.name: Αναζητήσεις ανα περιοχή - v2018 - Heading
templates.sql: SELECT -1 AS ID, 'null' AS name, 'κενό' AS Name2 UNION ALL SELECT CAST(REPLACE(h.Code, 'H', '') AS INTEGER) AS id, h.NameGR AS name, CAST(REPLACE(h.Code, 'H', '') AS VARCHAR) AS Name2 FROM heading.Heading AS h WHERE isActive = 1

templates.name: Αναζητήσεις ανα περιοχή - v2018 - Broader Area
templates.sql: SELECT '(κενό)' AS [BroaderArea], '-1' AS BroaderAreaID UNION ALL SELECT DISTINCT ba.AreaName AS [BroaderArea], ba.BroaderAreaID FROM ITApps.geomodel.geo_model_relations AS r JOIN yps.dbo.BroaderAreaLookUp AS ba ON r.broader_area_id = ba.BroaderAreaID WHERE r.region_id IN (@region) ORDER BY 1

templates.name: Αναζητήσεις ανα περιοχή - v2018 - Prefecture
templates.sql: SELECT DISTINCT pre.AreaName AS [Prefecture], pre.BroaderAreaID AS [PrefectureId] FROM ITApps.geomodel.geo_model_relations AS r LEFT JOIN yps.dbo.BroaderAreaLookUp AS ba ON r.broader_area_id = ba.BroaderAreaID LEFT JOIN yps.dbo.BroaderAreaLookUp AS pre ON r.prefecture_id = pre.BroaderAreaID WHERE ( r.broader_area_id IN (@broaderarea) OR r.region_id IN (@region) ) AND NOT pre.AreaName IS NULL AND NOT pre.BroaderAreaID IS NULL ORDER BY 1

templates.name: Αναζητήσεις ανα περιοχή - v2018 - Municipality
templates.sql: SELECT DISTINCT mun.AreaName AS [Municipality], mun.BroaderAreaID AS [MunicipalityId] FROM ITApps.geomodel.geo_model_relations AS r /* join yps.dbo.BroaderAreaLookUp reg on r.region_id = reg.BroaderAreaID -- join yps.dbo.BroaderAreaLookUp ba on r.broader_area_id = ba.BroaderAreaID join yps.dbo.BroaderAreaLookUp pre on r.prefecture_id = pre.BroaderAreaID join yps.dbo.BroaderAreaLookUp mun on r.municipality_id = mun.BroaderAreaID -- join yps.dbo.BroaderAreaLookUp loc on r.location_id = loc.BroaderAreaID and left--(loc.BroaderAreaID,1)='L' where pre.BroaderAreaID in (@prefecture) order by 1 */

templates.name: Αναζητήσεις ανα περιοχή - v2018 - City
templates.sql: SELECT DISTINCT loc.AreaName AS [City], loc.BroaderAreaID AS [CityId] FROM ITApps.geomodel.geo_model_relations AS r /* join yps.dbo.BroaderAreaLookUp reg on r.region_id = reg.BroaderAreaID -- join yps.dbo.BroaderAreaLookUp ba on r.broader_area_id = ba.BroaderAreaID -- join yps.dbo.BroaderAreaLookUp pre on r.prefecture_id = pre.BroaderAreaID join yps.dbo.BroaderAreaLookUp mun on r.municipality_id = mun.BroaderAreaID join yps.dbo.BroaderAreaLookUp loc on r.location_id = loc.BroaderAreaID and left(loc.BroaderAreaID,1)='L' where mun.BroaderAreaID in (@municipality) order by 1 */

templates.name: Αναζητήσεις ανα περιοχή - v2018 - Region

joins.right: reg.BroaderAreaID /* join yps.dbo.BroaderAreaLookUp ba on r.broader_area_id = ba.BroaderAreaID -- join yps.dbo.BroaderAreaLookUp pre on r.prefecture_id = pre.BroaderAreaID -- join yps.dbo.BroaderAreaLookUp mun on r.municipality_id = mun.BroaderAreaID -- join yps.dbo.BroaderAreaLookUp loc on r.location_id = loc.BroaderAreaID and left--(loc.BroaderAreaID,1)='L' order by 1 */

templates.sql: SELECT DISTINCT reg.AreaName AS [Region], reg.BroaderAreaID AS [RegionId] FROM ITApps.geomodel.geo_model_relations AS r JOIN yps.dbo.BroaderAreaLookUp AS reg ON r.region_id = reg.BroaderAreaID /* join yps.dbo.BroaderAreaLookUp ba on r.broader_area_id = ba.BroaderAreaID -- join yps.dbo.BroaderAreaLookUp pre on r.prefecture_id = pre.BroaderAreaID -- join yps.dbo.BroaderAreaLookUp mun on r.municipality_id = mun.BroaderAreaID -- join yps.dbo.BroaderAreaLookUp loc on r.location_id = loc.BroaderAreaID and left--(loc.BroaderAreaID,1)='L' order by 1 */

templates.name: Αναλυτική Κατάσταση Συμβολαίων Ανά Καμπάνια - Report DS
templates.sql: IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#campaigns') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #campaigns SELECT * into #campaigns FROM itapps.dbo.SplitTostring(@allcampaigns, ',') CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX ix_camp ON #campaigns ([value]); IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#selectedcontracts') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #selectedcontracts select ContractId = ct.id into #selectedcontracts from contract ct join #campaigns cmp on cmp.value = isnull(ct.CampaignID,-1) where ( ( ct.SignedDate BETWEEN @dateFrom AND DATEADD(day, 1, @dateTo) AND ct.OrigionalContractID IS NULL ) OR ( ct.CreatedOn BETWEEN @dateFrom AND DATEADD(day, 1, @dateTo) AND ct.OrigionalContractID IS NOT NULL ) OR ( @dateFrom IS NULL AND @dateTo IS NULL ) ) CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX ix_RltCt ON #selectedcontracts (ContractId); IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#temp') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #temp SELECT DISTINCT ContractId = ct.id , TaskTypeID = tt.id , t.CreatedOn , t.CompletedOn, t.Status , t.outcome , t.ID AS taskid ,tgi.CampaignID INTO #temp FROM #campaigns cpn join dbo.TargetGroupItem tgi WITH ( NOLOCK ) ON tgi.CampaignID = cpn.value join dbo.TargetGroupItemValue tgiv WITH ( NOLOCK ) ON tgi.ID = tgiv.TargetGroupItemID JOIN dbo.[Case] mc WITH ( NOLOCK ) ON mc.ContextEntityID = tgiv.id AND mc.ContextEntityType = 'TGIV' JOIN dbo.[Case] c WITH ( NOLOCK ) ON mc.MasterCaseID = c.MasterCaseID JOIN dbo.Task t WITH ( NOLOCK ) ON c.ID = t.CaseID LEFT JOIN dbo.TaskAssignment ta WITH ( NOLOCK ) ON t.ID = ta.TaskID AND ta.AssignmentType = 0 left join [Role] r WITH ( NOLOCK ) on r.id = t.ActualRoleID JOIN dbo.TaskType tt WITH ( NOLOCK ) ON t.TaskTypeID = tt.ID JOIN dbo.Contract ct WITH ( NOLOCK ) ON ct.id = COALESCE(tgiv.ContractID, tgiv.AltOfferID, tgiv.FixOfferID) WHERE ( (ActivityType = 'H' AND t.status = 0) OR ( tt.id IN (648) AND (t.Outcome = 'CONTINUE') OR ( tt.id = 934 AND t.Outcome is null ) OR ( TaskTypeID = 189 ) OR ( tt.id = 500 AND t.Outcome = '') OR ( tt.id = 956 AND t.Outcome is null ) --Added for DEV-14497 (used for DocuSign) ) ) AND tt.id <> 175 --sumplhrwsh kwdikou fusikou fakelou AND tt.id <> 170 --sumplhrwsh kwdikou fusikou fakelou AND tt.id <> 266 --eksetash metaforas stoxou AND ct.id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY ct.id ,t.id --select * from #temp where ContractId in (2014155,2015691,2015194,2015832) CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX ix_temp ON #temp ([taskid]); CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX ix_temp2 ON #temp ([TaskTypeID]); IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#MaxTask') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #MaxTask SELECT max(t.id) Taskid, tmp.ContractId INTO #MaxTask from #temp tmp WITH ( NOLOCK ) join [task] t WITH ( NOLOCK ) on t.id = tmp.taskid join [Contract] ct WITH ( NOLOCK ) on ct.id = tmp.ContractId group by tmp.ContractId CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX ix_maxtsk ON #MaxTask ([taskid]); CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX ix_maxtsk2 ON #MaxTask ([ContractId]); --select * from #MaxTask where ContractId = 2013957 IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#CtPrice') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #CtPrice SELECT ContractID =cpp.RelatedContractID, ContractPrice= SUM(CASE WHEN cpp.[STATE] IN ( 3, 4 ) AND advv.AlteredAmount IS NOT NULL THEN advv.AlteredAmount ELSE advv.price - advv.discount - advv.rulesdiscount END) INTO #CtPrice FROM #selectedContracts ct join dbo.ContractProduct cpp WITH ( NOLOCK ) on ct.ContractId = cpp.RelatedContractID JOIN dbo.Advertisement advv WITH ( NOLOCK ) ON cpp.ID = advv.ContractProductID WHERE advv.QA = 0 group by cpp.RelatedContractID CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX ix_CtPrice ON #CtPrice ([ContractId]); IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#RltCt') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #RltCt SELECT RelatedContractId = cpp.RelatedContractID , ContractPrice = SUM(CASE WHEN cpp.[STATE] IN ( 3, 4 ) AND cpp.AlteredAmount IS NOT NULL THEN cpp.AlteredAmount ELSE cpp.price - cpp.discount - cpp.rulesdiscount END) , PPC_xo_amount = SUM (case when cpp.state in (3,4) then ExtraFeeAmountAfterCC + isnull( cpp.OneTimeAmountAfterDiscount, cpp.OneTimeAmount) else isnull(ExtraFeeAmountAfterDiscount, ExtraFeeAmount) + isnull( cpp.OneTimeAmountAfterDiscount, cpp.OneTimeAmount) end ) INTO #RltCt FROM #selectedcontracts ct join dbo.ContractProduct cpp WITH ( NOLOCK ) on ct.ContractId = cpp.RelatedContractID WHERE cpp.State <> 3 GROUP BY cpp.RelatedContractID CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX ix_RltCt ON #RltCt ([RelatedContractId]); IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#advp') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #advp SELECT DISTINCT cp.RelatedContractID , pm.id pmid , pm.AdvancedPayment INTO #advp FROM #selectedcontracts ct join dbo.ContractProduct cp WITH ( NOLOCK ) on ct.ContractId = cp.RelatedContractID JOIN dbo.PaymentMethod pm WITH ( NOLOCK ) ON cp.PaymentMethodID = pm.ID WHERE cp.State <> 3 CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX ix_advp ON #advp ([RelatedContractId]); IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#MinTaskProduction') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #MinTaskProduction SELECT ContractId , MIN(createdon) createdon INTO #MinTaskProduction FROM #temp WITH ( NOLOCK ) WHERE TaskTypeID = 189 GROUP BY ContractId CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX ix_mintsk ON #MinTaskProduction([ContractId]); IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#MaxTaskProduction') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #MaxTaskProduction SELECT ContractId , MAX(CompletedOn) CompletedOn INTO #MaxTaskProduction FROM #temp WITH ( NOLOCK ) WHERE ((TaskTypeID =648 AND Outcome = 'CONTINUE') OR (TaskTypeID = 504 AND Outcome = 'CONTINUE') ) and status = 1 GROUP BY ContractId CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX ix_maxtskp ON #MaxTaskProduction([ContractId]); IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#MinTaskBackOffice') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #MinTaskBackOffice SELECT ContractId , MIN(createdon) createdon INTO #MinTaskBackOffice FROM #temp WITH ( NOLOCK ) WHERE TaskTypeID IN (894,870,876) GROUP BY ContractId CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX ix_mintskbo ON #MinTaskBackOffice([ContractId]); IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#MinAdvDate') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #MinAdvDate SELECT ContractId , MIN(a.AdvBeginDate) AdvBeginDate INTO #MinAdvDate FROM #selectedcontracts ct WITH ( NOLOCK ) join ContractProduct cp WITH ( NOLOCK ) on ct.ContractId = cp.RelatedContractID join Advertisement a WITH ( NOLOCK ) on cp.ID = a.ContractProductID GROUP BY ContractId CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX ix_mintskadv ON #MinAdvDate([ContractId]); IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#WebSiteAllProducts') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #WebSiteAllProducts SELECT DISTINCT contractid , pr.code AS prCode INTO #WebSiteAllProducts FROM #selectedcontracts ct JOIN ContractProduct cp WITH ( NOLOCK ) ON cp.RelatedContractID = ct.contractid JOIN Advertisement adv WITH ( NOLOCK ) ON adv.ContractProductID = cp.ID JOIN Product pr WITH ( NOLOCK ) ON pr.ID = adv.ProductID JOIN VersionSection vs WITH ( NOLOCK ) ON vs.ID = adv.VersionSectionID WHERE vs.MediumVersionID = 34 CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX ix_webs ON #WebSiteAllProducts([ContractId]); IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#WebSiteConcatProducts') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #WebSiteConcatProducts SELECT DISTINCT contractid , SUBSTRING(( SELECT ',' + prCode AS [text()] FROM #WebSiteAllProducts ins WHERE ins.contractid = ext.contractid ORDER BY prCode FOR XML PATH('') ), 2, 100) AS produdts INTO #WebSiteConcatProducts FROM #WebSiteAllProducts ext WITH ( NOLOCK ) CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX ix_webscn ON #WebSiteConcatProducts([ContractId]); IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#oldpaymentmethod') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #oldpaymentmethod SELECT ContractId, paymentDescription = max(pt.Description) into #oldpaymentmethod FROM #selectedcontracts ct join Contract c on ct.ContractId = c.id JOIN contractproduct cp ON c.id = cp.RelatedContractID JOIN PaymentMethod pm ON pm.ID = cp.PaymentMethodID JOIN PaymentMethodType pt ON pt.ID = pm.PaymentMethodTypeID group by ContractId CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX ix_woldpm ON #oldpaymentmethod([ContractId]); IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#results') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #results SELECT * INTO #results FROM ( SELECT [BP Κωδικός] = bp.code , [BP Επωνυμία] = bp.BrandName , [BP Διακριτικός Τίτλος] = bp.Name , [Πωλητής] = LTRIM(RTRIM('[' + u.SalesCode + ']' + u.LastName + ' ' + u.FirstName)) , [Κανάλι Πώλησης] = ISNULL(cht.DESCRIPTION, '') , [Κωδ. Συμβολαίου] = ct.id , [Συνδρομητικό Ν/Ο] = case when ct.IsSubscriptionBased = 0 then 'OXI' else 'ΝΑΙ' end, [Ανανέωση Συνδρομητικών] = CASE WHEN ct.OrigionalContractID IS NOT NULL AND ct.OriginalContractType = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END , [Κατάσταση Συμβολαίου] = ( CASE Ct.State WHEN 0 THEN 'Pending' WHEN 1 THEN 'Approved' WHEN 2 THEN 'Rejected' WHEN 3 THEN 'Cancelled' WHEN 4 THEN 'Replaced' WHEN 5 THEN 'CancelledOffer' WHEN 6 THEN 'Modified' END ) , [Ποσό Συμβολαίου] = CAST(ctpr.ContractPrice AS MONEY) , [Καθαρό Ποσό PPC] = CAST(ctpr.PPC_xo_amount AS MONEY) , [Ποσό Εκκρεμών Προβολών] = CAST(ctp.ContractPrice AS MONEY) , [Προκαταβολή] = CAST(SUM(advp.AdvancedPayment) AS MONEY), [Ρόλος] = CASE WHEN ts.status = 1 AND ts.TaskTypeID = 934 AND ts.Outcome is null THEN 'ACS/Collection' WHEN ts.status = 1 AND ts.TaskTypeID = 956 AND ts.Outcome is null THEN 'DocuSign' WHEN ts.status = 1 THEN 'Completed' when ts.status is null then 'Συνδρομητικό' ELSE rld.Description END , [Ημ/νια Υπογραφής Συμβολαίου] = CONVERT(NVARCHAR(15), ct.SignedDate, 103) , [Ημ/νια Δημιουργίας Συμβολαίου] = CONVERT(NVARCHAR(15), ct.CreatedOn, 103) , [Πρώτη Ημ/νια Παραγωγής] = CONVERT(NVARCHAR(15), mtp.createdon, 103) , [Τελευταία Ημ/νια Παραγωγής] = CONVERT(NVARCHAR(15), mtp2.CompletedOn, 103) , [Διαφορά Ημερομηνιών] = DATEDIFF(dd, ct.CreatedOn, mtp.createdon) , [Ημ/νία Έναρξης Τιμολόγησης σε EBS] = CONVERT(NVARCHAR(15), ct.EBSFirstInvoiceDate, 103) , [Τρόπος Πληρωμής] = ctpm.paymentDescription , [Διαφορά Ημερομηνιών2] = DATEDIFF(dd, ct.SignedDate, GETDATE()), [Προϊόντα WebSite] = wpr.produdts , [Πρώτη Ημ/νια BackOffice] = CONVERT(NVARCHAR(15), mtb.CreatedOn, 103) , ISNULL(ct.CampaignID, r.CampaignID) AS CampaignID FROM #selectedcontracts selct join dbo.Contract ct WITH ( NOLOCK ) on selct.ContractId = ct.ID LEFT JOIN #MinTaskProduction mtp WITH ( NOLOCK ) ON mtp.ContractId = ct.id LEFT JOIN #MaxTaskProduction mtp2 WITH ( NOLOCK ) ON mtp2.ContractId = ct.id LEFT JOIN #MinTaskBackOffice mtb WITH ( NOLOCK ) ON mtb.ContractId = ct.id LEFT JOIN #WebSiteConcatProducts wpr WITH ( NOLOCK ) ON wpr.contractid = ct.id LEFT JOIN #temp r WITH ( NOLOCK ) ON r.ContractId=ct.id left JOIN #MaxTask mxo WITH ( NOLOCK ) ON mxo.ContractId=ct.id left join Task ts WITH ( NOLOCK )on ts.id = mxo.Taskid left join [Role] rld WITH ( NOLOCK )on rld.id = ts.ActualRoleID left JOIN #CtPrice ctp WITH ( NOLOCK ) ON ctp.ContractID = ct.id ----------------------left join #temp tmp WITH ( NOLOCK ) ON tmp.CampaignID = ct.CampaignID JOIN #RltCt ctpr WITH ( NOLOCK ) ON ctpr.RelatedContractId = ct.id -- JOIN #advp advp WITH ( NOLOCK ) ON ct.ID = advp.RelatedContractID -- JOIN dbo.[User] u WITH ( NOLOCK ) ON ct.SalesManID = u.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.ChannelType cht WITH ( NOLOCK ) ON ct.channeltypeid = cht.id--un.ChannelTypeID = cht.ID JOIN dbo.BusinessPoint bp WITH ( NOLOCK ) ON ct.ActualBPOwnerID = bp.ID join #campaigns cmp on ISNULL(ISNULL(ct.CampaignID, r.CampaignID), -1) = cmp.value left join #oldpaymentmethod ctpm on ctpm.ContractId = ct.ID WHERE ct.State <> 3 AND ct.type IN ( 0, 2, 3, 4 ) GROUP BY bp.code , bp.Name , bp.BrandName , cht.Description , ctp.ContractPrice, ct.id , ct.State , rld.Description, ts.Status, ts.Outcome, ts.TaskTypeID, ctpr.ContractPrice , ct.OrigionalContractID , ct.OriginalContractType , u.SalesCode , u.LastName , u.FirstName , ct.CreatedOn , ct.SignedDate , mtp.createdon , mtp2.CompletedOn , mtb.CreatedOn , wpr.produdts , ct.CampaignID , r.CampaignID , ct.EBSFirstInvoiceDate , ctpr.PPC_xo_amount, ctpm.paymentDescription, ct.IsSubscriptionBased UNION SELECT [BP Κωδικός] = bp.code , [BP Επωνυμία] = bp.BrandName , [BP Διακριτικός Τίτλος] = bp.Name , [Πωλητής] = LTRIM(RTRIM('[' + u.SalesCode + ']' + u.LastName + ' ' + u.FirstName)) , [Κανάλι Πώλησης] = ISNULL(cht.DESCRIPTION, '') , [Κωδ. Συμβολαίου] = ct.id , [Συνδρομητικό Ν/Ο] = case when ct.IsSubscriptionBased = 0 then 'OXI' else 'ΝΑΙ' end, [Ανανέωση Συνδρομητικών] = CASE WHEN ct.OrigionalContractID IS NOT NULL AND ct.OriginalContractType = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END , [Κατάσταση Συμβολαίου] = ( CASE Ct.State WHEN 0 THEN 'Pending' WHEN 1 THEN 'Approved' WHEN 2 THEN 'Rejected' WHEN 3 THEN 'Cancelled' WHEN 4 THEN 'Replaced' WHEN 5 THEN 'CancelledOffer' WHEN 6 THEN 'Modified' END ) , [Ποσό Συμβολαίου] = CAST(ctpr.ContractPrice AS MONEY) , [Καθαρό Ποσό PPC] = CAST(ctpr.PPC_xo_amount AS MONEY) , [Ποσό Εκκρεμών Προβολών] = CAST(ctp.ContractPrice AS MONEY) , [Προκαταβολή] = CAST (advp.Amount AS MONEY), [Ρόλος] = CASE WHEN ts.status = 1 AND ts.TaskTypeID = 934 AND ts.Outcome is null THEN 'ACS/Collection' WHEN ts.status = 1 AND ts.TaskTypeID = 956 AND ts.Outcome is null THEN 'DocuSign' --Added for DEV-14497 (used for DocuSign) WHEN ts.status = 1 THEN 'Completed' WHEN ts.status is null THEN 'Συνδρομητικό' ELSE rld.Description END , [Ημ/νια Υπογραφής Συμβολαίου] = CONVERT(NVARCHAR(15), ct.SignedDate, 103) , [Ημ/νια Δημιουργίας Συμβολαίου] = CONVERT(NVARCHAR(15), ct.CreatedOn, 103) , [Πρώτη Ημ/νια Παραγωγής] = CONVERT(NVARCHAR(15), mtp.createdon, 103) , [Τελευταία Ημ/νια Παραγωγής] = CONVERT(NVARCHAR(15), mtp2.CompletedOn, 103) , [Διαφορά Ημερομηνιών] = DATEDIFF(dd, ct.CreatedOn, mtp.createdon) , [Ημ/νία Έναρξης Τιμολόγησης σε EBS] = CONVERT(NVARCHAR(15), ct.EBSFirstInvoiceDate, 103) , [Τρόπος Πληρωμής] = pt.Description , [Διαφορά Ημερομηνιών2] = DATEDIFF(dd, ct.SignedDate, GETDATE()), [Προϊόντα WebSite] = wpr.produdts , [Πρώτη Ημ/νια BackOffice] = CONVERT(NVARCHAR(15), mtb.CreatedOn, 103) , ISNULL(ct.CampaignID, r.CampaignID) AS CampaignID FROM #selectedcontracts selct join dbo.Contract ct WITH ( NOLOCK ) on selct.ContractId = ct.ID LEFT JOIN #MinTaskProduction mtp WITH ( NOLOCK ) ON mtp.ContractId = ct.id LEFT JOIN #MaxTaskProduction mtp2 WITH ( NOLOCK ) ON mtp2.ContractId = ct.id LEFT JOIN #MinTaskBackOffice mtb WITH ( NOLOCK ) ON mtb.ContractId = ct.id LEFT JOIN #WebSiteConcatProducts wpr WITH ( NOLOCK ) ON wpr.contractid = ct.id LEFT JOIN #temp r ON r.ContractId=ct.id left JOIN #MaxTask mxo WITH ( NOLOCK ) ON mxo.ContractId=ct.id left join Task ts WITH ( NOLOCK ) on ts.id = mxo.Taskid left join [Role] rld WITH ( NOLOCK ) on rld.id = ts.ActualRoleID left JOIN #CtPrice ctp WITH ( NOLOCK ) ON ctp.ContractID = ct.id -----------------left join #temp tmp WITH ( NOLOCK ) ON tmp.CampaignID = ct.CampaignID JOIN #RltCt ctpr WITH ( NOLOCK ) ON ctpr.RelatedContractId = ct.id--- JOIN dbo.InvoicePaymentMethod ipm WITH ( NOLOCK )ON ct.ID = ipm.id--- LEFT JOIN dbo.AdvancedPaymentMethod advp WITH ( NOLOCK )ON ct.id = advp.id JOIN dbo.[User] u ON ct.SalesManID = u.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.ChannelType cht WITH ( NOLOCK )ON ct.channeltypeid = cht.id--un.ChannelTypeID = cht.ID JOIN dbo.BusinessPoint bp WITH ( NOLOCK )ON ct.ActualBPOwnerID = bp.ID join #campaigns cmp on ISNULL(ISNULL(ct.CampaignID, r.CampaignID), -1) = cmp.value left join PaymentMethodType pt ON pt.ID = ipm.PaymentMethodTypeID WHERE ct.State NOT IN (3,10,11) AND ct.type IN ( 0, 2, 3, 4 ) GROUP BY bp.code , bp.Name , bp.BrandName , cht.Description , ctp.ContractPrice, ct.id , ct.State , rld.Description, ts.Status, ts.Outcome, ts.TaskTypeID, ctpr.ContractPrice , advp.Amount , ct.OrigionalContractID , ct.OriginalContractType , u.SalesCode , u.LastName , u.FirstName , ct.CreatedOn , ct.SignedDate , mtp.createdon , mtp2.Completedon , mtb.CreatedOn , wpr.produdts , ct.CampaignID , r.CampaignID , ct.EBSFirstInvoiceDate , ctpr.PPC_xo_amount, pt.Description, ct.IsSubscriptionBased ) aa CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX ix_reslt ON #results([Κωδ. Συμβολαίου]); SELECT ( CASE WHEN ( '[' + Code + '] ' + Name ) IS NULL THEN '(κενή)' ELSE '[' + Code + '] ' + Name END ) AS Καμπάνια , t.* , convert(nvarchar(20),ma.AdvBeginDate,103) as AdvBeginDate --into #aaa FROM #results t join #MinAdvDate ma on t.[Κωδ. Συμβολαίου] = ma.ContractId LEFT JOIN dbo.Campaign a ON a.id = t.CampaignID --WHERE [Κωδ. Συμβολαίου] IN (2067624,2067406,2067330,2067603) --where t.Ρόλος = 'Συνδρομητικό' ORDER BY 1,2 --select distinct a.[Ρόλος] from #aaa a DROP TABLE #temp DROP TABLE #MinTaskProduction DROP TABLE #MaxTask DROP TABLE #MaxTaskProduction DROP TABLE #MinTaskBackOffice DROP TABLE #WebSiteAllProducts DROP TABLE #WebSiteConcatProducts DROP TABLE #MinAdvDate DROP TABLE #CtPrice DROP TABLE #RltCt DROP TABLE #advp DROP TABLE #campaigns DROP TABLE #selectedcontracts DROP TABLE #oldpaymentmethod

templates.name: Αναλυτική Κατάσταση Συμβολαίων Ανά Καμπάνια - Campaign DS
templates.sql: SELECT ID, '[' + Code + '] ' + Name AS Description, CreatedOn FROM Campaign UNION SELECT -1 AS Expr1, '(κενή)' AS Expr2, GETDATE() AS Expr3 WHERE ( NOT @dateFrom IS NULL ) AND ( NOT @dateTo IS NULL ) ORDER BY CreatedOn DESC

templates.name: Αναφορά Αιτημάτων Διόρθωσης Προβολής xo.gr V2 - Report An Error Dataset
templates.source: rdl:Αναφορά Αιτημάτων Διόρθωσης Προβολής xo.gr V2:ReportAnErrorDataset
templates.sql: --DECLARE --@FromDate datetime, --@ToDate datetime, --@BusinessPointCode nvarchar(50), --@BusinessNameOld nvarchar(50), --@UserType nvarchar(50), --@PhoneOld nvarchar(50), --@MobileOld nvarchar(50), --@status int,--->changed parameter name from state to status --@SuggestsDeletion nvarchar(50), --@id nvarchar(50), --@Outcome nvarchar(50), --@NewBusinessPointCodes nvarchar(50), --@UserEmail nvarchar(500), --@RelativeBusinessPointCode nvarchar(10), --@HeadingOld nvarchar(50), --@Activity nvarchar(50); -- SET @FromDate ='2020-01-28' -- SET @todate ='2020-06-18' -- --SET @PhoneOld =null -- --SET @MobileOld =null -- --SET @id = 78393 -- --SET @BusinessPointCode =null -- --SET @BusinessNameOld =null -- --SET @UserEmail = 'test'; -- SET @Outcome='NULL' -- SET @NewBusinessPointCodes = 0 -- SET @status = 1 --->changed name according to declare -- SET @SuggestsDeletion ='Όχι' -- SET @UserType ='Ιδιοκτήτης' IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#t') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #t IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#beforet') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #beforet ;with casetask as (select c.ID as caseID,u.UserName as lastModifiedUser,isnull(t.CompletedOn,t.SavedOn) as lastModifiedDate from [yps].[dbo].[case] c join [yps].[dbo].task t on t.CaseID = c.ID join [yps].[dbo].[user] u on t.ActualOwnerID = u.ID where t.ID = (select max(tt.ID) from [yps].[dbo].[case] c1 join [yps].[dbo].task tt on c1.ID = tt.CaseID where c.ID = c1.ID and isnull(tt.CompletedOn,tt.SavedOn) is not null and tt.TaskTypeID in (236,237,238) ) ) ,taskt as (select c.id as caseID,min(t.[Status]) as casestatus from [yps].[dbo].[Case] c join [yps].[dbo].task t on t.CaseID = c.ID where t.TaskTypeID in (236,237,238) group by c.ID ) SELECT distinct [ErrorFormID] = rae.Id, [BusinessPointIdentificationID] = bpi.ID, [Κωδικός Αιτήματος] = rae.ID, [Ημ/νία – Ώρα Υποβολής] = rae.CreatedOn, [Κωδικός Επιχ. Σημείου] = rae.BusinessPointCode, [Επωνυμία Επιχείρησης] = rae.BusinessNameOld, [Επωνυμία Επιχείρησης (ΝΕΑ)] = CASE WHEN ISNULL(rae.BusinessNameOld,'') = ISNULL(rae.BusinessNameNew,'') THEN null ELSE rae.BusinessNameNew END , [Επαγγελματική Κατηγορία] = rae.HeadingOld, [Επαγγελματική Κατηγορία (ΝΕΑ)] = CASE WHEN ISNULL(rae.HeadingOld,'') = ISNULL(rae.HeadingNew,'') THEN null ELSE rae.HeadingNew END , [Επαγγελματική Δραστηριότητα] = rae.Activity, [Profile URL] = rae.ProfileUrl, [Τύπος Αιτούντα] = rae.UserType, [Ονοματεπώνυμο] = rae.UserFullName, [E-mail] = rae.UserEmail, [Σταθερό] = rae.PhoneOld, [Σταθερό (ΝΕΟ)] = CASE WHEN ISNULL(rae.PhoneOld,'') = ISNULL(rae.PhoneNew,'') THEN null WHEN ISNULL(rae.PhoneNew,'') = '' THEN '(διαγραφή)' ELSE rae.PhoneNew END , [Κινητό] = rae.MobileOld, [Κινητό (ΝΕΟ)] = CASE WHEN ISNULL(rae.MobileOld,'') = ISNULL(rae.MobileNew,'') THEN null WHEN ISNULL(rae.MobileNew,'') = '' THEN '(διαγραφή)' ELSE rae.MobileNew END , [MH.T.E.] = rae.MhteOld, [MH.T.E. (ΝΕΟ)] = rae.MhteNew, [Φαξ] = rae.FaxOld, [Φαξ (ΝΕΟ)] = CASE WHEN ISNULL(rae.FaxOld,'') = ISNULL(rae.FaxNew,'') THEN null WHEN ISNULL(rae.FaxNew,'') = '' THEN '(διαγραφή)' ELSE rae.FaxNew END , [Διεύθυνση Επιχείρησης] = rae.AddressOld, [Διεύθυνση Επιχείρησης (ΝΕΑ)] = CASE WHEN ISNULL(rae.AddressOld,'') = ISNULL(rae.AddressNew,'') THEN null ELSE rae.AddressNew END , [Γεωγραφικό Στίγμα] = rae.GeographicalPositionUrl, [Αφορά Διαγραφή Προβολής] = rae.SuggestsDeletion, [Λόγος Διαγραφής] = rae.DeletionReason, [Άλλος Λόγος] = rae.Comments, [Κατάσταση Αιτήματος] = tt.caseStatus,---->c.State, [Εσωτερικός Χρήστης XO.GR] = case when ct.lastModifiedDate is not null then ct.lastModifiedUser else null end , [Ημ/νία - 'Ωρα Tελευταίας Επεξεργασίας] = ct.lastModifiedDate, [Σχετικό ΕΣ] = bpi.NewBusinessPointCodes, [Εξειδίκευση/ Ανταγωνιστικό Πλεονέκτημα] = rae.SpecializationOld, [Εξειδίκευση/ Ανταγωνιστικό Πλεονέκτημα (ΝΕΟ)] = rae.SpecializationNew, [Λέξεις-Κλειδιά] = rae.KeywordsOld, [Λέξεις-Κλειδιά (ΝΕΟ)] = rae.KeywordsNew, cid = c.id, ttCaseStatus = tt.caseStatus, bpiNewBusinessPointCodes = bpi.NewBusinessPointCodes into #beforet FROM [ITAPPS].[rae].[ReportErrorForm] rae JOIN [yps].[dbo].[BusinessPointIdentification] bpi ON bpi.ID = rae.BusinessPointIdentificationId JOIN [yps].[dbo].[Case] c ON c.ContextEntityID = bpi.id AND c.ContextEntityType ='BPI' LEFT JOIN casetask ct ON ct.caseID = c.ID LEFT JOIN taskt tt ON tt.caseID = c.ID where (cast(rae.CreatedOn as date) >= ISNULL(@FromDate,'2019-09-25') AND cast(rae.CreatedOn as date) <= ISNULL( @ToDate,GETDATE()+1)) and ISNULL(rae.SuggestsDeletion, 'NULL') in (@SuggestsDeletion) and (rae.UserType in( @UserType) ) AND (rae.BusinessNameOld LIKE '%' + @BusinessNameOld + '%' or @BusinessNameOld is null) and (rae.BusinessPointCode = @BusinessPointCode or @BusinessPointCode is null) and (rae.PhoneOld = @PhoneOld or rae.PhoneNew = @PhoneOld or @PhoneOld is null) and (rae.MobileOld = @MobileOld or rae.MobileNew = @MobileOld or @MobileOld is null) and (cast(rae.id as nvarchar(50)) like @id +'%' or @id is null) AND (rae.UserEmail LIKE '%'+@UserEmail+'%' OR LTRIM(rtrim(isnull(@UserEmail,''))) = '') and (rae.HeadingOld like '%' + @HeadingOld + '%' or @HeadingOld is null) and (rae.Activity like '%' + @Activity + '%' or @Activity is null) IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#beforet1') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #beforet1 select * , [Σχόλια Εσωτερικού Χρήστη XO.GR] = yps.dbo.fn_CaseCommentConcat(cID) INTO #BEFORET1 from #beforet join yps.dbo.casecomment cc on cid = cc.CaseID union all select * , [Σχόλια Εσωτερικού Χρήστη XO.GR] = '' from #beforet left join yps.dbo.casecomment cc on cid = cc.CaseID where cc.ID is null SELECT *, [Απόφαση] = (select top 1 Outcome from [yps].dbo.task t where t.CaseID = cID and t.TaskTypeID in (236,237) and ttcaseStatus = 1 order by id desc) --->changed c.State to ct.Status INTO #T FROM #BEFORET1 WHERE ( ttcaseStatus in (@status) AND ----->changed c.State to ct.Status ((CASE WHEN LEN(ISNULL(bpiNewBusinessPointCodes,''))=0 THEN 0 ELSE 1 END) in ( @NewBusinessPointCodes)) and (bpiNewBusinessPointCodes like '%' + @RelativeBusinessPointCode + '%' or @RelativeBusinessPointCode is null) ) --select * from #t IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#temp') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #temp select * into #temp from #t t where isnull(t.Απόφαση, 'NULL') in (@Outcome) --select * from #temp ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#attrsplit') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #attrsplit SELECT t.ErrorFormID, a.AttributeID, FO.ITEM INTO #attrsplit FROM #temp t join ITApps.rae.ReportErrorFormAttribute a on t.ErrorFormID = a.ErrorFormID and a.BusinessPointIdentificationID = t.BusinessPointIdentificationID cross apply (select * from yps.dbo.SplitString(a.AttributeValueIDOld, '||')) as fO IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#temp2Old') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #temp2Old select distinct t.ErrorFormID, [AttributeGroupName] = ag.NameGR, [ValueName] = avO.NameGR into #temp2Old from #attrsplit T join ITApps.heading.Attribute atr on atr.ID = T.AttributeID join ITApps.heading.AttributeGroup ag on ag.ID = atr.AttributeGroupID join ITApps.heading.AttributeValue avO on T.Item = avO.ID --select * from #temp2Old IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#attrsplit2') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #attrsplit2 SELECT t.ErrorFormID, a.AttributeID, FO.ITEM INTO #attrsplit2 FROM #temp t join ITApps.rae.ReportErrorFormAttribute a on t.ErrorFormID = a.ErrorFormID and a.BusinessPointIdentificationID = t.BusinessPointIdentificationID cross apply (select * from yps.dbo.SplitString(a.AttributeValueID, '||')) as fO IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#temp2New') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #temp2New select distinct t.ErrorFormID, [AttributeGroupName] = ag.NameGR, [ValueName] = av.NameGR into #temp2New from #attrsplit2 t join ITApps.heading.Attribute atr on atr.ID = T.AttributeID join ITApps.heading.AttributeGroup ag on ag.ID = atr.AttributeGroupID join ITApps.heading.AttributeValue av on T.Item = av.ID join ITApps.heading.AttrValueAttribute ava on ava.AttributeID = atr.ID and ava.AttributeValueID = av.ID --select * from #temp2New --where ErrorFormID = 78257 ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#temp3Old') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #temp3Old select t.ErrorFormID, t.AttributeGroupName, [ValuesOld] = SUBSTRING(( SELECT ','+t2.ValueName from #temp2Old t2 WHERE t2.ErrorFormID = t.ErrorFormID and t2.AttributeGroupName = t.AttributeGroupName FOR XML PATH ('') ), 2, 1000 ) into #temp3Old from #temp2Old t group by t.ErrorFormID,t.AttributeGroupName --select * from #temp3Old IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#temp3New') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #temp3New select t.ErrorFormID, [AttributeGroupName] = concat(t.AttributeGroupName, ' (ΝΕΟ)'), [ValuesNew] = SUBSTRING(( SELECT ','+t2.ValueName from #temp2New t2 WHERE t2.ErrorFormID = t.ErrorFormID and t2.AttributeGroupName = t.AttributeGroupName FOR XML PATH ('') ), 2, 1000 ) into #temp3New from #temp2New t group by t.ErrorFormID,t.AttributeGroupName --select * from #temp3New ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#temp4Old') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #temp4Old SELECT * into #temp4Old FROM ( select * from #temp3Old ) AS TempTbl PIVOT ( max(ValuesOld) FOR TempTbl.[AttributeGroupName] IN ( [Brands],[Άθλημα],[Αριθμός δωματίων],[Αριθμός θέσεων],[Αστέρια Ξενοδοχείων],[Ασφαλιστικά ταμεία],[Δευτέρα],[Διαδικασία-μέθοδοι],[Δικαιοδοσία],[Δικηγορικός σύλλογος], [Δυνατότητα εξυπηρέτησης],[Εγκατάσταση],[Ειδικές προσφορές],[Είδος],[Είδος δωματίων],[Εξετάσεις],[Εξοπλισμός],[Εκπαιδευτική ειδίκευση],[Έτος Ίδρυσης],[Θέμα], [Ιατρική Εξειδίκευση],[Κλειδιά για Ενοικιαζόμενα Δωμάτια],[Κοντινά Αξιοθέατα],[Κουζίνα],[Κυριακή],[Λόγος επίσκεψης],[Μαθήματα],[Μάρκα βενζίνης],[Μενού],[Μέση τιμή παραγγελίας], [Μήνες λειτουργίας],[Νομική Εξειδίκευση],[Νόμισμα],[Γλώσσες Εκμάθησης],[Ομάδα εξυπηρέτησης],[Παιδικοί ήρωες],[Παρασκευή],[Παροχές δωματίου],[Πέμπτη],[Πιάτα / σπεσιαλιτέ], [Προϊόντα],[Προορισμοί],[Σάββατο],[Λογιστική Τάξη],[Τετάρτη],[Τρίτη],[Τρόποι πληρωμής],[Τύπος],[Τύπος δραστηριότητας],[Υλικό], [Υπηρεσίες-παροχές],[Υπόθεση],[Υψηλή περίοδος],[Χαμηλή περίοδος],[Εκπαιδευτικό πρόγραμμα],[Ώρα άφιξης],[Ώρα αναχώρησης],[Θεματολογία],[Ειδικότητα]--,[Εξειδίκευση/ Ανταγωνιστικό Πλεονέκτημα] ) ) AS PivotTable; --select * from #temp4Old IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#temp4New') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #temp4New SELECT * into #temp4New FROM ( select * from #temp3New ) AS TempTbl PIVOT ( max(ValuesNew) FOR TempTbl.[AttributeGroupName] IN ( [Brands (ΝΕΟ)], [Άθλημα (ΝΕΟ)], [Αριθμός δωματίων (ΝΕΟ)], [Αριθμός θέσεων (ΝΕΟ)], [Αστέρια Ξενοδοχείων (ΝΕΟ)], [Ασφαλιστικά ταμεία (ΝΕΟ)], [Γλώσσες Εκμάθησης (ΝΕΟ)], [Δευτέρα (ΝΕΟ)], [Διαδικασία-μέθοδοι (ΝΕΟ)], [Δικαιοδοσία (ΝΕΟ)], [Δικηγορικός σύλλογος (ΝΕΟ)], [Δυνατότητα εξυπηρέτησης (ΝΕΟ)], [Εγκατάσταση (ΝΕΟ)], [Ειδικές προσφορές (ΝΕΟ)], [Ειδικότητα (ΝΕΟ)], [Είδος (ΝΕΟ)], [Είδος δωματίων (ΝΕΟ)], [Εκπαιδευτική ειδίκευση (ΝΕΟ)], [Εκπαιδευτικό πρόγραμμα (ΝΕΟ)], [Εξετάσεις (ΝΕΟ)], [Εξοπλισμός (ΝΕΟ)], [Έτος Ίδρυσης (ΝΕΟ)], [Θέμα (ΝΕΟ)], [Θεματολογία (ΝΕΟ)], [Ιατρική Εξειδίκευση (ΝΕΟ)], [Κλειδιά για Ενοικιαζόμενα Δωμάτια (ΝΕΟ)], [Κοντινά Αξιοθέατα (ΝΕΟ)],
