templates.name: Αναφορά Αιτημάτων Δωρεάν Καταχώρησης XO.gr V2 - Data Set1
templates.source: rdl:Αναφορά Αιτημάτων Δωρεάν Καταχώρησης XO.gr V2:DataSet1
templates.sql: --declare @ID int --= 47543; --declare @DateFrom datetime = '2020-01-26' --declare @DateTo datetime = GETDATE()+1 --declare @BpCode nvarchar; --declare @Phone nvarchar; --declare @BpName nvarchar; --declare @FullName nvarchar; --declare @Status int; --declare @Outcome nvarchar; --declare @Email nvarchar; -- SET @ID = null -- SET @DateFrom = '2020-01-01' -- SET @DateTo = '2020-07-01' -- SET @BpCode = null -- SET @BpName = null -- SET @Phone = null -- SET @FullName = null -- SET @Email = null -- SET @Status = null -- SET @Outcome = nul --CaseTask Table --> needed for #view IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#CaseTask') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #CaseTask; SELECT c.ID AS caseID, u.UserName AS lastModifiedUser, ISNULL(t.CompletedOn,t.SavedOn) AS lastModifiedDate INTO #CaseTask FROM yps.dbo.[case] c JOIN yps.dbo.task t ON t.CaseID = c.ID JOIN yps.dbo.[user] u ON t.ActualOwnerID = u.ID WHERE t.TaskTypeID IN (236,237,238,239) AND t.ID = (SELECT MAX(tt.ID) FROM yps.dbo.[case] c1 JOIN yps.dbo.task tt ON c1.ID = tt.CaseID WHERE c.ID = c1.ID AND ISNULL(tt.CompletedOn,tt.SavedOn) IS NOT NULL AND tt.TaskTypeID IN (236,237,238,239)) --TempTable #view IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#viewTEMP') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #viewTEMP; SELECT BusinessPointIdetificationID = BPI.ID, TaskActualOwnerName = ct.lastModifiedUser, TaskCompletedOn = ct.lastModifiedDate, Comments = cm.CommentText INTO #viewTEMP FROM ITAPPS.rae.FreeListingForm flf JOIN yps.dbo.BusinessPointIdentification bpi ON flf.BusinessPointIdentificationId = bpi.id JOIN yps.dbo.[case] c on BPI.ID = c.contextentityid and c.contextentitytype = 'bpi' left join yps.dbo.CaseComment cm on cm.CaseID = c.ID LEFT JOIN #CaseTask ct on ct.caseid = c.id where cast(flf.CreatedOn as date) >= ISNULL(@DateFrom,'2010-01-01') and cast(flf.CreatedOn as date) <= ISNULL(@DateTo,GETDATE()+1) IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#view') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #view; SELECT BusinessPointIdetificationID , TaskActualOwnerName , TaskCompletedOn , CaseComments = SUBSTRING( ( SELECT v1.Comments AS [text()] FROM #viewTEMP v1 WHERE v1.BusinessPointIdetificationID = v2.BusinessPointIdetificationID ORDER BY v1.TaskCompletedOn FOR XML PATH ('') ) , 1, 1000) INTO #view FROM #viewTEMP v2 IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#temp') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #temp SELECT [Κωδικός Αιτήματος] = flf.Id, [Ημ/νία – Ώρα Υποβολής] = flf.CreatedOn, [ΚΕΣ] = CASE WHEN t.Outcome = 'Ναι' THEN bp.code ELSE null END, [Εμπορική Επωνυμία - Brand Name] = flf.BusinessName, [Κύριο Τηλέφωνο] = flf.Phone, [Κινητό] = flf.Mobile, [Φαξ] = flf.Fax, [Οδός - Αριθμός] = flf.[Address], [Τ.Κ.] = flf.PostCode, [Νομός] = flf.Prefecture, [Πόλη - Περιοχή] = flf.City, [Δραστηριότητα] = flf.Activity, [Αντιστοίχιση Κατηγορίας] = flf.Heading, [MH.T.E.] = flf.MHTE, [Ονοματεπώνυμο] = flf.UserFullName, [Ιδιότητα] = flf.[UserPosition], [Τηλέφωνο] = flf.UserContactPhone, [E-mail] = flf.UserEmail, [Website] = flf.UserWebsite, [Αποδοχή Ενημερώσεων] = CASE WHEN flf.AcceptedInfo = 1 THEN 'Ναι' ELSE 'Όχι' END, [Κατάσταση Αιτήματος] = CASE WHEN t.Status = 1 THEN 'Ολοκληρωμένο' else 'Ανοιχτό' END, [Απόφαση] = CASE WHEN t.Outcome is null THEN '-' WHEN t.Outcome = 'Ναι' THEN 'Ναι' ELSE 'Όχι' END, [Εσωτερικός Χρήστης XO.GR]= v.TaskActualOwnerName , [Ημ/νία – Ώρα τελευταίας Επεξεργασίας] = v.TaskCompletedOn, [Σχόλια Εσωτερικού Χρήστη XO.GR] = v.CaseComments , [Εξειδίκευση/ Ανταγωνιστικό Πλεονέκτημα] =flf.Specialization, [FreeListingFormID] = flf.Id, [Λέξεις-Κλειδιά] = flf.Keywords , [bpiId] = v.BusinessPointIdetificationID , [caseID] = cs.ID into #temp FROM #view v JOIN yps.dbo.BusinessPointConfirmationHistory bpc ON bpc.BusinessPointIdentificationID = v.BusinessPointIdetificationID JOIN ITAPPS.rae.FreeListingForm flf ON flf.BusinessPointIdentificationId = V.BusinessPointIdetificationID JOIN yps.dbo.[case] cs ON cs.ContextEntityID=v.BusinessPointIdetificationID and cs.ContextEntityType = 'BPI' JOIN yps.dbo.Task t ON t.caseID = cs.id JOIN yps.dbo.BusinessPoint bp ON bp.id=bpc.BusinessPointID left join yps.dbo.Task ta on ta.CaseID = cs.ID and ta.ID = (SELECT MAX(tt.ID) FROM yps.dbo.[case] cc JOIN yps.dbo.task tt ON cc.ID = tt.CaseID WHERE cc.ID = cs.ID AND ISNULL(tt.CompletedOn,tt.SavedOn) IS NOT NULL AND tt.TaskTypeID IN (236,237,238,239)) left join yps.dbo.[User] u on u.ID = ta.ActualOwnerID WHERE t.SenderID = 2434 and t.TaskTypeID = 239 and (flf.ID in (@ID) OR @ID is Null) and cast(flf.CreatedOn as date) >= ISNULL(@DateFrom,'2010-01-01') and cast(flf.CreatedOn as date) <= ISNULL(@DateTo,GETDATE()+1) and (bp.code in (@BpCode) or @BpCode is null ) and (flf.BusinessName like '%'+@BpName+'%' or @BpName is null ) and (flf.Phone like '%'+@Phone+'%' or flf.Mobile like '%'+@Phone+'%' or flf.Fax like '%'+@Phone+'%' or @Phone is null ) and (flf.UserFullName like '%'+@FullName+'%' or @FullName is null ) and (flf.UserEmail like '%'+@Email+'%' or @Email is null ) and (t.[status] in (@Status) OR @Status is Null) and (ISNULL(t.Outcome,'-') in (@Outcome) OR @Outcome is null) IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#temp2') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #temp2 select t.FreeListingFormID, [AttributeGroupName] = ag.NameGR, a.AttributeValueID, f.Item, av.NameGR into #temp2 from #temp t join ITApps.rae.FreeListingFormAttribute a on t.FreeListingFormID = a.FreeListingFormID and t.bpiId = a.BusinessPointIdentificationID join ITApps.heading.Attribute atr on atr.ID = a.AttributeID join ITApps.heading.AttributeGroup ag on ag.ID = atr.AttributeGroupID cross apply (select * from yps.dbo.SplitString(a.AttributeValueID, '||')) as f join ITApps.heading.AttributeValue av on f.Item = av.ID IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#temp3') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #temp3 SELECT * into #temp3 FROM ( select t.FreeListingFormID, t.AttributeGroupName, SUBSTRING(( SELECT ','+t2.NameGR from #temp2 t2 WHERE t2.FreeListingFormID = t.FreeListingFormID and t2.AttributeGroupName = t.AttributeGroupName and t2.AttributeValueID = t.AttributeValueID FOR XML PATH ('') ), 2, 1000 ) [Values] from #temp2 t group by t.FreeListingFormID,t.AttributeGroupName, t.AttributeValueID ) AS TempTbl PIVOT ( max([Values]) FOR TempTbl.[AttributeGroupName] IN ( [Brands],[Άθλημα],[Αριθμός δωματίων],[Αριθμός θέσεων],[Αστέρια Ξενοδοχείων],[Ασφαλιστικά ταμεία],[Δευτέρα],[Διαδικασία-μέθοδοι],[Δικαιοδοσία],[Δικηγορικός σύλλογος], [Δυνατότητα εξυπηρέτησης],[Εγκατάσταση],[Ειδικές προσφορές],[Είδος],[Είδος δωματίων],[Εξετάσεις],[Εξοπλισμός],[Εκπαιδευτική ειδίκευση],[Έτος Ίδρυσης],[Θέμα], [Ιατρική Εξειδίκευση],[Κλειδιά για Ενοικιαζόμενα Δωμάτια],[Κοντινά Αξιοθέατα],[Κουζίνα],[Κυριακή],[Λόγος επίσκεψης],[Μαθήματα],[Μάρκα βενζίνης],[Μενού],[Μέση τιμή παραγγελίας], [Μήνες λειτουργίας],[Νομική Εξειδίκευση],[Νόμισμα],[Γλώσσες Εκμάθησης],[Ομάδα εξυπηρέτησης],[Παιδικοί ήρωες],[Παρασκευή],[Παροχές δωματίου],[Πέμπτη],[Πιάτα / σπεσιαλιτέ], [Προϊόντα],[Προορισμοί],[Σάββατο],[Λογιστική Τάξη],[Τετάρτη],[Τρίτη],[Τρόποι πληρωμής],[Τύπος],[Τύπος δραστηριότητας],[Υλικό], [Υπηρεσίες-παροχές],[Υπόθεση],[Υψηλή περίοδος],[Χαμηλή περίοδος],[Εκπαιδευτικό πρόγραμμα],[Ώρα άφιξης],[Ώρα αναχώρησης],[Θεματολογία],[Ειδικότητα]--,[Εξειδίκευση/ Ανταγωνιστικό Πλεονέκτημα] ) ) AS PivotTable; select [Κωδικός Αιτήματος],[Ημ/νία – Ώρα Υποβολής],[ΚΕΣ],[Εμπορική Επωνυμία - Brand Name], [Κύριο Τηλέφωνο],[Κινητό],[Φαξ],[Οδός - Αριθμός],[Τ.Κ.],[Νομός],[Πόλη - Περιοχή], [Δραστηριότητα],[Αντιστοίχιση Κατηγορίας],[MH.T.E.],[Ονοματεπώνυμο],[Ιδιότητα],[Τηλέφωνο], [E-mail],[Website],[Αποδοχή Ενημερώσεων],[Κατάσταση Αιτήματος],[Απόφαση],[Εσωτερικός Χρήστης XO.GR], [Ημ/νία – Ώρα τελευταίας Επεξεργασίας],[Σχόλια Εσωτερικού Χρήστη XO.GR], [Brands],[Άθλημα],[Αριθμός δωματίων],[Αριθμός θέσεων],[Αστέρια Ξενοδοχείων],[Ασφαλιστικά ταμεία],[Δευτέρα],[Διαδικασία-μέθοδοι],[Δικαιοδοσία],[Δικηγορικός σύλλογος], [Δυνατότητα εξυπηρέτησης],[Εγκατάσταση],[Ειδικές προσφορές],[Είδος],[Είδος δωματίων],[Εξετάσεις],[Εξοπλισμός],[Εκπαιδευτική ειδίκευση],[Έτος Ίδρυσης],[Θέμα], [Ιατρική Εξειδίκευση],[Κλειδιά για Ενοικιαζόμενα Δωμάτια],[Κοντινά Αξιοθέατα],[Κουζίνα],[Κυριακή],[Λόγος επίσκεψης],[Μαθήματα],[Μάρκα βενζίνης],[Μενού],[Μέση τιμή παραγγελίας], [Μήνες λειτουργίας],[Νομική Εξειδίκευση],[Νόμισμα],[Γλώσσες Εκμάθησης],[Ομάδα εξυπηρέτησης],[Παιδικοί ήρωες],[Παρασκευή],[Παροχές δωματίου],[Πέμπτη],[Πιάτα / σπεσιαλιτέ], [Προϊόντα],[Προορισμοί],[Σάββατο],[Λογιστική Τάξη],[Τετάρτη],[Τρίτη],[Τρόποι πληρωμής],[Τύπος],[Τύπος δραστηριότητας],[Υλικό], [Υπηρεσίες-παροχές],[Υπόθεση],[Υψηλή περίοδος],[Χαμηλή περίοδος],[Εκπαιδευτικό πρόγραμμα],[Ώρα άφιξης],[Ώρα αναχώρησης],[Θεματολογία],[Ειδικότητα] ,[Εξειδίκευση/ Ανταγωνιστικό Πλεονέκτημα],[Λέξεις-Κλειδιά] from #temp t left join #temp3 t3 on t.FreeListingFormID = t3.FreeListingFormID

templates.name: Αναφορά Βάσης Δεδομένων - Επικαιροποιήσεις - Report DS
templates.sql: ;WITH SourceTable AS ( SELECT CampaignCode = cm.Code , CampaignName = cm.Name , ActionDate = case when BPIdent.BPIdentId is null and tgiv.BPIdentityConfirmed = 1 then 'ΠΡΟ ΑΝΑΒΑΘΜΙΣΗΣ' else cast(Month(BPIdent.ActionDate) as varchar(2)) + '/' + cast(Year(BPIdent.ActionDate) as varchar(4)) end , LossPrintedNew = CASE LossPrintedNew WHEN 0 THEN 'ΝΕΟΙ' WHEN 1 THEN 'ΠΡΟΤΥΠ/ΝΟΙ' WHEN 2 THEN 'ΑΠΩΛΕΙΑ' END , ContractIndicator = CASE WHEN ContractID IS NULL THEN 'ΧΩΡΙΣ ΣΥΜΒΟΛΑΙΟ' ELSE 'ΜΕ ΣΥΜΒΟΛΑΙΟ' END , IdentityConfirmed = CASE WHEN BPIdent.BPIdentId IS NULL AND tgiv.BPIdentityConfirmed = 0 THEN 'ΧΩΡΙΣ ΕΠΙΚΑΙΡΟΠΟΙΗΣΗ' WHEN BPIdent.BPIdentId IS NULL AND tgiv.BPIdentityConfirmed = 1 THEN 'ΜΕ ΕΠΙΚΑΙΡΟΠΟΙΗΣΗ' ELSE 'ΜΕ ΕΠΙΚΑΙΡΟΠΟΙΗΣΗ' END , DateSorting = case when BPIdent.BPIdentId is null and tgiv.BPIdentityConfirmed = 1 then 0 else 1 end FROM dbo.Campaign cm JOIN dbo.TargetGroupItem tgi ON cm.ID = tgi.CampaignID JOIN dbo.TargetGroupItemValue tgiv ON tgi.ID = tgiv.TargetGroupItemID AND cm.SelectedAllocationPlanID = tgiv.CampaignAllocationPlanID LEFT JOIN dbo.Contract ct ON tgiv.ContractID = ct.ID AND ct.State in (1,6) and ct.type in (0,2,4) LEFT JOIN (SELECT BPIdentId = bpch.ID, ActionDate = bpch.TIMESTAMP, TgivId = cs.ContextEntityID FROM dbo.Task t JOIN dbo.[Case] cs ON t.CaseID = cs.ID JOIN BusinessPointConfirmationHistory bpch ON t.ID = bpch.TaskID WHERE cs.ContextEntityType = 'tgiv' ) BPIdent ON BPIdent.TgivId = tgiv.ID WHERE cm.ID IN (@CampaignId) --AND ContractID IS NOT NULL --AND bpch.ID IS NULL --AND tgiv.BPIdentityConfirmed = 1 ) SELECT CampaignCode, CampaignName, ActionDate, IdentityConfirmed, DateSorting, LossPrintedNew, ContractIndicator, IdentityConfCounts = COUNT(*) FROM SourceTable GROUP BY CampaignCode, CampaignName, ActionDate, LossPrintedNew, ContractIndicator, IdentityConfirmed, DateSorting ORDER BY 1, 2, 5, 6, 7

templates.name: Αναφορά Βάσης Δεδομένων - Επικαιροποιήσεις - Campaign DS
templates.sql: SELECT cm.id AS CamapignId, '[' + cm.code + '] ' + cm.name AS CampaignDesc FROM campaign AS cm

templates.name: Αναφορά Επικαιροποίησης ΕΣ Συνεργαζόμενων Εταιρειών - Users
templates.sql: SELECT u.id, u.LastName FROM dbo.UserRole AS ur JOIN dbo.[User] AS u ON ur.UserID = u.ID WHERE RoleID = 580 /* Συνεργαζόμενες Εταιρείες */

templates.name: Αναφορά Επικαιροποίησης ΕΣ Συνεργαζόμενων Εταιρειών - Broader Areas
templates.sql: SELECT CAST('0' AS VARCHAR(10)) AS BroaderAreaID, 'Xωρίς Νομό' AS AreaName UNION ALL SELECT CAST(BroaderAreaID AS NVARCHAR(10)) AS BroaderAreaID, AreaName FROM dbo.BroaderAreaLookUp WHERE BroaderAreaID LIKE 'E%' ORDER BY 2

templates.name: Αναφορά Συνδρομητικών Συμβολαίων - Contracts DS
templates.sql: WITH reportdata AS ( SELECT [ΚΩΔΙΚΟΣ ΕΣ] = bp.Code, [ΚΩΔΙΚΟΣ ΣΥΜΒΟΛΑΙΟΥ] = c.ID, [ΚΑΜΠΑΝΙΑ] = ISNULL('[' + cm.Code + '] ' + cm.Name,''), [ΠΩΛΗΤΗΣ] = RTRIM('[' + u.salescode + '] ' + u.LastName + ' ' + u.FirstName), [ΗΜ. ΥΠΟΓΡΑΦΗΣ] = CAST(C.SignedDate AS DATE), [ΚΑΤΑΣΤΑΣΗ ΣΥΜΒΟΛΑΙΟΥ] = CASE C.State WHEN 0 THEN 'Pending' WHEN 1 THEN 'Approved' WHEN 2 THEN 'Rejected' WHEN 3 THEN 'Cancelled' WHEN 4 THEN 'Replaced' WHEN 5 THEN 'CancelledOffer' WHEN 6 THEN 'Modified' END, [ΜΙΝ START DATE] = CAST(AllSub.CBeginDate AS DATE), [MAX END DATE] = CAST(AllSub.CEndDate AS DATE), [ΣΥΝΔΡΟΜΗΤΙΚΗ ΑΞΙΑ ΣΥΜΒΟΛΑΙΟΥ] = AllSub.SubAdvPrice, [ΑΝΑΝΕΩΣΙΜΟ - ΜΙΝ START DATE] = CAST(Renewable.CBeginDate AS DATE), [ΑΝΑΝΕΩΣΙΜΟ - MAX END DATE] = CAST(Renewable.CEndDate AS DATE), [ΑΝΑΝΕΩΣΙΜΟ - ΣΥΝΔΡΟΜΗΤΙΚΗ ΑΞΙΑ ΣΥΜΒΟΛΑΙΟΥ] = Renewable.SubAdvPrice, --APO AUTOMATH ANANEWSH [ΗΜ. ΔΗΜΙΟΥΡΓΙΑΣ] = CAST(C.CreatedOn AS DATE), [ΣΥΜΒΟΛΑΙΟ-ΠΗΓΗ] = CASE WHEN c.OrigionalContractID IS NULL AND c.OriginalContractType IS NULL THEN '' ELSE c.OrigionalContractID END , [ΠΩΛΗΤΗΣ-ΠΗΓΗ] = CASE WHEN c.OrigionalContractID IS NULL AND c.OriginalContractType IS NULL THEN '' ELSE RTRIM('[' + sourceu.salescode + '] ' + sourceu.LastName + ' ' + sourceu.FirstName) END, [AutoCreated] = CASE WHEN c.OrigionalContractID IS NOT NULL AND c.OriginalContractType = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END FROM dbo.Contract c LEFT JOIN dbo.[User] U ON c.SalesManID = U.ID JOIN dbo.BusinessPoint bp ON c.ActualBPOwnerID = bp.ID JOIN ( SELECT RelatedContractID, MIN(ADV.AdvBeginDate) CBeginDate, MAX(ISNULL(cp.InterruptionDate,ADV.AdvEndDate)) CEndDate, SUM(CASE WHEN cp.state IN (3,4) AND adv.AlteredAmount IS NOT NULL THEN adv.AlteredAmount else adv.Price - adv.RulesDiscount - adv.Discount end) SubAdvPrice FROM dbo.Advertisement adv JOIN dbo.ContractProduct cp ON adv.ContractProductID = cp.ID WHERE adv.IsSubscriptionBased = 1 GROUP BY RelatedContractID ) AllSub ON AllSub.RelatedContractID = c.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT RelatedContractID, MIN(ADV.AdvBeginDate) CBeginDate, MAX(ISNULL(cp.InterruptionDate,ADV.AdvEndDate)) CEndDate, SUM(CASE WHEN cp.state IN (3,4) AND adv.AlteredAmount IS NOT NULL THEN adv.AlteredAmount else adv.Price - adv.RulesDiscount - adv.Discount end) SubAdvPrice FROM dbo.Advertisement adv JOIN dbo.ContractProduct cp ON adv.ContractProductID = cp.ID WHERE adv.IsSubscriptionBased = 1 AND cp.IsRenewable = 1 GROUP BY RelatedContractID ) Renewable ON Renewable.RelatedContractID = c.id LEFT JOIN dbo.Campaign CM ON C.CampaignID = CM.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.Contract sourcec ON sourcec.ID = c.OrigionalContractID LEFT JOIN dbo.[User] sourceu ON sourcec.SalesManID = sourceu.ID where (c.type in (0,2,3,4)) ) SELECT * FROM reportdata WHERE AutoCreated = @AutoCreated ORDER BY [ΚΩΔΙΚΟΣ ΣΥΜΒΟΛΑΙΟΥ]

templates.name: Αποτελέσματα Κλήσεων ανά Καμπάνια Dialer - Main
templates.sql: IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#CurrentTask') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #CurrentTask select dbp.BusinessPointCode ,CurPrTl.Outcome ,CurPrTl.Timestamp ,CurPrTl.Text ,CurPrT.id as ts_id ,CurCs.id as cs_id into #CurrentTask from DialerTask dt join DialerBusinessPoint dbp on dt.BusinessPointID = dbp.BusinessPointID join Task CurTs on dt.CurrentTaskID = CurTs.ID -- current Task join [Case] CurCs on CurCs.ID = CurTs.CaseID -- current Case join [Case] CurMcs on CurCs.MasterCaseID = CurMcs.ID -- MasterCase join Task CurPrT on Curmcs.ID = CurPrT.CaseID -- all tasks under the MasterCase join TargetGroupItemValue tgiv on tgiv.ID = CurMcs.ContextEntityID and CurMcs.ContextEntityType = 'TGIV' left join TaskLog CurPrTl on CurPrTl.TaskID = CurPrT.id where dt.DialerCampaignID = @Campaign and CurPrTl.Timestamp >= dt.ExportDate -- and dbp.BusinessPointCode in (1003919)--select * from dialercampaign and (CurPrT.TaskTypeID in (146,151,154,313,173,258,299,307) --all tasktypes that can result to outcomes 'ΑΔΥΝ','ΑΡΝΕ','ΑΡΝ','Επανάκληση' and CurPrTl.Outcome in ('ΑΔΥΝ','ΑΡΝΕ','ΑΡΝ','Επανάκληση'/*,'ΑΠΟΔΠ','ΑΝΣΥ'*/) and CurPrTl.Outcome is not null and CurPrTl.Text is not null) or (dt.DialerCampaignID = @Campaign -- and dbp.BusinessPointCode in (1003919) and (CurPrT.TaskTypeID in (146,151,154,313,173,258,299,307) --all tasktypes that can result to outcomes 'ΑΔΥΝ','ΑΡΝΕ','ΑΡΝ','Επανάκληση' and CurPrTl.Outcome in ('ΑΠΟΔΠ','ΑΝΣΥ') and CurPrTl.Outcome is not null )) --and tgiv.ContractID is null --contracts --select * from #CurrentTask --select * from TaskLog tl where tl.TaskID = 10608094 --select * from Task t where t.ID = 10862785 --select distinct tl.Outcome from TaskLog tl where tl.DMTable = '1065' --All cases with Ranking IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#aa') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #aa select BusinessPointCode ,Outcome ,Timestamp ,Text ,ts_id ,cs_id ,RANK() over (partition by BusinessPointCode order by ts_id) as TaskRnk ,RANK() over (partition by BusinessPointCode/*ts_id*/ order by timestamp) as DateRnk into #aa from #CurrentTask--#aai --select * from #aa where BusinessPointCode =1976495 IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#bbi') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #bbi --Max Tasks select aa.BusinessPointCode, aa.cs_id, MAX(TaskRnk) as TaskRnk--, --MAX(DateRnk) as DateRnk --DateRnk into #bbi from #aa aa group by aa.BusinessPointCode, aa.cs_id--, --DateRnk --select * from #bbi --Previous Task IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#bbi2') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #bbi2 select aa.BusinessPointCode, aa.cs_id, MAX(TaskRnk)-1 as TaskRnk--, --MAX(DateRnk) as DateRnk --DateRnk into #bbi2 from #aa aa group by aa.BusinessPointCode, aa.cs_id--, --select * from #bbi2 IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#bb') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #bb --Max dates select aa.BusinessPointCode, aa.cs_id, aa.TaskRnk, MAX(#aa.DateRnk) as DateRnk into #bb from #bbi aa join #aa on #aa.BusinessPointCode = aa.BusinessPointCode and #aa.TaskRnk = aa.TaskRnk group by aa.BusinessPointCode, aa.cs_id, aa.TaskRnk --select * from #bb IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#tmp') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #tmp select distinct --dbp.BusinessPointCode bp.Code as 'Κωδ. ΕΣ' ,bp.Name as 'Διακριτικος ΕΣ' ,bp.BrandName as 'Φορολογική Επωνυμία ΕΣ' ,'['+usr.SalesCode+'] '+usr.LastName +' '+ usr.FirstName as 'ΣΔ' ,case when aa.Outcome = 'ΑΔΥΝ' and aa.Text = 'Fax' then aaa.Outcome--previous task when aa.Outcome = 'ΑΔΥΝ' and aa.Text = 'Δεν απαντά' then aaa.Outcome when aa.Outcome = 'ΑΔΥΝ' and aa.Text = 'Επανάκληση' then aaa.Outcome when aa.Outcome = 'ΑΔΥΝ' and aa.Text = 'Τηλεφωνητής' then aaa.Outcome when aa.Outcome = 'ΑΡΝ' and aa.Text = 'Fax' then aaa.Outcome when aa.Outcome = 'ΑΡΝ' and aa.Text = 'Άμεση άρνηση' then aaa.Outcome when aa.Outcome = 'ΑΡΝ' and aa.Text = 'Δεν απαντά' then aaa.Outcome when aa.Outcome = 'ΑΡΝ' and aa.Text = 'Επανάκληση' then aaa.Outcome when aa.Outcome = 'ΑΡΝ' and aa.Text = 'Τηλεφωνητής' then aaa.Outcome when aa.Outcome = 'ΑΡΝ' and aa.Text = 'Κόλλημα Συμβούλου' then aaa.Outcome when aa.Outcome = 'Επανάκληση' and aa.Text = 'Επανάκληση' then aaa.Outcome when aa.Outcome = 'Επανάκληση' and aa.Text = 'Κόλλημα Συμβούλου' then aaa.Outcome when aa.Outcome = 'Επανάκληση' and aa.Text = '' then aaa.Outcome when aa.Outcome = 'Επανάκληση' and aa.Text = '-' then aaa.Outcome when aa.Outcome = 'Επανάκληση' and aa.Text IS null then aaa.Outcome--previous task end-- when aa.Outcome = 'ΑΔΥΝ' then 'Αδυναμία εύρεσης πελάτη' when aa.Outcome = 'ΑΡΝ' then 'Άρνηση συνεργασίας' when aa.Outcome = 'ΑΡΝΕ' then 'Άρνηση επικοινωνίας' when /*tgiv.AltOfferID IS Not null*/ aa.Outcome = 'ΑΠΟΔΠ' OR aa.Outcome = 'ΑΝΣΥ' then 'Αποδοχή Πρότασης' else aa.Outcome end as 'Αποτέλεσμα Κλήσης' ,case --when tgiv.AltOfferID IS Not null then null when aa.Outcome = 'ΑΔΥΝ' and aa.Text = 'Fax' then aaa.Text--previous task when aa.Outcome = 'ΑΔΥΝ' and aa.Text = 'Δεν απαντά' then aaa.Text when aa.Outcome = 'ΑΔΥΝ' and aa.Text = 'Επανάκληση' then aaa.Text when aa.Outcome = 'ΑΔΥΝ' and aa.Text = 'Τηλεφωνητής' then aaa.Text when aa.Outcome = 'ΑΡΝ' and aa.Text = 'Fax' then aaa.Text when aa.Outcome = 'ΑΡΝ' and aa.Text = 'Άμεση άρνηση' then aaa.Text when aa.Outcome = 'ΑΡΝ' and aa.Text = 'Δεν απαντά' then aaa.Text when aa.Outcome = 'ΑΡΝ' and aa.Text = 'Επανάκληση' then aaa.Text when aa.Outcome = 'ΑΡΝ' and aa.Text = 'Τηλεφωνητής' then aaa.Text when aa.Outcome = 'ΑΡΝ' and aa.Text = 'Κόλλημα Συμβούλου' then aaa.Text when aa.Outcome = 'Επανάκληση' and aa.Text = 'Επανάκληση' then aaa.Text when aa.Outcome = 'Επανάκληση' and aa.Text = 'Κόλλημα Συμβούλου' then aaa.Text when aa.Outcome = 'Επανάκληση' and aa.Text = '' then aaa.Text when aa.Outcome = 'Επανάκληση' and aa.Text = '-' then aaa.Text when aa.Outcome = 'Επανάκληση' and aa.Text IS null then aaa.Text--previous task end-- --when aa.Outcome = 'ΑΔΥΝ' then 'Αδυναμία εύρεσης πελάτη' --when aa.Outcome = 'ΑΡΝ' then 'Άρνηση συνεργασίας' --when aa.Outcome = 'ΑΡΝΕ' then 'Άρνηση επικοινωνίας' else aa.text end as 'Αιτία Αποτελέσματος' ,case when tgiv.AltOfferID IS Not null then null when aa.Outcome = 'ΑΔΥΝ' and aa.Text = 'Fax' and aaa.Outcome = 'Επανάκληση' then null--previous task when aa.Outcome = 'ΑΔΥΝ' and aa.Text = 'Δεν απαντά' and aaa.Outcome = 'Επανάκληση' then null when aa.Outcome = 'ΑΔΥΝ' and aa.Text = 'Επανάκληση' and aaa.Outcome = 'Επανάκληση' then null when aa.Outcome = 'ΑΔΥΝ' and aa.Text = 'Τηλεφωνητής' and aaa.Outcome = 'Επανάκληση' then null when aa.Outcome = 'ΑΡΝ' and aa.Text = 'Fax' and aaa.Outcome = 'Επανάκληση' then null when aa.Outcome = 'ΑΡΝ' and aa.Text = 'Άμεση άρνηση' and aaa.Outcome = 'Επανάκληση' then null when aa.Outcome = 'ΑΡΝ' and aa.Text = 'Δεν απαντά' and aaa.Outcome = 'Επανάκληση' then null when aa.Outcome = 'ΑΡΝ' and aa.Text = 'Επανάκληση' and aaa.Outcome = 'Επανάκληση' then null when aa.Outcome = 'ΑΡΝ' and aa.Text = 'Τηλεφωνητής' and aaa.Outcome = 'Επανάκληση' then null when aa.Outcome = 'ΑΡΝ' and aa.Text = 'Κόλλημα Συμβούλου' and aaa.Outcome = 'Επανάκληση' then null when aa.Outcome = 'Επανάκληση' and aa.Text = 'Επανάκληση' and aaa.Outcome = 'Επανάκληση' then null when aa.Outcome = 'Επανάκληση' and aa.Text = 'Κόλλημα Συμβούλου' and aaa.Outcome = 'Επανάκληση' then null when aa.Outcome = 'Επανάκληση' and aa.Text = '' and aaa.Outcome = 'Επανάκληση' then null when aa.Outcome = 'Επανάκληση' and aa.Text = '-' and aaa.Outcome = 'Επανάκληση' then null when aa.Outcome = 'Επανάκληση' and aa.Text IS null and aaa.Outcome = 'Επανάκληση' then null when aa.Outcome = 'Επανάκληση' and aa.Text IN ('Άλλαξε Γνώμη ο Πελάτης','Θα το σκεφτεί','Έλειπε ο υπεύθυνος') then tgiv.RecallTime else null end as 'Ημ/νια Τελ. Επανάκλησης' ,case when aa.Outcome = 'ΑΔΥΝ' and aa.Text = 'Fax' then aaa.Timestamp--previous task when aa.Outcome = 'ΑΔΥΝ' and aa.Text = 'Δεν απαντά' then aaa.Timestamp when aa.Outcome = 'ΑΔΥΝ' and aa.Text = 'Επανάκληση' then aaa.Timestamp when aa.Outcome = 'ΑΔΥΝ' and aa.Text = 'Τηλεφωνητής' then aaa.Timestamp when aa.Outcome = 'ΑΡΝ' and aa.Text = 'Fax' then aaa.Timestamp when aa.Outcome = 'ΑΡΝ' and aa.Text = 'Άμεση άρνηση' then aaa.Timestamp when aa.Outcome = 'ΑΡΝ' and aa.Text = 'Δεν απαντά' then aaa.Timestamp when aa.Outcome = 'ΑΡΝ' and aa.Text = 'Επανάκληση' then aaa.Timestamp when aa.Outcome = 'ΑΡΝ' and aa.Text = 'Τηλεφωνητής' then aaa.Timestamp when aa.Outcome = 'ΑΡΝ' and aa.Text = 'Κόλλημα Συμβούλου' then aaa.Timestamp when aa.Outcome = 'Επανάκληση' and aa.Text = 'Επανάκληση' then aaa.Timestamp when aa.Outcome = 'Επανάκληση' and aa.Text = 'Κόλλημα Συμβούλου' then aaa.Timestamp when aa.Outcome = 'Επανάκληση' and aa.Text = '' then aaa.Timestamp when aa.Outcome = 'Επανάκληση' and aa.Text = '-' then aaa.Timestamp when aa.Outcome = 'Επανάκληση' and aa.Text IS null then aaa.Timestamp--previous task end-- when aa.Outcome = 'ΑΔΥΝ' then aa.Timestamp when aa.Outcome = 'ΑΡΝ' then aa.Timestamp when aa.Outcome = 'ΑΡΝΕ' then aa.Timestamp when aa.Outcome = 'ΑΠΟΔΠ' OR aa.Outcome = 'ΑΝΣΥ' then aa.Timestamp else aa.Timestamp end as CreatedOn --,tgiv2.id --,tgiv.id,b.taskrnk,bb.taskrnk as bb_taskrnk,aa.ts_id, aaa.ts_id AS aaa_ts_id,tgiv2.RecallTime into #tmp from DialerTask dt join DialerBusinessPoint dbp on dbp.BusinessPointID = dt.BusinessPointID join BusinessPoint bp on bp.ID = dbp.BusinessPointID join #bb b on b.BusinessPointCode = dbp.BusinessPointCode join #AA aa on aa.cs_id = b.cs_id and aa.TaskRnk = b.TaskRnk and aa.DateRnk = b.DateRnk join Task tt on aa.ts_id = tt.id join [case] cc on cc.ID = tt.CaseID join TargetGroupItemValue tgiv on tgiv.ID = cc.ContextEntityID and cc.ContextEntityType = 'TGIV' join [User] usr on tt.ActualOwnerID = usr.id left join #bbi2 bb on bb.BusinessPointCode = bp.code left join #aa aaa on aaa.BusinessPointCode = bb.BusinessPointCode and aaa.TaskRnk = bb.TaskRnk and aaa.DateRnk <> b.DateRnk left join Task ttt on aaa.ts_id = ttt.id left join [case] ccc on ccc.ID = ttt.CaseID left join TargetGroupItemValue tgiv2 on tgiv2.ID = ccc.ContextEntityID and ccc.ContextEntityType = 'TGIV' left join [User] usr1 on ttt.ActualOwnerID = usr1.id --select * from #tmp select distinct[Κωδ. ΕΣ], [Διακριτικος ΕΣ], [Φορολογική Επωνυμία ΕΣ], [ΣΔ], Case when [Αποτέλεσμα Κλήσης] = 'ΑΔΥΝ' then 'Αδυναμία εύρεσης πελάτη' when [Αποτέλεσμα Κλήσης] = 'ΑΡΝ' then 'Άρνηση συνεργασίας' when [Αποτέλεσμα Κλήσης] = 'ΑΡΝΕ' then 'Άρνηση επικοινωνίας' when [Αποτέλεσμα Κλήσης] = 'ΑΝΣΥ' then 'Αναμονή Συμβολαίου' when [Αποτέλεσμα Κλήσης] = 'ΑΠΟΔΠ' then 'Αποδοχή Πρότασης' else [Αποτέλεσμα Κλήσης] end as 'Αποτέλεσμα Κλήσης', [Αιτία Αποτελέσματος] , [Ημ/νια Τελ. Επανάκλησης], CreatedOn from #tmp t where t.[Αποτέλεσμα Κλήσης] is not null and not exists (select 1 from #tmp t2 where t2.[Κωδ. ΕΣ] = t.[Κωδ. ΕΣ] and ((t2.[Αποτέλεσμα Κλήσης] = 'ΑΔΥΝ' and t2. [Αιτία Αποτελέσματος] = 'Fax') or (t2.[Αποτέλεσμα Κλήσης] = 'ΑΔΥΝ' and t2. [Αιτία Αποτελέσματος] = 'Δεν απαντά') or (t2.[Αποτέλεσμα Κλήσης] = 'ΑΔΥΝ' and t2. [Αιτία Αποτελέσματος] = 'Επανάκληση') or (t2.[Αποτέλεσμα Κλήσης] = 'ΑΔΥΝ' and t2. [Αιτία Αποτελέσματος] = 'Τηλεφωνητής') or (t2.[Αποτέλεσμα Κλήσης] = 'ΑΡΝ' and t2. [Αιτία Αποτελέσματος] = 'Τηλεφωνητής') or (t2.[Αποτέλεσμα Κλήσης] = 'ΑΡΝ' and t2. [Αιτία Αποτελέσματος] = 'Fax') or (t2.[Αποτέλεσμα Κλήσης] = 'ΑΡΝ' and t2. [Αιτία Αποτελέσματος] = 'Άμεση άρνηση') or (t2.[Αποτέλεσμα Κλήσης] = 'ΑΡΝ' and t2. [Αιτία Αποτελέσματος] = 'Δεν απαντά') or (t2.[Αποτέλεσμα Κλήσης] = 'ΑΡΝ' and t2. [Αιτία Αποτελέσματος] = 'Επανάκληση') or (t2.[Αποτέλεσμα Κλήσης] = 'ΑΡΝ' and t2. [Αιτία Αποτελέσματος] = 'Κόλλημα Συμβούλου') or (t2.[Αποτέλεσμα Κλήσης] = 'Επανάκληση' and t2. [Αιτία Αποτελέσματος] = 'Επανάκληση') or (t2.[Αποτέλεσμα Κλήσης] = 'Επανάκληση' and t2. [Αιτία Αποτελέσματος] = 'Κόλλημα Συμβούλου') or (t2.[Αποτέλεσμα Κλήσης] = 'Επανάκληση' and t2. [Αιτία Αποτελέσματος] = '') or (t2.[Αποτέλεσμα Κλήσης] = 'Επανάκληση' and t2. [Αιτία Αποτελέσματος] = '-') or (t2.[Αποτέλεσμα Κλήσης] = 'Επανάκληση' and t2. [Αιτία Αποτελέσματος] is null) )) --and cast(t.CreatedOn as DATE) not between '2015-05-01' and '2015-05-31' --order by createdOn --and [Κωδ. ΕΣ] = 57893 --order by 5--and t.[Αιτία Αποτελέσματος] is null --select * from #tmp t where t.[Αποτέλεσμα Κλήσης] is null where t.BusinessPointCode = 1675104 --select count(t.BusinessPointCode),t.BusinessPointCode -- from #temp1 t -- group by t.BusinessPointCode -- having count(t.BusinessPointCode)>1 --select dt.* -- from DialerTask dt -- join DialerBusinessPoint dbp on dt.BusinessPointID = dbp.BusinessPointID -- where dbp.BusinessPointCode = 36301--dt.CurrentTaskID = 11001745--dbp.BusinessPointCode = 36301--dt.BusinessPointID = 26250 ---- where --dt.DialerCampaignID = 327 -- select * from Task ts where ts.ID = 10364588 -- select * from [Case] cs where cs.ID = 9538357 -- select * -- from TargetGroupItemValue tgiv -- join [Case] cs on tgiv.ID = cs.ContextEntityID -- and cs.ContextEntityType = 'TGIV' -- join Task ts on cs.ID = ts.CaseID -- where ts.ID = 10364588 -- select distinct tt.id,tt.Description, tl.Outcome -- from DialerTask dt join Task t on dt.CurrentTaskID = t.id -- join [Case] cs on t.CaseID = cs.id -- join TargetGroupItemValue tgiv on tgiv.ID = cs.ContextEntityID and cs.ContextEntityType = 'TGIV' -- join TaskType tt on t.TaskTypeID = tt.id -- join TaskLog tl on t.ID = tl.TaskID --select * from TaskLog tl where tl.TaskID in (9291008, --9293121)

templates.name: Αποτελέσματα Κλήσεων ανά Καμπάνια Dialer - Data Set1
templates.sql: SELECT id, '[' + CONVERT(NVARCHAR(5), ID) + '] ' + Description AS Campaign FROM DialerCampaign

templates.name: Δείκτες Αποπληρωμής - Main DS
templates.sql: SET NOCOUNT ON; SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED; IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#detailed') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #detailed; IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#CloseAmountPTY') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #CloseAmountPTY; IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#CloseAmount') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #CloseAmount; IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#CloseAmountDates') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #CloseAmountDates; IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#indicator') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #indicator; IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#NotPaid') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #NotPaid; IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#CloseAmountSum') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #CloseAmountSum; IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#NotPaidSum') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #NotPaidSum; IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#NotExpired') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #NotExpired; IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#NotExpiredSum') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #NotExpiredSum; IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#a') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #a; -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- -- Υπολογίζει όλα τα παραστατικά που κλείνουν με 'ΠΤΥ' ή 'ΧΡΠ'-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- SELECT ESFILiquidityAccountEntryMatching.fOpenEntryGID AS fOpenEntryGID, sum(ESFILiquidityAccountEntryMatching.CloseCurrencyAmount )AS CloseCurrencyAmount into #CloseAmountPTY FROM ESFILiquidityAccountEntryMatching AS ESFILiquidityAccountEntryMatching INNER JOIN ESFILiquidityAccountEntry AS FK_ESFILiquidityAccountEntry_ESFILiquidityAccountEntryMatching ON ESFILiquidityAccountEntryMatching.fCloseEntryGID = FK_ESFILiquidityAccountEntry_ESFILiquidityAccountEntryMatching.GID INNER JOIN ESFILiquidityAccountEntry AS FK_ESFILiquidityAccountEntry_ESFILiquidityAccountEntryMatching1 ON ESFILiquidityAccountEntryMatching.fOpenEntryGID = FK_ESFILiquidityAccountEntry_ESFILiquidityAccountEntryMatching1.GID LEFT JOIN ESFILiquidityAccountEntry AS FK_ESFILiquidityAccountEntryMatching_ESFILiquidityAccountEntry_OI ON ESFILiquidityAccountEntryMatching.fOpenEntryGID = FK_ESFILiquidityAccountEntryMatching_ESFILiquidityAccountEntry_OI.GID LEFT JOIN ESFILiquidityAccountEntry AS FK_ESFILiquidityAccountEntryMatching_ESFILiquidityAccountEntry_CI ON ESFILiquidityAccountEntryMatching.fCloseEntryGID = FK_ESFILiquidityAccountEntryMatching_ESFILiquidityAccountEntry_CI.GID where left(FK_ESFILiquidityAccountEntryMatching_ESFILiquidityAccountEntry_CI.DocumentCode,3) in ('ΠΤΥ','ΧΡΠ') group by fOpenEntryGID --select * from #CloseAmountPTY ca where ca.DocumentCode1 ='ΤΠΥ-3-52701' -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- --Υπολογίζει τα παραστατικά που έχουν αντιστοίχιση------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- SELECT ESFILiquidityAccountEntryMatching.fOpenEntryGID AS fOpenEntryGID, sum(ESFILiquidityAccountEntryMatching.CloseCurrencyAmount )AS CloseCurrencyAmount into #CloseAmount FROM ESFILiquidityAccountEntryMatching AS ESFILiquidityAccountEntryMatching INNER JOIN ESFILiquidityAccountEntry AS FK_ESFILiquidityAccountEntry_ESFILiquidityAccountEntryMatching ON ESFILiquidityAccountEntryMatching.fCloseEntryGID = FK_ESFILiquidityAccountEntry_ESFILiquidityAccountEntryMatching.GID INNER JOIN ESFILiquidityAccountEntry AS FK_ESFILiquidityAccountEntry_ESFILiquidityAccountEntryMatching1 ON ESFILiquidityAccountEntryMatching.fOpenEntryGID = FK_ESFILiquidityAccountEntry_ESFILiquidityAccountEntryMatching1.GID LEFT JOIN ESFILiquidityAccountEntry AS FK_ESFILiquidityAccountEntryMatching_ESFILiquidityAccountEntry_OI ON ESFILiquidityAccountEntryMatching.fOpenEntryGID = FK_ESFILiquidityAccountEntryMatching_ESFILiquidityAccountEntry_OI.GID LEFT JOIN ESFILiquidityAccountEntry AS FK_ESFILiquidityAccountEntryMatching_ESFILiquidityAccountEntry_CI ON ESFILiquidityAccountEntryMatching.fCloseEntryGID = FK_ESFILiquidityAccountEntryMatching_ESFILiquidityAccountEntry_CI.GID group by fOpenEntryGID SELECT distinct ESFILiquidityAccountEntryMatching.fOpenEntryGID AS fOpenEntryGID, ESFILiquidityAccountEntryMatching.GID AS GID, trade.code, FK_ESFILiquidityAccountEntry_ESFILiquidityAccountEntryMatching1.DocumentCode AS DocumentCode1, FK_ESFILiquidityAccountEntry_ESFILiquidityAccountEntryMatching1.ValeurDate as XrewshValeur, FK_ESFILiquidityAccountEntry_ESFILiquidityAccountEntryMatching1.RegistrationDate as XrewshRegistration, ESFILiquidityAccountEntryMatching.CloseCurrencyAmount, FK_ESFILiquidityAccountEntryMatching_ESFILiquidityAccountEntry_CI.DocumentCode, FK_ESFILiquidityAccountEntryMatching_ESFILiquidityAccountEntry_CI.RegistrationDate as PistwshRegistration, FK_ESFILiquidityAccountEntry_ESFILiquidityAccountEntryMatching1.fDimension2Code into #CloseAmountDates FROM ESFILiquidityAccountEntryMatching AS ESFILiquidityAccountEntryMatching INNER JOIN ESFILiquidityAccountEntry AS FK_ESFILiquidityAccountEntry_ESFILiquidityAccountEntryMatching ON ESFILiquidityAccountEntryMatching.fCloseEntryGID = FK_ESFILiquidityAccountEntry_ESFILiquidityAccountEntryMatching.GID INNER JOIN ESFILiquidityAccountEntry AS FK_ESFILiquidityAccountEntry_ESFILiquidityAccountEntryMatching1 ON ESFILiquidityAccountEntryMatching.fOpenEntryGID = FK_ESFILiquidityAccountEntry_ESFILiquidityAccountEntryMatching1.GID join ESFITradeAccount trade on FK_ESFILiquidityAccountEntry_ESFILiquidityAccountEntryMatching1.fTradeAccountGID = trade.gid and trade.Type = 0 LEFT JOIN ESFILiquidityAccountEntry AS FK_ESFILiquidityAccountEntryMatching_ESFILiquidityAccountEntry_OI ON ESFILiquidityAccountEntryMatching.fOpenEntryGID = FK_ESFILiquidityAccountEntryMatching_ESFILiquidityAccountEntry_OI.GID LEFT JOIN ESFILiquidityAccountEntry AS FK_ESFILiquidityAccountEntryMatching_ESFILiquidityAccountEntry_CI ON ESFILiquidityAccountEntryMatching.fCloseEntryGID = FK_ESFILiquidityAccountEntryMatching_ESFILiquidityAccountEntry_CI.GID where FK_ESFILiquidityAccountEntry_ESFILiquidityAccountEntryMatching1.ValeurDate between @_FROM_DATECRITERIO and @_TO_DATECRITERIO and left(FK_ESFILiquidityAccountEntry_ESFILiquidityAccountEntryMatching1.DocumentCode,3) in ('ΤΠΥ','ΔΧΧ','ΜΕΤ','ΧΡΠ') and left(FK_ESFILiquidityAccountEntryMatching_ESFILiquidityAccountEntry_CI.DocumentCode,3) not in ('ΠΤΥ','ΧΡΠ') and left(FK_ESFILiquidityAccountEntryMatching_ESFILiquidityAccountEntry_CI.DocumentCode,4) not in ('ΠΤΥ','ΑΧΡΠ') and isnull(FK_ESFILiquidityAccountEntry_ESFILiquidityAccountEntryMatching1.fDimension2Code,'ΜΗ ΥΠΑΡΚΤΟΣ') in (@DocumentType) select sum(c.CloseCurrencyAmount) as CloseCurrencyAmount INTO #CloseAmountSum from #CloseAmountDates c SELECT distinct ESFILiquidityAccountEntry.GID AS ISUDGID, FK_ESFILiquidityAccountEntry_ESFITradeAccount.Code + ' - ' + FK_ESFILiquidityAccountEntry_ESFITradeAccount.Name AS Συναλλασσόμενος, ESFILiquidityAccountEntry.DocumentCode AS DocumentCode, ESFILiquidityAccountEntry.ValeurDate AS ValeurDate, ESFILiquidityAccountEntry.RegistrationDate AS RegistrationDate, PayableAmount = case when pty.CloseCurrencyAmount is not null then (case when left(ESFILiquidityAccountEntry.DocumentCode,3)in ('ΠΛΛ') then 0 else case ESFILiquidityAccountEntry.MatchingSign when 0 then ESFILiquidityAccountEntry.CurrencyValue else 0 end end) - pty.CloseCurrencyAmount else (case when left(ESFILiquidityAccountEntry.DocumentCode,3)in ('ΠΛΛ') then 0 else case ESFILiquidityAccountEntry.MatchingSign when 0 then ESFILiquidityAccountEntry.CurrencyValue else 0 end end) end , PaidAmount =case when pty.CloseCurrencyAmount is not null then oa.CloseCurrencyAmount - pty.CloseCurrencyAmount else oa.CloseCurrencyAmount end, LateAmount = case when ( case when ESFILiquidityAccountEntry.ValeurDate < @_REFERENCEDATE then(ESFILiquidityAccountEntry.CurrencyValue - ESFILiquidityAccountEntry.CurrencyClosedAmount) else 0 end)>0 and (case when left(ESFILiquidityAccountEntry.DocumentCode,3)='ΠΛΛ' then 0 else case ESFILiquidityAccountEntry.MatchingSign when 0 then ESFILiquidityAccountEntry.CurrencyValue else 0 end end)= 0 then 0 else (case when ESFILiquidityAccountEntry.ValeurDate < cast(getdate() as datetime) then case when ESFILiquidityAccountEntry.ValeurDate < @_REFERENCEDATE then(ESFILiquidityAccountEntry.CurrencyValue - ESFILiquidityAccountEntry.CurrencyClosedAmount) else 0 end else 0 end) end, -- Αν το lateAmount είναι μεγαλύτερο του 0 και το Payable είναι 0 τότε Late = 0 NotExpiredAmount = ( case when ESFILiquidityAccountEntry.ValeurDate >= @_REFERENCEDATE then(ESFILiquidityAccountEntry.CurrencyValue - ESFILiquidityAccountEntry.CurrencyClosedAmount) else 0 end), ESFILiquidityAccountEntry.fDocumentGID AS fDocumentGID, ESFILiquidityAccountEntry.fTradeAccountGID, ESFILiquidityAccountEntry.fDimension2Code into #Detailed FROM ESFILiquidityAccountEntry AS ESFILiquidityAccountEntry join ESFITradeAccount on ESFITradeAccount.GID = ESFILiquidityAccountEntry.fTradeAccountGID left join #CloseAmount oa on oa.fOpenEntryGID = ESFILiquidityAccountEntry.GID left join #CloseAmountPTY pty on pty.fOpenEntryGID = ESFILiquidityAccountEntry.GID LEFT JOIN ESFITradeAccount AS FK_ESFILiquidityAccountEntry_ESFITradeAccount ON ESFILiquidityAccountEntry.fTradeAccountGID = FK_ESFILiquidityAccountEntry_ESFITradeAccount.GID LEFT JOIN ESFINote AS FK_ESFILiquidityAccountEntry_ESFINote ON ESFILiquidityAccountEntry.fNoteGID = FK_ESFILiquidityAccountEntry_ESFINote.GID LEFT JOIN ESFILineItem AS AdjustmentLine ON ESFILiquidityAccountEntry.fDocumentLineGID = AdjustmentLine.GID AND 3 = AdjustmentLine.DocumentClass LEFT JOIN ESFIDocumentTrade AS TradeDocument ON ESFILiquidityAccountEntry.fDocumentGID = TradeDocument.GID LEFT JOIN ESFIDocumentCash AS CashDocument ON ESFILiquidityAccountEntry.fDocumentGID = CashDocument.GID LEFT JOIN ESGOSites AS FK_ESFILineItem_ESGOSites ON AdjustmentLine.fSiteGID = FK_ESFILineItem_ESGOSites.GID LEFT JOIN ESGOSites AS FK_ESGOSites_ESFIDocumentTrade_TradeAccountSite ON TradeDocument.fTradeAccountSiteGID = FK_ESGOSites_ESFIDocumentTrade_TradeAccountSite.GID LEFT JOIN ESGOSites AS FK_ESGOSites_ESFIDocumentCash_TradeAccountSite ON CashDocument.fTradeAccountSiteGID = FK_ESGOSites_ESFIDocumentCash_TradeAccountSite.GID WHERE ESFILiquidityAccountEntry.fCompanyCode = '001' AND ESFILiquidityAccountEntry.MatchingSign <> 2 AND ESFILiquidityAccountEntry.CancelState <> 1 AND ESFILiquidityAccountEntry.CancelState <> 2 and ESFITradeAccount.Type = 0 -- Returns customers and no suppliers AND (case when IsNull(FK_ESFILiquidityAccountEntry_ESFINote.Code,'A') <> 'A' then 1 when IsNull(FK_ESFILiquidityAccountEntry_ESFINote.Code,'A')= 'A' then 2 end = 2/*@Criterio*/ ) AND (Case 1 when 0 then ESFILiquidityAccountEntry.RegistrationDate when 1 then ESFILiquidityAccountEntry.ValeurDate end BETWEEN @_FROM_DATECRITERIO AND @_TO_DATECRITERIO) AND ((ESFILiquidityAccountEntry.Fullfilled IN (0/*@FULLFILLED_ITEM1*/,1/* @FULLFILLED_ITEM2*/))) ---- Λαμβάνουμε μόνο πελάτες που έχουν τιμολόγιο στην δεδομένη περίοδο and exists (select 1 from ESFILiquidityAccountEntry ie where ie.ValeurDate BETWEEN @_FROM_DATECRITERIO AND @_TO_DATECRITERIO and ie.fTradeAccountGID = ESFILiquidityAccountEntry.fTradeAccountGID and left(ie.DocumentCode,3)='ΤΠΥ') and left(ESFILiquidityAccountEntry.DocumentCode,3) in ('ΤΠΥ','ΔΧΧ','ΜΕΤ') --and not exists (select 1 from ) and isnull(ESFILiquidityAccountEntry.fDimension2Code,'ΜΗ ΥΠΑΡΚΤΟΣ') in (@DocumentType) --ΕΔΩ ΘΑ ΜΠΕΙ Η ΣΥΝΘΗΚΗ ΠΟΥ ΘΑ ΒΡΙΣΚΕΙ ΤΑ ΑΝΕΞΟΦΛΗΤΑ select d.* into #NotPaid from #Detailed d where isnull(d.LateAmount,0) >0 and d.ValeurDate < getdate() and d.[PayableAmount] > 0 -- μόνο τα παραστατικά που έχουν απαιτητό ποσό select sum(NotExpiredAmount) as NotExpiredAmount into #NotExpiredSum from #Detailed select sum(LateAmount) as LateAmount into #NotPaidSum from #NotPaid n select isnull(cl.CloseCurrencyAmount,0)+isnull(np.LateAmount,0)+isnull(ne.NotExpiredAmount,0) as 'Απαιτητό Ποσό',-- Απαιτητό μείον πιστωτικά isnull(cl.CloseCurrencyAmount,0) as 'Εξοφλημένο', isnull(np.LateAmount,0) as 'Ανεξόφλητο', isnull(ne.NotExpiredAmount,0) as 'Άληκτο'--, into #indicator from #detailed d cross join #NotPaidSum np cross join #CloseAmountSum cl cross join #NotExpiredSum ne select a.* into #a from ( --Εξοφλημένα select i.[Απαιτητό Ποσό], i.[Εξοφλημένο], i.[Ανεξόφλητο], i.[Άληκτο], case when isnull(i.Εξοφλημένο,0) = 0 then 0 else (datediff(day,XrewshValeur,PistwshRegistration) * CloseCurrencyAmount)/i.Εξοφλημένο end as 'Μέσος Χρόνος Εξόφλησης/Ημ.Λήξης', case when isnull(i.Εξοφλημένο,0) = 0 then 0 else (datediff(day,xrewshRegistration,PistwshRegistration) * CloseCurrencyAmount)/i.Εξοφλημένο end as 'Μέσος Χρόνος Εξόφλησης/Ημ.Έκδοσης' ,NULL as 'Μέσος Χρόνος Καθηστέρησης' ,XrewshValeur,PistwshRegistration,xrewshRegistration,CloseCurrencyAmount ,ca.DocumentCode1,ca.DocumentCode,ca.code,ca.fDimension2Code as 'Τύπος Παραστατικού', ca.fOpenEntryGID,ca.GID from #CloseAmountDates ca cross join #indicator i union -- Ανεξόφλητα select i.[Απαιτητό Ποσό], i.[Εξοφλημένο], i.[Ανεξόφλητο], i.[Άληκτο], null, null, case when i.Ανεξόφλητο = 0 then 0 else (datediff(day,ValeurDate,@_REFERENCEDATE)*d.LateAmount/i.Ανεξόφλητο) end as 'Μέσος Χρόνος Καθηστέρησης' ,ValeurDate,null,null,d.LateAmount ,d.DocumentCode,NULL,d.Συναλλασσόμενος,d.fDimension2Code,null,null from #NotPaid d cross join #indicator i )a select a.[Απαιτητό Ποσό], a.Εξοφλημένο, a.Ανεξόφλητο, a.Άληκτο, sum(a.[Μέσος Χρόνος Εξόφλησης/Ημ.Λήξης]) as 'Μέσος Χρόνος Εξόφλησης/Ημ.Λήξης', sum(a.[Μέσος Χρόνος Εξόφλησης/Ημ.Έκδοσης]) as 'Μέσος Χρόνος Εξόφλησης/Ημ.Έκδοσης', sum(a.[Μέσος Χρόνος Καθηστέρησης]) as 'Μέσος Χρόνος Καθηστέρησης' from #a a group by a.[Απαιτητό Ποσό], a.Εξοφλημένο, a.Ανεξόφλητο, a.Άληκτο

templates.name: Δείκτες Αποπληρωμής - Document Type
templates.sql: SELECT DISTINCT fDimension2Code AS DocumentType FROM ESFILiquidityAccountEntry AS e WHERE ( NOT fDimension2Code IS NULL ) UNION SELECT 'ΜΗ ΥΠΑΡΚΤΟΣ' AS Expr1

templates.name: Δεδομένα εφαρμογής [Διαχείριση ΕργατοΗμερών Πωλητών ανα Καμπάνια] - Data Set1
templates.source: rdl:Δεδομένα εφαρμογής [Διαχείριση ΕργατοΗμερών Πωλητών ανα Καμπάνια]:DataSet1
templates.sql: SELECT t.id, ( '[' + c.Code + '] ' + c.Name ) AS Καμπάνια, u.username AS [Πωλητής], u.SalesCode AS [κωδ. Πωλητή], u2.UserName AS [Supervisor], u2.SalesCode AS [κωδ. Supervisor], CONVERT(NVARCHAR(20), t.WorkingDate, 103) AS [Εργατοημέρα] FROM ITApps.wdc.WorkingDaysPerCampaign AS t JOIN yps.dbo.[User] AS u ON u.id = t.UserId JOIN yps.dbo.[User] AS u2 ON u2.id = t.SupervisorId JOIN yps.dbo.Campaign AS c ON t.CampaignId = c.ID WHERE c.id IN (@campaign) AND u.id IN (@user) ORDER BY 1

templates.name: Δεδομένα εφαρμογής [Διαχείριση ΕργατοΗμερών Πωλητών ανα Καμπάνια] - campaigns
templates.source: rdl:Δεδομένα εφαρμογής [Διαχείριση ΕργατοΗμερών Πωλητών ανα Καμπάνια]:campaigns
templates.sql: SELECT c.id, ( '[' + c.Code + '] ' + c.Name ) AS Καμπάνια FROM Campaign AS c

templates.name: Δεδομένα εφαρμογής [Διαχείριση ΕργατοΗμερών Πωλητών ανα Καμπάνια] - users
templates.source: rdl:Δεδομένα εφαρμογής [Διαχείριση ΕργατοΗμερών Πωλητών ανα Καμπάνια]:users
templates.sql: SELECT u.id, ( u.salescode + ' - ' + u.username ) AS name FROM [User] AS u WHERE NOT u.SalesCode IS NULL AND u.IsActive = 1 ORDER BY 2

templates.name: Διαχείριση Αιτημάτων CRM από Παραγωγή - Data Set1
templates.sql: --Κωδ. ΕΣ --Επωνυμία --Κωδ. Αιτήματος --Τύπος αιτήματος --Κωδ. Συμβολαίου --Προϊόν --Ημ. Προώθησης από CRM --Ημερομ. Ολοκλήρ. από τον Έλεγχο --Ημερομ. Ολοκλήρ. από Παραγωγή --Ημέρες Ολοκλήρωσης --Βήμα --Όλοι οι Χρήστες --Κριτήρια: --1. Ημ/νία όπως το σημερινό --2. Μέσο --Στοιχεία: --ότι στο σημερινό με επιπλέον: --1. Ημέρες σε Παραγωγή: ημ/νία ολοκλήρωσης από έλεχγο μέχρι την ημ ολοκλήρωσης. Αν δεν είναι ολοκληρωμένο, τότε θα είναι η ημ/νία ολοκλήρωσης από έλεχγο μέχρι την τρέχουσα ημέρα --2. Κατάσταση: Ολοκληρωμένο / Σε εκκρεμότητα --3. Ολοκλήρωση εντός 1 εβδομάδας : NAI, όταν ισχύει αλλιώς κενό --4. Ολοκλήρωση 1-2 εβδομάδες : NAI, όταν ισχύει αλλιώς κενό --5. Ολοκλήρωση 3-4 εβδομάδες : NAI, όταν ισχύει αλλιώς κενό --6. Ολοκλήρωση > 4 εβδομάδες : NAI, όταν ισχύει αλλιώς κενό --7. Προτεραιότητα : από το crm ticket IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#CRMProdTaskTypes') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #CRMProdTaskTypes SELECT t.ID taskID , tt.id TaskTypeID--,t.ActualOwnerID--,r.Description into #CRMProdTaskTypes FROM Task t JOIN TaskType tt on t.TaskTypeID = tt.id --join TaskAssignment ta on ta.TaskID = t.ID --join role r on r.id = ta.RoleID where tt.id in ( 537,193,509,511,512,513,514,516,517,519,520,522,523,524,525,527,528,529,192,194, ---Παλιό Flow Παραγωγής 743,744,748,749,750,751,752,753,754, ---Webs Planet ProdWorkflow 719,720,724,725,726,727, ---PPC -||- 670,671,675,676,677,678, ---XO Print 1 -||- 679,680,684,685,686,687,688,689,690,691, ---XO Print 2 -||- 797,798,802,803,804,806,807,808, ---SEO Δημιουργία περιεχομένου -||- 809,810,814,815,816,817,818,819,820,821,822,823,824,825,826, ---Μετάφραση Websites -||- 788,789,793,794,795,796, ---Audit SEO -||- 728,729,733,734,735,736,737,738,739,740,741,742, ---FB Banners & GADS Banners -||- 761,762,766,767,768,769,770,771,772,773,774,775,776,777,778,779,780,781, ---Wordpress -||- 782,783,787, ---Ανανέωση Website -||- 692,693,697,698,699,700,701,702,703,704,705,706,707,708,709,710,711,712,713,714,715,716,718,---Κατασκευή Προβολής Website Support 827,828,832,833,834,835 ---Κατασκευή ΠροβολήςEmailMarketing --903,904,905,906,907,908,909,910,911,912,913,914 ---CRM Workflow ) --DECLARE @Medium nvarchar(50); --set @Medium = '[10] XO.GR' IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#alldata') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #alldata select * into #alldata from ( select t.id as ticketcode, t.TicketTypeID, tt.Description ticketType, t.RelatedContractID contractid , ic.ID as caseid, mc.ID as mastercaseid, taskid = ta.id , TaskTypeId = ta.TaskTypeID , usr.UserName,ta.Status TskSt, ta.Description Task, ta.DynamicDescription TaskDescription, ta.CreatedOn TaskCreatedOn, ta.CompletedOn TaskCompletedOn, ta.Outcome, bp.Code as bpcode, bp.BrandName as bpName, t.RelatedAdvertisementID, pr.code as productcode, tp.[Description] as tktDescription from dbo.Ticket t join dbo.TicketType tt on tt.ID=t.TicketTypeID left join dbo.TicketPriority tp on tp.id = t.PriorityID --- added JOIN dbo.[Case] ic ON t.ID = ic.ContextEntityID AND ic.ContextEntityType = 'TICKET' JOIN dbo.[Case] mc ON mc.MasterCaseID = ic.id JOIN dbo.CaseType ct ON mc.CaseTypeID = ct.ID JOIN dbo.Task ta ON ta.CaseID = mc.ID join dbo.BusinessPoint bp on bp.ID=t.BusinessPointID join #CRMProdTaskTypes cptt on cptt.taskID = ta.ID left join dbo.[User] usr on usr.id=ta.ActualOwnerID join Advertisement adv on mc.ContextEntityID = adv.id and mc.ContextEntityType = 'ADV' join dbo.Product pr on pr.ID=adv.ProductID JOIN VersionSection vs ON vs.ID = adv.VersionSectionID JOIN MediumVersion mv ON mv.ID = vs.MediumVersionID JOIN Medium m ON m.ID = mv.MediumID where ('[' + m.code + '] ' + m.Name) in (@Medium) --order by ta.ID desc union select t.id as ticketcode, t.TicketTypeID, tt.Description ticketType, t.RelatedContractID contractid, ic.ID as caseid, mc.ID as mastercaseid, taskid = ta.id, TaskTypeId = ta.TaskTypeID, usr.UserName, ta.Status TskSt, ta.Description Task, ta.DynamicDescription TaskDescription, ta.CreatedOn TaskCreatedOn, ta.CompletedOn TaskCompletedOn, ta.Outcome, bp.Code as bpcode, bp.BrandName as bpName , t.RelatedAdvertisementID, NULL as productcode, tp.[Description] as tktDescription from dbo.Ticket t join dbo.TicketType tt on tt.ID=t.TicketTypeID left JOIN dbo.TicketPriority tp on tp.id = t.PriorityID--added JOIN dbo.[Case] ic ON t.ID = ic.ContextEntityID AND ic.ContextEntityType = 'TICKET' JOIN dbo.[Case] mc ON mc.MasterCaseID = ic.id JOIN dbo.CaseType ct ON mc.CaseTypeID = ct.ID JOIN dbo.Task ta ON ta.CaseID = mc.ID JOIN dbo.TaskAssignment tas ON ta.id = tas.TaskID JOIN dbo.Role r ON tas.RoleID = r.ID join dbo.BusinessPoint bp on bp.ID=t.BusinessPointID left join dbo.[User] usr on usr.id=ta.ActualOwnerID where r.ID in (114,655) --tas.roleid in (114,655) 'Προϊστάμενος Οργανωτικής Μονάδας Production' ,'Προϊστάμενος Οργανωτικής Μονάδας Website Constr.' and ta.TaskTypeID in (227) )xx IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#users') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #users Select Main.ticketcode, case when len(main.users)>0 then Left(Main.users,Len(Main.users)-1) else main.users end As [users] into #users From ( Select distinct ST2.ticketcode, ( Select distinct ST1.UserName + '/' AS [text()] From #alldata ST1 Where ST1.ticketcode= ST2.ticketcode For XML PATH ('') ) [users] From #alldata ST2 ) [Main] --DECLARE @DateFrom DATETIME ; --DECLARE @DateTo DATETIME ; --set @DateFrom = '2017-03-01' --set @DateTo ='2017-03-09' ;with main as ( select a.bpcode, bpName, ticketcode, ticketType, contractid, productcode, MIN(taskcreatedon) taskCreatedon, PCCompletedon= (select Min(t.completedon) from [case] c join task t on t.CaseID = c.id where t.TaskTypeID in (537,543) and t.Outcome<>'ΕΠΙΣΤΡΟΦΗ' and t.Status =1 and c.ContextEntityType = 'TICKET' and c.ContextEntityID = a.ticketcode), maxtaskid=(select MAX(taskid) from #alldata b where b.ticketcode=a.ticketcode), tktDescription , max(TaskCompletedOn) taskcompletedOn from #alldata a group by a.bpcode , bpName, ticketcode, ticketType, contractid,productcode,tktDescription--,TaskCompletedOn ) select [Κωδ. ΕΣ] =m.bpcode, [Επωνυμία] = m.bpName, [Κωδ. Αιτήματος] = m.ticketcode, [Τύπος Aιτήματος] = m.ticketType, [Προτεραιότητα Aιτήματος] = m.tktDescription,--added [Κωδ. Συμβολαίου] = m.contractid, [Προϊόν] = m.productcode, [Ημ. Προώθησης από CRM] = taskCreatedon , [Ημερομ. Ολοκλήρ. από τον Έλεγχο] = m.PCCompletedon, [Ημερομ. Ολοκλήρ. από Παραγωγή] = (select taskcompletedon from #alldata a where a.taskid=m.maxtaskid), [Ημέρες σε Παραγωγή] = case when(select taskcompletedon from #alldata a where a.taskid=m.maxtaskid) is not null then DATEDIFF(dd,taskCreatedon,(select taskcompletedon from #alldata a where a.taskid=m.maxtaskid)) else DATEDIFF(dd,taskCreatedon,getdate()) end ,--ημ/νία ολοκλήρωσης από έλεχγο μέχρι την ημ ολοκλήρωσης. Αν δεν είναι ολοκληρωμένο, τότε θα είναι η ημ/νία ολοκλήρωσης από έλεχγο μέχρι την τρέχουσα ημέρα [Κατάσταση] = case when (Case when (select taskcompletedon from #alldata a where a.taskid=m.maxtaskid) IS not null then DATEDIFF(dd,taskCreatedon,(select taskcompletedon from #alldata a where a.taskid=m.maxtaskid)) end) is not null then 'Ολοκληρωμένο' else 'Σε εκκρεμότητα' end , [Ολοκλήρωση εντός 1 εβδομάδας] = case when (Case when (select taskcompletedon from #alldata a where a.taskid=m.maxtaskid) IS not null then DATEDIFF(dd,taskCreatedon,(select taskcompletedon from #alldata a where a.taskid=m.maxtaskid)) end) < 7 then 'ΝΑΙ' else null end, [Ολοκλήρωση 1-2 εβδομάδες] = case when (Case when (select taskcompletedon from #alldata a where a.taskid=m.maxtaskid) IS not null then DATEDIFF(dd,taskCreatedon,(select taskcompletedon from #alldata a where a.taskid=m.maxtaskid)) end) between 7 and 14 then 'ΝΑΙ' else null end, [Ολοκλήρωση 3-4 εβδομάδες] = case when (Case when (select taskcompletedon from #alldata a where a.taskid=m.maxtaskid) IS not null then DATEDIFF(dd,taskCreatedon,(select taskcompletedon from #alldata a where a.taskid=m.maxtaskid)) end) between 21 and 28 then 'ΝΑΙ' else null end, [Ολοκλήρωση > 4 εβδομάδες] = case when (Case when (select taskcompletedon from #alldata a where a.taskid=m.maxtaskid) IS not null then DATEDIFF(dd,taskCreatedon,(select taskcompletedon from #alldata a where a.taskid=m.maxtaskid)) end) > 28 then 'ΝΑΙ' else null end, [Βήμα]=(select task from #alldata a where a.taskid=m.maxtaskid), [Ημέρες Ολοκλήρωσης] = Case when (select taskcompletedon from #alldata a where a.taskid=m.maxtaskid) IS not null then DATEDIFF(dd,taskCreatedon,(select taskcompletedon from #alldata a where a.taskid=m.maxtaskid)) end, [Όλοι οι Χρήστες] =(select UserS from #users usr where usr.ticketcode=m.ticketcode) from main m where taskCreatedon >= @datefrom and taskCreatedon < @dateto+1 --and m.ticketcode = 758329 order by taskCreatedon join [role] r on r.id = ttr.RoleID -- where ttr.roleid in (114,655) -- select distinct tt.* -- from ticket t -- join TicketType tt on tt.id = t.TicketTypeID -- where tt.id = 713 -- select * from TicketType where Description = 'ΠΛΗΡΩΜΕΝΗ ΠΡΟΒΟΛΗ/ ΔΙΟΡΘΩΣΗ ΠΡΟΒΟΛΗΣ ΠΡΟΪΟNΤΩΝ xo.gr'

templates.name: Διαχείριση Αιτημάτων CRM από Παραγωγή - Medium
templates.sql: SELECT ( '[' + m.code + '] ' + m.Name ) AS [Medium] FROM Medium AS m WHERE m.IsActive = 1

templates.name: Εισερχόμενα Εξερχόμενα Συμβόλαια από Back Office - Export Tasks
templates.source: rdl:Εισερχόμενα Εξερχόμενα Συμβόλαια από Back Office:ExportTasks
templates.sql: --declare @DateFrom as date, @DateTo as date --set @DateFrom = '2022-01-19' --set @DateTo = '2022-01-19' --================[All Contracts between selected dates]===================================== IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#ContractsWithProductionTasks') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #ContractsWithProductionTasks; SELECT distinct ct.ID as ctID INTO #ContractsWithProductionTasks FROM TargetGroupItemValue tgiv JOIN [Contract] ct on tgiv.ContractID = ct.ID --JOIN #Contracts ct ON tgiv.ContractID = ct.id JOIN [Case] c ON c.ContextEntityID = tgiv.ID AND c.ContextEntityType = 'TGIV' JOIN [Case] cc ON cc.MasterCaseID = c.ID JOIN Task t ON t.CaseID = cc.ID JOIN TaskType tt on t.TaskTypeID = tt.ID where (tt.ID = 156 or tt.ID = 251) and t.[Status] = 1 and cast(t.CompletedOn as DATE) >= @DateFrom and cast(t.CompletedOn as DATE) <= @DateTo --================[Last BO Tasks - Εξαγωγες]================================================= IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#LastBoTasks') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #LastBoTasks; SELECT distinct ct.ctID as ctID, (SELECT max(ti.ID) as taskID FROM TargetGroupItemValue tgivv JOIN [Case] ci ON ci.ContextEntityID = tgivv.ID AND ci.ContextEntityType = 'TGIV' JOIN [Case] cci ON cci.MasterCaseID = ci.ID JOIN Task ti ON ti.CaseID = cci.ID JOIN TaskType tti ON ti.TaskTypeID = tti.ID AND tti.ActivityType = 'h' LEFT JOIN dbo.[UserRole] uri on ti.ActualOwnerID = uri.UserID LEFT JOIN dbo.[Role] rri on uri.RoleID = rri.ID WHERE tti.ID not in (190,831,832,835,732,735,736,738,742, --934,956 = αναμονη συμβολαιου μεσω email/docusign 1003,1005,1009,1012,722,724,727,801, 802,805,808,962,964,747,748,751,754, 765,766,769,772,775,778,781,683,687, 691,813,814,817,820,823,826,673,678, 934,956,960,965) and ci.[State] = 1 and rri.id = 64 and ti.[Status] = 1 and tgiv.ID = tgivv.ID and (cast(ti.CompletedOn as DATE) >= @DateFrom AND cast(ti.CompletedOn as DATE) <= @DateTo ) ) as lastTask INTO #LastBoTasks FROM TargetGroupItemValue tgiv JOIN #ContractsWithProductionTasks ct ON tgiv.ContractID = ct.ctID JOIN [Case] c ON c.ContextEntityID = tgiv.ID AND c.ContextEntityType = 'TGIV' JOIN [Case] cc ON cc.MasterCaseID = c.ID JOIN Task t ON t.CaseID = cc.ID where c.State = 1 and cast(t.CompletedOn as DATE) >= @DateFrom and cast(t.CompletedOn as DATE) <= @DateTo --================[SalesManWithContractCountAndSum_ForExportTasks]============================================================ IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#SalesManWithContractCountAndSum') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #SalesManWithContractCountAndSum; ;with contractprice as( select ct.id contractid,SUM(CASE WHEN cp.[STATE] IN ( 3, 4 ) AND cp.AlteredAmount IS NOT NULL THEN cp.AlteredAmount ELSE cp.price - cp.discount - cp.rulesdiscount END) price from [Contract] ct join #LastBoTasks lb on lb.ctID = ct.ID join ContractProduct cp on cp.RelatedContractID = ct.id join [Task] t on lb.lastTask = t.ID where cp.state<>3 GROUP BY ct.id , t.CompletedOn) select cast(t.CompletedOn as date) tDate, ct.SalesManID, tgiv.Supervisor as SupervisorID, sth.ManagerID, count(distinct ct.id) as contractCount, sum(ctp.price) as contractPrice into #SalesManWithContractCountAndSum from [Contract] ct join #LastBoTasks lb on lb.ctID = ct.ID JOIN Task t ON t.ID = lb.lastTask JOIN contractprice ctp on ctp.contractid = ct.id join [User] salesMan on ct.SalesManID = salesMan.ID Join TargetGroupItemValue tgiv on tgiv.ContractID = ct.ID JOIN yps.dbo.SalesTreeHistory sth on sth.SalesmanID = ct.SalesManID and sth.[Year] = YEAR(ct.CreatedOn) and sth.SegmentID = MONTH(ct.CreatedOn) and sth.IsDeleted=0 group by ct.SalesManID, cast(t.completedOn as date), tgiv.Supervisor, sth.ManagerID order by cast(t.completedOn as date) --============[Main Query - ΕΞΑΓΩΓΕΣ]============================================================================================= SELECT distinct [Ημ/νία] = cast(t.CompletedOn as date), [Κανάλι πωλήσεων] = cnt.[Description], [Area/ Tele Manager] = '[' +area.SalesCode+'] ' + cast(area.LastName as nvarchar(50)) + ' ' + cast(area.FirstName as nvarchar(50)), [Supervisor] = '[' +sv.SalesCode+'] ' + cast(sv.LastName as nvarchar(50)) + ' ' + cast(sv.FirstName as nvarchar(50)), [ΣΔ] = '[' +cast(salesMan.SalesCode as nvarchar(100))+'] '+salesMan.LastName+' '+salesMan.FirstName, [Αρ. Συμβολαίων] = sccs.contractCount, [Αξία Συμβολαίων] = sccs.contractPrice FROM [Contract] cont JOIN #LastBoTasks lbot ON lbot.ctID = cont.ID JOIN ChannelType cnt ON cnt.ID = cont.ChannelTypeID JOIN Task t ON lbot.lastTask = t.ID JOIN TaskType tt ON t.TaskTypeID = tt.ID AND tt.ActivityType = 'h' JOIN #SalesManWithContractCountAndSum sccs on sccs.SalesManID = cont.SalesManID and cast(sccs.tDate as date) = cast(t.CompletedOn as date) JOIN [User] area ON sccs.ManagerID = area.ID JOIN [User] sv ON sccs.SupervisorID = sv.ID JOIN [User] salesMan ON salesMan.ID = cont.SalesManID LEFT JOIN [USER] taskUser on t.ActualOwnerID = taskuser.ID order by 1,2,3,4

templates.name: Εισερχόμενα Εξερχόμενα Συμβόλαια από Back Office - Returned Tasks
templates.source: rdl:Εισερχόμενα Εξερχόμενα Συμβόλαια από Back Office:ReturnedTasks
templates.sql: --declare @DateFrom as date, @DateTo as date --set @DateFrom = '2022-01-19' --set @DateTo = '2022-01-19' --================[BO Tasks - Επιστροφες]================================================ IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#ReturnedBoTasks') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #ReturnedBoTasks; SELECT ct.ID as ctID, ti.id as taskID INTO #ReturnedBoTasks FROM TargetGroupItemValue tgivv JOIN [Contract] ct ON tgivv.ContractID = ct.id JOIN [Case] ci ON ci.ContextEntityID = tgivv.ID AND ci.ContextEntityType = 'TGIV' JOIN [Case] cci ON cci.MasterCaseID = ci.ID JOIN Task ti ON ti.CaseID = cci.ID JOIN TaskType tti ON ti.TaskTypeID = tti.ID AND tti.ActivityType = 'h' JOIN [UserRole] uri on ti.ActualOwnerID = uri.UserID JOIN [Role] rri on uri.RoleID = rri.ID WHERE tti.ID in (190,831,832,835,732,735,736,738,742, --954,955, 1003,1005,1009,1012,722,724,727,801, 802,805,808,962,964,747,748,751,754, 765,766,769,772,775,778,781,683,687, 691,813,814,817,820,823,826,673,678) -- /*AND (rri.id = 64 or rri.ID = 72) */ and ti.[Status] = 0 AND cast(ti.CreatedOn as DATE) >= @DateFrom AND cast(ti.CreatedOn as DATE) <= @DateTo -- select * from #ReturnedBoTasks --================[SalesManWithContractCountAndSum_ForImportTasks]============================================================== IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#SalesManWithContractCountAndSum_Import') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #SalesManWithContractCountAndSum_Import; ;with contractprice as( select ct.id contractid,SUM(CASE WHEN cp.[STATE] IN ( 3, 4 ) AND cp.AlteredAmount IS NOT NULL THEN cp.AlteredAmount ELSE cp.price - cp.discount - cp.rulesdiscount END) price from [Contract] ct join #ReturnedBoTasks rb on rb.ctID = ct.ID join ContractProduct cp on cp.RelatedContractID = ct.id --join [Task] t on rb.taskID = t.ID where cp.state<>3 GROUP BY ct.id )--, t.CreatedOn) select cast(t.CreatedOn as date) tDate, ct.SalesManID, tgiv.Supervisor as SupervisorID, sth.ManagerID, count(distinct ct.id) as contractCount, sum(ctp.price) as contractPrice into #SalesManWithContractCountAndSum_Import from [Contract] ct join #ReturnedBoTasks rbt on rbt.ctID = ct.ID JOIN Task t ON t.ID = rbt.taskID JOIN contractprice ctp on ctp.contractid = ct.id join [User] salesMan on ct.SalesManID = salesMan.ID Join TargetGroupItemValue tgiv on tgiv.ContractID = ct.ID JOIN yps.dbo.SalesTreeHistory sth on sth.SalesmanID = ct.SalesManID and sth.[Year] = YEAR(ct.CreatedOn) and sth.SegmentID = MONTH(ct.CreatedOn) and sth.IsDeleted=0 group by ct.SalesManID, cast(t.CreatedOn as date), tgiv.Supervisor, sth.ManagerID order by cast(t.CreatedOn as date) --select * from #SalesManWithContractCountAndSum_Import --============[Main Query - Επιστροφες]============================================================================================ SELECT distinct [_Ημ/νία] = cast(t.CreatedOn as date), --t.CreatedOn, --[tt.id] = tt.ID, cont.ID as cID, t.ActualOwnerID as townerID, taskUser.LastName as taskOwner, --[TaskType_Description] = tt.[Description], [_Κανάλι πωλήσεων] = cnt.[Description], [_Area/ Tele Manager] = '[' +area.SalesCode+'] ' + cast(area.LastName as nvarchar(50)) + ' ' + cast(area.FirstName as nvarchar(50)), [_Supervisor] = '[' +sv.SalesCode+'] ' + cast(sv.LastName as nvarchar(50)) + ' ' + cast(sv.FirstName as nvarchar(50)), [_ΣΔ] = '[' +cast(salesMan.SalesCode as nvarchar(100))+'] '+salesMan.LastName+' '+salesMan.FirstName, [_Αρ. Συμβολαίων] = sccsi.contractCount, [_Αξία Συμβολαίων] = sccsi.contractPrice FROM [Contract] cont JOIN #ReturnedBoTasks rbot on rbot.ctID = cont.ID --JOIN TargetGroupItemValue tgiv on tgiv.ContractID = cont.ID JOIN ChannelType cnt ON cnt.ID = cont.ChannelTypeID JOIN Task t ON rbot.taskID = t.ID JOIN TaskType tt ON t.TaskTypeID = tt.ID AND tt.ActivityType = 'h' JOIN #SalesManWithContractCountAndSum_Import sccsi on sccsi.SalesManID = cont.SalesManID and cast(sccsi.tDate as date) = cast(t.CreatedOn as date) JOIN [User] area ON sccsi.ManagerID = area.ID JOIN [User] sv ON sccsi.SupervisorID = sv.ID JOIN [User] salesMan ON salesMan.ID = cont.SalesManID --LEFT JOIN #AreaManagers am on am.SalesmanID = salesMan.ID --LEFT JOIN [USER] taskUser on t.ActualOwnerID = taskUser.ID order by 1,2,3,4

templates.name: Εκκρεμότητες Παραγωγής - Data Set1
templates.sql: IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#MaxCompletedOn') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #MaxCompletedOn SELECT ContractId = tgiv2.AltOfferID , MAX(t.CompletedOn) CompletedOn INTO #MaxCompletedOn FROM dbo.Task t JOIN dbo.TaskType tt ON t.TaskTypeID = tt.ID JOIN dbo.[Case] c ON t.CaseID = c.ID JOIN dbo.TargetGroupItemValue tgiv2 ON C.ContextEntityID = TGIV2.ID AND C.ContextEntityType = 'TGIV' JOIN dbo.contract ct ON ct.ID = tgiv2.AltOfferID WHERE tt.id IN ( 189 ) AND ct.State <> 3 AND ct.type IN ( 0, 2, 3, 4 ) AND t.Status = 1 AND t.Outcome IN ( 'Δεν αφορά σύνθετη καταχώρηση', 'Δεν υπάρχουν ελλείψεις' ) GROUP BY tgiv2.AltOfferID IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#MinCreatedOn') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #MinCreatedOn SELECT ContractId = tgiv2.AltOfferID , MIN(t.CreatedOn) CreatedOn INTO #MinCreatedOn FROM dbo.Task t JOIN dbo.TaskType tt ON t.TaskTypeID = tt.ID JOIN dbo.[Case] c ON t.CaseID = c.ID JOIN dbo.TargetGroupItemValue tgiv2 ON C.ContextEntityID = TGIV2.ID AND C.ContextEntityType = 'TGIV' JOIN dbo.contract ct ON ct.ID = tgiv2.AltOfferID WHERE tt.id IN ( 189 ) AND ct.State <> 3 AND ct.type IN ( 0, 2, 3, 4 ) GROUP BY tgiv2.AltOfferID IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#OfferFlow') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #OfferFlow SELECT DISTINCT ContractId = tgiv2.AltOfferID INTO #OfferFlow FROM dbo.Task t JOIN dbo.TaskType tt ON t.TaskTypeID = tt.ID JOIN dbo.[Case] c ON t.CaseID = c.ID JOIN dbo.TargetGroupItemValue tgiv2 ON C.ContextEntityID = TGIV2.ID AND C.ContextEntityType = 'TGIV' JOIN dbo.contract ct ON ct.ID = tgiv2.AltOfferID WHERE tt.id IN ( 154, 313 ) AND ct.State <> 3 AND ct.type IN ( 0, 2, 3, 4 ) AND t.Status = 1 AND t.Outcome = 'ΠΡΟΣΦ' IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#Supervisor') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #Supervisor SELECT ContractId = tgiv2.AltOfferID , MAX(t.CompletedOn) CompletedOn INTO #Supervisor FROM dbo.Task t JOIN dbo.TaskType tt ON t.TaskTypeID = tt.ID JOIN dbo.[Case] c ON t.CaseID = c.ID JOIN dbo.TargetGroupItemValue tgiv2 ON C.ContextEntityID = TGIV2.ID AND C.ContextEntityType = 'TGIV' JOIN dbo.contract ct ON ct.ID = tgiv2.AltOfferID WHERE tt.id IN ( 164, 259, 261 ) AND ct.State <> 3 AND ct.type IN ( 0, 2, 3, 4 ) AND t.Status = 1 AND t.Outcome IN ( 'Δεν απαιτούνται διορθώσεις' ) GROUP BY tgiv2.AltOfferID IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#TicketDate') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #TicketDate SELECT min(ta.CreatedOn) as CreatedOn, a.id AS AdvId INTO #TicketDate FROM Ticket t JOIN Advertisement a on t.RelatedAdvertisementID = a.ID JOIN dbo.[Case] ic ON t.ID = ic.ContextEntityID AND ic.ContextEntityType = 'TICKET' JOIN dbo.[Case] mc ON mc.MasterCaseID = ic.id JOIN dbo.Task ta ON ta.CaseID = mc.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.TaskAssignment tas ON ta.id = tas.TaskID LEFT JOIN dbo.Role r ON tas.RoleID = r.ID where r.ID = 72 and t.Status = 0 --and t.ID = 634498 group by a.id --select * from #TicketDate SELECT DISTINCT t.id AS taskid , t.CreatedOn AS taskCreatedOn , t.Description AS taskDescr , t.DynamicDescription taskcomments , bp.Code AS bpCode , bp.Brandname AS bpName , ContractId = tgiv2.AltOfferID , ct.CreatedOn AS CtCreatedDate , ct.SignedDate , srv.completedon srvCompletedon , CASE WHEN ct.ChannelTypeID = 1 THEN 'Tele' WHEN ct.ChannelTypeID = 2 THEN 'Premise' ELSE 'Direct Mail' END AS ChannelType , mint.CreatedOn , mco.CompletedOn , NULL AS AdvBeginDate , NULL AS DesiredBeginDate, NULL AS prCode , NULL AS prDescription , NULL AS mvCode , NULL AS mvDescr , case when usr.UserName is null and R.Description is null then potusr.UserName else usr.UserName end AS taskowner , R.Description AS roleDescr , paymentType = CASE WHEN EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM InvoicePaymentMethod pm WHERE pm.ID = ct.ID ) THEN ( SELECT pt.Description FROM InvoicePaymentMethod pm JOIN PaymentMethodType pt ON pm.PaymentMethodTypeID = pt.ID WHERE pm.ID = ct.ID ) ELSE ( SELECT TOP 1 pt.Description FROM PaymentMethod pm JOIN PaymentMethodType pt ON pm.PaymentMethodTypeID = pt.id JOIN ContractProduct cp2 ON cp2.PaymentMethodID = pm.id WHERE cp2.RelatedContractID = ct.id ) END , IsContract = CASE WHEN flo.contractid IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END, tck.CreatedOn AS CrmDate FROM dbo.Task t JOIN dbo.TaskType tt ON t.TaskTypeID = tt.ID JOIN dbo.[Case] c ON t.CaseID = c.ID JOIN dbo.TargetGroupItemValue tgiv2 ON C.ContextEntityID = TGIV2.ID AND C.ContextEntityType = 'TGIV' JOIN dbo.contract ct ON ct.ID = tgiv2.AltOfferID JOIN ContractProduct cp ON ct.ID = cp.RelatedContractID JOIN Advertisement a on a.ContractProductID = cp.id JOIN BusinessPoint bp ON ct.ActualBPOwnerID = bp.id LEFT JOIN dbo.[User] usr ON usr.ID = t.ActualOwnerID LEFT JOIN dbo.TaskAssignment ta ON t.ID = ta.TaskID AND ta.AssignmentType = 0 LEFT JOIN dbo.[User] potusr ON ta.UserID = potusr.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.Role r ON ta.RoleID = r.ID LEFT JOIN #MaxCompletedOn mco ON mco.ContractId = ct.id LEFT JOIN #MinCreatedOn mint ON mint.ContractId = ct.id LEFT JOIN #OfferFlow flo ON flo.contractid = ct.id LEFT JOIN #Supervisor srv ON srv.ContractId = ct.id LEFT JOIN #TicketDate tck ON tck.AdvId = a.id WHERE tt.id IN ( 189, 195 ) AND ct.State <> 3 AND ct.type IN ( 0, 2, 3, 4 ) AND t.Status = 0 AND c.State = 0 --and bp.Code = 305879 --and a.ID = 4129348 --and ct.id=1925123 UNION ALL SELECT DISTINCT t.id AS taskid , t.CreatedOn AS taskCreatedOn , t.Description AS taskDescr , t.DynamicDescription taskcomments , bp.Code AS bpCode , bp.Brandname AS bpName , ct.id AS ContractId , ct.CreatedOn AS CtCreatedDate , ct.SignedDate , srv.completedon srvCompletedon , CASE WHEN ct.ChannelTypeID = 1 THEN 'Tele' WHEN ct.ChannelTypeID = 2 THEN 'Premise' ELSE 'Direct Mail' END AS ChannelType , mint.CreatedOn , mco.CompletedOn , adv.AdvBeginDate , adv.DesiredBeginDate , pr.Code AS prCode , pr.Description AS prDescription , mv.code AS mvCode , mv.Description mvDescr , case when usr.UserName is null and R.Description is null then potusr.UserName else usr.UserName end AS taskowner , R.Description AS roleDescr , paymentType = CASE WHEN EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM InvoicePaymentMethod pm WHERE pm.ID = ct.ID ) THEN ( SELECT pt.Description FROM InvoicePaymentMethod pm JOIN PaymentMethodType pt ON pm.PaymentMethodTypeID = pt.ID WHERE pm.ID = ct.ID ) ELSE ( SELECT pt.Description FROM PaymentMethod pm JOIN PaymentMethodType pt ON pm.PaymentMethodTypeID = pt.id JOIN ContractProduct cp2 ON cp2.PaymentMethodID = pm.id WHERE cp2.ID = cp.ID ) END , IsContract = CASE WHEN flo.contractid IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END, tck.CreatedOn AS CrmDate FROM dbo.Task t JOIN dbo.TaskType tt ON t.TaskTypeID = tt.ID JOIN dbo.[Case] c ON t.CaseID = c.ID JOIN Advertisement adv ON C.ContextEntityID = ADV.ID AND C.ContextEntityType = 'ADV' JOIN ContractProduct cp ON cp.ID = adv.ContractProductID JOIN dbo.contract ct ON ct.ID = cp.RelatedContractID JOIN BusinessPoint bp ON ct.ActualBPOwnerID = bp.id JOIN VersionSection vs ON adv.VersionSectionID = vs.ID JOIN MediumVersion mv ON mv.ID = vs.MediumVersionID LEFT JOIN Product pr ON pr.ID = adv.ProductID LEFT JOIN dbo.[User] usr ON usr.ID = t.ActualOwnerID LEFT JOIN dbo.TaskAssignment ta ON t.ID = ta.TaskID AND ta.AssignmentType = 0 LEFT JOIN dbo.[User] potusr ON ta.UserID = potusr.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.Role r ON ta.RoleID = r.ID LEFT JOIN #MaxCompletedOn mco ON mco.ContractId = ct.id LEFT JOIN #MinCreatedOn mint ON mint.ContractId = ct.id LEFT JOIN #OfferFlow flo ON flo.contractid = ct.id LEFT JOIN #Supervisor srv ON srv.ContractId = ct.id LEFT JOIN #TicketDate tck ON tck.AdvId = adv.id WHERE tt.id IN ( 192,193,194, 511,514,516,517, 520,522,523, 525,527,528,509,512,513,519,524,529) AND ct.State <> 3 AND ct.type IN ( 0, 2, 3, 4 ) AND t.Status = 0 AND c.State = 0 --and ct.id=1925123 --and adv.ID = 4129348 --and bp.Code = 305879 ORDER BY 1

templates.name: Εκκρεμότητες Ρόλων Παραγωγής - Data Set1
templates.sql: WITH xx AS ( SELECT DISTINCT 2 AS xx, cmp.id AS cm_id, '[' + cmp.Code + '] ' + cmp.Name AS CampaignDesc, t.Description AS TaskDesc, t.TaskTypeID, CASE WHEN t.tasktypeid IN (192, 509, 194) THEN 'Graphic Designer' WHEN t.tasktypeid IN (514, 517, 519) THEN 'Web Designer' WHEN t.tasktypeid IN (520, 523, 524) THEN 'Google Ads Expert' WHEN t.tasktypeid IN (525, 528, 529) THEN 'SEO Expert' WHEN t.tasktypeid IN (511, 513) THEN 'Copywriter' WHEN t.tasktypeid IN (193, 512) THEN 'Directories QC' WHEN t.tasktypeid IN (516, 522, 527) THEN 'Web Services QC' END AS [RoleDesc], t.id AS taskid, cp.RelatedContractID AS contractid, adv.ID AS advid FROM yps.dbo.[Case] AS c WITH (nolock) JOIN yps.dbo.[Case] AS cc WITH (nolock) ON cc.MasterCaseID = c.ID JOIN yps.dbo.Task AS t WITH (nolock) ON t.CaseID = cc.ID JOIN yps.dbo.Advertisement AS adv WITH (nolock) ON adv.ID = cc.ContextEntityID AND cc.ContextEntityType = 'adv' JOIN yps.dbo.ContractProduct AS cp WITH (nolock) ON cp.id = adv.ContractProductID JOIN yps.dbo.Product AS p WITH (nolock) ON cp.ProductID = p.ID JOIN yps.dbo.Contract AS ct WITH (nolock) ON ct.ID = cp.RelatedContractID JOIN yps.dbo.Campaign AS cmp WITH (nolock) ON cmp.ID = ct.CampaignID WHERE t.TaskTypeID IN ( 192, 193, 194, 509, 511, 512, 513, 514, 516, 517, 519, 520, 522, 523, 524, 525, 527, 528, 529 ) AND ( t.Status = 0 AND cc.state = 0 ) AND ( ( adv.productid = cp.productid AND p.IsComposite = 0 ) OR ( adv.productid <> cp.productid AND p.IsComposite = 1 ) ) UNION SELECT DISTINCT 1 AS xx, cmp.id AS cm_id, '[' + cmp.Code + '] ' + cmp.Name AS CampaignDesc, t.Description AS TaskDesc, t.TaskTypeID, 'Production Controller' AS [RoleDesc], t.id AS taskid, cp.RelatedContractID AS contractid, adv.ID AS advid FROM yps.dbo.TargetGroupItemValue AS tgiv WITH (nolock) JOIN yps.dbo.[Case] AS c WITH (nolock) ON c.ContextEntityID = tgiv.ID AND c.ContextEntityType = 'TGIV' JOIN yps.dbo.[Case] AS cc WITH (nolock) ON cc.MasterCaseID = c.ID JOIN yps.dbo.Task AS t WITH (nolock) ON t.CaseID = cc.ID JOIN yps.dbo.ContractProduct AS cp WITH (nolock) ON cp.RelatedContractID = tgiv.ContractID JOIN yps.dbo.Advertisement AS adv WITH (nolock) ON adv.ContractProductID = cp.id JOIN yps.dbo.Product AS p WITH (nolock) ON cp.ProductID = p.ID JOIN yps.dbo.Contract AS ct WITH (nolock) ON ct.ID = cp.RelatedContractID JOIN yps.dbo.Campaign AS cmp WITH (nolock) ON cmp.ID = ct.CampaignID WHERE t.TaskTypeID = 189 AND ( t.Status = 0 AND cc.state = 0 ) AND ( ( adv.productid = cp.productid AND p.IsComposite = 0 ) OR ( adv.productid <> cp.productid AND p.IsComposite = 1 ) ) ) SELECT DISTINCT xx, cm_id, CampaignDesc, TaskDesc, TaskTypeID, RoleDesc, COUNT(DISTINCT taskid) AS TaskCnt, COUNT(DISTINCT contractid) AS ContractCnt, COUNT(DISTINCT advid) AS AdvSum FROM xx GROUP BY xx, cm_id, CampaignDesc, TaskDesc, TaskTypeID, RoleDesc ORDER BY xx, RoleDesc, TaskDesc

templates.name: Εκκρεμείς Προβολές Ανά Μέσο-Κύκλο - Open Advs Per Medium Data Set
templates.sql: if object_id('tempdb..#CustomerData') is not null drop table #CustomerData SELECT DISTINCT bp.Code AS BPCode, bp.Name AS BPName, ctPrimary.ID, p.Code AS PCode, p.Name AS PName, ISNULL(taTGIV.ID, taAdv.ID) AS TaskID, u.FirstName + ' ' + u.LastName AS SalesMan, adv.AdvBeginDate AS StartDate, ctPrimary.SignedDate AS SignDate, adv.id as advid , (select ch.Description from dbo.channeltype ch where ch.id=ctPrimary.ChannelTypeID) salesChannel into #CustomerData FROM dbo.Contract ctPrimary JOIN dbo.[User] u ON ctPrimary.SalesManID = u.ID JOIN dbo.BusinessPoint bp ON ctPrimary.ActualBPOwnerID = bp.ID JOIN dbo.ContractProduct cp ON ctPrimary.ID = cp.RelatedContractID JOIN dbo.Advertisement adv ON cp.ID = adv.ContractProductID JOIN dbo.Product p ON adv.ProductID = p.ID AND p.IsComposite = 0 JOIN dbo.VersionSection vs ON adv.VersionSectionID = vs.ID JOIN dbo.MediumVersion mv ON vs.MediumVersionID = mv.ID JOIN dbo.Medium m ON mv.MediumID = m.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.TargetGroupItemValue tgiv ON ctPrimary.id = ISNULL(tgiv.ContractID, tgiv.AltOfferID) LEFT JOIN dbo.[Case] caAdv ON caAdv.ContextEntityID = adv.ID AND caAdv.ContextEntityType = 'ADV' LEFT JOIN dbo.Task taAdv ON caAdv.ID = taAdv.CaseID AND taAdv.id = ( SELECT TOP 1 taAdv2.ID FROM dbo.Task taAdv2 JOIN dbo.TaskType ttAdv ON taAdv2.TaskTypeID = ttAdv.ID WHERE taAdv.CaseID = taAdv2.CaseID AND ttAdv.ActivityType = 'H' AND taAdv2.Status = 0 ORDER BY taAdv2.id DESC ) LEFT JOIN dbo.[Case] caTGIV ON caTGIV.ContextEntityID = tgiv.ID AND caTGIV.ContextEntityType = 'TGIV' LEFT JOIN dbo.Task taTGIV ON caTGIV.id = taTGIV.CaseID AND taTGIV.id = ( SELECT TOP 1 taTGIV2.ID FROM dbo.Task taTGIV2 JOIN dbo.TaskType ttTGIV ON taTGIV2.TaskTypeID = ttTGIV.ID WHERE taTGIV.CaseID = taTGIV2.CaseID AND ttTGIV.ActivityType = 'H' AND taTGIV2.Status = 0 ORDER BY taTGIV2.id DESC ) WHERE adv.QA = 0 AND adv.VersionSectionID in ( SELECT vs2.ID FROM dbo.Medium m2 JOIN dbo.MediumVersion mv2 ON m2.ID = mv2.MediumID JOIN dbo.VersionSection vs2 ON mv2.ID = vs2.MediumVersionID WHERE m2.IsActive = 1 AND mv2.IsActive = 1 --AND MediumTypeID = 3 AND mv2.ID =@MediumCode ) AND ctPrimary.State not in (3,5) AND (ctPrimary.type IN (0, 2, 3, 4)) AND (cp.State <> 3) if object_id('tempdb..#result') is not null drop table #result SELECT DISTINCT cd.BPCode, cd.BPName, cd.id AS ContractID, cd.PCode, cd.PName, t.CreatedOn, t.Description AS TAction, r.Description AS TRole, u.UserName, SalesMan, StartDate, SignDate, advid,salesChannel into #result FROM #CustomerData cd left JOIN dbo.Task t ON cd.TaskID = t.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.TaskAssignment ta ON t.ID = ta.TaskID AND ta.AssignmentType = 0 LEFT JOIN dbo.Role r ON ta.RoleID = r.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.[User] u ON t.ActualOwnerID = u.ID WHERE PCode IS NOT NULL select * from #result r where TAction is not null union select * from #result r where TAction is null and r.advid not in (select r0.advid from #result r0 where r0.CreatedOn is not null)

templates.name: Εκκρεμείς Προβολές Ανά Μέσο-Κύκλο - Mediums Data Set
templates.sql: SELECT m.Name + '( ' + mv.Code + '-' + m.Code + ' )' AS MName, mv.ID FROM dbo.Medium AS m JOIN dbo.MediumVersion AS mv ON m.ID = mv.MediumID WHERE ( m.IsActive = 1 AND mv.IsActive = 1 AND @Inactive = 0 ) OR @Inactive = 1 /* AND MediumTypeID = 3 ORDER BY m.Name */

templates.source: rdl:Ενημέρωση YPS βάση αποτελέσματος κλήσης Tele Sales:DataSet1
templates.sql: WITH data AS ( SELECT DISTINCT a.BpCode AS [Κωδικός ΕΣ], bp.name AS [Διακριτικός Τίτλος ΕΣ], a.phone AS [Τηλέφωνο], a.[Νέα Κατάσταση Επικαιροποίησης] AS [Νέα Κατάσταση Επικαιροποίησης], a.action AS [Ενέργεια], a.ActionDate AS ActionDate, cn.Name AS [PrimaryActivity], bp.id AS bpid FROM ( SELECT BpCode, NULL AS Phone, NULL AS [Νέα Κατάσταση Επικαιροποίησης], 'Απενεργοποίηση ΕΣ' AS [Action], ActionDate FROM itapps.dbo.DINT401BPDeactivations UNION SELECT BpCode, Phone, NULL AS [Νέα Κατάσταση Επικαιροποίησης], 'Απενεργοποίηση Τηλεφώνου' AS [Action], ActionDate FROM itapps.dbo.DINT401PhoneDeactivations UNION SELECT BpCode, NULL AS Phone, UpdateValue AS [Νέα Κατάσταση Επικαιροποίησης], 'Ενημέρωση Κατάστασης Επικαιροποίησης' AS [Action], ActionDate FROM itapps.dbo.DINT401CU ) AS a JOIN yps.dbo.BusinessPoint AS bp ON bp.code = a.BpCode JOIN yps.dbo.ClassifierNode AS cn ON cn.id = bp.ActivityClassifierNodeID WHERE CAST(actiondate AS DATE) >= @datefrom AND CAST(actiondate AS DATE) <= @dateto ), secActivities AS ( SELECT DISTINCT data.bpid AS bpid, cn.name AS secondaryActivity FROM yps.dbo.Classification AS cl JOIN data ON data.bpid = cl.BusinessPointID JOIN yps.dbo.ClassifierNode AS cn ON cn.id = cl.ClassifierNodeID WHERE cl.ClassifierID = 4 ), delimitedActivities AS ( SELECT DISTINCT bpid AS bpid, STUFF( ( SELECT ' || ' + u.secondaryActivity FROM secActivities AS u WHERE u.bpid = i.bpid ORDER BY u.secondaryActivity FOR XML path('') ), 1, 4, '' ) AS secActs FROM secActivities AS i GROUP BY bpid ) SELECT DISTINCT a.[Κωδικός ΕΣ], a.[Διακριτικός Τίτλος ΕΣ], a.[Τηλέφωνο], a.[Νέα Κατάσταση Επικαιροποίησης], a.[Ενέργεια], a.ActionDate, a.[PrimaryActivity], delimitedActivities.secActs AS [SecondaryActivities] FROM data AS a LEFT JOIN delimitedActivities ON a.bpid = delimitedActivities.bpid ORDER BY a.actiondate

templates.sql: USE ITAPPS

templates.name: Εξοδολόγια - User Names
templates.sql: --declare @username nvarchar(50) --set @username = 'hruser'; --IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#supervisor') IS NOT NULL drop table #supervisor; --IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#admin') IS NOT NULL drop table #admin; IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#supervisor') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #supervisor; select u.* into #supervisor FROM [ItApps].[xoexpenses].[User] u join [ItApps].[xoexpenses].[User] uu on uu.SupervisorID = u.ID GROUP BY u.ID, u.Name, u.EmailAddress, u.SupervisorID IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#admin') IS NOT NULL drop table #admin; select u.USERNAME into #admin from [ITApps].[dbo].IT_APPLICATION_RIGHTS r join [ITApps].[dbo].IT_APPLICATION_USERS u on u.ADID = r.USER_ADID join [ITApps].[dbo].IT_APPLICATIONS a on a.ID = r.APPLICATION_ID join YPS.dbo.[user] usr on usr.USERNAME = u.USERNAME where a.APPLICATION_CODE = 'rep' UNION select u.USERNAME from [ITApps].[dbo].IT_APPLICATION_RIGHTS r join [ITApps].[dbo].IT_APPLICATION_USERS u on u.ADID = r.USER_ADID join [ITApps].[dbo].IT_APPLICATIONS a on a.ID = r.APPLICATION_ID where a.APPLICATION_CODE = 'xoexpenses' and r.[ROLE] = 'Admin' IF (@username in (select USERNAME from #admin))--ADMIN BEGIN SELECT [Name] FROM [ItApps].[xoexpenses].[User] order by 1 END ELSE IF EXISTS (SELECT EmailAddress FROM #supervisor WHERE EmailAddress like '%' + @username + '%')--SUPERVISOR BEGIN SELECT uu.[Name] FROM [ItApps].[xoexpenses].[User] u join [ItApps].[xoexpenses].[User] uu on uu.SupervisorID = u.ID WHERE u.EmailAddress like '%' + @username + '%' UNION SELECT u.[Name] FROM [ItApps].[xoexpenses].[User] u WHERE u.EmailAddress like '%' + @username + '%' order by 1 END ELSE BEGIN SELECT [Name] FROM [ItApps].[xoexpenses].[User] u WHERE u.EmailAddress like '%' + @username + '%' order by 1 END
