templates.sql: --SELECT cn.id,cn.CompositeName label FROM dbo.ClassifierNode cn WHERE cn.ClassifierTreeID = 2 ---Allages opou : --(duo pavles meta ton kwdika) --DECLARE @ids INT; --DECLARE @csid INT; --DECLARE @cuid INT; --DECLARE @perfecture varchar(50); --DECLARE @municipality varchar(50); --DECLARE @DateFrom datetime;-- --DECLARE @DateTo datetime;-- --DECLARE @BpUpdateFrom datetime;-- --DECLARE @BpUpdateTo datetime;-- --DECLARE @BpName varchar(50);-- --DECLARE @xolisting int; --DECLARE @activity bit; --DECLARE @MODE bit; --SET @ids = 82; --SET @csid = 14; --SET @cuid = 26; --SET @perfecture = 'Νομός Αττικής'; --SET @municipality = 'HB10'; --SET @DateFrom ='2017-03-20' ;-- --SET @DateTo = '2017-03-30';-- --SET @BpUpdateFrom ='2017-09-20' ;-- --SET @BpUpdateTo = '2017-09-30';-- --SET @BpName = 'an';-- --SET @BpBrandName = 'an';-- --SET @xolisting = 1; --SET @activity = 1; --SET @MODE = 1; IF @MODE = 1 BEGIN if object_id('tempdb..#activities') is not null drop table #activities SELECT items into #activities FROM itapps.dbo.SplitToInt(@allActivities, ',') if object_id('tempdb..#csids') is not null drop table #csids SELECT items into #csids FROM itapps.dbo.SplitToInt(@allCS, ',') if object_id('tempdb..#cuids') is not null drop table #cuids SELECT items into #cuids FROM itapps.dbo.SplitToInt(@allCU, ',') if object_id('tempdb..#pref') is not null drop table #pref SELECT items into #pref FROM itapps.dbo.Split(@allPrefectures, ',') if object_id('tempdb..#mun') is not null drop table #mun SELECT items into #mun FROM itapps.dbo.Split(@allMunicipality, ',') if object_id('tempdb..#ids') is not null drop table #ids select distinct bp.id id, ISNULL(bp.BillingAddressID, bilbp.LocationAddressID ) as biladrid, CustomerSource=cs.Description, CustomerUpdate=cu.Description, CustomerSolvency = solv.Description, LocationAddId = bp.LocationAddressID INTO #ids from dbo.BusinessPoint bp LEFT JOIN dbo.CustomerSolvency solv ON solv.ID = bp.CustomerSolvencyID left JOIN dbo.CustomerSource cs ON cs.id = bp.CustomerSourceID left JOIN dbo.CustomerUpdate cu ON cu.id = bp.CustomerUpdateID JOIN dbo.Classification cl ON bp.id = cl.BusinessPointID AND cl.ClassifierID IN (3,4) LEFT JOIN dbo.PointRelationship pr WITH (NOLOCK) ON pr.BusinessPointID = bp.id AND pr.type = 10 LEFT JOIN dbo.BusinessPoint bilbp WITH (NOLOCK) ON pr.TargetBussinessPointID = bilbp.id join #activities act on cl.ClassifierNodeID = act.items join #csids csi on csi.items = isnull(bp.CustomerSourceID,-1) join #cuids cui on cui.items = isnull(bp.CustomerUpdateID ,-1) where bp.IsActive = 1 and cast(bp.CreatedOn as date) >= @DateFrom-- and cast(bp.CreatedOn as date) <= @DateTo-- and (bp.name like '%'+@BpName+'%' or bp.BrandName like '%'+@BpName+'%' or @BpName is null ) -- AND cast(bp.CustomerUpdateModifiedOn as date) >= @BpUpdateFrom-- AND cast(bp.CustomerUpdateModifiedOn as date) <= @BpUpdateTo-- --AND cl.ClassifierNodeID IN (@ids) --AND bp.CustomerSourceID IN (@csid) --AND bp.CustomerUpdateID IN (@cuid) if object_id('tempdb..#CustIndic') is not null drop table #CustIndic SELECT clf.BusinessPointID, CustomerIndicator=cn.Name INTO #CustIndic FROM #ids id JOIN dbo.Classification clf ON clf.BusinessPointID = id.id JOIN dbo.ClassifierNode cn ON cn.ID = clf.ClassifierNodeID WHERE ClassifierID=5 if object_id('tempdb..#CustMainActivity') is not null drop table #CustMainActivity SELECT clf.BusinessPointID, MainActivity=cn.Name INTO #CustMainActivity FROM #ids id JOIN dbo.Classification clf ON clf.BusinessPointID = id.id JOIN dbo.ClassifierNode cn ON cn.ID = clf.ClassifierNodeID WHERE ClassifierID=3 if object_id('tempdb..#avct') is not null drop table #avct select count(distinct ct.id) AS ctid, MaxEndDate=MAX(adv.AdvEndDate), MaxSignDate=MAX(ct.SignedDate), ct.ActualBPOwnerID INTO #avct from #ids id JOIN Contract ct ON ct.ActualBPOwnerID = id.id join ContractProduct cp ON cp.RelatedContractID = ct.id and ct.State NOT IN (3,5) and ct.Type not in (1,10) join Advertisement adv ON adv.ContractProductID = cp.id and (adv.AdvEndDate > GETDATE()) group by ct.ID, ct.ActualBPOwnerID --if object_id('tempdb..#comments') is not null --drop table #comments --SELECT bpc.BusinessPointID, bpc.CommentText, bpc.CommentDate --INTO #comments --FROM #ids id --JOIN dbo.BusinessPointComment bpc ON bpc.BusinessPointID = id.id --WHERE bpc.ID = (SELECT MAX(id) -- FROM dbo.BusinessPointComment bpcin -- WHERE bpcin.BusinessPointID = bpc.BusinessPointID) if object_id('tempdb..#emails') is not null drop table #emails Select pe.BusinessPointID, pe.Email INTO #emails FROM #ids id JOIN dbo.PointEmail pe ON pe.BusinessPointID = id.id where pe.ID = (SELECT min(id) FROM dbo.PointEmail pein WHERE pe.BusinessPointID = pein.BusinessPointID ) if object_id('tempdb..#phones') is not null drop table #phones Select pe.BusinessPointID, pe.Number INTO #phones FROM #ids id JOIN dbo.PointPhone pe ON pe.BusinessPointID = id.id WHERE pe.Usage = 1 and pe.ID = (SELECT min(id) FROM dbo.PointPhone pein WHERE pe.BusinessPointID = pein.BusinessPointID AND pein.Usage = 1 ) if object_id('tempdb..#basicPoint') is not null drop table #basicPoint select distinct bp.id ID ,[Live σε XO]= case when tixo.CustomerCode is null then 'False' else 'True' end ,[Προέλευση] = i.CustomerSource ,[Ημερομηνία Δημιουργίας] = cast(bp.CreatedOn as date) ,[Κατάσταση Επικαιροποίησης] = cu.[Description] ,[Ημερομηνία Επικαιροποίησης] = bp.CustomerUpdateModifiedOn ,[Κωδικός ΕΣ]= cast(bp.code AS BIGINT) ,[Διακριτικός] = bp.name ,[Επωνυμία] = bp.BrandName ,[Επάγγελμα] = bp.profession ,[Φερεγγυότητα] = i.CustomerSolvency --,[CusIndicator]= indi.CustomerIndicator ---locationaddress ,[Διεύθυνση] = Ad.[Line1] --,[Περιοχή]= Ad.[Line3] ,[Πόλη]=bal.AreaName ,[Νομός] = ad.GeoModelDistrict --,[Πηγή] = i.CustomerSource --,[Επικαιροποίηση] = i.CustomerUpdate ,[Τηλέφωνα] = (SELECT TOP 1 ph.Number FROM yps.[dbo].[PointPhone] ph WHERE ph.BusinessPointID=bp.ID AND ph.isactive=1 AND ph.Usage!=5 ORDER BY ph.ID DESC) -----CSV ,[Url] = case when bp.Url is null then 'False' else 'True' end ,[Email] = case when (SELECT TOP 1 pe.Email FROM yps.[dbo].[PointEmail] pe WHERE pe.BusinessPointID=bp.ID ORDER BY pe.ID DESC) is null then 'False' else 'True' end ,[ΑΦΜ] = case when tc.TaxCode is null then 'False' else 'True' end ,[Κύρια Δραστηριότητα]= act.MainActivity --,[Δευτερεύουσα(ες) Δραστηριότητες] = '' ,[Ενεργά Συμβόλαια] = avct.ctid -----CSV -----billing address --,[Διεύθυνση Τιμ.] = adbil.[Line1] --,[Περιοχή Τιμ.]= adbil.[Line3] --,[Δήμος Τιμ.]=balbil.AreaName --,[Νομός Τιμ.] = adbil.GeoModelDistrict --,[Ημερ.Λήξης ΓΓΠΣ] = g.stopDate --,[ActiveContracts] = avct.ctid --,[Ημερ. Λήξης Προβολής]= avct.MaxEndDate --,[LastCreatedContract] = MaxSignDate --,[LastComment] = comm.CommentText --,[LastCommentDate] = comm.CommentDate --,[email1] =em.Email --,[Phone1] = ph.Number into #basicPoint from #ids i JOIN #CustIndic indi ON indi.BusinessPointID = i.id JOIN #CustMainActivity act ON act.BusinessPointID = i.id LEFT join BusinessPoint bp ON i.id = bp.id left join #avct avct on avct.ActualBPOwnerID = bp.id LEFT JOIN CustomerUpdate cu on cu.id = bp.CustomerUpdateID left join TaxCode tc ON tc.id =bp.id left join Itapps.xoupdate.XoListing tixo on tixo.CustomerCode = bp.Code LEFT JOIN itapps.dbo.[gsis_Data] g ON g.afm = tc.taxcode --LEFT join #comments comm ON comm.BusinessPointID = bp.ID LEFT JOIN #emails em ON em.BusinessPointID = i.id LEFT JOIN #phones ph ON ph.BusinessPointID = i.id ---location address JOIN dbo.Address ad ON ad.ID = i.LocationAddId JOIN dbo.BroaderArea bap ON bap.AddressID = ad.ID JOIN #pref p ON bap.BroaderAreaID = p.items JOIN dbo.BroaderArea bam ON bam.AddressID = ad.ID JOIN #mun m ON bam.BroaderAreaID = m.items JOIN dbo.BroaderAreaLookUp bal ON bal.BroaderAreaID = bam.BroaderAreaID ---billing --LEFT JOIN dbo.Address adbil ON adbil.ID = i.biladrid --LEFT JOIN dbo.BroaderArea bambil ON bambil.AddressID = adbil.ID AND bambil.BroaderAreaID LIKE 'HB%' --LEFT JOIN dbo.BroaderAreaLookUp balbil ON balbil.BroaderAreaID = bambil.BroaderAreaID where ( tixo.CustomerCode is null AND @xolisting = 0) OR ( tixo.CustomerCode is not null AND @xolisting = 1) OR ( @xolisting = 2) if object_id('tempdb..#SecondaryActivities') is not null drop table #secondaryActivities select cl.BusinessPointID,cn.Name ,RankID = RANK() over ( PARTITION By cl.BusinessPointID order by cn.Name, cl.ID ) into #secondaryActivities from #basicPoint bp join dbo.Classification cl ON bp.ID=cl.BusinessPointID and cl.ClassifierID=4 join dbo.ClassifierNode cn ON cn.ID=cl.ClassifierNodeID if object_id('tempdb..#result') is not null drop table #result select ID ,[Live σε XO] ,[Προέλευση] ,[Ημερομηνία Δημιουργίας] ,[Κατάσταση Επικαιροποίησης] ,[Ημερομηνία Επικαιροποίησης] ,[Κωδικός ΕΣ] ,[Διακριτικός] ,[Επωνυμία] ,[Επάγγελμα] ,[Φερεγγυότητα] ,[Διεύθυνση] ,[Πόλη] ,[Νομός] ,[Τηλέφωνα] = substring( ( Select ','+ST1.Τηλέφωνα AS [text()] From #basicPoint ST1 Where ST1.ID = bp.id For XML PATH ('') ), 2, 1000 ) ,[Url] ,[Email] ,[ΑΦΜ] ,[Κύρια Δραστηριότητα] ,[Δευτερεύουσα(ες) Δραστηριότητες] = substring( ( Select ','+ST1.Name AS [text()] From #secondaryActivities ST1 Where ST1.BusinessPointID = bp.id ORDER BY ST1.RankID For XML PATH ('') ), 2, 1000 ) ,[Ενεργά Συμβόλαια] --,SecActivity2= a2.Name,SecActivity3= a3.Name,SecActivity4= a4.Name,SecActivity5= a5.Name --,SecActivity6= a6.Name,SecActivity7= a7.Name,SecActivity8= a8.Name,SecActivity9= a9.Name,SecActivity10= a10.Name into #result from #basicPoint bp left join #secondaryActivities sa on bp.ID = sa.BusinessPointID --and a1.RankID =1 --left join #secondaryActivities a2 on bp.ID = a2.BusinessPointID and a2.RankID =2 --left join #secondaryActivities a3 on bp.ID = a3.BusinessPointID and a3.RankID =3 --left join #secondaryActivities a4 on bp.ID = a4.BusinessPointID and a4.RankID =4 --left join #secondaryActivities a5 on bp.ID = a5.BusinessPointID and a5.RankID =5 --left join #secondaryActivities a6 on bp.ID = a6.BusinessPointID and a6.RankID =6 --left join #secondaryActivities a7 on bp.ID = a7.BusinessPointID and a7.RankID =7 --left join #secondaryActivities a8 on bp.ID = a8.BusinessPointID and a8.RankID =8 --left join #secondaryActivities a9 on bp.ID = a9.BusinessPointID and a9.RankID =9 --left join #secondaryActivities a10 on bp.ID = a10.BusinessPointID and a10.RankID =10 where ( @activity = 1 and sa.BusinessPointID is null --and a2.BusinessPointID is null and a3.BusinessPointID is null --and a4.BusinessPointID is null and a5.BusinessPointID is null and a6.BusinessPointID is null and a7.BusinessPointID is null --and a8.BusinessPointID is null and a9.BusinessPointID is null and a10.BusinessPointID is null ) OR ( @activity = 0 and sa.BusinessPointID is not null --and a2.BusinessPointID is not null and a3.BusinessPointID is not null --and a4.BusinessPointID is not null and a5.BusinessPointID is not null and a6.BusinessPointID is not null and a7.BusinessPointID is not null --and a8.BusinessPointID is not null and a9.BusinessPointID is not null and a10.BusinessPointID is not null ) SELECT DISTINCT [Live σε XO] ,[Προέλευση] ,[Ημερομηνία Δημιουργίας] ,[Κατάσταση Επικαιροποίησης] ,[Ημερομηνία Επικαιροποίησης] ,[Κωδικός ΕΣ] ,[Διακριτικός] ,[Επωνυμία] ,[Επάγγελμα] ,[Φερεγγυότητα] ,[Διεύθυνση] ,[Πόλη] ,[Νομός] ,[Τηλέφωνα] ,[Url] ,[Email] ,[ΑΦΜ] ,[Κύρια Δραστηριότητα] ,[Δευτερεύουσα(ες) Δραστηριότητες] ,[Ενεργά Συμβόλαια] FROM #result WHERE id IS NOT null --ORDER BY 1,2 END ELSE begin SELECT DISTINCT [Live σε XO] = null ,[Προέλευση] = null ,[Ημερομηνία Δημιουργίας] = null ,[Κατάσταση Επικαιροποίησης] = null ,[Ημερομηνία Επικαιροποίησης] = null ,[Κωδικός ΕΣ] = null ,[Διακριτικός] = null ,[Επωνυμία] = null ,[Επάγγελμα] = null templates.sql: --SELECT cn.id,cn.CompositeName label FROM dbo.ClassifierNode cn WHERE cn.ClassifierTreeID = 2 ---Allages opou : --(duo pavles meta ton kwdika) --DECLARE @ids INT; --DECLARE @csid INT; --DECLARE @cuid INT; --DECLARE @perfecture varchar(50); --DECLARE @municipality varchar(50); --DECLARE @DateFrom datetime;-- --DECLARE @DateTo datetime;-- --DECLARE @BpUpdateFrom datetime;-- --DECLARE @BpUpdateTo datetime;-- --DECLARE @BpName varchar(50);-- --DECLARE @xolisting int; --DECLARE @activity bit; --DECLARE @MODE bit; --SET @ids = 82; --SET @csid = 14; --SET @cuid = 26; --SET @perfecture = 'Νομός Αττικής'; --SET @municipality = 'HB10'; --SET @DateFrom ='2017-03-20' ;-- --SET @DateTo = '2017-03-30';-- --SET @BpUpdateFrom ='2017-09-20' ;-- --SET @BpUpdateTo = '2017-09-30';-- --SET @BpName = 'an';-- --SET @BpBrandName = 'an';-- --SET @xolisting = 1; --SET @activity = 1; --SET @MODE = 1; IF @MODE = 0 BEGIN if object_id('tempdb..#activities') is not null drop table #activities SELECT items into #activities FROM itapps.dbo.SplitToInt(@allActivities, ',') if object_id('tempdb..#csids') is not null drop table #csids SELECT items into #csids FROM itapps.dbo.SplitToInt(@allCS, ',') if object_id('tempdb..#cuids') is not null drop table #cuids SELECT items into #cuids FROM itapps.dbo.SplitToInt(@allCU, ',') if object_id('tempdb..#pref') is not null drop table #pref SELECT items into #pref FROM itapps.dbo.Split(@allPrefectures, ',') if object_id('tempdb..#mun') is not null drop table #mun SELECT items into #mun FROM itapps.dbo.Split(@allMunicipality, ',') if object_id('tempdb..#ids') is not null drop table #ids select distinct bp.id id, ISNULL(bp.BillingAddressID, bilbp.LocationAddressID ) as biladrid, CustomerSource=cs.Description, CustomerUpdate=cu.Description, CustomerSolvency = solv.Description, LocationAddId = bp.LocationAddressID INTO #ids from dbo.BusinessPoint bp LEFT JOIN dbo.CustomerSolvency solv ON solv.ID = bp.CustomerSolvencyID left JOIN dbo.CustomerSource cs ON cs.id = bp.CustomerSourceID left JOIN dbo.CustomerUpdate cu ON cu.id = bp.CustomerUpdateID JOIN dbo.Classification cl ON bp.id = cl.BusinessPointID AND cl.ClassifierID IN (3,4) LEFT JOIN dbo.PointRelationship pr WITH (NOLOCK) ON pr.BusinessPointID = bp.id AND pr.type = 10 LEFT JOIN dbo.BusinessPoint bilbp WITH (NOLOCK) ON pr.TargetBussinessPointID = bilbp.id join #activities act on cl.ClassifierNodeID = act.items join #csids csi on csi.items = isnull(bp.CustomerSourceID,-1) join #cuids cui on cui.items = isnull(bp.CustomerUpdateID ,-1) where bp.IsActive = 1 and cast(bp.CreatedOn as date) >= @DateFrom-- and cast(bp.CreatedOn as date) <= @DateTo-- and (bp.name like '%'+@BpName+'%' or bp.BrandName like '%'+@BpName+'%' or @BpName is null ) -- AND cast(bp.CustomerUpdateModifiedOn as date) >= @BpUpdateFrom-- AND cast(bp.CustomerUpdateModifiedOn as date) <= @BpUpdateTo-- --AND cl.ClassifierNodeID IN (@ids) --AND bp.CustomerSourceID IN (@csid) --AND bp.CustomerUpdateID IN (@cuid) if object_id('tempdb..#CustIndic') is not null drop table #CustIndic SELECT clf.BusinessPointID, CustomerIndicator=cn.Name INTO #CustIndic FROM #ids id JOIN dbo.Classification clf ON clf.BusinessPointID = id.id JOIN dbo.ClassifierNode cn ON cn.ID = clf.ClassifierNodeID WHERE ClassifierID=5 if object_id('tempdb..#CustMainActivity') is not null drop table #CustMainActivity SELECT clf.BusinessPointID, MainActivity=cn.Name INTO #CustMainActivity FROM #ids id JOIN dbo.Classification clf ON clf.BusinessPointID = id.id JOIN dbo.ClassifierNode cn ON cn.ID = clf.ClassifierNodeID WHERE ClassifierID=3 if object_id('tempdb..#avct') is not null drop table #avct select count(distinct ct.id) AS ctid, MaxEndDate=MAX(adv.AdvEndDate), MaxSignDate=MAX(ct.SignedDate), ct.ActualBPOwnerID INTO #avct from #ids id JOIN Contract ct ON ct.ActualBPOwnerID = id.id join ContractProduct cp ON cp.RelatedContractID = ct.id and ct.State NOT IN (3,5) and ct.Type not in (1,10) join Advertisement adv ON adv.ContractProductID = cp.id and (adv.AdvEndDate > GETDATE()) group by ct.ID, ct.ActualBPOwnerID --if object_id('tempdb..#comments') is not null --drop table #comments --SELECT bpc.BusinessPointID, bpc.CommentText, bpc.CommentDate --INTO #comments --FROM #ids id --JOIN dbo.BusinessPointComment bpc ON bpc.BusinessPointID = id.id --WHERE bpc.ID = (SELECT MAX(id) -- FROM dbo.BusinessPointComment bpcin -- WHERE bpcin.BusinessPointID = bpc.BusinessPointID) if object_id('tempdb..#emails') is not null drop table #emails Select pe.BusinessPointID, pe.Email INTO #emails FROM #ids id JOIN dbo.PointEmail pe ON pe.BusinessPointID = id.id where pe.ID = (SELECT min(id) FROM dbo.PointEmail pein WHERE pe.BusinessPointID = pein.BusinessPointID ) if object_id('tempdb..#phones') is not null drop table #phones Select pe.BusinessPointID, pe.Number INTO #phones FROM #ids id JOIN dbo.PointPhone pe ON pe.BusinessPointID = id.id WHERE pe.Usage = 1 and pe.ID = (SELECT min(id) FROM dbo.PointPhone pein WHERE pe.BusinessPointID = pein.BusinessPointID AND pein.Usage = 1 ) if object_id('tempdb..#basicPoint') is not null drop table #basicPoint select distinct bp.id ID ,[Live σε XO]= case when tixo.CustomerCode is null then 'False' else 'True' end ,[Προέλευση] = i.CustomerSource ,[Ημερομηνία Δημιουργίας] = cast(bp.CreatedOn as date) ,[Κατάσταση Επικαιροποίησης] = cu.[Description] ,[Ημερομηνία Επικαιροποίησης] = bp.CustomerUpdateModifiedOn ,[Κωδικός ΕΣ]= cast(bp.code AS BIGINT) ,[Διακριτικός] = bp.name ,[Επωνυμία] = bp.BrandName ,[Επάγγελμα] = bp.profession ,[Φερεγγυότητα] = i.CustomerSolvency --,[CusIndicator]= indi.CustomerIndicator ---locationaddress ,[Διεύθυνση] = Ad.[Line1] --,[Περιοχή]= Ad.[Line3] ,[Πόλη]=bal.AreaName ,[Νομός] = ad.GeoModelDistrict --,[Πηγή] = i.CustomerSource --,[Επικαιροποίηση] = i.CustomerUpdate ,[Τηλέφωνα] = (SELECT TOP 1 ph.Number FROM yps.[dbo].[PointPhone] ph WHERE ph.BusinessPointID=bp.ID AND ph.isactive=1 AND ph.Usage!=5 ORDER BY ph.ID DESC) -----CSV ,[Url] = case when bp.Url is null then 'False' else 'True' end ,[Email] = case when (SELECT TOP 1 pe.Email FROM yps.[dbo].[PointEmail] pe WHERE pe.BusinessPointID=bp.ID ORDER BY pe.ID DESC) is null then 'False' else 'True' end ,[ΑΦΜ] = case when tc.TaxCode is null then 'False' else 'True' end ,[Κύρια Δραστηριότητα]= act.MainActivity --,[Δευτερεύουσα(ες) Δραστηριότητες] = '' ,[Ενεργά Συμβόλαια] = avct.ctid -----CSV -----billing address --,[Διεύθυνση Τιμ.] = adbil.[Line1] --,[Περιοχή Τιμ.]= adbil.[Line3] --,[Δήμος Τιμ.]=balbil.AreaName --,[Νομός Τιμ.] = adbil.GeoModelDistrict --,[Ημερ.Λήξης ΓΓΠΣ] = g.stopDate --,[ActiveContracts] = avct.ctid --,[Ημερ. Λήξης Προβολής]= avct.MaxEndDate --,[LastCreatedContract] = MaxSignDate --,[LastComment] = comm.CommentText --,[LastCommentDate] = comm.CommentDate --,[email1] =em.Email --,[Phone1] = ph.Number into #basicPoint from #ids i JOIN #CustIndic indi ON indi.BusinessPointID = i.id JOIN #CustMainActivity act ON act.BusinessPointID = i.id LEFT join BusinessPoint bp ON i.id = bp.id left join #avct avct on avct.ActualBPOwnerID = bp.id LEFT JOIN CustomerUpdate cu on cu.id = bp.CustomerUpdateID left join TaxCode tc ON tc.id =bp.id left join Itapps.xoupdate.XoListing tixo on tixo.CustomerCode = bp.Code LEFT JOIN itapps.dbo.[gsis_Data] g ON g.afm = tc.taxcode --LEFT join #comments comm ON comm.BusinessPointID = bp.ID LEFT JOIN #emails em ON em.BusinessPointID = i.id LEFT JOIN #phones ph ON ph.BusinessPointID = i.id ---location address JOIN dbo.Address ad ON ad.ID = i.LocationAddId JOIN dbo.BroaderArea bap ON bap.AddressID = ad.ID JOIN #pref p ON bap.BroaderAreaID = p.items JOIN dbo.BroaderArea bam ON bam.AddressID = ad.ID JOIN #mun m ON bam.BroaderAreaID = m.items JOIN dbo.BroaderAreaLookUp bal ON bal.BroaderAreaID = bam.BroaderAreaID ---billing --LEFT JOIN dbo.Address adbil ON adbil.ID = i.biladrid --LEFT JOIN dbo.BroaderArea bambil ON bambil.AddressID = adbil.ID AND bambil.BroaderAreaID LIKE 'HB%' --LEFT JOIN dbo.BroaderAreaLookUp balbil ON balbil.BroaderAreaID = bambil.BroaderAreaID where ( tixo.CustomerCode is null AND @xolisting = 0) OR ( tixo.CustomerCode is not null AND @xolisting = 1) OR ( @xolisting = 2) if object_id('tempdb..#SecondaryActivities') is not null drop table #secondaryActivities select cl.BusinessPointID,cn.Name ,RankID = RANK() over ( PARTITION By cl.BusinessPointID order by cn.Name, cl.ID ) into #secondaryActivities from #basicPoint bp join dbo.Classification cl ON bp.ID=cl.BusinessPointID and cl.ClassifierID=4 join dbo.ClassifierNode cn ON cn.ID=cl.ClassifierNodeID if object_id('tempdb..#result') is not null drop table #result select ID ,[Live σε XO] ,[Προέλευση] ,[Ημερομηνία Δημιουργίας] ,[Κατάσταση Επικαιροποίησης] ,[Ημερομηνία Επικαιροποίησης] ,[Κωδικός ΕΣ] ,[Διακριτικός] ,[Επωνυμία] ,[Επάγγελμα] ,[Φερεγγυότητα] ,[Διεύθυνση] ,[Πόλη] ,[Νομός] ,[Τηλέφωνα] = substring( ( Select ','+ST1.Τηλέφωνα AS [text()] From #basicPoint ST1 Where ST1.ID = bp.id For XML PATH ('') ), 2, 1000 ) ,[Url] ,[Email] ,[ΑΦΜ] ,[Κύρια Δραστηριότητα] ,[Δευτερεύουσα(ες) Δραστηριότητες] = substring( ( Select ','+ST1.Name AS [text()] From #secondaryActivities ST1 Where ST1.BusinessPointID = bp.id ORDER BY ST1.RankID For XML PATH ('') ), 2, 1000 ) ,[Ενεργά Συμβόλαια] --,SecActivity2= a2.Name,SecActivity3= a3.Name,SecActivity4= a4.Name,SecActivity5= a5.Name --,SecActivity6= a6.Name,SecActivity7= a7.Name,SecActivity8= a8.Name,SecActivity9= a9.Name,SecActivity10= a10.Name into #result from #basicPoint bp left join #secondaryActivities sa on bp.ID = sa.BusinessPointID --and a1.RankID =1 --left join #secondaryActivities a2 on bp.ID = a2.BusinessPointID and a2.RankID =2 --left join #secondaryActivities a3 on bp.ID = a3.BusinessPointID and a3.RankID =3 --left join #secondaryActivities a4 on bp.ID = a4.BusinessPointID and a4.RankID =4 --left join #secondaryActivities a5 on bp.ID = a5.BusinessPointID and a5.RankID =5 --left join #secondaryActivities a6 on bp.ID = a6.BusinessPointID and a6.RankID =6 --left join #secondaryActivities a7 on bp.ID = a7.BusinessPointID and a7.RankID =7 --left join #secondaryActivities a8 on bp.ID = a8.BusinessPointID and a8.RankID =8 --left join #secondaryActivities a9 on bp.ID = a9.BusinessPointID and a9.RankID =9 --left join #secondaryActivities a10 on bp.ID = a10.BusinessPointID and a10.RankID =10 where ( @activity = 1 and sa.BusinessPointID is null --and a2.BusinessPointID is null and a3.BusinessPointID is null --and a4.BusinessPointID is null and a5.BusinessPointID is null and a6.BusinessPointID is null and a7.BusinessPointID is null --and a8.BusinessPointID is null and a9.BusinessPointID is null and a10.BusinessPointID is null ) OR ( @activity = 0 and sa.BusinessPointID is not null --and a2.BusinessPointID is not null and a3.BusinessPointID is not null --and a4.BusinessPointID is not null and a5.BusinessPointID is not null and a6.BusinessPointID is not null and a7.BusinessPointID is not null --and a8.BusinessPointID is not null and a9.BusinessPointID is not null and a10.BusinessPointID is not null ) SELECT [Αριθμός Εγγραφών] = count(distinct [Κωδικός ΕΣ]) FROM #result WHERE id IS NOT null --ORDER BY 1,2 END ELSE begin SELECT [Αριθμός Εγγραφών] = null END

templates.name: Επιχειρησιακά Σημεία με Customer Constraints - Επιχειρησιακά Σημεία  ανά Προέλευση - Constraints Main
templates.source: rdl:Επιχειρησιακά Σημεία με Customer Constraints - Επιχειρησιακά Σημεία  ανά Προέλευση:ConstraintsMain
templates.sql: IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#Constraint') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #Constraint IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#a') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #a select distinct top 5000 bp.code as 'Κωδ. ΕΣ' ,bp.BrandName as 'Φορ. Επωνυμία', bp.Name as 'Διακριτικός Τίτλος' ,cln.name as 'Constraint' ,cs.description as 'Προέλευση' into #Constraint from BusinessPoint bp left join dbo.Classification cl on cl.BusinessPointID = bp.ID and cl.ClassifierID = 6 left JOIN dbo.ClassifierNode cln ON cl.ClassifierNodeID = cln.ID left join CustomerSource cs on bp.CustomerSourceID = cs.id where bp.IsActive = 1 and isnull(cln.id,9999) in ( @constraint) and bp.Name <> 'Empty-Name' and isnull(cs.id,1111) in (@CustomerSource) select top 5000 c.[Κωδ. ΕΣ], c.[Φορ. Επωνυμία],c.[Διακριτικός Τίτλος],min(pp.Number) as 'Τηλέφωνο',c.[Constraint],c.[Προέλευση] from #Constraint c left join BusinessPoint bp on bp.code = c.[Κωδ. ΕΣ] left join PointPhone pp on pp.BusinessPointID = bp.id where pp.IsActive = 1 and pp.Usage in (1,4,9,10,11) group by c.[Κωδ. ΕΣ], c.[Φορ. Επωνυμία],c.[Διακριτικός Τίτλος],c.[Constraint],c.[Προέλευση]

templates.name: Επιχειρησιακά Σημεία με Customer Constraints - Επιχειρησιακά Σημεία  ανά Προέλευση - Customer Constraints
templates.source: rdl:Επιχειρησιακά Σημεία με Customer Constraints - Επιχειρησιακά Σημεία  ανά Προέλευση:CustomerConstraints
templates.sql: SELECT DISTINCT cln.id, cln.name FROM dbo.Classification AS cl JOIN dbo.ClassifierNode AS cln ON cl.ClassifierNodeID = cln.ID JOIN dbo.Classifier AS clr ON cl.ClassifierID = clr.ID WHERE clr.id = 6 UNION SELECT 9999, '(Χωρίς Customer Constraints)' /* distinct cln.id, from dbo.Classification cl JOIN dbo.ClassifierNode cln ON cl.ClassifierNodeID = cln.ID JOIN dbo.Classifier clr ON cl.ClassifierID = clr.ID where clr.id <> 6 */

templates.name: Επιχειρησιακά Σημεία με Customer Constraints - Επιχειρησιακά Σημεία  ανά Προέλευση - Source
templates.source: rdl:Επιχειρησιακά Σημεία με Customer Constraints - Επιχειρησιακά Σημεία  ανά Προέλευση:Source
templates.sql: SELECT cs.id, cs.Description FROM CustomerSource AS cs UNION SELECT 1111, '(Χωρίς Προέλευση)' FROM CustomerSource AS cs

templates.name: Επιχειρησιακά Σημεία με Customer Constraints - Επιχειρησιακά Σημεία  ανά Προέλευση - Main Count
templates.source: rdl:Επιχειρησιακά Σημεία με Customer Constraints - Επιχειρησιακά Σημεία  ανά Προέλευση:MainCount
templates.sql: SELECT COUNT(bp.code) AS bpCodeCnt FROM BusinessPoint AS bp LEFT JOIN dbo.Classification AS cl ON cl.BusinessPointID = bp.ID AND cl.ClassifierID = 6 LEFT JOIN dbo.ClassifierNode AS cln ON cl.ClassifierNodeID = cln.ID LEFT JOIN CustomerSource AS cs ON bp.CustomerSourceID = cs.id WHERE bp.IsActive = 1 AND ISNULL(cln.id, 9999) IN (@constraint) AND bp.Name <> 'Empty-Name' AND ISNULL(cs.id, 1111) IN (@CustomerSource)

templates.name: Ιστορικό Αναθέσης πελατών σε πωλήσεις - Data Set1
templates.sql: --declare @datefrom datetime --set @datefrom='20121029' --declare @dateto datetime --set @dateto='20141110' --declare @bpcode varchar(10) --set @bpcode='278563' ;with xx as (Select MIN(T.CreatedOn) mindd,tgiv.id as tgivid from TargetGroupItemValue tgiv join TargetGroupItem tgi on tgi.ID=tgiv.TargetGroupItemID JOIN [Case] c ON c.ContextEntityID = tgiv.ID AND c.ContextEntityType = 'TGIV' JOIN [Case] cc ON cc.MasterCaseID = c.ID JOIN Task t ON t.CaseID = cc.ID where tgi.Code=@bpcode group by tgiv.id ) SELECT tgivid = tgiv.id , '['+cmp.code+'] '+cmp.Name campaign , u.UserName ActualUser , t.Description Task , t.CreatedOn TaskCreatedOn , t.CompletedOn TaskCompletedOn , '['+pro.code +'] '+pro.Description as product , adv.AdvBeginDate,tgiv.altofferid as contractid , '['+mv.Code+'] '+mv.Description AS Medium ,case t.outcome when 'ΑΔΥΝ' then 'Αδυναμία εύρεσης πελάτη' when 'ΕΚΠΤ' then 'Αίτημα Εκπτωσης' when 'ΑΡΝΕ' then 'Αρνηση Επικοινωνίας' when 'ΡΑΝΤ' then 'Κλείσιμο Ραντεβού' when 'ΠΡΟΣΦ' then 'Δημιουργία Προσφοράς' when 'ΝΕΟΡ' then 'Επισκεψη - Νέο Ραντεβού' when 'ΑΡΝ' then 'Αρνηση Συνεργασίας' when 'ΑΝΣΥ' then 'Αναμονή Συμβολαίου' when 'ΑΠΟΔΥ' then 'Aποδοχή με υπογραφή' when 'ΑΠΟΔΜ' then 'Αποδοχή με email' when 'ΣΚΦΦ' then 'Συμπλήρωση κωδικού φυσικού φακέλου' when 'ΔΣΥΜ' then 'Διόρθωση συμβολαίου' when 'ΕΚΠΤΑ' then 'Εξέταση αιτήματος έκπτωσης' when 'ΕΛΟΠΣ' then 'Έλεγχος ορθότητας και πληρότητας Συμβολαίου' when 'ΕΞΜΣ' then 'Εξέταση μεταφοράς στόχου' when 'ΕΞΟΠΣ' then 'Εξέταση ορθότητας και πληρότητας συμβολαίου' when 'ΑΕΚΠΤ' then 'Απάντηση αιτήματος έκπτωσης' when 'ΑΠΟΔΠ' then 'Αποδοχή πρότασης' when 'ΟΛΟΚΒΗΜ' then 'Ολοκλήρωση βήματος' when 'ΣΥΜΥΛ' then 'Συμπλήρωση Κειμένων και Μεταφράσεων' when 'Forward' then 'Προώθηση' else t.Outcome end outcome , Case t.Outcome when 'Επανάκληση' then pr.Description when 'ΑΡΝ' then nr.Description when 'ΑΔΥΝ' then nc.Description End as reason , pr.Description as postponeReason , nr.Description as negationReason , nc.Description as nocommReason FROM xx join TargetGroupItemValue tgiv on xx.tgivid=tgiv.id join TargetGroupItem tgi on tgi.ID=tgiv.TargetGroupItemID JOIN [Case] c ON c.ContextEntityID = tgiv.ID AND c.ContextEntityType = 'TGIV' JOIN [Case] cc ON cc.MasterCaseID = c.ID JOIN Task t ON t.CaseID = cc.ID join Campaign cmp on cmp.ID=tgi.CampaignID JOIN dbo.TaskType tt ON t.TaskTypeID = tt.ID and tt.ActivityType='H' LEFT JOIN dbo.[User] u ON t.ActualOwnerID = u.ID left join dbo.PostponeReason pr on pr.ID=tgiv.PostponeReasonID left join dbo.NegationReason nr on nr.ID=tgiv.NegationReasonID left join dbo.NoCommReason nc on nc.ID=tgiv.NoCommReasonID LEFT JOIN dbo.Advertisement ADV ON Cc.ContextEntityID = ADV.ID AND Cc.ContextEntityType = 'ADV' LEFT JOIN dbo.Product pro ON adv.ProductID = pro.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.VersionSection vs on vs.ID=adv.VersionSectionID LEFT JOIN dbo.MediumVersion mv on mv.ID=vs.MediumVersionID WHERE tgi.code=@bpcode and xx.mindd between @datefrom and @dateto+1 order by tgiv.ID,t.id

templates.name: Ιστορικό Συμβολαίου - YPSContract View Dataset
templates.sql: SELECT c.ID AS ContractID, bpActual.Code AS ActualBPCode, bpActual.Name AS ActualBPName, bpBilling.Code AS BillingBPCode, bpBilling.Name AS BillingBPName, c.CreatedOn, c.SignedDate, ( CASE WHEN NOT c.DMKey IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS IsMigrated, ( CASE WHEN NOT c.DMKey IS NULL THEN c.DMKey ELSE '' END ) AS MigrateCode, ( CASE c.State WHEN 0 THEN 'Pending' WHEN 1 THEN 'Approved' WHEN 2 THEN 'Rejected' WHEN 3 THEN 'Cancelled' WHEN 4 THEN 'Replaced' WHEN 5 THEN 'CancelledOffer' WHEN 6 THEN 'Modified' END ) AS ContractState, ISNULL( ( SELECT TOP 1 CAST(ipm.PaymentMonth AS DATE) AS Expr1 FROM InvoicePaymentMethod AS ipm WHERE ( ipm.id = c.ID ) ORDER BY ipm.PaymentMonth ), ( SELECT TOP 1 CAST(pmED.PaymentMonth AS DATE) AS Expr1 FROM ContractProduct AS cpED INNER JOIN PaymentMethod AS pmED ON cpED.PaymentMethodID = pmED.ID WHERE ( cpED.RelatedContractID = c.ID ) ORDER BY pmED.PaymentMonth ) ) AS ExpectedFirstPaymentDT, ( CASE WHEN c.ShippingType = 0 THEN 'Email' WHEN c.ShippingType = 1 THEN 'Fax' WHEN c.ShippingType = 2 THEN 'Ταχυδρομείο' WHEN c.ShippingType IS NULL THEN 'Μη Διαθέσιμο' END ) AS ShippingType FROM Contract AS c INNER JOIN BusinessPoint AS bpActual ON c.ActualBPOwnerID = bpActual.ID INNER JOIN BusinessPoint AS bpBilling ON c.BillingPointID = bpBilling.ID WHERE ( c.ID = @ContractID ) AND ( c.Type IN (0, 2, 3, 4, 5) )

templates.name: Ιστορικό Συμβολαίου - YPSContract View History Data Set
templates.sql: --temp για να παρουμε ολα τα προιοντα του συμβολαιου comma-separated IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#Products') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #Products SELECT DISTINCT [ContractID] = cp.RelatedContractID, [code] = pr.code+' - '+isnull(pr.[Name],'') into #Products from udac u left join UdacProdRole upr on u.id = upr.UdacID join Product pr on u.id = pr.UdacID join Advertisement adv on adv.ProductID = pr.id join VersionSection vs on adv.VersionSectionID = vs.id join MediumVersion mv on mv.id = vs.MediumVersionID join Medium m on m.id = mv.MediumID join ContractProduct cp on cp.id = adv.ContractProductID where upr.UdacID is null and pr.IsComposite = 0 and m.id not in (84,83,73,75,76,9) and cp.RelatedContractID = @ContractID --group by cp.RelatedContractID --having count(pr.code)>1 order by 1 desc IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#Products2') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #Products2 SELECT p1.ContractID, [Products] = ( SELECT code + ' || ' FROM #Products p2 WHERE p2.ContractID = p1.ContractID ORDER BY Code FOR XML PATH('') ) INTO #products2 FROM #Products p1 GROUP BY ContractID ; IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#t1') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #t1 --tasks πωλησεων και παραγωγης SELECT t.id, t.CreatedOn, t.[Description], [PotentialRole] = ISNULL(potusr.LastName +' '+ potusr.FirstName,r.[Description]), [ActualOwner] = u.UserName, [Outcome] = CASE WHEN t.Status = 0 THEN '' ELSE t.Outcome END, t.DynamicDescription, t.CompletedOn, [Status] = CASE WHEN t.Status = 0 THEN 'Pending' ELSE 'Completed' END, [TaskProductCode] = CASE WHEN tt.id = 189 /*έλεγχος πληρότητας*/ THEN prs.Products ELSE pr.Code END, --prs.Code [TaskProduct] = pr.[Description], [ContractId] = COALESCE(tgiv.ContractID, tgiv.AltOfferID), [Medium] = mv.Code+'-'+mv.[Description], adv.AdvBeginDate INTO #t1 FROM TargetGroupItemValue tgiv JOIN [Case] c ON c.ContextEntityID = tgiv.ID AND c.ContextEntityType = 'TGIV' JOIN [Case] cc ON cc.MasterCaseID = c.ID JOIN Task t ON t.CaseID = cc.ID --LEFT JOIN dbo.TaskLog tl ON t.ID = tl.TaskID JOIN dbo.TaskType tt ON t.TaskTypeID = tt.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.TaskAssignment ta ON t.ID = ta.TaskID AND ta.AssignmentType = 0 LEFT JOIN dbo.[User] potusr ON ta.UserID = potusr.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.Role r ON ta.RoleID = r.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.[User] u ON t.ActualOwnerID = u.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.[User] su ON t.SenderID = su.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.Advertisement ADV ON Cc.ContextEntityID = ADV.ID AND Cc.ContextEntityType = 'ADV' LEFT JOIN dbo.Product pr ON adv.ProductID = pr.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.VersionSection vs on vs.ID=adv.VersionSectionID LEFT JOIN dbo.MediumVersion mv on mv.ID=vs.MediumVersionID LEFT JOIN #products2 prs on prs.ContractID = @ContractID WHERE (tgiv.ContractID =@ContractID OR tgiv.AltOfferID =@ContractID ) AND tt.ActivityType = 'H' UNION ALL --tasks απο CDM (ContractDeliveryManagement (ITApp)) SELECT t.id, t.CreatedOn, [Description] = t.[Description], [PotentialRole] = NULL, [ActualOwner] = t.CompletedBy, [Outcome] = o.[Description], [DynamicDescription] = NULL, t.CompletedOn, [Status] = CASE WHEN t.Closed =1 THEN 'Completed' ELSE 'Pending' END, [TaskProductCode] = isnull('Επανάκληση:' + convert(varchar(10), ti.recalldate, 103),'') + isnull(' ' + convert(varchar(5), ti.recalldate, 108) ,'') + isnull(' || Ραντεβού:' + convert(varchar(10), ti.AppointmentDateFrom, 103),'') + isnull(' ' + convert(varchar(5), ti.AppointmentDateFrom, 108) ,'') + isnull(' - ' + convert(varchar(5), ti.AppointmentDateTo, 108) ,'') + isnull(' || Ανάθεση σε:' + au.[Name],'') + isnull(' || Barcode' + ti.Barcode,'') , [TaskProduct] = NULL, ci.Contractid, [Medium] = NULL, [Advbegindate] = NULL FROM Itapps.cdm.[case] cs JOIN Itapps.cdm.caseinfo ci ON ci.caseid = cs.Id JOIN Itapps.cdm.task t ON t.CaseId = cs.Id JOIN Itapps.cdm.TaskInfo ti ON ti.TaskId = t.Id LEFT JOIN Itapps.cdm.AssignUsers au ON au.id = ti.AssignedTo LEFT JOIN Itapps.cdm.Outcome o ON t.OutcomeId = o.Id WHERE ci.ContractId = @ContractID UNION ALL SELECT t.id, t.CreatedOn, [Description] = t.[Description], [PotentialRole] = NULL, [ActualOwner] = t.CompletedBy, [Outcome] = o.[Description], [DynamicDescription] = NULL, t.CompletedOn, [Status] = CASE WHEN t.Closed =1 THEN 'Completed' ELSE 'Pending' END, [TaskProductCode] = isnull('Επανάκληση:' + convert(varchar(10), ti.recalldate, 103),'') + isnull(' ' + convert(varchar(5), ti.recalldate, 108) ,'') + isnull(' || Ραντεβού:' + convert(varchar(10), ti.AppointmentDateFrom, 103),'') + isnull(' ' + convert(varchar(5), ti.AppointmentDateFrom, 108) ,'') + isnull(' - ' + convert(varchar(5), ti.AppointmentDateTo, 108) ,'') + isnull(' || Ανάθεση σε:' + au.[Name],'') + isnull(' || Barcode' + ti.Barcode,'') , [TaskProduct] = NULL, ci.Contractid, [Medium] = NULL, [Advbegindate] = NULL FROM Itapps.cdm.[caseHistory] cs JOIN Itapps.cdm.caseinfoHistory ci ON ci.caseid = cs.Id JOIN Itapps.cdm.taskHistory t ON t.CaseId = cs.Id JOIN Itapps.cdm.TaskInfoHistory ti ON ti.TaskId = t.Id LEFT JOIN Itapps.cdm.AssignUsers au ON au.id = ti.AssignedTo LEFT JOIN Itapps.cdm.Outcome o ON t.OutcomeId = o.Id WHERE ci.ContractId = @ContractID ORDER BY CreatedOn -- docusign pseudo-task IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#t2') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #t2 SELECT TOP 1 [id] = cast(NULL as int), [CreatedOn] = e.CreatedOn, [Description] = 'Αναμονή Υπογραφής μέσω Docusign', [PotentialRole] = cast(NULL as nvarchar(20)), [ActualOwner] = 'Docusign System', [Outcome] = CASE WHEN s.StatusTypeID = 0 THEN 'Pending' WHEN s.StatusTypeID = 1 AND p.ID is not null THEN 'Completed' WHEN s.StatusTypeID = 1 AND p.ID is null THEN 'SignNoPayment' WHEN s.StatusTypeID = 2 THEN 'RefusedToSign' WHEN s.StatusTypeID = 3 THEN 'Expired' END, [DynamicDescription] = cast(NULL as nvarchar(20)), [CompletedOn] = CASE WHEN s.StatusTypeID = 0 THEN NULL ELSE s.[Date] END, [Status] = CASE WHEN s.StatusTypeID = 0 THEN 'Pending' ELSE 'Completed' END, [TaskProductCode] = cast(NULL as nvarchar(20)), [TaskProduct] = cast(NULL as nvarchar(20)), [Contractid] = e.ContractID, [Medium] = cast(NULL as nvarchar(20)), [Advbegindate] = NULL INTO #t2 FROM Itapps.docusign.Envelope e JOIN Itapps.docusign.EnvelopeStatus s on s.EnvelopeID = e.ID LEFT JOIN [avocet\avocet].XODB.xopayment.Contractpayment p on p.ContractID = e.ContractID WHERE e.ContractID = @ContractID order by s.ID desc select * from #t1 union all select * from #t2 order by CreatedOn

templates.name: Ιστορικό Συμβολαίου - EBSContract Exists Data Set
templates.sql: SELECT ESDCreated FROM dbo.ESFITradeAccountContract WHERE Code = @ContractID

templates.name: Ιστορικό Συμβολαίου - EBSContract TPYData Set
templates.sql: SELECT MIN(dt.ESDCreated) AS ESDCreated FROM esfidocumenttrade AS dt INNER JOIN esfidocumenttype AS dtype ON dtype.gid = dt.faddocumenttypegid INNER JOIN ESFITradeAccountContract AS ec ON ec.Code = dt.faddimension1code WHERE dtype.code = 'ΤΠΥ' AND dtype.fcompanycode = '001' AND dt.faddimension1code = @ContractID

templates.name: Ιστορικό Συμβολαίου - EBSContract OTEData Set
templates.sql: SELECT ( 'Αποστολή Δόσεων ( ' + flinetablefield1code + ' )' ) AS Txt, COUNT(UDFString2) AS YesNo FROM esfilineliquidityaccount WHERE fdimension1code = @ContractID AND UDFString2 = 'SENT' GROUP BY flinetablefield1code

templates.name: Ιστορικό Συμβολαίου - Subscription Based Data Set
templates.sql: SELECT ( CASE WHEN SUM(CAST(adv.IsSubscriptionBased AS NUMERIC)) > 0 THEN '1' ELSE '0' END ) AS SubscriptionBased FROM dbo.ContractProduct AS cp JOIN dbo.Advertisement AS adv ON cp.ID = adv.ContractProductID WHERE RelatedContractID = @ContractID

templates.name: Ιστορικό Συμβολαίου - Solvency Data Set
templates.sql: /* SELECT CASE WHEN ta.fTableField1Code = '001' THEN 'GREEN' WHEN ta.fTableField1Code = '002' THEN 'YELLOW' WHEN ta.fTableField1Code = '003' THEN 'ORANGE' WHEN ta.fTableField1Code = '004' THEN 'RED' END AS Solvency FROM dbo.ESFITradeAccount ta JOIN dbo.ESFITradeAccountContract tac ON ta.GID = tac.fTradeAccountGID WHERE tac.Code = @ContractID */ SELECT cs.Description AS Solvency FROM dbo.Contract AS ct JOIN dbo.BusinessPoint AS bp ON bp.id = ct.ActualBPOwnerID JOIN dbo.CustomerSolvency AS cs ON cs.id = bp.CustomerSolvencyID WHERE ct.id = @ContractID

templates.name: Ιστορικό Συμβολαίου - Contract Value Dataset
aggregations: SUM(CASE WHEN cp.state IN (3, 4) THEN cp.price - cp.discount - cp.rulesdiscount - COALESCE(cp.AlteredAmount, 0) ELSE 0 END)
SUM(CASE WHEN cp.state IN (3, 4) THEN COALESCE(AlteredAmount, 0) ELSE cp.Price - cp.Discount - cp.RulesDiscount END)
templates.sql: SELECT ct.id AS ContractID, SUM(cp.price) AS Price, SUM(cp.discount) AS SDDiscount, SUM(cp.rulesdiscount) AS RulesDiscount, SUM(cp.ProductDiscount) AS ProductDiscount, SUM(cp.PaymentDiscount) AS PaymentDiscount, SUM(cp.BundleDiscount) AS BundleDiscount, SUM( CASE WHEN cp.state IN (3, 4) THEN cp.price - cp.discount - cp.rulesdiscount - ISNULL(cp.AlteredAmount, 0) ELSE 0 END ) AS AlteredDiffAmount, SUM( CASE WHEN cp.state IN (3, 4) THEN ISNULL(AlteredAmount, 0) ELSE cp.Price - cp.Discount - cp.RulesDiscount END ) AS PriceAfterDiscount FROM Contract AS ct JOIN ContractProduct AS cp ON ct.id = cp.RelatedContractID WHERE ct.id = @ContractID AND ct.type IN (2, 3, 4, 5) GROUP BY ct.id

templates.name: Ιστορικό Συμβολαίου - YPSContract View History CRM
templates.sql: --temp για να παρουμε ολα τα προιοντα του συμβολαιου comma-separated IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#Products') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #Products IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#Products2') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #Products2 select distinct cp.RelatedContractID as ContractID,pr.code+' - '+isnull(pr.Name,'') as code into #Products from udac u left join UdacProdRole upr on u.id = upr.UdacID join Product pr on u.id = pr.UdacID join Advertisement adv on adv.ProductID = pr.id join VersionSection vs on adv.VersionSectionID = vs.id join MediumVersion mv on mv.id = vs.MediumVersionID join Medium m on m.id = mv.MediumID join ContractProduct cp on cp.id = adv.ContractProductID where upr.UdacID is null and pr.IsComposite = 0 and m.id not in (84,83,73,75,76,9) and cp.RelatedContractID = @ContractID --group by cp.RelatedContractID --having count(pr.code)>1 order by 1 desc SELECT p1.ContractID, ( SELECT code + ' || ' FROM #Products p2 WHERE p2.ContractID = p1.ContractID ORDER BY Code FOR XML PATH('') ) AS Products into #products2 FROM #Products p1 GROUP BY ContractID ; --tasks CRM select distinct ti.ID TicketID ,tit.[Description] TicketDescription ,t.id ,t.CreatedOn ,t.[Description] ,isnull(pu.LastName +' '+ pu.FirstName,case when t.[Description] = 'Δημιουργία Case' then null else r.[Description] end) as PotentialRole ,au.UserName ActualOwner ,t.Outcome ,t.DynamicDescription ,t.CompletedOn ,case when t.[Status] = 0 then 'Pending' else 'Completed' end as [Status] ,prs.Products TaskProductCode ,TaskProduct = null ,ti.RelatedContractID ,Medium = null -- mv.Code+'-'+mv.Description AS Medium ,AdvBeginDate = null -- ad.AdvBeginDate from Ticket ti join [Case] c on c.ContextEntityID = ti.ID and c.ContextEntityType = 'TICKET' join [Case] cc on cc.MasterCaseID = c.ID join Task t on t.CaseID = cc.ID join TaskType tt on tt.ID = t.TaskTypeID left join [User] au on au.ID = t.ActualOwnerID left join TaskAssignment ta on ta.TaskID = t.ID left join [Role] r on r.ID = ta.RoleID left join [User] pu on pu.ID = ta.UserID left join #products2 prs on prs.ContractID = @ContractID join TicketType tit on tit.ID = ti.TicketTypeID --left join Advertisement ad on ad.ID = cc.ContextEntityID and cc.ContextEntityType = 'ADV' --left join Product p on p.ID = ad.ProductID --left join VersionSection vs on vs.ID = ad.VersionSectionID --left join MediumVersion mv on mv.ID = vs.MediumVersionID where ti.RelatedContractID = @ContractID and tt.ActivityType = 'H' order by CreatedOn

templates.name: Ιστορικό Συμβολαίου - YPSContract View History Deactivations
templates.sql: --temp για να παρουμε ολα τα προιοντα του συμβολαιου comma-separated --μπαινει και στα 3 history datasets (YPSContractViewHistoryDataset, YPSContractViewHistoryCRM, YPSContractViewHistoryDeactivations) IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#Products') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #Products IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#Products2') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #Products2 select distinct cp.RelatedContractID as ContractID,pr.code+' - '+isnull(pr.Name,'') as code into #Products from udac u left join UdacProdRole upr on u.id = upr.UdacID join Product pr on u.id = pr.UdacID join Advertisement adv on adv.ProductID = pr.id join VersionSection vs on adv.VersionSectionID = vs.id join MediumVersion mv on mv.id = vs.MediumVersionID join Medium m on m.id = mv.MediumID join ContractProduct cp on cp.id = adv.ContractProductID where upr.UdacID is null and pr.IsComposite = 0 and m.id not in (84,83,73,75,76,9) and cp.RelatedContractID = @ContractID --group by cp.RelatedContractID --having count(pr.code)>1 order by 1 desc SELECT p1.ContractID, ( SELECT code + ' || ' FROM #Products p2 WHERE p2.ContractID = p1.ContractID ORDER BY Code FOR XML PATH('') ) AS Products into #products2 FROM #Products p1 GROUP BY ContractID ; select t.id ,t.CreatedOn ,t.[Description] ,ISNULL(pu.LastName +' '+ pu.FirstName,r.Description) [PotentialRole] ,au.UserName ActualOwner ,t.Outcome ,t.DynamicDescription ,t.CompletedOn ,case when t.[Status] = 0 then 'Pending' else 'Completed' end as [Status] ,p.Code TaskProductCode ,p.[Description] TaskProduct ,cp.RelatedContractID ,mv.Code+'-'+mv.Description Medium ,ad.AdvBeginDate ,adr.[Description] DeactivationReason from Advertisement ad join [Case] c on c.ContextEntityID = ad.ID and c.ContextEntityType = 'ADV' join [Case] cc on cc.MasterCaseID = c.ID join Task t on t.CaseID = cc.ID join TaskType tt on tt.ID = t.TaskTypeID join CaseType ct on ct.ID = cc.CaseTypeID left join TaskAssignment ta on ta.TaskID = t.ID and ta.AssignmentType = 0 left join [User] pu on pu.ID = ta.UserID left join [Role] r on r.ID = ta.RoleID left join [User] au on au.ID = t.ActualOwnerID join ContractProduct cp on cp.ID = ad.ContractProductID join Product p on p.ID = cp.ProductID join VersionSection vs on vs.ID = ad.VersionSectionID join MediumVersion mv on mv.ID = vs.MediumVersionID left join AdvertisementDeactivationReason adr on adr.ID = ad.DeactivationReason where cp.RelatedContractID = @ContractID and tt.ActivityType = 'H' and ct.ID in (108,109) order by CreatedOn

templates.name: Καρτέλα Επικαιροποίησης Πελάτη - Data Set1
templates.sql: SELECT bp.Code AS [Κωδ. ΕΣ], bpi.Name AS [Διακριτικός], bpi.BrandName AS [Επωνυμία], bpi.TaxCode AS [ΑΦΜ], bpi.Profession AS [Επάγγελμα], bpi.Heading AS [Επαγγελματική Κατηγορία], bpi.Phone1 AS [Τηλέφωνο 1], bpi.Phone2 AS [Τηλέφωνο 2], bpi.Phone3 AS [Τηλέφωνο 3], bpi.MobilePhone AS [Κινητό], bpi.Fax AS [Φαξ], bpi.Email1 AS [Email 1], bpi.Email2 AS [Email 2], bpi.Address AS [Διεύθυνση], bpi.City AS [Πόλη], bpi.PostalCode AS [ΤΚ], bpi.GeographicalPositionUrl AS [Γεωγραφικο Στίγμα], bpi.LegalForm AS [Νομική Μορφή], bpi.TaxOffice AS [ΔΟΥ], bpi.CustomerURL AS [URL], bpi.BillingEmailAddress AS [Διεύθυνση Τιμολόγησης], bpi.BillingTelephone AS [Τηλέφωνο Τιμολόγησης], bpi.ExtraInformation AS [Έξτρα Πληροφορίες], bph.TimeStamp AS [Ημερομηνία], CASE WHEN us.SalesCode IS NULL OR us.SalesCode = '' THEN '' ELSE '[' + us.SalesCode + '] ' END + ISNULL(us.LastName, '') + ISNULL(' ' + us.FirstName, '') AS [Χρήστης] FROM dbo.BusinessPoint AS bp JOIN dbo.BusinessPointConfirmationHistory AS bph ON bp.ID = bph.BusinessPointID JOIN dbo.BusinessPointIdentification AS bpi ON bph.BusinessPointIdentificationID = bpi.ID JOIN dbo.[User] AS us ON bph.PerformedByID = us.ID WHERE ( bp.code = @bpCode ) AND bph.TimeStamp BETWEEN @dateFrom AND DATEADD(DAY, 1, @dateTo)

templates.name: Κατάσταση Προβολών Ανά Μέσο-Κύκλο - Open Advs Per Medium Data Set
templates.sql: -- declare @MediumCode int -- set @MediumCode = 34; -- if object_id('tempdb..#CustomerData') is not null --drop table #CustomerData -- SELECT DISTINCT -- bp.Code AS BPCode, -- bp.Name AS BPName, -- ctPrimary.ID, -- p.Code AS PCode, -- p.Name AS PName, -- taskid=isnull((select MAX(t.id) from TargetGroupItemValue tgiv -- JOIN [Case] c ON c.ContextEntityID = tgiv.ID AND c.ContextEntityType = 'TGIV' -- JOIN [Case] cc ON cc.MasterCaseID = c.ID and cc.ContextEntityType='ADV' -- JOIN Task t ON t.CaseID = cc.ID -- JOIN dbo.TaskType tt ON t.TaskTypeID = tt.ID -- where tt.ActivityType = 'h' -- and cc.ContextEntityID=adv.id), -- (select MAX(t.id) from TargetGroupItemValue tgiv -- JOIN [Case] c ON c.ContextEntityID = tgiv.ID AND c.ContextEntityType = 'TGIV' -- JOIN ctPrimary.id = tgiv.AltOfferID) -- ), -- u.FirstName + ' ' + u.LastName AS SalesMan, -- adv.AdvBeginDate AS StartDate, ctPrimary.SignedDate AS SignDate, -- adv.id as advid ,adv.qa, -- template=case when temp.id is not null and (temp.Template='' or temp.Template is null) then 0 -- when temp.id is null and ( utemp.id is null or utemp.Template='' or utemp.Template is null) then 0 else 1 end, -- heading=vgi.Description, -- (select ch.Description from dbo.channeltype ch where ch.id=ctPrimary.ChannelTypeID) salesChannel -- into #CustomerData -- FROM dbo.Contract ctPrimary -- JOIN dbo.[User] u utemp on ud.id = utemp.ID -- left join VersionGroupItem vgi on vgi.ID=adv.HeadingID -- WHERE --adv.QA = 0 AND -- adv.VersionSectionID in ( -- SELECT vs2.ID -- FROM dbo.Medium m2 -- JOIN dbo.MediumVersion mv2 ON m2.ID = mv2.MediumID -- JOIN dbo.VersionSection vs2 ON mv2.ID = vs2.MediumVersionID -- WHERE m2.IsActive = 1 -- AND mv2.IsActive = 1 -- --AND MediumTypeID = 3 -- AND mv2.ID (cp.State <> 3) -- order by 12 -- SELECT distinct -- --cd.BPCode, -- --cd.BPName, -- --cd.id AS ContractID, -- --'['+cd.PCode+'] '+ cd.PName as product , -- cd.advid, -- --ta.ID -- -- cd.qa, -- --cd.template -- --cd.heading, -- -- t.CreatedOn, -- -- t.Description AS TAction, -- count(ta.ID ) -- --u.UserName, SalesMan, StartDate, SignDate, advid,salesChannel -- FROM #CustomerData cd -- left JOIN dbo.Task t ON cd.TaskID = t.ID -- LEFT JOIN dbo.TaskAssignment ta ON t.ID = ta.TaskID -- AND ta.AssignmentType = 0 -- LEFT JOIN dbo.Role r ON ta.RoleID = r.ID -- LEFT JOIN dbo.[User] u ON t.ActualOwnerID = u.ID -- WHERE PCode IS NOT NULL --and r.[Description] is null -- GROUP BY -- advid -- having count(ta.ID ) > 1 --order by t.CreatedOn desc--cd.template -------------------------NEW Version--------------- SELECT [Product] = '['+P.Code+'] '+ P.Name, [Template] = case when temp.id is not null and (temp.Template='' or temp.Template is null) then 0 when temp.id is null and ( utemp.id is null or utemp.Template='' or utemp.Template is null) then 0 else 1 end, [Κατάσταση Προβολών] = case when ad.qa = 0 then 'Μη Ολοκληρωμένες' else 'Ολοκληρωμένες' end , [ADVID] = ad.id FROM Advertisement ad JOIN dbo.Product p ON ad.ProductID = p.ID AND p.IsComposite = 0 JOIN dbo.Udac ud ON ud.ID=p.UdacID JOIN ContractProduct cp ON cp.id = ad.ContractProductID JOIN [Contract] ct ON ct.id = cp.RelatedContractID JOIN VersionSection vs ON vs.id = ad.VersionSectionID JOIN MediumVersion mv ON mv.id = vs.MediumVersionID JOIN Medium m ON m.id = mv.MediumID LEFT JOIN ProductExportTemplate temp ON p.id = temp.ID LEFT JOIN UdacExportTemplate utemp ON ud.id = utemp.ID WHERE mv.id = @MediumCode AND ct.State not in (3,5) and ct.Type not in (1,10) AND cp.State <> 3 --GROUP BY -- p.code, -- case when temp.id is not null and (temp.Template='' or temp.Template is null) then 0 -- when temp.id is null and ( utemp.id is null or utemp.Template='' or utemp.Template is null) then 0 -- else 1 -- end

templates.name: Κατανομή Κατασκευής Προβολών σε Χρονικά Διαστήματα - Data Set1
templates.source: rdl:Κατανομή Κατασκευής Προβολών σε Χρονικά Διαστήματα:DataSet1
templates.sql: --declare @datefrom datetime --set @datefrom='2014-02-26' --declare @dateto datetime --set @dateto='2014-02-26' IF object_id('tempdb..#ElegxosPlirotitas') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #ElegxosPlirotitas select distinct ContractId = tgiv.AltOfferID,max(t.CreatedOn) as maxCreatedOn into #ElegxosPlirotitas from Task t join [Case] c ON t.CaseID = c.ID join TargetGroupItemValue tgiv ON C.ContextEntityID = TGIV.ID AND C.ContextEntityType = 'TGIV' join Contract ct on ct.ID=tgiv.AltOfferID where t.TaskTypeID IN (189) and ct.State in(1,6) and ct.Type IN (0,2,3,4) and not exists (select 1 from Task t2 JOIN [Case] c2 ON t2.CaseID = c2.ID JOIN TargetGroupItemValue tgiv2 ON C2.ContextEntityID = TGIV2.ID AND C2.ContextEntityType = 'TGIV' where t2.TaskTypeID=190 and t2.Status=0 and tgiv.AltOfferID=tgiv2.AltOfferID ) group by tgiv.AltOfferID having cast(max(t.CreatedOn)as DATE)>=@datefrom and cast(max(t.CreatedOn) as DATE)<@dateto+1 IF object_id('tempdb..#CompletedSinthetes') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #CompletedSinthetes select distinct ContractId = cp.RelatedContractID,adv.id as advId, maxCompletedOn=MAX(t.CompletedOn) into #CompletedSinthetes from Contract ct join ContractProduct cp on ct.ID=cp.RelatedContractID join Advertisement adv on cp.ID=adv.ContractProductID JOIN product p ON adv.productid = p.id JOIN [Case] c ON C.ContextEntityID = adv.ID AND C.ContextEntityType = 'ADV' join Task t ON t.CaseID = c.ID where exists (select 1 from #ElegxosPlirotitas ep where ep.ContractId=ct.ID) and adv.QA=1 AND ( (t.TaskTypeID IN (193) and t.Outcome='Σύνθετη καταχώρηση δεν παρουσιάζει λάθη' ) OR (t.TaskTypeID IN (516,522,527) and t.Outcome='Δεν Απαιτούνται Διορθώσεις' ) ) and t.Status=1 GROUP BY cp.RelatedContractID,adv.id IF object_id('tempdb..#CompletedAples') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #CompletedAples select distinct ContractId = cp.RelatedContractID,adv.id as advId, maxCompletedOn=MAX(t.CompletedOn) into #CompletedAples from Contract ct join ContractProduct cp on ct.ID=cp.RelatedContractID join Advertisement adv on cp.ID=adv.ContractProductID JOIN product p ON adv.productid = p.id join TargetGroupItemValue tgiv ON ct.ID=tgiv.AltOfferID JOIN [Case] c ON C.ContextEntityID = TGIV.ID AND C.ContextEntityType = 'TGIV' join Task t ON t.CaseID = c.ID where exists (select 1 from #ElegxosPlirotitas ep where ep.ContractId=ct.ID) and adv.QA=1 and t.TaskTypeID =189 and t.Status=1 GROUP BY cp.RelatedContractID,adv.id ;with alldata as ( select ep.ContractId,ep.maxCreatedOn as EpCreatedOn,ct.CreatedOn as ctCreatedOn,adv.id as advId, case when m.MediumTypeID=3 then 'Print' else m.Name end mediumType, completedon = ISNULL((SELECT maxCompletedOn FROM #CompletedSinthetes cs WHERE cs.advId = adv.id), (SELECT maxCompletedOn FROM #CompletedAples cs WHERE cs.advId = adv.id)), IsSimple = CASE WHEN EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM #CompletedSinthetes cs WHERE cs.advId = adv.id) THEN 'Σύνθετη' WHEN EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM #CompletedAples cs WHERE cs.advId = adv.id) THEN 'Απλή' WHEN NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM #CompletedSinthetes cs WHERE cs.advId = adv.id) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM #CompletedAples cs WHERE cs.advId = adv.id) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM dbo.Udac ud JOIN dbo.UdacProdRole upr ON ud.ID = upr.UdacID WHERE ud.ID = ad_p.udacid) THEN 'Απλή' ELSE 'Σύνθετη' END from #ElegxosPlirotitas ep join Contract ct on ct.ID=ep.ContractId join ContractProduct cp on cp.RelatedContractID=ct.ID join Advertisement adv on adv.ContractProductID=cp.ID JOIN dbo.Product p ON cp.ProductID = p.ID JOIN product ad_p ON adv.ProductID = ad_p.id join VersionSection vs on vs.ID=adv.VersionSectionID join MediumVersion mv on mv.ID=vs.MediumVersionID join Medium m on m.id=mv.MediumID --left join #Completed cmp on cmp.advId=adv.id where cp.state<>3 AND ((adv.productid = cp.productid AND p.IsComposite = 0) OR (adv.productid <> cp.productid AND p.IsComposite = 1)) ) select MediumType,IsSimple, CntProductsAll = COUNT(advId) , DaysSLS = round((sum(cast(DATEDIFF(dd,ctCreatedOn,epCreatedOn) as float))),2), DaysPrd = round((sum(cast(DATEDIFF(dd,epCreatedOn,completedOn) as float))),2), CountProductsCompleted = sum(case when completedOn is null then 0 else 1 end), CountProductsNotCompleted = sum(case when completedOn is null then 1 else 0 end), CountProductsCompleted10 =sum(Case when completedOn IS not null and DATEDIFF(DD,epCreatedOn,completedon)<=10 then 1 else 0 end ), CountProductsCompleted20 =sum(Case when completedOn IS not null and DATEDIFF(DD,epCreatedOn,completedon)>=11 and DATEDIFF(DD,epCreatedOn,completedon)<=20 then 1 else 0 end ), CountProductsCompleted30 =sum(Case when completedOn IS not null and DATEDIFF(DD,epCreatedOn,completedon)>=21 and DATEDIFF(DD,epCreatedOn,completedon)<=30 then 1 else 0 end ), CountProductsCompletedRest =sum(Case when completedOn IS not null and DATEDIFF(DD,epCreatedOn,completedon)>=31 then 1 else 0 end ) from alldata group by mediumType, IsSimple order by 1,2 IF object_id('tempdb..#CompletedSinthetes') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #CompletedSinthetes IF object_id('tempdb..#CompletedAples') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #CompletedAples IF object_id('tempdb..#ElegxosPlirotitas') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #ElegxosPlirotitas

templates.name: Κατανομή Κατασκευής Προβολών σε Χρονικά Διαστήματα - Data Set2
templates.source: rdl:Κατανομή Κατασκευής Προβολών σε Χρονικά Διαστήματα:DataSet2
templates.sql: SELECT DISTINCT MIN(t.CreatedOn) AS minCreatedOn, MAX(t.CreatedOn) AS maxCreatedOn FROM Task AS t JOIN [Case] AS c ON t.CaseID = c.ID JOIN TargetGroupItemValue AS tgiv ON C.ContextEntityID = TGIV.ID AND C.ContextEntityType = 'TGIV' JOIN Contract AS ct ON ct.ID = tgiv.AltOfferID WHERE t.TaskTypeID IN (189) AND ct.State IN (1, 6) AND ct.Type IN (0, 2, 3, 4) AND NOT EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM Task AS t2 JOIN [Case] AS c2 ON t2.CaseID = c2.ID JOIN TargetGroupItemValue AS tgiv2 ON C2.ContextEntityID = TGIV2.ID AND C2.ContextEntityType = 'TGIV' WHERE t2.TaskTypeID = 190 AND t2.Status = 0 AND tgiv.AltOfferID = tgiv2.AltOfferID ) AND t.CreatedOn >= CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), GETDATE(), 120) AND t.CreatedOn < CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), GETDATE() + 1, 120)

templates.name: Ολοκληρωμένα Website - Data Set1
templates.sql: --DECLARE @from DATE -- , @to DATE -- , @option BIT ; --SET @from = '20130101' ; --SET @to = '20130801' ; --SET @option =1; if object_id('tempdb..#new') is not null drop table #new SELECT bpid , [Κωδ. ΕΣ] = Branch_ID , [Διακριτικός] = Brand_Name , [Επωνυμία] = Customer_Name , [Διεύθυνση] = [Address] , [ΤΚ] = Zip , [Δήμος] = Municipality , [Νομός] = Prefecture , prcode = prcode , [Πωλητής] = salesman , [Site Preview File] = preview , [Ημερ. Ολοκλήρωσης] = CONVERT(NVARCHAR(15), completed_on, 103) , completed_on , [Ημερ. Λήξης Προβολής] = Adv_EndDate , advid , cpid , Heading INTO #new FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT bp.id AS bpid , bp.code AS Branch_ID , bp.Name AS Brand_Name , bp.BrandName AS Customer_Name , [ad].[Line1] AS [Address] , [ad].GeoModelZip AS [Zip] , ad.Municipality , ad.Prefecture , mh.Code AS internet_heading_id , mh.Description AS internet_heading_description , pr.code AS prcode , advid = adv.ID , cpid = cp.ID , Heading = vgi.Description , ( SELECT username + '@yellowpages.gr' FROM [User] WHERE id = c.SalesManID ) AS salesman , CASE WHEN ( SELECT MAX(tsk.completedon) FROM yps.dbo.[Case] cc JOIN YPS.dbo.[Case] mcc ON mcc.id = cc.MasterCaseID JOIN yps.dbo.Task tsk ON tsk.CaseID = cc.id WHERE Cc.ContextEntityID = ADV.ID AND cc.ContextEntityType = 'ADV' AND mcc.ContextEntityType = 'TGIV' AND tsk.TaskTypeID=192 ) IS NULL AND c.state NOT IN ( 3, 5 , 10) AND adv.QA = 1 AND c.MigratedCode IS NOT NULL THEN adv.AdvBeginDate when c.OrigionalContractID IS Not null then adv.AdvBeginDate ELSE ( SELECT MAX(tsk.completedon) FROM yps.dbo.[Case] cc JOIN YPS.dbo.[Case] mcc ON mcc.id = cc.MasterCaseID and mcc.ContextEntityType = 'TGIV' JOIN yps.dbo.Task tsk ON tsk.CaseID = cc.id join yps.dbo.Advertisement adv2 on adv2.ID=cc.ContextEntityID AND cc.ContextEntityType = 'ADV' WHERE adv2.QA=1 and adv.ID=adv2.id and tsk.TaskTypeID IN (193,516) and tsk.Outcome in ('Σύνθετη καταχώρηση δεν παρουσιάζει λάθη','Δεν Απαιτούνται Διορθώσεις') ) END AS completed_on , isnull(cp.interruptionDate,fccv2.Adv_EndDate) Adv_EndDate , '\\junco12\YPSDATA\CaseAttachments\' + fccv2.Cav_Value AS preview FROM yps.dbo.BusinessPoint bp JOIN FullAddressViewV2 ad ON bp.LocationAddressID = ad.id JOIN yps.dbo.Contract c ON bp.ID = c.ActualBPOwnerID AND c.OrigionalContractID IS NULL AND c.OriginalContractType IS NULL JOIN yps.dbo.ContractProduct cp ON c.ID = cp.RelatedContractID JOIN yps.dbo.Advertisement adv ON adv.ContractProductID = cp.ID JOIN yps.dbo.Product pr ON adv.ProductID = pr.ID JOIN yps.dbo.udac ud ON pr.UdacID = ud.ID JOIN yps.dbo.VersionGroupItem vgi ON vgi.ID = adv.HeadingID JOIN yps.dbo.MasterHeading mh ON mh.ID = vgi.SourceHeadingID JOIN yps.dbo.FullContractCavView fccv2 ON adv.id = fccv2.Adv_ID AND fccv2.Cad_Name in ('Εικόνα Web','ScreenShot for Cred') WHERE pr.MediumVersionID IN ( SELECT id FROM MediumVersion WHERE Mediumid = 9 ) AND c.type IN ( 0, 2, 3, 4 ) AND c.state IN (1,6) AND cp.State NOT IN (3,4) ) AS xx WHERE (completed_on between @from and @to) OR (completed_on is null AND @option = 1) --SELECT * FROM #new WHERE bpid=998014 if object_id('tempdb..#urls') is not null drop table #urls ;WITH urlwebsites AS ( SELECT DISTINCT fccv2.CP_ID, fccv2.adv_id, vgi2.Description, fccv2.cav_value FROM dbo.FullContractCavView fccv2 JOIN dbo.Product p ON fccv2.Adv_ProductID = p.ID JOIN dbo.VersionGroupItem vgi2 ON vgi2.ID = fccv2.Adv_HeadingID WHERE cad_name in('URL','Domain') ), urlwebsitesall AS ( SELECT DISTINCT fccv2.CP_ID, vgi2.Description, fccv2.cav_value FROM dbo.FullContractCavView fccv2 JOIN dbo.Product p ON fccv2.Adv_ProductID = p.ID JOIN dbo.VersionGroupItem vgi2 ON vgi2.ID = fccv2.Adv_HeadingID WHERE cad_name in('URL','Domain') AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM dbo.MediumVersion mv WHERE MediumID = 9 AND mv.id=p.MediumVersionID) ), urlall AS ( --url online/website products SELECT DISTINCT fccv2.CP_ID, vgi2.Description, fccv2.cav_value FROM dbo.FullContractCavView fccv2 JOIN dbo.Product p ON fccv2.Adv_ProductID = p.ID JOIN dbo.VersionGroupItem vgi2 ON vgi2.ID = fccv2.Adv_HeadingID WHERE cad_name in('URL','Domain') ) SELECT x.*, domain1 = stuff(( select ';' + uw.Cav_Value from urlwebsites uw where x.cpid = uw.CP_ID AND uw.Adv_ID = x.advid AND uw.Cav_Value IS NOT NULL order by uw.CP_ID, uw.Description, uw.cav_value for xml path('') ),1,1,''), domain2 = stuff(( select ';' + uw2.Cav_Value from urlwebsitesall uw2 where x.cpid = uw2.CP_ID AND uw2.Description = x.Heading AND uw2.Cav_Value IS NOT NULL order by uw2.CP_ID, uw2.Description, uw2.cav_value for xml path('') ),1,1,''), domain3 = stuff(( select ';' + ua.Cav_Value from urlall ua where x.cpid = ua.CP_ID AND ua.Description = x.Heading AND ua.Cav_Value IS NOT NULL order by ua.CP_ID, ua.Description, ua.cav_value for xml path('') ),1,1,'') INTO #urls FROM #new x if object_id('tempdb..#phones') is not null drop table #phones SELECT * , RankID = RANK() over ( PARTITION By aa.BusinessPointID order by aa.Number ) into #phones from ( select distinct pp.BusinessPointID , pp.Number from #new bp join dbo.PointPhone pp on bp.bpID = pp.BusinessPointID AND pp.IsActive=1 and Usage in (7,8) )aa if object_id('tempdb..#emails') is not null drop table #emails SELECT * , RankID = RANK() over ( PARTITION By aa.BusinessPointID order by aa.Email ) into #emails from ( select distinct pe.BusinessPointID ,pe.Email from #new bp join dbo.PointEmail pe on bp.bpID = pe.BusinessPointID )aa select bp.bpid , bp.[Κωδ. ΕΣ] , bp.[Διακριτικός] , bp.[Επωνυμία] , bp.[Διεύθυνση] , bp.[ΤΚ] , bp.[Δήμος] , bp.[Νομός] , bp.[Πωλητής] , domain=COALESCE(bp.domain1, bp.domain2, bp.domain3) , bp.[Site Preview File] , bp.[Ημερ. Ολοκλήρωσης] , bp.completed_on , [Ημερ. Λήξης Προβολής] = CONVERT(NVARCHAR(15),MAX(bp.[Ημερ. Λήξης Προβολής]), 103) ,e1.Email as email1,e2.Email as email2,e3.Email as email3, p1.Number as fax1,p2.Number as fax2,p3.Number as fax3 from #urls bp left join #emails e1 on bp.bpID = e1.BusinessPointID and e1.RankID =1 left join #emails e2 on bp.bpID = e2.BusinessPointID and e2.RankID =2 left join #emails e3 on bp.bpID = e3.BusinessPointID and e3.RankID =3 left join #phones p1 on bp.bpID = p1.BusinessPointID and p1.RankID =1 left join #phones p2 on bp.bpID = p2.BusinessPointID and p2.RankID =2 left join #phones p3 on bp.bpID = p3.BusinessPointID and p3.RankID =3 GROUP BY bp.bpid , bp.[Κωδ. ΕΣ] , bp.[Διακριτικός] , bp.[Επωνυμία] , bp.[Διεύθυνση] , bp.[ΤΚ] , bp.[Δήμος] , bp.[Νομός] , bp.[Πωλητής] , COALESCE(bp.domain1, bp.domain2, bp.domain3) , bp.[Site Preview File] , bp.[Ημερ. Ολοκλήρωσης] , bp.completed_on ,e1.Email ,e2.Email ,e3.Email , p1.Number ,p2.Number ,p3.Number order by cast(bp.[Κωδ. ΕΣ] as bigint) if object_id('tempdb..#new') is not NULL drop table #new if object_id('tempdb..#urls') is not NULL drop table #urls if object_id('tempdb..#phones') is not NULL drop table #phones if object_id('tempdb..#emails') is not NULL drop table #emails

templates.name: Ολοκληρωμένα Πακέτα Google Ads - Data Set1
templates.sql: IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#x1') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #x1 IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#x2') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #x2 select tsk.id as taskid,bp.code as [ID Πελάτη], bp.Name as [ΕΠΩΝΥΜΙΑ], cn.Name as [ΚΑΤΗΓΟΡΙΑ], '' as [On Hold YPS], isnull(adr.GeoModelStreet1Text+' '+isnull(adr.GeoModelStreet1Num,''),adr.Line1)+', '+adr.GeoModelLocText as [ΠΕΡΙΟΧΗ], pr.code as [ΠΑΚΕΤΟ GA], tsk.CompletedOn as [Ημερομηνία Παράδοσης ON AIR], tsk.CreatedOn as [Ημερομηνία Παραλαβής στο YPS χωρίς url], '' as [Στησιμο Καμπάνιας], cpbp.url as [Website] , coalesce( (select top 1 fcv.Cav_Value from FullContractCavView fcv where fcv.adv_ID=adv.id and fcv.Cad_Name='url'), (select top 1 fcv.Cav_Value from FullContractCavView fcv where fcv.C_ID=ct.id and fcv.Cad_Name='url' and fcv.Adv_VersionSectionID =796) , (select top 1 fcv.Cav_Value from FullContractCavView fcv where fcv.c_id=ct.id and fcv.Cad_Name='friendly url' and fcv.Adv_VersionSectionID =580), (select top 1 fcv.Cav_Value from FullContractCavView fcv where fcv.c_id=ct.id and fcv.Cad_Name='url' and fcv.Adv_VersionSectionID =580)) as [Profile], adv.AdvBeginDate as [Μελλοντική Ημερομηνία για Live Profile],cp.RelatedContractID, usr.LastName+' '+usr.FirstName as [Δημιουργία Καμπάνιας], tsk.Description as [Περιγραφή] into #x1 from Task tsk join [Case] cs on cs.ID=tsk.CaseID join Advertisement adv on adv.id=cs.ContextEntityID and cs.ContextEntityType='ADV' join ContractProduct cp on cp.ID=adv.ContractProductID join Contract ct on ct.ID=cp.RelatedContractID AND (ct.type IN (0, 2, 4)) join BusinessPoint bp on bp.id=ct.ActualBPOwnerID join ClassifierNode cn on cn.ID=bp.ActivityClassifierNodeID join Product pr on pr.ID=adv.ProductID join BusinessPoint cpbp on cpbp.ID=cp.BusinessPointID join address adr on adr.ID=cpbp.LocationAddressID left join [User] usr on usr.ID=tsk.ActualOwnerID where tsk.Status=1 and tsk.TaskTypeID in (520,523,524) and tsk.createdon >=@datefrom and tsk.createdon<@dateto+1 select tsk.id as taskid,bp.code as [ID Πελάτη], bp.Name as [ΕΠΩΝΥΜΙΑ], cn.Name as [ΚΑΤΗΓΟΡΙΑ], '' as [On Hold YPS], isnull(adr.GeoModelStreet1Text+' '+isnull(adr.GeoModelStreet1Num,''),adr.Line1)+', '+adr.GeoModelLocText as [ΠΕΡΙΟΧΗ], pr.code as [ΠΑΚΕΤΟ GA], tsk.CompletedOn as [Ημερομηνία Παράδοσης ON AIR], tsk.CreatedOn as [Ημερομηνία Παραλαβής στο YPS χωρίς url], '' as [Στησιμο Καμπάνιας], cpbp.url as [Website] , coalesce( (select top 1 fcv.Cav_Value from FullContractCavView fcv where fcv.adv_ID=adv.id and fcv.Cad_Name='url'), (select top 1 fcv.Cav_Value from FullContractCavView fcv where fcv.C_ID=ct.id and fcv.Cad_Name='url' and fcv.Adv_VersionSectionID =796) , (select top 1 fcv.Cav_Value from FullContractCavView fcv where fcv.c_id=ct.id and fcv.Cad_Name='friendly url' and fcv.Adv_VersionSectionID =580), (select top 1 fcv.Cav_Value from FullContractCavView fcv where fcv.c_id=ct.id and fcv.Cad_Name='url' and fcv.Adv_VersionSectionID =580)) as [Profile], adv.AdvBeginDate as [Μελλοντική Ημερομηνία για Live Profile],cp.RelatedContractID, usr.LastName+' '+usr.FirstName as [Δημιουργία Καμπάνιας], tsk.Description as [Περιγραφή] into #x2 from Task tsk join TaskAssignment tsa on tsk.ID=tsa.TaskID join [Case] cs on cs.ID=tsk.CaseID join Advertisement adv on adv.id=cs.ContextEntityID and cs.ContextEntityType='ADV' join ContractProduct cp on cp.ID=adv.ContractProductID join Contract ct on ct.ID=cp.RelatedContractID AND (ct.type IN (0, 2, 4)) join BusinessPoint bp on bp.id=ct.ActualBPOwnerID join ClassifierNode cn on cn.ID=bp.ActivityClassifierNodeID join Product pr on pr.ID=adv.ProductID join BusinessPoint cpbp on cpbp.ID=cp.BusinessPointID join address adr on adr.ID=cpbp.LocationAddressID left join [User] usr on usr.ID=tsk.ActualOwnerID where tsk.Status=1 and tsk.TaskTypeID in (192,194) and tsa.RoleID=527 and tsa.AssignmentType=0 and tsk.createdon >=@datefrom and tsk.createdon<@dateto+1 select * from #x2 union select * from #x1 IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#x1') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #x1 IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#x2') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #x2

templates.name: Ολοκληρωμένα Προιόντα Web Services - Data Set1
templates.sql: --declare @datefrom datetime = '2014-11-05', -- @dateto datetime = '2014-11-05' ;with xx as ( select t.CompletedOn completedon ,t.CreatedOn as createdOn ,ct.ID as contractid ,a.id as advertisementId from yps.dbo.TargetGroupItemValue tgiv JOIN yps.dbo.[Case] c ON c.ContextEntityID = tgiv.ID AND c.ContextEntityType = 'TGIV' JOIN yps.dbo.[Case] cc ON cc.MasterCaseID = c.ID JOIN dbo.Advertisement a ON a.id = cc.ContextEntityID AND cc.ContextEntityType = 'ADV' JOIN yps.dbo.Task t ON t.CaseID = cc.ID join yps.dbo.Contract ct on tgiv.contractid=ct.ID where t.TaskTypeID in (516, 522,527) and t.Outcome = 'Δεν Απαιτούνται Διορθώσεις' and t.CompletedOn>=@datefrom and t.CompletedOn<@dateto+1 ) select xx.* ,ct.state ctstate ,cp.state as cpstate ,bp.Code as bpcode ,name=isnull((select bp2.BrandName from yps.dbo.PointRelationship pr join yps.dbo.BusinessPoint bp2 on bp2.ID=pr.TargetBussinessPointID where pr.type=10 and pr.BusinessPointID=bp.id),bp.brandName) ,m.Description as medium ,adv.AdvBeginDate ,isnull(cp.InterruptionDate,adv.AdvEndDate) AdvEndDate ,isnull(adv.AlteredAmount,adv.Price-adv.Discount-adv.RulesDiscount) as advprice ,pr.Code as prcode ,email= (select top 1 pe.Email from yps.dbo.PointEmail pe where pe.BusinessPointID=bp.id and isnull(pe.Email,'')<>'') ,domain=(select top 1 cav.Cav_Value from yps.dbo.FullContractCavView cav where cav.Adv_ID=adv.ID and cav.Cad_Name='url' ) ,status = Case when cp.state <>3 and ct.State <> 3 and getdate()>=adv.AdvBeginDate and isnull(cp.InterruptionDate,adv.AdvEndDate)>getdate() then 'active' else 'inactive' end from xx join yps.dbo.Advertisement adv on adv.ID = xx.advertisementId join yps.dbo.ContractProduct cp on cp.ID = adv.ContractProductID join Contract ct on ct.ID = cp.RelatedContractID join yps.dbo.BusinessPoint bp on bp.ID=ct.ActualBPOwnerID join yps.dbo.VersionSection vs on vs.ID=adv.VersionSectionID join yps.dbo.MediumVersion mv on mv.ID=vs.MediumVersionID join yps.dbo.Medium m on m.ID=mv.MediumID join yps.dbo.Product pr on pr.ID=adv.ProductID join yps.dbo.Product p on p.ID=cp.ProductID where mv.MediumID in (9,73,75,76,83) and adv.qa=1 and ((adv.productid = cp.productid AND p.IsComposite = 0) OR (adv.productid <> cp.productid AND p.IsComposite = 1)) --select distinct tt.id, tt.Description ,t.Outcome -- from TaskType tt -- join Task t on tt.ID = t.TaskTypeID order by 2 -- where tt.Description like '%fac%' -- where tt.ID in (516, 522,527)

pr.type=10 and pr.BusinessPointID=bp.id),bp.brandName), m.id as mid,m.name as medium,ct.signedDate,usr.username,adv.AdvBeginDate, isnull(cp.InterruptionDate,adv.AdvEndDate) AdvEndDate, cast(isnull(adv.AlteredAmount,adv.Price-adv.Discount-adv.RulesDiscount) as float) as advprice, pr.Code as prcode, email= (select top 1 pe.Email from yps.dbo.PointEmail pe where pe.BusinessPointID=bp.id and isnull(pe.Email,'')<>''), domain=(select top 1 cav.Cav_Value from yps.dbo.FullContractCavView cav where cav.Adv_ID=adv.ID and cav.Cad_Name='url'), status=case when adv.AdvBeginDate>CAST(GETDATE() as DATE) then 'Μελλοντικές' when isnull(cp.InterruptionDate,adv.AdvEndDate)<=CAST(GETDATE() as DATE) then 'Ληγμένες το προηγούμενο έτος' else 'Ενεργές' end from yps.dbo.Contract ct join yps.dbo.BusinessPoint bp on bp.ID=ct.ActualBPOwnerID join yps.dbo.ContractProduct cp on cp.RelatedContractID=ct.ID join yps.dbo.Advertisement adv on adv.ContractProductID=cp.ID join yps.dbo.VersionSection vs on vs.ID=adv.VersionSectionID join yps.dbo.MediumVersion mv on mv.ID=vs.MediumVersionID join yps.dbo.Medium m on m.ID=mv.MediumID join yps.dbo.Product pr on pr.ID=adv.ProductID join yps.dbo.Product p on p.ID=cp.ProductID join yps.dbo.[user] usr on usr.id=ct.salesmanid where --m.MediumTypeID=2 --and m.ID<>10--and adv.qa=1 and ((adv.productid = cp.productid AND p.IsComposite = 0) OR (adv.productid <> cp.productid AND p.IsComposite = 1)) and ct.State not in (3,5) and cp.State not in (0,1,3) and ct.Type not in (1,10) and mv.Code<>'20' and m.isactive=1 and dateadd(yy,1,isnull(cp.InterruptionDate,adv.AdvEndDate))>CAST(GETDATE() as DATE) and m.id in (@mediumid) and case when adv.AdvBeginDate>CAST(GETDATE() as DATE) then 'Μελλοντικές' when isnull(cp.InterruptionDate,adv.AdvEndDate)<=CAST(GETDATE() as DATE) then 'Ληγμένες το προηγούμενο έτος' else 'Ενεργές' end in (@state)

templates.name: Πανελλαδικές Αναζητήσεις - v2018 - Main Dataset
templates.sql: --declare @catinternal table (ID nvarchar(max)); --declare @catinternal2 nvarchar(max); --Declare @allcategories nvarchar(max), --@monthfrom nvarchar(2), --@monthto nvarchar(2), --@yearfrom nvarchar(4), --@yearto nvarchar(4), --@monthfrom2 nvarchar(2), --@monthto2 nvarchar(2), --@yearfrom2 nvarchar(4), --@yearto2 nvarchar(4) Declare @dateto date; Declare @dateto2 date; --set @yearfrom = '2018'--02 --set @monthfrom = '02' --set @yearto = '2018' --set @monthto = '02' --set @yearfrom2 = '2019'--02 --set @monthfrom2 = '03' --set @yearto2 = '2019' --set @monthto2 = '03' --set @allcategories = '3548,3549' begin if @monthto+1<10 set @dateto = cast(@yearto+'0'+cast(@monthto+1 as nvarchar(2))+'01' as date) else if @monthto < 12 set @dateto = cast(@yearto+cast(@monthto+1 as nvarchar(2))+'01' as date) else if @monthto = 12 set @dateto = cast(cast(@yearto+1 as nvarchar) + '0101' as date) end begin if @monthto2+1<10 set @dateto2 = cast(@yearto2+'0'+cast(@monthto2+1 as nvarchar(2))+'01' as date) else if @monthto2 < 12 set @dateto2 = cast(@yearto2+cast(@monthto2+1 as nvarchar(2))+'01' as date) else if @monthto2 = 12 set @dateto2 = cast(cast(@yearto2+1 as nvarchar) + '0101' as date) end ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ --Active headings from YPS---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#ActiveHeading') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #ActiveHeading select distinct mh.Code into #ActiveHeading from yps.dbo.VersionGroupItem vgi join yps.dbo.MasterHeading mh on vgi.SourceHeadingID = mh.id where vgi.MediumVersionID = 36 and vgi.IsActive = 1 and vgi.ID <> 23 and mh.code <> 'ALL' ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ --Displays from begining of given year to be used in MO field ---------------------------------------------------- ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ --set @catinternal2 = @category; --set @catinternal2 = replace(@category,',',';'); --print @catinternal2 --insert into @catinternal --select * --from [dbo].[fn_SplitString](@catinternal2,';') --select * from @catinternal IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#categories') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #categories SELECT * into #categories FROM itapps.dbo.SplitToInt(@allcategories, ',') a join heading.Heading h on replace(h.Code, 'H', '') = a.items IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#stats') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #stats select s.heading, s.countofdisplays, cast(cast(s.LocalPeriod as nvarchar(6))+'01' as date) as LocalPeriod into #stats from #categories ct join [gypneu01synapse01.sql.azuresynapse.net].[GYPNEU01DWPL01].[dbo].[StatsHeadingsMonthly] s on s.Heading collate Greek_100_CI_AI = ct.items where cast(cast(s.LocalPeriod as nvarchar(6))+'01' as date) > = cast(@yearfrom+'01'+'01' as date) and cast(cast(s.LocalPeriod as nvarchar(6))+'01' as date) < @dateto--cast(@yearto+'0'+cast(@monthto+1 as nvarchar(2))+'01' as date) IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#yy') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #yy select s.Heading , ct.NameGR as 'Κατηγορία', sum(s.CountOfDisplays) as CountOfDisplays into #yy from #categories ct --join heading.Heading h on replace(h.Code, 'H', '') = ct.items --join itapps.xocateg.category_text cat on ct.items = cat.id join #stats s on s.Heading collate Greek_100_CI_AI = ct.items where s.LocalPeriod > = cast(@yearfrom+'01'+'01' as date) and s.LocalPeriod < @dateto--cast(@yearto+'0'+cast(@monthto+1 as nvarchar(2))+'01' as date) --and s.Heading in (@category) --and cat.language_code = 'el' --and cat.id between 3000 and 6000 Group By s.Heading, ct.NameGR -- select * from #yy --select DATEDIFF(MONTH,cast(@yearfrom+'01'+'01' as date),cast(@yearto+'0'+cast(@monthto+1 as nvarchar(2))+'01' as date)) IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#yy2') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #yy2 select s.Heading , ct.NameGR as 'Κατηγορία', sum(s.CountOfDisplays) as CountOfDisplays into #yy2 from #categories ct --join heading.Heading h on replace(h.Code, 'H', '') = ct.items join #stats s on s.Heading collate Greek_100_CI_AI = ct.items where s.LocalPeriod > = cast(@yearfrom2+'01'+'01' as date) and s.LocalPeriod < @dateto2--cast(@yearto+'0'+cast(@monthto+1 as nvarchar(2))+'01' as date) Group By s.Heading, ct.NameGR ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ --Month Displays for the given months ---------------------------------------------------------------------------- ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#mm') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #mm select Sum(s.CountOfDisplays) as CountOfDisplays, s.Heading , ct.NameGR as 'Κατηγορία' into #mm from #categories ct --join heading.Heading h on replace(h.Code, 'H', '') = ct.items --join itapps.xocateg.category_text cat on ct.items = cat.id join #stats s on s.Heading collate Greek_100_CI_AI = ct.items where s.LocalPeriod > = cast(@yearfrom+@monthfrom+'01' as date) and s.LocalPeriod < @dateto--cast(@yearto+'0'+cast(@monthto+1 as nvarchar(2))+'01' as date) Group By s.Heading, ct.NameGR IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#mm2') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #mm2 select Sum(s.CountOfDisplays) as CountOfDisplays, s.Heading , ct.NameGR as 'Κατηγορία' into #mm2 from #categories ct --join heading.Heading h on replace(h.Code, 'H', '') = ct.items --join itapps.xocateg.category_text cat on ct.items = cat.id join #stats s on s.Heading collate Greek_100_CI_AI = ct.items where s.LocalPeriod > = cast(@yearfrom2+@monthfrom2+'01' as date) and s.LocalPeriod < @dateto2--cast(@yearto+'0'+cast(@monthto+1 as nvarchar(2))+'01' as date) Group By s.Heading, ct.NameGR select m.CountOfDisplays as 'Αναζητήσεις Κατηγοριών', m2.CountOfDisplays as 'Αναζητήσεις Κατηγοριών2', y.Heading as 'Κωδικός Κατηγορίας', y.[Κατηγορία] , -- MO Total Displays from begining of given year to given @monthto / count of months round(y.CountOfDisplays/DATEDIFF(MONTH,cast(@yearfrom+'01'+'01' as date),@dateto),0) as MO , round(y2.CountOfDisplays/DATEDIFF(MONTH,cast(@yearfrom2+'01'+'01' as date),@dateto2),0) as MO2 from #yy y join #ActiveHeading ah on ah.Code = y.heading collate Greek_100_CI_AI join #mm m on m.heading = y.heading left join #yy2 y2 on y2.heading = y.heading left join #mm2 m2 on m2.heading = y.heading order by y.Heading -- --select * from [gyp-neu-01-avocet-01.database.windows.net].[GYP-NEU-01-DB0`].[dbo].[StatsHeadingsMonthly] s --where s.localPeriod in (201801,201802,201803) and s.heading = 3548

templates.sql: WITH yearlist1 AS ( SELECT 2018 AS year, CAST(2018 AS VARCHAR(4)) AS yearlabel UNION ALL SELECT yl.year + 1 AS year, CAST(yl.year + 1 AS VARCHAR(4)) AS yearlabel FROM yearlist1 AS yl WHERE yl.year + 1 <= YEAR(GETDATE()) ) SELECT year, yearlabel FROM yearlist1 UNION SELECT NULL, '-' ORDER BY year DESC
