templates.name: Παραγωγικότητα Παραγωγής - Data Set1
templates.sql: --DECLARE @datefrom DATETIME, @dateto DATETIME; --SET @datefrom = '2015-04-01'; --SET @dateto = '2015-05-01'; IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#ContractsPC') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #ContractsPC SELECT DISTINCT ContractId = tgiv2.AltOfferID , t.Description AS taskDescr , t.CreatedOn AS taskCreatedOn , t.CompletedOn taskCompletedOn , usr.UserName AS taskowner , t.Outcome AS taskOutcome , t.id AS taskid INTO #ContractsPC FROM dbo.Task t JOIN dbo.TaskType tt ON t.TaskTypeID = tt.ID JOIN dbo.[Case] c ON t.CaseID = c.ID JOIN dbo.TargetGroupItemValue tgiv2 ON C.ContextEntityID = TGIV2.ID AND C.ContextEntityType = 'TGIV' JOIN dbo.contract ct ON ct.ID = tgiv2.AltOfferID LEFT JOIN dbo.[User] usr ON usr.ID = t.ActualOwnerID WHERE tt.id IN ( 189 ) --AND ct.State <> 3 --AND ct.type IN ( 0, 2, 3, 4 ) AND t.CreatedOn >= @datefrom AND t.CreatedOn < @dateto+1 IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#ContractsCompleted') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #ContractsCompleted SELECT DISTINCT ContractId = tgiv2.AltOfferID , REPLACE(t.Description,'Code Task for P101 - CT01','Οριστικοποίηση κατασκευής (System)') AS taskDescr , t.CreatedOn AS taskCreatedOn , t.CompletedOn AS taskCompletedOn , usr.UserName AS taskowner , t.Outcome AS taskOutcome , t.id AS taskid INTO #ContractsCompleted FROM dbo.Task t JOIN dbo.TaskType tt ON t.TaskTypeID = tt.ID JOIN dbo.[Case] c ON t.CaseID = c.ID JOIN dbo.TargetGroupItemValue tgiv2 ON C.ContextEntityID = TGIV2.ID AND C.ContextEntityType = 'TGIV' JOIN dbo.contract ct ON ct.ID = tgiv2.AltOfferID JOIN #ContractsPC ON #ContractsPC.contractid = ct.id LEFT JOIN dbo.[User] usr ON usr.ID = t.ActualOwnerID WHERE tt.id IN ( 195 , 505 ) --1st report SELECT bp.Code AS bpCode , ct.ID AS ContractId , ct.CreatedOn AS CtCreatedDate , ct.SignedDate , CASE WHEN ct.State = 1 THEN 'Approved' WHEN ct.state = 2 THEN 'Rejected' END AS ctState , ch.description AS Channel , pr.Code AS prCode , pt.Description AS prCategory , mv.code + ' - ' + mv.Description mvDescr , pc.taskDescr , pc.taskCreatedOn , pc.taskCompletedOn , pc.taskowner , pc.taskOutcome , comp.taskDescr AS taskDescr2 , comp.taskCreatedOn AS taskCreatedOn2 , comp.taskCompletedOn AS taskCompletedon2 , comp.taskowner AS taskowner2 FROM Contract ct JOIN #ContractsPC pc ON ct.ID = pc.ContractId JOIN ContractProduct cp ON ct.ID = cp.RelatedContractID JOIN BusinessPoint bp ON bp.ID = ct.ActualBPOwnerID JOIN Advertisement adv ON adv.ContractProductID = cp.id JOIN Product pr ON pr.ID = adv.ProductID JOIN yps.dbo.Product p ON cp.ProductID = p.ID JOIN VersionSection vs ON adv.VersionSectionID = vs.ID JOIN MediumVersion mv ON mv.ID = vs.MediumVersionID LEFT JOIN ProductType pt ON pt.ID = pr.ProductTypeID LEFT JOIN #ContractsCompleted comp ON comp.contractid = pc.contractid LEFT JOIN channeltype ch ON ch.id = ct.channeltypeid WHERE pc.taskid = ( SELECT MAX(taskid) FROM #ContractsPC pc2 WITH ( NOLOCK ) WHERE pc.ContractId = pc2.ContractId ) and ((adv.productid = cp.productid AND p.IsComposite = 0) OR (adv.productid <> cp.productid AND p.IsComposite = 1)) ORDER BY pc.taskCreatedOn , ct.ID , pr.code

templates.name: Παραγωγικότητα Παραγωγής - Data Set2
templates.sql: --DECLARE @datefrom DATETIME, @dateto DATETIME; --SET @datefrom = '2015-04-01'; --SET @dateto = '2015-05-01'; IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#ContractsPC') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #ContractsPC SELECT DISTINCT ContractId = tgiv2.AltOfferID , t.Description AS taskDescr , t.CreatedOn AS taskCreatedOn , t.CompletedOn taskCompletedOn , usr.UserName AS taskowner , t.Outcome AS taskOutcome , t.id AS taskid INTO #ContractsPC FROM dbo.Task t JOIN dbo.TaskType tt ON t.TaskTypeID = tt.ID JOIN dbo.[Case] c ON t.CaseID = c.ID JOIN dbo.TargetGroupItemValue tgiv2 ON C.ContextEntityID = TGIV2.ID AND C.ContextEntityType = 'TGIV' JOIN dbo.contract ct ON ct.ID = tgiv2.AltOfferID LEFT JOIN dbo.[User] usr ON usr.ID = t.ActualOwnerID WHERE tt.id IN ( 189 ) --AND ct.State <> 3 --AND ct.type IN ( 0, 2, 3, 4 ) AND t.CreatedOn >= @datefrom AND t.CreatedOn < @dateto+1 IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#ProductionTasks') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #ProductionTasks SELECT ContractId = ct.id , tt.id AS TaskTypeID , tt.Description AS taskDescr , MAX(t.CreatedOn) AS taskCreatedOn , MAX(t.CompletedOn) AS taskCompletedOn , u.UserName AS taskowner , Case when tt.id in (192,509,194) then 'Graphic Designer' when tt.id in (514,517,519) then 'Web Designer' when tt.id in (525,528,529) then 'SEO Expert' when tt.id in (511,513) then 'Copywriter' when tt.id in (193,512) then 'Directories QC' when tt.id in (516, 522, 527) then 'Web Services QC' end as [RoleDesc], Case when tt.id =511 then 1 when tt.id=513 then 2 when tt.id IN (192,514,525) then 3 when tt.id=512 then 4 when tt.id IN ( 193,516,527)then 5 when tt.id IN (194,517,528) then 6 when tt.id IN (509,519,529)then 7 end as [orderind], adv.ID AS advId , c.id AS caseid INTO #ProductionTasks FROM dbo.Task t WITH ( NOLOCK ) JOIN dbo.TaskType tt WITH ( NOLOCK ) ON t.TaskTypeID = tt.ID JOIN dbo.[Case] c WITH ( NOLOCK ) ON t.CaseID = c.ID JOIN dbo.[Case] mc WITH ( NOLOCK ) ON c.MasterCaseID = mc.ID AND mc.ContextEntityType = 'TGIV' JOIN dbo.Advertisement ADV WITH ( NOLOCK ) ON C.ContextEntityID = ADV.ID AND C.ContextEntityType = 'ADV' JOIN dbo.ContractProduct CP WITH ( NOLOCK ) ON ADV.ContractProductID = CP.ID JOIN dbo.Product p ON cp.ProductID = p.ID JOIN dbo.Contract ct WITH ( NOLOCK ) ON cp.RelatedContractID = ct.ID JOIN #ContractsPC WITH ( NOLOCK ) ON ct.ID = #ContractsPC.ContractId LEFT JOIN dbo.[User] u WITH ( NOLOCK ) ON t.ActualOwnerID = u.ID WHERE TT.ActivityType = 'H' AND tt.id IN ( 192, 511, 525, 514, 509, 519, 529,193, 194, 512, 513, 516, 517, 527, 528 ) and ((adv.productid = cp.productid AND p.IsComposite = 0) OR (adv.productid <> cp.productid AND p.IsComposite = 1)) GROUP BY ct.id ,tt.id ,tt.Description ,u.UserName ,adv.ID ,c.id -- 2nd report---- SELECT bp.Code AS bpCode , ct.ID AS ContractId , ct.CreatedOn AS CtCreatedDate , ct.SignedDate , CASE WHEN ct.State = 1 THEN 'Approved' WHEN ct.state = 2 THEN 'Rejected' END AS ctState , ch.description AS Channel , pr.Code AS prCode , adv.AdvBeginDate , pt.Description AS prCategory , mv.code + ' - ' + mv.Description mvDescr , prt.TaskTypeID ,prt.taskDescr ,prt.taskCreatedOn , prt.taskCompletedOn ,prt.taskowner,prt.RoleDesc,prt.orderind,prt.advId FROM Contract ct JOIN ContractProduct cp ON ct.ID = cp.RelatedContractID JOIN BusinessPoint bp ON bp.ID = ct.ActualBPOwnerID JOIN Advertisement adv ON adv.ContractProductID = cp.id JOIN VersionSection vs ON adv.VersionSectionID = vs.ID JOIN MediumVersion mv ON mv.ID = vs.MediumVersionID JOIN #ProductionTasks prt ON prt.advid = adv.id JOIN Product pr ON pr.ID = adv.ProductID LEFT JOIN ProductType pt ON pt.ID = pr.ProductTypeID LEFT JOIN channeltype ch ON ch.id = ct.channeltypeid ORDER BY ct.ID ,pr.code

templates.name: Παρακολούθηση Leads - Dashboard - Lead DS
templates.sql: --declare @DateFrom1 datetime, @DateTo1 datetime, @DateFrom2 datetime, @DateTo2 datetime, @option bit; --set @DateFrom1 = '20160901'; --set @DateTo1 = '20160930'; --set @DateFrom2 = '20161001'; --set @DateTo2 = '20161031'; --set @option=1; SELECT l.id,l.Source, l.TicketSource,l.CreatedOn, PriceFromContract =sum(isnull(ct.Price, l.ContractValue)), CountContracts=count(distinct ct.ContractId), Outcome=isnull(ot.Name, '(κανένα)'), CustomerIndicator, Period=1 FROM [lpm].[Lead] l left join lpm.Outcome ot on ot.Id = l.OutcomeId left join lpm.LeadContract cl on cl.LeadId = l.Id left join lpm.YPSContracts ct on ct.ContractId = cl.ContractId where CreatedOn between @Datefrom1 and dateadd(day, 1, cast(@DateTo1 as date)) and l.Source in (@Sources) and isnull(l.TicketSource, '(χωρίς)') in (@TicketSources) and isnull(ot.Id,-1) in (@Outcomes) and isnull(CustomerIndicator, '(χωρίς)') in (@CustomerIndicator) group by l.id, l.Source, l.TicketSource, l.CreatedOn,ot.Name,l.ContractValue,CustomerIndicator union all SELECT l.id, l.Source, l.TicketSource, l.CreatedOn, PriceFromContract =sum(isnull(ct.Price, l.ContractValue)), CountContracts=count(distinct ct.ContractId), Outcome=isnull(ot.Name, '(κανένα)'), CustomerIndicator, Period=2 FROM [lpm].[Lead] l left join lpm.Outcome ot on ot.Id = l.OutcomeId left join lpm.LeadContract cl on cl.LeadId = l.Id left join lpm.YPSContracts ct on ct.ContractId = cl.ContractId where CreatedOn between @Datefrom2 and dateadd(day, 1, cast(@DateTo2 as date)) and l.Source in (@Sources) and isnull(l.TicketSource, '(χωρίς)') in (@TicketSources) and isnull(ot.Id,-1) in (@Outcomes) and isnull(CustomerIndicator, '(χωρίς)') in (@CustomerIndicator) and @option=1 group by l.id, l.Source, l.TicketSource, l.CreatedOn,ot.Name,l.ContractValue,CustomerIndicator

templates.name: Παρακολούθηση Leads - Data Set12
templates.sql: --declare @datefrom datetime, @dateto datetime ; --set @datefrom = '20200101' ; --set @dateto = '20210331'; -- Πίνακας LeadByDate -- IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#leadbydate') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #leadbydate; select * into #leadbydate from lpm.Lead l where l.CreatedOn between @DateFrom and dateadd(day,1,cast(@DateTo as date)) create index idx_bpcode on #leadbydate(businesspointcode) -- Πίνακας PointPhones -- IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#pointphones') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #pointphones; select BPId=bp.id, BPCode=bp.code, Phones= STUFF((SELECT distinct ',' + pp.number from YPS.dbo.pointphone pp where pp.businesspointid = bp.id and pp.isactive= 1 and pp.usage <> 7 FOR XML PATH(''), TYPE ).value('.', 'NVARCHAR(MAX)') ,1,1,'') into #pointphones from #leadbydate l join YPS.dbo.businesspoint bp on l.businesspointcode = bp.code -- Πίνακας PointEmails -- IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#pointemails') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #pointemails; select BPId=bp.id, BPCode=bp.code, Emails= STUFF((SELECT distinct ',' + pe.Email from YPS.dbo.PointEmail pe where pe.BusinessPointID = bp.ID FOR XML PATH(''), TYPE ).value('.', 'NVARCHAR(MAX)') ,1,1,'') into #pointemails from #leadbydate l join YPS.dbo.businesspoint bp on l.businesspointcode = bp.code where exists (select 1 from YPS.dbo.PointEmail pee where pee.BusinessPointID = bp.ID) -- Πίνακας MainActivity -- IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#mainactivity') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #mainactivity; select BpId = Bp.ID, BPCode = bp.Code, MainActivity = cn.Name into #mainactivity from #leadbydate l join YPS.dbo.BusinessPoint bp on l.businesspointcode = bp.code join YPS.dbo.Classification clf on clf.BusinessPointID = bp.ID join YPS.dbo.ClassifierNode cn on cn.id = clf.ClassifierNodeID and clf.ClassifierID = 3 -- Πίνακας Indicator -- IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#indicator') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #indicator; select distinct BpId = Bp.ID, BPCode = bp.Code, CustomerIndicator = cn.Name into #indicator from #leadbydate l join YPS.dbo.BusinessPoint bp on l.businesspointcode = bp.code join YPS.dbo.Classification clf on clf.BusinessPointID = bp.ID join YPS.dbo.ClassifierNode cn on cn.id = clf.ClassifierNodeID AND cn.id in (3,4,5) -- Πίνακας LocationPrefecture -- IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#locationprefecture') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #locationprefecture; select BpId = bp.id, BpCode=bp.Code, Prefecture = min(bal.AreaName) into #locationprefecture from #leadbydate l join YPS.dbo.BusinessPoint bp on l.businesspointcode = bp.code join YPS.dbo.Address ad on bp.LocationAddressID = ad.ID join YPS.dbo.BroaderArea ba on ad.id = ba.AddressID and ba.BroaderAreaID like 'E%' join YPS.dbo.BroaderAreaLookUp bal on bal.BroaderAreaID = ba.BroaderAreaID group by bp.id, bp.code -- Πίνακας YPSDATA -- IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#ypsdata') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #ypsdata; select distinct l.id, l.BusinessPointCode, pp.phones, pe.Emails, ma.MainActivity, ind.CustomerIndicator, lp.Prefecture into #ypsdata from #leadbydate l left join #pointphones pp on pp.BPCode = l.BusinessPointCode left join #pointemails pe on pe.BPCode = l.BusinessPointCode left join #mainactivity ma on ma.BPCode = l.BusinessPointCode left join #indicator ind on ind.BPCode = l.BusinessPointCode left join #locationprefecture lp on lp.BpCode = l.BusinessPointCode -- Πίνακας LastArea -- IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#lastarea') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #lastarea; select ll.*, Area= replace(left(logdesc,charindex('.',logdesc)-2),'Ανάθεση:: σε ''', ''), RowNo = ROW_NUMBER() Over( partition by ll.leadId order by ll.id desc) into #lastarea from #leadbydate l join [lpm].[LeadLog] ll on l.Id = ll.LeadId where ll.actionid in (1,8) and charindex('.',logdesc) > 2 -- Πίνακας lastsupervisor -- IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#lastsupervisor') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #lastsupervisor; select ll.*, Supervisor= replace(left(logdesc,charindex('.',logdesc)-2),'Ανάθεση:: σε ''', ''), RowNo = ROW_NUMBER() Over( partition by ll.leadId order by ll.id desc) into #lastsupervisor from #leadbydate l join [lpm].[LeadLog] ll on l.Id = ll.LeadId where ll.actionid in (2,9) and charindex('.',logdesc) > 2 -- Πίνακας lastsd -- IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#lastsd') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #lastsd; select ll.*, Salesman= replace(left(logdesc,charindex('.',logdesc)-2),'Ανάθεση:: σε ''', ''), RowNo = ROW_NUMBER() Over( partition by ll.leadId order by ll.id desc) into #lastsd from #leadbydate l join [lpm].[LeadLog] ll on l.Id = ll.LeadId where ll.actionid in (3,10) and charindex('.',logdesc) > 2 -- Πίνακας contracts -- IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#tmpcontracts') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #tmpcontracts; SELECT LeadId, ct.ContractId, YCT.Price INTO #tmpcontracts FROM #leadbydate L JOIN lpm.LeadContract ct ON L.Id = CT.LeadId join lpm.YPSContracts yct on ct.ContractId = yct.ContractId IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#contracts') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #contracts; select LeadId, CountContract= count(distinct ct.ContractId), SumContract = sum(ct.Price), substring( ( Select distinct ','+cast(ct2.ContractId AS nvarchar(50)) From #tmpcontracts ct2 where ct.LeadId = ct2.LeadId For XML PATH ('') ), 2, 1000) LeadContracts into #contracts from #tmpcontracts ct group by leadid -- Πίνακας firstCRMComment -- IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#tmpcrmcomments') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #tmpcrmcomments; select com.*, RowNo = ROW_NUMBER() Over( partition by com.ticketid order by com.createdon asc) into #tmpcrmcomments from lpm.YPSCRMTicketsComments com join #leadbydate l on l.ticketid = com.TicketId IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#admin') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #admin; select id=0, u.USERNAME, UserFullName = 'Admin', YpsUserId=0, SalesmanIds = (select SalesmanYPSIds from ItApps.scd.Salesman where Username = 'araptis'), ShortName = '', AppCode = a.APPLICATION_CODE, UserID = usr.Id into #admin from [ITApps].[dbo].IT_APPLICATION_RIGHTS r join [ITApps].[dbo].IT_APPLICATION_USERS u on u.ADID = r.USER_ADID join [ITApps].[dbo].IT_APPLICATIONS a on a.ID = r.APPLICATION_ID --join [ITApps].[dbo].[YPSUsersAll] usr on usr.Username = u.USERNAME join YPS.dbo.[user] usr on usr.USERNAME = u.USERNAME where a.APPLICATION_CODE = 'rep' SELECT LeadId=l.id, l.CreatedOn, l.BusinessPointCode, l.BusinessPointName, LeadContracts = cct.LeadContracts, l.BusinessPointPrefecture, l.BusinessPointCity, l.[Source], l.TicketSource, com.CommentText, l.CampaignLeadId, la.Area, ls.Supervisor, lsd.Salesman, [Initiator]=initi.[UserFullName], [Handler]=handl.[UserFullName], [LastAction]=act.Name, Outcome=ou.Name, [Status]=st.Name, [ContractValue] = isnull(cct.SumContract, contractValue), [Comments], [IsClosed], ---YPS d.Phones, d.Emails, d.MainActivity, d.CustomerIndicator, d.Prefecture, ---Adsolutions ai.[AdsolutionsTicket], ai.[CompanyName], ai.[YourName], ai.[CompanyEmail], ai.[YourTelephone], ai.[NomoiGr], ai.[Katigoria], ai.[YourMessage], ai.[NewsletterOk] FROM #leadbydate l left join lpm.[Action] act on act.Id = l.ActionId left join [lpm].[Outcome] ou on ou.id = l.outcomeid left join [lpm].[Status] st on st.id = l.statusid left join lpm.YPSUsers initi on l.InitiatorId = initi.userid left join lpm.YPSUsers handl on l.HandlerId = handl.userid left join #lastarea la on l.id = la.leadid and la.RowNo = 1 left join #lastsupervisor ls on l.id = ls.leadid and ls.RowNo = 1 left join #lastsd lsd on l.id = lsd.leadid and lsd.RowNo = 1 left join #tmpcrmcomments com on com.TicketId = l.ticketid and com.RowNo = 1 ---Adsolutions left join [lpm].[AdsolutionInfo] ai on ai.leadid = l.Id -----YPS left join #ypsdata d on d.Id = l.Id left join #contracts cct on cct.LeadId = l.Id WHERE ( (ISNULL(la.Area,'-') IN (@areamanagerName) OR la.Area IS NULL) AND (ISNULL(ls.Supervisor,'-') IN (@supervisor) OR ls.Supervisor IS NULL) AND (lsd.AssignmentUser IN (@salesman) OR lsd.AssignmentUser IS NULL) AND COALESCE(la.AssignmentUser,ls.AssignmentUser,lsd.AssignmentUser) IS NOT NULL) OR (COALESCE(la.AssignmentUser,ls.AssignmentUser,lsd.AssignmentUser) IS NULL AND (@ypscurrentuserid in (1189,2264,524 ,426,2262,493) /*araptis,pissadaki,boulouxou,karmiri,epanzari,gpapakosta*/) OR (@ypscurrentuserid in (select UserID from #admin UNION select 2264))) order by l.CreatedOn --select * from #tmpcrmcomments

templates.name: Παρακολούθηση Leads - Area Manager
templates.sql: --declare @username nvarchar(50) --set @username = 'spitsaris'; --declare @ypscurrentuserid int = 2503; IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#tt') IS NOT NULL drop table #tt; IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#area') IS NOT NULL drop table #area; IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#supervisor') IS NOT NULL drop table #supervisor; IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#admin') IS NOT NULL drop table #admin; SELECT u.* into #area FROM [ITApps].[dbo].[YPSUsersAll] u join YPS.dbo.UserRole ur on u.YPSUserId = ur.UserID where ur.RoleID in (41,42) and u.YPSUserId <> 1189 /*araptis*/ select u.* into #supervisor FROM [ITApps].[dbo].[YPSUsersAll] u join YPS.dbo.UserRole ur on u.YPSUserId = ur.UserID where ur.RoleID in (43,44) and u.YPSUserId not in (select YPSUserId from #area ) and u.YPSUserId <> 1189 /*araptis*/ select id=0, u.USERNAME, UserFullName = 'Admin', YpsUserId=0, SalesmanIds = (select SalesmanYPSIds from ItApps.scd.Salesman where Username = 'araptis'), ShortName = '', AppCode = a.APPLICATION_CODE, UserID = usr.Id into #admin from [ITApps].[dbo].IT_APPLICATION_RIGHTS r join [ITApps].[dbo].IT_APPLICATION_USERS u on u.ADID = r.USER_ADID join [ITApps].[dbo].IT_APPLICATIONS a on a.ID = r.APPLICATION_ID --join [ITApps].[dbo].[YPSUsersAll] usr on usr.Username = u.USERNAME join YPS.dbo.[user] usr on usr.USERNAME = u.USERNAME where a.APPLICATION_CODE = 'rep' select Salesman = u.YPSUserId, SalesmanName = u.UserFullName, AreaManager = area.YPSUserId, AreaManagerName = '['+area.UserSalesCode+'] ' + area.UserFullName,u.Username,area.UserFullName into #tt from [ITApps].[dbo].[YPSUsersAll] u left join #area area on u.FullUnitId like area.FullUnitId + '%' where area.Level = (select max(ain.level) from #area ain where u.FullUnitId like ain.FullUnitId + '%' ) order by 3 --select * from YPS.dbo.[user] u where username = 'araptis' if (@ypscurrentuserid in (select UserID from #admin ) or @ypscurrentuserid in (1189,2264,524 ,426,2262,493) /*araptis*/) and @ypscurrentuserid not in (select YPSUserID from #area)-- Admin begin select distinct t.AreaManager,t.AreaManagerName,t.UserFullName from #tt t order by t.UserFullName end else if @ypscurrentuserid in (select YPSUserID from #area) and @ypscurrentuserid <> 1189 -- Area Manager begin select YPSUserId as AreaManager ,'['+UserSalesCode+'] '+UserFullName as AreaManagerName,UserFullName from #area a where a.YPSUserID = @ypscurrentuserid order by UserFullName end else if @ypscurrentuserid in (select YPSUserID from #supervisor) -- Supervisor begin select distinct YPSUserId as AreaManager, '['+UserSalesCode+'] '+UserFullName as AreaManagerName, UserFullName from YPS.dbo.SalesTreeHistory sth join #area a on sth.ManagerID = a.YPSUserId where sth.SupervisorID = @ypscurrentuserid and sth.year = year(getdate()) and sth.SegmentID = month(getdate()) end else-- if @username in (select t.salesman from #tt t) and @username <> 'araptis' and @username not in (select Username from #area) begin select t.AreaManager,t.AreaManagerName,t.UserFullName from #tt t where t.AreaManager = @ypscurrentuserid order by t.UserFullName end --else -- Sup or SR --select * from #tt where salesman = 1185 -- select * from [user] u where u.id in (718)(1303) (1185, --1189, --1306, --1330, --1378, --1385, --2024) -- --

templates.name: Παρακολούθηση Leads - Supervisor
templates.sql: IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#area') IS NOT NULL drop table #area; IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#supervisor') IS NOT NULL drop table #supervisor; SELECT u.* into #area FROM [ITApps].[dbo].[YPSUsersAll] u join [YPS].[dbo].UserRole ur on u.YPSUserId = ur.UserID where ur.RoleID in (41,42) and u.YPSUserId <> 1189 /*araptis*/ select u.* into #supervisor FROM [ITApps].[dbo].[YPSUsersAll] u join [YPS].[dbo].UserRole ur on u.YPSUserId = ur.UserID where ur.RoleID in (43,44) and u.YPSUserId not in (select YPSUserId from #area ) and u.YPSUserId <> 1189 /*araptis*/ if @ypscurrentuserid in (select YPSUserID from #supervisor) begin select distinct YPSUserId as SupervisorID, '['+UserSalesCode+'] '+UserFullName as Supervisor, UserFullName from [YPS].[dbo].SalesTreeHistory sth join #supervisor s on sth.SupervisorID = s.YPSUserId where sth.SupervisorID = @ypscurrentuserid and sth.year = year(getdate()) and sth.SegmentID = month(getdate()) end else begin select distinct sth.SupervisorID,'['+UserSalesCode+'] '+UserFullName as Supervisor,UserFullName from [YPS].[dbo].SalesTreeHistory sth join [ITApps].[dbo].[YPSUsersAll] sup on sup.YPSUserId = sth.SupervisorID where sth.ManagerID in (@areamanager) and sth.year = year(getdate()) and sth.SegmentID = month(getdate()) order by UserFullName end

templates.name: Παρακολούθηση Leads - User Id
templates.sql: SELECT usr.id FROM [YPS].[dbo].[user] AS usr WHERE CASE WHEN @username = 'amatzorou' THEN 'amantzorou' ELSE @username END = usr.UserName

templates.name: Παρακολούθηση Leads - Area Manager Name
templates.sql: SELECT '[' + u.UserSalesCode + '] ' + u.UserFullName AS AreaManagerName FROM [ITApps].[dbo].[YPSUsersAll] AS u WHERE u.YPSUserId IN (@areamanager)

templates.name: Παρακολούθηση Leads - Salesmen
templates.sql: SELECT DISTINCT '[' + u.UserSalesCode + '] ' + u.UserFullName AS Salesman FROM yps.dbo.SalesTreeHistory AS sth JOIN [ITApps].[dbo].[YPSUsersAll] AS u ON u.YPSUserId = sth.SalesmanID JOIN [ITApps].[dbo].[YPSUsersAll] AS s ON s.YPSUserId = sth.SupervisorID WHERE sth.Year = YEAR(GETDATE()) AND sth.IsDeleted = 0 AND ( '[' + s.UserSalesCode + '] ' + s.UserFullName ) IN (@supervisor) AND NOT u.UserSalesCode IS NULL

templates.name: Παρακολούθηση αποστολής στατιστικών ανα μήνα και τύπο μέσου - Year
templates.source: rdl:Παρακολούθηση αποστολής στατιστικών ανα μήνα και τύπο μέσου:Year
templates.sql: WITH yearlist AS ( SELECT 2014 AS year UNION ALL SELECT yl.year + 1 AS year FROM yearlist AS yl WHERE yl.year + 1 <= YEAR(GETDATE()) ) SELECT year FROM yearlist ORDER BY year DESC

templates.name: Παρακολούθηση εκπτώσεων ανά καμπάνια - Discount DS
aggregations: SUM(CASE WHEN cp.State = 4 THEN cp.AlteredAmount ELSE cp.price - cp.discount - cp.rulesdiscount END)
templates.sql: SELECT '[' + cm.Code + '] ' + cm.Name AS campaign, ct.id AS contractid, ct.signeddate AS contractsigned, '[' + u.SalesCode + '] ' + ISNULL(u.LastName, '') + ' ' + ISNULL(u.FirstName, '') AS Saleman, SUM(cp.price) AS cttotalamount, SUM( CASE WHEN cp.State = 4 THEN cp.AlteredAmount ELSE cp.price - cp.discount - cp.rulesdiscount END ) AS ctamountafterdiscount, SUM(cp.Discount) AS ctSDdiscount, SUM(cp.BundleDiscount) AS ctbundlediscount, SUM(cp.ProductDiscount) AS ctproductdiscount, SUM(cp.PaymentDiscount) AS ctpaymentdiscount, SUM(cp.rulesdiscount) AS ctrulesdiscount FROM dbo.Contract AS ct LEFT JOIN dbo.[User] AS u ON u.id = ct.salesmanid LEFT JOIN dbo.Campaign AS cm ON cm.id = ct.CampaignID JOIN ContractProduct AS cp ON cp.RelatedContractID = ct.ID AND cp.State <> 3 WHERE ct.state IN (1, 6) AND NOT ct.type IN (1, 10) AND ct.SignedDate BETWEEN CAST(@fromdate AS DATE) AND CAST(@todate AS DATE) GROUP BY '[' + cm.Code + '] ' + cm.Name, ct.id, ct.signeddate, '[' + u.SalesCode + '] ' + ISNULL(u.LastName, '') + ' ' + ISNULL(u.FirstName, '')

templates.name: Παρακολούθηση Κατάστασης Φυσικών Συμβολαίων - Main Data Set
templates.sql: --declare @DateFrom datetime = '2021-12-29'; --declare @DateTo datetime = '2021-12-29'; --declare @action int = 2; IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#contractsSHT') IS NOT NULL drop table #contractsSHT; SELECT ctr.ContractId , tgiv.ID as tgivID, ct.CreatedOn, ct.State, ct.SignedDate, ct.SalesManID, ct.CampaignID, ct.ActualBPOwnerID, tgiv.HandlerUserID, tgiv.Supervisor INTO #contractsSHT FROM sht.ContractTracker ctr JOIN yps.dbo.TargetGroupItemValue tgiv ON ISNULL(tgiv.ContractID,tgiv.AltOfferID) = ctr.ContractId JOIN yps.dbo.[Contract] ct ON ct.ID = ctr.ContractId WHERE ctr.ReferenceDate >= @DateFrom AND ctr.ReferenceDate <= @DateTo AND ctr.[Action] = @Action GROUP BY ctr.ContractId , tgiv.ID, ct.CreatedOn, ct.State, ct.SignedDate, ct.SalesManID, ct.CampaignID, ct.ActualBPOwnerID, tgiv.HandlerUserID, tgiv.Supervisor IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#camps') IS NOT NULL drop table #camps; SELECT cmp.ID, cmp.Name, cmp.Code INTO #camps FROM #contractsSHT tmp JOIN yps.dbo.Campaign cmp ON cmp.ID = tmp.CampaignID GROUP BY cmp.ID, cmp.Name, cmp.Code IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#tasks') IS NOT NULL drop table #tasks; SELECT tmp.contractID, t.id taskID, isnull('['+CAST(t.id AS nvarchar(15))+'] '+t.Description,'-') tDescription, t.CreatedOn INTO #tasks FROM #contractsSHT tmp JOIN yps.dbo.[Case] mc ON mc.ContextEntityID = tmp.tgivID AND mc.ContextEntityType = 'TGIV' JOIN yps.dbo.[case] c ON mc.ID = c.MasterCaseID JOIN yps.dbo.Task t ON c.ID = t.CaseID JOIN yps.dbo.TaskType tt ON t.TaskTypeID = tt.ID AND tt.ActivityType = 'H' WHERE t.Status = 0 AND c.state = 0 GROUP BY tmp.contractID, t.id, t.Description, t.CreatedOn union all select ci.ContractId, t.id taskID, tDescription = isnull('['+CAST(t.id AS nvarchar(15))+'] '+t.Description,'-'), t.CreatedOn from Itapps.cdm.[case] cs join Itapps.cdm.caseinfo ci on ci.caseid = cs.Id join Itapps.cdm.task t on t.CaseId = cs.Id join Itapps.cdm.TaskInfo ti on ti.TaskId = t.Id join #contractsSHT cts on cts.contractID = ci.ContractId left join Itapps.cdm.AssignUsers au on au.id = ti.AssignedTo left join Itapps.cdm.Outcome o on t.OutcomeId = o.Id WHERE t.Closed = 0 union all select ci.ContractId, t.id taskID, tDescription = isnull('['+CAST(t.id AS nvarchar(15))+'] '+t.Description,'-'), t.CreatedOn from Itapps.cdm.[caseHistory] cs join Itapps.cdm.caseinfoHistory ci on ci.caseid = cs.Id join Itapps.cdm.taskHistory t on t.CaseId = cs.Id join Itapps.cdm.TaskInfoHistory ti on ti.TaskId = t.Id join #contractsSHT cts on cts.contractID = ci.ContractId left join Itapps.cdm.AssignUsers au on au.id = ti.AssignedTo left join Itapps.cdm.Outcome o on t.OutcomeId = o.Id WHERE t.Closed = 0 union all -- docusign pseudo-task for DEV-14465 select e.ContractID, 0 taskID, tDescription = 'Αναμονή Υπογραφής μέσω Docusign', e.CreatedOn FROM Itapps.docusign.Envelope e join #contractsSHT ct on ct.contractID = e.ContractID WHERE e.LastStatus = 0 ORDER BY t.CreatedOn desc IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#maxtasks') IS NOT NULL drop table #maxtasks; select ta.ContractId, ta.taskId, ta.tDescription, ta.CreatedOn into #maxtasks from #tasks ta JOIN ( SELECT tmp1.contractID, max(tmp1.taskID) as taskID FROM #tasks tmp1 group by tmp1.contractID ) maxedTID on ta.taskID = maxedTID.taskID group by ta.ContractId,ta.tDescription, ta.CreatedOn, ta.taskID if object_id('tempdb..#taskstatus') is not null drop table #taskstatus select cp.RelatedContractID AS [Contract], max(ts.id) AS Taskid into #taskstatus from yps.dbo.[case] cs join yps.dbo.task ts on cs.id = ts.CaseID join yps.dbo.Advertisement a on a.id = cs.ContextEntityID and cs.ContextEntityType = 'ADV' join yps.dbo.[Case] cc on cc.id = cs.MasterCaseID AND cc.ContextEntityType = 'TGIV' join yps.dbo.ContractProduct cp on cp.ID = a.ContractProductID join #contractssht cts on cts.contractID= cp.RelatedContractID join yps.dbo.Product pr on pr.id = cp.ProductID join yps.dbo.Udac ud on ud.id = pr.UdacID --where ud.ProdWorkflowID <> 2 group BY cp.RelatedContractID union all -------------Μέχρι έλεγχο Πληρότητας ---------- select cp.RelatedContractID AS [Contract], max(ts.id) AS Taskid --into #taskstatus from yps.dbo.[case] cs join yps.dbo.task ts on cs.id = ts.CaseID join yps.dbo.[Case] cc on cc.id = cs.MasterCaseID AND cc.ContextEntityType = 'TGIV' join #contractssht cts on cts.tgivID= cs.ContextEntityID join yps.dbo.ContractProduct cp on cts.contractID = cp.RelatedContractID join yps.dbo.Product pr on pr.id = cp.ProductID join yps.dbo.Udac ud on ud.id = pr.UdacID where ts.Status = 1 and ts.TaskTypeID = 189 and not exists ( select 1 from yps.dbo.udac iu join yps.dbo.Product ip on ip.UdacID = iu.id join yps.dbo.ContractProduct icp on icp.ProductID = ip.id where icp.RelatedContractID = cp.RelatedContractID and iu.ProdWorkflowID <> 2) group BY cp.RelatedContractID union all select cp.RelatedContractID AS [Contract], max(ts.id) AS Taskid --into #taskstatus from yps.dbo.[case] cs join yps.dbo.task ts on cs.id = ts.CaseID join yps.dbo.[Case] cc on cc.id = cs.MasterCaseID AND cc.ContextEntityType = 'TGIV' join #contractssht cts on cts.tgivID= cs.ContextEntityID join yps.dbo.ContractProduct cp on cts.contractID = cp.RelatedContractID join yps.dbo.Product pr on pr.id = cp.ProductID join yps.dbo.Udac ud on ud.id = pr.UdacID where ts.Status = 1 and ts.TaskTypeID = 189 and cts.contractID in (2004625,2005595,2006379,2008295,2009114,2010632,2014811,2012808) and not exists ( select 1 from yps.dbo.udac iu join yps.dbo.Product ip on ip.UdacID = iu.id join yps.dbo.ContractProduct icp on icp.ProductID = ip.id where icp.RelatedContractID = cp.RelatedContractID and iu.ProdWorkflowID <> 4) group BY cp.RelatedContractID order by 1 --select * from #taskstatus --medium if object_id('tempdb..#tmpMediums') is not null drop table #tmpMediums select distinct '[' + mv.Code + ']-'+m.name as medium , t.contractID into #tmpMediums from #contractsSHT t join yps.dbo.[Contract] ct on t.contractID = ct.ID join yps.dbo.ContractProduct cp on cp.RelatedContractID = ct.ID join yps.dbo.Advertisement adv on cp.ID = adv.ContractProductID join yps.dbo.Product pr on adv.ProductID = pr.id join yps.dbo.VersionSection vs on adv.VersionSectionID = vs.ID join yps.dbo.MediumVersion mv on mv.ID = vs.MediumVersionID join yps.dbo.Medium m on m.ID = mv.MediumID where pr.IsComposite = 0 if object_id('tempdb..#medium') is not null drop table #medium select t1.contractID , ( SELECT t2.medium + ',' FROM #tmpMediums t2 WHERE t2.contractID = t1.contractID ORDER BY t2.medium FOR XML PATH('') ) AS Mediums into #medium from #tmpMediums t1 group by contractID --ContractPrice IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#contractprice') IS NOT NULL drop table #contractprice select ct.id contractid,sum(CASE WHEN cp.[STATE] IN ( 3, 4 ) AND cp.AlteredAmount IS NOT NULL THEN cp.AlteredAmount ELSE cp.price - cp.discount - cp.rulesdiscount END) price, sum(cp.Discount) Disc, sum(isnull(cp.PaymentDiscount,0)) pDisc, SUM(CASE WHEN ct.State = 6 AND cp.state IN (3,4) THEN cp.AlteredAmount WHEN ct.State = 6 AND cp.State NOT IN (3,4) THEN cp.Price-cp.RulesDiscount-cp.Discount ELSE null END) altAmount into #contractprice from yps.dbo.[Contract] ct join yps.dbo.ContractProduct cp on cp.RelatedContractID = ct.id join #contractsSHT ctrSHT on ctrSHT.ContractId = ct.Id GROUP BY ct.id SELECT [Καμπάνια] = '[' + cmp.code+'] '+cmp.Name, [Area Manager] = '[' +cast(area.SalesCode as nvarchar(100))+'] '+area.LastName+' '+area.FirstName, [Supervisor] = '[' +supervisor.SalesCode+'] ' + cast(supervisor.LastName as nvarchar(50)) + ' ' + cast(supervisor.FirstName as nvarchar(50)) , [SalesMan] = '[' +cast(u.SalesCode as nvarchar(100))+'] '+u.LastName+' '+u.FirstName, [Κωδ. ΕΣ] = bp.code, [Επωνυμία] = bp.name, [Κωδ. Συμβολαίου] = ctr.contractID, [Τελική Αξία Συμβολαίου] = ctp.price, [Ημερ. Υπογραφής Συμβ.] = ctr.SignedDate, [Ημερ. Δημιουργίας Συμβ.] = ctr.CreatedOn, [Κατάσταση Συμβολαίου] = CASE ctr.[State] WHEN 0 THEN 'Pending' WHEN 1 THEN 'Approved' WHEN 2 THEN 'Rejected' WHEN 3 THEN 'Cancelled' WHEN 4 THEN 'Replaced' WHEN 5 THEN 'CancelledOffer' WHEN 6 THEN 'Modified' END, [Ολοκληρωμένα] = CASE ts.Status WHEN 1 THEN 'Completed' ELSE '-' END, [Τελευταίο Ανοιχτό Βήμα] = isnull(tasks.tDescription,'-'), [Μέσα/Εκδόσεις Συμβ.] = SUBSTRING(mdm.Mediums,1,LEN(mdm.Mediums)-1) FROM #contractsSHT ctr JOIN #camps cmp ON cmp.ID = ctr.CampaignID JOIN yps.dbo.[User] supervisor on ctr.Supervisor = supervisor.ID JOIN yps.dbo.[User] u ON ctr.HandlerUserID = u.id LEFT JOIN yps.dbo.SalesTreeHistory sth on sth.SalesmanID = u.id and sth.[Year] = YEAR(ctr.CreatedOn) and sth.SegmentID = MONTH(ctr.CreatedOn) and sth.IsDeleted=0 LEFT JOIN yps.dbo.[User] area on sth.ManagerID = area.ID JOIN yps.dbo.Businesspoint bp ON bp.id = ctr.ActualBPOwnerID LEFT JOIN #contractprice ctp ON ctp.contractid = ctr.contractID LEFT JOIN #taskstatus tst on tst.Contract = ctr.contractID LEFT JOIN yps.dbo.Task ts on ts.id = tst.Taskid LEFT JOIN #maxtasks tasks ON tasks.contractID = ctr.ContractId LEFT JOIN #medium mdm ON mdm.ContractId = ctr.ContractId ORDER BY [Καμπάνια]

templates.name: Παρακολούθηση Κατάστασης Φυσικών Συμβολαίων - Remaining DS
templates.sql: --declare @DateFrom datetime = '2021-12-29'; --declare @DateTo datetime = '2021-12-29'; --declare @action int = 2; IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#contractsSHT') IS NOT NULL drop table #contractsSHT; SELECT ctr.ContractId , tgiv.ID as tgivID, ct.CreatedOn, ct.State, ct.SignedDate, ct.SalesManID, ct.CampaignID, ct.ActualBPOwnerID, tgiv.HandlerUserID, tgiv.Supervisor INTO #contractsSHT FROM sht.ContractTracker ctr JOIN yps.dbo.TargetGroupItemValue tgiv ON ISNULL(tgiv.ContractID,tgiv.AltOfferID) = ctr.ContractId JOIN yps.dbo.[Contract] ct ON ct.ID = ctr.ContractId WHERE ctr.ContractId NOT IN (SELECT ctr.ContractId FROM sht.ContractTracker ctr2 WHERE ctr2.ContractId = ctr.ContractId AND ctr2.Action = 2) AND ctr.ReferenceDate >= @DateFrom AND ctr.ReferenceDate <= @DateTo AND ctr.[Action] = 1 GROUP BY ctr.ContractId , tgiv.ID, ct.CreatedOn, ct.State, ct.SignedDate, ct.SalesManID, ct.CampaignID, ct.ActualBPOwnerID, tgiv.HandlerUserID, tgiv.Supervisor IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#camps') IS NOT NULL drop table #camps; SELECT cmp.ID, cmp.Name, cmp.Code INTO #camps FROM #contractsSHT tmp JOIN yps.dbo.Campaign cmp ON cmp.ID = tmp.CampaignID GROUP BY cmp.ID, cmp.Name, cmp.Code IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#tasks') IS NOT NULL drop table #tasks; SELECT tmp.contractID, t.id taskID, isnull('['+CAST(t.id AS nvarchar(15))+'] '+t.Description,'-') tDescription, t.CreatedOn INTO #tasks FROM #contractsSHT tmp JOIN yps.dbo.[Case] mc ON mc.ContextEntityID = tmp.tgivID AND mc.ContextEntityType = 'TGIV' JOIN yps.dbo.[case] c ON mc.ID = c.MasterCaseID JOIN yps.dbo.Task t ON c.ID = t.CaseID JOIN yps.dbo.TaskType tt ON t.TaskTypeID = tt.ID AND tt.ActivityType = 'H' WHERE t.Status = 0 AND c.state = 0 GROUP BY tmp.contractID, t.id, t.Description, t.CreatedOn union all select ci.ContractId, t.id taskID, tDescription = isnull('['+CAST(t.id AS nvarchar(15))+'] '+t.Description,'-'), t.CreatedOn from Itapps.cdm.[case] cs join Itapps.cdm.caseinfo ci on ci.caseid = cs.Id join Itapps.cdm.task t on t.CaseId = cs.Id join Itapps.cdm.TaskInfo ti on ti.TaskId = t.Id join #contractsSHT cts on cts.contractID = ci.ContractId left join Itapps.cdm.AssignUsers au on au.id = ti.AssignedTo left join Itapps.cdm.Outcome o on t.OutcomeId = o.Id WHERE t.Closed = 0 union all select ci.ContractId, t.id taskID, tDescription = isnull('['+CAST(t.id AS nvarchar(15))+'] '+t.Description,'-'), t.CreatedOn from Itapps.cdm.[caseHistory] cs join Itapps.cdm.caseinfoHistory ci on ci.caseid = cs.Id join Itapps.cdm.taskHistory t on t.CaseId = cs.Id join Itapps.cdm.TaskInfoHistory ti on ti.TaskId = t.Id join #contractsSHT cts on cts.contractID = ci.ContractId left join Itapps.cdm.AssignUsers au on au.id = ti.AssignedTo left join Itapps.cdm.Outcome o on t.OutcomeId = o.Id WHERE t.Closed = 0 union all -- docusign pseudo-task for DEV-14465 select e.ContractID, 0 taskID, tDescription = 'Αναμονή Υπογραφής μέσω Docusign', e.CreatedOn FROM Itapps.docusign.Envelope e join #contractsSHT ct on ct.contractID = e.ContractID WHERE e.LastStatus = 0 ORDER BY t.CreatedOn desc IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#maxtasks') IS NOT NULL drop table #maxtasks; select ta.ContractId, ta.taskId, ta.tDescription, ta.CreatedOn into #maxtasks from #tasks ta JOIN ( SELECT tmp1.contractID, max(tmp1.taskID) as taskID FROM #tasks tmp1 group by tmp1.contractID ) maxedTID on ta.taskID = maxedTID.taskID group by ta.ContractId,ta.tDescription, ta.CreatedOn, ta.taskID if object_id('tempdb..#taskstatus') is not null drop table #taskstatus select cp.RelatedContractID AS [Contract], max(ts.id) AS Taskid into #taskstatus from yps.dbo.[case] cs join yps.dbo.task ts on cs.id = ts.CaseID join yps.dbo.Advertisement a on a.id = cs.ContextEntityID and cs.ContextEntityType = 'ADV' join yps.dbo.[Case] cc on cc.id = cs.MasterCaseID AND cc.ContextEntityType = 'TGIV' join yps.dbo.ContractProduct cp on cp.ID = a.ContractProductID join #contractssht cts on cts.contractID= cp.RelatedContractID join yps.dbo.Product pr on pr.id = cp.ProductID join yps.dbo.Udac ud on ud.id = pr.UdacID --where ud.ProdWorkflowID <> 2 group BY cp.RelatedContractID union all -------------Μέχρι έλεγχο Πληρότητας ---------- select cp.RelatedContractID AS [Contract], max(ts.id) AS Taskid --into #taskstatus from yps.dbo.[case] cs join yps.dbo.task ts on cs.id = ts.CaseID join yps.dbo.[Case] cc on cc.id = cs.MasterCaseID AND cc.ContextEntityType = 'TGIV' join #contractssht cts on cts.tgivID= cs.ContextEntityID join yps.dbo.ContractProduct cp on cts.contractID = cp.RelatedContractID join yps.dbo.Product pr on pr.id = cp.ProductID join yps.dbo.Udac ud on ud.id = pr.UdacID where ts.Status = 1 and ts.TaskTypeID = 189 and not exists ( select 1 from yps.dbo.udac iu join yps.dbo.Product ip on ip.UdacID = iu.id join yps.dbo.ContractProduct icp on icp.ProductID = ip.id where icp.RelatedContractID = cp.RelatedContractID and iu.ProdWorkflowID <> 2) group BY cp.RelatedContractID union all select cp.RelatedContractID AS [Contract], max(ts.id) AS Taskid --into #taskstatus from yps.dbo.[case] cs join yps.dbo.task ts on cs.id = ts.CaseID join yps.dbo.[Case] cc on cc.id = cs.MasterCaseID AND cc.ContextEntityType = 'TGIV' join #contractssht cts on cts.tgivID= cs.ContextEntityID join yps.dbo.ContractProduct cp on cts.contractID = cp.RelatedContractID join yps.dbo.Product pr on pr.id = cp.ProductID join yps.dbo.Udac ud on ud.id = pr.UdacID where ts.Status = 1 and ts.TaskTypeID = 189 and cts.contractID in (2004625,2005595,2006379,2008295,2009114,2010632,2014811,2012808) and not exists ( select 1 from yps.dbo.udac iu join yps.dbo.Product ip on ip.UdacID = iu.id join yps.dbo.ContractProduct icp on icp.ProductID = ip.id where icp.RelatedContractID = cp.RelatedContractID and iu.ProdWorkflowID <> 4) group BY cp.RelatedContractID order by 1 --select * from #taskstatus --medium if object_id('tempdb..#tmpMediums') is not null drop table #tmpMediums select distinct '[' + mv.Code + ']-'+m.name as medium , t.contractID into #tmpMediums from #contractsSHT t join yps.dbo.[Contract] ct on t.contractID = ct.ID join yps.dbo.ContractProduct cp on cp.RelatedContractID = ct.ID join yps.dbo.Advertisement adv on cp.ID = adv.ContractProductID join yps.dbo.Product pr on adv.ProductID = pr.id join yps.dbo.VersionSection vs on adv.VersionSectionID = vs.ID join yps.dbo.MediumVersion mv on mv.ID = vs.MediumVersionID join yps.dbo.Medium m on m.ID = mv.MediumID where pr.IsComposite = 0 if object_id('tempdb..#medium') is not null drop table #medium select t1.contractID , ( SELECT t2.medium + ',' FROM #tmpMediums t2 WHERE t2.contractID = t1.contractID ORDER BY t2.medium FOR XML PATH('') ) AS Mediums into #medium from #tmpMediums t1 group by contractID --ContractPrice IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#contractprice') IS NOT NULL drop table #contractprice select ct.id contractid,sum(CASE WHEN cp.[STATE] IN ( 3, 4 ) AND cp.AlteredAmount IS NOT NULL THEN cp.AlteredAmount ELSE cp.price - cp.discount - cp.rulesdiscount END) price, sum(cp.Discount) Disc, sum(isnull(cp.PaymentDiscount,0)) pDisc, SUM(CASE WHEN ct.State = 6 AND cp.state IN (3,4) THEN cp.AlteredAmount WHEN ct.State = 6 AND cp.State NOT IN (3,4) THEN cp.Price-cp.RulesDiscount-cp.Discount ELSE null END) altAmount into #contractprice from yps.dbo.[Contract] ct join yps.dbo.ContractProduct cp on cp.RelatedContractID = ct.id join #contractsSHT ctrSHT on ctrSHT.ContractId = ct.Id GROUP BY ct.id SELECT [Καμπάνια] = '[' + cmp.code+'] '+cmp.Name, [Area Manager] = '[' +cast(area.SalesCode as nvarchar(100))+'] '+area.LastName+' '+area.FirstName, [Supervisor] = '[' +supervisor.SalesCode+'] ' + cast(supervisor.LastName as nvarchar(50)), [SalesMan] = '[' +cast(u.SalesCode as nvarchar(100))+'] '+u.LastName+' '+u.FirstName, [Κωδ. ΕΣ] = bp.code, [Επωνυμία] = bp.name, [Κωδ. Συμβολαίου] = ctr.contractID, [Τελική Αξία Συμβολαίου] = ctp.price, [Ημερ. Υπογραφής Συμβ.] = ctr.SignedDate, [Ημερ. Δημιουργίας Συμβ.] = ctr.CreatedOn, [Κατάσταση Συμβολαίου] = CASE ctr.[State] WHEN 0 THEN 'Pending' WHEN 1 THEN 'Approved' WHEN 2 THEN 'Rejected' WHEN 3 THEN 'Cancelled' WHEN 4 THEN 'Replaced' WHEN 5 THEN 'CancelledOffer' WHEN 6 THEN 'Modified' END, [Ολοκληρωμένα] = CASE ts.Status WHEN 1 THEN 'Completed' ELSE '-' END, [Τελευταίο Ανοιχτό Βήμα] = isnull(tasks.tDescription,'-'), [Μέσα/Εκδόσεις Συμβ.] = SUBSTRING(mdm.Mediums,1,LEN(mdm.Mediums)-1) FROM #contractsSHT ctr JOIN #camps cmp ON cmp.ID = ctr.CampaignID JOIN yps.dbo.[User] supervisor on ctr.Supervisor = supervisor.ID JOIN yps.dbo.[User] u ON ctr.HandlerUserID = u.id LEFT JOIN yps.dbo.SalesTreeHistory sth on sth.SalesmanID = u.id and sth.[Year] = YEAR(ctr.CreatedOn) and sth.SegmentID = MONTH(ctr.CreatedOn) and sth.IsDeleted=0 LEFT JOIN yps.dbo.[User] area on sth.ManagerID = area.ID JOIN yps.dbo.Businesspoint bp ON bp.id = ctr.ActualBPOwnerID LEFT JOIN #contractprice ctp ON ctp.contractid = ctr.contractID LEFT JOIN #taskstatus tst on tst.Contract = ctr.contractID LEFT JOIN yps.dbo.Task ts on ts.id = tst.Taskid LEFT JOIN #maxtasks tasks ON tasks.contractID = ctr.ContractId LEFT JOIN #medium mdm ON mdm.ContractId = ctr.ContractId ORDER BY [Καμπάνια]

templates.name: Παρακολούθηση στόχων ανά segment - DS Main
templates.sql: --DECLARE @startdate AS DATETIME, @date AS DATETIME, @Campaign AS INT,@segment AS int --SET @startdate = '20130917' --SET @date = '20131015' --SET @Campaign = 22 --SET @segment =52 IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#SegmentDays') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #SegmentDays; IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#SegmentDaysVar') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #SegmentDaysVar; IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#SegmentTarget') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #SegmentTarget; ------------ Ημέρες segment---------------------------------------------------- SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT sd.[id]) AS Cnt ,cs.CampaignId ,sd.segmentId INTO #SegmentDays FROM [ITApps].[sts].SegmentDate sd JOIN [ITApps].[sts].CampaignSegment cs ON cs.id = sd.segmentId WHERE cs.id = @segment GROUP BY cs.CampaignId ,sd.segmentId ----------------- Ημέρες segment μέχρι @date ------------------------------------- SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT sd.[id]) AS Cnt ,cs.CampaignId ,sd.segmentId INTO #SegmentDaysVar FROM [ITApps].[sts].SegmentDate sd JOIN [ITApps].[sts].CampaignSegment cs ON cs.id = sd.segmentId WHERE sd.[date] <= @date AND cs.id = @segment GROUP BY cs.CampaignId ,sd.segmentId --SELECT * FROM #SegmentDays --SELECT * FROM #SegmentDaysVar ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ SELECT DISTINCT cm.id AS campaignId ,cm.Name ,cm.Code ,cs.id AS segmentId ,u.id AS SRId ,'[' +u.SalesCode+']' +' '+u.LastName +' '+ u.FirstName AS SRName ,sup.id AS SupId ,'[' +sup.SalesCode+']' +' '+sup.LastName + ' '+sup.FirstName AS SupName ,cs.datefrom ,cs.dateto ,st.printedCount ,st.printedValue ,st.newCount ,st.newvalue INTO #Segmenttarget FROM yps.dbo.Campaign cm JOIN [ITApps].[sts].[CampaignSegment] cs ON cm.id = cs.CampaignId JOIN [ITApps].[sts].[SegmentDate] sd ON cs.id = sd.segmentId JOIN [ITApps].[sts].[SegmentTarget] st ON st.segmentId = cs.id JOIN yps.dbo.[User] u ON st.salemanID = u.id JOIN YPS.dbo.[User] sup ON st.supervisorID = sup.ID WHERE cm.id = @campaign AND cs.id = @segment -----------------------------DailyActivity_Visits------------------------------- IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#ContractData') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #ContractData SELECT CampaignID = cm.id, CampaignCode = cm.Code, CampaignDescription = cm.Name, SalesManId = ct.SalesManID, SupervisorId = tgiv.Supervisor, --Supervisor = '[' + su.SalesCode + '] ' + su.LastName + ' ' + su.FirstName, --Salesman = '[' + u.SalesCode + '] ' + u.LastName + ' ' + u.FirstName, CustomerIndicator = CASE LossPrintedNew WHEN 2 then 0 ELSE LossPrintedNew END, ContractId = ct.id, bp.ID BPId, ContractPrice = ( (SELECT sum(CASE WHEN cp1.state IN (3,4) AND cp1.AlteredAmount IS NOT NULL THEN cp1.AlteredAmount else Price - Discount - RulesDiscount end) FROM dbo.ContractProduct cp1 WHERE RelatedContractID = ct.id)) INTO #ContractData FROM dbo.Campaign cm JOIN dbo.TargetGroupItem tgi ON cm.ID = tgi.CampaignID JOIN dbo.TargetGroupItemValue tgiv ON tgi.ID = tgiv.TargetGroupItemID JOIN dbo.[Case] c ON c.ContextEntityID = tgiv.ID AND c.ContextEntityType = 'TGIV' JOIN dbo.Task t ON c.ID = t.CaseID JOIN dbo.TaskType tt ON t.TaskTypeID = tt.ID AND TT.ActivityType = 'H' AND tt.ID IN (154,312,313,309,311, 151, 299, 300) ---TaskType = Επίσκεψη σε πελάτη, νέο ραντεβού --,Απάντηση Αιτήματος Έκπτωσης added on 20130724 ---TaskType = Tele : Επικοινωνία με πελάτη, Επανάκληση, Απάντηση Αιτήματος Έκπτωσης JOIN dbo.Contract ct ON tgiv.AltOfferID = ct.ID and ct.State not in (3,5,10) and ct.type in (0,3,2,4) ---Not cancelled JOIN dbo.[User] u ON ct.SalesManID = u.ID JOIN dbo.BusinessPoint bp ON tgi.BusinessPointID = bp.ID JOIN dbo.[User] su ON tgiv.Supervisor = su.ID WHERE cm.ID = @campaign AND ISNULL(t.Outcome, 'ΑΠΟΔΠ') IN ( 'ΑΠΟΔΠ','Αποδοχή με παρουσίαση μακέτας','Αποδοχή χωρίς παρουσίαση μακέτας','ΑΕΚΠΤ',--ΑΕΚΠΤ added on 20130724 'Άρνηση Καταγραφής', 'Αναμονή Υλικού Πελάτη', 'Συγκατάθεση καταγραφής', 'ΑΕΚΠΤ') --Tele AND ct.SignedDate BETWEEN @startdate AND DATEADD(DAY,1, @date) --DEV3848 GROUP BY cm.id , cm.Code , cm.Name , (CASE LossPrintedNew WHEN 2 THEN 0 ELSE LossPrintedNew END) , ct.id , bp.id , ct.SalesManID , tgiv.Supervisor IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#SegmentResults') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #SegmentResults SELECT CampaignID, --CampaignDesc = '[' + CampaignCode + '] ' + CampaignDescription, -- Supervisor, SupervisorId, -- Salesman, SalesManId, CustomerIndicator , NewCount = CASE CustomerIndicator WHEN 0 THEN COUNT(DISTINCT BPId) ELSE 0 END, NewValue = CASE CustomerIndicator WHEN 0 THEN SUM(ContractPrice) ELSE 0 END, PrintedCount = CASE WHEN CustomerIndicator <> 0 THEN COUNT(DISTINCT BPId) ELSE 0 END, PrintedValue = CASE WHEN CustomerIndicator <> 0 THEN SUM(ContractPrice) ELSE 0 END INTO #SegmentResults FROM #ContractData cd GROUP BY CampaignId, -- CampaignCode, -- CampaignDescription, -- Supervisor, SupervisorId, -- Salesman, CustomerIndicator, SalesManId, cd.SupervisorId IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#SegmentResultsRow') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #SegmentResultsRow SELECT CampaignID, --CampaignDesc, SupervisorId, --Supervisor, SalesManId, --Salesman, NewCount = SUM(NewCount), NewValue = SUM(NewValue), PrintedCount = SUM(printedCount), PrintedValue = SUM(PrintedValue) INTO #SegmentResultsRow FROM #SegmentResults GROUP BY CampaignID --, CampaignDesc , SupervisorId --, Supervisor , SalesManId --, Salesman IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#CustomerVisits') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #CustomerVisits SELECT * INTO #CustomerVisits FROM ( SELECT TgivId = tgiv.id, TaskID = t.id, CampaignID = cm.ID , -- CampaignDesc = '[' + cm.Code + '] ' + cm.NAME, SupervisorId = su.ID, -- SupervisorName = '[' + ISNULL(su.SalesCode,'') + '] ' + ISNULL(su.LastName, '') + ' ' + ISNULL(su.FirstName,''), SalesManId = U.ID, -- SalesManName = '[' + ISNULL(u.SalesCode,'') + '] ' + ISNULL(u.LastName, '') + ' ' + ISNULL(u.FirstName,''), VisitDate = DATEADD(day, DATEDIFF(day, 0, t.CompletedOn), 0), CustomerIndicator = CASE tgiv.LossPrintedNew WHEN 2 then 0 ELSE tgiv.LossPrintedNew END, TaskOutcome = t.Outcome, BPId = tgi.BusinessPointID FROM dbo.Campaign cm JOIN dbo.TargetGroupItem tgi ON tgi.CampaignID = cm.ID JOIN dbo.TargetGroupItemValue tgiv ON tgi.ID = tgiv.TargetGroupItemID AND tgiv.CampaignAllocationPlanID = cm.SelectedAllocationPlanID JOIN dbo.[User] su ON tgiv.Supervisor = su.ID JOIN dbo.[Case] cs ON cs.ContextEntityID = tgiv.ID AND cs.ContextEntityType = 'tgiv' JOIN dbo.Task t ON cs.ID = t.CaseID JOIN dbo.TaskType tt ON t.TaskTypeID = tt.ID AND TT.ActivityType = 'H' AND tt.ID in (154,312,313) --154 ---TaskType = Επίσκεψη σε πελάτη select * from tasktype where id in(154,312,313) JOIN dbo.[User] u ON t.ActualOwnerID = u.id LEFT JOIN dbo.Contract ct ON tgiv.AltOfferID = ct.ID WHERE cm.ID = @campaign AND t.CompletedOn BETWEEN @startdate AND DATEADD(DAY,1,@date) AND ISNULL(ct.State,0) not in (3) and ISNULL(ct.type,0) in (0,2,3,4) UNION --Neo Rantebou SELECT TgivId = tgiv.id, TaskID = t.id, CampaignID = cm.ID , -- CampaignDesc = '[' + cm.Code + '] ' + cm.NAME, SupervisorId = su.ID, -- SupervisorName = '[' + ISNULL(su.SalesCode,'') + '] ' + ISNULL(su.LastName, '') + ' ' + ISNULL(su.FirstName,''), SalesManId = U.ID, -- SalesManName = '[' + ISNULL(u.SalesCode,'') + '] ' + ISNULL(u.LastName, '') + ' ' + ISNULL(u.FirstName,''), VisitDate = DATEADD(day, DATEDIFF(day, 0, tl.Timestamp), 0), CustomerIndicator = CASE tgiv.LossPrintedNew WHEN 2 then 0 ELSE tgiv.LossPrintedNew END, TaskOutcome = tl.Outcome, BPId = tgi.BusinessPointID FROM dbo.Campaign cm JOIN dbo.TargetGroupItem tgi ON tgi.CampaignID = cm.ID JOIN dbo.TargetGroupItemValue tgiv ON tgi.ID = tgiv.TargetGroupItemID AND tgiv.CampaignAllocationPlanID = cm.SelectedAllocationPlanID JOIN dbo.[User] su ON tgiv.Supervisor = su.ID JOIN dbo.[Case] cs ON cs.ContextEntityID = tgiv.ID AND cs.ContextEntityType = 'tgiv' JOIN dbo.Task t ON cs.ID = t.CaseID JOIN dbo.TaskType tt ON t.TaskTypeID = tt.ID AND TT.ActivityType = 'H' AND tt.ID in (154,312,313) --154 ---TaskType = Επίσκεψη σε πελάτη JOIN dbo.[User] u ON t.ActualOwnerID = u.id JOIN dbo.TaskLog tl ON t.ID = tl.TaskID AND tl.Outcome = 'ΝΕΟΡ' WHERE cm.ID = @campaign AND tl.Timestamp BETWEEN @startdate AND DATEADD(DAY,1,@date) ) A IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#WorkingDays') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #WorkingDays SELECT CampaignId = ISNULL( yd.CampaignID, cm.ID), -- CampaignDesc = ISNULL(yd.CampaignDesc , '[' + cm.Code + '] ' + cm.NAME), SupervisorId = ISNULL(yd.SupervisorId, su.ID) , -- SupervisorName=ISNULL(yd.SupervisorName, '[' + ISNULL(su.SalesCode,'') + '] ' + ISNULL(su.LastName, '') + ' ' + ISNULL(su.FirstName,'')), SalesManId = ISNULL(yd.SalesManId, u.ID), -- SalesmanName = ISNULL(yd.SalesManName, '[' + u.SalesCode + '] ' + u.LastName + ' ' + u.FirstName), WorkingDays = COUNT(DISTINCT DATEADD(day, DATEDIFF(day, 0, wdct.WorkingDate), 0)) INTO #WorkingDays FROM ITApps.wdc.WorkingDaysPerCampaign wdct JOIN dbo.Campaign cm ON cm.ID = wdct.CampaignId JOIN dbo.[User] u ON wdct.UserId = u.ID JOIN dbo.[User] su ON wdct.SupervisorId = su.ID FULL OUTER JOIN #CustomerVisits yd ON wdct.CampaignId = yd.CampaignID AND wdct.UserId = yd.SalesManId AND wdct.SupervisorId = yd.SupervisorId AND wdct.WorkingDate = yd.VisitDate WHERE (cm.ID = @campaign OR cm.ID IS NULL) AND (wdct.WorkingDate BETWEEN @startdate AND DATEADD(DAY,1,@date) OR wdct.WorkingDate IS NULL) GROUP BY ISNULL( yd.CampaignID, cm.ID), --ISNULL(yd.CampaignDesc , '[' + cm.Code + '] ' + cm.NAME), ISNULL(yd.SupervisorId, su.ID), --ISNULL(yd.SupervisorName, '[' + ISNULL(su.SalesCode,'') + '] ' + ISNULL(su.LastName, '') + ' ' + ISNULL(su.FirstName,'')), ISNULL(yd.SalesManId, u.ID)--, --ISNULL(yd.SalesManName, '[' + u.SalesCode + '] ' + u.LastName + ' ' + u.FirstName) IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#GroupVisitData') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #GroupVisitData SELECT CampaignID, --CampaignDesc, SupervisorId, --SupervisorName, SalesManID, --SalesManName, NewCountOfVisits = CASE CustomerIndicator WHEN 0 THEN COUNT(*) ELSE 0 END, PrintedCountOfVisits = CASE WHEN CustomerIndicator <> 0 THEN COUNT(*) ELSE 0 END INTO #GroupVisitData FROM #CustomerVisits GROUP BY CampaignID, --CampaignDesc, SupervisorId, --SupervisorName, SalesManID, --SalesManName, CustomerIndicator IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#GroupVisitDataRow') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #GroupVisitDataRow SELECT CampaignID, -- CampaignDesc, SupervisorId, -- SupervisorName, SalesManID, -- SalesManName, NewCountOfVisits = SUM(NewCountOfVisits), PrintedCountOfVisits = SUM(PrintedCountOfVisits) INTO #GroupVisitDataRow FROM #GroupVisitData GROUP BY CampaignID, -- CampaignDesc, SupervisorId, -- SupervisorName, SalesManID--, -- SalesManName IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#TeleLosses') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #TeleLosses SELECT TgivId = tgiv.id, TaskID = t.id, CampaignID = cm.ID , SupervisorId = su.ID, SalesManId = U.ID, VisitDate = DATEADD(day, DATEDIFF(day, 0, t.CompletedOn), 0), CustomerIndicator = CASE tgiv.LossPrintedNew WHEN 2 then 0 ELSE tgiv.LossPrintedNew END, TaskOutcome = t.Outcome, BPId = tgi.BusinessPointID INTO #TeleLosses FROM dbo.Campaign cm JOIN dbo.TargetGroupItem tgi ON tgi.CampaignID = cm.ID JOIN dbo.TargetGroupItemValue tgiv ON tgi.ID = tgiv.TargetGroupItemID AND tgiv.CampaignAllocationPlanID = cm.SelectedAllocationPlanID JOIN dbo.[User] su ON tgiv.Supervisor = su.ID JOIN dbo.[Case] cs ON cs.ContextEntityID = tgiv.ID AND cs.ContextEntityType = 'tgiv' JOIN dbo.Task t ON cs.ID = t.CaseID JOIN dbo.TaskType tt ON t.TaskTypeID = tt.ID AND TT.ActivityType = 'H' AND tt.ID in (299, 151) ---TaskType = Επικοινωνία με πελάτη, Επανάκληση JOIN dbo.[User] u ON t.ActualOwnerID = u.id LEFT JOIN dbo.Contract ct ON tgiv.AltOfferID = ct.ID WHERE cm.ID = @campaign AND t.CompletedOn BETWEEN @startdate AND DATEADD(DAY,1,@date) AND ISNULL(ct.State,0) not in (3) and ISNULL(ct.type,0) in (0,2,3,4) AND t.Outcome IN ('ΑΡΝΕ', 'ΑΡΝ') IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#CustomerPreprintedValue') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #CustomerPreprintedValue SELECT a.CampaignId, a.SupervisorId, a.SalesmanId, PreprintedValue = SUM(B.TargetValue) INTO #CustomerPreprintedValue FROM ( --Sales SELECT DISTINCT CampaignId, SupervisorId, SalesmanId, bpid FROM #ContractData WHERE CustomerIndicator <> 0 UNION --PremiseLosses SELECT DISTINCT CampaignId, SupervisorId, SalesmanId, bpid FROM #CustomerVisits cd WHERE CustomerIndicator <> 0 AND TaskOutcome = 'ΑΡΝ' UNION --TeleLosses SELECT DISTINCT CampaignId, SupervisorId, SalesmanId, bpid FROM #TeleLosses cd WHERE CustomerIndicator <> 0 ) A JOIN (SELECT CampaignID = cm.id, tgiv.Supervisor, tgiv.HandlerUserID, tgi.businesspointid, TargetValue = SUM(tgiv.TargetValue) FROM dbo.Campaign cm JOIN dbo.TargetGroupItem tgi ON cm.ID = tgi.CampaignID JOIN dbo.TargetGroupItemValue tgiv ON tgi.ID = tgiv.TargetGroupItemID AND cm.SelectedAllocationPlanID = tgiv.CampaignAllocationPlanID GROUP BY cm.id, tgiv.Supervisor, tgiv.HandlerUserID, tgi.businesspointid ) B ON a.Campaignid = b.CampaignID AND a.supervisorid = b.supervisor AND a.salesmanid = b.HandlerUserID AND a.bpid = b.businesspointid GROUP BY a.CampaignId, a.SupervisorId, a.SalesmanId IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#GroupLossesData') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #GroupLossesData SELECT * INTO #GroupLossesData FROM ( SELECT CampaignID, --CampaignDesc, SupervisorId, --SupervisorName, SalesManID, --SalesManName, NewCountOfLosses = CASE CustomerIndicator WHEN 0 THEN COUNT(DISTINCT BPId) ELSE 0 END, PrintedCountOfLosses = CASE WHEN CustomerIndicator <> 0 THEN COUNT(DISTINCT BPId) ELSE 0 END FROM #CustomerVisits cd WHERE TaskOutcome = 'ΑΡΝ' GROUP BY CampaignID, --CampaignDesc, SupervisorId, SalesManID, CustomerIndicator--, --SalesManName, --SupervisorName UNION ALL SELECT CampaignID, --CampaignDesc, SupervisorId, --SupervisorName, SalesManID, --SalesManName, NewCountOfLosses = CASE CustomerIndicator WHEN 0 THEN COUNT(DISTINCT BPId) ELSE 0 END, PrintedCountOfLosses = CASE WHEN CustomerIndicator <> 0 THEN COUNT(DISTINCT BPId) ELSE 0 END FROM #TeleLosses cd GROUP BY CampaignID, --CampaignDesc, SupervisorId, SalesManID, CustomerIndicator--, --SalesManName, --SupervisorName ) A IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#GroupLossesDataRow') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #GroupLossesDataRow SELECT CampaignID, --CampaignDesc, SupervisorId, --SupervisorName, SalesManID, --SalesManName, NewCountOfLosses = SUM(NewCountOfLosses), PrintedCountOfLosses = SUM(PrintedCountOfLosses) INTO #GroupLossesDataRow FROM #GroupLossesData GROUP BY CampaignID, --CampaignDesc, SupervisorId, --SupervisorName, SalesManID--, --SalesManName IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#DailyActivity_Visits') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #DailyActivity_Visits SELECT campaignid = ISNULL(swd.campaignid, sr.campaignid) , --CampaignDesc =ISNULL(swd.CampaignDesc, sr.CampaignDesc), SupervisorId =ISNULL(swd.SupervisorId, sr.SupervisorId), --SupervisorName= ISNULL(swd.SupervisorName, sr.Supervisor), SalesManID = ISNULL(swd.SalesManID, sr.SalesManID), --SalesManName = ISNULL(swd.SalesManName, sr.SalesMan), ResultsCountNew =isnull(sr.NewCount,0), ResultsValueNew = isnull(sr.NewValue,0), ResultsCountPrinted = isnull(sr.PrintedCount,0), ResultsValuePrinted =isnull(sr.PrintedValue,0), LossesCountPrinted= ISNULL(gl.PrintedCountOfLosses,0), PreprintedValue = ISNULL(PreprintedValue,0), VisitsNew = ISNULL(gv.NewCountOfVisits,0), swd.WorkingDays /*, SalesNew = ISNULL(gc.NewCountOfSales,0)*/ INTO #DailyActivity_Visits FROM #WorkingDays swd FULL JOIN #SegmentResultsRow sr ON swd.SupervisorId = sr.SupervisorId AND swd.SalesmanId = sr.SalesManId --AND swd.CampaignID = sr.CampaignID LEFT JOIN #GroupVisitDataRow gv ON ISNULL(swd.SupervisorId, sr.SupervisorId) = gv.SupervisorId AND ISNULL(swd.SalesManID, sr.SalesManID) = gv.SalesmanId --AND swd.CampaignId = gv.campaignid LEFT JOIN #GroupLossesDataRow gl ON ISNULL(swd.SupervisorId, sr.SupervisorId) = gl.SupervisorId AND ISNULL(swd.SalesManID, sr.SalesManID) = gl.SalesmanId --AND swd.CampaignId = gl.campaignid LEFT JOIN #CustomerPreprintedValue prv ON ISNULL(swd.SupervisorId, sr.SupervisorId) = prv.SupervisorId AND ISNULL(swd.SalesManID, sr.SalesManID) = prv.SalesmanId --AND ISNULL(swd.campaignid, sr.campaignid) = prv.CampaignId --WHERE SupervisorId IN (@UserIds) ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------- SELECT ISNULL(sd.cnt,0) AS TotalSegmentDays ,ISNULL(sdv.cnt,0) AS SegmentDays ,st.segmentId ,st.SRid ,st.SRName ,st.SUPid ,st.SupName ,st.datefrom ,st.dateto ,ISNULL(st.printedCount,0) AS printedCount ,ISNULL(st.printedValue,0) AS printedValue ,ISNULL(st.newCount,0) AS newCount ,ISNULL(st.newvalue,0) AS newvalue ,ISNULL(dav.ResultsCountNew,0) AS ResultsCountNew ,ISNULL(dav.ResultsValueNew,0) AS ResultsValueNew ,ISNULL(dav.ResultsCountPrinted,0) AS ResultsCountPrinted ,ISNULL(dav.ResultsValuePrinted,0) AS ResultsValuePrinted ,ISNULL(dav.LossesCountPrinted,0) AS LossesCountPrinted ,ISNULL(dav.PreprintedValue,0) AS PreprintedValue ,ISNULL(dav.VisitsNew,0) AS VisitsNew ,ISNULL(dav.WorkingDays,0) AS WorkingDays --,ISNULL(dav.SalesNew,0) AS SalesNew FROM #Segmenttarget st JOIN #SegmentDays sd ON st.campaignId = sd.campaignId AND st.segmentId = sd.segmentId JOIN #SegmentDaysVar sdv ON st.campaignId = sdv.campaignId AND st.segmentId = sdv.segmentId left JOIN #DailyActivity_Visits dav ON st.campaignId = dav.campaignId AND dav.supervisorId = st.SUPid AND dav.SalesManId = st.SRid WHERE st.SUPid IN (@UserIds) IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#SegmentDays') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #SegmentDays; IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#SegmentDaysVar') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #SegmentDaysVar; IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#SegmentTarget') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #SegmentTarget; IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#ContractData') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #ContractData IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#SegmentResults') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #SegmentResults IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#SegmentResultsRow') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #SegmentResultsRow IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#CustomerVisits') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #CustomerVisits IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#WorkingDays') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #WorkingDays IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#GroupVisitData') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #GroupVisitData IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#GroupVisitDataRow') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #GroupVisitDataRow IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#CustomerPreprintedValue') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #CustomerPreprintedValue IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#GroupLossesData') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #GroupLossesData IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#GroupLossesDataRow') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #GroupLossesDataRow IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#DailyActivity_Visits') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #DailyActivity_Visits IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#TeleLosses') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #TeleLosses

templates.name: Παρακολούθηση στόχων ανά segment - DS Campaign
templates.sql: IF SUBSTRING(@UserName, CHARINDEX('\', @UserName) + 1, 50) IN ( SELECT UserName FROM ITApps.dbo.PPR_SpecialUsers ) SELECT distinct '['+c.code+']' +' '+'['+c.Name+']' as campaign, c.id FROM itapps.sts.CampaignSegment cs JOIN yps.dbo.Campaign c ON cs.CampaignId = c.id ELSE SELECT distinct '['+c.code+']' +' '+'['+c.Name+']' as campaign, c.id FROM itapps.sts.CampaignSegment cs JOIN yps.dbo.Campaign c ON cs.CampaignId = c.id JOIN dbo.TargetGroupItem tgi ON c.ID = tgi.CampaignID JOIN dbo.TargetGroupItemValue tgiv ON tgi.ID = tgiv.TargetGroupItemID AND tgiv.CampaignAllocationPlanID = c.SelectedAllocationPlanID WHERE tgiv.Supervisor IN ( @UserIds )

templates.name: Παρακολούθηση στόχων ανά segment - DS Segment
templates.sql: SELECT DISTINCT cs.id, '[' + cs.name + '] ' + CONVERT(NVARCHAR(100), cs.datefrom, 103) + ' - ' + CONVERT(NVARCHAR(100), cs.dateto, 103) AS name FROM ITApps.sts.CampaignSegment AS cs WHERE cs.CampaignId = @campaign

templates.name: Παρακολούθηση στόχων ανά segment - DS Segment Start Date
templates.sql: SELECT DISTINCT id, name, datefrom, dateto FROM ITApps.sts.CampaignSegment AS cs WHERE ( id = @segment )

templates.name: Παρακολούθηση στόχων ανά segment - DS Users
templates.sql: IF SUBSTRING(@UserName, CHARINDEX('\', @UserName) + 1, 50) IN ( SELECT UserName FROM ITApps.dbo.PPR_SpecialUsers ) SELECT UserId = u.id, u.SalesCode, u.LastName, u.FirstName, u.UserName, u.IsUnitManager, u.IsActive, UnitDescription = un.Description, [1rstUnit] = [1ParentUnit].Description, [2ndUnit] = [2ParentUnit].Description, [3rdUnit] = [3ParentUnit].Description, [4rthUnit] = [4ParentUnit].Description, [5fthUnit] = [5ParentUnit].Description FROM dbo.[User] u JOIN dbo.Unit un ON u.UnitID = un.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.Unit [1parentunit] ON un.ParentID = [1ParentUnit].ID LEFT JOIN dbo.Unit [2parentunit] ON [1parentunit].ParentId = [2parentunit].id LEFT JOIN dbo.Unit [3parentunit] ON [2parentunit].ParentId = [3parentunit].id LEFT JOIN dbo.Unit [4parentunit] ON [3parentunit].ParentId = [4parentunit].id LEFT JOIN dbo.Unit [5parentunit] ON [4parentunit].ParentId = [5parentunit].id WHERE [5parentunit].ID = 56 OR [4parentunit].ID = 56 OR [3parentunit].ID = 56 OR [2parentunit].ID = 56 OR [1parentunit].ID = 56 OR [un].ID = 56 ELSE SELECT UserId = u.id, u.SalesCode, u.LastName, u.FirstName, u.UserName, u.IsUnitManager, u.IsActive, UnitDescription = un.Description, [1rstUnit] = [1ParentUnit].Description, [2ndUnit] = [2ParentUnit].Description, [3rdUnit] = [3ParentUnit].Description, [4rthUnit] = [4ParentUnit].Description, [5fthUnit] = [5ParentUnit].Description FROM dbo.[User] u JOIN dbo.Unit un ON u.UnitID = un.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.Unit [1parentunit] ON un.ParentID = [1ParentUnit].ID LEFT JOIN dbo.Unit [2parentunit] ON [1parentunit].ParentId = [2parentunit].id LEFT JOIN dbo.Unit [3parentunit] ON [2parentunit].ParentId = [3parentunit].id LEFT JOIN dbo.Unit [4parentunit] ON [3parentunit].ParentId = [4parentunit].id LEFT JOIN dbo.Unit [5parentunit] ON [4parentunit].ParentId = [5parentunit].id WHERE [5parentunit].ID IN (SELECT UnitID FROM [User] u WHERE u.UserName = SUBSTRING(@UserName, CHARINDEX('\', @UserName) + 1, 50)) OR [4parentunit].ID IN (SELECT UnitID FROM [User] u WHERE u.UserName = SUBSTRING(@UserName, CHARINDEX('\', @UserName) + 1, 50)) OR [3parentunit].ID IN (SELECT UnitID FROM [User] u WHERE u.UserName = SUBSTRING(@UserName, CHARINDEX('\', @UserName) + 1, 50)) OR [2parentunit].ID IN (SELECT UnitID FROM [User] u WHERE u.UserName = SUBSTRING(@UserName, CHARINDEX('\', @UserName) + 1, 50)) OR [1parentunit].ID IN (SELECT UnitID FROM [User] u WHERE u.UserName = SUBSTRING(@UserName, CHARINDEX('\', @UserName) + 1, 50)) OR [un].ID IN (SELECT UnitID FROM [User] u WHERE u.UserName = SUBSTRING(@UserName, CHARINDEX('\', @UserName) + 1, 50))

templates.name: Παρακολούθηση Συμβολαίων Παραγωγής Ανά Ημέρα   Εισαγωγές-Επιστροφές - Data Set1
templates.source: rdl:Παρακολούθηση Συμβολαίων Παραγωγής Ανά Ημέρα   Εισαγωγές-Επιστροφές:DataSet1
templates.sql: --declare @datefrom datetime --set @datefrom='20150420' --declare @dateto datetime --set @dateto='20150423' SELECT DISTINCT 'a' as type, ContractId = tgiv2.AltOfferID , cast(t.CreatedOn as date) AS taskCreatedOn FROM dbo.Task t JOIN dbo.[Case] c ON t.CaseID = c.ID JOIN dbo.TargetGroupItemValue tgiv2 ON C.ContextEntityID = TGIV2.ID AND C.ContextEntityType = 'TGIV' JOIN dbo.contract ct ON ct.ID = tgiv2.AltOfferID WHERE t.TaskTypeID=189 AND t.CreatedOn >= @datefrom AND t.CreatedOn < @dateto+1 union all SELECT DISTINCT 'c' as type, ContractId = tgiv2.AltOfferID , cast( t.CreatedOn as DATE) AS taskCreatedOn FROM dbo.Task t JOIN dbo.[Case] c ON t.CaseID = c.ID JOIN dbo.TargetGroupItemValue tgiv2 ON C.ContextEntityID = TGIV2.ID AND C.ContextEntityType = 'TGIV' JOIN dbo.contract ct ON ct.ID = tgiv2.AltOfferID WHERE t.TaskTypeID=190 AND t.CreatedOn >= @datefrom AND t.CreatedOn < @dateto+1 union all select distinct 'd' as type,cp.RelatedContractID as contractid, cast(t.CreatedOn as date) AS taskCreatedOn from yps.dbo.[Case] c JOIN yps.dbo.[Case] cc ON cc.MasterCaseID = c.ID JOIN yps.dbo.Task t ON t.CaseID = cc.ID join yps.dbo.Advertisement adv on adv.ID=cc.ContextEntityID and cc.ContextEntityType='adv' join yps.dbo.ContractProduct cp on cp.id= adv.ContractProductID WHERE t.TaskTypeID=508 AND t.CreatedOn >= @datefrom AND t.CreatedOn < @dateto+1 union all SELECT DISTINCT 'b' as type, ContractId = tgiv2.AltOfferID , cast(t.CreatedOn as date) AS taskCreatedOn FROM dbo.Task t JOIN dbo.[Case] c ON t.CaseID = c.ID JOIN dbo.TargetGroupItemValue tgiv2 ON C.ContextEntityID = TGIV2.ID AND C.ContextEntityType = 'TGIV' JOIN dbo.contract ct ON ct.ID = tgiv2.AltOfferID WHERE t.TaskTypeID=189 and (not exists (Select 1 from dbo.Advertisement adv join ContractProduct cp on cp.ID=adv.ContractProductID where cp.RelatedContractID=ct.ID and adv.QA=0) or exists (Select 1 from dbo.Advertisement adv join ContractProduct cp on cp.ID=adv.ContractProductID where cp.RelatedContractID=ct.ID and adv.QA=0and cp.State in (3,6,7) ) ) AND t.CreatedOn >= @datefrom AND t.CreatedOn < @dateto+1 order by 1,3

templates.name: Παρακολούθηση Συμβολαίων Παραγωγής Ανά Ημέρα   Εισαγωγές-Επιστροφές - Data Set2
templates.source: rdl:Παρακολούθηση Συμβολαίων Παραγωγής Ανά Ημέρα   Εισαγωγές-Επιστροφές:DataSet2
templates.sql: --declare @datefrom datetime --set @datefrom='20150420' --declare @dateto datetime --set @dateto='20150423' SELECT DISTINCT 'a' as type, ContractId = tgiv2.AltOfferID , cast(t.CreatedOn as date) AS taskCreatedOn , value=(select cast(sum(CASE WHEN cp.[state] IN (3,4) THEN cp.AlteredAmount ELSE cp.[Price] - cp.[Discount] - cp.[RulesDiscount] END ) as float) from dbo.ContractProduct cp where cp.RelatedContractID=ct.ID) FROM dbo.Task t JOIN dbo.[Case] c ON t.CaseID = c.ID JOIN dbo.TargetGroupItemValue tgiv2 ON C.ContextEntityID = TGIV2.ID AND C.ContextEntityType = 'TGIV' JOIN dbo.contract ct ON ct.ID = tgiv2.AltOfferID WHERE t.TaskTypeID=189 AND t.CreatedOn >= @datefrom AND t.CreatedOn < @dateto+1 union all SELECT DISTINCT 'c' as type, ContractId = tgiv2.AltOfferID , cast( t.CreatedOn as DATE) AS taskCreatedOn , value=(select cast(sum(CASE WHEN cp.[state] IN (3,4) THEN isnull(cp.AlteredAmount,0) ELSE cp.[Price] - cp.[Discount] - cp.[RulesDiscount] END )as float) from dbo.ContractProduct cp where cp.RelatedContractID=ct.ID) FROM dbo.Task t JOIN dbo.[Case] c ON t.CaseID = c.ID JOIN dbo.TargetGroupItemValue tgiv2 ON C.ContextEntityID = TGIV2.ID AND C.ContextEntityType = 'TGIV' JOIN dbo.contract ct ON ct.ID = tgiv2.AltOfferID WHERE t.TaskTypeID=190 AND t.CreatedOn >= @datefrom AND t.CreatedOn < @dateto+1 union all select *, value=(select CAST( sum(CASE WHEN cp.[state] IN (3,4) THEN isnull(cp.AlteredAmount,0) ELSE cp.[Price] - cp.[Discount] - cp.[RulesDiscount] END ) as float) from dbo.ContractProduct cp where cp.RelatedContractID=x.contractid) from( select distinct 'd' as type,cp.RelatedContractID as contractid, cast(t.CreatedOn as date) AS taskCreatedOn from yps.dbo.[Case] c JOIN yps.dbo.[Case] cc ON cc.MasterCaseID = c.ID JOIN yps.dbo.Task t ON t.CaseID = cc.ID join yps.dbo.Advertisement adv on adv.ID=cc.ContextEntityID and cc.ContextEntityType='adv' join yps.dbo.ContractProduct cp on cp.id= adv.ContractProductID WHERE t.TaskTypeID=508 AND t.CreatedOn >= @datefrom AND t.CreatedOn < @dateto+1 )x union all SELECT DISTINCT 'b' as type, ContractId = tgiv2.AltOfferID , cast(t.CreatedOn as date) AS taskCreatedOn , value=(select CAST( sum(CASE WHEN cp.[state] IN (3,4) THEN cp.AlteredAmount ELSE cp.[Price] - cp.[Discount] - cp.[RulesDiscount] END ) as float) from dbo.ContractProduct cp where cp.RelatedContractID=ct.ID) FROM dbo.Task t JOIN dbo.[Case] c ON t.CaseID = c.ID JOIN dbo.TargetGroupItemValue tgiv2 ON C.ContextEntityID = TGIV2.ID AND C.ContextEntityType = 'TGIV' JOIN dbo.contract ct ON ct.ID = tgiv2.AltOfferID WHERE t.TaskTypeID=189 and (not exists (Select 1 from dbo.Advertisement adv join ContractProduct cp on cp.ID=adv.ContractProductID where cp.RelatedContractID=ct.ID and adv.QA=0) or exists (Select 1 from dbo.Advertisement adv join ContractProduct cp on cp.ID=adv.ContractProductID where cp.RelatedContractID=ct.ID and adv.QA=0and cp.State in (3,6,7) ) ) AND t.CreatedOn >= @datefrom AND t.CreatedOn < @dateto+1 order by 2

templates.name: Πελάτες με Google Adwords - Contracts Google Adwords Data Set
templates.sql: WITH adwords AS (SELECT fcv.Adv_BeginDate ,fcv.A_BPCode ,fcv.Adv_ProductCode ,fcv.C_ID as ctID FROM dbo.FullContractView fcv WHERE fcv.Adv_ProductCode in (@GadsPr) --fcv.Adv_ProductCode IN ('GADS Bronze', -- 'GADS Silver', -- 'GADS Gold', -- 'GADS Light' -- ) ) SELECT DISTINCT BusinessPointCode = bp.Code ,CustomerName = bp.BrandName ,BrandName = bp.Name ,MainActicvity = cln.Name ,Address = (select line1 from Address where ID=bp.LocationAddressID) ,City= (select GeoModelLocText from Address where ID=bp.LocationAddressID) ,TK= (select GeoModelZip from Address where ID=bp.LocationAddressID) ,Email =(select top 1 email from PointEmail where BusinessPointID=bp.ID) ,BusinessPointStatus = CASE WHEN bp.IsActive =1 THEN 'Active' ELSE 'Inactive' end ,ContractStatus = (CASE fcv.C_State WHEN 0 THEN 'Pending' WHEN 1 THEN 'Approved' WHEN 2 THEN 'Rejected' WHEN 3 THEN 'Cancelled' WHEN 4 THEN 'Replaced' WHEN 5 THEN 'CancelledOffer' WHEN 6 THEN 'Modified' END) ,ContractProductStatus = (CASE fcv.CP_State WHEN 0 THEN 'Pending' WHEN 1 THEN 'Accepted' WHEN 2 THEN 'Rejected' WHEN 3 THEN 'Cancelled' WHEN 4 THEN 'Interrupted' WHEN 5 THEN 'Completed' WHEN 6 THEN 'Modified' WHEN 7 THEN 'ModifiedForEBS' END) ,ContractCode = fcv.C_ID ,SaleRepCode = u.SalesCode ,SalesRepName = u.LastName ,Start_Date = adv.AdvBeginDate ,AdvertisementProductCode = fcv.Adv_ProductCode ,AdvertisementProductName = fcv.Adv_ProductName ,Domain = fccv.Cav_Value ,Adwords_Product=a.Adv_ProductCode ,AdwordsBeginDate = a.Adv_BeginDate from dbo.FullContractView fcv JOIN dbo.FullContractCavView fccv ON fcv.Adv_ID = fccv.Adv_ID AND fccv.Cad_Name LIKE '%url%' JOIN dbo.ContractProduct cp ON cp.id = fcv.CP_ID JOIN dbo.Advertisement adv ON fcv.Adv_ID = adv.ID join dbo.[Contract] c on fcv.C_ID = c.ID join dbo.BusinessPoint bp on bp.ID = c.ActualBPOwnerID JOIN dbo.Classification cl ON cl.BusinessPointID = bp.ID JOIN dbo.Classifier clf ON cl.ClassifierID = clf.ID JOIN dbo.ClassifierNode cln ON cln.ID = cl.ClassifierNodeID left join dbo.[User] u on c.SalesManID = u.ID JOIN adwords a ON a.ctID=c.ID where fcv.Adv_ProductIsComposite = 0 AND clf.id = 3 and c.type in (0,2,3,4) union SELECT DISTINCT BusinessPointCode = bp.Code ,CustomerName = bp.BrandName ,BrandName = bp.Name ,MainActicvity = cln.Name ,Address = (select line1 from Address where ID=bp.LocationAddressID) ,City= (select GeoModelLocText from Address where ID=bp.LocationAddressID) ,TK= (select GeoModelZip from Address where ID=bp.LocationAddressID) ,Email =(select top 1 email from PointEmail where BusinessPointID=bp.ID) ,BusinessPointStatus = CASE WHEN bp.IsActive =1 THEN 'Active' ELSE 'Inactive' end ,ContractStatus = (CASE fcv.C_State WHEN 0 THEN 'Pending' WHEN 1 THEN 'Approved' WHEN 2 THEN 'Rejected' WHEN 3 THEN 'Cancelled' WHEN 4 THEN 'Replaced' WHEN 5 THEN 'CancelledOffer' WHEN 6 THEN 'Modified' END) ,ContractProductStatus = (CASE fcv.CP_State WHEN 0 THEN 'Pending' WHEN 1 THEN 'Accepted' WHEN 2 THEN 'Rejected' WHEN 3 THEN 'Cancelled' WHEN 4 THEN 'Interrupted' WHEN 5 THEN 'Completed' WHEN 6 THEN 'Modified' WHEN 7 THEN 'ModifiedForEBS' END) ,ContractCode = fcv.C_ID ,SaleRepCode = u.SalesCode ,SalesRepName = u.LastName ,Start_Date = adv.AdvBeginDate ,AdvertisementProductCode = '' ,AdvertisementProductName = '' ,Domain = '' ,Adwords_Product=a.Adv_ProductCode ,AdwordsBeginDate = a.Adv_BeginDate from dbo.FullContractView fcv JOIN dbo.ContractProduct cp ON cp.id = fcv.CP_ID JOIN dbo.Advertisement adv ON fcv.Adv_ID = adv.ID join dbo.[Contract] c on fcv.C_ID = c.ID join dbo.BusinessPoint bp on bp.ID = c.ActualBPOwnerID JOIN dbo.Classification cl ON cl.BusinessPointID = bp.ID JOIN dbo.Classifier clf ON cl.ClassifierID = clf.ID JOIN dbo.ClassifierNode cln ON cln.ID = cl.ClassifierNodeID left join dbo.[User] u on c.SalesManID = u.ID JOIN adwords a ON a.ctID=c.ID where fcv.Adv_ProductIsComposite = 0 AND clf.id = 3 and c.type in (0,2,3,4) and c.ID in (select a.ctID from adwords a join dbo.ContractProduct cp on cp.RelatedContractID = a.ctID JOIN dbo.advertisement adv ON adv.ContractProductID=cp.id group by a.ctID,a.A_BPCode,a.Adv_ProductCode having COUNT(*)=1) ORDER BY bp.Name,fcv.C_ID

templates.name: Πελάτες με Google Adwords - GAds Products
templates.sql: SELECT DISTINCT pr.code AS GadsProduct FROM Product AS pr WHERE pr.MediumVersionID = 471 AND IsComposite = 0 ORDER BY 1

templates.name: Πλήθος Udac ανα Βιβλίο και Κύκλο Έκδοσης - Udacs Sold Per Medium Version And Salesman Data Set
templates.source: rdl:Πλήθος Udac ανα Βιβλίο και Κύκλο Έκδοσης:UdacsSoldPerMediumVersionAndSalesmanDataSet
templates.sql: SELECT mv.name AS medium, mv.MediumID AS mediumCode, mv.code AS mediumVersion, vs.Name AS mediumSection, usr.LastName, usr.SalesCode, pr.Code AS prCode, pr.Name AS prName, COUNT(*) AS CntofAdv FROM contract AS ct JOIN contractproduct AS cp ON cp.relatedcontractid = ct.id JOIN advertisement AS ad ON cp.id = ad.contractproductid JOIN versionsection AS vs ON ad.versionsectionid = vs.id JOIN product AS pr ON pr.id = ad.productid JOIN MediumVersion AS mv ON mv.ID = vs.MediumVersionID JOIN [User] AS usr ON usr.ID = ct.SalesManID WHERE mv.MediumID = @mediumid AND ( ct.type IN (0, 2, 3, 4) ) AND mv.Code = @versioncode AND pr.iscomposite = 0 AND NOT ct.State IN (3, 5, 10) AND cp.State <> 3 GROUP BY mv.name, mv.MediumID, mv.code, vs.Name, usr.LastName, usr.SalesCode, pr.Code, pr.Name ORDER BY 4, 5

templates.name: Πλήθος Udac ανα Βιβλίο και Κύκλο Έκδοσης - Mediums
templates.source: rdl:Πλήθος Udac ανα Βιβλίο και Κύκλο Έκδοσης:Mediums
templates.sql: SELECT id, name FROM Medium WHERE IsActive = 1

templates.name: Πλήθος Udac ανα Βιβλίο και Κύκλο Έκδοσης - Medium Versions

templates.name: Πληρωμένες προβολές ανά μέσο-έκδοση - Main
templates.sql: --DECLARE @mediumVersion INT; --SET @mediumVersion = 408 if object_id('tempdb..#basicPoint') is not null drop table #basicPoint select distinct mv.name as medium ,mv.MediumID as mediumCode ,mv.code as mediumVersion ,vs.Name as mediumSection ,bp.id ,[Κωδικός Πελάτη] = bp.code ,[Διακριτικός] = bp.Name ,[Επωνυμία] = bp.BrandName ,[Επάγγελμα] = bp.Profession ,[Διεύθυνση]= adr.[Line1] ,[Πόλη] = adr.Municipality ,[ΤΚ] = adr.GeoModelZip ,[Νομός] = Prefecture INTO #basicPoint from contract ct join contractproduct cp on cp.relatedcontractid=ct.id join advertisement ad on cp.id=ad.contractproductid join versionsection vs on ad.versionsectionid=vs.id join product pr on pr.id=ad.productid join MediumVersion mv on mv.ID=vs.MediumVersionID join businesspoint bp on bp.id=ct.actualbpownerid JOIN dbo.FullAddressViewV2 adr ON bp.LocationAddressID = adr.ID where mv.id = @mediumVersion and ct.State NOT IN (3,5,10) --AND ad.QA AND ct.Type NOT IN ( 1, 10) AND cp.State <> 3 --AND bp.IsActive = 1 order by 4,6,5 if object_id('tempdb..#phones') is not null drop table #phones SELECT * , RankID = RANK() over ( PARTITION By aa.BusinessPointID order by aa.Number ) into #phones from ( select distinct pp.BusinessPointID , pp.Number from #basicPoint bp join dbo.PointPhone pp on bp.ID = pp.BusinessPointID AND pp.IsActive=1 )aa if object_id('tempdb..#result') is not null drop table #result select bp.* ,Phone1 = p1.Number,Phone2 = p2.Number,Phone3 = p3.Number,Phone4 = p4.Number into #result from #basicPoint bp left join #phones p1 on bp.ID = p1.BusinessPointID and p1.RankID =1 left join #phones p2 on bp.ID = p2.BusinessPointID and p2.RankID =2 left join #phones p3 on bp.ID = p3.BusinessPointID and p3.RankID =3 left join #phones p4 on bp.ID = p4.BusinessPointID and p4.RankID =4 SELECT DISTINCT [medium] ,[mediumCode] ,[mediumVersion] ,[Κωδικός Πελάτη] ,[Διακριτικός] ,[Επωνυμία] ,[Επάγγελμα] ,[Διεύθυνση] ,[Πόλη] ,[ΤΚ] ,[Νομός] ,[Phone1] ,[Phone2] ,[Phone3] FROM #result

templates.name: Πληρωμένες προβολές ανά μέσο-έκδοση - Medium
templates.sql: SELECT id, name FROM Medium AS m WHERE m.IsActive = 1 AND id <> 3 AND m.MediumTypeID = 3

templates.name: Πληρωμένες προβολές ανά μέσο-έκδοση - Medium Version
templates.sql: SELECT id, code FROM MediumVersion AS mv WHERE mv.MediumID = @medium AND IsActive = 1

templates.name: Προβολές με Λάθος ή Κενό Video URL - Invalid Video URLs Data Set
templates.source: rdl:Προβολές με Λάθος ή Κενό Video URL:InvalidVideoURLsDataSet
templates.sql: WITH ProductIds AS ( SELECT id AS id, Code AS Code, IsComposite AS IsComposite FROM dbo.product WHERE Code LIKE '%VH%' OR Code LIKE '%VP%' ), YContracts AS ( SELECT DISTINCT fccv.* FROM dbo.FullContractCavView AS fccv JOIN Contract AS ct ON ct.id = fccv.c_ID AND ct.Type IN (0, 2, 3, 4) JOIN dbo.ContractProduct AS cp ON cp_ID = cp.id AND cp.State <> 3 WHERE NOT C_State IN (3, 5, 10) AND Adv_Productid IN ( SELECT id FROM ProductIds ) ) SELECT DISTINCT bp.Code AS BPCode, bp.Name AS BPBrandName, bp.BrandName AS BPName, YC.C_ID AS ContractId, YC.C_Signdate AS ContractSignedDate, YC.Adv_BeginDate, YC.Adv_EndDate, ( SELECT pr.Code FROM dbo.Advertisement AS adv JOIN dbo.Product AS pr ON adv.ProductID = pr.ID WHERE yc.adv_id = adv.ID ) AS ProductCode, ( CASE WHEN YC.Adv_QA = 0 THEN 'Μη Ολοκληρωμένο' ELSE 'Ολοκληρωμένο' END ) AS Complete, vs.Description, YC.Cad_Name, YC.Cav_Value FROM YContracts AS yc JOIN dbo.BusinessPoint AS bp ON YC.A_BPID = bp.ID JOIN dbo.VersionGroupItem AS vs ON YC.Adv_HeadingID = vs.id WHERE YC.Cad_ID IN (47503, 47906, 47907, 48770) AND ( YC.Cav_Value IS NULL OR NOT ( YC.Cav_Value LIKE 'video.xo.gr/%' OR YC.Cav_Value LIKE 'http://video.xo.gr/%' ) ) AND CAST(yc.Adv_EndDate AS DATE) > CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE) AND yc.Cav_SeqNo = 0
