templates.name: Σύνθετη αναφορά παρακολούθησης Εξοφλήσεων - Προκαταβολών - Data Set1
templates.sql: ;with released as ( select cmp.Description as campaign,ct.ID as ctid,ct.ChannelTypeID , -- compid=(select MAX( M.CompanyID) --from ContractProduct AS CP --INNER JOIN Product AS P ON CP.ProductID = P.ID --INNER JOIN MediumVersion AS MV ON P.MediumVersionID = MV.ID --INNER JOIN Medium AS M ON MV.MediumID = M.ID --where cp.relatedcontractid=ct.id --and cp.State<>3) , value=(select cast(sum(CASE WHEN cp.state = 4 THEN cp.AlteredAmount ELSE cp.Price - cp.Discount - cp.RulesDiscount END) as float) from yps.dbo.ContractProduct cp where cp.RelatedContractID=ct.id and cp.State<>3) , adv_flg=Case when adv.ID IS not null then 1 else 0 end, cash_flg=(Case when pt.id in(414,435,431,272,437,438,429) then 1 else 0 end) , cast(adv.Amount as float)as adv_value ,pt.id ptid from dbo.Contract ct join dbo.Campaign cmp on ct.CampaignID=cmp.id left join dbo.AdvancedPaymentMethod adv on adv.ID=ct.id join dbo.InvoicePaymentMethod pm on pm.ID=ct.id join dbo.PaymentMethodType pt on pt.ID=pm.PaymentMethodTypeID where ct.OrigionalContractID is null and ct.type not IN( 1,10) and ct.State not IN (3,5) and ct.CampaignID not IN (25,26,30,32,38,42,43,44,45,47,23,39) and ct.createdon>='20130411' and ct.ReleaseDate>=@datefrom and ct.ReleaseDate<@dateto+1 and ct.ChannelTypeID in (@channeltypeid) ) ,alldata as ( select * , est_value=Case when channeltypeid=2 then value*0.3 when ChannelTypeID=1 and value<=300 then 50 when ChannelTypeID=1 and value>300 then 100 end from released where value<>0 --and compid=1 ) select campaign, --released-- COUNT(ctid) released_Contracts, SUM(value) released_valueContracts, SUM(est_value) released_estimatedAdvanceValue, --cash--- sum(case when cash_flg=1 then 1 else 0 end) as cash_Contracts, sum(case when cash_flg=1 then value else 0 end) as cash_valueContracts, --advance--- sum(case when adv_flg=1 and cash_flg=0 then 1 else 0 end) as adv_Contracts, sum(case when adv_flg=1 and cash_flg=0 then value else 0 end) as adv_valueContracts, sum(case when adv_flg=1 and cash_flg=0 then est_value else 0 end) as adv_estimatedAdvanceValue, sum(case when adv_flg=1 and cash_flg=0 then adv_value else 0 end) as adv_advancevalue, --no advance-- sum(case when cash_flg=0 and adv_flg=0 then 1 else 0 end) as noadvance_Contracts, sum(case when cash_flg=0 and adv_flg=0 then value else 0 end) as noadvance_valueContracts, sum(case when cash_flg=0 and adv_flg=0 then est_value else 0 end) as noadvance_estimatedAdvanceValue from alldata a group by campaign

templates.name: Σύνθετη αναφορά παρακολούθησης Εξοφλήσεων - Προκαταβολών - Data Set2
templates.sql: WITH yearlist AS ( SELECT 2013 AS year UNION ALL SELECT yl.year + 1 AS year FROM yearlist AS yl WHERE yl.year + 1 <= YEAR(GETDATE()) ) SELECT year FROM yearlist ORDER BY year DESC

templates.name: Σύστημα Διαχείρισης Παράδοσης Συμβολαίων - Κατανομή Ραντεβού - Date Count Per Assigned User
templates.source: rdl:Σύστημα Διαχείρισης Παράδοσης Συμβολαίων - Κατανομή Ραντεβού:DateCountPerAssignedUser
templates.sql: SELECT au.Name AS [Ανάθεση], CAST(ti.AppointmentDateFrom AS DATE) AS [Ημ/νία], COUNT(DISTINCT ci.ContractId) AS [Αρ.Συμβολαίων] FROM cdm.Task AS t INNER JOIN cdm.TaskInfo AS ti ON ti.TaskId = t.Id INNER JOIN cdm.AssignUsers AS au ON au.Id = ti.AssignedTo INNER JOIN cdm.CaseInfo AS ci ON ci.CaseId = t.CaseId WHERE t.TaskTypeId IN (2, 5, 7) AND t.Closed = 0 AND ti.AppointmentDateFrom >= @pDateFrom GROUP BY au.Name, CAST(ti.AppointmentDateFrom AS DATE) ORDER BY CAST(ti.AppointmentDateFrom AS DATE)

templates.name: Σύστημα Διαχείρισης Παράδοσης Συμβολαίων - Κατανομή Ραντεβού - Available Dates
templates.source: rdl:Σύστημα Διαχείρισης Παράδοσης Συμβολαίων - Κατανομή Ραντεβού:AvailableDates
templates.sql: SELECT DISTINCT ti.AppointmentDateFrom AS [Ημ/νία] FROM cdm.CaseInfo AS ci INNER JOIN cdm.ContractAppointment AS ca ON ca.ContractId = ci.ContractId INNER JOIN cdm.Task AS t ON t.CaseId = ci.CaseId INNER JOIN cdm.TaskInfo AS ti ON ti.TaskId = t.Id INNER JOIN cdm.AssignUsers AS au ON au.Id = ti.AssignedTo WHERE ( ti.AppointmentDateFrom >= GETDATE() )

templates.name: Σύστημα Διαχείρισης Παράδοσης Συμβολαίων - Παρακολούθηση Συμβολαίων - Data Set1
templates.source: rdl:Σύστημα Διαχείρισης Παράδοσης Συμβολαίων - Παρακολούθηση Συμβολαίων:DataSet1
templates.sql: SELECT ci.CreatedOn AS [Ημ.Μεταφοράς], t.Description AS [Βήμα], CONVERT(NVARCHAR(50), ti.AppointmentDateFrom, 103) + ' ' + CONVERT(NVARCHAR(50), ti.AppointmentDateFrom, 108) + ' - ' + CONVERT(NVARCHAR(50), ti.AppointmentDateTo, 103) + ' ' + CONVERT(NVARCHAR(50), ti.AppointmentDateTo, 108) AS [Ραντεβού], ci.BusinessPointCode AS [Κωδ ΕΣ], ci.ContractId AS [Κωδ Συμβολαίου], ISNULL(u.SalesCode + ' - ', '') + u.LastName AS [Πωλητής], ci.BusinessPointName AS [Επωνυμία], ci.BusinessPointBrandName AS [Διακριτικός], CAST(ci.ContractValue AS MONEY) AS [Αξία Συμβολαίου(χωρίς ΦΠΑ)], ci.ContractPaymentMethod AS [Τρόπος Πληρωμής Συμβολαίου], CAST(ci.AdvancedPaymentAmount AS MONEY) AS [Αξία Προκαταβολής], CASE WHEN ci.AdvancedPaymentAmount > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS [Αφορά σε Εξόφληση], ci.IsCollectorPayoff AS [Εξόφληση Από Εισπράκτορα], ci.CaseComments AS [Σχόλια Πωλήσεων] FROM cdm.[Case] AS cs JOIN cdm.CaseInfo AS ci ON ci.CaseId = cs.Id JOIN yps.dbo.Contract AS ct ON ct.id = ci.ContractId JOIN yps.dbo.[User] AS u ON u.id = ct.SalesManID JOIN cdm.Task AS t ON t.CaseId = cs.Id JOIN cdm.TaskInfo AS ti ON ti.TaskId = t.Id WHERE ( @HistoricElements = 'False' AND t.Closed = 0 ) OR ( @HistoricElements = 'True' AND t.id = ( SELECT MAX(tin.id) FROM cdm.[Case] AS csin JOIN cdm.Task AS tin ON tin.CaseId = csin.Id WHERE csin.id = cs.Id ) AND CAST(ci.CreatedOn AS DATE) BETWEEN @DateFrom AND @DateTo ) ORDER BY ci.ContractId ASC, ci.CreatedOn DESC

templates.name: Σύστημα Διαχείρισης Παράδοσης Συμβολαίων - Προμήθειες Εισπρακτόρων - Data Set1
templates.source: rdl:Σύστημα Διαχείρισης Παράδοσης Συμβολαίων - Προμήθειες Εισπρακτόρων:DataSet1
templates.sql: ;with signedcontractsa as ( select ci.ContractId from cdm.[Case] cs join cdm.CaseInfo ci on ci.CaseId = cs.Id join cdm.Task t on t.CaseId = cs.Id where t.OutcomeId = 5 ) select distinct [Year]=year(ti.AssignedOn) , [Month]=month(ti.assignedon), Agent = au.Name, AssignContract = ci.contractid, SignedContract=a.ContractId, PayOffContractd = case when a.ContractId is not null and ci.IsCollectorPayoff = 1 then ci.ContractId when a.ContractId is not null and ci.AdvancedPaymentAmount > 0 then null when a.ContractId is not null and ci.AdvancedPaymentAmount = 0 then ci.ContractId else null end from cdm.[Case] cs join cdm.CaseInfo ci on ci.CaseId = cs.Id left join signedcontractsa a on a.contractid = ci.contractid join cdm.Task t on t.CaseId = cs.Id join cdm.TaskInfo ti on ti.TaskId = t.Id join cdm.AssignUsers au on au.Id = ti.AssignedTo where year(ti.AssignedOn) = @year and month(ti.assignedon) between @monthFrom and @monthTo and ti.AssignedTo in (@User)

templates.name: Στατιστικά Online - DS
templates.sql: WITH gen AS ( SELECT DISTINCT ( SELECT TOP 1 cv.Name + ' ' + cv.Code AS code FROM TargetGroupItemValue AS tgiv INNER JOIN TargetGroupItem AS tgi ON tgiv.TargetGroupItemID = tgi.ID INNER JOIN Campaign AS cv ON cv.ID = tgi.CampaignID WHERE ( fcv.C_ID = tgiv.ContractID ) ) AS Campaign, bp.Code AS BranchCode, bp.BrandName AS Customer, fcv.C_Signdate AS SignDate, c.CreatedOn AS CreatedOn, c.OrigionalContractID AS OrigionalContractID, fcv.Adv_ProductCode AS AdvertisementProductCode, fcv.Adv_ProductName AS AdvertisementProductName, CASE WHEN CHARINDEX('.', SUBSTRING(Hvgi.Description, 1, CHARINDEX('-', Hvgi.Description))) <> 0 THEN HvgiC.Description ELSE Hvgi.[Description] END AS Heading, adv.AdvBeginDate AS AdvertisementBeginDate, adv.AdvEndDate AS AdvertisementEndDate, cpBP.Code AS cpBPcode FROM FullContractView AS fcv INNER JOIN ContractProduct AS cp ON cp.ID = fcv.CP_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN BusinessPoint AS cpBP ON cp.BusinessPointID = cpBP.ID INNER JOIN Advertisement AS adv ON fcv.Adv_ID = adv.ID INNER JOIN VersionSection AS vs ON adv.VersionSectionID = vs.ID INNER JOIN MediumVersion AS mva ON vs.MediumVersionID = mva.ID INNER JOIN Medium AS ma ON mva.MediumID = ma.ID INNER JOIN Contract AS c ON fcv.C_ID = c.ID INNER JOIN BusinessPoint AS bp ON bp.ID = c.ActualBPOwnerID LEFT OUTER JOIN VersionGroupItem AS Hvgi LEFT OUTER JOIN VersionGroupItem AS HvgiC ON Hvgi.ParentID = HvgiC.ID INNER JOIN MediumVersion AS mv ON Hvgi.MediumVersionID = mv.ID INNER JOIN Medium AS m ON mv.MediumID = m.ID ON Hvgi.ID = fcv.Adv_HeadingID WHERE ( c.Type IN (0, 2, 3, 4) ) AND ( fcv.Adv_ProductIsComposite = 0 ) AND ( mva.Code = '21' ) AND ( ma.Code = '10' ) ) SELECT BranchCode, cpBPcode, Customer, AdvertisementProductCode, AdvertisementProductName, Heading AS HeadingDescription, LEFT(Heading, CHARINDEX('-', Heading) - 1) AS HeadingCode, RIGHT(Heading, LEN(Heading) - CHARINDEX('-', Heading)) AS HeadingName, AdvertisementBeginDate, AdvertisementEndDate FROM gen AS gen_1 WHERE ( ( OrigionalContractID IS NULL ) AND ( ISNULL(Campaign, '(κενή)') IN (@Campaign) ) AND ( SignDate BETWEEN @dateFrom AND DATEADD(DAY, 1, @dateTo) ) ) OR ( ( NOT OrigionalContractID IS NULL ) AND ( ISNULL(Campaign, '(κενή)') IN (@Campaign) ) AND ( CreatedOn BETWEEN @dateFrom AND DATEADD(DAY, 1, @dateTo) ) ) ORDER BY BranchCode

templates.name: Στατιστικά Online - DS Campaign
templates.sql: SELECT DISTINCT cv.NAME + ' ' + cv.Code AS code FROM dbo.Campaign AS cv UNION SELECT '(κενή)' AS code

templates.name: Στατιστικά Επιχειρησιακών Σημείων - Data Set1
templates.sql: --DECLARE @from DATEtime, @to DATEtime; --SET @from = '20150301'; --SET @to = '20150330'; if object_id('tempdb..#ci') is not null drop table #ci select cn1.name as CusInd,cn1.ID as CusIndID into #ci from ClassifierNode cn1 where cn1.id in (3,4,5) if object_id('tempdb..#cu') is not null drop table #cu select cu.Description as CustomerUpdate,cu.ID as CustomerUpdateID into #cu from dbo.CustomerUpdate cu UNION SELECT '(κενό)' , -1 if object_id('tempdb..#cs') is not null drop table #cs select cs.Description as CustomerSource,cs.ID as CustomerSourceID into #cs from dbo.CustomerSource cs UNION SELECT '(κενό)' , -1 if object_id('tempdb..#tmp0') is not null drop table #tmp0 select * INTO #tmp0 from #ci,#cs,#cu if object_id('tempdb..#tmp1') is not null drop table #tmp1 SELECT DISTINCT bp.id , ISNULL(bp.CustomerSourceID, -1) AS CustomerSourceID , ISNULL(bp.CustomerUpdateID, -1) AS CustomerUpdateID , cl.ClassifierNodeID , bp.ModifiedOn , 1 AS [ALL] , CAST(bp.isActive AS INT) IsActive , 1 - CAST(bp.isActive AS INT) AS IsInactive , ( CASE WHEN ( bp.CreatedOn BETWEEN @from AND DATEADD(day, 1, @to) ) AND bp.IsActive = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS newBP , ( CASE WHEN ( bp.ModifiedOn BETWEEN @from AND DATEADD(day, 1, @to) ) AND bp.IsActive = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS deleted1 INTO #tmp1 FROM BusinessPoint bp JOIN Classification cl ON cl.BusinessPointID = bp.id AND ClassifierID = 5 if object_id('tempdb..#z') is not null drop table #z select distinct id, [CusInd],CustomerSource AS [Source],t0.CustomerUpdate, [ALL],[IsActive],[IsInactive],[newBP],[deleted1]--,[deleted2] into #z from #tmp0 t0 left join #tmp1 t1 on t1.CustomerSourceID = t0.CustomerSourceID and t1.ClassifierNodeID = t0.CusIndID AND t1.CustomerUpdateID = t0.CustomerUpdateID order by 1,2 select [CusInd],[Source], CustomerUpdate , isnull(sum([ALL]),0) as Σύνολο, isnull(sum([IsActive]),0) as Ενεργά, isnull(sum([IsInactive]),0) as Ανενεργά, isnull(sum([newBP]),0) as Νέα, isnull(sum([deleted1]),0) as Απενεργοποιήσεις --,isnull(sum([deleted2]),0) as Απενεργοποιήσεις2 from #z group by [CusInd],[Source], CustomerUpdate order by 1,2

templates.name: Στατιστικά Επιχειρησιακών Σημείων - Data Set2
templates.sql: --DECLARE @from DATEtime, @to DATEtime; --SET @from = '20140701'; --SET @to = '20140715'; if object_id('tempdb..#ci') is not null drop table #ci select cn1.name as CusInd,cn1.ID as CusIndID into #ci from ClassifierNode cn1 where cn1.id in (3,4,5) if object_id('tempdb..#pr') is not null drop table #pr select bal.AreaName, bal.BroaderAreaID into #pr from dbo.BroaderAreaLookUp bal WHERE BroaderAreaID LIKE 'E%' UNION SELECT '(κενό)' , '-1' if object_id('tempdb..#tmp0') is not null drop table #tmp0 select * INTO #tmp0 from #ci,#pr if object_id('tempdb..#tmp1') is not null drop table #tmp1 SELECT DISTINCT bp.id , ISNULL(ad.Prefecture,'(κενό)') Prefecture, cl.ClassifierNodeID , bp.ModifiedOn , 1 AS [ALL] , CAST(bp.isActive AS INT) IsActive , 1 - CAST(bp.isActive AS INT) AS IsInactive , ( CASE WHEN ( bp.CreatedOn BETWEEN @from AND DATEADD(day, 1, @to) ) AND bp.IsActive = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS newBP , ( CASE WHEN ( bp.ModifiedOn BETWEEN @from AND DATEADD(day, 1, @to) ) AND bp.IsActive = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS deleted1 INTO #tmp1 FROM BusinessPoint bp JOIN Classification cl ON cl.BusinessPointID = bp.id AND ClassifierID = 5 JOIN dbo.FullAddressViewV2 ad ON bp.LocationAddressID = ad.id if object_id('tempdb..#z') is not null drop table #z select distinct id, [CusInd], Prefecture, [ALL],[IsActive],[IsInactive],[newBP],[deleted1]--,[deleted2] into #z from #tmp0 t0 left join #tmp1 t1 on t1.ClassifierNodeID = t0.CusIndID AND t1.Prefecture = t0.AreaName order by 1,2 select [CusInd],Prefecture , isnull(sum([ALL]),0) as Σύνολο, isnull(sum([IsActive]),0) as Ενεργά, isnull(sum([IsInactive]),0) as Ανενεργά, isnull(sum([newBP]),0) as Νέα, isnull(sum([deleted1]),0) as Απενεργοποιήσεις --,isnull(sum([deleted2]),0) as Απενεργοποιήσεις2 from #z group by [CusInd],Prefecture order by 1,2

templates.name: Στατιστικά Πελατών - Συμβόλαια με Internet προιόντα - Main Data Set
templates.source: rdl:Στατιστικά Πελατών - Συμβόλαια με Internet προιόντα:MainDataSet
templates.sql: --DEV3434 --2. Σε πόσους από τους κωδικούς προϊόντος PIG_NEW, PIG, PIP_NEW, PIP, WST+PIG, WST-Easy+PIG --έχει εφαρμοστεί η εμπορική πολιτική 50%. --Συμπεριλαμβάνονται και τα bundles που περιέχουν τουλάχιστον έναν από τους παραπάνω κωδικούς προϊόντος. --Χρονικά διαστήματα (ημερομηνία υπογραφής συμβολαίου & ημερομηνία δημιουργίας συμβολαίου) --01/01/2011 - 15/07/2011, 01/01/2012 - 15/07/2012 και 01/01/2013 - 15/07/2013. --Στάδιο workflow Approved. --Στήλες: *Κωδ. ΕΣ, *Επωνυμία, *Διακριτικός Τίτλος, *Νομός, *Νομός ΕΣ πώλησης, *Καμπάνια, --*Τύπος πελάτη, *Συμβόλαιο, *ID Προβολής(advID), *Ημερομηνία δημιουργίας συμβολαίου, *Ημερομηνία υπογραφής συμβολαίου, --*Κανάλι πώλησης, *Προϊόν, *Συστατικό προϊόν, -- Εμπορική πολιτική 50% (Ναι/Όχι), -- Επαγγελματική Κατηγορία, --Αρχική αξία προϊόντος, Έκπτωση προϊόντος, Τελική αξία προϊόντος, Τελική αξία συμβολαίου, Συνδρομητικό, Ανανέωση συνδρομητικού, Αυτόματης δημιουργίας --Για το 2. όπως σου ανέφερα και σε προηγούμενο comment δεν έχουμε την πληροφορία για το αν ένα bundle έχει λάβει έκπτωση 50% βάσει της συγκεκριμένη εμπορικής πολιτικής --ή βάσει όλων των υπολοίπων που έχουν εφαρμοστεί στο συμβόλαιο ή ακόμα και από έκπτωση του ΣΔ. -- Οπότε, μπορούμε να εμφανίσουμε τα προϊόντα που έχεις αναφέρει ή τα bundles που τα περιέχουν και έχουν πωληθεί με τιμή μέσα στο συμβόλαιο 50% της τιμής τιμοκαταλόγου. -- Είσαστε οκ με αυτό; --DECLARE @dateFrom DATETIME, @dateTo DATETIME, @PCode NVARCHAR(max), @w_sign BIT; --SET @dateFrom = '20130101'; --SET @dateTo = '20130630' --SET @PCode = 'PIG_New'; --SET @w_sign = 0; --0 CreatedOn, 1 SignedOn if object_id('tempdb..#ctIDs') is not null drop table #ctIDs SELECT DISTINCT ct.id, cp.id AS cpid , CASE WHEN ABS(cp.RulesDiscount - (cp.Price / 2 )) < 0.1 AND cp.RulesDiscount > 0 THEN 'ΝΑΙ' ELSE 'ΟΧΙ' END chk INTO #ctIDs FROM dbo.Contract ct JOIN dbo.ContractProduct cp ON ct.ID = cp.RelatedContractID JOIN dbo.Advertisement adv ON cp.ID = adv.ContractProductID JOIN dbo.Product pr ON adv.ProductID = pr.ID WHERE ( (@w_sign = 1 AND ct.SignedDate BETWEEN @dateFrom AND DATEADD(day,1,@dateTo) AND ct.OrigionalContractID IS null) OR (@w_sign = 0 AND ct.CreatedOn BETWEEN @dateFrom AND DATEADD(day,1,@dateTo) AND ct.OrigionalContractID IS null) OR (ct.CreatedOn BETWEEN @dateFrom AND DATEADD(day,1,@dateTo) AND ct.OrigionalContractID IS NOT null) ) AND ct.type IN (0,2,3,4) AND ct.state = 1 AND cp.State <> 3 AND pr.code IN (@Pcode) --AND ABS(cp.RulesDiscount - (cp.Price / 2 )) < 0.1 SELECT DISTINCT BranchCode = bp.Code ,Customer = bp.BrandName ,BrandName = bp.Name ,Prefecture = (SELECT TOP 1 AreaName FROM dbo.BroaderArea ba JOIN dbo.BroaderAreaLookUp bal ON ba.BroaderAreaID = bal.BroaderAreaID WHERE bal.BroaderAreaID LIKE 'E%' AND ba.AddressID = bp.LocationAddressID) ,SalesPointPrefecture = (SELECT TOP 1 AreaName FROM dbo.BroaderArea ba JOIN dbo.BroaderAreaLookUp bal ON ba.BroaderAreaID = bal.BroaderAreaID WHERE bal.BroaderAreaID LIKE 'E%' AND ba.AddressID = bpPwl.LocationAddressID) ,Campaign = '[' + cv.name + '] ' +cv.Code ,CustomerType = cn.Name ,ContractCode = ct.ID ,cpid = cp.id ,advID = adv.ID ,Contract_Creation_Date = ct.CreatedOn ,SignDate = ct.SignedDate ,ContractChannelType = cht.Description ,ProductCode = cppr.Code ,ProductName = cppr.Name ,AdvertisementProductCode = pr.Code ,AdvertisementProductName = pr.Name --,CASE WHEN EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM #ctIDs a WHERE a.cpid = cp.id) THEN 'NAI' ELSE 'OXI' END AS [Εμπορική πολιτική 50%] , chk AS [Εμπορική πολιτική 50%] ,SHeading = (CASE WHEN CHARINDEX('.',SUBSTRING(Hvgi.[Description],1,CHARINDEX('-',Hvgi.[Description]))) <> 0 THEN HvgiC.[Description] ELSE Hvgi.[Description] END) ,Price = adv.Price ,adv.RulesDiscount ,adv.Discount ,PriceAfterDiscount = adv.Price - (adv.Discount + adv.RulesDiscount) ,AlteredPrice = adv.AlteredAmount ,BundleAmount = CASE WHEN cp.state IN (3,4) AND pr.IsComposite = 1 THEN cp.AlteredAmount WHEN cp.state NOT IN (3,4) AND pr.IsComposite = 1 then cp.Price - cp.Discount - cp.RulesDiscount ELSE NULL END ,ContractAmount = (select SUM ( CASE WHEN cp.state IN (3,4) THEN cp.AlteredAmount WHEN cp.state NOT IN (3,4) THEN cp.Price-cp.Discount - cp.RulesDiscount ELSE NULL END ) from dbo.ContractProduct cp where ct.ID= cp.RelatedContractID) ,Subscription = case adv.IsSubscriptionBased when 1 then 'ΝΑΙ' when 0 then 'ΟΧΙ' end ,AutoRenewal = case cp.IsRenewable when 1 then 'ΝΑΙ' when 0 then 'ΟΧΙ' end ,AutoCreation = (CASE WHEN ct.OriginalContractType = 1 AND ct.OrigionalContractID IS NOT NULL THEN 'ΝΑΙ' ELSE 'ΟΧΙ' END) ,( SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(DISTINCT a.id) > 0 THEN 'ΝΑΙ' ELSE 'ΟΧΙ' END FROM dbo.Contract a WHERE a.ActualBPOwnerID = bp.id AND a.type IN (0,2,3,4) AND a.state = 1 AND ( ( @w_sign = 1 AND a.SignedDate BETWEEN DATEADD(year,-1,@dateFrom) AND @dateFrom AND ct.OrigionalContractID IS null) OR ( @w_sign = 0 AND a.CreatedOn BETWEEN DATEADD(year,-1,@dateFrom) AND @dateFrom AND ct.OrigionalContractID IS null) OR ( a.CreatedOn BETWEEN DATEADD(year,-1,@dateFrom) AND @dateFrom AND ct.OrigionalContractID IS NOT null) ) ) AS [Συμβόλαιο τον προηγ.χρόνο] FROM dbo.Contract ct JOIN dbo.BusinessPoint bp ON bp.ID = ct.ActualBPOwnerID LEFT JOIN dbo.ChannelType cht ON ct.ChannelTypeID = cht.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.Campaign cv ON ct.CampaignID = cv.ID JOIN dbo.Classification cl ON cl.BusinessPointID = bp.id AND cl.ClassifierID = 5 JOIN dbo.ClassifierNode cn ON cl.ClassifierNodeID = cn.ID JOIN dbo.ContractProduct cp ON cp.RelatedContractID = ct.ID JOIN dbo.Product cppr ON cppr.id = cp.ProductID JOIN dbo.Advertisement adv ON adv.ContractProductID = cp.ID JOIN dbo.Product pr ON pr.id = adv.ProductID LEFT JOIN dbo.PointRelationship ppr JOIN dbo.BusinessPoint bpPwl ON ppr.TargetBussinessPointID = bpPwl.ID ON ppr.BusinessPointID = bp.id AND ppr.Type = 9 left join dbo.VersionGroupItem Hvgi on Hvgi.ID = adv.HeadingID left JOIN dbo.VersionGroupItem HvgiC ON Hvgi.ParentID = HvgiC.ID JOIN #ctIDs t ON cp.id = t.cpid --WHERE --ct.id IN (SELECT id FROM #ctIDs) --AND --( -- (@w_sign = 1 AND ct.SignedDate BETWEEN @dateFrom AND DATEADD(day,1,@dateTo) AND ct.OrigionalContractID IS null) -- OR -- (@w_sign = 0 AND ct.CreatedOn BETWEEN @dateFrom AND DATEADD(day,1,@dateTo) AND ct.OrigionalContractID IS null) -- OR -- (ct.CreatedOn BETWEEN @dateFrom AND DATEADD(day,1,@dateTo) AND ct.OrigionalContractID IS NOT null) --) --AND pr.code IN (@Pcode) --AND ct.type IN (0,2,3,4) --AND ct.state = 1 ORDER BY ct.id,cp.id,adv.id

templates.sql: SELECT DISTINCT '[' + pr.code + '] ' + pr.name AS prname, pr.code FROM dbo.Product AS pr JOIN dbo.MediumVersion AS mv ON pr.MediumVersionID = mv.ID JOIN dbo.Medium AS m ON mv.MediumID = m.ID JOIN dbo.Udac AS u ON pr.UdacID = u.id WHERE m.MediumTypeID = 2 AND mv.ID IN (@MediumCode) AND u.UdacType IN (0, 1) ORDER BY 1

templates.name: Στατιστικά Στοιχεία Απόδοσης Ad Premium Position - Data Set1
templates.sql: IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#cust') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #cust; SELECT Client = @client INTO #cust create index idx_client on #cust (client) --ev1 IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#Ev1') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #Ev1; SELECT c.Client, Displays = count(actionId), el.[name] as EventLabel INTO #ev1 FROM #cust c join [gypneu01synapse01.sql.azuresynapse.net].[GYPNEU01DWPL01].dbo.DimClient cl on c.client = cl.code collate Greek_100_CI_AI join [gypneu01synapse01.sql.azuresynapse.net].[GYPNEU01DWPL01].[dbo].[FactStatistics] f on cl.id = f.ClientID join [gypneu01synapse01.sql.azuresynapse.net].[GYPNEU01DWPL01].dbo.DimDate d on f.datekey = d.datekey join [gypneu01synapse01.sql.azuresynapse.net].[GYPNEU01DWPL01].dbo.DimEventLabel el on el.id = f.EventLabelID --join [dbo].[StatsCustomerDisplaysDailyadpremium] ad on c.Client = ad.client WHERE f.actionId = 3 and f.categoryid = 54 and d.[date] BETWEEN @datefrom AND @dateto GROUP BY c.Client, el.[Name] --ev2 IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#Ev2') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #Ev2; SELECT c.Client, Clicks = count(actionId), el.[Name] as EventLabel INTO #ev2 FROM #cust c join [gypneu01synapse01.sql.azuresynapse.net].[GYPNEU01DWPL01].dbo.DimClient cl on c.client = cl.code collate Greek_100_CI_AI join [gypneu01synapse01.sql.azuresynapse.net].[GYPNEU01DWPL01].[dbo].[FactStatistics] f on cl.id = f.ClientID join [gypneu01synapse01.sql.azuresynapse.net].[GYPNEU01DWPL01].dbo.DimDate d on f.datekey = d.datekey join [gypneu01synapse01.sql.azuresynapse.net].[GYPNEU01DWPL01].dbo.DimEventLabel el on el.id = f.EventLabelID --join [dbo].[StatsCustomerClicksDailyadpremium] ad on c.Client = ad.client WHERE f.actionId = 57 and f.categoryid = 54 and d.[date] BETWEEN @datefrom AND @dateto GROUP BY c.Client,el.[Name] SELECT c.client as Κωδικός_ΕΣ, evl1.Displays as [Displays: Premium.sponsor.display], evl2.Displays as [Displays: Premium.stickybar.display], evl3.Clicks as [Clicks: stickybar.cta],evl4.Clicks as [Clicks: stickybar.close], evl5.Clicks as [Clicks: Premium.sponsor.click] FROM #cust c LEFT JOIN #ev1 evl1 ON evl1.client = c.client AND evl1.EventLabel = 'Premium.sponsor.display' LEFT JOIN #ev1 evl2 ON c.client = evl2.client AND evl2.EventLabel = 'Premium.stickybar.display' LEFT JOIN #ev2 evl3 ON evl3.client = c.client AND evl3.EventLabel = 'stickybar.cta' LEFT JOIN #ev2 evl4 ON c.client = evl4.client AND evl4.EventLabel = 'stickybar.close' LEFT JOIN #ev2 evl5 ON evl5.client = c.client AND evl5.EventLabel = 'Premium.sponsor.click' GROUP BY c.client, evl1.Displays, evl2.Displays, evl3.Clicks, evl4.Clicks, evl5.Clicks OPTION(RECOMPILE)

templates.name: Στοιχεία Πελατών για Διανομή - Data Set1
templates.sql: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT bp.Code AS bpCode, bp.Name AS Diakritikos, CASE WHEN pr.TargetBussinessPointID IS NULL THEN bp.BrandName ELSE bp2.BrandName END AS Epwnumia, CASE WHEN pr.TargetBussinessPointID IS NULL THEN bp.Profession ELSE bp2.Profession END AS Profession, ( SELECT TOP 1 ph.Number FROM pointphone AS ph WHERE ph.BusinessPointID = bp.id AND ph.IsActive = 1 ) AS phone, ( SELECT TOP 1 bl.AreaName FROM yps.dbo.BroaderArea AS ba JOIN yps.dbo.BroaderAreaLookUp AS bl ON ba.BroaderAreaID = bl.BroaderAreaID WHERE ba.AddressID = adr.ID AND ba.BroaderAreaID LIKE 'E%' ORDER BY ba.BroaderAreaID ) AS [Prefecture], adr.GeoModelLocText AS GeoModelLocText, CASE WHEN ISNULL(adr.GeoModelStreet1Text, '') <> '' THEN ISNULL(adr.GeoModelStreet1Text, '') + ' ' + ISNULL(adr.GeoModelStreet1Num, '') ELSE CASE WHEN ISNULL(adr.line1, '') <> '' THEN ISNULL(adr.line1, '') ELSE adr.Line2 END END AS Street, adr.GeoModelZip AS GeoModelZip FROM BusinessPoint AS bp JOIN Address AS adr ON bp.LocationAddressID = adr.id LEFT JOIN PointRelationship AS pr ON pr.BusinessPointID = bp.ID AND pr.Type = 10 AND pr.TargetBussinessPointID <> pr.BusinessPointID LEFT JOIN BusinessPoint AS bp2 ON bp2.ID = pr.TargetBussinessPointID WHERE bp.IsActive = 1 AND NOT adr.GeoBroaderAreas IS NULL AND NOT adr.GeoModelZip IS NULL ) AS xx WHERE Prefecture IN (@prefecture) AND GeoModelZip >= CASE WHEN @fromzip = '' THEN '00000' ELSE @fromzip END AND GeoModelZip <= CASE WHEN @tozip = '' THEN '99999' ELSE @tozip END AND GeoModelLocText LIKE '%' + @loc + '%'

templates.name: Συγκεντρωτική Αντιπαραβολή Συμβάσεων YPS- ERP - Data Set1
templates.sql: --declare @dateFrom date, @dateTo date; --set @dateFrom = '20130201'; --set @dateTo = '20130301'; if object_id('tempdb..#xx') is not null drop table #xx select ct.ID as ctid,ct.State as ctstate,ct.CreatedOn, cast((select SUM (adv.price-adv.discount-adv.rulesdiscount) from cardinal11.yps.dbo.Advertisement adv join cardinal11.yps.dbo.ContractProduct cp on cp.ID=adv.ContractProductID where cp.RelatedContractID=ct.id)as float) ypsValue, isnull((select top 1 1 from ypsebs.ebscontractvalues where contractcode=convert (varchar(20),ct.id)),0) hasPar, (select sum(ebsparvalue) from ypsebs.ebscontractvalues where contractcode=convert (varchar(20),ct.id)) ebsParvalue, (select sum(ebstpyvalue) from ypsebs.ebscontractvalues where contractcode=convert (varchar(20),ct.id)) ebsTimvalue into #xx from cardinal11.yps.dbo.Contract ct where ct.State not in ( 3,5) AND ct.type IN (0,2,3,4) and ct.CreatedOn>=@dateFrom and ct.CreatedOn<=@dateTo select case when ctstate=1 and haspar=0 then 'ΣΕ YPS' when ctstate=1 and haspar=1 then 'ΣΕ YPS-ERP' when ctState = 0 then 'Σε YPS Pending' when ctState =2 then 'ΣΕ YPS Rejected' end as 'Κατάσταση', count(ctid) 'Πλήθος Συμβολαίων', cast (sum(ypsValue) as float) 'Αξία YPS', cast (sum(ebsparValue) as float) 'Αξία ERP Παραγγελιών', cast(sum(ebsTimvalue) as float) as 'Αξία ERP Τιμολογίων', case when ctstate=1 and haspar=1 then 1 when ctstate=1 and haspar=0 then 2 when ctState = 0 then 3 when ctState =2 then 4 end as orderInd from #xx group by ctstate,haspar order by 6

templates.name: Συγκεντρωτική Κατάσταση Συμβολαίων Ανά Καμπάνια - Contracts Per Task Type Dash Board Data Set
templates.sql: SELECT ContractId = ISNULL(ct.id, tgiv2.AltOfferID) , CampaignId = ISNULL(tgi.campaignid, ct.campaignid) , RoleDesc = r.Description , TaskTypeID = tt.id , TaskTypeDesc = tt.Description , t.CreatedOn , t.Status , t.outcome , t.ID AS taskid INTO #temp FROM Task t JOIN dbo.TaskType tt ON t.TaskTypeID = tt.ID JOIN dbo.[Case] c ON t.CaseID = c.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.TaskAssignment ta ON t.ID = ta.TaskID AND ta.AssignmentType = 0 LEFT JOIN dbo.Role r ON ta.RoleID = r.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.TargetGroupItemValue tgiv2 ON C.ContextEntityID = TGIV2.ID AND C.ContextEntityType = 'TGIV' LEFT JOIN dbo.TargetGroupItem tgi ON tgi.ID = tgiv2.TargetGroupItemID LEFT JOIN dbo.Advertisement ADV ON C.ContextEntityID = ADV.ID AND C.ContextEntityType = 'ADV' LEFT JOIN dbo.ContractProduct CP ON ADV.ContractProductID = CP.ID AND cp.State <> 3 LEFT JOIN dbo.Contract ct ON cp.RelatedContractID = ct.ID AND ct.type IN ( 0, 2, 3, 4 ) WHERE ( ( tt.id <> 195 AND t.status <> 189 AND t.status = 0 AND TT.ActivityType = 'H' ) OR tt.id = 195 OR tt.id = 505 OR tt.id = 500 OR tt.id = 189 ) AND tt.id <> 175 AND tt.id <> 170 AND tt.id <> 266; WITH LastTaskPerContract AS ( SELECT DISTINCT ContractId , CampaignId , TaskTypeid , STATUS , outcome , CreatedOn , LastRole = CASE WHEN ( TaskTypeid IN ( 146, 169, 252, 258, 262, 173, 154, 151, 260, 167, 299, 307, 300, 309, 311, 312, 313 ) ) OR ( TaskTypeid = 190 AND ISNULL(RoleDesc, '') = '' ) OR ( TaskTypeid IN ( 294, 295 ) AND ISNULL(RoleDesc, '') = '' ) THEN 'Σε ΣΔ' WHEN ( TaskTypeid = 190 AND RoleDesc <> '' ) OR ( TaskTypeID IN ( 179, 296, 291 ) ) OR ( TaskTypeid IN ( 294, 295 ) AND ISNULL(RoleDesc, '') <> '' ) THEN 'Back Office' WHEN tasktypeid IN ( 259, 164, 261, 174, 178 ) THEN 'Σε S/V' WHEN tasktypeid IN ( 198, 264, 267, 268, 269, 270, 310, 308 ) THEN 'Σε S/V - Manager' WHEN tasktypeid IN ( 193, 192, 194, 511, 516, 517, 520, 522, 523, 525, 527, 528 ) THEN 'Παραγωγή' WHEN tasktypeid = 189 AND STATUS = 0 THEN 'Σε έλεγχο υλικού' --WHEN tasktypeid = 189 AND status = 1 AND isnull(outcome,'') <> 'Δεν αφορά σύνθετη καταχώρηση' THEN 'ForProduction' WHEN tasktypeid = 195 AND STATUS = 0 THEN 'Οριστικ/ση' WHEN ( tasktypeid = 195 AND STATUS = 1 AND outcome = 'Σελιδοποίηση' ) OR ( tasktypeid = 505 AND STATUS = 1 AND outcome = 'Σελιδοποίηση' ) OR ( tasktypeid = 189 AND STATUS = 1 AND outcome = 'Δεν αφορά σύνθετη καταχώρηση' ) OR ( tasktypeid = 500 AND STATUS = 1 AND outcome = '' ) THEN 'Ολοκλ/να' END FROM #temp wrk WHERE taskid = ( SELECT MAX(taskid) FROM #temp wrd WHERE wrd.ContractId = wrk.ContractId ) ) SELECT Campaign = cmp.Name + '(' + cmp.Code + ')' , cmp.Code AS CampaignCode , cmp.PlannedStartOn , cmp.PlannedCloseOn , COUNT(Contract) AS CntContract , LastRole , GroupInd = CASE WHEN LastRole IN ( 'Σε ΣΔ', 'Σε S/V', 'Σε S/V - Manager', 'Back Office' ) THEN 'Πωλήσεις' WHEN LastRole IN ( 'Σε έλεγχο υλικού', 'Παραγωγή', 'Οριστικ/ση' ) THEN 'Παραγωγή' ELSE '' END , CASE WHEN cmp.PlannedCloseOn <= GETDATE() THEN 2 ELSE 1 END AS cmpType FROM ( SELECT Contract = ct.id , ISNULL(ltc.CampaignId, ct.campaignid) AS CampaignId , LastRole = CASE WHEN LastRole IS NULL AND ct.OrigionalContractID IS NOT NULL AND OriginalContractType IS NOT NULL THEN 'Συνδρ/κά' ELSE LastRole END FROM dbo.Contract ct LEFT JOIN LastTaskPerContract ltc ON ltc.ContractId = ct.id WHERE ct.State NOT IN ( 3, 5 ) AND ct.type IN ( 0, 2, 3, 4 ) ) AS xx JOIN dbo.Campaign cmp ON cmp.ID = xx.CampaignId AND cmp.State = 2 WHERE LastRole IS NOT NULL AND CASE WHEN cmp.PlannedCloseOn <= GETDATE() THEN 2 ELSE 1 END IN ( @CampaignType ) GROUP BY LastRole , cmp.Name , cmp.Code , cmp.PlannedStartOn , cmp.PlannedCloseOn ORDER BY cmp.Code , cmp.Name DROP TABLE #temp

templates.name: Συγκεντρωτική Κατάσταση Συμβολαίων Ανά Καμπάνια - Contracts Per Task Type Dash Board More Than15Days Data Set
templates.sql: SELECT ContractId = ISNULL(ct.id, tgiv2.AltOfferID) , CampaignId = ISNULL(tgi.campaignid, ct.campaignid) , RoleDesc = r.Description , TaskTypeID = tt.id , TaskTypeDesc = tt.Description , t.CreatedOn , t.Status , t.outcome , t.ID AS taskid INTO #temp FROM Task t JOIN dbo.TaskType tt ON t.TaskTypeID = tt.ID JOIN dbo.[Case] c ON t.CaseID = c.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.TaskAssignment ta ON t.ID = ta.TaskID AND ta.AssignmentType = 0 LEFT JOIN dbo.Role r ON ta.RoleID = r.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.TargetGroupItemValue tgiv2 ON C.ContextEntityID = TGIV2.ID AND C.ContextEntityType = 'TGIV' LEFT JOIN dbo.TargetGroupItem tgi ON tgi.ID = tgiv2.TargetGroupItemID LEFT JOIN dbo.Advertisement ADV ON C.ContextEntityID = ADV.ID AND C.ContextEntityType = 'ADV' LEFT JOIN dbo.ContractProduct CP ON ADV.ContractProductID = CP.ID AND cp.State <> 3 LEFT JOIN dbo.Contract ct ON cp.RelatedContractID = ct.ID WHERE ( ( tt.id <> 195 AND t.status <> 189 AND t.status = 0 AND TT.ActivityType = 'H' ) OR tt.id = 195 OR tt.id = 505 OR tt.id = 500 OR tt.id = 189 ) AND tt.id <> 175 AND tt.id <> 170 AND tt.id <> 266; ; WITH LastTaskPerContract AS ( SELECT DISTINCT ContractId , CampaignId , TaskTypeid , STATUS , outcome , CreatedOn , LastRole = CASE WHEN ( TaskTypeid IN ( 146, 169, 252, 258, 262, 173, 154, 151, 260, 167, 299, 307, 300, 309, 311, 312, 313 ) ) OR ( TaskTypeid = 190 AND ISNULL(RoleDesc, '') = '' ) OR ( TaskTypeid IN ( 294, 295 ) AND ISNULL(RoleDesc, '') = '' ) THEN 'Σε ΣΔ' WHEN ( TaskTypeid = 190 AND RoleDesc <> '' ) OR ( TaskTypeID IN ( 179, 296, 291 ) ) OR ( TaskTypeid IN ( 294, 295 ) AND ISNULL(RoleDesc, '') <> '' ) THEN 'Back Office' WHEN tasktypeid IN ( 259, 164, 261, 174, 178 ) THEN 'Σε S/V' WHEN tasktypeid IN ( 198, 264, 267, 268, 269, 270, 310, 308 ) THEN 'Σε S/V - Manager' WHEN tasktypeid IN ( 193, 192, 194, 511, 516, 517, 520, 522, 523, 525, 527, 528 ) THEN 'Παραγωγή' WHEN tasktypeid = 189 AND STATUS = 0 THEN 'Σε έλεγχο υλικού' --WHEN tasktypeid = 189 AND status = 1 AND isnull(outcome,'') <> 'Δεν αφορά σύνθετη καταχώρηση' THEN 'ForProduction' WHEN tasktypeid = 195 AND STATUS = 0 THEN 'Οριστικ/ση' WHEN ( tasktypeid = 195 AND STATUS = 1 AND outcome = 'Σελιδοποίηση' ) OR ( tasktypeid = 505 AND STATUS = 1 AND outcome = 'Σελιδοποίηση' ) OR ( tasktypeid = 189 AND STATUS = 1 AND outcome = 'Δεν αφορά σύνθετη καταχώρηση' ) OR ( tasktypeid = 500 AND STATUS = 1 AND outcome = '' ) THEN 'Ολοκλ/να' END FROM #temp wrk WHERE taskid = ( SELECT MAX(taskid) FROM #temp wrd WHERE wrd.ContractId = wrk.ContractId ) ) SELECT Campaign = cmp.Name + '(' + cmp.Code + ')' , cmp.Code AS CampaignCode , cmp.PlannedStartOn , cmp.PlannedCloseOn , COUNT(Contract) AS CntContract , LastRole , GroupInd = CASE WHEN LastRole IN ( 'Σε ΣΔ', 'Σε S/V', 'Σε S/V - Manager', 'Back Office' ) THEN 'Πωλήσεις' WHEN LastRole IN ( 'Σε έλεγχο υλικού', 'Παραγωγή', 'Οριστικ/ση' ) THEN 'Παραγωγή' ELSE '' END , CASE WHEN cmp.PlannedCloseOn <= GETDATE() THEN 2 ELSE 1 END AS cmpType FROM ( SELECT Contract = ct.id , ISNULL(ltc.CampaignId, ct.campaignid) AS CampaignId , LastRole = CASE WHEN LastRole IS NULL AND ct.OrigionalContractID IS NOT NULL AND OriginalContractType IS NOT NULL THEN 'Συνδρ/κά' ELSE LastRole END FROM dbo.Contract ct LEFT JOIN LastTaskPerContract ltc ON ltc.ContractId = ct.id WHERE ct.State <> 3 AND ct.type IN ( 0, 2, 3, 4 ) AND DATEDIFF(dd, ct.SignedDate, GETDATE()) > 15 ) AS xx JOIN dbo.Campaign cmp ON cmp.ID = xx.CampaignId AND cmp.State = 2 WHERE LastRole IS NOT NULL AND lastrole NOT IN ( 'Συνδρ/κά', 'Ολοκλ/να' ) AND CASE WHEN cmp.PlannedCloseOn <= GETDATE() THEN 2 ELSE 1 END IN ( @CampaignType ) GROUP BY LastRole , cmp.Name , cmp.Code , cmp.PlannedStartOn , cmp.PlannedCloseOn ORDER BY cmp.Code , cmp.Name DROP TABLE #temp

templates.name: Συγκεντρωτικό Αρχείο με Google Ads - Google Account Manager Open Tasks Data Set

selectable: Ημερομηνία Παραλαβής στο YPS χωρίς url

templates.sql: SELECT tsk.id, bp.code AS [ID Πελάτη], bp.Name AS [ΕΠΩΝΥΜΙΑ], cn.Name AS [ΚΑΤΗΓΟΡΙΑ], '' AS [On Hold YPS], '' AS [ΠΕΡΙΟΧΗ], pr.code AS [ΠΑΚΕΤΟ GA], '' AS [Ημερομηνία Παράδοσης ON AIR], tsk.CreatedOn AS [Ημερομηνία Παραλαβής στο YPS χωρίς url], '' AS [Στησιμο Καμπάνιας], CASE WHEN CHARINDEX('(Web)', pr.Code) <> 0 OR ( EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM ContractProduct AS cp2 JOIN Advertisement AS adv2 ON adv2.ContractProductID = cp2.id JOIN Product AS pr2 ON pr2.ID = adv2.ProductId WHERE cp2.RelatedContractID = cp.RelatedContractID AND pr2.Code LIKE 'wst%' ) AND CHARINDEX('(P)', pr.Code) = 0 ) THEN 'yes' END AS [Website], CASE WHEN CHARINDEX('(P)', pr.Code) <> 0 OR ( EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM ContractProduct AS cp2 JOIN Advertisement AS adv2 ON adv2.ContractProductID = cp2.id JOIN Product AS pr2 ON pr2.ID = adv2.ProductID WHERE cp2.RelatedContractID = cp.RelatedContractID AND ( pr2.Code LIKE 'ΑΤΚ%' OR pr2.Code IN ('Bronze', 'silver', 'gold') ) ) AND CHARINDEX('(Web)', pr.Code) = 0 ) THEN 'yes' END AS [Profile], adv.AdvBeginDate AS [Μελλοντική Ημερομηνία για Live Profile], cp.RelatedContractID, tsk.Description AS [Περιγραφή] FROM Task AS tsk JOIN TaskAssignment AS tsa ON tsk.ID = tsa.TaskID JOIN [Case] AS cs ON cs.ID = tsk.CaseID JOIN Advertisement AS adv ON adv.id = cs.ContextEntityID AND cs.ContextEntityType = 'ADV' JOIN ContractProduct AS cp ON cp.ID = adv.ContractProductID JOIN Contract AS ct ON ct.ID = cp.RelatedContractID AND ( ct.type IN (0, 2, 4) ) JOIN BusinessPoint AS bp ON bp.id = ct.ActualBPOwnerID JOIN ClassifierNode AS cn ON cn.ID = bp.ActivityClassifierNodeID JOIN Product AS pr ON pr.ID = adv.ProductID WHERE tsk.Status = 0 AND tsa.RoleID = 527 AND tsa.AssignmentType = 0 AND tsk.TaskTypeID IN (192, 194) AND tsk.createdon >= @datefrom UNION SELECT tsk.id, bp.code AS [ID Πελάτη], bp.Name AS [ΕΠΩΝΥΜΙΑ], cn.Name AS [ΚΑΤΗΓΟΡΙΑ], '' AS [On Hold YPS], '' AS [ΠΕΡΙΟΧΗ], pr.code AS [ΠΑΚΕΤΟ GA], '' AS [Ημερομηνία Παράδοσης ON AIR], tsk.CreatedOn AS [Ημερομηνία Παραλαβής στο YPS χωρίς url], '' AS [Στησιμο Καμπάνιας], CASE WHEN CHARINDEX('(Web)', pr.Code) <> 0 OR ( EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM ContractProduct AS cp2 JOIN Advertisement AS adv2 ON adv2.ContractProductID = cp2.id JOIN Product AS pr2 ON pr2.ID = adv2.ProductId WHERE cp2.RelatedContractID = cp.RelatedContractID AND pr2.Code LIKE 'wst%' ) AND CHARINDEX('(P)', pr.Code) = 0 ) THEN 'yes' END AS [Website], CASE WHEN CHARINDEX('(P)', pr.Code) <> 0 OR ( EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM ContractProduct AS cp2 JOIN Advertisement AS adv2 ON adv2.ContractProductID = cp2.id JOIN Product AS pr2 ON pr2.ID = adv2.ProductID WHERE cp2.RelatedContractID = cp.RelatedContractID AND ( pr2.Code LIKE 'ΑΤΚ%' OR pr2.Code IN ('Bronze', 'silver', 'gold') ) ) AND CHARINDEX('(Web)', pr.Code) = 0 ) THEN 'yes' END AS [Profile], adv.AdvBeginDate AS [Μελλοντική Ημερομηνία για Live Profile], cp.RelatedContractID, tsk.Description AS [Περιγραφή] FROM Task AS tsk JOIN [Case] AS cs ON cs.ID = tsk.CaseID JOIN Advertisement AS adv ON adv.id = cs.ContextEntityID AND cs.ContextEntityType = 'ADV' JOIN ContractProduct AS cp ON cp.ID = adv.ContractProductID JOIN Contract AS ct ON ct.ID = cp.RelatedContractID AND ( ct.type IN (0, 2, 4) ) JOIN BusinessPoint AS bp ON bp.id = ct.ActualBPOwnerID JOIN ClassifierNode AS cn ON cn.ID = bp.ActivityClassifierNodeID JOIN Product AS pr ON pr.ID = adv.ProductID WHERE tsk.Status = 0 AND tsk.TaskTypeID IN (520, 523, 524) AND tsk.createdon >= @datefrom ORDER BY 10, 11, 6

templates.name: Συμβόλαια - Ε.Σ. - Άνευ Email- Συνολικό - Customers No Email Data Set
templates.sql: WITH CustomerData AS ( SELECT DISTINCT bpAdd.Code AS [Κωδικός διαφ.], bpAdd.Name AS [Επωνυμία διαφ.], bpPay.Code AS [Κωδ. Υπόχρεου πλ.], bpPay.Name AS [Επωνυμία υποχρ. Πληρωμής], [Ποσό διαφ.] = ( select sum(CASE WHEN cp.state IN (3,4) AND cp.AlteredAmount IS NOT NULL THEN cp.AlteredAmount else cp.Price - cp.Discount - cp.RulesDiscount end) from dbo.ContractProduct cp where ct.ID = cp.RelatedContractID ), cm.Name AS [Καμπάνια], cm.Code AS [Κύκλος], ch.DESCRIPTION AS [Κανάλι Πώλησης], usrInspector.SalesCode AS [Κωδ. Επιθεωρητή], usrInspector.FirstName + ' ' + usrInspector.LastName AS [Επιθεωρητής], ct.ID AS [Κωδ. Συμβολαίου], ct.State, usrSalesMan.SalesCode AS [Κωδ. Πωλητή], usrSalesMan.FirstName + ' ' + usrSalesMan.LastName AS [Πωλητής], ct.CreatedOn AS [Ημ. Δημιουργίας Συμβολαίου] FROM dbo.TargetGroupItem tgi JOIN dbo.TargetGroupItemValue tgiv ON tgi.ID = tgiv.TargetGroupItemID JOIN dbo.Contract ct ON ISNULL(tgiv.ContractID, tgiv.AltOfferID) = ct.ID AND (ct.type in (0,2,3,4)) JOIN dbo.BusinessPoint bpAdd ON ct.ActualBPOwnerID = bpAdd.ID JOIN dbo.BusinessPoint bp ON ct.ActualBPOwnerID = bp.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.PointRelationship pr ON bp.ID = pr.BusinessPointID AND pr.Type = 10 JOIN dbo.BusinessPoint bpPay ON pr.TargetBussinessPointID = bpPay.ID JOIN dbo.Campaign cm ON tgi.CampaignID = cm.ID JOIN dbo.[User] usrInspector ON tgiv.Supervisor = usrInspector.ID LEFT JOIN yps.dbo.[User] usr on ct.SalesManID = usr.ID LEFT JOIN yps.dbo.unit un on un.id = usr.unitid LEFT JOIN yps.dbo.channeltype ch on ch.id = un.channeltypeid JOIN dbo.[User] usrSalesMan ON ct.SalesManID = usrSalesMan.ID WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM dbo.PointEmail pph WHERE pph.BusinessPointID = bpPay.id ) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM dbo.ContactRelationship cr JOIN dbo.Contact con ON cr.ContactID = con.ID JOIN dbo.ContactEmail cph ON cph.ContactID = con.id WHERE cr.BusinessPointID = bpPay.id ) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM dbo.PointEmail pph WHERE pph.BusinessPointID = bpAdd.id ) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM dbo.ContactRelationship cr JOIN dbo.Contact con ON cr.ContactID = con.ID JOIN dbo.ContactEmail cph ON cph.ContactID = con.id WHERE cr.BusinessPointID = bpAdd.id ) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM dbo.Advertisement adv JOIN dbo.ContractProduct cp ON adv.ContractProductID = cp.ID WHERE adv.ContractProductID = cp.id AND cp.RelatedContractID = ct.ID AND adv.QA = 0 ) AND ct.State = 1 AND ct.DMKey IS NULL AND (cast(ct.CreatedOn as date) > = @FromDate AND cast(ct.CreatedOn as date) < = @ToDate) ) SELECT [Κωδικός διαφ.], [Επωνυμία διαφ.], [Κωδ. Συμβολαίου], [Ημ. Δημιουργίας Συμβολαίου], [Κωδ. Υπόχρεου πλ.], [Επωνυμία υποχρ. Πληρωμής], [Ποσό διαφ.], Καμπάνια, Κύκλος, [Κανάλι Πώλησης], [Κωδ. Πωλητή], Πωλητής, [Κωδ. Επιθεωρητή], Επιθεωρητής FROM CustomerData
