templates.sql: WITH CustomerData AS ( SELECT DISTINCT bpAdd.Code AS [Κωδικός διαφ.], bpAdd.Name AS [Επωνυμία διαφ.], bpPay.Code AS [Κωδ. Υπόχρεου πλ.], bpPay.Name AS [Επωνυμία υποχρ. Πληρωμής], [Ποσό διαφ.] = ( select sum(CASE WHEN cp.state IN (3,4) AND cp.AlteredAmount IS NOT NULL THEN cp.AlteredAmount else cp.Price - cp.Discount - cp.RulesDiscount end) from dbo.ContractProduct cp where ct.ID = cp.RelatedContractID ), cm.Name AS [Καμπάνια], cm.Code AS [Κύκλος], ch.DESCRIPTION AS [Κανάλι Πώλησης], usrInspector.SalesCode AS [Κωδ. Επιθεωρητή], usrInspector.FirstName + ' ' + usrInspector.LastName AS [Επιθεωρητής], ct.ID AS [Κωδ. Συμβολαίου], ct.State, usrSalesMan.SalesCode AS [Κωδ. Πωλητή], usrSalesMan.FirstName + ' ' + usrSalesMan.LastName AS [Πωλητής], ct.CreatedOn AS [Ημ. Δημιουργίας Συμβολαίου] FROM dbo.TargetGroupItem tgi JOIN dbo.TargetGroupItemValue tgiv ON tgi.ID = tgiv.TargetGroupItemID JOIN dbo.Contract ct ON ISNULL(tgiv.ContractID, tgiv.AltOfferID) = ct.ID AND (ct.type in (0,2,4)) JOIN dbo.BusinessPoint bpAdd ON ct.ActualBPOwnerID = bpAdd.ID JOIN dbo.BusinessPoint bp ON ct.ActualBPOwnerID = bp.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.PointRelationship pr ON bp.ID = pr.BusinessPointID AND pr.Type = 10 JOIN dbo.BusinessPoint bpPay ON pr.TargetBussinessPointID = bpPay.ID JOIN dbo.Campaign cm ON tgi.CampaignID = cm.ID JOIN dbo.[User] usrInspector ON tgiv.Supervisor = usrInspector.ID LEFT JOIN yps.dbo.[User] usr on ct.SalesManID = usr.ID LEFT JOIN yps.dbo.unit un on un.id = usr.unitid LEFT JOIN yps.dbo.channeltype ch on ch.id = un.channeltypeid JOIN dbo.[User] usrSalesMan ON ct.SalesManID = usrSalesMan.ID WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM dbo.PointPhone pph WHERE pph.BusinessPointID = bpPay.id AND pph.Number LIKE '69%' ) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM dbo.ContactRelationship cr JOIN dbo.Contact con ON cr.ContactID = con.ID JOIN dbo.ContactPhone cph ON cph.ContactID = con.id WHERE cr.BusinessPointID = bpPay.id AND cph.Number LIKE '69%' ) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM dbo.PointPhone pph WHERE pph.BusinessPointID = bpAdd.id AND pph.Number LIKE '69%' ) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM dbo.ContactRelationship cr JOIN dbo.Contact con ON cr.ContactID = con.ID JOIN dbo.ContactPhone cph ON cph.ContactID = con.id WHERE cr.BusinessPointID = bpAdd.id AND cph.Number LIKE '69%' ) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM dbo.Advertisement adv JOIN dbo.ContractProduct cp ON adv.ContractProductID = cp.ID WHERE adv.ContractProductID = cp.id AND cp.RelatedContractID = ct.ID AND adv.QA = 0) AND ct.State = 1 AND ct.DMKey IS NULL AND (cast(ct.CreatedOn as date) > = @FromDate AND cast(ct.CreatedOn as date) < = @ToDate) ) SELECT [Κωδικός διαφ.], [Επωνυμία διαφ.], [Κωδ. Συμβολαίου], [Ημ. Δημιουργίας Συμβολαίου], [Κωδ. Υπόχρεου πλ.], [Επωνυμία υποχρ. Πληρωμής], [Ποσό διαφ.], Καμπάνια, Κύκλος, [Κανάλι Πώλησης], [Κωδ. Πωλητή], Πωλητής, [Κωδ. Επιθεωρητή], Επιθεωρητής FROM CustomerData

templates.name: Συμβόλαια Franchise - Πελάτες προς τιμολόγηση - Main DS
templates.sql: USE yps

templates.name: Συμβόλαια ανά Τρόπο Πληρωμής - DS Main
templates.sql: DECLARE @Rpt TABLE ( BranchCode NVARCHAR(50) , a_id INT , CustomerName NVARCHAR(150) , BrandName NVARCHAR(150) , ContractCode INT , SalesCode NVARCHAR(20) , SignDate DATETIME , ContractProduct NVARCHAR(100) , AdvertisementProduct NVARCHAR(100) , AdvertisementStatus NVARCHAR(40) , AdvertisementPrice DECIMAL(18, 3) , FinancialDptFlag NVARCHAR(40) , MarketingDptFlag NVARCHAR(40) , PaymentMethod NVARCHAR(100) , Campaign NVARCHAR(254) , Channel NVARCHAR(20) , heading NVARCHAR(MAX) , Profession NVARCHAR(150) , Prefecture NVARCHAR(250) ); /*SET @DateTo = '2013-01-30'*/ INSERT INTO @Rpt SELECT DISTINCT bp.Code AS BranchCode , a.id a_id , bp.BrandName AS CustomerName , bp.NAME AS BrandName , c.ID AS ContractCode , u.SalesCode , c.SignedDate AS SignDate , p.NAME AS ContractProduct , CASE WHEN p.IsComposite = 0 THEN '' ELSE ap.Name END AS AdvertisementProduct , CASE WHEN a.qa = 0 THEN 'Σε εξέλιξη' ELSE 'Ολοκληρωμένο' END AS AdvertisementStatus , AdvertisementPrice = a.Price - a.Discount - a.RulesDiscount , CASE WHEN ( pmt.PaymentWay NOT IN ( 2, 5 ) OR /*OTE-TAXYPL*/ pm.AdvancedPayment > 0 ) THEN 'ΑΜΕΣΗ ΤΙΜΟΛΟΓΗΣΗ' ELSE 'ΔΕΝ ΧΡΗΖΕΙ ΑΜΕΣΗΣ ΤΙΜ.' END AS FinancialDptFlag , CASE WHEN pmt.id = 269 THEN 'ΑΝΤΑΠΟΔΟΤΙΚΗ ΣΥΝΕΡΓΑΣΙΑ' ELSE '' END AS MarketingDptFlag , pmt.DESCRIPTION AS PaymentMethod , Campaign = ( SELECT TOP 1 cv.NAME + ' ' + cv.Code AS code FROM dbo.TargetGroupItemValue tgiv JOIN dbo.TargetGroupItem tgi ON tgiv.TargetGroupItemID = tgi.ID JOIN dbo.Campaign cv ON cv.ID = tgi.CampaignID WHERE C.ID = tgiv.ContractID ) , ISNULL(ct.Description, srct.Description) AS Channel , Heading = CASE WHEN CHARINDEX('.', SUBSTRING(Hvgi.Description, 1, CHARINDEX('-', Hvgi.Description))) <> 0 THEN HvgiC.Description ELSE Hvgi.[Description] END , /*hvgi.Description AS heading ,*/ bp.Profession , adr.Prefecture FROM Contract AS c JOIN dbo.[User] u ON c.SalesManID = u.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.Unit unt ON u.UnitID = unt.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.ChannelType srct ON unt.ChannelTypeID = srct.ID /*LEFT JOIN dbo.SubChannel sc ON c.SubChannelID = sc.ID*/ LEFT JOIN dbo.ChannelType ct ON c.ChannelTypeID = ct.id /*sc.ChannelTypeID = ct.ID*/ JOIN dbo.ContractProduct AS cp ON c.ID = cp.RelatedContractID JOIN dbo.Advertisement a ON cp.ID = a.ContractProductID JOIN dbo.Product p ON cp.ProductID = p.ID JOIN dbo.Product ap ON a.ProductID = ap.id JOIN dbo.BusinessPoint AS bp ON bp.ID = c.ActualBPOwnerID JOIN FullAddressViewV2 adr ON adr.id = bp.LocationAddressID JOIN dbo.PaymentMethod AS pm ON cp.PaymentMethodID = pm.ID JOIN dbo.PaymentMethodType AS pmt ON pm.PaymentMethodTypeID = pmt.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.VersionGroupItem Hvgi ON hvgi.ID = a.HeadingID LEFT JOIN dbo.VersionGroupItem Hvgic ON Hvgi.ParentID = HvgiC.ID WHERE c.[State] NOT IN ( 3, 5 ,10) AND ( c.type IN ( 0, 2, 3, 4 ) ) AND cp.State <> 3 AND ap.IsComposite = 0 AND ( ( c.SignedDate BETWEEN @dateFrom AND DATEADD(day, 1, @dateTo) AND c.OrigionalContractID IS NULL ) OR ( c.CreatedOn BETWEEN @dateFrom AND DATEADD(day, 1, @dateTo) AND c.OrigionalContractID IS NOT NULL ) ) AND a.qa IN ( @ContractLineStatus ) INSERT INTO @Rpt SELECT DISTINCT bp.Code AS BranchCode , a.id a_id , bp.BrandName AS CustomerName , bp.NAME AS BrandName , c.ID AS ContractCode , u.SalesCode , c.SignedDate AS SignDate , p.NAME AS ContractProduct , CASE WHEN p.IsComposite = 0 THEN '' ELSE ap.Name END AS AdvertisementProduct , CASE WHEN a.qa = 0 THEN 'Σε εξέλιξη' ELSE 'Ολοκληρωμένο' END AS AdvertisementStatus , AdvertisementPrice = a.Price - a.Discount - a.RulesDiscount , CASE WHEN ( pmt.PaymentWay NOT IN ( 2, 5 ) OR apm.Amount > 0 ) THEN 'ΑΜΕΣΗ ΤΙΜΟΛΟΓΗΣΗ' ELSE 'ΔΕΝ ΧΡΗΖΕΙ ΑΜΕΣΗΣ ΤΙΜ.' END AS FinancialDptFlag , CASE WHEN pmt.id = 269 THEN 'ΑΝΤΑΠΟΔΟΤΙΚΗ ΣΥΝΕΡΓΑΣΙΑ' ELSE '' END AS MarketingDptFlag , pmt.DESCRIPTION AS PaymentMethod , Campaign = ( SELECT TOP 1 cv.NAME + ' ' + cv.Code AS code FROM dbo.TargetGroupItemValue tgiv JOIN dbo.TargetGroupItem tgi ON tgiv.TargetGroupItemID = tgi.ID JOIN dbo.Campaign cv ON cv.ID = tgi.CampaignID WHERE C.ID = tgiv.ContractID ) , ISNULL(ct.Description, srct.Description) AS Channel , Heading = CASE WHEN CHARINDEX('.', SUBSTRING(Hvgi.Description, 1, CHARINDEX('-', Hvgi.Description))) <> 0 THEN HvgiC.Description ELSE Hvgi.[Description] END , /*hvgi.Description AS heading ,*/ bp.Profession , adr.Prefecture FROM Contract AS c JOIN dbo.[User] u ON c.SalesManID = u.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.Unit unt ON u.UnitID = unt.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.ChannelType srct ON unt.ChannelTypeID = srct.ID /*LEFT JOIN dbo.SubChannel sc ON c.SubChannelID = sc.ID*/ LEFT JOIN dbo.ChannelType ct ON c.ChannelTypeID = ct.id /*sc.ChannelTypeID = ct.ID*/ JOIN dbo.ContractProduct AS cp ON c.ID = cp.RelatedContractID JOIN dbo.Advertisement a ON cp.ID = a.ContractProductID JOIN dbo.Product p ON cp.ProductID = p.ID JOIN dbo.Product ap ON a.ProductID = ap.id JOIN dbo.BusinessPoint AS bp ON bp.ID = c.ActualBPOwnerID JOIN FullAddressViewV2 adr ON adr.id = bp.LocationAddressID JOIN dbo.InvoicePaymentMethod AS ipm ON c.id = ipm.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.advancedPaymentMethod AS apm ON c.id = apm.ID JOIN dbo.PaymentMethodType AS pmt ON ipm.PaymentMethodTypeID = pmt.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.VersionGroupItem Hvgi ON hvgi.ID = a.HeadingID LEFT JOIN dbo.VersionGroupItem Hvgic ON Hvgi.ParentID = HvgiC.ID WHERE c.[State] NOT IN ( 3, 5 , 10) AND ( c.type IN ( 0, 2, 3, 4 ) ) AND cp.State <> 3 AND ap.IsComposite = 0 AND ( ( c.SignedDate BETWEEN @dateFrom AND DATEADD(day, 1, @dateTo) AND c.OrigionalContractID IS NULL ) OR ( c.CreatedOn BETWEEN @dateFrom AND DATEADD(day, 1, @dateTo) AND c.OrigionalContractID IS NOT NULL ) ) AND a.qa IN ( @ContractLineStatus ) SELECT BranchCode , a_id , CustomerName , BrandName , ContractCode , SalesCode , CONVERT(NVARCHAR(15), SignDate, 103) AS SignDate , ContractProduct , AdvertisementProduct , AdvertisementStatus , AdvertisementPrice , FinancialDptFlag , MarketingDptFlag , PaymentMethod , Campaign , Channel , heading , Profession , Prefecture FROM @Rpt WHERE FinancialDptFlag IN ( @FinancialFlag ) AND MarketingDptFlag IN ( @MarketingFlag ) AND Prefecture IN ( @PrefectureParam )

templates.name: Συμβόλαια ανά Τρόπο Πληρωμής - Prefectures
templates.sql: select distinct Prefecture = case --bal.AreaName WHEN bal.BroaderAreaID ='E2' THEN 'Αττικής' WHEN bal.BroaderAreaID = 'E5' THEN 'Αττικής' WHEN bal.BroaderAreaID = 'E20' THEN 'Αττικής' WHEN bal.BroaderAreaID = 'E4' THEN 'Αττικής' ELSE bal.AreaName END from BroaderAreaLookUp bal where bal.BroaderAreaID like 'E%'

templates.name: Συμβόλαια Ανα Έτος - Contracts Per Year Data Set
templates.sql: --DECLARE @year nvarchar(5); --SET @year = '2012'; SELECT ct.ID , bp.BrandName , bp.Name , CASE ct.state WHEN 0 THEN 'Pending' WHEN 1 THEN 'Approved' WHEN 2 THEN 'Rejected' WHEN 3 THEN 'Cancelled' WHEN 4 THEN 'Replaced' WHEN 5 THEN 'CancelledOffer' WHEN 6 THEN 'Modified' END AS state , SUM(CAST(CASE WHEN cp.[STATE] in (3,4) AND cp.AlteredAmount IS NOT NULL THEN cp.AlteredAmount ELSE ( cp.Price - cp.Discount - cp.RulesDiscount ) END AS MONEY)) AS value , CAST(SUM(cp.Price) AS FLOAT) AS initialvalue , ( SELECT ch.Description FROM [User] AS usr INNER JOIN Unit AS unt ON unt.ID = usr.UnitID INNER JOIN ChannelType AS ch ON ch.ID = unt.ChannelTypeID WHERE ( usr.ID = ct.SalesManID ) ) AS channel , CASE WHEN ( ct.OrigionalContractID IS NOT NULL AND YEAR(ct.Createdon) = @year ) THEN 'Ναι' ELSE 'Οχι' END AS Expr1 , CONVERT(VARCHAR(20), ct.SignedDate, 103) AS Expr2 , ISNULL(cmp.Code + ' - ' + cmp.Name, ( SELECT cmp.Code + ' - ' + cmp.Name AS Expr1 FROM TargetGroupItemValue AS tgiv INNER JOIN TargetGroupItem AS tgi ON tgi.ID = tgiv.TargetGroupItemID INNER JOIN Campaign AS cmp ON cmp.ID = tgi.CampaignID WHERE ( tgiv.ContractID = ct.ID ) )) AS Expr3 FROM Contract AS ct INNER JOIN BusinessPoint AS bp ON bp.ID = ct.ActualBPOwnerID INNER JOIN ContractProduct AS cp ON cp.RelatedContractID = ct.ID LEFT OUTER JOIN Campaign AS cmp ON cmp.ID = ct.CampaignID WHERE ( ( YEAR(ct.SignedDate) = @year ) AND ( ct.State NOT IN ( 3, 5, 10 ) ) AND ( ct.Type IN ( 0, 2, 3, 4 ) ) AND ( cp.State <> 3 ) AND ( ct.OrigionalContractID IS NULL ) ) OR ( ( YEAR(ct.CreatedOn) = @year ) AND ( ct.State NOT IN ( 3, 5, 10 ) ) AND ( ct.Type IN ( 0, 2, 3, 4 ) ) AND ( cp.State <> 3 ) AND ( ct.OrigionalContractID IS NOT NULL ) ) GROUP BY ct.ID , bp.BrandName , bp.Name , ct.State , ct.SalesManID , ct.CreatedBy , ct.SignedDate , cmp.Name , cmp.Code , ct.CreatedOn , ct.OrigionalContractID ORDER BY Expr1 DESC , bp.BrandName DESC

templates.name: Συμβόλαια Ανα Έτος - years
templates.sql: WITH yearlist AS ( SELECT 2012 AS year UNION ALL SELECT yl.year + 1 AS year FROM yearlist AS yl WHERE yl.year + 1 <= YEAR(GETDATE()) ) SELECT year FROM yearlist ORDER BY year DESC

templates.name: Συμβόλαια για υποβολή ΔΟΥ - Data Set1
templates.sql: --declare @from date, @to date, @option bit; --set @from = '20130101'; --set @to = dateadd(month,3,@from); --set @option = 1; if object_id('tempdb..#ebsC') is not null drop table #ebsC select code into #ebsC FROM [cardinal12].XoEntersoft.dbo.ESFITradeAccountContract e WHERE /*e.fCompanyCode = '001' and*/ isnumeric(e.code) = 1 if object_id('tempdb..#tmp') is not null drop table #tmp select distinct --[Κωδικός ΕΣ] = bp.code, --[Κωδικός ΕΣ τιμoλόησης] = bilbp.code, [Φορολογική Επωνυμία] = isnull(bilbp.BrandName, bp.BrandName) , [Επάγγελμα] = isnull(bilbp.Profession,bp.Profession), [Διεύθυνση] = LEFT ( CASE WHEN LEN ( isnull(ADR.GeoModelStreet1Text,'') ) > 0 THEN LEFT(ADR.GeoModelStreet1Text,110) + RTRIM( ' ' + isnull(ADR.GeoModelStreet1Num,'') ) + CASE WHEN ADR.GeoModelStreet2Text IS NOT NULL AND LEN (ADR.GeoModelStreet2Text) >0 THEN ' & ' + ADR.GeoModelStreet2Text ELSE '' END + RTRIM( ' ' + isnull(ADR.GeoModelStreet2Num,'') ) WHEN LEN ( isnull(ADR.Line1,'') ) > 0 THEN ADR.Line1 ELSE ISNULL(left(ADR.GeoModelLocText,128), LTRIM( left(ADR.Line3, LEN(line3) - charindex(',', reverse(ADR.Line3))))) END, 256), --[TK] = (CASE WHEN ADR.NumericZip = 0 -- THEN ( case WHEN charindex(',', reverse(ADR.Line3)) > 0 -- THEN LTRIM( reverse(left(reverse(ADR.Line3), charindex(',', reverse(ADR.Line3)) -1))) --2/4/2012 -- ELSE NULL END ) -- ELSE ADR.NumericZip END), [TK] = CASE WHEN ADR.NumericZip = 0 THEN ( case WHEN charindex(',', reverse(ADR.Line3)) > 0 and isnumeric(LTRIM( reverse(left(reverse(ADR.Line3), charindex(',', reverse(ADR.Line3)) -1))))=1 THEN LTRIM( reverse(left(reverse(ADR.Line3), charindex(',', reverse(ADR.Line3)) -1))) --2/4/2012 ELSE NULL END ) ELSE ADR.NumericZip END, [Πόλη] = ISNULL(left(ADR.GeoModelLocText,128), LTRIM( left(ADR.Line3, LEN(line3) - charindex(',', reverse(ADR.Line3))))), --[Διεύθυνση] = isnull(adr.Line1,'')+' '+isnull(adr.GeoModelZip,'')+' '+ isnull(adr.Municipality,'')+' '+isnull(adr.Prefecture,''),adr.line3, --[BilBPLocationAddress] = (select distinct isnull(a.Line1,'')+' '+isnull(a.GeoModelZip,'')+' '+ isnull(a.Municipality,'')+' '+isnull(a.Prefecture,'') from FullAddressViewV2 a where a.id = bilbp.LocationAddressID ), --[BillingAddress] = (select distinct isnull(a.Line1,'')+' '+isnull(a.GeoModelZip,'')+' '+ isnull(a.Municipality,'')+' '+isnull(a.Prefecture,'') from FullAddressViewV2 a where a.id = bp.BillingAddressID ), [ΑΦΜ] =cast(t.TaxCode as nvarchar(15)), [ΔΟΥ] = tao.Description,--tao.Code+' - '+tao.Description , [Συμβόλαιο] = ct.id, [Κατάσταση Συμβολαίου] = (CASE WHEN ct.State = 0 THEN 'Pending' WHEN ct.State = 1 THEN 'Approved' WHEN ct.State = 2 THEN 'Rejected' WHEN ct.State = 3 THEN 'Cancelled' WHEN ct.State = 4 THEN 'Replaced' WHEN ct.State = 5 THEN 'CancelledOffer' WHEN ct.State = 6 THEN 'Modified' END), [Αξία] = (SELECT CAST(SUM( CASE WHEN cp.[STATE] in ( 3,4 ) AND cp.AlteredAmount IS NOT NULL THEN cp.AlteredAmount ELSE (cp.Price - cp.Discount - cp.RulesDiscount) END ) AS money) FROM dbo.ContractProduct cp JOIN dbo.Contract ct1 ON cp.RelatedContractID = ct1.id WHERE cp.RelatedContractID = ct.id), [Ημερομηνία Υπογραφής] = convert(nvarchar(15),ct.signeddate,103) , [Καμπάνια] = (SELECT '['+c.code+'] '+c.name FROM dbo.Campaign c WHERE tgi.CampaignID = c.id), [Συνδρομητικό] = (case when exists (select * from ContractProduct cp where cp.RelatedContractID = ct.id and cp.isRenewable = 1 ) then 'ΝΑΙ' else 'OXI' end), [EBS] = (case when exists (select * FROM #EBSc e WHERE e.code = cast(ct.id as nvarchar(50))) then 'ΝΑΙ' else 'OXI' end) into #tmp from contract ct join BusinessPoint bp on bp.id = ct.ActualBPOwnerID --and ct.BillingPointID left join PointRelationship pr on pr.BusinessPointID = bp.id and pr.type = 10 --and pr.BusinessPointID <> pr.TargetBussinessPointID left join BusinessPoint bilBP on bilBP.id = pr.TargetBussinessPointID join FullAddressViewV2 adr on adr.id = isnull(isnull(bp.BillingAddressID, bilbp.BillingAddressID), '') LEFT join dbo.TargetGroupItemValue tgiv on ct.ID = isnull(tgiv.ContractID , tgiv.AltOfferID) LEFT join dbo.TargetGroupItem tgi on tgiv.TargetGroupItemID = tgi.ID left join TaxCode t on t.id = isnull( bilBP.id, bp.id ) left join TaxOffice tao on tao.ID = bp.TaxOfficeID where --ct.state = 1 ct.type in (0,2,3,4) and ct.OrigionalContractID is NULL --and ct.SignedDate BETWEEN @from AND DATEADD(day, 1, @to) and (CASE WHEN @option = 1 THEN ct.SignedDate ELSE ct.CreatedOn END BETWEEN @from AND DATEADD(day, 1, @to)) order by convert(nvarchar(15),ct.signeddate,103) select ROW_NUMBER() over(order by [Φορολογική Επωνυμία]) as AA, * from #tmp order by [Φορολογική Επωνυμία]

templates.name: Συμβόλαια με Web Προϊόντα - Τελευταίο Βήμα - Contracts Web Products Last Step Data Set
templates.source: rdl:Συμβόλαια με Web Προϊόντα - Τελευταίο Βήμα:ContractsWebProductsLastStepDataSet
templates.sql: --and ct.type in (0,2,4) if object_id ('tempdb..#a') is not null drop table #a SELECT C.* , tt.Description , t.ID AS TaskID , t.CreatedOn AS TaskCreatedON , adv.ID AS AdvID , cp.BusinessPointID , ContractId = ISNULL(tgiv2.ContractID, cp.RelatedContractID) , tgiv2.AltOfferID , pr.Code AS ProductCode , t.Status AS TaskStatus , AO.UserName AS ActualOwnerUserName , R.Description AS PotentialOwnerRole , ta.AssignmentType , t.Outcome , adv.VersionSectionID , adv.AdvBeginDate , ConcatContractId = COALESCE(tgiv2.ContractID, cp.RelatedContractID, AltOfferID) ,cp.State cpstate into #a FROM Task t JOIN dbo.TaskType tt ON t.TaskTypeID = tt.ID JOIN dbo.[Case] c ON t.CaseID = c.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.TargetGroupItemValue tgiv2 ON C.ContextEntityID = TGIV2.ID AND C.ContextEntityType = 'TGIV' LEFT JOIN dbo.Advertisement ADV ON C.ContextEntityID = ADV.ID AND C.ContextEntityType = 'ADV' LEFT JOIN dbo.Product pr ON adv.ProductID = pr.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.Udac u ON pr.UdacID = u.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.ContractProduct CP ON ADV.ContractProductID = CP.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.Contract ct ON cp.RelatedContractID = ct.ID AND ct.Type IN ( 0, 2, 3, 4 ) LEFT OUTER JOIN [User] AS AO ON T.ActualOwnerID = AO.ID LEFT OUTER JOIN TaskAssignment AS TA ON T.ID = TA.TaskID AND ta.AssignmentType = 0 LEFT OUTER JOIN [Role] AS R ON TA.RoleID = R.ID WHERE TT.ActivityType = 'H' AND EXISTS ( SELECT wc.Code FROM ItApps.dbo.udacwebsites wc WHERE wc.Code = u.code ) if object_id ('tempdb..#b') is not null drop table #b SELECT bp.ID bpid , bp.code , bp.Name , c.ID , c.[State] --, cp.State , c.SalesManID , c.CreatedOn , c.SignedDate , SalesMan = usr.UserName , ContractPrice = SUM( CAST(CASE WHEN cp.[STATE] in (3,4) AND cp.AlteredAmount IS NOT NULL THEN cp.AlteredAmount ELSE (cp.Price - cp.Discount - cp.RulesDiscount) END AS money) ) into #b FROM dbo.BusinessPoint bp JOIN dbo.Contract c ON bp.ID = c.ActualBPOwnerID LEFT JOIN dbo.[User] usr ON c.SalesManID = usr.ID JOIN dbo.ContractProduct cp ON c.ID = cp.RelatedContractID WHERE c.Type IN ( 0, 2, 3, 4 ) AND EXISTS ( SELECT wc.Code FROM ItApps.dbo.udacwebsites wc JOIN udac ud ON wc.Code = ud.code JOIN dbo.Product pr ON pr.UdacID = ud.ID JOIN dbo.Advertisement adv ON adv.ProductID = pr.ID WHERE adv.ContractProductID = cp.ID ) GROUP BY bp.ID , bp.code , bp.Name , c.ID , c.[State] , c.SalesManID , c.CreatedOn , c.SignedDate , usr.UserName SELECT wc.code AS [BranchCode] , wc.name AS [Name] , wc.id AS [ContractID] , [Αξία_Συμβολαίου] = wc.ContractPrice , A.ProductCode AS [UDAC] , A.Description AS [LastStep] , (CASE wc.[State] WHEN 0 THEN 'Pending' WHEN 1 THEN 'Approved' WHEN 2 THEN 'Rejected' WHEN 3 THEN 'Cancelled' WHEN 4 THEN 'Replaced' WHEN 5 THEN 'CancelledOffer' WHEN 6 THEN 'Modified' END) AS [ContractStatus] , (CASE a.cpstate WHEN 0 THEN 'Pending' WHEN 1 THEN 'Accepted' WHEN 2 THEN 'Rejected' WHEN 3 THEN 'Cancelled' WHEN 4 THEN 'Interrupted' WHEN 5 THEN 'Completed' WHEN 6 THEN 'Modified' WHEN 7 THEN 'ModifiedForEBS' END) [ContractProductStatus] , a.ActualOwnerUserName AS ActualOwner , a.PotentialOwnerRole AS PotentialOwnerRole , a.Outcome AS Outcome , wc.SalesMan , wc.CreatedOn , wc.SignedDate , a.AdvBeginDate , ( SELECT MAX(email) FROM PointEmail WHERE BusinessPointID = wc.bpid ) AS Email , ( SELECT MAX(number) FROM PointPhone WHERE BusinessPointID = wc.bpid AND IsActive = 1 AND Usage IN ( 7, 8 ) ) AS Fax FROM #b wc LEFT JOIN #a A on wc.id = a.ConcatContractId WHERE ( a.TaskCreatedON = ( SELECT MAX(TaskCreatedON) FROM #a ain WHERE a.ContractId =ain.ConcatContractId ) OR ( A.TaskCreatedON IS NULL ) ) ORDER BY wc.code , wc.id

templates.name: Συμβόλαια με Web Προϊόντα και Free Web Link - Contracts Web Sites Free Web Link Data Set
templates.source: rdl:Συμβόλαια με Web Προϊόντα και Free Web Link:ContractsWebSitesFreeWebLinkDataSet
templates.sql: WITH ProductIds AS ( SELECT id , Code , IsComposite FROM dbo.product WHERE Code IN ( SELECT Code FROM ItApps.dbo.udacwebsites ) AND IsComposite = 0 ), YContracts AS ( SELECT fccv.* FROM dbo.FullContractCavView fccv join Contract ct on ct.id = fccv.c_ID and ct.Type in (0,2,3,4) JOIN dbo.ContractProduct cp ON cp.RelatedContractID = ct.id WHERE C_State not in (3,5,10) AND cp.State <> 3 AND Adv_Productid IN ( SELECT id FROM ProductIds ) --AND Adv_Productid IN (SELECT id FROM dbo.Product pr WHERE MediumVersionID = 34) /*change request!!!*/ AND Adv_QA = 1 ) SELECT DISTINCT bp.Code BPCode , bp.Name BPBrandName , bp.BrandName BPName , C.C_ID ContractId , C.C_Signdate ContractSignedDate , ProductCode = ( SELECT pr.Code FROM dbo.Advertisement adv JOIN dbo.Product pr ON adv.ProductID = pr.ID WHERE yc.adv_id = adv.ID ) , C.Cad_Name , C.Cav_Value, CASE WHEN ( SELECT MAX(tsk.completedon) FROM yps.dbo.[Case] cc JOIN YPS.dbo.[Case] mcc ON mcc.id = cc.MasterCaseID JOIN yps.dbo.Task tsk ON tsk.CaseID = cc.id WHERE Cc.ContextEntityID = yc.adv_id AND cc.ContextEntityType = 'ADV' AND mcc.ContextEntityType = 'TGIV' AND tsk.TaskTypeID=192 ) IS NULL AND ct.state NOT IN ( 3, 5 , 10) AND yc.Adv_QA = 1 AND ct.MigratedCode IS NOT NULL THEN yc.Adv_BeginDate when ct.OrigionalContractID IS Not null then yc.Adv_BeginDate ELSE ( SELECT MAX(tsk.completedon) FROM yps.dbo.[Case] cc JOIN YPS.dbo.[Case] mcc ON mcc.id = cc.MasterCaseID and mcc.ContextEntityType = 'TGIV' JOIN yps.dbo.Task tsk ON tsk.CaseID = cc.id join yps.dbo.Advertisement adv2 on adv2.ID=cc.ContextEntityID AND cc.ContextEntityType = 'ADV' WHERE adv2.QA=1 and yc.adv_id=adv2.id and tsk.TaskTypeID IN (193,516) and tsk.Outcome in ('Σύνθετη καταχώρηση δεν παρουσιάζει λάθη','Δεν Απαιτούνται Διορθώσεις') ) END AS completedon FROM YContracts yc JOIN dbo.FullContractCavView c ON c.C_ID = yc.c_id join Contract ct on ct.id = c.c_ID and ct.Type in (0,2,3,4) JOIN dbo.BusinessPoint bp ON c.A_BPID = bp.ID WHERE C.Cad_ID in (49325,126428) AND ( LEN(C.Cav_Value) = 0 OR C.Cav_Value IS NULL )

templates.name: Συμβόλαια με Παράκαμψη Εταιρικών Πολιτικών Ανά Καμπάνια - Data Set1
templates.source: rdl:Συμβόλαια με Παράκαμψη Εταιρικών Πολιτικών Ανά Καμπάνια:DataSet1
aggregations: SUM(CASE WHEN hasTicket = 1 THEN value ELSE 0 END)
SUM(CASE WHEN hasApprovedTicket = 1 THEN value ELSE 0 END)
SUM(CASE WHEN cp.state IN (3, 4) THEN cp.AlteredAmount ELSE cp.Price - cp.Discount - cp.RulesDiscount END)
templates.sql: WITH ypsData AS ( SELECT ct.ID AS contractid, ISNULL('[' + cmp.Code + '] ' + cmp.Name, '(χωρίς καμπάνια)') AS Campaign, ISNULL(cht.Description, '(χωρίς κανάλι)') AS ChannelType, ct.ReleaseDate AS releasedDate, ( SELECT SUM( CASE WHEN cp.state IN (3, 4) THEN cp.AlteredAmount ELSE cp.Price - cp.Discount - cp.RulesDiscount END ) FROM yps.dbo.ContractProduct AS cp WHERE cp.RelatedContractID = ct.ID ) AS value FROM yps.dbo.contract AS ct LEFT JOIN yps.dbo.campaign AS cmp ON ct.CampaignID = cmp.ID LEFT JOIN yps.dbo.ChannelType AS cht ON cht.ID = ct.ChannelTypeID WHERE NOT ct.State IN (3, 5) ), alldata AS ( SELECT *, ISNULL( ( SELECT TOP 1 1 FROM ITApps.bcp.Ticket AS bcp WHERE TicketType = 'Εξαίρεση από πολιτική προκαταβολής' AND bcp.ContractID = ypsData.contractid ), 0 ) AS hasTicket, ISNULL( ( SELECT TOP 1 1 FROM ITApps.bcp.Ticket AS bcp WHERE TicketType = 'Εξαίρεση από πολιτική προκαταβολής' AND Status IN ('Έγκριση', 'Επαναφορά', 'Κλειστό') AND bcp.ContractID = ypsData.contractid ), 0 ) AS hasApprovedTicket FROM ypsdata WHERE releasedDate >= @datefrom AND releasedDate < DATEADD(DAY, 1, @dateto) ) SELECT Campaign, ChannelType, COUNT(contractid) AS cntContracts, SUM(value) AS sumContractsValue, SUM(hasTicket) AS cntTickets, SUM(CASE WHEN hasTicket = 1 THEN value ELSE 0 END) AS sumTicketsValue, SUM(hasApprovedTicket) AS cntApprovedTickets, SUM(CASE WHEN hasApprovedTicket = 1 THEN value ELSE 0 END) AS sumApprovedTicketsValue, ROUND(( CAST(( SUM(hasTicket) * 100 ) AS FLOAT) / COUNT(contractid) ), 2) AS percTickets, ROUND(( CAST(( SUM(hasApprovedTicket) * 100 ) AS FLOAT) / COUNT(contractid) ), 2) AS percApprovedTickets FROM alldata GROUP BY Campaign, ChannelType ORDER BY 1, 2

templates.name: Συμβόλαια με προιόντα Internet - Data Set1
templates.sql: --DECLARE @signedDate date, @signedDatePlus1 date,@medium INT; --SET @signedDate = '20120101'; --SET @signedDatePlus1 = '20130101'; --SET @medium = 10; SELECT distinct [Κωδ. ΕΣ] = bp.code, [Επωνυμία] = bp.brandname, [Διακριτικός] = bp.NAME, [Νομός] = (SELECT TOP 1 prefecture FROM dbo.FullAddressViewV2 ad WHERE ad.id = bp.LocationAddressID), [Νομός ΕΣ πώλησης] = ( SELECT TOP 1 prefecture FROM dbo.PointRelationship pr JOIN dbo.BusinessPoint t ON TargetBussinessPointID = t.id AND pr.type = 9 JOIN dbo.FullAddressViewV2 ad ON t.LocationAddressID = ad.id WHERE pr.BusinessPointID = bp.id), [Campaign] = (SELECT '['+c.Code+'] '+c.name FROM dbo.Campaign c WHERE tgi.CampaignID = c.id), [Τύπος πελάτη] =(case tgiv.LossPrintedNew when 0 then 'Loss' when 1 then 'Printed' when 2 then 'New' end), [Συμβόλαιο] = co.id, [Κατάσταση Συμβ.] = ( CASE Co.State WHEN 0 THEN 'Pending' WHEN 1 THEN 'Approved' WHEN 2 THEN 'Rejected' WHEN 3 THEN 'Cancelled' WHEN 4 THEN 'Replaced' WHEN 5 THEN 'CancelledOffer' WHEN 6 THEN 'Modified' END ) , [ID Προβολής] = cp.id, [Ημερομηνία Δημιουργίας Συμβολαίου] = convert(nvarchar(50),co.CreatedOn,103), [Ημερομηνία Υπογραφής Συμβολαίου] = convert(nvarchar(50),co.SignedDate,103), [Πωλητής] = (SELECT u.LastName +' '+u.FirstName FROM [User] u WHERE u.id = co.SalesManID ), Supervisor = (SELECT u.LastName +' '+u.FirstName FROM [User] u WHERE u.id = tgiv.Supervisor ), [Προιόν] = cppr.code, [Συστατικό Προιόν] = pr.code, [Heading] = vgi.DESCRIPTION, [Αρχική αξία προιόντος] = cast(adv.Price as money) , [Έκπτωση προιόντος] = cast(adv.Discount + adv.RulesDiscount as money), [Τελική Αξία Προιόντος] = cast(adv.Price - adv.Discount - adv.RulesDiscount as money), [Μεταβεβλημένη Αξία Προιόντος] = cast(adv.AlteredAmount as money), [Ημερομηνία Έναρξης προβολής] = convert(nvarchar(50),adv.AdvBeginDate,103), [Τελική Αξία Συμβολαίου] = (cast((SELECT sum(CASE WHEN cp1.state IN (3,4) AND cp1.AlteredAmount IS NOT NULL THEN cp1.AlteredAmount else Price - Discount - RulesDiscount end) FROM dbo.ContractProduct cp1 WHERE RelatedContractID = co.id) as money)), [Συνδρομητικό]= (CASE cp.IsSubscriptionBased WHEN 1 then 'NAI' else 'OXI' end), [Ανανέωση Συνδρομητικού] = (CASE WHEN cp.IsRenewable=1 AND cp.IsRenewed=0 then 'NAI' else 'OXI' end), [AutoCreated] = (CASE WHEN co.OrigionalContractID IS NOT NULL THEN 'NAI' ELSE 'OXI' END), [Τρόπος πληρωμής] = pmt.Description, [Κανάλι πώλησης] = (select Description FROM channeltype ct WHERE ct.id = co.ChannelTypeID) --PaymentChannel = CASE pmt.PaymentWay -- WHEN 1 THEN 'ΠΙΣΤΩΤΙΚΗ ΚΑΡΤΑ' -- WHEN 2 THEN 'ΟΤΕ' -- WHEN 3 THEN 'ΜΕΤΡΗΤΑ' -- WHEN 4 THEN 'ΕΠΙΤΑΓΗ' -- WHEN 5 THEN 'ΤΑΧΥΠΛΗΡΩΜΗ' -- WHEN 6 THEN 'ΑΝΤΑΛΛΑΚΤΙΚΗ ΠΩΛΗΣΗ' -- WHEN 7 THEN 'ONLINE ΠΙΣΤΩΤΙΚΗ' -- WHEN 8 THEN 'OFFLINE ΠΙΣΤΩΤΙΚΗ' -- WHEN 9 THEN 'ΚΑΤΑΘΕΣΗ ΣΕ ΤΡΑΠΕΖΑ' -- WHEN 10 THEN 'ΕΠΙ ΠΙΣΤΩΣΕΙ' -- else 'other' -- END, --into #yy from dbo.BusinessPoint bp JOIN dbo.Contract co ON bp.ID = co.ActualBPOwnerID AND co.State in (1,6) LEFT JOIN dbo.InvoicePaymentMethod ipm ON ipm.id = co.id LEFT join dbo.TargetGroupItemValue tgiv on co.ID = tgiv.ContractID LEFT join dbo.TargetGroupItem tgi on tgiv.TargetGroupItemID = tgi.ID JOIN dbo.ContractProduct cp ON co.ID = cp.RelatedContractID left join Product CpPr on cp.ProductID = cppr.id and cppr.IsComposite = 1 LEFT JOIN dbo.PaymentMethod pm ON pm.id = cp.PaymentMethodID LEFT JOIN dbo.PaymentMethodType pmt ON pmt.id = ISNULL(ipm.PaymentMethodTypeID, pm.PaymentMethodTypeID) JOIN dbo.Advertisement adv ON cp.ID = adv.ContractProductID LEFT JOIN dbo.VersionGroupItem vgi ON adv.HeadingID = vgi.id JOIN dbo.Product pr ON adv.ProductID = pr.ID JOIN dbo.VersionSection vs ON adv.VersionSectionID = vs.ID JOIN dbo.MediumVersion mv ON mv.id = vs.MediumVersionID JOIN dbo.Medium m ON m.id = mv.MediumID WHERE --bp.IsActive = 1 --and pr.code in (@Udacs) AND m.id = @medium --AND --m.id IN (SELECT id FROM dbo.Medium WHERE MediumTypeID = 2) AND co.State in (@state) AND co.state NOT IN (3,5,10) AND (co.type not in (1,10)) AND ( (co.SignedDate BETWEEN @signedDate AND @signedDateplus1 AND OrigionalContractID IS NULL) OR (co.CreatedOn BETWEEN @signedDate AND @signedDateplus1 AND OrigionalContractID IS NOT NULL) ) ORDER BY [Συμβόλαιο] , [ID Προβολής]--, adv.id

templates.name: Συμβόλαια με προιόντα Internet - Udacs
templates.sql: SELECT DISTINCT pr.code FROM Product AS pr JOIN MediumVersion AS mv ON pr.mediumVersionID = mv.id AND mv.MediumID = @medium AND pr.IsDeleted = 0

templates.name: Συμβόλαια με προιόντα Internet - Mediums
templates.sql: SELECT DISTINCT ID, Name FROM Medium WHERE ( IsActive = 1 ) AND ( NOT ID IN (3, 7) ) AND ( MediumTypeID = 2 ) ORDER BY ID

templates.name: Συμβόλαια με Τρόπο Αποστολής - Ταχυδρομείο - Contracts With Ground Mail Type Of Shipping Data Set
templates.sql: SELECT bp.Code AS [Κωδ. Πελάτη], bp.Name AS [Επωνυμία], ctr.ID AS [Κωδ. Συμβολαίου], cmp.Name AS [Καμπάνια], ctr.SignedDate AS [Ημ. Υπογραφής], ctr.CreatedOn AS [Ημ. Δημ. Συμβολαίου] FROM dbo.Contract ctr JOIN dbo.TargetGroupItemValue tgiv ON ctr.ID = tgiv.ContractID JOIN dbo.TargetGroupItem tgi ON tgiv.TargetGroupItemID = tgi.ID JOIN dbo.Campaign cmp ON tgi.CampaignID = cmp.ID JOIN dbo.BusinessPoint bp ON tgi.BusinessPointID = bp.ID WHERE ctr.DMKey IS NULL AND ShippingType = @ShippingType AND ctr.State = 1 AND (ctr.type in (0,2,4)) AND cast(ctr.CreatedOn as date) > = @FromDate and cast(ctr.CreatedOn as date) < = @ToDate ORDER BY cmp.Name, ctr.CreatedOn

templates.name: Συμβόλαια με Τρόπο Πληρωμής Πιστωτική Κάρτα - DS
templates.source: rdl:Συμβόλαια με Τρόπο Πληρωμής Πιστωτική Κάρτα:DS
templates.sql: --DECLARE @datefrom DATE, @dateto DATE; --SET @datefrom = '20120801'; --SET @dateto = '20131011'; IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#customerRelationship') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #customerRelationship SELECT MainCustomerCode AS edra , CustomerCode AS ypokatasthma INTO #customerRelationship FROM CustomerRelationshipsView AS crv IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#price') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #price SELECT c.ID , cp.PaymentMethodID AS pm_id , SUM(CASE WHEN cp.state IN (3,4,6,7) AND cp.AlteredAmount IS NOT NULL THEN cp.AlteredAmount else cp.Price - cp.Discount - cp.RulesDiscount end) AS price INTO #price FROM Contract AS c INNER JOIN ContractProduct AS cp ON c.ID = cp.RelatedContractID INNER JOIN PaymentMethod AS pm ON cp.PaymentMethodID = pm.ID GROUP BY c.ID , cp.PaymentMethodID IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#main') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #main SELECT DISTINCT bp.Code AS BranchCode , bp.BrandName AS Customer , c.ID AS ContractCode , c.SignedDate AS SignDate , pm.Installments , pm.NumberOfInvoices , pm.ID AS pmId , CASE WHEN pmt.Description LIKE '%OFF%' THEN 'OFF LINE' WHEN pmt.Description LIKE '%ON%' THEN 'ON LINE' ELSE 'OTHER' END AS PaymentMethod INTO #main FROM Contract AS c INNER JOIN ContractProduct AS cp ON c.ID = cp.RelatedContractID INNER JOIN BusinessPoint AS bp ON bp.ID = c.ActualBPOwnerID INNER JOIN PaymentMethod AS pm ON cp.PaymentMethodID = pm.ID INNER JOIN PaymentMethodType AS pmt ON pm.PaymentMethodTypeID = pmt.ID WHERE ( c.State NOT IN ( 3, 5 , 10 ) ) AND ( c.Type IN ( 0, 2, 3, 4 ) ) AND ( cp.State <> 3 ) AND ( pmt.IsActive = 1 ) AND ( pmt.PaymentWay = 1 ) AND ( cp.IsRenewed <> 1 ) AND (( c.SignedDate BETWEEN @dateFrom AND DATEADD(day, 1, @dateTo) AND c.OrigionalContractID IS null) OR ( c.CreatedOn BETWEEN @dateFrom AND DATEADD(day, 1, @dateTo) AND c.OrigionalContractID IS NOT null) ) IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#result1') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #result1 SELECT m.BranchCode , m.Customer , m.ContractCode , CONVERT(NVARCHAR, m.SignDate, 103) AS SignDate , m.Installments , m.NumberOfInvoices , m.PaymentMethod , ISNULL(crm.edra, crs.edra) AS Mcustomer , ISNULL(crs.ypokatasthma, crm.ypokatasthma) AS Scustomer , SUM(DISTINCT p.price) AS ContractAmount INTO #result1 FROM #main AS m INNER JOIN #price AS p ON m.ContractCode = p.ID AND m.pmId = p.pm_id LEFT OUTER JOIN #customerRelationship AS crm ON m.BranchCode = crm.edra LEFT OUTER JOIN #customerRelationship AS crs ON m.BranchCode = crs.ypokatasthma GROUP BY m.BranchCode , m.Customer , m.ContractCode , m.SignDate , m.Installments , m.NumberOfInvoices , m.PaymentMethod , ISNULL(crm.edra, crs.edra) , ISNULL(crs.ypokatasthma, crm.ypokatasthma) ORDER BY m.PaymentMethod /*-*/ IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#price2') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #price2 SELECT c.ID , ipm.id AS pm_id , SUM(CASE WHEN cp.state IN (3,4) AND cp.AlteredAmount IS NOT NULL THEN cp.AlteredAmount else cp.Price - cp.Discount - cp.RulesDiscount end) AS price INTO #price2 FROM Contract AS c INNER JOIN ContractProduct AS cp ON c.ID = cp.RelatedContractID INNER JOIN InvoicePaymentMethod AS ipm ON cp.RelatedContractID = ipm.ID GROUP BY c.ID , ipm.id IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#main2') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #main2 SELECT DISTINCT bp.Code AS BranchCode , bp.BrandName AS Customer , c.ID AS ContractCode , c.SignedDate AS SignDate , ipm.Installments , ipm.NumberOfInvoices , ipm.ID AS pmId , CASE pmt.PaymentWay WHEN 7 THEN 'ON LINE' WHEN 8 THEN 'OFF LINE' ELSE 'OTHER' END AS PaymentMethod INTO #main2 FROM Contract AS c INNER JOIN ContractProduct AS cp ON c.ID = cp.RelatedContractID INNER JOIN BusinessPoint AS bp ON bp.ID = c.ActualBPOwnerID INNER JOIN InvoicePaymentMethod AS ipm ON cp.RelatedContractID = ipm.ID INNER JOIN PaymentMethodType AS pmt ON ipm.PaymentMethodTypeID = pmt.ID WHERE ( c.State <> 3 ) /*and c.id = 1806772*/ AND ( c.Type IN ( 0, 2, 3, 4 ) ) AND ( cp.State <> 3 ) AND ( pmt.IsActive = 1 ) AND ( pmt.PaymentWay IN ( 7, 8 ) ) AND ( cp.IsRenewed <> 1 ) AND (( c.SignedDate BETWEEN @dateFrom AND DATEADD(day, 1, @dateTo) AND c.OrigionalContractID IS null) OR ( c.CreatedOn BETWEEN @dateFrom AND DATEADD(day, 1, @dateTo) AND c.OrigionalContractID IS NOT null) ) /*select * from Contract where id = 1806772*/ IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#result2') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #result2 SELECT m.BranchCode , m.Customer , m.ContractCode , CONVERT(NVARCHAR, m.SignDate, 103) AS SignDate , m.Installments , m.NumberOfInvoices , m.PaymentMethod , ISNULL(crm.edra, crs.edra) AS Mcustomer , ISNULL(crs.ypokatasthma, crm.ypokatasthma) AS Scustomer , SUM(DISTINCT p.price) AS ContractAmount INTO #result2 FROM #main2 AS m INNER JOIN #price2 AS p ON m.ContractCode = p.ID AND m.pmId = p.pm_id LEFT OUTER JOIN #customerRelationship AS crm ON m.BranchCode = crm.edra LEFT OUTER JOIN #customerRelationship AS crs ON m.BranchCode = crs.ypokatasthma GROUP BY m.BranchCode , m.Customer , m.ContractCode , m.SignDate , m.Installments , m.NumberOfInvoices , m.PaymentMethod , ISNULL(crm.edra, crs.edra) , ISNULL(crs.ypokatasthma, crm.ypokatasthma) ORDER BY m.PaymentMethod SELECT * FROM #result1 UNION SELECT * FROM #result2

templates.name: Συνοπτική Παρουσίαση Βάσης - Λίστα Μητρώου 11 - Data Set1
templates.sql: SELECT his.* FROM [bpm].[HistoryGroup] AS his WHERE his.createdon >= @datefrom AND his.createdon < @dateto + 1

templates.name: Συνοπτική Παρουσίαση Βάσης - Λίστα Μητρώου 11 - Data Set2
templates.sql: SELECT his.* FROM [bpm].HistoryYPSBP AS his WHERE his.actionDate >= @datefrom AND actionDate <= @dateto

templates.name: Τζίρος ανά καμπάνια-κανάλι πληρωμής - Report DS
templates.sql: --DECLARE @DateFrom DATETIME -- , @DateTo DATETIME -- , @Mode BIT -- , @Autorenewal BIT ; --SET @DateFrom = '20130301' --SET @DateTo = '20130331' --SET @Mode = 0 --SET @Autorenewal = 0 ;WITH ContractPaymentChannel AS ( SELECT distinct ContractId = cp.RelatedContractID , PMId = pm.id , PaymentChannel = CASE pmt.PaymentWay WHEN 1 THEN 'ΠΙΣΤΩΤΙΚΗ ΚΑΡΤΑ' WHEN 2 THEN 'ΟΤΕ' WHEN 3 THEN 'ΜΕΤΡΗΤΑ' WHEN 4 THEN 'ΕΠΙΤΑΓΗ' WHEN 5 THEN 'ΤΑΧΥΠΛΗΡΩΜΗ' WHEN 6 THEN 'ΑΝΤΑΛΛΑΚΤΙΚΗ ΠΩΛΗΣΗ' WHEN 7 THEN 'ONLINE ΠΙΣΤΩΤΙΚΗ' WHEN 8 THEN 'OFFLINE ΠΙΣΤΩΤΙΚΗ' WHEN 9 THEN 'ΚΑΤΑΘΕΣΗ ΣΕ ΤΡΑΠΕΖΑ' WHEN 10 THEN 'ΕΠΙ ΠΙΣΤΩΣΕΙ' else 'other' END , RankId = RANK() OVER ( PARTITION BY cp.RelatedContractID ORDER BY pm.id) FROM dbo.ContractProduct cp JOIN dbo.PaymentMethod pm ON cp.PaymentMethodID = pm.ID --3148247 JOIN dbo.PaymentMethodType pmt ON pm.PaymentMethodTypeID = pmt.ID union SELECT distinct ContractId = c.id , PMId = ipm.id , PaymentChannel = CASE pmt.PaymentWay WHEN 1 THEN 'ΠΙΣΤΩΤΙΚΗ ΚΑΡΤΑ' WHEN 2 THEN 'ΟΤΕ' WHEN 3 THEN 'ΜΕΤΡΗΤΑ' WHEN 4 THEN 'ΕΠΙΤΑΓΗ' WHEN 5 THEN 'ΤΑΧΥΠΛΗΡΩΜΗ' WHEN 6 THEN 'ΑΝΤΑΛΛΑΚΤΙΚΗ ΠΩΛΗΣΗ' WHEN 7 THEN 'ONLINE ΠΙΣΤΩΤΙΚΗ' WHEN 8 THEN 'OFFLINE ΠΙΣΤΩΤΙΚΗ' WHEN 9 THEN 'ΚΑΤΑΘΕΣΗ ΣΕ ΤΡΑΠΕΖΑ' WHEN 10 THEN 'ΕΠΙ ΠΙΣΤΩΣΕΙ' else 'other' END , RankId = 1 FROM dbo.contract c join dbo.InvoicePaymentMethod ipm on c.id = ipm.id JOIN dbo.PaymentMethodType pmt ON ipm.PaymentMethodTypeID = pmt.ID ), AllContracts AS ( SELECT Campaign = '[' + cm.Code + '] ' + cm.Name , ch.PaymentChannel , AutoRenewal = CASE WHEN ct.OriginalContractType = 1 AND ct.OrigionalContractID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END , ContractId = ct.ID , ContractValue = (SELECT CAST(SUM( CASE WHEN cp.[STATE] in (3,4) AND cp.AlteredAmount IS NOT NULL THEN cp.AlteredAmount ELSE (cp.Price - cp.Discount - cp.RulesDiscount) END ) AS money) FROM dbo.ContractProduct cp JOIN dbo.Contract ct1 ON cp.RelatedContractID = ct1.id WHERE cp.RelatedContractID = ct.id AND cp.State NOT IN (3)) FROM dbo.Contract ct left JOIN dbo.Campaign cm ON ct.CampaignID = cm.ID JOIN ( SELECT ContractId , PaymentChannel FROM ContractPaymentChannel WHERE RankId = 1 ) ch ON ch.ContractId = ct.id WHERE /*not cancelled*/ ct.State not in (3,5,10) /*not fix offers*/ AND ct.Type NOT IN ( 1, 10 ) /*have passed supervisor approval*/ AND ( /*Production */ EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM dbo.TargetGroupItemValue tgiv JOIN dbo.[Case] cs ON cs.ContextEntityID = tgiv.ID AND cs.ContextEntityType = 'TGIV' JOIN dbo.Task T ON cs.ID = T.CaseID AND t.TaskTypeID = 189 WHERE tgiv.ContractID = ct.ID ) OR /*Autorenewal*/ ( ct.OriginalContractType = 1 AND ct.OrigionalContractID IS NOT NULL ) ) AND CASE WHEN @Mode = 1 THEN ct.SignedDate ELSE ct.CreatedOn END BETWEEN @DateFrom AND DATEADD(day, 1, @DateTo) ) SELECT isnull(Campaign, '(άνευ)') as Campaign , PaymentChannel , AutoRenewal , ContractNbr = COUNT(DISTINCT ContractId) , ContractValue = CAST(SUM(ContractValue) AS MONEY) FROM AllContracts rc WHERE CAST(AutoRenewal AS NVARCHAR(1)) LIKE CASE WHEN @Autorenewal = 1 THEN '%' ELSE '0' END GROUP BY Campaign , PaymentChannel , AutoRenewal ORDER BY 1 , 2

templates.name: Τζίρος ανά μήνα-καμπάνια-κανάλι πληρωμής - Data Set1
templates.sql: --DECLARE @dateFrom DATE, @dateTo DATE, @w_sign bit; --SET @dateFrom = '20120101' --SET @dateTo = '20130601' --SET @w_sign = 1 ; SELECT ISNULL(camp, '(κενή)') AS Καμπάνια , creMonth AS μήνας , PaymentChannel ,/* COUNT( DISTINCT ctid) AS πλήθος,*/ SUM(CPamount) AS Τζίρος FROM ( SELECT [ctid] = ct.id , [cpid] = cp.id , [camp] = ( '[' + c.Code + '] ' + c.Name ) , [creMonth] = CASE WHEN ct.OrigionalContractID IS NULL AND @w_sign = 1 THEN CAST(MONTH(ct.CreatedOn) AS NVARCHAR(5)) + '/' + CAST(YEAR(ct.SignedDate) AS NVARCHAR(5)) WHEN ct.OrigionalContractID IS NULL AND @w_sign = 0 THEN CAST(MONTH(ct.CreatedOn) AS NVARCHAR(5)) + '/' + CAST(YEAR(ct.CreatedOn) AS NVARCHAR(5)) WHEN ct.OrigionalContractID IS NOT NULL THEN CAST(MONTH(ct.CreatedOn) AS NVARCHAR(5)) + '/' + CAST(YEAR(ct.CreatedOn) AS NVARCHAR(5)) END , [PaymentChannel] = CASE pmt.PaymentWay --WHEN 1 THEN 'ΠΙΣΤΩΤΙΚΗ ΚΑΡΤΑ' WHEN 2 THEN 'ΟΤΕ' --WHEN 3 THEN 'ΜΕΤΡΗΤΑ' --WHEN 4 THEN 'ΕΠΙΤΑΓΗ' --WHEN 5 THEN 'ΤΑΧΥΠΛΗΡΩΜΗ' --WHEN 6 THEN 'ΑΝΤΑΛΛΑΚΤΙΚΗ ΠΩΛΗΣΗ' --WHEN 7 THEN 'ONLINE ΠΙΣΤΩΤΙΚΗ' --WHEN 8 THEN 'OFFLINE ΠΙΣΤΩΤΙΚΗ' --WHEN 9 THEN 'ΚΑΤΑΘΕΣΗ ΣΕ ΤΡΑΠΕΖΑ' --WHEN 10 THEN 'ΕΠΙ ΠΙΣΤΩΣΕΙ' ELSE 'Non OTE' END , [CPamount] = CAST(CASE WHEN cp.[STATE] in (3,4) AND cp.AlteredAmount IS NOT NULL THEN cp.AlteredAmount ELSE ( cp.Price - cp.Discount - cp.RulesDiscount ) END AS MONEY) --,[date] =CASE WHEN ct.OrigionalContractID IS NULL AND @w_sign = 1 THEN ct.SignedDate -- when ct.OrigionalContractID IS NULL AND @w_sign = 0 THEN ct.CreatedOn -- when ct.OrigionalContractID IS NOT NULL THEN ct.CreatedOn -- END --select * FROM dbo.Contract ct LEFT JOIN dbo.Campaign c ON ct.CampaignID = c.id JOIN dbo.ContractProduct cp ON cp.RelatedContractID = ct.id LEFT JOIN dbo.PaymentMethod pm ON cp.PaymentMethodID = pm.id LEFT JOIN dbo.InvoicePaymentMethod ipm ON ipm.id = ct.id LEFT JOIN dbo.PaymentMethodType pmt ON ISNULL(pm.PaymentMethodTypeID, ipm.PaymentMethodTypeID) = pmt.id WHERE ( ( @w_sign = 1 AND ct.SignedDate BETWEEN @dateFrom AND DATEADD(day, 1, @dateTo) AND ct.OrigionalContractID IS NULL ) OR ( @w_sign = 0 AND ct.CreatedOn BETWEEN @dateFrom AND DATEADD(day, 1, @dateTo) AND ct.OrigionalContractID IS NULL ) OR ( ct.CreatedOn BETWEEN @dateFrom AND DATEADD(day, 1, @dateTo) AND ct.OrigionalContractID IS NOT NULL ) ) AND ct.type IN ( 0, 2, 3, 4 ) AND ct.state NOT IN ( 3, 5, 10 ) AND cp.State <> 3 ) aa GROUP BY camp , creMonth , PaymentChannel ORDER BY 1 , RIGHT(creMonth, 4) , RIGHT('0' + creMonth, 7)

templates.name: Φερεγγυότητα Πελατών - Data Set Solvency
templates.sql: SELECT * FROM CustomerSolvency

templates.name: Φερεγγυότητα Πελατών - Data Set Score
templates.sql: SELECT cn.ID, cn.Name FROM ClassifierNode AS cn JOIN Classifier AS cl ON cn.ClassifierTreeID = cl.ClassifierTreeID WHERE Cl.ID = 13 ORDER BY cn.Name

templates.name: Χρόνοι Διαχείρισης Lead - Lead Source Type
templates.sql: --SELECT DISTINCT ISNULL(TicketSource,'-') FROM lpm.lead ORDER BY 1 SELECT Description FROM yps.dbo.TicketSourceType WHERE IsActive = 1 UNION SELECT '-'

templates.name: Χρόνοι Διαχείρισης Lead - Outcome
templates.sql: SELECT ISNULL(Name, '-') FROM lpm.Outcome WHERE IsActive = 1 UNION SELECT '-' ORDER BY 1

templates.name: Χρόνοι Διαχείρισης Lead - Main DS
templates.sql: -- SELECT -- LeadId = l.Id -- BPCode = l.BusinessPointCode -- FROM lpm.Lead l -- WHERE l.CreatedOn >= @fromDate AND l.CreatedOn <= @toDate --Πίνακας Manager-- IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#manager') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #manager; SELECT ll.Id, ll.LeadId, ll.AssignmentUser, ll.CreatedOn as CreatedOn, RowNo = ROW_NUMBER() Over( partition by ll.leadId order by ll.id desc) INTO #manager FROM [lpm].[LeadLog] ll WHERE ll.actionid in (1,8) AND charindex('.',logdesc) > 2 --select * from #manager where LeadId=76870 --LEFT JOIN yps.dbo.SalesTreeHistory sth on sth.SalesmanID = u.id and sth.[Year] = YEAR(ctr.CreatedOn) and sth.SegmentID = MONTH(ctr.CreatedOn) and sth.IsDeleted=0 --LEFT JOIN yps.dbo.[User] area on sth.ManagerID = area.ID --select distinct AssignmentUser from #manager --Πίνακας Supervisor-- IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#supervisor') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #supervisor; SELECT ll.Id, ll.LeadId, ll.AssignmentUser, ll.CreatedOn as CreatedOn, RowNo = ROW_NUMBER() Over( partition by ll.leadId order by ll.id desc) INTO #supervisor FROM [lpm].[LeadLog] ll WHERE ll.actionid in (2,9) AND charindex('.',logdesc) > 2 --Πίνακας ΣΔ-- IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#advisor') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #advisor; SELECT ll.Id, ll.LeadId, ll.AssignmentUser, ll.CreatedOn as CreatedOn, RowNo = ROW_NUMBER() Over( partition by ll.leadId order by ll.id desc) INTO #advisor FROM [lpm].[LeadLog] ll WHERE ll.actionid in (3,10) AND charindex('.',logdesc) > 2 --Πίνακας Επιστροφής-- IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#return') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #return; SELECT ll.Id, ll.LeadId, ll.AssignmentUser, ll.CreatedOn as CreatedOn, RowNo = ROW_NUMBER() Over( partition by ll.leadId order by ll.id asc) INTO #return FROM [lpm].[LeadLog] ll WHERE ll.actionid = 5 AND charindex('.',logdesc) > 2 --Πίνακας Επανάθεσης-- IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#reassign') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #reassign; SELECT ll.Id, ll.LeadId, ll.AssignmentUser, ll.CreatedOn as CreatedOn, RowNo = ROW_NUMBER() Over( partition by ll.leadId order by ll.id asc) INTO #reassign FROM [lpm].[LeadLog] ll WHERE ll.ActionId IN (8,9,10) AND charindex('.',logdesc) > 2 --Πίνακας Προσωρινής Κατάστασης-- IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#tempStatus') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #tempStatus; SELECT ll.Id, ll.LeadId, ll.Status as TempStatus, ll.CreatedOn as CreatedOn, RowNo = ROW_NUMBER() Over( partition by ll.leadId order by ll.id asc) INTO #tempStatus FROM [lpm].[LeadLog] ll WHERE ll.ActionId = 6 --Πίνακας Καταχώρησης Οριστικού Αποτελέσματος-- IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#entryOutcome') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #entryOutcome; SELECT ll.Id, ll.LeadId, ll.CreatedOn, ll.Outcome as EntryOutcome, RowNo = ROW_NUMBER() Over( partition by ll.leadId order by ll.id asc) INTO #entryOutcome FROM [lpm].[LeadLog] ll WHERE ll.ActionId = 4 --Πίνακας Επιβεβαίωσης Οριστικού Αποτελέσματος-- IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#finalOutcome') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #finalOutcome; SELECT ll.Id, ll.LeadId, ll.CreatedOn, CASE WHEN ll.Outcome IS NULL THEN ( select top 1 Outcome from lpm.LeadLog l where LeadId=ll.LeadId and Outcome is not null order by CreatedOn desc) ELSE ll.Outcome END as FinalOutcome, RowNo = ROW_NUMBER() Over( partition by ll.leadId order by ll.id asc) INTO #finalOutcome FROM [lpm].[LeadLog] ll WHERE ll.ActionId = 7 --Πίνακας Lead Filtered by Input / Parameter Dates-- IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#leadsByDate') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #leadsByDate; SELECT * INTO #leadsByDate FROM [lpm].[Lead] l WHERE CAST(l.CreatedOn AS DATE) >= CAST(@fromDate AS DATE)--cast('20200101' as date) AND CAST(l.CreatedOn as DATE) <= CAST(@toDate AS DATE)--cast('20210301' as date) IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#admin') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #admin; select id=0, u.USERNAME, UserFullName = 'Admin', YpsUserId=0, SalesmanIds = (select SalesmanYPSIds from ItApps.scd.Salesman where Username = 'araptis'), ShortName = '', AppCode = a.APPLICATION_CODE, UserID = usr.Id into #admin from [ITApps].[dbo].IT_APPLICATION_RIGHTS r join [ITApps].[dbo].IT_APPLICATION_USERS u on u.ADID = r.USER_ADID join [ITApps].[dbo].IT_APPLICATIONS a on a.ID = r.APPLICATION_ID --join [ITApps].[dbo].[YPSUsersAll] usr on usr.Username = u.USERNAME join YPS.dbo.[user] usr on usr.USERNAME = u.USERNAME where a.APPLICATION_CODE = 'rep' ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- SELECT LeadId = l.Id, BPCode = l.BusinessPointCode, Source = l.TicketSource, CreatedOn = l.CreatedOn, DateAssignedToArea = dM.CreatedOn, AreaManager= dM.AssignmentUser, DateAssignedToSuper = dS.CreatedOn, Supervisor = dS.AssignmentUser, DateAssignedToAdvisor = dA.CreatedOn, Advisor = dA.AssignmentUser, ReturnDate = re.CreatedOn, ReturnedUsr = re.AssignmentUser, ReassignDate = rea.CreatedOn, ReassignUsr = rea.AssignmentUser, InitialEditDate = l.FirstOpenOn, InitialCommDate = l.FirstCommunicationOn, TmpStatusDate = tmp.CreatedOn, TmpStatus = tmp.TempStatus, eoCreatedOn =eo.CreatedOn, eoOutcome = eo.EntryOutcome, foCreatedOn = fo.CreatedOn, foOutcome = fo.FinalOutcome, curOutcome = ou.Name FROM #leadsByDate l LEFT JOIN #manager dM ON dM.LeadId = l.Id AND dM.RowNo = 1 LEFT JOIN #supervisor dS ON dS.LeadId = l.Id AND dS.RowNo = 1 LEFT JOIN #advisor dA ON dA.LeadId = l.Id AND dA.RowNo = 1 LEFT JOIN #return re ON re.LeadId = l.Id AND re.RowNo = 1 LEFT JOIN #reassign rea ON rea.LeadId = l.Id AND rea.RowNo = 1 LEFT JOIN #tempStatus tmp ON tmp.LeadId = l.Id AND tmp.RowNo = 1 LEFT JOIN #entryOutcome eo ON eo.LeadId = l.Id AND eo.RowNo = 1 LEFT JOIN #finalOutcome fo ON fo.LeadId = l.Id AND fo.RowNo = 1 LEFT JOIN lpm.Outcome ou ON ou.Id = l.OutcomeId WHERE ((dM.AssignmentUser IN (@areamanagerName) OR dM.AssignmentUser IS NULL) AND (dS.AssignmentUser IN (@supervisor) OR dS.AssignmentUser IS NULL) AND (dA.AssignmentUser IN (@salesman) OR dA.AssignmentUser IS NULL) AND ISNULL(ou.Name,'-') IN (@leadOutcome) AND ISNULL(l.TicketSource,'-') IN (@sourceType) AND COALESCE(dM.AssignmentUser,dS.AssignmentUser,dA.AssignmentUser) IS NOT NULL ) OR ((dM.AssignmentUser IN (@areamanagerName) OR dM.AssignmentUser IS NULL) AND (dS.AssignmentUser IN (@supervisor) OR dS.AssignmentUser IS NULL) AND (dA.AssignmentUser IN (@salesman) OR dA.AssignmentUser IS NULL) AND (ISNULL(ou.Name,'-') IN (@leadOutcome) AND ISNULL(l.TicketSource,'-') IN (@sourceType) AND COALESCE(dM.AssignmentUser,dS.AssignmentUser,dA.AssignmentUser) IS NULL AND (@ypscurrentuserid in (1189,2264,524 ,426,2262,493) /*araptis,pissadaki,boulouxou,karmiri*/) OR (@ypscurrentuserid in (select UserID from #admin UNION select 2264 )))) ORDER BY l.Id DESC

templates.name: Χρόνοι Διαχείρισης Lead - Area Manager
templates.sql: --declare @username nvarchar(50) --set @username = 'spitsaris'; --declare @ypscurrentuserid int = 2503; IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#tt') IS NOT NULL drop table #tt; IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#area') IS NOT NULL drop table #area; IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#supervisor') IS NOT NULL drop table #supervisor; IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#admin') IS NOT NULL drop table #admin; SELECT u.* into #area FROM [ITApps].[dbo].[YPSUsersAll] u join YPS.dbo.UserRole ur on u.YPSUserId = ur.UserID where ur.RoleID in (41,42) and u.YPSUserId <> 1189 /*araptis*/ select u.* into #supervisor FROM [ITApps].[dbo].[YPSUsersAll] u join YPS.dbo.UserRole ur on u.YPSUserId = ur.UserID where ur.RoleID in (43,44) and u.YPSUserId not in (select YPSUserId from #area ) and u.YPSUserId <> 1189 /*araptis*/ select id=0, u.USERNAME, UserFullName = 'Admin', YpsUserId=0, SalesmanIds = (select SalesmanYPSIds from ItApps.scd.Salesman where Username = 'araptis'), ShortName = '', AppCode = a.APPLICATION_CODE, UserID = usr.Id into #admin from [ITApps].[dbo].IT_APPLICATION_RIGHTS r join [ITApps].[dbo].IT_APPLICATION_USERS u on u.ADID = r.USER_ADID join [ITApps].[dbo].IT_APPLICATIONS a on a.ID = r.APPLICATION_ID --join [ITApps].[dbo].[YPSUsersAll] usr on usr.Username = u.USERNAME join YPS.dbo.[user] usr on usr.USERNAME = u.USERNAME where a.APPLICATION_CODE = 'rep' select Salesman = u.YPSUserId, SalesmanName = u.UserFullName, AreaManager = area.YPSUserId, AreaManagerName = '['+area.UserSalesCode+'] ' + area.UserFullName,u.Username,area.UserFullName into #tt from [ITApps].[dbo].[YPSUsersAll] u left join #area area on u.FullUnitId like area.FullUnitId + '%' where area.Level = (select max(ain.level) from #area ain where u.FullUnitId like ain.FullUnitId + '%' ) order by 3 --select * from YPS.dbo.[user] u where username = 'ekarmiri' if (@ypscurrentuserid in (select UserID from #admin ) or @ypscurrentuserid in (1189,2264,524 ,426,2262,493) /*araptis*/) and @ypscurrentuserid not in (select YPSUserID from #area)-- Admin begin select distinct t.AreaManager,t.AreaManagerName,t.UserFullName from #tt t order by t.UserFullName end else if @ypscurrentuserid in (select YPSUserID from #area) and @ypscurrentuserid <> 1189 -- Area Manager begin select YPSUserId as AreaManager ,'['+UserSalesCode+'] '+UserFullName as AreaManagerName,UserFullName from #area a where a.YPSUserID = @ypscurrentuserid order by UserFullName end else if @ypscurrentuserid in (select YPSUserID from #supervisor) -- Supervisor begin select distinct YPSUserId as AreaManager, '['+UserSalesCode+'] '+UserFullName as AreaManagerName, UserFullName from YPS.dbo.SalesTreeHistory sth join #area a on sth.ManagerID = a.YPSUserId where sth.SupervisorID = @ypscurrentuserid and sth.year = year(getdate()) and sth.SegmentID = month(getdate()) end else-- if @username in (select t.salesman from #tt t) and @username <> 'araptis' and @username not in (select Username from #area) begin select t.AreaManager,t.AreaManagerName,t.UserFullName from #tt t where t.AreaManager = @ypscurrentuserid order by t.UserFullName end --else -- Sup or SR --select * from #tt where salesman = 1185 -- select * from [user] u where u.id in (718)(1303) (1185, --1189, --1306, --1330, --1378, --1385, --2024) -- --

templates.name: Χρόνοι Διαχείρισης Lead - Supervisor
templates.sql: IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#area') IS NOT NULL drop table #area; IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#supervisor') IS NOT NULL drop table #supervisor; SELECT u.* into #area FROM [ITApps].[dbo].[YPSUsersAll] u join [YPS].[dbo].UserRole ur on u.YPSUserId = ur.UserID where ur.RoleID in (41,42) and u.YPSUserId <> 1189 /*araptis*/ select u.* into #supervisor FROM [ITApps].[dbo].[YPSUsersAll] u join [YPS].[dbo].UserRole ur on u.YPSUserId = ur.UserID where ur.RoleID in (43,44) and u.YPSUserId not in (select YPSUserId from #area ) and u.YPSUserId <> 1189 /*araptis*/ if @ypscurrentuserid in (select YPSUserID from #supervisor) begin select distinct YPSUserId as SupervisorID, '['+UserSalesCode+'] '+UserFullName as Supervisor, UserFullName from [YPS].[dbo].SalesTreeHistory sth join #supervisor s on sth.SupervisorID = s.YPSUserId where sth.SupervisorID = @ypscurrentuserid and sth.year = year(getdate()) and sth.SegmentID = month(getdate()) end else begin select distinct sth.SupervisorID,'['+UserSalesCode+'] '+UserFullName as Supervisor,UserFullName from [YPS].[dbo].SalesTreeHistory sth join [ITApps].[dbo].[YPSUsersAll] sup on sup.YPSUserId = sth.SupervisorID where sth.ManagerID in (@areamanager) and sth.year = year(getdate()) and sth.SegmentID = month(getdate()) order by UserFullName end

templates.name: Χρόνοι Διαχείρισης Lead - User Id
templates.sql: SELECT usr.id FROM [YPS].[dbo].[user] AS usr WHERE CASE WHEN @username = 'amatzorou' THEN 'amantzorou' ELSE @username END = usr.UserName

templates.name: Χρόνοι Διαχείρισης Lead - Area Manager Name
templates.sql: SELECT '[' + u.UserSalesCode + '] ' + u.UserFullName AS AreaManagerName FROM [ITApps].[dbo].[YPSUsersAll] AS u WHERE u.YPSUserId IN (@areamanager)

templates.name: Χρόνοι Διαχείρισης Lead - Salesmen
templates.sql: SELECT DISTINCT '[' + u.UserSalesCode + '] ' + u.UserFullName AS Salesman FROM yps.dbo.SalesTreeHistory AS sth JOIN [ITApps].[dbo].[YPSUsersAll] AS u ON u.YPSUserId = sth.SalesmanID JOIN [ITApps].[dbo].[YPSUsersAll] AS s ON s.YPSUserId = sth.SupervisorID WHERE sth.Year = YEAR(GETDATE()) AND sth.IsDeleted = 0 AND ( '[' + s.UserSalesCode + '] ' + s.UserFullName ) IN (@supervisor) AND NOT u.UserSalesCode IS NULL
